column2: Jisu Khrista David atu ate Abraham sanao pa puhang pahang na jiekka shi.
Abraham hi Isaac hina mapa, Isaac na Jacob hina mapa Jacob na Judah akha chu ulenao ngei mapa.
Judah na Perez lea Zerah mapa, hana manu na Tamar, Perez na Hezron mapa, Hezron na Ram mapa.
Ram na Amminadab mapa. Amminadab na Nahshon mapa, Nashon na Salmon mapa.
Salmon na Boaz mapa manu na Rahab Obed mapa na Boaz akha chu manu na Ruth, Jesse mapa na Obed.
Akha chu arengpa David manu chu Uriah namei ae.
Rehoboam mapa na Solomon, Abijah mapa na Rehoboam, Asa mapa na Abijah.
Jehoshaphat mapa na Asa. Jehoram mapa na Jehoshaphat, Uzziah mapa na Jehoram.
Jotham mapa na Uzziah Ahaz mapa na Jotham Hezekiah mapa na Ahaz.
Manasseh mapa na Hezekiah, Amon mapa na Manasseh. Josiah mapa na Amon.
Akha chu Jeconiah lea uleh nao ngei mapa na Josiah, Babylon na phaija ta lei sunga don.
Babylon na phaija ta nutienga Jeconiah hi shealtiel ma pa ae. Zerubbabel mapa na Shealtiel.
Abiud mapa na Zerubbabel. Eliakim mapa na Abiud. Azo mapa na Eliakim.
Zadok mapa na Azos. Akim mapana Zadok. Eliud mapa na Akim.
Eleazar mapa na Eliud. Mathan mapa na Eeazar. Jacob mapa na Matthan.
Akha chu Khrista Jisu ta kok Messiya manu Mary pasal na Josep hina mapa na Jacob.
Abram hai thou David phao shunga meerul asom inly, Huna David hai thou Babylon na phaija tah phao sung hina meerul asom inly. Huna hai thou wa khrista phao sung kom meerul asom inly.
Jisu Khrista hi ta don ae, manu Mary hi Josep kolla nuhla ranga reikung silsha so weh chuti weta manui ani na taichang matieng Mary chu muihla athieng na nao ron so ae.
Chuna mapasal chang angpa Josep chu adiek tullu lu mee sou chu mee ngei na thei hap matienga athei chak alung sunga daitiek ta hran hou rang hal so.
Rouram lim mahal su nutienga Arengpu wanrui na ma manga amo ta kok, “David sanao Josep, Mary ta nei ang ati no oh rouram chu mawon sunga naoron chu muihla athieng hai thou ae.
Namei hana spa don ange akha chu nangna maming hi Jisu ta kokko, amona mamee ngei ta pak hai thou sanpi ange.”
Nalim pa hi Arengpu rou ma ril rouphu na rilsha ha thungpi ranga ae.
“Athieng snu chunga naoron nange amo na spa akha don ange, akha chu amota Immanuel ta kokkange” (hina rilna chu, “Anita am haso Chungthieng.”)
Josep na eenhrang lakjuija Areng wanrui na amo ta trongsan pek nu juija amona Mary ta anamei changa ma inn na rui phao.
Chuti weta amona nao don ma lim ma anamei ae ta jalha hrun ha no ae. Akha chu aming ko amo na Jisu ta kokkae.
Herod Reng na reng changlei ah. Judea ram Bethlehem ma Jisu don su takka, nasu tienga athei asingei na Jerushalem ma phao.
Akha chu sai, “Jews ngei Rengpa don so weti chu hoija mo ae? Kani na nasu tienga ma-arshi ri unge akha chu amo ta mokranga phao unge.”
Herod rengpa akha chu Jerushalem ma am lim pa na theijuija lung ehekta olso.
Amona mamee ngei chungtekti thiempu akha chu roukung ocha ngei ta kokka rachun piweta manita sai, “Khrista ha hoi mun na don nang sha?”
Mani na sange, “Judea Bethlehem ah ae.” “Nahi ae rouphu ngei na jiekka hita shi:
“Judah ram sunga Bethlehem nang chu Judah ram sanao ngei karra sintekti ano ae; rouram chu kamee Israel ngei ta lamkai pi ang akha nakolla hai thou shuk kange.”
Chuna Herod na nasu tienga athei achang tuita kokweta ejong apha ah arshi na sukmoti hrabakta dangpha so.
Amona manita Bethlehem ah hla weta hita ril, “Thingo hanaweta unga am na ha hrabak dang shu nutienga keita takko, dangpi oh chuleh chu kei kom thingweta amota mok thing tikkae.”
Rengpa kolla mani thei su nutienga mani na mani lam hana thinga nasu tienga mani ri arshi hana matienga thinge nao san am na pha ma lim ma.
Arshi ha na ngir rijui ariem na shihakti so.
Inn hana mani lutjuija naosan ha chu manu Mary hitta am riso. Akha chu manina huk hrun weta amo ta moksho. Hana mani thul hongweta ariem hoi shariktui akha chu sona ha pepi sho.
Mani ta amanga dangpi nu juija Herod am na tienga lea no wa, mani na adang lampi tienga mani ram ma lea so weh.

Mani thing nutienga Arengpa wanrui na Josep manga ripi ah amo na rille; “Thou jou wo, hana unga lea manu hitta Egypt pa bithingo. Amunt hana am mo nakolla Le-ota kadang pimalimma, rouram chu Herod na unga ha ta that ranga jonga am meh.”
Chuna amo na thou weta unga akha chu manu ta jantinga Egypt pa thing so.
Amunt hana Herod theet malim ma amo na ammeh. Chuna rouphu thiempu na rilshukha atun chu tungso ae: “Keina kasanaopa Egypt hai thou sunga kokkange.”
Herod na dangphaso nasutienga athei achangei na amota routhup so ae ta madangpha ah, amo na alung sha ah Bethlehem sunga am nao san spa akum ani thuija am lim ta that ranga trongsan pe so.
Hana rouphu pa Jeremiah na ril phur ha adiek takka shukso:
“Ramah hai thou wa meetrap sanrol akha chu Rachel na asanao ngei taranga trap pa; akha chu ma hoi rang ephou am no ae rouram chu mani ha am no jarra.”
Herod thit su takka Egypt ram ma Josep manga Arengpa wanrui na amota ripi.
Akha chu ril, “Thou oh, unga akha chu manu ruiweta Israel ramma lea oh rouram chu unga hata la tikkae ta ae mee amo ha thi so ae.”
Chuna amona thou weta unga akha chu manu ta rui weh ta Israel ram thing so.
Chuti weta Arkileas na Judea ram ma mapa Herod hut sil so weh theipa chu amo na amunt hana thing rang atri. Chutichun mamanga takpi nu juija amona Galily ram tienga thingso.
Akha chu amona Nazaret hulokka thingweta amso. Chuna rouphu ngei ril phur ha tungso, “Amo ta Nazarete mee ta kokkange.”
Hanalei rungnie ah Johon Baptias na Judiah ram rukka phaoweta rouril ae.
Akha chu hita ril, “Shilung hlongo, Rengpa ma ram thangwan neiso ae.”
Hiso ae rouphu Isaiah marou ril phur ha,
“Ram rukka sanrol akha na koka am Arengpa
tarang lam shatto, mataranga lam jangpi oh.”
Johon punchoi dirchoi chu utshamul ae hana akung hit huppa. Mabak ma inn chu hou akha chu ram ma hui stui ae.
Jerushalem akha chu Judiah ram ma malmashi ngei akha chu Jordon ram tienga malmashi ngei na makolla phao ae.
Mani na mani pak rilsukweta Jordan turella makol hai thou Baptias ae.
Chutiweta amona Pharisi akha chu Saddukis ngei baptias ae ranga wak mari juija mo na mani ta ril lea, “Arul tu te ngei! atu na nangei ta tanna thingo, rilla meh? Chungthieng malungshit tung ang so.
Pak hei thou wa hlonga hou sange ti ha nangei tullu na ri pi oh.
Nathei chakka hita halla nathei ah hita rilno oh, ‘kani pa Abraham hek ti unge ta.’ Keina nangei ta rilla aminge Chungthieng na allung hai thou wa ko Abraham sanao ngei wul pi nea ae.
Thing too ah arei na tan na am so ae. Akha chu thingkung hana ara ahra ra no lea chu tan weta sermei ah jun ange.

“Keina nangei ta tui ah baptias ae pi sange nalung hlong sarukka, chuti weta kanutienga phao ang pa amo chu kei ta hella chungtek ae machung huirang phao ron na ephao matick cha nonge. Amo na nangei ta muihla athing akha chu sarmei ah baptias ae pi ange.
Arengpa makutta balei ha am meh akha chu shangrei na, ruimunt hana mashang lim rachon weta masier ah shangtak makhai chu shiweta ashi awai ta chu atreem am low sarmei ah deng-ange.
Jisu na Galily hai thou wa Jordan turel la Johon kolla baptias ae ranga phao.
Chutiweta Johon na ae no ranga rilleh, “Keita nangna baptias ae pi anga ae, hatiweta nangna keita alo ae pi oh ta phao ah che meh?”
Jisu na sange, “Ashu oh; hijongpa hina adiek tullu lu ranga ani taranga ahra sa ae hanapa chu Johon na ngei pi so.”
Jisu na baptias ae su len tui sunga thou mashuk juija thangwan honga Chungthieng muihla na urhu hekta tumma junga machunga mawar war riso.
Akha chu thangwan tieng hai thou wa sanrol akha na ril. “Nahi kasanao pa ae machunga keina lunghsi inge keina amota leima lung tin shinge.”
Jisu ta hlem ranga dijabol na amota ramrukka muihla na rui thingso.
Suon somly akha chu jan somly bakno een no na amo hi wontarma hangso.
Dijabol ahlem na makolla phaoveta ril, “Ejonga nang na Chungthieng sanao mak ata lea chu nangna allung hita budol wul ranga rillo.”
Jisu na sang, “Hita jiek shi ae, budol chakna malmashi ringna no ae, chuna Chungthieng kol hai thou phao rou lim na ring ange.”
Hana hrano dijabolna athieng inn wangtekti am na Jerushalem athieng huluk hana amota ruija thingso.
“Ejonga nangna Chungthieng asanaopa lea chu,” nangna chom ma tummo, amona ril rouram chu hita jiekka shi so ae,
“Amo na mawanrui ngeita hla weta mani
kut na nangta lang ah,
nakae allung chunga
theng pi ang no ae.”
Jisu na sange, “Hita jiek ka shi sho ae, nang na narengpu Chungthieng ta chang an no oh.”
Woiha pakom dijabol na mullon chungtekti mun na rui oh thinga akha chu simlei chunga rengram lim ma ahra ahoi eja ta ripi.
Hana amo na ril, “Nalim hi keina nangta pe-ange, ejonga nangna keita huk rhun weta mok ta lea chu.”
Jisu na amota ril, “Ka am na hai thou wa thing jou oh, Saitan! rouram chu hita jieka shi so ae nangna narengpa Chungthieng mo ta chak mokkanga ae.”
Hana chu dijabol na amota houphur weta wanrui na makolla phao weta amha so.
Johon ta aral inn sunga shi so ae ta Jisu na thei pha pa chu amona Galily tienga lea so.
Hana Nazarete houphur weta Jebulun akha chu Naptaly Galily tuipi ramtienga Kapharnahum ma thing so.
Rouphu Isaiah ril sha adiek takka shuk ranga,
“Jebulun ram akha chu Naptaly ram tuipi lam tienga mun ha ah Jordan, ral ha ah meejat adang Galily.
Ramthim ma ringa am malmashi ngei na alok mawar ripha so. Hana athi hla ram ma ringa am ngei tarang mawar war thou so.”
Hana apha thou wa Jisu na rou sam thouso. “Lung hlongo, rouram chu thangwan rengram nei so ae.”
Jisu na Galily tuipi ralla mathing juija Saimon Pitar akhu chu manou Andrew manui na tuipi sunga len junna am riso, manui ha tuirik mant mee ae.
Jisu na ril, “Wa oh kanutieng juijo, akha chu keina nangei ta mee mant mee changpi ange.”
Hana makka manui na mani len haouphur weta manutieng jui so.
Amunt hana thou thinga amo na Zebedi spa ulehnao Jacob akha chu Johon riso. Manui ha mapa hitta kung sunga len photta am ha Jisu na manuita kok.
Apha hana makka manuina kung akha chu mapa ta houphur weta manutieng jui so ae.
Jisu na Galily ram sung lim ma thing weta Synagoge sunga Reng maram ahra rou chupi rilpi ah akha chu malmashi ana rai eja ta dampi ae.

Syria ram sunga am malmashi ngei na routhar lim hi thei ah akha chu malmashi ngei na makolla rai adang adang eja hana ehakta dongneno arot asha ngei hana thikirdon, dijabol na mant, akha chu tak ahui athisa ngei eja amo na dampi sho weh.
Chuna Galily, Dekapoli, Jerushalem, Judiah akha chu Jordan ralha tieng hai thou wairul riha ngei na manutieng jui.
Jisu na wairul riha ta mari juija amo na mullon tienga kal hang weta ong so weh, hana marui ngei na makolla wa ah.
Akha chu amo na manita chupi thou so weh:
“Muihla ah ringrei ngei ha jaihra ae;
ti chu thangwan rengram ha mani tarange!
“Ningshi tah olla am mani ha jaihra ae;
rouram chu mani ta hoipi ange!
“Lung nem ngei ha jaihra ae;
rouram chu mani na alei ram hi chang ange!
“Adiek taranga tuiral wantam ngei ha jaihra ae;
rou ram chu mani ta won shi pi ange!
“Lungshi ngei ha jaihra ae; rouram chu
mani chunga meelungshit pha nge!
“Lung thieng ngei ha jaihra ae;
rouram chu mani na chung thieng ta ri ange!
“Adai semthei ngei ha jaihra ae;
rouram chu manita Chungthieng sanao ngei ta kokkange!
“Adiek taranga aol ana dong ngei ha jaihra ae;
rouram chu thangwan rengram mani ta ae!
“Kasaruk ka sharei ah nangei ta mee na anar ah ehai lim na hra no tullu lu, diekno rou ril, aol ana dong akha chu ajak pha ngei ha jaihra ae.
Ariem mo akha chu lella hoi oh. Rouramchu wanram ma natarang alok amant shi sho weh rouram chu nangei matienga roumaril shuk thiempu ngei ta kom aol ana pe ae.

“Nangei chu alei ram ma chi chau ae. Chutiweta ejonga chi na ma-al am no lea, alo ta amota al rang sem mang meh? Chu lea chu lea sier ra amo ta eheilim ma ahra rang am no ae, denga hou weta mee na to ah hou no wa chu.
“Nangei ha aleiram ma awar chau ae, mullon na hulok ta eitick ko thumpa shi ngai no ae.
Atuna kom awar dewankari ta tai sunga shi no ae; hana shi ang hutta mani na adui na chunga shi ae, akha chu mawar ha inn sunga am limpa na pha ae.
Hihekta nawar hakom mee ngei maikunga warpi oh, chuleh chu mani na ahra natullu lu ri weta akha chu wanram ma napathieng ta kom malmashi ngei na dom mange.
“Nangei na keita hal no oh rouphon hou ranga akha chu rouphusuk ngei ta mangpi junge ta; manita mangpi jung nonge chuti weta mami ta tinpi jung singe.
Keina adiek rou ril inge thangwan akha chu shimlei tiem ma lim chu jiekka shi sintekti rou akha chu chilepti akhaphao rouphun na mapung pha malim chu mang ang no ae.

Chuna sarukka atu jongpa na, natrongsan hita kuipi weta meeta atante chupi takpi lea chu amo ta kom thangwan rengram ma amo ta kom asintekti kok kange, chuti weta atu jongpa na natrongsan hita hrabakta chupi takpi ah tullu lu lea chu thanwan rengram ma amota alokka kok kange.
Rouram chu keina nangei ta rilla aminge nangeina Pharisi ngei akha chu rouphun ocha ngei ta hella ngoiring am no lea chu nangei na thangwan rengram ma lut nea ang no ae.
“Apha eja matienga malmashi ngei ta rilphur rou ha nangna thei ang chau ae, ‘meeta that no oh; akha chu atu jongpa amona meeta that lea chu amota i routreem mang.’

Hana keina nangei kolla rilla aminge: atu jongpa na ma-u-manao ta eko nowa lungsha meeta kom routreem mange, woi hapa kom atu-jongpa na ma-u-manao ta ‘Raca’ (wonpilok) ta rilleh chu ulenchang ngei mai ah ajak tukkange, hana atu jongpa ta ‘he lungmo!’ ta ril mee kom sarmei kum ma aol pha ange.
Chuna sarukka ejonga nangna Chungthieng kolla napek rang pot nadon ha, maicham ma tung ma tienga na-u-nonao na nangta anda ah am meh ta angei thei oh.
Napot ha maicham matieng houphur weta, masha ah lea weta na-u-nanao kolla ngei hlak su thingo; hana napot ha choiweta pe oh.

“Nang hitta anda hlak ha ranga lungleh hlakko. amona nangta ruisanga rui ange, nangna amohitta lampi hana thingha amlei ah, anoleh amona nangta routreem ae ngeita pekom ngei ange hana routreem pangei na nangta aral inn na si ange.
Keina nakolla adiek rou rillinge maleh pi phung shuk som ha naleh pi malium chu nangna amunt hana thou wa shukne ang no che ae.
“Nangei na rilsa rou thei pha ang chau ae, ‘mee namei mee pashal lal no oh.’
Chuna keina nangei kolla rilla amminge: atujong akha na mee nameinu ta amitta adi apam ma an thing lea alungsunga namei nu hata lal thing shu sa hekti ae.
Ejonga namit changtieng pana pak tapi ang lea chu kolweta denga hou oh. Rouram chu natak lim pa sarmei ah luttang masing chu natakka tum akha sal pana lella hra tekkae.
Akha chu nakut changtieng pana nangta pak tul pi ang lea chu, tan weta denga hou oh, rouram chu napum limpa sermei kum ma luttang ma sinchu napum ma tum akha sal pana lella hra tekkae.
“Nahi rilla am meh, atujong amo na anamei ta hranhlak lea chu hran sange ti na ajiek pe shu oh.
Chuti weta kaina nangei ta rillinge atu jong akha na anamei ta emo rou sarukka hran hlakka, mee pasal ta lalla hranhlak anowa chu, ahran namei ta nei mee amo ha namei ta lal mee ae.
“Woihakom amatienga nangei na malmashi ngeita ril thei pha ange, ‘Diekno saro ei no oh, chuti weta nasaro ei nu juija narengpu kolla hata shi oh.’
Chuti weta keina nangei ta rillinge Chungthieng minga saro ei no oh, apha chang honna ano lea thanwan hai ah rouram chu Chungthieng phum lu ae.
Anoleh simlei phu ah, rouram chu makae tro na ae anoleh. Jerushalem phu ah, rouram chu Rengram alok hupi sa ae.
Akha chu nalu thamma saro ei no oh, rou ram chu nangei na tou sam angou hal ahanghal akha phao sem nea no che;
Chuna cham prekta nangna ngai sange nati ha ngai sange ta ammo, akha chu ngai nong nati ha ngai nonge ta am mo, nahina hei thou ralha ah phao chu hra no sa ae.
“Nangei na hita ril thei pha sho chou ae, mit akha tarang mit akha, akha chu ha akha tarang ha akha,
Chuti weta atun chu keina nangeita rillinge hrano ae mee ta mangshak lea no oh. Ejonga atujong akha na nabe changtienga bengleh chu woitieng tiengpa kom wulla pe shir oh amo ta.
Akha chu atu jong akha na naling lut nie lea chu napun pai kom amota pe ngal oh.
Ejonga atu jong akha na nangta mile akha thing ranga kalla rilleh chu amo hita mile ani thing ha oh.
Nakolla mee akha na nie lea chu amo ta pe oh, akha chu nakolla pu phao ngei ta kom pu pi oh.

“Nangna hita ril theipha ang che ae na inn ning tuh tieng ta lungshi oh akha chu nangta anda meeta atier ro. (“Nangei na rilla hou phurha thei so chou weh, nangei tonpi ngeita lungshi oh na ngei ta an da ngei ta atir ou oh.”)

Chutiweta keina nanta rillinge anda meeta lungshi oh akha chu nangta aol ana pe mee tarang nie oh. (Chutiweta atun chu keina rillinge nangei ta anda mee ngei ta lungshi oh, akha chu wut rel ngei taranga nie pi oh.)

Chuleh chu thangwan na napathieng sanao akha chang ange amona ahra mee tarang kom hrano mee tarang kom nienu shukpi, hana dramo chel mee tarang kom chelno mee tarang kom ru surpi. (Chuleh chu nangei hi thangwan ram ma pathieng spa ngei chang ange, rouram chu amo na hrano mee ngei chunga kom ahra mee ngei chunga kom ni war warpi ah ru shur pi ae.)

Eje ah nangta lungshi meeta nangna lungshi ta lea chu, echu pha anga meh? Hajongpa chu khasanu thou ngei nakom hata ae. (Nungei ta lungshi ngei ta chak nang na lungshi ta lea chu, Chungthieng na amant e pe ang meh? Hajongpa chu pak chel ngei na kom ae ah am meh.)

Akha chu na-u-nanao ta chak riemtuk pe ta lea chu adangei hitta nangna ejongpa hella ae ah che? Hojong chu adang jat na kom ae sa ae. (Chuna nangei na nangei tonpi ngei ta chak trongthou lea chu, adangei ta chu ejongpa tullu lu ah che? Hojong chu jat adang na kom ae sha.)
Mapung pha oh, thangwan napathieng mapung pha hekta. (Thawan pathieng rakit hek ta nangei kom rakit anga ae.)

“Malmashi ngei mai ah mani na ri ong shu oh ta nangei dramo am na tullu lu no ranga shilung lutta tullu lu oh. Nangna ejonga hata ae ta lea chu thangwan ram ma napa thieng kolla naolmant am mang no ae.

“Chuna sarukka nalung lokka napek juija dang halla tumpet tum ma hypokrate (ahra sangei) na synagoge sunga akha chu lampi ah malmashi ngei na ajak atri ranga pek kha keina nakolla adiek rou rillinge, mani ha mani lommant pha shu so ae.
Chuna nalung lokka napek juija nakut chang tieng pana dangpha no shu oh nakut woitieng pa lu tullu.
Chuna napek juija aruhan ta pe oh, chuleh chu napathieng na, na lu tullu riveta amant pe ange.

“Akha chu naniek juija hypokret (ahra sangei) hek ta ae no oh. Mani dit niek chu synagoge sunga kom ngir thou weta akha chu lamhou wa akha ah malmashi ngei na ri ranga keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge, mani ha mani kemant pha su so ae.
Chuti weta nangei niek jui apha ah na inn ki sunga thing weta eenhar kalveta meena mitta rillou napa thieng kolla nie oh aru hanta na lu tullu ri ah am pa na lumant pe ange.
“Akha chu naniek juija malmashi jat adangei hekta arimsalla lea ah, lea ah nie no oh rouram chu rou atam ril hana mani ril theipi shijo weta mani na hal hekta.
Mani hekta ae no oh, rouram chu napathieng na dange naniek matienga nakolla dang no ha.
Chuta lea chu nangei na hitta nie yo oh. “Wanram ma kanilim pathieng maming athieng ha chang shu oh:
‘Narengram jung shu oh:
wanram ma nahal hekta aleiram ma kom
nahal ha chang shu oh;
Awoni kani ahoppang rak pepi oh.
Kani pak hai thou wa kanita ngakpi oh,
kani na kom kanita diekno ae ngei ta ngakpi hek.
Akha chu kanita ahlem na nea no ranga,
chuti weta hrano kut chung hai thou sanpi oh.’
Rouram chu nangei na meengei hrano hoino ngak ta lea chu wanram ma pathieng na kom nangta ngak ange.
Chuti weta nangna mee ngei hrano hoino ngak no taleh chu, pathieng na kom nahoino hratno ngak pi ang no ae.

“Nangeina buhei ah niek juija hipokrate (ahra sangei) ngei hek ti no oh. Mani chu malmashi ngei na rijuija buhei mee ae ta dang ranga mani mai thiem ma am meh. Keina nangei ta adiek rou rillinge mani ha olmant ha pha shu so ve.
Chuti weta buhei ah amjuija nalukanga sharik not ta akha chu namai kom hrabakta phi oh.
Chuleh chu malmashi ngei na nanghi buhei ah am meh ta dang ang no ae, chuti weta mitna ri-low pathieng na chak na tullu lu rija am nangta olmant pe ange.
Leitha akha chu thir-rek na mangpi nea, akha chu aru thei pana kom ru nea na simlei ram ma nataranga chak selsum homma shino oh.
Chuti weta leitha akha chu thir rek na mangpi no na akha chu aru thei panakom ru wa thingno na thangwan ram ma nataranga homma shi oh.
Rouram chu naselthul am na ah nalung kom hana am mange.
“Pum hina awar chu mit ae, ejonga namit na hra lea chu napum lim pa kom warrange.
Chuti weta ejonga namit na hra no lea chu napum lim pa kom athiem na shi hakti ange. Ejonga nakolla am awar na thiemma am lea chu athiem ha eja ah thiem mang sha!

“Atu akha na mitpu ani shuk chang nea no ae, rouram chu akha tana anda weta akha tana lungshi ange anoleh, amo na akha ta chu mok weta akha ta chu hlou nal ange nangna Chungthieng akha chu lal sum ani hina hlou jui nea ang no ae.

“Chuna saruka keina nang eita rillinge naring chang tarang ekom olno oh. E-bak inn ang mota, anoleh, napum taranga, echoi epai ang mo. Ringchang na bak rang-inn ta lella chung tekno meh, akha chu pum na punchoi dirchoi ta lel no meh!”

Junga am awa ngei ta anno; mani muchi kom wor no ae hom ko hom no ae hana shangpang sunga kom shi no ae chuti phao sunga thungwan na pathiengna awon hoppi ah shi ae nang chu mani ta lel no wa cha meh?
Nalung ol weta naring chang atan te atuna lonne ah meh?
“Akha chu eje ranga napun dier taranga olla che? Anno loulei ahlam rei na alo ta tou mo manina tullu kom ae no la kom har no ae.
Chuna keina nangei ta rillinge, Reng Solomon na machong mareng reita kom lella hra tek no ae.

Awoni ah diekka am hina atuk chu sermei ah denga hou ang loulai ah tou rampa aphul ngei ta rukka Chungthieng na hija jonpi lea chu alowa ngoiring bet ngei oh malmashi nangei ta chu amo na punchoi hella jonpi ang mo weh?
Chuna olla hita rilno oh, ‘ejongpa bakkang monu? anoleh,’ Ejongpa inn nang monu? ‘anoleh,’ ejongpa seng ang mo nu?
Rouram hi jati adangei na hijongpa lim jonge akha chu wanram ma pathiengna nadit ang lim danga am meh.
Chuti weta masha ah reng ram akha chu adiek lim jong masha oh. Akhu chu nalim pa hi amo na nangta lon pi ange.
Chuna sarukka atuk taranga ekom hlawai no oh rouram chu atuk taranga atuk na ol shu oh, marung nie hana marungnie taranga ha ta chap cha ange.
“Routreem no oh, natak chunga routreem no ranga.
Rouram chu nangei na routreem ae thing hana nangei ta kom routreem ange. Akha chu nangei na vul thingna chang hona nangeita kom vullange.
Hana namit makka tulu la no weta na-u-nanao mitta alota an thinga che?
Chuna alo ta na-u-nanao mitta tulu la tikkae ta rillang che, namit makka tulu ta la no the na am leija?
Ahra sangei oh masha ah namitta tulu ha la ta lea chu nangna na u-nanao mitta tulu ha hrabak ah riweta hou nea ang che.
“Athieng pot ha ui ta pe no oh. Hana aman tam pot ha wokta denga hla no oh. Ejonga nangna deng taleh chu manina akae takka to wa therra hou ange.
“Nie ta lea chu nangeita pe ange; jong ta lea chu nangeita tuk pi ange; akha chu rei ta lea chu nangta innkal hongpi ange.
Rouram chu atu jongpa anie mee na chu pha ae; atu mo ajong mee na chu tukkae akha chu eenkal nok mee ta chu hongpi ae.
Nangei kar sunga asanao na budol nie weta alung pe mo weh?
Ano lea ejonga amo na tuirik nie weta arul pe mo weh?
Ejonga nang na hrano che hal nasanao ta napekjui ja ahra pek rang dang che ae chuna thangwam na pathieng na chu eja lella anie meeta ahra pe ang sha!
Chuna sarukka nangei na mee ngei ta nangei kolla ae pi num hekta nangei na kom mani ta hata ae oh, rau ram chu nahina roukung hina akha chu rouma ril rouphu ngei na ril ae.
“Nangei na achip lam hana lutto, roulam chu, sarmei kum lut ranga chu inn harlan lokkae, hana thing mee tam meh.
Chuti weta ring rang lam ha chu a chip lam ae hana lut malmashi chu tam no ae.
“Shingthei oh hrano rouphu rou maril ngei ha, mani ha na am na ah phao ange kelmo pun wurra, chuti weta asunga chu wontam rammui ae.
Manita nadangpha ang chu mani ara hana, malmashi ngei na alingbom sunga angur lei no ae, anoleh alingbom sunga theichang ra meh?
Chuhekta ahra akunga ahra theira ra ae, chuti weta hrano akunga hrano theira ra ae.
Ahra akunga hra no theira ra no ae akha chu hrano akunga ahra theira ra no ae.
Ahra theira ra no akung lim ta chu tan weta sarmei ah denga hou ae.
Chuna saruka mani ara nujuija nangei na manita dang ange.
“Keita arengpa, arengpa kokka chak am meelim ha wan rengram luttang no ae chuti weta wanram ma pathieng ahal ae mee na luttange.
Atreemni rungnie ah leima tam malmashi ngeina keita rillange, Arengpa kani na naminga roumaril shuk no meh, akha chu naminga dejabol ta kom jul no meh akha chu leima tam angakpi kom ae unge?
Hanachu keina athup am no lutta manita ril shuk kange, ‘keina nangei ta dang nonge hrano tullu lu ngei kakol hai thou wa thingo!’
“Chuna sarukka atu jongpa nangei kar sunga karou thei weta tullu lu malmashi chu alung chunga inn sha lungwar spa ae.
Akha chu ru kalla surra tuijul hanga akha chu thirang ranga hanga inn na nam ma wa hal, chuti phao sunga tikne no ae, rouram chu alung chunga shak sou chu.
“Chuti weta atu jongpa nangei kar sunga karou theiveta karil jui no malmashi chu waipin chunga inn sha lungmo spa ae.
Ru surra hang juija akha chu tuijul hangjuija hana chu thirang na inn na nam juija inn ha chu tu wa junga alok akui atik shukkae. Hana atik chu eya atripi ang sha!”
Jisu na rilsu nutienga wairul riha na machupi takpi lim ta angak shukkae.
Rouram chu amo na chupi takpi hi rouphun ocha ngei hekti no ae leima tam arat ane akha hekta chupi ae.
Arengpu na mullon akha ah tumma majunga wairul riha na manu tieng jui ya.
Hana raichi spa akha na arengpa maikunga huk hrun weta mokka ril. “Rengpa, ejonga keita ngeipi lea chu nangna keita thiengpi oh.”
Jisu na makut dokveta amota tham ma, “Keina nangta ngaipi inge” ta rilla, “Thiengjou oh!” Apha hana makka maraichi damso ae.

Hana Jisu na makolla ril, “An no nangna atu akha kolla rilshukno oh. Chuti weta thingo thiempu kolla natakmak ri pi oh, akha chu mani kolla rou dang ranga akha chu Moses trongsan an nujuija pek phung shuk pe oh.”
Jisu na Kapharnahum malut juija ralmee riha mitpu na wa weta amota sanpi ranga sai.
Amona ril, “Rengpa,” ka suuk akha hi innna pum ahui thi ah ati pi ol donga am meh.”
Jisu na amota ril, “Keina thing weta dampi ange amota.”
Hana ralmee riha mitpu na sange. Rengpa chunga keina trongsan peveta ka inn na wak kanghi kamatik am nonge chuti weta rengpa trongsan na pek na chakkom kasuuk ha dam mange.

Rouram chu keikom mitpu akha thuija am minge hana kathuija kom karalmee am meh keina hita rillinge, “Thingo ta keina ril lea chu amona thing. Akhana wa-oh ta ril lea amona wa ae kasuuk ta kom hi ae ta ril lea amona hata ae.”
Jisu na rouhi theijuija angak shukka akha chu manu jui ngei ta ril, “Keina adiek rou rillinge. Israel ngei karra phao sunga kom hihekti ngoiring hek ti tuk nonge.
Keina nangei ta rillinge nasu tienga akha chu nattak tienga mee leima phao weta Abraham Isaac akha chu Jacob hitta thangwan rengram ma reenbu hang hana ong ha ange.
Chuti weta rengpa sanao ngei ta chu athiem awau wa denga hou ange amunt hana chu atrap arel la chak amange.”
Hana Jisu na ralmee riha mitpu ta ril, “Thingo, nangoiring nujuija hata amokom chang shu oh.”
Hana pha makka masuuk kom dam so ae.
Jisu na Peter inn sunga lutjuija Pitar mapi na kut chunga atun nokka jalla am ri so.
Jisu na makut tong pa chu atun nokka am ha dam so. Akha chu thou wa rengpa ta seba pha tolso.
Nitak tieng pha ah wakjuija dejabol akha chu hrano muihla na ruija rol mani lei ma tam ha makolla ruija phao ah akha chu hrano muihla lim pata tronglo chakka julla ana eja dampi.
Nalim pa hi rouphu thiempu Isaiah na rilsa shuk so weh maril phur ha. “Rengpa na ringrei nungshi eja sanpi akha chu hrano rai eja kom amona dampi ti rou shuk ranga ae.”
Jisu na wairul riha na ahul tunga am mari ah, amona tuipi aralla thing ranga trongsan pe.
Hana rouphun ocha na makolla phao weta ril, “Ocha amunt changhon nathing na kei jui ange.”
Jisu na sange, “Ramhui ngei ahur am meh akha chu awa ngei tarang kom abu am meh, chuti weta meesanao pa taranga chu alu kang te shi chek ti rang am no ae.”
Adang anujui mee akha na makolla ril, “Rengpa masha ah kei kapa ta wui thing ri tikkae.”
Chuti weta Jisu na mokolla ril, “Kanutieng jui jo akha chu athi ngei na mani athi ngei ta wui shu oh.”
Hana amo na kung sunga lutta akha chu marui ngei nakom manutieng jui.
Tuipi hana atipi tuijul hanga kung ha tui na shi ah wa so. Chuti weta Jisu chu jalla am songe.
Arui ngei na thing weta amota hrang. “Rengpa kani ta san pi oh!” manina ril. “Ani thi ang so ae!”
Amo na ril, “Ngoiring bet nangei, elo wa haja ati ah chau?” hana amo na thou weta thirang ta ril pa chu tuijul ha ripta daiso ae.
Hana malmashi ngei na angak shukka saihlak. “Nahi ejongpa malmashi meh? Thirang akha chu tuijul nakom mariljui ae!”

Gadarene ram ralha tieng matung juija hlan kung hai thou wa tarik na mant apa ani na amota tuk hlak kanga phao ae. Manui ani ha ati pi akha changa am sarukka atu akha na lampi ha lalla thing nea no ae.
“Chungthieng sanaopa kanuita nangna ejongpa di cha meh?” Hita au wa ril, apha ha pha matienga amunt hina kanui ta aol ana pe anga wa ah che?”
Amunt hana thou aram latakka vok ngei arak bakka am meh.
Tarik na Jisu kolla nie ae, “Ejonga nangna kanuita julla hou ang ta lea chu vok ngei am na ah julla hla pi oh.”
Manita amo na ril, “Thingo!” hana pa chu mani na shukka thing weta vok ngei sunga lut so. Akha chu vok lim pa na leiral tienga tanna tuipi sunga lutta thi so.
Vok runga am ngei na husunga tanna thing weta shukka houphur lim akha chu tarik na mant ani hana rou takso.
Hana husunga am limpana Jisu ta rihlak kanga akha chu mani na amota riso. Hana mani rijuija mani ram ma phao no ranga rilleh.
Jisu na kung chung weta maram mak hulok tienga phao ae.

Hana Anno malmashi ngeina pum ahui athisa akha ta makut chunga jalpi weta ma am na ah rui ah phao Jisu na riweta pum ahui athi sa pata ril. “Kasanao oh riem jou oh; napak kom shil pi sange nangoiring jarra.”
Hina sarukka rouphun ocha ahre na manithei chakka rilleh, “Amo jong pana Chungthieng ta khrarim elshel ae!”
Jisu na mani lunghal dangpha ah ril, “Eje ranga nangei lungsunga hrano lunghal hal then ah chau?
Napak shilpi sange, ta ril pa lea anoleh ‘thou weta thing jou oh rilpa hi hoipa na lok tek kang meh.’
Chuna nangei na meesanaopa na alei rama malmashi pak shilpi nea ae ti hi dang ranga ae hana amo na pum ahui athisa ta rilleh, “thou jou oh hana nakut kang choi weta na inn lam ma thing jou oh.”
Hana amo na thou weta ma inn tienga lea so ae.
Amota ri wairul riha na atri ae chuti weta hijongpa ane hina taranga manina Chungthieng ta dom so weh.
Jisu na hana haithou mathing juija apa Mithew ta ri so sum thit na munt ofis hana onga am. Amo na rilleh “kanutieng juijo” hana Mithew na thou weta manutieng jui so.
Jisu na Mithew inn sunga bu bakha ah amlei ah sum hrai ngei lea pakchel ngei eja akha chu marui ngei kom makolla bakha ae.
Pharisies ngei na nahi rijuija marui ngei ta mani na sai, “Alo sarukka nangei ocha na sum hrai ngei lea pak chel ngei hitta bakha ah meh?”
Rouhi Jisu na theijuija rilleh, “Pum ahra ngei taranga thiempu kanano ae chuti weta rai am ngei taranga ae.
Chuti weta thing weta rou hi chu thingo alo tina pa mo nu ta kadit chu ringrei thei ha ae rithoi ha no ae, rou ram chu hina kaphao hi athieng ngei ta kok nonge, pak chel ngei taranga ae.”
Johon rui ngeina phao weta Jisu kolla sai, “Pharisies ngei lea kani na bu hai weta alo sarukka narui ngei chu hai no ah meh?”

Jisu na sange, “Taichang ang pa na am lei ah aphao atonpi ngeina alota ningshi them am manga meh? Mani karra matol lei ah! Chuna apha ha phao ange taichang ang pa ha mani kar hai thou rui ange; hana jui ja mani ha bu hai ange.
Chuna atu akha na pun alui ah punthar bal no ae rouram chu abal pun hana pun hata takkin pi ah atit na amunt ha hella tieng tit na change.

Malmashi ngeina darkha tui ha tui-oium alui ah thal no ae, ejonga thal lea chu kui ah darkha tui sarange chuchak no wa tuium ngei kom amang change. Chuna sarukka manina darkha tui ha athar tuium ma thalla ani makha hrabakta doi ah shi ae.”
Amona manita tronga am leija, Jihudi rourilpa na ahuk hrun weta ril, “Kasanao nu akha atun makka thi so ae. Chuna nangna wa weta machunga nakut shipi lea chu amoha ringthou ange.”
Jisu na thou wa manutieng juija thing jui ah arui ngei na kom anu yuiye.
Hana nameinu akha akum asom ani athee tulla na am nu na Jisu linglut achul pa akienga tham so.
Namei nu na athei chakka ril, “Ejonga keina malinglut akieng te chak halkom tham pha lea kei hi dam mange.”
Jisu na anungtienga hai lea ah nameinu ta ripha ah rille, “Kasanao nu oh riem jou oh” “nangoiring jarra hana dam pha so che,” hana mak apha hana namei nu ha dam so ae.
Jisu na Jihudi rourilpa inn sunga lut juija wairul riha na toutri hung-dar reiya trappa am ripha ah.
Amo na ril, “Shukka thingo nangak sanao hi thi no ae jalla am ma sa ae” chuti weta mani na amo ta nuiso weh.
Wairul riha na awaou ah shuk nutienga amo na lutveta nangak sanao kutta kai ah thouso oh-inlen ring thou so weh.
Routhar hi hatieng ram lim thangso weh.
Jisu na amunt lha houwa wakyuiya mitcho ani na manutieng jui weta aowa rille, “David sanao pa kanuita ringrei ngei pi oh.”
Chuna amo na inn sunga malutjuija mitcho ani kom makolla luttolla amona manuita sai. “Keina nanuita dampi nea ae ti hi chu nanui na ngoiring ah chau?”
“Oh weh, Arengpa” manui na sang.
Hana amona manui mit tong weta ril, “Ngoiring anujuija nanui kolla shuk shu oh.”
Chuna manui mitha ripha nea ah Jisu na manui ta rou arit dolla shi, “Anno atu akha na kom na hi dangno shu oh.”
Chuti weta manuina mani ram tienga thing weta routhar hi thangpi so weh.
Hana haithou wa mani shukka thinga sharuina na ruija rol spa akha atrong shukno wa Jisu kolla ruija phao ae.
Hana dijabol na makolhai thou julla hla nutienga atrong shukno spa ha tronga wairul rihana angak shukka ril, “Israel sunga hihakti mee sup ri-ya rino songe.”
Chuti weta Pharisies na ril, “Dijabol ngei jaitha jarra amona dijabol ta julla hla ae.”
Jisu na hulokka akha chu husung chang honna thing weta mani synagoge sunga chupi takpi ah ana eja ta dampi ah reng param hina taranga routhar hi takpi.
Hana amona wairul riha ta mari juija lungshi ngei ae, rouram chu mani aol ana ha sanrang am no ah kelmo rungpa am no kelmo ngei hekti ae.
Marui ngei ta amo na ril, sang pottang chu am hom meh chuti weta tullu lu mee chu atom te ae
chuna sarukka arengpa kolla niyo oh, amo na sang pottang mee ha hla ange.
Amona marui asom ani ta kok weta hrano muihla ta julla hou nea rang akha chu rai eja ta dam pi nea rang jaitha pe ae.
Ahalsha rui asom ani hina kokna, masha ah Saimon Pitar ta kok, akha chu Andrew manao; Zabedi sanao Jacob akha chu manao Johon.
Philip akha chu Bartholomew; Thomas akhu chu Mithew sal hraipa, Alphaeus sanao Jacob akha chu Thaddaeus,
Kananna Saimon akha chu Judas Iskarot Jisu ta jur pa.
Na asom ani hita Jisu na chupi ah hla ae manita. “Gentle (meejaty) ngei am na thingno oh anoleh Samaritans ngei hulokka kom lut no oh.
Chuti weta Israel ngei inn sunga amangsa kelmo ngei ta lella jongo.
Akha chu nathing juija hita rou rillo, thangwan rengram hi neiso ae.
Ana (Rai) ngeita dampi oh, athi sa ta kom ringthoupi oh, Raichi ngei ta kom hra pi oh, dijabol takom julla hou oh, ariemsalla pha sou chu ariemshalla nangkom pe oh.
Nangei sumhao sunga sona, rupa, akha chu sumsan kom choi no oh.
Akha chu nalam taranga linglut ani anoleh huirang anoleh molbuk choino oh rouram chu tullu lu mee tarang abak pha ange.
Hana husunga akha chu hulokka nangei na ejonga lut juija atuna ae nea ang mo ti ha hrabakta jongo. Akha chu nangei na shukka thing malim ma amunt hana am mo.
Nangei na inn sunga lut juija ariemma riemtuk pe oh.
Chuna inn sung hana ejonga manae yaitha cha lea chu nangei kolla adai ha inn sung chunga am shu oh. Ejonga mani inn sungna matik chanoleh nangei adai ha nangei kolla lea shu oh.
Akha chu ejonga atujong akha na nangei ta ariem ma wokpi no anoleh rou ngeipi noleh inn sung akha chu hulok hana nangei sukjuija nangei kaepha ah vokphul ha thaphur oh.
Keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge atreem na routreem chu hajong hulok ngei ha Sodom akha chu Gomara na tieng hella sha tek kange.
Rammui ngei karra kelmonao hla hekta keina hla singe chuna sarukka arul hekta lung singo, akha chu wurhu hekta nalung nemmo.
Malmashi ngei ta sing theiyo, manina nangei ta ulien changei kut chunga pe weta synagoge sunga rui lut weta nangei ta hoino hrano rou rillange.
Hana chakno wa ka sarukka ram sunga reng ngei hana ram ronna am Governors ngei akha chu jat adang ngei kolla saro ei pi ange.
Chuti weta mani na nangei ta hup pa mant juija ejongpa rou rillang mota ati no oh hana juija nangta ejong rou rillang mo rouha pe ange.
Rouram chu rou ha nangei ril ah no weh chu-na pathieng muihla athieng na rille sa ae.
“Ulenao kar sunga kom ma ata na manao ta akha chu mapa na asanao ta athit ranga jur hlak kange akha chu unga ngei na kom mapa ngei ta an num no wa athit rang phao ae ange.
Ka sarukka malmashi ngei na nangta anda ange, chuti weta atreem ni rungni phao sunga ratta dongthei ngei ta chu sanpi ange.
Chuna nangta amunt akha ah sun rella ae juija ram a danga tanna thingo, keina adiek rou nakolla rillinge, meesanao pana jung matienga nangei na Israel hulok tunga rol nea ang no chau.
“Arui na ma ocha chunga am no ae, hana asuuk na amitpu chunga am no ae.
Arui na ma ocha hekta akha chu asuukna amitpu hekta kai hal kom, ejonga inn amit puta manina Belzebul kok lea chu mani inn sunga am ngei ta chu eja hrano ming kok kang sa!
Chuti halkom manita ati no oh, rouram chu ril shuk kanglou athup rou ephao am no ae hana dang ang lou rou thuppa si ephao am no ae.
Chuna keina nangei kolla janthiem ma karil rou ha nisuon na rillo, hana nakurra nathei rou ha inn chunga kalweta au shukko.
Pum ta that nea ngeita eko ati no oh manina muihla ta chu that nea no ae hella natit ang chu pum akha chu muihla ta that weh ta sarmei kum ma yunna hou nea amo ta ting ati oh.
Vashak awa anita ana paisa taranga jur no wa mo? akha chu Pathieng ahal ano wa chu mani karra akha phao nakom alei chunga tul no ae.
Akha chu nalu wa tousam phao masing tella shi ae.
Chuna saruka ekom ati no oh, nangei chu vashak ta hella aman tam meh.
“Atu jong akha na malmashi ngei maikunga keita ariem ma ngaipile chu keina kom thangwan ram ma pathieng kolla ariem ma ngaipi ange.
Chuti weta atujong akha na malmashi ngei maikunga keita ngeinum no mee ha thangwan na pathieng mai kunga ah keina kom ngei ang no ae.
Alei ram ma kajunghi adai pe junge ta hal no oh, kajung hi adai pejung nonge chuti weta chamsai pe yung inge.
Kajungna rou ram chu: Asanaopa na mapa ta anda rang, asanao nu na manu ta anda rang, amau na mani ta anda rang ae.
Hana ehekta ma anda mee ha ma inn sunga shuk kange.
Atu jongpa na mapa manuta keita lella lungshi mee ha chu matik cha mee no ae hana atu jongpa manu mapa nakom asanao ta kei ta hella lungshi lea chu amo ha matik cha mee no ae.
Akha chu atu yong akha na ma khross choi no weta kanutieng jui lea chu amo ha matik cha mee no ae.
Atu motieng akha na aring rang jong lea chu amo ha mang ange, akha chu atu motieng akha na ka sarukka aring chang mang pi lea chu amo ha aring pha ange.
“Amona nangta ariemma langpi chu keita lang sa ae. Akha chu amo na keita ariem ma lang mee ha keita hla pata lasil la ae.

Atujong akha na Chungthieng rou maril akha minga lasil lea chu Chungthieng rouphu hana lomman ha pha ange. Akha chu amo na dramochel akha ta dramochel mee ae ta la sil lea chu amo kom dramochel hana lomman pha ange.
Hana asin te ngei kar sunga akha ta atu jong akha na karui ae ta siktui heisin akha te pe lea chu keina nangei kolla adiek rou ril linge ae mant ha sui no ah pha ange.
Jisuna arui asom anita machupi tlakka amo na Galily hulok hana chupi takpi rang akha chu rousam rang thingso weh.
Johon na raen inn sunga ma amlei ah Khrista lu tullu rou theijuija marui ngei ta amo na hla weta sai pi.
“Phao ah am nang ha ajou cha meh? phao ang ha, ano lea kani na hakkang adang am song anga meh?”
“Jisu na sange lea jou oh hana Johon kolla nangei thei rou akha chu nangei mitta ri ha rillo ta.

Amit cho meekom ri so weh hana kae tik meekom thingthei so ae Raichi ngei kom dam so ae akur set ngei kom thei pha so ae athi sa kom ringthou so ae akha chu sara ringrei ngei kolla ahra rou thar ahra ha theipi so.
Akha chu atu jong na keita mada no mee lutta ae mee ha jaihra ae.”
Johon rui ngei na thingsu takka Jisu na wairul riha ngei mai kunga Johon hana rou ram ma ril thou so; “Ram rukka ejongpa ah nangna shukka thinga chau? thirang na ling pi alang ta mo?
Nangei shukka thing chu ejongpa ri ah chau? ahra pun pai weta apa am ha? Hajong ahra pun pai ngei chu Reng hun taiten chunga am ngei sa ae.
Anoleh ejongpa an ranga shukka thinga chao? Chungthieng rouphu mee mo? Ow weh keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge amo ha chu Chungthieng rouphu ta helle.
Hiso weh masarukka jiekka shi sa, “Keina na matienga rouchoi mee akha hla ange. Amo na nalampi ha nama tienga tamasha ae pi hakkange.
Keina nakolla adiek rou rillinge, namei ngei na don sanao lim sunga chu Johon Baptias hekti akharo alok don no songe chuti chun wanram ma sintekti amona makolhai thou wa lok tek kange.
Johon Baptias na rou ril hai thou atun phao sunga wanram hi ane jaitha na nam ma ol donga am meh, hana nam ma mant mee ngei na shoun na am songe.
Johon apha phao sunga Chungthieng rou phu ngei na akha chu Moses rouphun na rengram tarang trongsuk phure.
Chuna ejonga nangna ngeinum ta lea, Johon hi Elija ha ae.
Akur am malmashi lim na thei shu oh.
“Chuna ejongpa ngeita keina an hlak kang meh atun rija mee ngeita? Mani ha chu kaithil amunt na onga am unga ngei na adang ngeita au wa am hekti ae.
‘Kani na nangei taranga hung rasam tum munge nangei na lam no chau, kani na hran hlakna laa sa unge nangei na tap no chau!’
Johon na phao juija bakno een no ha mani lim na ril amo chu hralao hlawang chunge?

Meesonaopa phao juija amona bakka een mani na hita ril, apa hita anno! amo hi karam mee ae akha chu sum hrai ngei mal akha chu pakchel mee ae. Chuti weta Chungthieng lungsing hana mani adiek tullu hana dangpi ae.”
Jisu na tamtekti angakpi tullu lu na munt hulok na lunghlong no ae ta lungsha thou so,

“Korozin taranga ringreipi ae, Bethsaida taranga ringreipi ae rouram chu nangei kolla angakpi lu tullu lim ha Tur akha chu Sidon na ah phur lea chu hana lei apha ah mani na borahao therweta akha chu vokphul chu notweta manilung hlong phur ange.
Chuna routreem ni ah chu Tur akha chu Sidon na am malmashi ngei ta Chungthieng na hella ringrei thei ange.

Akha chu Kapharnahum nangchu thangwan phao wang song anga che? Na ha chu sermei kum phao denga hla ange rouram chu nakolla ane anglao tullu eja ae phur ha Sodom ma ae phur lea chu atun phao Sodom amphur ange.
Keina nakolla adieka rillinge routreem ni rungnie ah Chungthieng na nang hita chu Sodom ta hella ringrei ngei ange!”

Hana apha ah Jisu na ril, “Wan akhu chu aleiram ma Pathieng rengpa keina nangta ariem ma dom minge, rouram chu nangna lungsin lungwar ngei akha chu dang thei ngeita thuppa shiveta theino ngei ta dangno ngeita dangpi so che.
Oh weh Pathieng nahi ahra nadit sa ae.

“Ehei lim hi kapa na kakolla pehap so weh akha chu kapa ano wa masanao pa ta atu akhana dangno ae, hana masanao pa akha chu masanaopa na ma kolla takpi num atu jongpa akha ano wa atu nakom mapa ta dang no ae.
“Tullu olla lu rol ngei akha chu arit pot ron na am nangei lim na kakolla lutto keina nangei ta solhla pi ange.
Rengkor hi nachunga shi oh akha chu kakol hai thou chu oh, rouram chu keihi shilung dai inge akha chu lung nem inge chuta lea chu nangei na nangei muihla solha pha ange.
Rouram chu karengkor chu alaite ae akha chu karengkor chu jange.”
Hana lei apha ah Jisu na Sabbath rungnie ah sang loupuk ajaija mathing juija marui ngei na won tam pa chu mani na sangbor hriem weta shang mal chip thou so weh.
Pharisis ngeina ri ah Jisu kolla mani na ril lea, “Anno narui ngei na Sabbath rungnie ah hita mani ae chu rouphun ta ngeinum no ngei ae!”
Chuna Jisuna mani ta sange, “David akha chu ma mee ngei na wontam lei ah ae phur ha nangei na pa no chau?
Amo akha chu mamee ngei na Chungthieng inn sunga donna si badol bakha, routakka chu thiempu na chak bak phung shuk budol ae.
Amo lea Moses hana rouphun jiekka shi pa no chaup sabbath rungnie chang honna thiempu ngei na mokna inn na routakka kuipi halkom mani ta maral am no ae ta ril ha?
Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge amunt hina Chungthieng mokna inn ta hella alok akha am meh.
Jieksha rou na rilleh, lungshi theingei ta di inge rithoi pot chu di nonge karil rou hi ejongpa mo nu ta nangei na dang ta lou chu aral am no ngei ta lal pi ang no wa ae.
Rouram chu Meesanaopa na sabbath hina mitpu ae.”
Jisu na amunt hou phurra synagog ka thingso weh.

Amunt hana apa akha na akut akha tiengpa thipa am meh, malmashi ahre na chu Jisu na ejong tullu akha ae juija maral jonga am jarra manina makolla sai, “Sabbath rungnie ah meeta dam pi hi rouphun hata ngei num ah mo ae?”
Jisu na sange, “Ejonga nangei kar sunga akha na kelmo don na Sabbath rungnie ah athuk kum sunga tulla, amo ana akelmo hata la lut weta awao wa choi shuk kang no meh?
Chuna malmashi na kelmo ta hella amant tam tek no meh? Chuna sarukka Sabbath rungnie ah ahra tullu lu chu rouphun ahra no meh?”
Hanapa chu akut akha tieng thisa apa ta amo na ril, “Nakut dok shukko,” Amo na akut dok shuk pa chu amo ha hrabakta akha tiengpa hek ti so ae.
Chunnapa chu Pharisis ngeina houphur weta Jisu ta that rang waisi thou so.
Jisu na amota that ranga ngaitu hlak rou theija amona amunt ha haophur ra thingso; Manu tienga wairul rija na kom juije amona mani kar sunga ana ngei ta dampi.
Akha chu manita marou hana rouramma mani na ril shuk no rang rou pe ah hla ae.
Na hi so ae Chungthieng rouphu Isaiah ril phur trong ha tung ranga ae:
“Hi ae ka halsha suuk, makolla keina a halsa sange,
kalungshit amo ha, makolla keina tin singe;
machunga kamuihla hla ange akha chu amo na
meejat adangei taranga adiek rou ril shuk kange.
Amona meeta rou ruk hlak kang no weh akha chu trong rang kom trong ang no weh,
chu atu akha nakom lampi lamrukka marol thei ang no ae.
Amona asul ana ngeita lungnem mange akha chu atujong,
sannang am lao ngei ta ringrei ngei ange.
Amo na ane na routreem pha thingma lim phao sunga.
Akha chu malmashi lim na makolla lung rang shi ange.”
Hana malmashi ahre na Jisu kolla atrong shukno akha chu mitcho akha ruija wa ae, ti chu amo ha tarik mant ah shi ae. Jisu na amota dampi ah amit kom riso hana atrong kom shukso.
Jisu na lu tullu riweta wairul riha na ngakka, “Amo hi meh David spa ha” ta manina sai!
Rou hi Pharisis ngei na thei juija mani na rilleh, “Amona tarik ta julla mahao nea hi amota ruija rol Beelzebul na machunga a nea jaitha pe ah ae sha ae.”

Jisuna mani lunghal dangpha ah manita amona ril. Rengpal na ram akha ah mani masel sunga sul hlakka hran hlakka adang adang amleh chu ephao sot nea ang no ae. Akha chu hulok anoleh inn shunga mani kar kom sul hlakka ani shukka hran hlak lea chu ngir ra am mang no ae.
Ejonga Saitan na Saitan ta julla hou lea chu amo ha matak nang ta anda mee ae. Chu lea chu alota mareng ram na ngir ra am nea ang sa?
Chuna ejonga keina Beelzebul jarra tarik ta julla houne lea chu nangei na chu atujong jarra manita julla hou nea ang chau? Chuna sarukka mani na nangei routan rengpa chang ange.
Beelzebul jarra no ae Chengthieng muihla na keita tarik jul nea rang jaitha mapek hana ae, hina takpi chu Chungthieng reng ram hi nangei kolla am su sa so ae.
Aratpa amota huppa shi no wa. Alota atujong akhana aratpa inn sunga lut weta manei madon ru wa shukne ang meh?
“Kai hitta am ha-no amo chu keita anda mee ae, akha chu kei hitta hom ha no mee achok arel mee ae.
Chuna sarukka keina nangei kolla rillinge, malmashi pak akha chu hrano trong lim ta chu silpi ange chuti weta muihla athieng ta hrano trongshi ril chu sanpi rang am no ae.
Atu akha na meesanaopa ta anda ah trongshi ril hal kom sanpi ange; chuti weta atu jung na muihla athieng ta anda lea chu atun akha chu atreem nei no wa amota sanpi rang am no ae.
“Theira ahra ra ranga theikung ahra pi ah ta ae, ejonga theikung hana hra no lea nathei kung ara ha hrano ra ange theikung hi ara hana akung amel dangpi ae.
Arul nangei chu nakola hralou am weta alo ta ahra trong sukkang che? rouram chu namur ra ril shuk lim ha lungsunga hra no lim shuksa ae.
Ahra mee hana chu makol hai thou wa ahra shuk kange hrano mee hana makolhai thou hra no shuk kange.
“Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge meengei na trongchui matrong phur lim ha routeemni ah pha ange.
Hana sarukka na trong phur lim hana nangta diek, diekno routreem ange.”
Rouphun ocha lea Pharisis ahre na hita ril shuk kae, “Ocha” “Kani na anealah tullu na ae ri num munge ta mani na sai.”
Jisu na rilleh, “Atun rija ah hrano mee akha chu hlawang ngei jo!” nangei na anela tullu hi Chungthieng rouphu ril Jonah ta pek ano wa anela tullu pe ang nijo weh.
Jonah na alok anga won sunga soun thum jan thum am chu hekta meesanaopa na soun thum jan thum alei sunga am mange.

Routreem nie ah Niniveh malmashi ngei na ngir thou ha weta halim ha ral ae ta ril shuk kange rouram chu Jonah rouril la mani lung hlong jarra; chuna keina nangei ta atun chu rou hi rillinge Jonah ta hella alok akha am meh!

Rengnu Shiba na routreem nie rungnie ah ngirthou haweta mani ta aral ngei ae ta nont ange, rouram chu simlei chung ram lim ma Solomon lungsin lungwar thei pha tik kae ta phao ae. Chutihal kom Solomon ta hel alok akha am meh.
“Hana hrano muihla na malmashi kol hai thou shukka thing juija masolhak rang ramkang amunt na junga rol, chuti weta amunt akha phao tuk no wa lea ae,
mathei chakka amona ril, ‘Keina shukka thingna inn tienga lea ang singe.’ Chuna amo na lea inn ha rukka thienga hra ah am ri sho.

Chunapa chu amo na amota lel hrano tek ti muihla sari kom ruija thingso, mani makhaina makol hana am jui ja chu amo ha amatieng ta hella hrano tek so ae. Chuna sarukka atun rija hrano malmashi ngei kolla hi jongpa hrano hi shuk kange.”
Jisu na malmashi ngei hita trongthou hlakka am lei ah manu akha chu manao ngei na amo hita trong thou num ma awao wa ngir ra am meh.
Chuna mani kar sunga akha na amota ril, “Nanu akha chu nanao ngei na nangta trongthou num ma awao wa ngirra am meh.”
Jisu na sange, “Atumeh kanu? atu ngei na kanao ngei mo ae?”
Chuna amo na arui ngei kolla kutchal hin weta rilleh, “Anno hi ngei hina kanu akha chu ka-u-kanao ngei ae!
Rouram chu atu jongna Chungthieng wan Pathieng ahal ae mee amo ha ka-u-kanao kasar akha chu kanu ae.”
Hani rungnie makka Jisu na inn ha haophur weta amona tuipi ahao wa thinga, ong weta chupi ae.
Wairul riha na amota ahul tunga rachon chu, tam hai sulla amona kung chunga lut ta ong so, chuna wairul riha na tui hao wa ngirre.
Amona manita roumu shuk eja rilleh, “Apha akha ah apa akhana muchi wor ranga shukkae.
Amo na muchi louloija theja hla juija ahre na lampi ah tulla awa na sar weta bakso.
Ahre na lungkai chunga alei atam am nona ah tulla, hana alei atam am no jarra tou len ae.
Chuti weta nie na dinga hang juija chu atou te ngei ha hui ae, tichu chu ato na alei athukka lut no pa chu.
Muchi ahre na aling akha chu rampa bella mani na tau wa hang halkom aling jam na shoun so weh.
Chuti weta muchi ahre chu ahra alei ja tulla muchi atam ra ae, ahre na riha, akhana somruk, hana adangna somthum.”
“Akur am malmashi lim na ngei oh ta rilweta Jisu na treem so weh!”
Hana arui ngei na Jisu kolla wa weta makolla sai, “Alo sarukka nangna malmashi ngei ta natrong juija roumu shukka ah rilla che?”
Jisu na sange, “Thangwan rengram ma athup rou hi nagei kolla chak thinwar pe phur ae chuti weta mani ta chu takno ae.

Rouram chu atujong malmashi akha kolla madon chunga makolla tam tek rang lollange, hata lea chu amo ha makolla am ta lella am tek kange; chuti weta ephao don no malmashi makolla chu madon te phao la ange.
Manina karil katrong juija rou mushuk kapek na chu mani na an hal kom mani na ri no ae akha chu ngai hal kom mani na thei no ae akha chu lunglang thei no ae.
Chuna sarukka rouphu Isaiah rilsuk ha mani chunga shuk so weh:
‘Na malmashi ngei na ngaija ngai ja lunghal thei no ae;
mani na anna, anna ri pha nea no ae.
Ti chu mani lunghal mo so ae akha
chu mani kur kom thei nijowe mit kom ri pi nijowe,
ano lea chu mani mitna ri nea ange mani
kur na thei ange mani lunghal nakom hal la shukne ange.
Akha chu mani ha ka am na ah, hai lea ange akha chu
mani ta keina ahra adam pi ange ta
Chungthieng na rilleh.’
“Nataranga chu nanghi rawan hra ae! namit na ri pha akha chu nakurna kom theipha ae.

Keina nangei kolla diekka rillinge rouphu thiempu ngei akha chu Chungthieng rouchoi ngeina nangei ripha nea ha leima tam ri num meh, chuti weta manina rino, akha chu nangei theipha ha theipi num meh, chuti weta manina theino ae.
“Muchi worpa hina roumu shuk hi hrabakta nangei na theijo akha chu chu oh.
Rengram hina rouril thei chu thei-weta lunghal theino ngei hi lampi ah tul muchi ae hrano na phao weta muchi lim ha sar ah thing so weh.
Kengkai chunga tul muchi rilna chu manina ahra rouril theipha lea ariemma la sil ngei ha ae.
Chuti weta ato na thukka lut no jarra asotta am nea no ae, ti na chu ahra routrong sharukka aol ana pha juija manina hla ah hou len ae.
Aling abom sunga tou hana ril na chu ahra rouril thei ha chu, thei weta, aring chang taranga aol hana achong areng ta di ah mani na ara ra no ngei ae.
Akha chu ahra warah alei chunga tul muchi ta rilna chu ahra rouril hata ngai thei weta lunghal thei mani na ara ra ae ahre na riha, akha na somruk adang na somthum ra ae.”
Jisu na roumu shuk adang akha ah manita rilleh: “Wanram ma Rengram chu hihakti ange. Apa akha na malao lai ah ahra muchi worphur ae.
Nahani jantienga meelim na jal sutakka, hrano apa akha na phao weta gehu amu karra rampa amu worphur so.
Chuti weta akung changa lokka hanga ara rajuija rampa kung hakom ripha so.
Apa hana asuuk na phao weta makolla hita rilleh, ‘Ocha, nalaolai ah muchi ahra chak worphur weta; hoitianga rampa amu phao wa meh?’
‘Nahi hrano mee na ae phur sa ae ta amo na sange,’ ‘nangna rampa makhai chu phoija hou pi num cha mo ae, mani na amo ta sai.’
‘Phoi no oh,’ ‘rampa kung makhai nangei na phoi juija shang kung ngei kom juitol ange mani hitta.

Shangpot malim chu hata shang akha chu rampa kung ani mak tou ha shu oh. Chuna kei na sangpot juija tullu lu ngeita hita rillange masha ah rampa kung pot weta ahu ahu hup weta sarmei hollo hana nutienga chu shang makhai hana ka serkunga shi oh.’ ”
Jisu na mani ta adang roumu shuk akha rilleh. “Wan ramma rengram chu apa akha na alou lai ah atam amu choi weta worra hou hek ti ae.
Amu lim karra sin tek ti halkom tou ah hang juija chu kungpi chang so weh hana awa ngei na phao weta abakka abu sa ae.”
Jisu na adang roumu shuk manita rilla am songe, “Wan ramma rengram chu namei nu akha na wainoi tingkung inthum ripta porra hong malim hlak ahol hekti ae.
Jisu na nalim hi roumu shuk changa ril shuke. Chuna roumu shuk tolno ah rengpa na ril no ae.
Amo na ma ae hi rouphu rilphur ha tung so weh,
“Kei na manita karil juija roumu shuk tolla rillange;
simlei ram hai thou thuppa am limpa ha
kei na ril shuk kange.”
Amona wairul riha hao phur weta inn sunga lut so. Arui ngei na ma am na wa weta sai, “Kanita loulai ah rampa wor na rouram ma dangpi oh.”
Jisu na sange, “Ahra muchi worpa ha hamee sanao pa ae;
Lou ha chu simlei chunge ahra muchi ha chu rengram malmashi ngei ha sha; rampa mu ngei chu hrano pa hana mee ngei ae;
hana rampa mu worphur ha chu hrano mee ha ae. Louluk ti hina shimlei ashu ang apha ae sang pottang ngei ha chu wanrui ngei ae.
Rampa mu lim hom weta sar meija hol chu hekta atreem ni apha wak juija hahek ta shuk kange.
Meesanaopana mawanrui hla ah diekno tullu lu mee akha chu hrano pak tullu lu meelim ta marengram hom mange.
Akha chu manita sarmei kum sunga denga hla ange hana mani na aha riella tappange.
Hana juija Chungthieng mee ngeina chu pathieng rengram ma niwar soun hekta war range chuna ejonga nakur am ngei na thei shu oh!
“Wan rengram chu hihek ti ae lou lai ah thuppa apa akha na loulaija sumpang thuppa shi tukhek ti ae, hana amona ariem ma lea weta adon anei ehai lim jurra akha chu lea weta loumun akha lei so weh.
“Woihapa, wan rengram chu apa akha na kungkap lung jonga rol akha hek ti ae.
Akha chu amant tam kung kapllung tuk juija chu thing weta manei madon am makhai jurweta naha lei so ae.
“Woihapa kom wan rengram chu hihekti ae apa ngei na mani len tuipi ah jun deng weta tuiriek chat lim mant ha hek ti ae.
Manina len shihak ti juija tui hou wa kaja shuk weta akha chu onga tuiriek hita hran so, Ahra tuiriek na mani pai sunga thung hana hrano lim chu denga hao so ae.
Ringchang hina atreem na apha hana chu hi hekti ange wanrui ngei jung weta ahra ngei karra hrano ngeita halweta rachun pi ange.
Hana manita sarmei kum ma deng juija amunt maniha aha riella trappange.
Jisu na manita sai ae, “Nangei na na lim hi lunghal thei chau?”
“Oh weh” ta manina sange.
Chuna amona sange, “Rouram chu wan rengram ma rui changpi rouphun ocha lim na mata anei adon haithou wa athar akhu chu alui choija shuk inn mitpu akha jongpa ae.”
Jisu na roumu shuk lim ril su nutienga amunt ha houphur so.

Akha chu ma am na mahu maram tienga lea so. “Amo na synagog sunga machu pi takpi thei meelim na angak shukka, amona hija lungsing hi hoija chu thing mo?” ta mani na sai, “Hana akha na angakpi hina alo ti mo nu?”
Amo hi thing tullu lu sanao pa no mo? Mary hi manu no mo, akha chu Jacob Josep, Simon akha chu Judas ngei na ma-u-manao ngei no meh?
Masarnu ngei ha no meh hina am ngei ha? “Amona nalim hi hoitinga pha meh?
Chuna amo ta mani na ngei no ae.
Jisu na manita rou ril, “Rouphu ta amunt aram adang adanga ajak ati ae mahu sunga akha chu ma inn sung hur na chakna ngei no ae.”
Rouram chu mani ngoiring am no jarra amona kom anealah tullu ha mani maikunga ripi no ae.
Apha hana Galily ah roukam mitpu Herod na Jisu rouramma theipha so.
Amo na marui ngei ta rillea, “Amo hi Johon Baptias ae; Amo hi athi sa hai thou ringthou so! Chuna sarukka angakpi tullu hi amo na ae nea ah ae.”
Hana mahaita Herod na Johon hi mant ranga roupe ah amo hi thirui takka huppa ren inn sunga shi so ae hina rouram chu manao pa Philip anamei Herodias sarukka ae.
Rouram chu Johon Baptias na Herod maikunga ril, “Nangna Herodias ta nei hi adiek ang no ae!”
Chuna sarukka Herod na Johon ta that num meh, chuti halkom Jehudi meengei ta ti ae rouram chu mani na Johon hi rouphu akha ae ta hal phur ae.
Herod sumla mingsen ni rungnie ah Herodias sanao nu na mani bomtul na maikunga lam ha Herod na ehekta ariem ae.
Herod na chuna tarang sarukka hita saro ei ae, “Ejongpa nadit naden naniekha keina nataranga ae ange!”
Manu thuchu anu juija amona maniek chu, “Kei ta Johon Baptias alu kang ha balei chunga dor ah pe oh!”
Reng ha alung olso, rouram chu makok phao meelim maikunga amona saro ei ja nadit makha pe ange ta maril jarra.
Chuna Johon aringa ren inn sunga tan so ae.
Hana malukang ha balei ta maril sha rou sha rukka chunga choija wa weta nungak hana manu kolla pesho ae.
Johon arui ngeina phao weta athi sa apum ha choija thing weta manina wui so. Hana manina Jisu am na thing weta thangkou so weh.

Jisu na matheipha pa chu, amunt hana thou amo na houphur weta kung chung weta athei chakka achik munt na ah thingso. Chuti weta meengei na marou theijuija hulok hei thou wa mani kae takka kalchoi ah anu juija thinge.
Chuna Jisu na manilimta kung shunga haithou rijuija ringrei ngei ah ana asa ejata dam pi ae.
Nietak apha pha juija arui ngei na makolla wa weta ril, “Atun hi apha leima taiso ae na ram munt hi malmashi atu kom am no na ram meh, chuna mani hla weta mani bak rang een rang leithing shu oh.”
Chuti weta Jisu na sange, “Manita hla no oh mani bakrang tieng nangei na pe oh!”
“Kani te am makhai chu tuiriek ani akha chu budol ranga chak so ae,” ta mani na sange.
Jisu na ril, “Ka am na ah choija wa oh.”

Amo na malmashi ngei ha rampa chunga ong ranga roupi ril weta amo na budol ranga akha chu tuiriek anie sar so. Thangwan tinga hai weta Chungthieng kolla dom weta. Amona budol ha ther weta marui ngei ta pe so. Hana marui ngei na mee ngei ta pe so ae.
Meelim na awon hoppa bak shu nutienga arui ngei na aliem ngei ha hom jui ja tai asom anie liem meh.
Hana abak ngei ha, namei noupong tol no lutta apa chakka lasing ranga ae.
Meelim ta mahla lei sunga Jisu na marui ngeita kuung sunga lut pi weta tuilien aralla tung ranga thinge.
Mani lim ta mahla su tak chu amona mathei chakka niek ae rang mullon na kalso, nitak pha ah wak jui chu Jisu mathei chakso.
Hana jui apha ah chu kung ha tui hou thou wa aram leima lah so ae ti chu thing rangna tuijul hangpi jarra.
Nituk apha eenly tak juija Jisu na mani am na den na kae ah tuipi lien chunga wa so.
Tui chunga mawak hi mani na ri jui ah mani hi leima ti so ae. Mani naril lae nahi thimpalop ae ta ati ah rol shukka au.
Jisu na manita ril nangei lung olno oh kei inge ati no oh.
Hana Pitarna ril shuk so. “Arengpu nang mak lea kei ta tuichung hina nakolla kawak nea rang rou pe oh.”
Jisu na sange, “Wa oh!” hana Pitar na kuung sung hai thou shuk weta tui chunga Jisu am na ah wa thou so ae.
Chuti weta amo na thi rang phaibu mari juija amo na ati so chuna tui sunga lup thou wa ril shukso, “Arengpu keita sanpi oh!”
Apha hana makka Jisu na makut dok weta amota mant so. “Oh ngoiring takno! ejerang nalung ngir no ah che?”
Manui niemak kuung sunga lutta hana chu thirang kom dai so ae.
Hana kung sunga marui ngei na Jisu ta mok weta ril, “Nang hi adiek takka Chungthieng asanao pa ae!”
Manina tui kung lal sunu tienga Genesaret ram ha tungso weh.
Chuna ram munt hana mee ngei na Jisu ta mel danga hana ram ahul tunga am lim na ana asa eja ngeita Jisu am na ruija phao ae.
Akha chu mani na Jisu linglut punkeng te chak halkom tham ranga Jisu kolla nie ah punking te tham ma lim na adam ahra pha ae.
Jerushalem hai thou phao Pharisees akha chu rouphun ocha ngei na Jisu kolla phao weta sai ae.
“Alo sara rukka narui ngei na ulien changei taleet tamang kui pi ah meh? Mani na bak inn ang tienga akut hra bak ta siel no ae!”
Jisu na sange, “Nangei chu alo wa Chungthieng rou jui no lutta nangei thei chak sem ta jui ja chao?
Rouram chu Chungthieng na rilleh, ‘Napa nanu ta ajak atri oh,’ akha chu atu jong akha na ‘mapa manu ta sarkou lea chu amo ha athi pha ange.’
Chutiwe nangeina ril chou weh, atumoting na manu, mapa ta san phung shuk hata ‘Chungthieng ta sa eta’ ril tale chu, hayong amo hen mapata ayak ati ang ni yo weh.
Chuna nangei taleet jui ranga Chungthieng tong santa iko ano changpiso weh.
Taat-kool ngei oh! Isaiah na nangei kolla ril phur ha iya adiek ka shukka yo meh?
‘Na malmashi ngei na mani murra chakka ajak atri ae,
chuti weta mani lung sung chu rou takka kakol
hai thou aram lah au amme.
Chuna manina mangei taalit tamang ta dramo na ngei
akha hekta chupi ah keita arimsalla mokkae!’ ”
Hana Jisu na mani wairul riha ta makolla kok weta manita ril, “Lunghal thei oh akha chu hra bakta ngai oh.”
Ejongpa akha na mur sunga lut chu ephao makolla thienglou changpi no ae chuti weta mur thou shuk hana amo ta thienglou changpi ae.
Arui ngei na makolla wa weta hita rille. “Rou hi thei juija Pharisis ngei kolla keng tin ange ta dangpha che?”
Chuna thangwan na pathieng na toupi muchi ano lim chu phoija hou ange ta Jisu na sange.
“Mani taranga ephao ol no oh! Mani ha mitcho lamkai mitcho mee sa ae; mitcho akha na mit cho akha ta lamkai lea chu manui nielim kum sunga tul ta ae.”
“Hina rou sarukka kanita hrabak ta phu ah rilpi oh ta Pitar naril.”
Jisu na mani ta ril, “Atun phao sunga nangei na dang no chou?
Nangei na dangno chou? bao sunga lut eheilim pa hi won sunga lut weta woihapa tak hai thou shukka thinge.
Chuti weta bao hai thou shuk rou ha chu lung hai thou shuk sa ae hana na ngei na mee hata thienglou changpi ae.
Rouram chu lung hei thou shuk hana hrano lung halla meethat, meenamei meepisal lalpi akha chu hahekta hrano tullu aruthei, trongshi dieklao saro ei hana hrano rou ril hi ae.
Hi ngei hina malmashi ta thienglou mee changpi ae chuna mani na rilchu hekta nangei kut shil no lutta bak hana mee hata thingno mee changpi no ae.”
Hana nutienga chu Jisu na Ture akha chu Sidon ram tienga thingso.
Ram hatienga am Kanaanite namei nu na makolla phao. “David sanaopa,” “Keita lungshi ngai pi oh kasanao nu ha hrano muihla sounna olla am so ae.”
Chuti weta Jisu na chu namei nu hata rou akha phao ril no ae, Marui ngei na makolla waveta ril. “Nameinu hi julla hla oh! Namei hina ani nutieng juija amo na rochok rasau pi so weh!”
Jisu na sange, “Keita hla chu amang sa Israel sanao ngei tarang chakke.”
Chuna namei nu na makae kunga wa weta mokka “Ocha keita sanpi oh!” amona ril.
Jisu na ril, “Unga ngei taranga bu hata ui ta denga pe pi hi kei adiek ahno ae.”
Namei nu na sange, “Naha rou takkae, ocha,” chuti weta, “Ui na kom mamitpu bakna maicham chung thou tul bu maal bak pha ae.”
Chuna Jisu na maninga sange, “Namei nang hina nangoiring hi lei maratte! emo nadit ha nakolla tung shu oh.” Hana pa chu apha hana makka asanaonu ha dam so ae.
Jisu na amunt kalha houphur weta Galily tuipi kolla thingso weh. Hana mullon na kallweta ongso.
Wairul riha na Jisu kolla phao wa mani hita kae hor mitcho akha-chu kut hor atrong shukno akha chu adang rai eja Jisu kaekunga rui phao wa Jisuna manita dampi so-ae.
Chuna atrong sukno na trong shuk, kut hor ta dampi kaetlik ta thingpi akha chu mitcho na ri nea hi malmashi eja na ri juija ngakka akha chu manina Israel Chungthieng ta dom so ae.

Jisu na marui ngei ta makolla kok weta rille, “Keina manita ringrei ngai thei ni ange; Mani hi kei hita amha rungnie nathum su so ae, mani hi ephao bakno ae. Chuna manita wontam ma keina hla num nonge anoleh mani ha lampi ah waipha ri tuk kange.”
Marui ngei na sange, “Wairul riya hina won hop rang budol chu na ramruk hina alo ta tukkang meh?”
Jisu na sai, “Budol chu eja thap don chou?” Mani na sange. “Sari” akha chu “tuiriek asinte ahre.”
Amona wairul riya ta alei chunga ong rang ril.
Chuna amo na budol sari akha chu tuiriek sar weta Chungthieng kolla niek weta budol ha therra marui ngeita pe pi ah, marui ngei na kom meengei ta samma bakpi so weh.
Mani lim na won hoppa bak su takka arui ngei na atul ata hom juija tai sari shi-hakti ae.
Namei Naopong ngei tolno lutta apa ngei chakka lising inly ae.
Jisu na wairul riya ta hla su takka amo na kung sunga lut weta Magadan ram tienga thingso weh.
Pharisis akha chu Saddusis na Jisu kolla lung ann phao wa thangwan tienga anealah ri pi rang mani na sai ae.
Chuna Jisu na mani ta sange; “Nataktieng apha wak juija nangei na ril, ‘hachu ae ruh mei sur ang no ae rouram chu thangwan hi sann ae.’
Hana nietukka na awoni hi ruh mei sur ange rouram chu thangwan hi runem meh. Nangei na thangwan an weta ejongpa shuk kang mo danga ril nea chau, muh anutienga esuk kang mo tichu ril nea no ae.
Hana akha chu mee namei lal thing meerol na chu angakpi anealah an na am meh, chuti weta nahi Jonah kolla pek chak no wa chu pe ang ni jo weh.”
Chuna Jisu na mani ta hou phurra thingso weh.
Mani na tuipi lal su wa thing juija marui ngei budol choi rang makphur so ae.
Jisu na mani ta ril, “Song jello Pharisis lea Sadusis ngei achol ha.”
Mani sung nanga mani na hal hlakka rillea, “Nahina rou chu anina budol choi no sarukka ae.”
Mani ngaitu hlak ha Jisu na dangpha ah rillea, “Ngoiring takno ngei eje ranga nangei sunga budol tol no sharukka trong hlakka chau?
Atun phao nangei na lunghal thei no chau? Budol ranga na lasing ranga mee ta kabakpi ha angei thei no chau? akha chu tai shihakti eja nangei na shi pi sa?
Ano lea budol sari na lasing innly ta pek akha chu tai shihakti eja nangei na shi pi chou?
Keina budol rouramma nangei kolla ril nonge ti ha alo dang no ah chau? chuti halkom Pharisis akha chu Sadusis ngei achol ha chu natak na song jello.”
Chuna budol akha chu achol roulam ma no ae hana Pharisis akha chu Sadusis ngei chupi takpi ha song jello ta ril na arengpu na trongsan pe ah ae ta mani na dangpha so ae.
Kaisariya Philipi ram tienga Jisu na phao ah marui ngei ta Jisu na sai, “Meesanaopa ta malmashi ngei na alo ta ril meh?”
Manina sange. “Ahre na chu Johon Baptias ae; adang na ril ae Elija, akha chu adang ahre na chu Jeremiah anoleh rouphu akha ae.”
“Chuti weta nangei na chu alota rilla chau?” “Keita atu ae hallo chau?” Amo na sai.
Simeon Pitarna sange, “Aring Chungthieng sanaopa Khrista ha nange.”
Jisu na sange, “Jonah sanaopa Simon nang chu jaihra ae, rouram chu mee ngei na nakolla nahi dangpi ano ae, thangwan na pathieng na dangpi ae.
Chuna keina nakolla rillinge nang chu Pitar, nang chu sumlung chunga keina akha ae nokna inn sa ange. Hana sarmei kuum innkal na nahata dap nea ang no ae.
Keina thangwan rengram ma innkal kalna pe ange chuna ejongpa alei ram ma nahup ha wan ram ma huppange akha chu aleiram ma nahla ha wanram ma hla ange.”
Chuna marui ngeita amona trongsan pe ae atujong akha kolla kei hi Khrista ae ta ril no oh.

Apha hana hai thou wa Jisu na marui ngei ta hrabak ta amona hi ril thou so, “Kei Jerushalem ma thing weta rouphu lamkai ngei kut chunga akha chu roukung ocha ngei maikunga aol dong pha ange akha chu amota that tange rungnie nathum su nie ah ring changa ringthou ange.”
Pitar na amota adanga ruija thing weta lungsa so, “Ano mee ril hajongpa ha ephao shuk kang no ae,” Amona ril, “Ephao shuk kang no ae Arengpu.”

Jisu na Pitar am na haileh ah ril, “Ka am na hai thou lea oh, saitan! nang hi ka kae mathui rang mee ae; rouram chu nangna Chungthieng ningtienga nadang am no ae chuna nangna malmashi ngei hek ta hal che ae.”
Jisu na marui ngeita ril, “Atu jongpa na kanutieng jui num lea, matakna matak ta ngei no shu oh akha chu ma Kross ron weta kanutieng jui shu oh.
Rouram chu atu jongpa na maring chang ring num lea mang ang ae. Chuti weta atu jongna kataranga maring chang mangpi lea amo ha tuksier ange.
Atujong malmashi akha na simlei ram lim pha weta mamuihla mangpi lea chu echu hoi ah meh?
Chuna meesanaopa mapa hina mahung majai wanrui hitta jungha ange. Chuna apha ah chu malmashi lim na ma ae, ma ae na tullu anu juija olmant pe ange.
Keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge hina ngirra am ahre chu athee am no lutta meesanaopa na marengram jung ripha ange.”
Chuna rungnie naruk nutienga Jisu na amo hitta Pitar, Jacob akha chu Johon Jacob hita rui weta chungtek ti mulbung ah manithei chak kalso.
Mani anna amlei ah maikunga Jisu na melrung hlonga mamai soun na semnie nu hekta warra, akha chu apun choi angouna demwar war so ae.
Hana arui inthum na Moses, lea Elija na Jisu ta trong thoupi ah am ri so ae.
Chuna Pitar na Jisu ta ril, “Rengpa hina ani am hi ehekta hra so ae, ejong nangna ngaipi ta lea chu keina tusang inthum sa num minge rengpa tarang akha, Moses tarang akha, hana Elija tarang akha.”
Hata mani trong thou lei ja awar sumphai na manita hlumma sanrol akhana sumphai karra ril, “Nahi kasanaopa ae amota keina lungshi inge makolla keina ehekta pel sange nangei na maril ha thei oh.”
Marui ngeina son rol hi thei pha juija mani na atri ah alei chunga amai bu ah tu so ae.
Chuti weta Jisu na mani am na wa weta tongso, “Atri no oh!”, Amona ril, “thou jou oh.”
Chuna manina Chungtinga anjuija mani na Jisu ah no wa atu akha phao ri pha no ae.
Mani na molbung hai thou tumma, Jisu na mani ta chupi, “Atujong akha kolla awoni nangei ri ha ril shuk no oh, meesanaopa na athi haithou wa ringthou malim ma.”
Chuna arui ngei na makolla sai ae, “Alo wa rouphun ocha ngeina chu Elija na masha ah phao ange ta rilla meh?”
“Adiek takka Elija na Phao masha ae”, Jisu na sang, “Hana amona eheilim thourang rang ange.”

Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge Elija chu phao shu so ae mani na amota mel dang no ae chuna sarukka machunga mani dit aenum tullu lu phur ae. Chu hekta meesanaopa takom mani kut chunga aol ana pha ange.
Hana arui ngei na lunghal thei ah na hi amo na Johan Baptias rou wa rilla am mee ta hal so ae.
Mani na wairul rija am na nei ah wakjuija Jisu maikunga apa akha na huk hrun na ah ril ae.
“Rengpa oh, ka sanao pata thangshit ngei pi oh, amo ha thikier don na ehekta olso ae amo hi tuisunga meisunga hata tul chakti ae.
Keina narui ngei kolla rui phao inge chuti weta mani na amo ta dampi nea nijo weh.”

Jisu na sange, “Oh ngoiring lou ngei oh akha chu lam diekno meerol ngei oh! Echan sotta keina nangei kolla am ha ang sa? Echan sotta keina nangei ta donga am mang sa? Apasanao ha ka am na ah ruija wa oh.”
Jisu na thimpalop ta trongshi ril weta apasanao kolla hai thou shuk so. Hana apha amo ha dam so ae.
Hana marui ngei na Jisu am na ah mani chak wa weta sai, “Alo wa kani na julla hou nea no wa meh?”

Jisu na sange, “Rouram chu nangoi ring ha rat no sharukka ae, keina adiek rou rillinge. Ejonga nangoiringna antam muh thap te am ta lea chu, nangna na amulbung ta amunt hina thou hlonga hi na am mo ril che hal hlong ange nakolla neno ti am mang no ae.”
Chuti halkom hijongpa lim hi bu hai ah niek a no wa chu shuk nea no ae.
Marui ngei na Galily ah manilim na rachun wakjui ja Jisu na ril, “Meesanaopa ta meengei kut chunga pe ange.
Mani na amota that ange akha chu rungnie nathum sunie ah amo ha ring thou ange” chuna arui ngeina aol na shi so.
Kapharnahum ma Jisu akha chu arui ngeina tunga sum hrai anina Pitar am na phao weta sai, “Nangei ocha na innthieng sum pejou meh?”

Amo na inn thieng lut juija Jisu na amota masha rilleh, Simon nangna chu ejongpa rilla che? simlei chunga Rengpa ngei na atujongpa kolla sum la meh? masanao ngei kolla mo ano lea tairam mee ngei kolla mo?
Amona tairam mee ngei kolla ae ta sange chuna Jisu na makolla ril rouram chu huram mee ngei chu pekphung shuk no ae.

Chuti halkom anina mani ta shungshi oida pi no ranga nangna tuipi ah thing weta kui jun thinga chuna masha na mant tuiriek ha abou nather juija sekal akha tuk kange, naha la weta mani ta pe thingo, kasaruk akha chu nasaruk ko tolla pe oh.
Hana lei apha ah arui ngei na Jisu am na wa weta sai, “Chung thangwan rengram ma atuna lok tek ti meh?”
Chuna Jisu na unga akha kok weta mani lim maikunga ngir pi so,
Akha chu Jisuna ril, “Keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge nangei na unga hi hekta ahlong pha malim chu thangwan rengram lut nea ang no ae.
Thangwan rengram ma loktek ti chu atu mo akha na matakna nem thei ah unga hek ta alung nem hana wanram ma loktek ti ae.
Akha chu atu jong akha na unga hita kaminga hrabakta la sil mee ha kei ta la silla ae.
“Chuna atujong akhana keita ngoiringa am unga ngei ta pakka lutpi lea chu amo ha chu ahonga shum ren weta athuk tuipi len ah denga hlapa na makolla hra tek kange.
Simlei chung hina pak tapi ahlempa ha ringrei pi ae rou ram chu ahlem pa hi phao no ngei no ae chuti weta hajong ahlem mee amo ha chu ringrei pi ae.

“Ejonga nakut anoleh nakae na nangta pak lut pi ang lea chu tan weta denga hao oh, kut ani ano lea kae ani su wa sarmei kum ma luttang sa ruk chu kut akha chak kae akha chak samla ring chang pha pa na hra tekkae.
Akha chu namitna pak lutpi ang sharuk chu, la weta denga hao oh, sarmei kum ma mit ani su ah lut ang sa ruk chu mit akha chak na samla ring chang pha pa na hra tekkae.
“Nangei na, na asin te akha hita eko no hekta halno oh, rouram chu keina nangei kolla rilla aminge. Thangwan na mani wan rui ngeina thangwan na am ka pathieng maisun apha changhon na ri ah am meh.
(Rouram chu meesanaopa junghi amang kelmo ta sanarang junge.)
“Nangei na alo ta hallang chau? Apa akha na kelmo riha don sunga mani kar sunga akha na mang juija amo na som ku akuta hou phur weta amang hata tuk ranga jong thing no meh.
Adiek takka keina rillinge amona akha te hi matukjui apha ah eja ah ariem ma meh, mangno samku-aku ta lella.
Chu hekta thangwan na pathieng na kom asin te akha mang tihi madit no ae.
“Chuna ejonga nanao akha na nangta aral tullu aleh chu nanui theichak am lei ja ma-maral ha amota ri pi thingo. Ejonga narou natrong amo na ngei pi lea chu nanao ta woiha lea ah tuk sier so che.
Chuti weta ejonga amo na ngeipi no lea chu nang hitta mee akha ani ruiveta thingo mani na narou ha adiektak kae ta ngir ha ranga.
Chuna ejonga amo na mani rou trong phao ngei pi no lea chu mee limpa ta rillo, atreem na ah mee limpa ril kom ngeinum no lea nakol hai thou wa amo hi jati adang akha chu sum hrai mee hekta hallo.
“Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge alei ramma nangei lou lim pa ha keina kom thangwan na ngei ang. Nonge akha chu alei ramma angeipi ha keina kom thangwan na ngeipi ange.
“Hana chunga keina ril shop inge alei ram ma ehal kom nanui mee ani na rachun na ah ngei hlakka niekha thangwan na am pathieng na ae pi ange.
Rouram chu anino lea eenthum na kaminga rachun am na karra munt na kei amtollinge.”
Chuna Pitar na makolla phao weta ril, “Arengpu, ejonga ka-u-kanao na kakolla pak tullu lu juija kei na woi eja ringrei ngei pi ang meh? woi sari phao meh?”
Jisuna makolla rillea, “Keina nakolla karil chu woisari chak no weh somsari sari ha sari ae.
Chuna sarukka wanram rengram chu hihekti ange Rengpa akha na marui ngei kolla anei adon chollang kengirre.
Chuna amo na sumsing matel thou juija lasing asom don na am akha makolla ruija wa so ae.
Hana madingne no jarra mamit puna makolla rou pe so ae, manamei asanao akha chu madon manei ehai limpa jur weta mapek phung shuk pea shu oh.
Chuna pa chu marui hana makae kunga mok weta ril makolla. Arengpu oh, ‘Kei ta lungshi pi oh,’ ‘Apha atan te hana keina malandon lim ha ding ang singe!’
Hana Arengpu na machunga ringrei ngei pi ah arui hana landon lim ringriei ngeipi ah hla so ae.

“Chuti weta arui hana hita shukka mathing juija atonpi rui akha na kom makolla Diner riha don akha tuk hlakka atonpi na makolla hlemso; hana juija amo na atonpi ahonga mot weta ril, ‘Napek phung ha pe jou oh.’
Chuna atonpi na makolla mok weta hlem so. ‘Keita lungshi pi oh,’ ‘Apha atan te kei na nalandon ha ding ang singe.’
Amo na ngei num no ah thing weta aton pi hata ren inn sunga malandon ding nea ma lim phao taranga shi so ae.
Chuna shukka am, ha ripha adang atonpi ngei na mani lung leima olla mani na rengpa kolla thing weta roulam lim ha thangkau so ae.
Chuna marengpa na amota kok weta rou rillea, ‘hra no suuk!’ ‘Keina nalandon lim pa ha ring reingeipi singe rouram chu kakolla naniek nujuija,
keina nangta ringrei ngei hekta nangna kom natonpi ta kom ringrei ngei pi ngei no che?’
Rengha akeng sha ah Malandon lim dingne malim taranga amota ren sunga hla so.
Atreem na changa Jisu na rillea, “Nangei na lung lutta ringrei ngeipi no lea chu wanram ma pathieng na kom hohekta nangei ta kom ae ange.”
Jisu na nalimpa hi ril su nutienga amo na Galily hai thou wa Jordon aral ramtieng Judeah ah thingso ae.
Wairul rija na mamu tieng juije hana am amo na ana asha ngei ta dom pi ae.
Chuna Pharisies ngei na phao weta makolla chang anna hita sai. “Anamei ta ejongpa rou akha sarukka mahran num juija hran hlak hi rouphun na angai ah meh?”
Jisu na sange, “Nangei na pa no the songa chau ha chu athou hai thou wa sempipa mitpu na namei apa ta sem ha.
Chungthieng na rillea hina rouram sarukka apa na manu mapa ta hla phur weta anamei kolla am shu oh hana ani ha atun chu akha wul so ae?
Chuna sarukka manui aniha ani ah ni oh weh akha chakso ae. Hana sarukka Chungthieng na tul pi sha hi atu akha na hran hlak no shu oh.”
Mani na Jisu ta sai ae, “Chu lea chu alo sarukka Moses na ngei hlak na jiek shi lea chu hran oh ta trongsan pe ah meh?”
Jisu na meengeita sange, “Nangei lungna hir hai sulla Moses na nanamei ta hran ranga amo na angai pe ah shi ah ae. Leisem hai thou chu nahi angai ano ae.
Chuna keina nangei kolla rilla aminge atu na hal, atu hal apa akha na anamei ta vokno shimshak chat ano lutta ahran tul shukka namei adang ta nei thing lea chu shimshi bohron mee ae ta la ange.”
Arui ngei na Jisu ta rillea, “Ejonga nahi jongpa na pisal sangam ani karra shuk kang lea chu taichang no pa na hella hra tekkae.”
Jisu na sange, “Na roulam hi malmashi lim tarang no ae, chuti weta Chungthieng na pek sha mani tarang chak sa ae.

Apa akha na alo wa tai chang no meh ti hi adang adang rouram am meh, rouram chu ahre na chu mani hata apok hai thou kom tol ae. Hana adang na chu mani thei chakka thangwan rengram taranga sem kom tol ae. Atu jongpa na nahi jui nea lea chu ha ta jui shu oh.”
Mee ngei na unga makhai tama am na ah ruija wa ah mani taranga amo na mani chunga kut shi weta aniek rang nga ae. Chuti weta arui ngei na meengei ta ran na hla ae,
Jisu na rillea, “Unga ngei ha hamma shi no oh ka-am na ah wa shu oh mani ha, rouram chu wanram ha mani taranga ae.
Chuna Jisu na unga ngei chunga kut dung phur weta amo na thingso.
