Nahani akha apa akha na makolla wa weta ril, “Ocha, samla ringchang pha ranga kei na ejongpa tullu lu ang meh?”
Chuna Jisu na sange, “Ejerange kakolla ahra tullu taranga nangna sai ah am che?” “ahra akha chu am meh, nangna samla ring chang phanum ta lea chu jieksha rouphun ngei ha sung jella am mo.”
Amo na sai, “Ejongpa rouphun mo ae?” Hana Jisu na sange, “Nangna ekom mee that no oh; angna mee shimshi bohron tullu lu no oh; meepot kom nang naru thing no oh; nangna diekno meelung ngir tol no oh.
Nanu napa ta ajak atri oh, akha chu nangna inn ning tultieng ta natak mak hekta lungshi oh.”
Rung thar hana Jisu ta sange, “Na limpa hi keina unga haithou wa ae no wa hang sange chuna ejongpa wat the song mo ae?”

Jisu na amota rillea, “Ejonga nangna hilim hi rakit num ta lea chu, thing weta na am nadon lim jur weta napha sum ha sara nouringei kolla pe thingo chu lea chu waram ma natarang am mange, chutilea chu kanutieng juijo.”
chuna rou hi rungthar hana theipha juija alung leima olla amo na thingso, ti chu amo hi anei adon mee ae.
Hana Jisu na marui ngei ta rillea, “Keina diekka nangei kolla rillinge, achongpu malmashi ngei na wan rengram lut tanghi leima olla shuk kae.
Keina nangei kolla rilsinge achongpu malmashi na Chungthieng rengram tung ang chu jangpu sha na ahriem na sunga lut pa na hella lei tekkae.”
Rou hi arui ngei na theipha juija ehekta angak shukka ril, “Atu ngei na chu sanpi pha ang mo nu?” ta mani na sui.
Jisu na mani ta an weta manikolla ril, “Nangei malmashi kolla chu nahi ane no ae,” chuti weta Chungthieng kolla chu aneno ti ekom am no ae.
Pitar na sange, “Anno kani na eheilim pa houphur ra nanutieng jui songe kani chu ejongpa pha ang meh?”

Jisu na mani ta rillea, “Keina athar simlei chung tarang adiek rou rillinge, meesanaopa na phomlu chunga ahung ajai phu ah phumlu chunga ong juija, kanutieng jui nangei asom ani kom phomlu ah ong weta Israel phung asom ani chunga pallange.

Chuna atu jongnu atu jongpa akha na kasaruk ka ah inn alou houphur ra anoleh ah-u-anao, anoleh, manu mapa ah no lea asanao hou phurra thing lea chu amo na saruk riha hella pha ah samla ring chang kom pe ange.
Chuti weta masha ah am ngei na atreem na chang ange hana meenu ngei na masha ange.
“Thangwan rengram chu hihekti ange. Apa akha ma mahun na tullu lu ranga inthou wa rui thing jong pa ae.
Rungnie akha ah dinaris pe ange ta ngei hlak nutienga amo na mahunna tullu lu rang hla so ae.
Hana hita shukka mathing jui apha na aku tak juija ngamdol ahre kai thil hou wa ngirra am ri so.
Chuna amo na manita rillea, ‘nangei na mahunna thing weta tullu lu thingo nangei ta pek phung shukha keina pe ange.’
Chuna mani na kom thingso ae. Hana asom ani tak jui ja kom akha chu apha na inthum takjui ja kom ahre ta hla ae.

Amo na kaithil la mathing jui apha na ranga ta ang neite wak juija apa ahre na hata ngirra am ripha so. Chuna amo na mani ta rillea, ‘Ejeranga nahani chuppa apha ariem salla mangpi ah am chau?’ ta amona sai.
Mani na sang, ‘Atu akha na kanita tullu lu rang nek phao no ae,’ ‘chuleh hra so ae nangei kom mahunna thing weta tullu lu thingo’ ta amona manita rillea.
Nitak apha pha juija mahun amit puna arui ta kokka ril, ‘tullu lu lim ha mani ratna sum pejou oh, athou na hai thou atreem na phao hana masha ngei phao sunga.’
Apha na asom akha tak juija tullu lu thou ngei na wa weta denarius pha juija.
Masha ah tullu lu ngei halso kani chu manita hella pha ange. Chuti weta mani kom dinarius akha pha so.
Mani na pha denarius pha hina taranga mitpu kolla mani na vokhlak thou so.
‘Atreem na ngei chu apha akha chak tullu lu weta nangna mani hitta kani nahani akha nisha donga tullu lu kani hita akha rukka napek chu!’
“Amitpu hana sange manita, ‘thanrol ngei oh, keina nangei ta dienarius akha ah ngei hlakka no wa meh keina nangei kolla aral tullu lu nonge.’
Nata ha la weta thingo nakolla kapek hekta atreem na ah tullu lu ngei kom pe hi kahal kalunge.
Kata hi kahal kalung anu juija tullu ka ae hi ae phung shuk no meh? anoleh kulung lokka ka ae hi nangna anar ah che?”
“Chu hekta oh rui nungeina masha ange masha ngeina ruinung ange.”
Jisu na Jerushalem tienga kalla thinga arui asom ani ta ruija mani lampi ah amo na manita ril.
“Anno ani na Jerushalem ma thinga; meesanaopa ta chungtekti thiempu ngei kut chunga akha chu scribe ngei kut chunga pe ange hana mani na thit ranga rou rillange.
Akha chu meejat adang ngei na nuiso semso ah trongshi eja ril weta aban yamma that-ange akha chu rungnie nathum su nie ah ringthou ange.”
Zebedee namei na asanao rel hita Jisu kolla phao weta huk hrun na mokka ejongpa akha sai ae.
“Ejongpa nangna di ah che?” Jisu na amota sai. Hana amona makolla sang, “Kasanao rel ta na rengram ma na am juija akha nachangtieng akhana nawoitienga ong ranga trongsan pe pi oh.”
Chuti weta Jisu na sange, “Nangna na sai rou ha kom ejongpa sai mo ti phao dang no che ae. Nangna ka in rang tui don ha nang na in nea ang che? mani na makolla sange kanina nea ange.”
Jisu na mani ta ril, “Nangna katuidon in nea che hal kom kachangtienga akha chu ka uitienga ong ti chu kapek nea no ae chuti weta na hi chu kapa thieng na mani taranga tamasha ae sa so ae.”
Chuna asom na chu rou hi thei juija manui uleh nao chunga lungsa so.
Hana Jisu na mani ta ma am na ah koknm weta ril, “Adang chat ngei na mani chunga mitpu change akha chu mani na mani chunga ane angam change.
Hijongpa hi nangei karra am mang no sa ae: atu jongpana nangei karra alok chang num lea chu meelim rui chang ange.
Akha chu atu jongna lamkai chang num lea chu nangei kor chang shu oh,
Meesanaopa na jung hi amota seba ae rang jung no ae, chuti weta amo sipa ae pi ranga akha chu meelimta sanpirang maring chang pe-yunge.”
Jerikho haithou wa Jisu akha chu arui ngeina shukha thing juija wairul riya na mani nutieng juije.
Lamhouwa onga am mitcho spa ani na Jisu wa so ae ta rou thei pha ah manui na hita aou shukkae, “David sanaopa! kanui nita ringrei ngei pi oh!”
Wairul riya na manui ta trongshi trong bau rilla au, daidikta ammo, chuti phao sunga manui na lella ranga ao-ae, “David sanao pa! Kanui ta ringrei ngei pi oh!”
Jisu na solha weta manui ta kokka rille. “Nanui ni taranga keita e-ae pi nummui chou?” amo na manui ta sai;
“Karenge,” kanui mit ri num munge manui na sange.
Jisu na manui ta ringrei ngei ah manui mitta thampi-a ripisowe chuti pachu manuina manutieng jui so-ae.
Olives mulbung Jerushalem Betphage amunt nei ah Jisu akha chu arui ngei na wakjui ja
Jisu na marui ani ta masha ah rourilla hla ae. “Nangei maiah am hu shunga thingo hana nangei na kormoh asonao ren na am tuk hlak kange. Naha nangei na ruit hla weta ka am no ah rui ah wa oh.
Chuna ejonga atu jong akha na hana taranga rou sai lea chu makolla hitta rillo. ‘mitpu na danunrkar akha am meh, hana narou chakna amo na nangta thing jou oh ta hla ange.”
Na shukka am limpa hi amatienga rouphupa rilphur lim ha adiekka shukso weh:
“Zion hupi ah rourillo,
Anno na rengpu ha na am na ah phao so weh.
Amo chu alung nem meh,
hana kurmoh sanao chunga wa ange.”
Chuna arui ngeina maril nu juija thingweta Jisu ril makha ae so.
Mani na kurmoh api ate rui ah wa ah kurmoh sanao chunga mani pun pha pi ah Jisu na achunga ong kal so.
Hana ehekta atam wairul rija na mani punchoi lim lampi ah dokka pha ah, adang ahre na chu anobak hrim ma lampi ah pha pi ae.

Ehekta tam wairul rija na Jisu maitinga thinge hana anung tieng juija wa ngei na hitta au thou weh. “David sanao pa ta dommunge! Arengpa minga wa mee amo ha Chungthieng na jaihra machunga pe ange. Chungthiengta dom munge!”
Jisu na Jerushalem ma lut juija hupi shunga am meelim pa na rashao ae, “Amo hi atu meh?” mee ngeina sai ae.
Hana wairul rijana hitta sange Nahi ae Galily Nazaretta phao rouphupa Jisu ae.
Jisu na mokna inn shunga lut weta pot jurra am ngei lea leija am mee ngeita julla hla so weh hana sum noi sella am ngei doukang kom achung athui wulpi so, hana paipi jurra am ngei ta kom.
Hana amo na mani ta ril, hitta, “Jieksha rou wa Chungthieng na hitta rillea, ‘Ka inn hi amokna inn ae ta keina kokkange,’ chuti weta nangei na chu aru thei ngei bik na changpi chou ae!”
Mokna inn na lut mitcho kaehar kut hor ngei ta Jisu na manita dampi.
Jisu na mokna inn shunga angakpi tullu lu ah am akha chu unga ngei na David sanao pa ta domma am hi, chungtekti thiempu ngei lea rouphun ocha ngei na rijuija ehekta alungsha thou so.
Chuna mani na Jisu ta sai, “Mani ril hlak lim hi nang chu thei ah che?”
Jisu na sange, “Oh weh, kei thei inge jieksha rou ha nang pa pha no songa che?” “Nangei na rakitpha ah dom thei ranga unga naopongei ta chupi ha!”
Jisu na manita houphur weta Bethany hupi ah thingweta amona nani jantieng ha am so weh.
Nani mathangpa chama hupi tieng malampi malea jui ja Jisu hi won tram so weh.

Lam hou wa Jisu na theichang kung ripha ah amunt hana thingso. Chuti weta theichang abuna ano wa chu ephao am no weh. Chuna amo na thingkung hata ril, “Nang hi woiha lea ah naira ra no sha oh!” Chu enlen theichang kungha charra thingso.
Arui ngei na na hi rijuija alou shukso. Chuna mani na ril, “Alo ta theichang kung hi hija ranga charra meh?

Jisu na sange, “Keina nangei ta rilla am minge, ejonga elog am no lutta ngoiring ta lea chu, keina theichang kungta ka ae hekta nangei kom ae nea ange. Akha chu chuna chak no wa kom na mullon ta kom rilne ange ‘thou jou oh nathei chakka hana tuipi ah thingo’ hata thing ange.
Ejonga nang na ngoiringa naniek lim ha nangna pha ang che ae.”

Jisu na mokna inn na lea weta; amo na chupi takpi ae hana chungtekti thiempu akha chu ulien changei na makolla wa weta sai, “Ejongpa nane am ma na hi nang na ae ah am che? Atuna nangta na ae nea na pe ah meh?”
Jisu na manita sang, “Keina nangeita rou akha sai ange ejonga nangei na sangne lea chu keina kom kane na tullu hi atu pek moti ha keina rillange.
Johon na baptias ae pina hi hoitienga phao mo weh, na hi Chungthieng ning tienga mo, ano lea malmashi ning tienga mo weh?”
Mani sunga rou vuk hlak thou so, “Anina alota rillang meh? Ejonga anina Chungthieng kol hai thou ae sang lea chu amo na hitta rillange, chulea chu nangei na alowa Johon ta ngoiring no chou?”
Chutiweta ejonga ani na malmashi kolla thou ae ta rillea chu mee ngei na anita alo ae ah wa ang sha, rouram chu manina Johon hi thiempu ae ta ngoiringe.”
Chunapa chu mani na Jisu ta sang. “Kani na dang nonge.” hana Jisu na manita ril, “Keina karillang dang nonge ka lu tullu hi hoitienga phao moti ha.
Nangna alota halla che? Apha akha ah apapah akhana asanao ani am phurre. Hana amo na asanao ulienpa kolla thing weta angur mahunna thing weta tullu lu thingo ta ril.
Asanaopa na sange, ‘Kei thing ang nonge.’ Chutiweta anutienga chu alung hlonga amona thing so weh.
Chuna hekta mapa na asanao akha kolla thing weta hata ril so, hana amo na sange, ‘Oh weh kei na thing ange.’ Chuti weta amo na thing chu thing nijowe.

Na asanao ani shunga mapa na atuta lung tin tek kang sha?” Mani na sange, ‘asanao ulien pa tah.’ Chunapa chu Jisu na manita ril, “Keina nangeita rilla am minge ha chu salhraipa lea honrei namei nu na nangei matienga Chungthieng rengram thing mee sha ange.”

Chuna taranga Johon Baptias na nangei am na ah adiek lam ri pi rang junge chuti weta nangei na chu amota ngoiring no weh, chuti weta sumhrai rol mee lea honrei nameinu na chu amota ngoiringe. Nangei na ri shu nutieng phao nangei lung hlonga amota ngoiring no weh.

Jisu na ril, “Anno adang rou mushuk akha hi.” Apha akha aram mitpu akha am meh, amo na chu angur mahun tamma ling phurra ahul tunga pal harra angur tui lak rangkom semma rungang ngei am rang kom teiten sha ah, amo na mee ngeita an na hakranga rou rille, amo chu ram akha ah thing so weh.
Angkur ara lairang apha wakjuija amo na mapha phung shuk lak ranga makor ngei ta hla so weh.
Hana mashi mee ngei na makor ngeita phitta that so weh adang akha tachu alung a deng so.
Woihapa makor masha ta tam tek hla so weh, manina masha mee ngei hekta ae sin so weh.
Atreem na ah chu asanao pa ta hla sierso. mahal chu asanao pa ta chu mani na ajak atri ange ta.
Chutiweta manina asanaopa ta ri juija mani yeye ril hlak so, “Nahi ram mitpu pa sanao ae anina amota that weta maram hi ani na chang ei oh!
Chuna mani na amota man na that weta angkur mahun hai thou denga hou so weh.
Jisu na manita sai, “Atun chu ram mitpu pana angur enkulla wakjuija chu ramshal la ah am ngei ha alo ta ae ang sha?”
Mani na sange, “Amona hrano mee ngeita suino wa that tange” akha chu “atu motieng apha cha ah ramshal pe ang mee amota angkur mahun ha pe ange.”
Jisu na manita ril, “Jiekka shi sha rou ha nangei na pa no songa chou?
‘Inn sha pa na denga housa alung ha anutienga
chu amo na tieng lella kana tekti change.
Na hi arengpu tullu lu sha ae;
eja ah angakpi no meh!’
Jisu na woiha kom rille “Keina nangei ta rilla am minge, Chungthieng rengram hi nangei kol hai thou la ing weta atu jong apha cha ah ara ra pine mee kolla pe ange.”
Atu yongna hi alung chunga tulta lea chu amoha matup, matup tan ange; chuti weta alungna atuyong chunga tul lea chu, alungha vokphul oul makhei thugai ange.
Chungtekti thiempu ngei lea Pharisis ngei na Jisu hina roumushuk hi mani ta rilla am meh ti hi dang pha so.
Chunapa chu manina amota mant rang ae weta bom tulla am wairul rija ta tri so, rouram chu mani na Jisu hi rouphun thiempu ae ta ngoiringe.
Jisu na woihapa malmashi ngei maikunga rou mushukka hi rillea.
“Thangwan rengram hi, hihekti ae. Apha akha ah Rengpa akha na asanaopa nuhla pamhla na ah reen bu rang semsha ae.
Amo na mashuk ngeita mee adang adang thur mal ngei ta bakpi enpi ranga kokpi thinge, chuti weta mani atu na ko phao no weh.
Chunapa chu woihapa adang mashukta hla weta mee kokpi thing sierra, hitta rillo: ‘Kashil chalpa anol ahra thatta nangei ta bubak ranga kokka am minge. Bu an atun hi limpa shu happa hakka am minge!’
Chutiweta akok meelim pa na matullu, matullu ae thinga, akha na maloupukka adang ahre na mapot jurrang thingso.
Hata lei shunga ahre na chu asuuk ngei ta phitta manita that so weh.
Chunapa chu Rengpa ehekta alung hanga, amona maralmee ngeita hla ah meethat mee ngeita that ranga hla oh mani hupi kom sarmei holso ae.
Hana amo na masuuk ngeita kokka manita hitta ril, ‘Nuhla pamhla na bak rang enrang hi shu hap so weh, chuti weta akok mee ngei phao no weh rouram chu mani na baknum no weh.
Chuna atun chu nangei na lampi ah thing weta nangei tukhlak meelimta bakphao enphao rang jong thingo.’
Chunapa chu asuuk ngei na lampi ah thing weta ahra kom hrano kom mani tukhlak kok thinga phao ah, nuhla pamhla na inn ha shihak ti so weh.
“Rengpa na thing weta phao ah am meelim ta an na marol juija apa akha chu nuhla pamhla na pun choi dirchoi no wa am ri so weh.
‘Tonpi oh nang chu alo wa nuhla pamhla na pun choi dirchoi tol nowa hina alota am ma che?’ Rengpa na amota sai.
Hana chu Rengpa na masuuk ngei ta ril, ‘Akae akut rui ah huppa chou weta athim awaou wa denga hla oh. Hana amo na aha riella au wa trappange.’ ”
Chuna “meelim ta kokkae, chuti weta ahre ta chak hallea” na hi ril weh ta Jisu na atreem na rou chang so weh.
Pharisis ngei na thing weta Jisu ta mant ranga waishi trong thou ae.

Chuna mani rui ahre akha chu Herod mee ahre ma am na ah hla ah mani na rillea, “Ocha nang na adiek rou ril ae ta kani na dang unge malmashi ngei taranga Chungthieng adiek rou na chupi ha, malmashi ngei na alo ta halla am ma mo ephao nangna olno lutta, rouram chu nang na mee akha hina mathei masing ha rousha no ae.
Chuna kanita rilpi oh, hana nangna chu alo ta halla che? Kaishar rengpa ta sha hi pe ang mo anolea pe ang no meh?”
Jisu na hrano mani waishi trong thou ha danga amo na ril, “Ahra sa ngei oh! ejeranga keita mant rang ae ah chau?
Sum pek ranga nangei sum chandi keita ri pi oh!” hana mani na chandi choi ah phao so weh.
Hana amona manita sai, “Atu maishun lea ming mo weh?”
Manina sange “Kaishar rengpa”, chuna Jisu na manita ril, “Kaishar lea kaishar ta pe oh akha chu Chungthieng ta lea chu Chungthieng ta pe oh.”
Na rou hi mani thei juija mani ha angak shuk ka; mani na amo ta hou phurra thing so weh.
Nanie rungnie makka Saddusis ahre na Jisu am na phao weta ril malmashi athi sha na ringthou no weh.

Manina ril “ocha” “Moses na rilphurre ejonga apa akha na asanao am no wa thi lea chu anaopa na anamei arung nu ta nei shu oh. Hana manui ha asanao don juija atu sanao ae ta rillang mo weh athi sa sanao mo weh.
Hina uleanao sari am phurre, hana ulien tek ti na namei akha nei phurweta asanao don no wa thi so weh, chuna anamei arungnu ha anao pa kolla nei pi so.
Ani suna pa anao pa kom hahekta ani shunapa kom inthum shuna pa kom hana atreem na uleanao sari lim pa.
Atreem na ah chu namei nu ha kom thi so weh.
Chuna athi sha ngei na ringthou nie ah chu amo ha atu namei chang ang meh? rouram chu mani lim pa na amo ha nei phurre.”
Jisu na manita sange, “Nangei na eja ah dang no mo nu! na hi nangei na jieksha rou lea Chungthieng jaitha dang no jarra ae.
Athi na ringthou juija chu, mani ha wanrui ngei hek ti ange hana wanram ma chu taichang ti am mang no weh.
Hana athi na ringthou ange ti hi Chungthieng na rilla shi ha pa no wa chau? Ama na ril.
Kei hi Abraham hina Chungthieng inge, Isaac hina Chungthieng inge akha chu Jacob hina Chungthieng inge hana amo chu aring Chungthieng sha ae athi ngei ta ano weh.
Wairul rija na hi thei juija amo na alota hija hra ah chupi mo ta angak shuk so weh.”
Saddusis ngei hi daitik ta Jisu na am pi so weh ta Pharisis ngei na thei juija mani na tulla wa ha so weh.
Mani shunga akha na mant ranga raphun hina ocha rousai.
Amo na ril, “Ocha,” “Rouphun hina loktekti hi ei meh?”
Jisu na sange, “ ‘Narengpu Chungthiengta nashilung lim hamuihla lim akha chu nalung rang lim tolla lungshi oh.’
Nahina lokti akha chu, chungtek ti rakit rou ae.
Hana ani shunapa rakit chungtakti na: ‘Natakta nalungshit hek ta inn ning ta lungshi oh.’
Moses na chupi takpi akha chu rouphu pa ril pi lim hi na rakitrou hina beija am meh.”
Pharisis ngei na rachun na am ha lei ah, Jisu na manita sai,
“Messiya hi nangei na alota halla am ma chao amo hi atu tute mo weh?” amo hi David hina tu te ae
“Chulechu, eye sarukka” Jisuna saiye, “Muilhana Davidta shurra amota ‘Rengpata’ kokka meh? David na ril,
‘Arengpa hana karengpa ta rille:
kachang tieng hina ongo, nangta anda
mee ngei ha nakae kunga kashi malim.’
Chulea chu alo wa David
na ‘Karengpu’ oh ta kokka mo weh.
Hana Messiya hi David tu te lea chu?”
Jisu sai rou hi atu akha na sang nea nijowe hana nani rungnie hai thou wa atu akhana kom amo ta rou sai num ni jo weh.
Jisu na marui ngei lea wairul riha ta rouril ae.
“Rouphun ocha ngei lea Pharisis ngei hi chak Moses rouphun trong let ranga angai pe ae.
Chuna sharukka mani rilha nangei na jui ja tullu lu anga ae; chuti chun mani ae na tullu hekta ae nou oh, rouram chu mani ha murra chak rilla lu tullu chu tol no ngei ae.
Manina malmashi ngei lin nga kalla renna shi ae mee na ronne no pot rit hana mani kutchalte phao na potrit ha san nea no weh.
Manina mani tullu lu hi mee ngei na ri rang chak tullu lu, mani chalpanga, akha chu aban na Khrista trongsan jiekka shi ae. Hana mani linglut achulpa ha weta.
Mani dit chu Synagoge shunga kom mani ong rang amunt kalla shi, hana bu bak na amunt kom hra tekti amunt ae.
Mani dit chu, pot jurna amunt na kom mee ngei na ariem ma riemtuk pe weta “ocha” ta kokpi num meh.
Nangei atu akha na “Ocha” kokpi no, rouram chu nangei limpa uleanao rukkae hana nangei “Ocha” chu akha chak am meh.
Hana, nangei na aleiram ma atu akha ta “Apa” kok no oh, rouram chu nangei apa chu wanram ma am akha chakkae.
Hana atu akha ta kom “lamkai pa” kok no oh, rouram chu nangei lam kaipu chu Messiya amo chakkae.
Nangei karra lok tek ti amo na nangei kor chang ange.
Atu jongpa akha na lokkinge ti lea chu sinpi ange. Hana atu jong akha matakta a sin inge ti lea amota lokpi ange.
“Eja ah atrih pi meh rouphun ocha lea Pharisis ngei hi! nangei hi ahra sa ngei ae thangwan Rengram innhar hi nangei na chu, kalla shi chou ae. Nangei na nangei tak chu inn shunga lut num no weh!”
Pharisis, ahra shangei akha chu jiek sha rou ocha ngei nangei chunga aol ana am meh. Nangei na niek juija kom innhar hongweta ashotta niek sha lakkae, chuna nangei chunga hella aol ana pha ange.

“Eja ah atrih pi meh, rouphun ocha lea Pharisis nangei hi! ahra shangei oh! nangei na tuipi len na kom ramkanga kom thing, thing weta mee ngei ta namee chang weta nangei ta lella sarmei kumma thing ranga sharuk ani lella olpi ae.

“Eja ah atri pi meh mitcho lamkai nangei hi! nangei na mee ta chupi takpi chau ae, mokna inn an weta rouraen mee chu eko no weh; chuti weta mokna inn na am sona ming ril weta rouraen mee chu aol akha ae.
Mitcho lamkai ngei oh, hoipa na hella chung tekmo weh sona lea mokna inn, sona ta thiengpi nea inn ha mo ae?
Hana nangei na hita kom chu pi chau ae, ejong atu jong akha na shaiphung ta rouraen lea chu eko no weh, chuti weta shaiphung chunga don na shi kutthul ming rillea chu aol pi ae.
Eja mitcho ngei oh, hoipa na hella chung tek mo weh shaiphung lea shaiphung chunga don na shi pot hata thiengpi shaiphung ha?
Chuna mee na shaiphung ta rouraen lea chu amo na shaiphung chunga am lim pa tolla rouraen na ae;
akha chu mokna inn ta rouraen lea chu amona Chungthieng hana am ha ta rouraen na ae.
Hana atu jong akha na thangwan an na rouraen lea chu Chungthieng phomlu ma ong na ta rouraen na ae.

“Eja ah atri aol ana mo weh rouphun ocha ngei lea Pharisis nangei hi! Ahra sha ngei! nangei na Chungthieng kolla som sunga akha nathing theipar phao apha nu juija pe weh ta chung oitek ti rouphun na jiekka shi adiek rou lungshi thei shilung athieng ta pa na jui no weh hana nangei na na hi adang adang rouphun hon atal adol am lutta jui anga ae.
Mitcho lamkai ngei oh! nangei enrang tuidon na thouwaibi ta julla hou weta yangkoosa ta na volthen ae!
“Eja ah atri pi meh rouphun ocha lea Pharisis ahra sha ngei! nangei na tuidon awao wa shilweta ashunga ashihmalom lea matarang chak halla am ta chu shi am meh.
Mitcho Pharisis! tuidon shunga am hrano ha masha ah tlengo, hana awao kom hata thieng ange!
“Eja ah atri pi meh rouphun ocha lea Pharisis nangei hi! ahra sangei! nangei devir ti ae shilsha hlan bung hekti ae ashunga na athi sha sharu na shihak ti ae.
Chuna chu hekta nangei na meelim maikunga chu ehekta ahra muh shuk kae, chuti weta ashunga chu pak lea ahra no na shihakti ae.
“Ahra shangei! eja ah atri pi meh rouphun ocha lea Pharisis nangei hi! rouphu pa ngei hlan bunga akha chu thilrou phun ah ahra reipar em ma shi chau ae mani ringlai ah ahra tullu lu ngei taranga.
Hana nangei na ril chau ae ejonga napi napu ngei apha ah ring phur ta lou chu, mani na rouphupa ngeita that tullu lu hi ae phur ang nonge.
Chuna nangei hi routakka chu mani rou phupa ta mee that ngei hina atu ate ngei ae.
Thing jou oh hana napi napu ngei thou ah hou phur tullu ha shu thingo!
Arul sanao ngei oh, akha chu nangei chu arul chou ae! alo ta nangei na sarmei hai thou hlan na thinge ta halla am ma che?

Chuna kei na nangei ta rilla am minge kei na rouphupa ngei lea athei ashing ocha hla ange, hana nangei na manita aban jam ma that oh, adang ahre tana Synagoge shunga mantna aol ana pe weta nangei husin akha hai thou hulokka jullang chou ae.
Hina sharukka aral am no eja ta nangei that na amant aol ha nangei chunga dollange, aral amno Abel ta that hai thou Berakiah sanou Zachariah mokna inn hai thou wa shaiphung karrakka nangei that.
Kei na nangei ta rilla am minge, nameethat lim hina aol dandi hi awoni ah mee ngei chunga shur ange.

“Jerushalem, Jrushalem! nangei na Chungthieng rouron ngei ta akha chu rouphun ngei ta alung denga that chao ae! arpinu na ate majam ta ahla thu shunga shi hekta keina woi eja nangei ta kaban jam ang shong anga meh nangei na ephao kei ta chuti weta nanyei na chu keita ngei chou ae.
Chuna nangei mokna inn kom mee na hla how inn ruk chang sajo weh.
Chuna atun hai thou wa nangei na keita ri ang ni jo weh, ‘Arengpu minga phao meeta Chungthieng na jaihra pe pi oh’ ta nangei ril ma lim ma.
Jisu na mokna inn houphurra arui ngei na amo ta inn hana rouram ma amo ta kok phao ae.
Amona sange, “Oh weh,” “Keina nangei ta rilla am minge nangei an juija leima hra ah ri ange chuti weta, alung akha phao amunt hina houphur rang nonge, nalim pahi tick ange.”

Olives mulbung ah Jisu na onga am leija arui ngei na makolla mani thei chakka phao, “Manina sai, na shimlei hina shu ang tienga akha chu najung ang tieng apha hi kanina alo ta dangne ang meh akha chu ehekti shuk kang mo kanita rilpi oh.”
Jisu na sange, “Atu akha na kom nangei ta hungpher no shu oh, akha chu natak na natak ta theija singa am mo.”
Mee eja na kaminga rou rillange, hana mani na rillange, ‘Kei hi Messiya inge!’ hana mani na mee eja ta hungpher ange.
Nangei na ral rasha theipha ange chuti hal kom nangei lung ephao ol no oh. Nalimpa shuk halkom, ha ngei hana atreem na ah no weh.
Ram akha lea akha shul hak kange, hana rengram akha na akha ta ral ae ange lingnu nukka bu tang jutang ange amunt chang honna.
Nalimpa hi masha ah nao don ngei ol hekti ange.
“Hana nangei ta mant weta athit ranga meekut chunga pe ange kasharukka mee ngeina nangei ta anda ange.
Malmashi eja na mani ngoiring hla hou ange; mani akha lea kha jur hlakkange akha chu akha na akha ta anda ange.
Hana dieklou rouphu eja muh shukka mee eja ta mani na hungpher ange.
Hajong hrano eja na thanga thingjuija chu malmashi ngei lungshit hlak manga jung ange.
Chutiweta atreem nie pha ket ta dong thei ah am mee amo ta chu sanpi pha ange.
Rengram ah ahra rou hi jat chong honna mee lungir chang rang simlei ahul tunga sui ange akha chu apha hana atreem ni chang-ange.
Thiempu Daniel ta rilpi phur, “nangei na ehekta atri pi akha ripha ange athieng amunt na ngirra am ha.”
Jihudiah ram shunga am mee ngei na mullon na tanna thing su-oh.
Inn chunga kalla am amo na ko tumma jung weh ta ma inn shunga am pot kom lakrang apha am mang no weh.
Loulaiya am amo na kom pun-ni lak lea rang apha am mang no weh.
Nao ronna am saming zir ngei akha chu nutuiya am nupinu ngei ha -a-ol yaisi pi ae.
Chungthieng kolla ratta niyo akha chu nangna sabat rungnie anole phalbi timma ah shukno rang!
Rouram chu hana jui apha ah aol ana chu shimlei hei thou wa awoni pha ket ta am no shonge hana hajong ha woiha lea ah kom shuk kang no weh.
Chutiweta Chungthieng na mahalla rungnie masing bongpiso ae, hita amona ae phur nole atu akhako ringang no weh. Chuti hal mahalshi meengei sarukka Chungthieng na rungni ha bong pi ange.
“Hana, atujong akha na rillange, ‘Anno Messiya ha hina am so weh!’ ano lea ko na am so weh!’ hajong ha nangna amota ngoiring no oh.
Rouram chu dieklou Messiya lea thiempu ngei mel muh shuk kange manina Chungthieng ahal sha mee ngei ta ejong ngai lea chu angakpi tullu lu weta hungphear ange.
“Hajong apha tungma tienga keina nangei kolla rilla am minge.”
“Anolea ejonga mee ngei na rillange, anno amo hi ramruka am meh!’ thingno oh hana anolea mani na hitta rillange, “anno amo ha bi ah am meh!” na ha ngoiring no oh.
Rouram chu meesanao pa na hucham palak hekta mawar na nashutieng hei thou natak tieng phao war hekta yung ange.
“Amunt chang honna athi ngei pum hloumu am na amunt na hloumu na bom mange.
“Hajong aol ana nutienga chu ninu na kom thimma thing ange hlawar nu na kom mawar war ang no weh, hana arshi na thangwan hai thou tulla jung ange hana wanjai ja am lim hi na jaitha shalla am mange.
Hana chu meesanaopa na wanram haithou mamel muh ange, hana aleiram ma am malmashi ngei na meesanaopa na shumphai chunga mahung majai tolla arat athei hitta jung rijuija trappa am mange.
Shimlei ram aky ennly makka amo na wanrui hla ange trumpet tumma jung juija hana chu amo na mahalshi meelim ta shimlei ram atreem na phakat ta homma rachun pi ange.
“Nangei na theichang kung haithou chu oh. Abakka a don soun don nahangjuija asha apha nei so weh ta dang chou weh.
Hina chu hekta na lim hi shukka nangei rijuija, apha hi nei ah wa so weh.
Makno oh, ringa am lim pa hi thi hap so weh dangma tienga nalim hi shuk kange.
Thang wan lea sim leiram chu mang ange chuti weta katrongsan chu etika ko amang am mang no weh.
“Atu akha na kom marungnie akha chu mapha dang no weh wanna wanrui na kom asanao pa na kom; pathieng amo chak na dange.
Meesanaopa jung rang hi Noah apha ah shuk hekta shuk kange.
Tuina len a hangma apha ah mee ngei na bakka enna Noah na kung shunga lut phao shunga nuhla pam hla ah am meh;
chu phao shunga mee ngei na ephao halla shukno weh shukka am tui pilien na eheilim choi phao shunga. Chuna chu hek ta ae ange meesanaopa na jung ang hi.
Hana jui apha ah loulai ah apa ani na tullu lu ah am mange akha ta na rui ja thing ange hana akha tana houphur range.
Namei nu ani na shang shu wa am mange akha tana rui ja thing ange hana akha tana hou phur range.
“Chuna sharukka apha chang honna shong jella am mo na Rengpu jung rang apha ha atu akha na dang no weh.
Inn mitpu pa na aru pa na phao rang apha dang lea chu enhrang la ah am manga ae hana aru pa na etik kom ma inn akuipi tumpi nea ang no weh.
Chuna sharukka apha chang honna tamasha ae ah am mo, rouram chu meesanaopa na jung rang apha ha dang no weh nang na amo ta hakka na am no lei ah shukka ngei ae.
“Chu lea chu atu na ngoiringai akha chu ashing suuk mo weh? Amo ta amitpu na asuuk adang ngei ta apha cha ah bakpi enpi taranga makolla pe ah hou phur ae.
Amitpu na inn na malea juija akor hana tullu lu ri juija eja ah ariem mang sha?
Routak ka keina nangei ta rillinge, ‘Amitpu hana akor hatta manei madonlim kut shilna phur ange.’
Chutiweta ejonga hrano akor akha lea chu mathei chakka amo na hitta ril ange, ‘Apha shotta amitpu ha inn na lea ang no weh.’
Akha chu amo na atonpi kor ngei hata bakka enna, rui ba ah akha chu phitta reija thouso weh.
Hana chu edang dang no wa madang no lei apha ah amitpu hana inna nahani akha chu lea so weh.
Hana chu amitpu na atan, atan wat weta ahra sha matullu lim ha pha ange hana chu amo hi aha riella trappange.
“Thangwan Rengram hi na hina apha hekti ange. Apha akha ah nangak ashom na mani dewankari choiweta thing so weh nu mou ruinu ta tuk hlak ranga.
Ranga chu mani kara sing ae hana adang ranga chu pange ae.
Apang ranga hakom dewankari chu choi weta alel thou tui chu choino weh.
Hana a sing ranga chu thou thal na shihakta choi ae,
mouruipa hi tai ah am ma namei ngei ha ennum ma wa ah jal so ae.
“Janjai pha juija chu shanrol au wa, ‘wa so weh! nouruipa phao so weh, wa oh akha chu tukhlak jou oh!’
Namei ashom ha thouweta mani dewan kari hlan thou so.
Hana lungmo ngei na lungsingei kolla ril, ‘kani ta thou ahre te pe pi oh, rouram chu kani dewankari hina thou thangso weh.’
Lungsingei na sang so weh, ‘kani taranga kom hoppang no weh nangei na nangei taranga ajurna thingweta lei thingo.’
Chuna pa chu lungmo mani ranga ha thou lei ranga thing so weh, hana mani thing lei apha makka mouruipa tung so weh. Chuna mani ranga chu amo hitta lut weta raengna bu bak lutta inkal ha kalso weh.
“Anutienga chu adang namei ngei kom tungso weh. Mani na ril, ocha, ‘Ocha kani kom lut tuk kae!’
Hana mou rui pa na sange, ‘Nangei atu mo weh,’ keina dang nonge inkal hong nea ang nonge.”
Nangei natak na natakta shong jella am mo maram chu marung nie ano lea apha ha nangei na dang no weh, Jisu na nahi ril weh ta atreem na chang so weh.
“Thangwan rengram hi na hi hek ti ange hana jui apha ah. Apha akha ah apa akha na tairam ma mathing ang tienga; amo na masuuk ngei ta madon manei lim pa shilna ah hou phur ae.

Amona mani limta mant ae, mane rang an weh ta pe so weh. Akha tana sona sumnoi lising ranga pe so weh. Hana adang akha ta na lising ani pe so weh akha chu adang akha tana lising akha pe so weh hana chu amo na manita hou phurra malampi thingso.
Hana chu sumnoi lising ranga pha pa na thingweta lising rang adang tukka phao weh.
Chuna chu hekta lising ani pha pa nakom adang lising ani woihapa tokka phao so weh.
Chutiweta adang suuk lising akha chak pha pa na chu thingweta alei hur shunga amitpu sum ha thup thingso weh.
“Apha ashot nutienga chu suuk ngei hina mitpu lea ah mani hitta sum ha sam ha so.
Lising ranga pha pa shuk amo na wa weta lising ranga ha pe so weh. Amo naril, ‘Nangna keita lising ranga na pekha! anno! hina adang lising ranga kom keina tukka phao inge.’

Amitpu na ril, ‘Ehekta hra so weh, nang chu ahra ngoiringei suuk kae.’ ‘Nang chu asinte shella kom hrabakta tonsin thei che ae chuna nangta keina alok tullu ma kom kahut shilpi ang shange, wa oh hina kariem hi riem ha ui oh!’
Hana sum lising ani pha pa na kom wa weta hitta ril, ‘Mitpu nang na keita lising ani napek chunga keina adang lising ani kom tukka phao singe.’

Amitpu na makolla ril, ‘Ehekta hra so weh nangna ahra tullu ngoiringa ngei tullu lu so che ae, chuna nang hi asin te summa ahra ton sin thei na ah alok shelphom ma kom keina tonsin rang tullu hapsange, wa oh kariem na hi nangkom riem tollo!’
“Lising akha pha pa suukna wa weta ril, ‘Mitpu, keina nangta dang inge nang chu nang na muchi worna na amunt na kom lukmee ae, akha chu muchibalna nathe no na munt na kom hom mee che ae.
Kei chu atri ah nashel napekha choi ah thing ing weta alei hur shunga thuppa shi ah anno! hina am so weh na pekha.’ Amitpu naril,
“ ‘Nang chu hrano akha chu adol suuk kae!’ ‘muchi kawor no na ah keina lukkae hana muchi kathe no na amunt na kom keina homma shi ae. Nangna alo ta naha dang ah che?
Hra so weh, nangna sum sumpang na naha tha thing phur pa chu. Keina woiha pa kalea sier juija kashel ha athui tolla pha ange.
Atun chu makol hai thou wa la weta sum lising ashom am pa kolla pe jou oh.
Maram chu atom lea am meelim chang honna meelim lella lollange. Chu na amo na lella tamma am hom mange; chuti weta atu jong eko am no ngei kolla ma am atomte hako makol hai thou chu la ange.
Chuna kanano suuk hitta chu athim thuija denga hou oh; hana amo ha trappa am mange akha chu aha riellange.’
“Meesanaopa Reng changa majung juija chu wanrui ngei na kom tollange, hana amo na reng phomlu ah ong ange.
Hana amo na jat chang honna malmashi lim ta rachun pi weh ta, hana chu amo na ani shukka hran weh ta abom, a bom ong pi ange, kelmopu na, kel ngei kar haithou kelmo ta hran hekta.
Amo na dramochel mee ngei ta na atreem tienga shi ange hana adang ta chu ma-wuitienga shi ange.
Hana Rengna machang tienga am ngei ta rillange, ‘kapa Pathieng na jaihra pek mee ngeioh wa oh hina! Shimlei shem hai thou wa rengram shemma shi hina am wa jou oh.
Kawon tam lei kom nangei na bakpi chou ae katuiral lei kom nangei na en pi chou ae loi ram changa kaphao juija kom nangei inn na keita ruija lut ae.
Kapun kani sum lei kom nangeina pe chau ae, kanat kashat lei kom nangei na keita lai an pi ae raen inn shunga ka am lei kom nangei na an phao pi ae.’
“Hana juija dramochel ngei na rillange, Arengpu, kani na nawontam lei ah kani na ri ah bakpi enpi ah meh?
Ejongpa apha ah nangna loiram mee hakta phao wa kani inn na nangta rui ah meh akha chu tuiral wantam juija enpi mee hana napun nani shallei ah peja meh?
Ejongpa apha ah raen inn shunga am ma akha chu na ah na amlei kanina an phao wa meh?
Hana chu Rengna sange, ‘keina nangei ta rilla am minge ha chu, nang na sintekti ka-a kanou akha ta chungtek ta nangei an ha akha kolla ha keita ae ah ae!’
“Hana mawui tienga am ngeita amona rillange, ‘Nangei hi Chungthieng sharkou thuija am ngei ae thing jou oh Saitan lea marui ngei taranga semsha sarmei kum ma!
Ka wontam lei kom nangei na bakpi no weh katuiral juija kom nangei na keita tui pe no weh.
Loiram kachanglei ah keita rui ah nangei inn shunga lut pi no chou; kapun kani sum lei kom pun nie pe no chou, raen inn shunga akha chu na ah ka am lei kom an phao pi no chou.’
“Hana mani na sange, ‘Arengpu kani na nangta etikka ri ah meh. Wontam tuiralla akha chu punshal nishal ah raen shunga, na om ah loiram naphao kani na nangta san no wa meh?’
Reng na sange, ‘keina nangeita rilla am minge ha chu asin te akha ta nangei na chungtek ata changpi no wa jullo nangei hla ha keita julla hla a ae.’
Hana chu nangei hi atreem nei no tanti pek ranga hla ange, chuti weta dramochel ngeita chu shamla ringchang pha ange.”
Jisu na nalimpa hi chupi takpi shu nutienga marui ngei ta mo na ril.
“Rungni nani chak so weh lanpina reen, nangei danga am ha sa ae, hana meesanao pa ha aban jamma khross ah thitrang mee kut chunga pe ange.”
Chuna thiempu akha chu uliengei na loktekti kaijapha Renghun tuk hlak kae.
Akha chu manina Jisu ta aruhan na mant weta that rang rourilla wai ta am meh.
“Ani na rein shunga chu ae no ei oh” maram chu mee ngei na huhlong tuihlong shuk kange.
Bethany ah atripi ah raichi na aol donga am Simon inn na Jisu na am ma.
Jisu bu bakka am lei ah ehekta amant tam alabaster sirik thui shihakti akha namei nu akha na alu chung hai thou wa shung so weh.
Arui ngei na, nahi rijuija alung sha thou wa, manina ril, “alowa ariem shalla hou wa che?”
“Na ariem hoi sirik hi amant tamma jurra hou weta sara ring rei ngei ta pe lea chu!”
Jisu na mani ae hlakka am rou hi danga mani ta amo na ril, “Ejeranga nangei na namei nu ta jou jou rilla chau? Amo na ehekta ahra tullu akha kataranga ae sho ae.
Sara ngei chu apha chang honna nangei hitta am ha ange, chuti weta kei chu nangei hitta apha chang honna am ha nea ang no weh.
Na namei nu na kachunga sirik ariem hoi tui sho hi, keita phum ranga tamasha ae rang sha ae.
Atun chu keina nangei ta rilla am minge. Amunt chang honna nangei na ahra trongsan shimlei ram lim ma sam thing juija, ma ae na tullu hi amo ta angei thei ranga rouril tol then oh.”
Arui ashom ani shunga aming Judas Iskarot chungtekti thiempulel am na thingso.
Akha chu amo na sai, “Keina Jisu ta nangei kolla jur lea chu nangei na keita ejongpa pe ang chau mo weh?” hana mani na rupa shomthum tel weta makolla pe sho weh.
Hana hai thou wa Judas na Jisu hi ejongpa apha ahra akha ah mani ta pe ang mo ta anna rol thou sho weh.
Chol tolno butol reen ahalpa rungnie ah arui ngei na Jisu am na wa weta sai makolla, “Lanpina bu ha nang na hoitieng amunt na kanita jon nang di che?”
Amo na mani ta ril, “Hupi shunga apa akha inn na thingo.” “Hana makolla rillo, ‘ka pha ha wa so weh, ka ocha na rillea, kei akha chu karui ngei hita lanpi na reen nei na inn na.’ ”
Hana arui ngei na Jisu na mani ta ril ha mak lanpina bu bakha rang tamasha so weh.
Nitak apha wakjuija chu arui ashom ani na bakha inn ha rang ong ha so.
Mani bakha inn ha lei shunga Jisu na ril, “Keina adiek rou nangei ta rilla am minge ha chu nangei shunga akha na keita jur range.”
Arui ngei na ehekta lung olla akha nutienga akha na akha chu adang lim na makolla sai. “Arengpu keita rilla che?
Jisu na sange, “Kei hitta ankop sunga budol chi ha am amo na keita jur ange.
Jieksha rou na rillea meesanaopa ha thi ange, chuti weta meesanao pa ta jur mee amo ha chu eja ah atri pi meh? Mataranga chu donno phur no pa na hella hra tekkanga ae!”
Judas na ril shukkae, “Ocha nang na keita rilla che?” ta amo na sai.
Jisu na sange, “Nang na ril sho che.”
Jisu na budol ahui choi ja kal weta adom hitta munt ha ah nie ae amo na therweta arui ngeita pe so weh Jisu na ril, “Lah weta bakko” “Nahi katakkae.”
Hana woiha pa Jisu na wonsang lah weta Chungthieng kolla dom ma mani ta pe so weh hana amo na ril, “Nangei lim pa na nahi een no.”
“Na hi ka thi ae Chungthieng na pak lim pa silpiranga kachunga peksha athar rou raen ae.
keina nangeita rilla am minge kei chu Pathieng Rengram ma nangei hitta bakha een ha malim ma chu woiha lea ah inn ha pha ang ni ang.”
Hana manina lah saweta Olives mullon ah thing so weh.

Jisu na manita ril, “Awoni jantieng mak hi nangei lim na keita houphur weh ta tanna thing ange. Maram chu jieksha rou na ril, “Chungthieng na kelmo rungpa ha thattange hana kelmo hana kelmo lim ha chok chai ange.
Chutiweta karing ka thou jui ja nangei matienga keina Galily ah thing ange.”
Pitar na rilshukkae, “Meelim pa na ae hal kom keichu nangta hla ah hou ang nonge!”
Pitar ta Jisu na ril, “Kei na nakolla rilla am minge awoni jantieng arhongpa na hungma limma nang na keita woithum keita dang nonge rillange.”
Pitar na sange, “Kei ephao rillang nonge. Hana kei nang hitta thit ha ang halkom.”
Ha hekta adang rui ngei na kom rillea.
Hana Jisu na marui ngei hitta Gethsemmi ram ma thingso, hana amo na mani ta ril, “Hina nangei na ong hakko kei na, ko na thing ing weta niek thing lei ah.”
Amo na Zebedy sanao ani lea Pitar ta rui ah thinge ehekta aol dongne no makolla phao weh.
Hana amo na mani ta ril, “Ehekta aol ana na, kalunghi kui ang hekti so weh hina am hakko akha chu adong ratta am mo.”
Amo na aram atit te, te lah dom ma thing weta alei ah maimai bu ah nie ae. “Pathieng ejonga ngeipi lea chu kalung shunga aol wonsang hi la pi oh! Chutihal kom kahal ano lutta nahal changpi oh.”
Hana amo na marui inthum kolla malea juija mani chu jalla am ha tuk hlak so; hana amo na Pitar kolla ril, “Nangei inthum na apha akha te phao alo wa adong thei no wa chau?
Adong thei ah nie ah am mo chulea chu nangei na ahlem kut chunga tullang no weh muihla na chu ae num meh, chuti weta pum na chu ehekta shul so weh.”
Woihapa kom Jisu na thingweta nie thing sier so weh, “Pathieng na aol ana wonsang hi ka inn malim ma lah ang nong ti halkom nahal ha changpi shu oh.”
Amo na woiha malea sier juija arui ngei ha jalla am tukhlak sier so; mani mit phao mang nea no wa am so weh.
Woiha pa Jisuna manita hou phurra, woithum shuna nie thing so weh, maril sha rou makha.
Hana arui ngei am na lea weta rillea, “Atun phao shunga nangei na jalla sholha am shong chau? Anno! meesanaopa ha pak am ngei kut chunga pek rang apha ha wa so weh.
Thou jou oh, thing sai oh. Anno, wa so weh keita jur rang pa ha!”
Jisu na hata tronga ma am lei shunga arui ashom ani shunga Judas na, amo hitta chamsai akha chu mol choi wairul rija chungtekti thiempu ngei lea ulien changei hla mee ngeikom tolla wa ae.
Hana meejurpa na wairul rija ta amo na adang rang akha ae ah: “Nangei mant rang mee ha chu kei na chuppange.”
Judas na Jisu am na thingweta amo na ril, “Ocha nakolla adai ti ha am shu oh,” hana amo na chup so weh.
Jisu na sange, “Tonpi oh na ae rang tullu ha har jou oh!”
hana chu mani na ma am na wa weta mant na ruitakka hup so.
Jisu hitta am ha akha na machamsai kai shu shukka thiempu lel suuk akha hina kurra tan sho weh.
Jisu na makolla ril, “Nachamsai ha na abur shung thal sierro.” “Chamma thei meelim na chamma ah thi ange.
Nangei na dang no wa chau keina Pathieng kolla sanpi ranga koklea chu amo na wanrui ashom ani ta lella hla ange?
Chuti lea chu alot ta jieksha rou hi adiek ae ta rillanga meh. Chuna na hi shukno ngei no weta rilla shi ae.”

Hana Jisu na manita ril, “Nangei na keita mant rang rouphun juino mee hekta chamsai lea molla phao ah chau mant rang rungni chang honna keina nangei hitta ongha ah mokna inn na kachupi kutakpi lei chu mant no chou ae.
Chutihalkom na limpa roumaril rouphu na jiekka rou hi shukranga sha ae diek takka.”
Hana chu arui ngei ha amota houphurra tanna thing hap so weh.
Jisu ta mant ngei na kajapha thiempulel inn na ruija thing so weh amunt hana chu rouphun ocha ngei lea ulien changei kom bom tulha ah am meh.
Pitar na aram lah ah anu tieng juija wa ah thiempulel inn panga hakka am ngei hitta ong tolla ejongpa shuk mo ta an na am meh.
Chungtekti thiempu ngei lea bom tulla am meelim pa na Jisu na aral hoija am mang mo ta jong weta amo hi that ranga thou so.
Chutiweta mani na aral tuk nea no weh, mee eja na maitienga wa, wa weta dieklou murthui eja ril lea. Atreem na ah chu, apa ani na maitienga wa weta hanga.
Manui na rillea, “Na apa hina rillea, ‘keina Chungthieng mokna inn hi hri weta rungnie nathum shunga keina sha nea ange ta rillea.’ ”
Hana chungtekti thiempu na ngir thou weta Jisu kolla ril, “Nangta junna rilla am hi nashang ang am no meh?”

Chutiweta Jisu chu dai diekta am meh woi ha lea ah thiempu lel na makolla sai ah am meh, “Aring Chungthieng minga keina saro eihitta nakolla rou hi sai inge nang na kanita ril pi oh, ha chu nang hi Chungthieng sanaopa Messiya cha mo weh.”

Jisu na sange makolla, “Nangna ril shuk so che. Chuti halkom kei na nangei kolla rilling, hi apha hai thou wa chu meesanao pa na ene nea pa changtienga ongweta thangwan hai thou shumphai ngei kar shunga pung ri ange nangei na!”

Hana makka thiempulel na mapun therweta amo na Chungthieng ta thi ah ril sho weh, “Hina lella ani na amota ejongpa maral jong ang shong ang meh! Nangeina atun makka thei so chaou ae meenam matrong ha!”
Nangei na ejongpa halla am ma meh?”
Mani na sange, “Amo hi maral am sho weh chuna amo hi thi ta so weh.”
Hana chu mamai ah chil shakweta phit thou so weh: akha chu abe ah beng thou weta ril
“kani taranga rou ma ril jou oh sanpi pa Messiya! atu na nangta phitta am ma meh?”
Pitar na inn tumai ah onga ma-am lei ah thiempulel suuk nangak akha na ma am na wa weta ril, “Nang kom Galily ah Jisu hitta am ha mee ae.”
Chutiweta mani meelim maikunga Pitar na ngai no wa amo na sange, “Atu rou, ah nang na tronga am ma che kei chu ephao dang nonge.”
Akha chu amona inn tumai lut na shongkarra ma wak juija adang nangak akha na amo ta ri ah hana am meengei maikunga ril. “Amo hi ko Jisu hitta thingha mee ae Nazarete ah am ha ae.”
Hana woihapa kom Pitar na ngaino wa saro ei ah ril. “Na apa hi atu mo kei na eko dang nonge!”
Apha atante nutienga hana ngirra am apa akha na Pitar am na wa weta, “Routakkae nang kom mani kar shunga akha ae.” “Narou ril shuklim hana na kani na dang unge,” ta mani naril ae.
Pitar na ril, “Keina saro ei ah adiek rou rilla am minge! Chungthieng na kei ta leichoi shu oh ka ril diek nolea! Kei na apa hatta ekom dang nonge!”
Hana lei shunga arhongpa na hung so weh,
hana chu Pitar na angei thei thou so Jisu na makolla rilphur ha: “Arhongpa na hungma lim ma chu nang na kei ta woithum ngei ang no che ae,” amo na tan na thing weta alung tonga tap so weh.
Chama enthou wa thiempulel akha chu ulien changei na Jisu ta that ranga waishi tong hlak so weh.
Manina akutta thirling rui ah huppa Rom Pilate rengpa kut chunga pe sho weh.
Meejurpa Judas na Jisu ta leima aol ana pe soweh tah mathei pha juija malung hlonga rupa shomthum ha choi weta thiempulel ngei lea ulien changei am na ah lea so weh.
Amo na ril, “Keina pakka tul singe, ha chu aral am no mee ta athit ranga jur singe!” hana manina sange,
“Hana taranga kani arang e am meh?” “Na ha chu na lu tullu sha ae!”
Judas na sumnoi lim ha mokna inn na denga hou phur weta shuk soweh hana amo atheichak ka ah ahong rui hitta thi so weh.
Thiempu lel na sumnoi ha sar weta ril, “Na sum hi chu athee amant ae, chuna mokna inn sumthul ah shi chu ani rouphun na ngei no ae.”
Chuna mani limpa na ngei hlak anu juija ha sum takka leibel shakna lou munt akha lei sho weh hana tairam ma phao mee ngei hlan kung chang pi ae.
Hana rungnie hai thou wa mani na “Athee Loumunt” ta kok kae.
Na hi rouphu atun phao shunga thiempu Jeremiah rilphur ha adiek takka shuk sho weh, “Israel sanao ngei na mamant ha rupa shomthum ma ngei hlakka la ange.
Akha chu Reng na keita trong pe ah, na sum takka leibel shakna loumunt lei ange.”
Amo ta rou sai ah am Rom Rengpa maikunga Jisu na ngirra am. “Nang hi Jihudi rengpa chae?” ta amo na sai, Jisu na sange,
“Nangna ril shuk sho che.”
Thiempulel lea ulien changei na sai akha chu maral eja pe halkom amo na ephao sang no weh.
Chuna pa chu Pilate na makolla ril, “Nangta maral hija pekka am hi chu nang na thei no wa che?”
Chutiweta Jisu na chu rou atan te phao sang num no sharukka, Rengpa na angakkae.
Lanpina reen chang honna Rom Rengpa na rean inn shunga am mee akha hi hla chak ti ae chuna wairul riha kolla sai ae.
Apha hana meelim na amel dang, Jisu Barabasti apa akha rean inn shunga am phurre.
Chuna pa chu wairul riha na rachun na am lei ah Pilate na manita sai, “Atu pa ta nangei na hla num ah chau? Jisu Barabbas mo anolea Jisu ta kok Messiya?”
Amo na Jihudi ulien chang ngei na Jisu makolla kut shilla hla hi amo ta anar ae ti hi hrabak ta dange.
Pilate na routreem phomlu chunga ma ong lei ah anamei na rou pe ah hla ae: “Aral am no mee hata nangna eko ae rang am no weh rouram chu ajantieng kamanga kei hi masharuk ka leima ollinge.”
Thiempulel akha chu ulien changei hana wairul riha na Pilate ta ril, Barabbas ta hla pi oh hana Jisu ta na thi pe oh.
Chutiweta Pilate na wairul riha ta sai, “Na ani shunga atu pa ta keita hla pi num ma chau?” manina sange, “Barabbas!”
“Chulea chu kei na alo ta ae ang meh Messiya ta kok Jisu hita?” Pilate na manita sai. Mani limpa na sange,
“Aban jamma thatto!”
Chutiweta Pilate na manita sai, “Amona ejongpa hrano tullu lu jou meh?”
Hana mani na wangtekti shanrolla au shukkae: “Aban jamma thatto!”

Chuna pa chu Pilate na ripha so weh nahi hitta rilla am halkom eko kana ang no weh ashul ahal tiang hella shuk kange ta halla amo na tui la weh ta wairul ri ha maikunga akut shilla rillea, “Apa hina thit hi kei chu eko ron tollang nange; nahi nangei lu tullu sha ae!”
Wairul riha meelim pa na sange, “Na athi hina rouram ma kani akha chu kani sanao ngei chunga hrano shurshu oh!”
Chuna pa chu Pilate na mani taranga Barabbas ta hla so weh akha chu amo na Jisu ta phitta mani kut chunga ban jam ma that ranga pe ah hla so weh.
Pilate ralmee ngeina Jisu ta Rengpa hun shunga ruija lutta abom, abom eja na makolla ahul tunga am meh.
Mani na mapun mani lipweta akha chu amota punshan akha paipi so weh.

Hana mani na aling komlu akha jelpiweta alu wa lubur burpi ah akut changtienga mol akha reen ah manina mamai kunga huk hrun weta nuisho shim sho ah makolla ril, “Ringchang sai shu oh Jihudi ngei Rengpa ha!” ta mani na ril.
Manina chil shakweta mol takka alu apum ma phit.
Mani na nuisho shimso waitakka mani punsan ha la weta woihapa mapun mani happi weta, ban jamma that ranga amo ta rui ah thing so weh.
Mani na hitta thing lei ah Syreni ah Simon apa akha tuk hlak so weh. Hana ralmee ngei na amo ta Jisu Khross ha nam ma ron pi so weh.
Manina wa ah Golgotha, hina rilna chu lukung amunt ta dang na ram ma tungso weh.
Amunt hana manina ehekta akha tui ha darkha tui hitta tulla Jisu murra thun nea, chuti weta amo na en no weh.
Manina amota aban jamma tar so weh mapun mani lim ha rawan an na mani shunga sam hlak so weh.
Hana nutienga mani na amota onga hakka am meh.
Malu chunga mani na amo ta junna ril, “Hi trong ha Jisu Jihudi ngei Rengpa” ta jiekka shi ae.
Hana mani na Jisu changtieng akha chu wui tienga aru thei ani kom aban jamma tarre.
Hana kolla thing ahong eja na amota an weta milla kharim ashella shimso ah ril.
“Nangna mokna inn hri weta rungnie inthum shunga sha ange ril sha lea! Nanghi Chungthieng sanaopa lea chu natakna natak ta sanweta Khross chung hai thou tummo!”
Chuna chu hekta thiempulel, ngeina hana rouphun ocha akha chu ulien changei na amo ta nuisho ah ril.
“Amo na mee adangei ta chu san nea weta matak ta chu sanne no weh! amo hino meh Israel ngei Rengpa ha? ejonga amona Khross chunga atun tum na junglea chu ani na amota ngoiringei ange!
Amo na Chungthieng ta ngoiringe akha chu amo hi Chungthieng sanaopa inge ta kom rillea hra so weh, chutilea, ejonga Chungthieng na amo ta atun hi sanna mo ani na an ei oh!”
Chuna chu hekta arutheipa khross chunga aban jamma amo hitta tar ha na kom amota ajak pe ah rillea.
Ni ding lei takka ram limpa hi athim na pung inthum hunna am meh.
Apha inthum ma chu Jisu na sanrol ringa au shuk kae, “Eli, Eli lema Sabak tani?” hina rilna chu, “Kapa Chungthieng, ka Chungthieng alo wa keita hla ah hou wa che?”
Hana ngirra am mee ngei na thei pha ah ril, “Amo hi Elija ta kokka am so weh!”
Mani shunga akha na apha hana makka tan na shuk weta tongka la weta athur tuishik akha hitta tulweta molla thilla Jisu ta en ranga ae.
Chuti weta adangei na chu ril, “Hak ri eijo ejonga Elija na jung weta sanna mo an ei jo!”
Woihapa Jisu na sanrol ringa au phur weta arang ehat sho weh.
Hana chu mokna inn shunga banga am pun ha chuntekti thou athui phao shunga ani shukka tit sho weh hana aleiram kom nok sho weh, hana sum lung kom ahui, ahui kui sho weh,
Hlanbung eja kom honga shukka Chungthieng athisha mee ngei kom ring thou so weh.
Manina hlankung hou phur so weh Jisu na athi haithou ringthou juija hana mani na athieng hupi ah thingange amunt hana mee eja na manita ripha ange.
Sipai mee lam kaipa akha chu ralmee eja na amo ta hakka am lim na ling nu nok akha chu shuk ka amlim hi mani rijuija mani ha leima atri ah ril hlakkae. “Amo hi adiek takka Chungthieng spa ae!”
Galily hai thou wa amota sanna hang akha chu manutieng juija phao namei eja kom aram la hai thou am meh.
Mani shunga Mary Madalini Jacob lea Josep manu Mary akha chu Zebedi namei kom tollea.
Nitak apha pha juija Arimathiah hai thou achongpu kha tunge aming na Josep amo hi Jisu arui kom ah ae.
Amo na Pilate am na thingweta Jisu pum ha nie thing so weh. Hana Pilate na Josep pum ha pek ranga rou pe so weh.
Chuna pa chu Josep na athar punsan purpai takka hlum ma.
Maphum rang hlan hur athar samlung alok shunga wit ta shi hana shi sho weh, amo na alung alok akha na hlan mai ah kalla shi so weh.
Mary Magadalin akha chu adang Mary mani makhai kom hlan maikunga onga am meh.
Mathangpa rungni hani ha chu Sabbath ae chung tekti thiempu akha chu Pharisis ngei na Pilate tuk hlakka.
Mani na ril, “Ocha, Murthei amo na maring lei ah marilphur ha kanina angei thei unge, ‘Kei na rungnie nathum shuni ah woiha lea ah ringthou ange.’

Rungni nathum phao shunga hlan ha hak ranga kani ta rou pe pi oh. Chulea chu marui ngei na atak ha ru wa thing nea ang no weh akha chu mani na mee ngei maikunga athi hai thou ringthou soweta ril nea ang no weh. Na atreem na murthei ah mani ril hina amatienga murthui ta hella anshi tek kange.”
Pilate na manita ril. “Ral mee ngei ha rung thingo” akha chu, “Nangei na hlan bung ha hrabakta hakk am mo.”
Chunapa chu mani na hlan na thingweta hlan mai ah dolla shi lungpak chunga mani na chungnam weta hra bakta hakka am so weh.
Sabbath nutienga ahal parungni hu wardu du ah Mary Madalini akha chu adang Mary ngeina hlan hana anthinge.
Edang dang nowa lingnu nukka ae; thangwan haithou wanrui akha na jungweta hlan mai kunga lungpak ha letta hla weta manina alung chunga ong so weh.
Maisoun ha chu, champlak hek ta warpi ae akha chu mapun mani kom awur hek ta ngou ae.
Hlan hakka am ngei ha leima atri ah ahir akha phao so weh hana mani ha athi sha hek ti so weh.
Wanrui na namei nu ngei ta ril so weh. “Nangei na atri rang ekom am no weh,” maram chu “Keina dang inge ha chu khross chunga aban jamma that Jisu nangei na jonge tiha.
Maril, houphur anu juija amo chu ringthou shu sho weh, amo ha chu hina am nijo weh; majal phur na hi nangei na wa weta an wa oh.

Atun hi nangei na harra thingweta arui ngei ta rilpi oh. ‘Amo ha athi haithou ringso weh, akha chu atun amo hi Galily ah thingsho weh; nangei matienga hana amo ta ripha ang chau ae!’ makno oh nangei kolla karilphur ha.”
Chunapa chu mani na hlan kungha hou phurra ranga thing so weh mani atri lim ha ariemna shi hakti so weh akha chu mani na tanna thing weta arui ngei kolla ril so weh.
Edang dang no wa Jisu na mani ta tuk hlakka ril, “Nangei chunga adai am shu oh.” Manina Jisu am na nei ah wa weta akha chu akae oh weta makolla mok so weh.
Jisu na manita ril, “Atri no oh.” “Nangei na ka-u-kanao ngei kolla thingweta takpi oh Galily ah thingo hana mani na kei ta ri ang ae.”
Namei ngei na mani lampi ah mani lea lei ah hlan hakka am ralmee ngei na hupi ah lea ah chungtekti thiempu ngei maikunga shukka am eheilimpa ha thangkou pi ae.
Thiempulel ngei na ulien changei hitta tuk hlakka halhlak so. Hana mani na ralmee ngei ta ehekta tam sum pe ae.
Hana hitta rillea, “Nangei na hitta rilpi oh. Ha chu jantieng nangei jallei ah arui ngei na phao weta apum ha ru wa thing so weh.
Akha chu rouphom hi Arengpa na theipha halkom nangei lung ol rang ekom am no weh kani na amo ta hrabak ta ril weta nangei hi maral am no weta rilpi ange.”
Ralmee ngeina sum ha la weh ta mani ta ae oh ril ha hatta mani na ae so weh. Hana pa chu hani rungnie hai thou atun phao wa Jihudi ngei am na ram lim ma ah rou hi thanga am meh.
Jisu na manita thingo rilna Galily mullon na arui ashom akha na thing so weh.
Mani na amota rijuija amota mok so weh chu phao shunga ahre chu ngoiring tak no wa am shonge.
Jisu na mani am na neiah wa weta ril. Keina thang wanram akha chu shimlei ram ma ane ha nangei kolla pe hap singe.
Nangei na amunt chang honna mee ngei am na thing weta karui semmo. Pathieng, asanaopa akha chu muihla athiengpa minga baptias ae pi oh.
Keina nangei ta rou kapeklim hi meelim na jui ranga chupi oh. Anno, keina nangei ta simlei atreem ni phao nangei hitta apha chang honna am ha ange.
Chungthieng sanao Jisu Khrista hina ahra rou weh.
Isaah rouphu na hita jiekka shi so weh: “Na ma halla keina karouril malmashi hla ange,
‘Amona na lam sattange.’
Ramrukka sanrol akha na kokke, ‘Arengpu tarang lam satto,
hana malam ha jangpi oh.’ ”
Chuna ramruk tieng hai thouwa Johon na phao weta shilung hlonga pak tullu lu no rang rourilla baptias ae pi ae.
Judiah ram sung limna akha chu Jerushalem malmashi ngei na makolla tuk hlakka mani pak tullu lim ril shuk weta Jordon tuiwa ah baptias amo na ae pi.
Johon punchoi dierchoi chu jangkulsha akha chu akonga savut jemme hana hao lea huistui bak ae.
Hana marou ril chu hi so weh, “Kanutieng aphao angpa chu keita lella loktekka, chuna kei chu machung honghup rui phao hla kom matik cha nonge.
Keina tui sunga baptias nangta la pi sange. Chuti weta amo na chu nangta Muihla Athieng hitta baptias ae pi ange.”
Hana lei apha ah Jisu na Galily sunga Nazaret ram hai thou phao ah Jordon na Johon kolla baptias ae.
Jisu na tui sung hai thou shukka, wan tienga ripha so muihla na wurhu hekta machunga jung.
Hana wan tienga sarol akha theipha so, “Nanghi kalungshit sanao pa ae; nakolla keina leima ariem singe.”
Apha hana makka muihla na amota ram rukka hla so weh.
Hana rungnie somly ram rukka saitan na hlem ma. Amo hi ramsa ngei hitta am ha ae. Wanrui ngei na kom amo ta san ae.
Johon ta raen inn sunga shi shu takka. Jisu na Galily ram ma thing weta Chungthieng ahra rou dangpi ae.
“Apha nai so weh,” amona rile, “Chungthieng rengram nai so. Na pak hai thou wa lea jou oh akha chu ahra rou hata ngoiring jou oh!”
Galily tuipi hou wa Jisu na wak juija Saimon akha chu mata Andreu na tuikunga len denga am ripha so tichu manui ha tuirik mant mee ae.
“Wa oh kanutieng juijo.” Jisu na ril, “Hana keina nangta tuirik mant hai thou wa mee mant rang chu pi ange.”
Apha hana makka mani len hou phurra manutieng juiso.
Amona aram ahui te lella mathingjui Zebedi sanaorel Jacob akha chu Johon kungsunga len photta am ripha so.
Apha taino lutta manuita kokke. Hana mamuina mapa Zebedi ta kung sunga hou phurra manutieng juija thingso ae.
Jisu akha chu arui ngeina Sabath rungnie hana kaphernahum ma thing weta Senagogue sunga chupi takpi thouso weh.
Machupi takpi majaitha hi rijuija asunga am malmashi ngei na angak shukka pi hi rouphun hina ocha hekti no weh, hata lella amona arat jaitha tella chupi ae.
Hana makka Senagogue sunga hralou muihla lut am apa akha na hita au weh.
“Nazaret ta Jisu, nangna kanita ejongpa di ah che? Kanita mangpi tikta phao ah che? Keina nang atu moti ha dang inge. Nang chu Chungthieng athieng rou ron ae!”
Jisu na hralou muihla ta dai tik ti oh rillea. “Shukjou oh makolla haithou!”
Chuna hralou muihla na apa hata hirpi ah rol ringa au wa makol hai thou shukso weh.

Hana sunga am malmashi ngei na akha lea akha saihlakka akha chu angak shukka, “Nahi emo weh? ejongpa ma ae nea am ma routhar chupi chak no wa hralou muihla ta kom thingo ril weta marou juija thinghi!”
Chuna Jisu hina rou hi Galily ram lim ma ranga thang so weh.
Senagogue amunt thou wa amo na shukke Jacob akha chu Johon ruiweta Simon akha chu Andreu inn na lut so weh.
Saimon mapi atun thou wakot chunga am ha Jisu kolla manina takpi ae.
Chuna makolla wa weta thouranga akut oh-weta thoupi so weh hana atun nokhako dam so weh. Chuna amona mani sipa ae so ae.
Chanutienga nitak ka meengeina Jisu kolla ana akha chu hrano muihla na lut eja ruija phao ae.
Hulokka am meelimna inmai hana boma ama,
Jisu na damne no laina, eja ta dompi. Hralou muihla eja ta kom julla hla ae chuti weta hralou muihla eja ta ti chu mani na amo hi Khrista ae ta dange.
Leima angallei, hu-war-angtinga inn hai thou wa maniekna adai munna athei chakka nie ae.
Saimon akha chu atonpi ngeina amota jong ae.
Manina amota tuk hlak juija, manina rille, “Meelim na nangta yonga am meh!”
Jisu na sange, “Ani na hu adang adanga kom thing ngei oh manitakom keina trong sui ange, chuna taranga hina kei wa singe.”
Chuna Galily ramlimma thing weta senagogeu sunga lut weta rou rilleh akha chu hrano muihla eja ta julla hou ae.
Raichi am sapa akhana Jisu kolla wa weta huuk hruna mokke, “Ejonga nangna ngaipi lea chu keita nangna thiengpi oh.”
Jisu lungsunga ringrei ngaiya matakka tong weta. “Keina ngaisinge” “thieng jou oh.”
Apha hana makka mareichi ha dama, thieng so weh.
Hana Jisuna rou akal machunga dolla hla so weh.
“Rou hi atu adang kolla suino oh, chuti weta nang natak damna thiempu ngei maija ripi weta Moses na roupi nu juija mani kolla mee lungir changrang pethieng-oh.”
Chutiweta apa hana thing weta amunt chang honna roulin ha lokka sui so weh. Hina sarukka Jisu na hulok hana malmu num no
Jisu na sotnolutta Kaphernahum ma woiha lutjuija meengeina amha inn na am aeta thei so ae.
Chuna malmashi ngei na rachun jui ja chu inn sung chakno wa songkar phao sihak so weh, chuna Jisuna arha rou sui thou so weh.
Apa inly na pum ahui thi sha akha Jisu kolla ruija phao ae.
Wairul riha kara mani rui lut ne-nojarra Jisu am-na inn chunga kal weta innchung hri ah pum ahui thi pa ta kot chunga jalpi weta athui tienga hla so weh.
Mani ngoiringha rijuija Jisu na rillea, “Kasanaopa napak limpa silpi sange.”
Amunt hana onga am rouphun ocha ngeina mani thei chakka hita hal hlakso.
“Amojongpa na eje rang hijong rou tronga am ma meh? hichu, Chungthieng ta roushi rilla ae! Atujong pakta sil nea chu Chungthieng chak ae!”
Apha hana makka Jisu na mani halha dangpha ah Chungthieng chakkae pak shilpi nea chu amo na manita hita rillea.
“Ejeranga hijong lunghal songa chau?
Pum ahui thi sa ta napak shilso weh rilpa lea nakot kang choi weta thou ah thingo ril hi hoipana lai teka meh?
Chuti weta meesanaopa na simlei chunga pak shilpirang jaitha am-meh ti hi nangna dang ang che.” Rouhi amona pum ahui athi sa ta rillea.
“Thou jou oh, najalna phar choi weta na inn na thingo.”
Meelim na anna am lei ah maphar choiveta mathau hi meelim na rijuija ngak hai shulla Chungthieng ta mani na dom meh, “Hijongpahi anina shupri ri no songe!”
Galily tuipi ahou wa nahani kom Jisu na thing nge hanapa chu wairul rihana phao thou wa, mani hata amo na chupi thou ae.
Hita mathing juija sum hrai ngei amna wakka Aphija sanao Levi onga amhata rijuija Jisu na amo ta rillea, “Kanutieng juijo,” chuna pachu amona thou weta manu tieng juiso ae.
Levi inn sunga Jisu na bu bakha ah, amlei ah pakchel ngei akha chu sum hrai eja hitta ong ha ae jui ah.
Rouphun ocha ti chu Pharisi ngei na pakchel ngei lea sum hrai ngei hitta bakha inha rijuija marui ngei kolla hita sai, “Alowa sum hrai ngei lea pakchal ngei hitta ama na bakha enn ha meh?”
Jisu na rouhi theijuija, mani kolla hita shange, “Maipa hi pum ahra ngei tarang anowe chuti weta ana ngei taranga ae kaphao hi adiek ngei ta kok phao nonge pakchel ngei tarange.”

Ejongpa akha Johon lea Pharasi arui ngeina bu hei ah am lei ah mee adang ngei na Jisu kollo hita rou shai, “Alo-wa mo-ae Johon arui ngei lea Pharasi arui ngei na bu hei ah am lei ah, na-rui ngei chu alo wa tol no chu?”
Jisu na sange, “Mauruipa na atonpi ngei karra amha lei lim chu atonpi ngei ha bu hai ang no weh.
Chuti weta rungnie chu phao ange mauruipa ha mani kar hai thou rui ah thingjui ja chu mani ha bu hai thou ange.
“Atu akhana linglut alui atit ta pum athar ah bal no ae, bal lea chu, abai pun athar na pun alui ta hella amel shi ah titekkange.

Akha chu atu akha na darkha tui shavun aramsa hao sunga thal no weh, ejonga thal lea chu darkha tui hana savun hao chat hapi ange, hana chu ani mak darkha tui kom savun hao kom alak rang amang no ae. Thal no ae amona darkha tui ha savun athar wa hao chak sunga thal ae.”
Sabbath rungnie akha ah Jisu lea arui ngeina lau lai ah wakjuija arui ngei na sang sai hriem hriem ma bak thou ae.
Pharasi ngeina makolla hita rillea, “Anno mani na Sabbath rungnie ah narui ngei na rouphun na ngeino ae ah meh?”
Amona sange, “David lea amo hitta thingha ngei na won tamma hangna jeikka shi nang na pa no songa che?
Abiyathar na thiempu chang lei apha ah, Chungthieng athieng sunga kat athieng badol ha David na bak jui ja mamee ngei ta kom pe ae routakka trongsan sunga chu thiempu na chak bak phung shuk kae.”
Jisu na atreem na changa mani kolla hita rillea, “Sabbath hi malmashi tarang sakke malmashi hi Sabbath taranga no weh.
Chuhekta meesanaopa hi Sabbath hina mitpu rengpu ae.”
Woiha lea ah senagoge sunga Jisuna lutta, akut akha tieng thipa apa akhong hana am meh.
Adang ahre na chu Jisu ta maral pek ranga rou cholla anna, chuna tarang sharukka Sabbath ah Jisuna dampi ang mota makolla a nei ah wa weta anna am meh.
Jisu na apa hatta rillea, “Amai tienga wa oh.”

Hana mani kolla Jisu na sai ae, “Ani rouphun na Sabbath rungnie ah angei e am ma meh! Ahra tullu lu anoleh hrano tullu lu hana ringchang sanpi pana mo anoleh athatpa na mo?” Chutichun mani na sangne no weh.
Jisu na mani alung hir ri weta alung sha ahul tunga anne chuna amo apa hatta rillea. “Nakut dokshukko” makut dokshuk pa chu, amatieng hekta ripta dam so weh.
Hana pachu pharasi, ngei na awao ah shukka thing weta Herodija mee ngei ta ejongpa ah Jisu ta that ang mota waishi thouso.
Jisu akha chu arui na Galily tuipi hou tienga thingso weh akha chu wairul rija na Galily Judiah thou anu juija wa ae.
Jerushalem, Judeja, Edomija akha chu Jordon ral tieng hai thou hana ter lea Sidon ahulla am malmashi ngeina Jisu tullu lim theija julla phao ae.
Wairul rija tam hai sarukka Jisu na marui ngeita kung akha te adanga shi pi oh chuleh kei mani na nungjeil maijeil ang no weh.
Jisu na ana eja ta dampi jarra reeshi leishi eja na mani tak tham pi rang amatienga julla wa ae.
Hrano muihla don eja na amota rijuija mamai kunga tuveta hita au shukke, “Nangha Chungthieng spa che ae.”
Chuti weta kamel atu ta ril shuk nea ranga manita rou thingpi.
Jisuna mullon akha ah kalla thing weta madit mee ngeita kokka mani na kom makolla phao ae.
Amo na asom anita hal so weh manita ahalsa rui ta bo so weh, “Apha chang honna kakolla am ha rang hana halsinge,” “Amo na mani ta rille ahra rousam ranga hla ange.
Hana nangei na hrano muihla julne rang ane jaitha pha ange.”
Hi ngei so weh ahalsa rui asom ani ha, Saimon (makolla Pitar ta kokha;)
Zebedi asanaorel Jacob lea Johon. (Manui ta kom amona bornager hina takchu ruri sanao.)
Andrew, Philip, Bartholomew, Mithew, Thomas, Alphaeus sanao Jacob, Thaddaeus, Simon, Zealot.
Akha chu Judas Jisu ta jurpa Judas Escarot.
Woihapa Jisu na inn tienga lea chu woihakom wairul rija na rachun jarra arui ngei lea amona hrabakta bu bak tui in pha no ae.
Mani innsung ngeina rouhi thei pachu, amota mant rang shuk so weh, maram chu mee ngeina hitta rillea, “Amo hi awet lut so weh!”
Hana Jerushalem hai thou wa rouphun ocha ngeina hitta rilleh. “Amo hi Belzebul lut so weh! Chuna tarik ngei reng sarukka tarik ejata kom julla hou nea rang jaitha am ma ae.”
Jisu na mani lim ta kokveta roumu shukka rilleh: “Alota saitan na saitan ta julla anga meh?
Ejonga Rengram sunga anda hlakka hran hlak lea chu alota reng ram ha pallang meh.
Ejonga innsung akha na shul hlakka ani shuklea chu inn sunga ha alota palne ang meh?
Hana ejonga saitan rengran kom hran hlak lea chu shetta am nea ang no weh, mani ha tu wa mang shaijo weh.
Aratpa inn sunga atu akha na lut weta madon neinun choi ah thing nea no ae, masha ah aratpa amota rui ah hup su no wa chu choi ah thingne no ae, chuna hup shu lea chu eheilim choi nea ae.
“Keina adiek rou rilla aminge nangei pak lim kom silpi ange hana murra hrano nangei ril kom shilpi ange.
Chuti weta atu jong pana atheing muihla changa hrano rou rillea chu etikom shilpi ang no weh; maram chu amo ha shil ngaitou pak ae so weh.”
(Jisu na hi ril hi na maram chu mee ngei na, “Amo hi hrano muihla am ma meh.”)
Jisu manu akha chu ma-u-manao ngei kom amunt na tunga awau ah ngirra amweta amota mani na mee akha hla ah kok lutpi ae.
Makolla ongha am wairol rija na amota hita rillea. “Anno nanu lea na-u-nao na akha chu nashar ngeina awau wa nangta hakka am meh.”
Amona sange, “Atu meh kanu akha chu ka-u-kanao ngei ha?”
Chuna amona makolla ahul tunga ong ha am ngei ta an na hita rillea.
“Amo hina amha nangei ha kanu akha chu ka-u-kanao ae.
Atu jongna Chungthieng adit ae mee ha kata ngei akha chu ko-ute ngei akha chu kanu ae.”

Woihapa kom Jisu na Galily tuipilen hou ah chupi thou so weh. Amunt hana rachon na am wairol rija na ahul tunga am sarukka amona kung chunga, ong weta tuipilen hou tienga lutweta meelimna tui hao wa ngir ae.
Amona roumushuk eja manita chupi, hana manita ril:
“Thei oh ngai jou oh, apha akha ah apa akha na muchi wur juija.
Mawor mochi ha lampi ah tul ngei chu awana bak so weh,
Ahrena lungkhrok chunga tul ngei na alei atam am nojarra ranga tou wa shukkae.
Chuti weta semni na dingjui ja chu charra thing ae rouram chu ato thukka am no ae.
Muchi ahre na aling bom sunga tul ae tou wa shuk halkom aling jamna siem ma ara ra nea no ae.
Chutichun adang muchi na chu ahra wara lei am na tulla ara atam ra nea ah ahre na som thum som ruk akha ko riha phao ra nea ae.”
Chuna Jisu na ril, “Atu jungpa athei rang kur, am ngei na thei su oh.”
Amona mathei chak am lei apha asom ani akha chu adang amota hulla am ngei na roumushuk phurakta rou amota sai.
Manita hita rillea, “Chungthieng reng maram sunga athuk rou lim nangei ta pe jek so weh, chuti weta awao wa am ngei taranga roumushuk hi pe sa ae.
Chuna
‘Mani na an na,
an na ri ang no weh;
akha chu theija theija,
lung hal shuk no ae,
mani mai hai lea weta ejonga mani na rithei lungtul thei phur lea chu Chungthieng am na mai hai ah lea ange,
hana amona kom sanpi ange nge.’ ”
Hana Jisu na manita sai ae, “Roumushuk hi nangei na lunghal thei no chao? Alota chu roumushuk hi nangei na lunghal thei ang chao?
Muchi wurpana Chungthieng rou ha wurphur ae.
Malmashi ahre chu lampi ah tul muchi rou hekta mani na theipha sulen mani kolla saitan na phao weta muchi wur rou ha choija thinge.
Hahekta Chungthieng rou ha aranga ariem ma lasil ngei ha lungkhrok chunga muchi tul jong pa ae.
Chuti weta ato am no jarra asot dong nea no wa apha atante nutienga ahra trongsan hina taranga aol ana anoleh ajet am juija dong nea no wa hla hou ae.
Hana ahre na aling jam ma tul na rou ha thei chu theiweta.
Ringchanga lung olla neinun sungkeng taranga hung thei ah akha chu adang adit eja am ma rou lim ariem chang pi ae.
Adang ahra wor lei chunga tul muchi na thei shu takka ariem ma lapiweta ara atam shukpi akha chu saruk som thum sum ruk chakno wa riha phao ara ra ae.”
Jisu na hita rillea, “Atujong akha na dewankari ha taibur sunga anoleh kulthuija shi ranga mo? nahana hutta nangei na dau kang chunga doi no wa meh?
Chuna thuppa shi ang eko am no ae hana thuppa shi ang aru rou ekom am no ae. Wurra shilim pa kom hong shukkange.
Atujong akur am amona rou hi thei shu oh.”
Woihakom lea sirra rillea arengpuna nathei sha ha hrabakta hallo, “Meeta nawul na ah nangta kom wul lange lella kom wullange.
Atu jongpa don na am amota chu madon chunga ta lella donpi ange hana don thei no amota chu madon thei te phao la ah hao ange.”
Jisu na hitta rillea, “Chungthieng reng ram chu hihek ti ange apa akha na alei chunga muchi wur jongpa ae.
Tantienga amo na jalla am hal enthou wa thou hal muchi lim pa chu tou ah hange. Chuphao shunga amona alota shukmo dangpha no ae.
Nalimpa hi alei na mathei chakka ajiek adon masha ah shuk weta hana asui chumma anutieng chu ara ra ae.
Hana ara amin jai ja chu apa ha na kuite choija pot thou ae. Maram chu aham rang apha ha tung so weh.
“Anina Chungthieng rengram hi, ehekti, ae ta rillang meh?” “Anoleh ejongpa roumushuk ka dangpi ang sha?
Na ha chu hihek ti ae sin takti maru na alei chunga nawur juija.
Amu ngei lim karra amo na tou ah hang juija loktekti changa abak tamma wanjaija awana kom a bu sha ah sholhlak na nei ae.”
Jisu na mee ngei kolla rouril ae, hijongpa adang adang roumushuk ka, mani lung hal thei runga.
Amo na manita roumushuk hi tolno wa manita rilno ae chuti weta marui ngei hitta chak amjui ja chu hrabakta tong let pi ae.
Nani nie nietak wakjuija marui ngeita amona rilleh, “Anina ralha lalla thingsai oh.”
Chuna wairul rija ta hran phur weta amona chunga am na kung chak no wa adang kung ahre am hana manina amo hitta rui ah thing haso.
Hana idang dangno ajap ahai hanga tuijulna kunga lutta wa ah tuina kung shi ah waso ae.
Chuti weta Jisu chu kung dopa mul neiya alu dau ah jalla ame. Chunapa chu arui ngei na amota hrangveta rilleh. “Ocha ani thi-anga aeya am hi nang chu dang no-ache?”
Amona thou weta, thirangta Roupe-ae, “Dai oh! Tuiyul tako rille nemmo!” Chuna pa chu thirang ko daisowe akha chu tuiyulko nem so weh.
Arengpu na marui ngeita hitta rilleh. “Ejaranga alo haja atie ah chuo? atun phao sunga nangoiring am no the chau?”
Chuna mani thei chakka hita rillhakke, “Atu pamonu nahi?” thirang na kom tuijul na kom marou jui ae!”
Manina Gerasinie ram tienga tuipi lalla wa so weh.
Kungsunga thou Jisu na shuk juija hrano muilha lut mee akhana hlankung hai thou wa wa-a arengpu ta tukhlak so weh.
Na mee hi hlankung sunga hata ringa am mee ae hana atu akha na amota mant na shi nea no weh.
Amota apha chang honna leh-ah Leh-ah akut akae thirling rui ah huppa shihalko chatpi,atu akhana ko amota lhem neno-ae.
Suon jan nei no wa hlan kung bunga au-wa akha chu athei chaka matakka alung seou weh.
Aram la hai thou wa Jisu ta mari juija ma am na tan na wa weta arengpa maitienga ahuk hrun ae.
Amona ringa ou-ae, “Loktekti Chungthieng spa Jisu, nangle kei isuk lhak meh?” Chungthieng minga keina nangta nie ah am minge, keita aol pha pi no oh!”
(amona hi rilna chu, “Hrano muihla nang apa kol hai thou wa shukko Jisu na ril!”)
Hana Jisu na sai, “Naming alo ti meh?” Apa hana sange kaming chu kanilim “ti chu kani hi tammunge.”
Hana Jisuta leh-ah leh-ah kani ta, na ram sung hai thou julla hla pi no oh ta nie ae.
Aneite Mullon tlanga wok abom akra rak jonga am meh.
Mani na Jisu kolla hlam meh kanita na wok ngei karra hla pi oh. Hana mani sunga kani na lut tukkae.
Arengpu na ngaipi ah hrano muihla ngei ha shuk weta wok sunga lut so weh nahana am wok ngei chu lasing ani ae. Mani na tuikung ral ahai thou wa mani ha tolla lup so ae.
Wok shelpa ngei na rou lim hi mani hu sunga tanna thing weta suipa chu meelim na shukka am hata alo ti mo ta anphao ae.
Jisu kolla mani wakjuija chu hlawang chunga rol apa ha manina ripha so hra bakta apun adir jon weta onga am ri weta mani na atie ae.
Hrano triek na choija am apana alo ta hati ah sa, akha chu wok ngei kolla shuk ri pha sa mee ngei na manita hrabakta suipi ae.
Chuna mani ram sung hai thou thing rang ril lea.
Hana Jisu na kung sunga lutpachu hrano triek chung apana manutienga jui tol rang nie ae. “Nang hitta thing ha tikkae.”
Chuti weta Jisu na manu jui rang ngei pi no ae, “Chuna hutta Jisu na amota rillea na inntienga lea weta nani inn sung ngeita rillo Arengpu na natarang tullu lu pi akha chu eja tam malungshit pi ha.”
Chunapa chu amona ma inn tienga lea weta hulok asom ma Jisu na aloti tullu mataranga ae pi mo ti ha. amona sui ae marou thei pha meelim na angak tul shuk kae.
Jisuna woihapa tuipilen kunga aral lalsu wa wak juija wairul rijana amota bom ma am meh tuipilen ralla.
Hana senagoge sunga rouril nea karsung Jairas kom tunga Jisu mel maripha jui ah makae kunga moksho ae.
Akha chu alung thienga ril lungshi pi oh, keita, “Kasanaonu ha thi anga ana ah am so weh. Chuna nangna lungshi ngei ah wa weta nakut na machunga shi lea chu dam ange.”
Chunapachu Jisu na amo hitta thingha so ae hanapa chu wairul rija na Jisu manu jui ah thing so weh, hana chu mee eja na numa shihakti so weh.
Hana kum asom ani athee chak tulla am ana nameinu akha am meh.
Namei nu ha maipa eya na an halkom lella tieng dam no tekka adon anei eja kom thangso ae adam mang hutta hella tieng na tek so weh naha, naha.
Hativeta amona Jisu hina rou mathei juija wairul riha nutienga wa weta arengpu punkiengte thamso.
Matham na rouram chu hita halleh. Amona, “Keina mapun kiengte chak halkom tham lea chu kei dam mange.”
Apha hana makka mapum ma shuk athee ha shuk nijo weta matakna dangpha ah aol madong eja ha dam so ae.
Jisu na makolla haithou wa jatha akha shukka thingso ti matakna dangpha pa chu nutienga wairul rija amna haileh weta hita sai ae, “Atuna kapun kieng tham meh?”
Marui ngei na hita sange. “Wairul rija na nungjel mangjel kar sunga atuna keita thamma meh ta alota sai ah che?”
Chutiweta Jisu na atun na tham nu ta berra ann ae.
Namei nu na dangpha so shukka am lim hi, chuna arengpu kae kunga atri akha chu hirra tu weta makolla adiek rou lim rilso ae.
Arengpu na, nameinu ta rillea, “Ka sanaonu nangoiring jarra adam pha so che. Na ol nanat hai thou wa dam jou oh daija thing jou oh.”
Rouhi Jisu na tronga amleija Jairus inn hai thou wa rouron mee na wa weta amota rillea, “Nasanao nu ha thiso ae, ejaranga ocha ta ollang pi ah che?”
Jisuna mani ril thei no hongsa ae weta makolla rilso, “Ngoi chak ngoiringo ekom atri no oh.”
Pitar akha chu Jacob hina uleh nao Johon chak ano wa atu akhata Jisu amohitta thingha no weh.
Manina Jairus inn sunga tung so weh hana mee ngei na tappa ae rang dangno wa am Jisu na ripha so.
Mani am na Jisu na lut weta rilleh. “Ejaranga nangei lungolla erang dangtheino wa chou? Na unga hi athi ano sa ae inn na sha ae.”
Chuti weta mani na Jisu ta nuiso ae amo na mani lim pa ta awao wa julla hla weta unga hana manu mapa akha chu manutieng jui marui inthum chak unga am na lutso ae.
Arengpu na unga kut choiweta woithum rillea. “Talitha koum!” (hina rilna chu ngakte oh thou jou ta keina rilla aminge!)
Apha hana makka ngir thou weta ahul tunga rol so. (Nangak te ha akum asom ani shu so weh.) Nahi mani lim na angak shukkae.
Hana arengpu na mani kolla rou akha rille nahi atu akhana dangno su oh. Hana mabak ma-in rang ahre te pe oh.
Jisu na amunt hana hai thou phel hou wa arui ngei hitta mahu ah thingso.

Sabat nie ah Jisu na Senagoge sunga lutweta machu pi matakpi rijuija marou thei mee ngei na angak shukka “Naapa hina hoitienga hilimpa chu thing a meh?” ta sai. “Amota pekkashi lungsing lungwar hi ejong pa mo meh? Alota amo na anealah ae sha!”
Amo hino meh thing tullu lu paha? Amo hino meh Mary’s sanao Jacob, Josep, Judas akha chu Saimon unaopa ha? ma au ngei no meh ani karra am ngei ha? hana mani na amota ngaino thouso.
Manita Jisu na rilleh, “Rouphu pata amunt changhon na ajak atri ae, chuti weta mahu sunga ma-u-manao ngei na chu ngai nun no ae.”
Amo na anealah ephao hana ae no weh ana asa ahre te chunga makut shiveta dampi ano wa.
Chuna amo na kom mani ngoiring awat hi ri weta angak shukka. Jisu na hu, hu chang honna lutweta chupi takpi ae.
Asom ani ta makolla kokweta mee ani, ani tulla manita hla ae hana amo na hrano muihla ta nea rang jai tha kom pepi ae.
Machupina lamchu hi so weh, “Nathing nahongjuija namolbok chak ano wa ephao choi ngai ang no weh budol kom nahou sunga sum kom choi no oh.
Huirang chungweta nalinglut ani shu wa choi no oh.”
Amo na hitta kom rillea, “Nangta lamtukka ama na inn sunga am mo, amunt ha houphurra na thingma lim ma.
Hana ejonga nangta meengei na ariem ma nuisong no narou ngei pi no lea nakae ah vokphul ta ha hao oh na hi na dang nea ranga ae!”
Manina thingweta malmashi lung hlong rang rou rilpi ae.
Manina tarik eja ta julla hao weta ana eja chung olives shirik notpi ah manita dampi.

Herod na atun chu Rengna theipha so weh maram chu Jisu minghi amunt chang honna thang so weh mee ahre na rilhlak ae, baptias ae pi pa Johon kom athi sa hai thou wa ring so weh chuna sarukka amona anealah jaitha ma ae.
Adang ngei na chu hitta rilleh, “Amo hi Elija ae” hana, adang ahre na rillea, “Amo hi rouphu pa ae hana amatienga rouphu akha ae.”
Chuti weta Herod na theiweta ril rouchu, “Ahong watta kathat apa Johon ha athi sa hai thou ringso weh.”
Na hi Herod matak makna Johon ta ruija hup weta ren inn sunga hunga shi rang tongsan mapekha. Hi lim pa hi amo na anaopa Phillip anamei ta manei sarukka ae.
Johon na Herod kolla, “Nahi ril phur ae, nanaopa namei nei ti hi tongsan na angei ano ae.”
Chuna Herod namei nu na Johon ta anda ah that chu that num weta ephao ae nea no ae.
