Rouram chu Herod na Johon chu dramo am mee akha chu athieng mee ae ta danga atri ah kalla shi ae. Chuna marou thei juija lung hlong thin hlong halkom, hata marou theija ariem pha ae.
Hana Herod apoknie rungnie kom pha wa ah amona hijongpa mingseng samla nie ah ralmee tienga trongsan pe ngei alok akha chu Galily ah lamkai ngei ta kokkae.
Herod sanaonu na innsunga lut weta malam juija Herod akha chu alok ashai eja ariem pi ae. Arengpa na nangak hata rilleh, “Nadit eja kakolla saitaleh chu keina nangta pe ange.”
Amona namei sanao ta saro ei ah hita rilleh, “Eheilimpa naniek lim ha keina nangta pe ange, chu chakno wa ka reng ram ahui phao kom pe ange.”
Namei sanao hana manu amna awau wa tan na shuk weta, “Hina taranga keina ejong pa nie ang meh?” Manu na sange, “Johon Baptias ae pa alu ha nie oh.”
Apha hana makka namei sanao hana Arengpa am na ah ranga tanna hongweta hita nie ae. “Nakol haithou wa kadit chu Johon Baptias hina lukang ha atun makka maicham chunga di inge.”
Hina sharukka rengpa na alung ehakta oal so weh, chutihal ko masaro ei nu juija amona ngai no nea no weh maram chu meelim mai ah saro eishu jarra.
Chuna apha hana makka ahak mee akha ta Johon lukang ha choi wakrang rourillea chuna ahak pana rean inn na thing weta Johon ahong tan so weh.
Hana maicham chunga lukang don weta nangak hata pe so weh, hana nangak te na kom manu ta pe so.
Rou hi Johon rui ngei na theijuija phao weta apum ha la weta hlan na ui so weh.
Ahal rouron ngeina Jisu kolla rachon weta mani ae na akha chu mani lunghal limpa thangkou ae.
Arengpu na manita rilleh mani limpa hi aphao kom thing angei kom bakrang inrang tancha phao pha nijo weh, “Wa-oh apha atante kei lea nangei na daija solha thing ngei oh.”
Chuna mani theichakka adai awan ti na mun na kung chungveta thingso weh.
Chutihalko mani thing ri ejana dangpha jarra mani hulok ram hana mani kae ah ranga thingweta mani matienga tung thing hakso ae.
Jisu na kung hai thou shukjuija wairul rija mel rijuija, amo na ringrei ngei thei ah. Mani hi arung ang amo no kelmo hektiso weh chuna manita eheilim ma chupi takpi thouso.
Nietlak apha na wak sharukka arui ngei na makolla rilleh “Ram munt hi aram leima la so weh.” hana apha kom leima taiso weh.
Chuna mee ngei hla sai oh chuleh manikom hu anaite akha chu ram hina mani kom mani thei chakka bak thing inthing su oh.

Chuti weta Arengpu na sange, “Mani bakrang een ranga nangei na pe oh.” Manina sange Arengpu ta, “Rupa sumnoi rihani choi weta leithing ngo ta rilla che, hija tam luttang budol chu kani na manita bakpi ang meh?”
“Budol eja choi mee am mo nangeina an thing weta anthingo” Arengpu na manita ril.
“Manina budol ranga lea tuirik ani tuk kunge,” ta rilleh.
Chunapa chu Jisu na mani limpa ha phaiphung rampa chunga abom, abom ong ranga arui ngeita rillea.
Chuna mani na athil nei ah riha akha chu som nga na shak abom ma ongha so.

Arengpu na budol ranga lea anga ani choi weta wantienga hai weta ariemma Chungthieng ta dom so weh ahui, ahui hlamma. Amona arui ngei ta mee ngeita sam ranga pe ae. Hahekta tuirik ani kom mee ngei ta sam so ae.
Mani lim na awon hoppa bak kae.
Chuna arui ngei na mani baksu sa anui alim budol akha chu tuirik ha taidon asom ani hom meh.
Hana bak phur ngei ha apa ngei chakka lasing ranga ae.
Apha hana maka Jisu na arui ngei hitta kung sunga lutweta wairul rija ta hao phur ra amona Betsaida tienga thinge.
Mani ta hran nu tienga Jisu na mul bung akha ah thing weta nie thinge.
Nietlak apha wakjuija chu kung hakom tuipi ajai ja am so ae. Chuna arengpu chakso ramkanga am hi.

Thi rang na mani mai tienga ratta ranga wak sarukka rui ngeina kungthou wa holla olla am Jisu na riphaso. Na hi jantieng apha inly tah ah wakjuija arengpu na tui chunga akae ah thing hi mani ta lella waso.
Chuti weta arui ngeina tui chunga makae ah thing rijuija mani chu thempalopna rang so weta atri ah au thouso.
Rouram chu mani limpa na amota risharukka atri alao thouso. Apha hana makka arengpu na manita trongpi so, “Atri no oh kei inge.”
Chuna pachu arengpu na kunga kalweta mani hitta amha so ae, hana thing rang kom daipiso chuna mani limpana angak shukso ae.
Manina mee lasing ranga ta bakpi inpi ha ephao halla shuk thei no weh mani lung na kom hal thei no ae.
Tuipi ha mani na lal sujui ja Genesaret ramma tung so ae. Hana mani kung ha ren na shi so weh.
Kung sung hai thou mani shukjuija hana am mee ngei na Jisu ae ti dangpha so.
Hatieng ram ma am ana asha ngeina mani jalna phar choi weta Jisu amna chang honna phao ae.
Chuna husunga akha chu hulokka hana chak no wa hupi na mun na kom ana asha ngeina rachon na arengpa na mani pun kiengte chak halkom thampi ranga nie ae akha chu mathampi meelim na adam ahra pha ae.
Pharishi lea rouphun ocha ngeina Jerushalem hai thou wa phao weta rachunna Jisu ta hulla bom tul ae.
Pharishi ngei na mee ngeita juipi num talit anu juija marui ngei na akut shiel no lutto budol bakkha.
(Pharishi akha chu Jihudi ngei na ulien changei talit anu juija mani kut siel no wa chu bak in no ae.
Chuna mani na ajien thingjui jakom mani kut siel no wa chu bakno ae. Chu chakno wa mani talit nujuija asielsha wonshang akha chu tapot tuidon kom.)
Chuna Pharishi akha chu rouphun ocha ngei na Jisu ta sai, “Alo wa narui ngei na bakrang sharukka ulien changei talit nu juija asiellou kuta bakka meh?”
Jisu na manita sange, “Ahra sangei oh, Isaiah na adiek rou maphukka nangei taranga rilla shi ha, hita jiekka shi ae:
‘malmashi ngei na keita mani murrachak ajak atri ae.
Chuti weta manilung chu kakolla hai thou aram la ah am meh.
Chuna manina malmashi ngei talit hi,
dramo rou hekta chupi takpi ah
keita ariemsalla mokkae!’ ”
“Nangei na Chungthieng trongshan ta hla ah houweta malmashi ngei talit ta ratta choi ae.”
Akha chu manita amona rilleh, “Nangei talit ha hlano rang sharukka Chungthieng hina trongsan jui numno ae.
Hina sarukka Moses na rilleh, ‘Nanu napa ta ajak atri oh hana atujongna manu mapa ta sarkou lea chu amo ha thi su oh.’
Chuti weta nangei na chupi chou ae, ejonga mee akha na manu mapa ta san nang ha, chuti weta rillea, ‘Nahi korban ae’ (nahi rilna chu, Chungthieng ta ae),
chuna sarukka nangei na nanu napa taranga ephao ae num nijo weh.
Hitta aeja nangeina mee dangta chupijui Chungthieng trongshan chu hla hou so chou ae. Hichak ano wa adang eja ko ae ja am chau ae.”
Jisu na mani makhaita lea ah ma am na ah kok weta rilleh. “Karou hi thei oh akha chu nangei limpana dang au oh.
Malmashi sunga lut hana amota thienglao changpi nea ang mo weh chuti weta malmashi sunga hai thou shuk hana chakna amota thienglao changpi ange.
Atujong akur am mee na thei shu oh.”
Hana meelim hlathou wa arengpu na innsung tienga lutjuija, marui ngei na akal ahe rilpi ranga sai ae.
Chuna arengpu na manita sai ae nangei kom mani hekta lunghal thei no chau? “Nangna ri no the ah che awau hai thou wa malmashi sunga lut na malmashi ta thienglao chang pi nea no ae?”
Ti chu nahana malmashi lungsunga lut no ae chuti weta won sunga ae, hati weta awao wa shukka thing sier ae. (Hi rilna chu, Jisu na bakka ngei eheilim pa ta thiengpi so ae.)
Hana woihapa Arengpuna rilleh, “Malmashi lungsung hai thou shuk na amota theignlao changpi ae.
Rouram chu lung sung hai thou shuk hrano lunghal chu, aruthei, meethat, akha chu meenamei ta shimshi boron mee ae.
Hoplah pelah, hrano tullu lu murthei, namei apa hrano lunghal anar rat, hrano shukrang rou. Lokchokti mel akha chu lungmo.
Hi hrano eheilimpa hi lungsung hai thou wa shuk weta malmashi ta ‘thienglao changpi ae.’ ”
Jisu na, na amunt hai thou wa houphurra Tur akha chu Sidon tienga thinga atu akha dangno lutta innsunga lutnum hal kom amona aruhanta ma amna ah am theino ae.
Hrano muihla na ruija rol namei sanao akha hina manu na Jisu hina rouram ma mathei pha juija phao weta arengpu kae kunga mok so weh.
Namei ha chu adang jati ae Syrian Phoniciah ram ah pok mee ae. Namei nu hana asanao nu kolla am hrano muihla julla houranga Jisu kolla nie ae.
Chuti weta Jisu na sange, “Masha tekka unga ngeina awon hop masha shu oh. Rouram chu unga ngei bakrang budol ha ui ta pe no ae.”
Namei nu na sange, “Oh weh arengpu” “Chuti weta unga ngei bakna maicham thuija tul bak na in na alim ngei chu ui na kom bak no meh.”
Hana arengpu na namei nu ta ril, “Narou hina sarukka nang thingjou oh nasanao nu kolla hrano muihla shukka thingso ae!”
Namei nu na ma inn tienga maleh ah asanao nu ha kut chunga jalla am ripha so; hana hrano muihla na shukka thing so.
Jisuna Tur akha chu Sidon ram hla ah hou phur weta Galily tuipi thui tieng tumma jung weta Dekapolis ramtieng thingso ae.
Hana mee ahre ngeina akurko set atrong lah apa akha Jisu am na ruija phao weta Jisu na ma chunga akut te shi ranga nie ae.
Chuna wairul rija ngei karra hai thou wa adanga ruija shuk weta Jisu na makur ani makka akut chal soun na, achil shak weta akha chu apa hana alei ah tongpi ae.
Amona wan ram tienga mai hai weta asorpi holla makolla rilleh. “Ephphatha!” hina rilna chu “hong jou oh!”
Hana pachu spa kur kom hongpiso akha chu alei rui suikom hla pa chu hrabak ta trong thou so.
Hana Jisu na mani ta atu akha kolla rou hi rilno oh ta trongsan pe ae. Chuti weta arengpu na hija ril halkom malmashi ngei na chu lella thangpi ae.
Chuna na rou thei meelim na ashi angak shukkae. “Amohi ehai limpa hrabakta ae nea ae,” mani na rilleh, “Akur set meekom thei pi nea ae hana atrong lah kom trongpi nea ae.”
Apha hana wairul rijana rachonna abakrang ephao am no leija Jisu na arui ngeita ma am na ah koka rilleh.
Keina mani makhai ta ringrei singe rouram chu mani hi kei hitta rungnie inthum am ha ah mani hi abakrang ephao am no ae.
Ejonga keina mani ta awon tam ma lea pi lea chu lampi ah mani ha waipha tukkange, ti chu mani ahre chu aram lah hai thou phao ae.
Hana marui ngeina sange, “Mani hija taranga ram rukhina budol amte hina awon hopne ang meh?”
“Budol chu eja am ma chau?” Jisu na sai arui ngeina sange “Sari.”

Wairul rija ta alei chunga ongranga amona rilleh. Hana budol sari choi weta wan tienga hai ah nie weta budol ha ther sunutienga marui ngei ta masatekka amatienga am ngeita sam ranga pe ah, hata marui ngeina sampi so ae.
Hana manikolla tuiriek asiente ahre amhakom; arengpu na nie weta marui ngei kolla sam ranga rou ril so.
Mani na awon hoppa bak sutakka aliem anoi aning ha marui ngei na hom juija tai sari shukkae.
Hana baktol ngei ha apa lasing inly ae chuna manita hla so weh.
Apha hana makka Jisu na marui ngei hitta kung sunga lutweta Dalmanutha ramtienga thingso.
Pharisi ahre ngeina phao weta Jisu kolla wa weta rou vuk thou so weh mani na amota mant num ae chunga angai mee akha ae ta dang ranga mamta muh oh ta rillea.

Arengpu na alung thukka halla surpi holla manita rilleh atun takka nangei na anealah jong hi eje rang meh? Routakka nangei kolla keina rilnum minge rou ram chu atun tak chu nangei na anealah pe ang nonge.
Hana arengpu na houphur weta kung chung weta tuipi ralhatienga lalla thingso ae.
Arui ngei ha budol choi ang makhappa budol akha chak manikolla am meh, kung sung hana.
“Thei singa am mo” Jisu na manit hin nea Pharisi ngei achol akha chu Herod hina achol ha hrabakta singthei ah an no.
Arui ngei kar sunga akha lea akha mani thei chakka halhlakka, na rou ril hi ani na budol choi no sarukka range.
Chuna Jisu na mani halhlak rou ha dangpha ah mani ta rillea ejerang budol am no sarukka lung olla chau? Atun phao sunga nangei na rino dangthei no song chau? nangei lung eja hirra chau?
Nangei mit am ma, am ma rine no chau, hana nangei kur am am ma thei no chau? hana nangei na angei thei no chau?
Keina budol ranga ta mee lasing ranga ta kabakpi nangei na aliem hakom tai eja hom sa? mani na sange, “Asom ani.”
Hana keina lasing inly taranga budol sari kasampi na, tai eja limma nangei na hom ma chau? “mani na sange, tai sari.”
Arengpu na manita rilleh, “Atun phao sunga nangei na dangno song chau?”
Bethsaida ah mani phao juija hana malmashi ngeina Jisu kolla mitcho apa ta tham pi ranga mokkae.
Jisu na mitchopa kut choi weta husung hai thou wa ruija thingso. Hana Jisu na apa hina amit ta chil shak weta machunga makut shi weta hita rilleh Jisu na, “Ejongpa akha ripha che?”
Amona Chungtienga anweta rilleh, “Malmashi ngeita keina ri pha inge; chuti weta mani ha thingkungei hekta linga am meh.”
Woiha pakom Jisu na apa hana mitta akut shi ae atun pa chu mamit ha eheilimpa hrabak ta rine so ae.
Jisu na ma inn lam ma hla weta rourilleh, “Husunga lut no oh.”
Jisu na arui ngei hitta Kaisaria Philipi ram tienga mani thieng juija lampi ah mani kolla Jisu na sai, “Mee ngei na keita atu ae ta ril meh?”
Mani na sange, “Ahre na chu Johon Baptias; adang na ril chu Elija; hana rouphupa ae ta kom rilhlakkae.”
“Jisuna mani ta rillea “Nangei na chu keita atu ata rilla chau?” Pitar na sange, “Khrista ha nang ae.”
Jisu na marou sarukka atu kolla ril no ranga mani ta rou akal rilleh.

Amona manita chupi takpi thouso, “Meesanao paha aol dong ang ehekta am meh, ulien changei na julla hla ange, thiempu ngeina, akha chu rouphun chupi takpi ngei nakom hana arengpu ta that weta rungnie inthum sunie ah woiha lea ah ringthou ange.”
Amo na nahi manita thienga rilpi sho ae, hana pa chu Pitar amota lam panga kai ah thing weta ranga rillea.

Chuti weta Jisuna marui ngei ta nutienga haileh weta Pitar ta trongshi ah rilleh, “Kanungtieng lea oh, saitan!” amona rilleh, “Nangna Chungthieng nahal ha Chungthieng kol hai thou no weh, chuti weta mee ning hai thou sha ae.”
Hana Jisuna arui ngei lea wairol rija hitta kokweta rilleh, “Ejonga atu jongpana kanutieng jui num lea chu matak na matakta ngai num no su oh, hana ma khross ha chuti weta kanutieng jui su oh.
Rouram chu ringchang sanpi pha num atu jongpa na hata mang ange, chuti weta atu jongpa maring changta ahra rou taranga mangpi lea chu mamuihla sanpi pha ange.
Mee akha na simlei lim chang weta mamuihla chu sanpi pha no lea, e-chu mataranga ahra meh?
Anoleh mee akhana mamuihla ha sil hlak ranga e-chu pe jou meh?

Atu jongpa na kataranga ajak tukleh chu hana meenamei ta lalthinga atunpa pok hina pak na dolla karou hina sarukka keita ajak peleh chu keina athieng wanrui ngei hitta kapa hina ahung ajai hitta jungjuija amo kom ajak tukkange.”
Hana Arengpu na manita rilleh, “Keina adiek rou nangei kolla ril inge. Hina am ahre chu Chungthieng rengram na ane jaitha tolla jung malim ma athi ti dangpha ang no ae.”
Rungnie aruk takka Jisu na Pitar, Jacob akha chu Johon tolla mullon sang nga manita ruija, hana chu mani ha mani thei chak rui kallea. Hana mani na anna am lei ah Jisu kolla ahlong waso ae.
Akha chu apun adir chu deja warra haja war ae chuna aleiram ma atu akha na kom hahekti awar pun don nea no ae.
Hana arui inthum na Moses hitta Elija na mani maikunga shuk weta manui na Jisu ta trong thou pi hari so ae.
Jisu kolla Pitar na rillea, “Ocha, amunt hina ani amhi ehakta hra so weh. Thiel inthum ani na sa ei oh-akhana nataranga, akha na Moses tarang hana akhana Elija tarang.”
Chuna amo akha chu adangei na elota rill ang mo dangthei no weh, ti chu mani na leima tri sarukka.
Chuna mani chunga sumphai na li-weta sumphai sunga thou sanrol akha na ril shukkae, “Nahi kasanao pa ae, machunga keina lungshi inge maril hi ngai thei oh.”
Edang dang nowa ahul tunga mani anjuija Jisu ano wa atu adang akha phao mani na ri pha ni jo weh.
Chuna manina mulbung hai thou tumma junga Jisu na manita rillea meesanaopana athi ngei kar hai thou malim chu, atu akha kolla nangei na ri sa ha ril shuk no oh ta Jisu na rou manita rillea.
Mani thei chakka hita ngai tu hlak thouso, “Athi hai thou wa ringthou tina meh.”
Jisu ta manina hita sai, “Alo sarukka rouphun chui ngei na Elija na masha phao ange ta rilla meh?”

Matrong sang chu, “Elija na masha jungweta eheilim pa hi tamasha ae ange ti ha adiek takkae. Chutiweta ejeranga abai sunga jiekka shi ah meh meesanao pana aol ana eja dong anga mee na junna hou anga meh?
Chuti weta nangei kolla karil chu, Elija chu phao so weh hana marou hana jiekka shi hekta mani na dit ha makolla ae so weh.”
Amona arui ngei am na mawakka ehakta tam wairol rija na mani ta hulla rouphun chupi takpi ngeina trong sum hlakka am ripha so.
Jisu wakhi meelim na rijuija mani na edang dangno wa angak shukka ma am na ah tanna thing weta amota mokso.
Jisu na sai, “Ejongpa sarukka nangei na manita trong sum hlak chao?”
Hana wairol rija sunga apa akhana sange “Ocha, kasanaopa ha hraihru na sunna atrong shukno akha nakolla ruija wa inge.

Chuna amunt chang honna amota hlawang na sunna athei chakka alei chunga tabu ah athei chakka aha ril weta achel phul shukka keina narui ngei ta hraihru muihla jullanga karilla manina julla hao nea nijo weh,” Jisu na rilleh.
“Ngoiring thei lou mee ngei.” “Echan sotta keina nangei hitta amha ang meh? Echan sotta keina nangei ta dangpi song ang meh? ruija wa oh apa sanao ha ka-am na ah.”
Chunapa chu manina Jisu am na apa sanao ha ruija hlawang muihla na Jisu ta ri len apha hana makka apasanao hata ratta soum ma houphur weta alei chunga letta tu wa achilphul sakso ae.
Apa sanao hina mapa kolla Jisu na sai, “Apha Eja sotta amona hihakta ae mo weh?” “Mapa na sange unga hai thou ah.”
“Apha chang honna amota that ranga tuisunga maisunga denga hou ae. Chuna kani ta lungshi ringrei ah san changa nangna na ae nea tullu te lu pi oh.”
Jisuna makolla rilleh, “Ejonga nangna ngoiring ta lea chu eheilim aneno am no ae atujong ngoiring mee taranga.”
Hata leitakka mapana tappa aushukke, kangoi ringchu aminge chuti weta hane shulinge, “Ka ngoiring lel ranga sanpi oh!”

Wairul rija na mani kolla naija wak juija Jisu na ri ah, hrano muihla ta amona trongshi rilleh, “Atrong shukno akha chu kurset muihla,” amona lul lea, “Keina nangta rou ril inge, na unga heithou woiha shuk jouwo waiha lea ah lutno sa oh.”
Hrano muihla na amota mant phura aol ana pe hao phur weta shukka thingso. Chuna rungthar apa sanao ha athi sa hekso weh meelim na ko thi so weh ta rilleh.
Chuti weta Jisu na makut ha ao weta thoupi so weh hana amoha ngir thou so weh.
Jisu na inn sunga malut juija marui ngeina aru hanta amota sai, “Alo sarukka kanina hrano muihla hata julla hao nea no wa meh?”
Jisu na sange, “Hijongpa hi chu ani nachakka julne ae.”
Chuna nutienga Jisu akha chu arui ngei na rammun ha hau phurra Galily lalla thingso. Mani na thingna munt ha Jisu na chu atu akha ta dangpi num no ae.

Rouram chu arengpu na arui ngeita chupi ah, takpi ah hita rilleh, manita, “Meesanaopa hata meengei kut chunga pe ange akha chu mani na amota that tange. Chutihal kom rungnie na thum takka amo na ringthou ange.
Chuti weta rilla am hi mani na dangpha nea no ae chu chakno ah manina hina rilna rouram kom sai angphao atri ae.”
Manina Kaphernahum wakjuija mani lutna innsunga amona manita hita sai, “Ejongpa rou sarukka nangeina lampi ah trong sella chao?”
Chuti weta manilim na daisiem ti ae rouram chu manina lampiah atu na atuta loktek mo ae ti hi trong shell hlakkae.
Hana Jisu ong weta asom ani hata kok weta rilleh, “Ejong atu motieng na masha di lea chu, amo ha meenu tek ti ha chang weta meelim rui changa ta ae.”
Amo na unga akha mani karra ngir pi weta amona kolku wa mani ta ril.
“Atu jong pana na unga akha hita ariem tukka kaminga lapi lea chu kaita lapi ah ae; hana atu jong pana keita ariemma ngai pi lea chu keita ano weh chuti weta keita hlapa ta ngaipi ah ae.”
Johon na rilleh, “Ocha, malmashi ngei na naminga hrano triek julla hou juija kanina manita ha tullu ha lu no ranga ham unge, rouram chu amoha ani sunga ano weh.”
Jisu na manita rilleh, “Amota nangei na hamma si no oh,” “Rouram chu kaminga atu jongna ae nea tullu lu weta hana nutienga kaming taranga hrano tronga rollang mee amono ae.
Chuna atu motieng na anita anda no ngei ha ani taranga ae.
Nangei hi Khrista mee ae ta hana minga atu jong pana in-ranga tui don pi lea chu keina adiek takka rilsinge ma ae na amant pha ange.
“Atu jongpa ung sanao akhana keita ngoiring amota nangei karra atu jong pana amota pakka tulpi lea chu, mataranga shum alung ahonga ren weta tui pi linna denga haopana hella hratek kange.
Hana ejonga nakut na nangta pakka tul pi lea chu, nakut tan na hao oh, rouram chu nakut akha chakka aring ringchang pha pa na hella hratek kae, nakut ani su wa sarmei ah luttang saruk chu.
Amunt hana sarmei chu amit ti am no ae, hana alung na bakka athi ti am no ae.
Hana ejonga nakae nakom nangta pakka tulpi lea chu, nakae tan na hao oh, rouram chu nakae hurra aring ringchang pha pa na hella hra tekka nakae ani su wa sermei ah luttang saruk chu.
Amunt hana sarmei chu amit ti am no ae, hana alung na bakka athi ti am no ae.
Hana ejonga namit na kom nangta pak tulpi lea chu lah ah hao oh, Chungthieng rengram ma namit akha chakna lutpa na hella hra tekke mit ani su wa sarmei kum ma deng ang saruk chu.
‘Amunt hana ringphur lung ha adai am no ae hana sarmei kom adai am no ae.’
“Sarmei ah malmashi lim pa hi chi-al an hek ti ange.
“Chi hi hra ae; chuti weta ejonga chi-al ha am no lea chu nangei na olata al pi ang chau?
“Nangei karra chi hekti tonpi chang chu oh, akha chu akha lea akha adai am ha oh.”
Jisu na rammun ha hou phur weta Judia ram tienga Jordon lalla thingso. Woihapa kom malmashi wairul rija makolla wa ah machupi ngei nujuija amona chupi takpi ae manita.
Pharisi ahre na makolla phao weta mant rang hi rilleh, “Apa akha na anamei hran hi rouphun hana angei mo ae?”
Jisu na shai weta sange, “Mosi na chu nangeita trongsan alota pe mo ae?”
Manina sange, “Mosi na chu apa hana hran sange ta jieksha pe lea chu anamei ta hran na ngei ae.”
Jisuna mani ta rilleh, “Nangei hi nalung hir hai sulla Mosi na rouphun ha nataranga jiekka sa ae.
Chuti weta, ‘Chungthieng na shimlei shaklei athou na chu apa lea namei mamui chakkae,’ athieng trongshan na ril shi hekta,
‘chuna rousarukka apa na anamei nei juija mapa manu ta houphu weta namei hitta am ha shu oh,
hana manui ani ha atun chu pum akha chakso ae.’ Chuna manui ha etikom ani ha anijo weh, akha chak so ae.
Chuna sarukka Chungthiengna tulpisha ani ha atu akhana hranpi no shu oh.”
Mani na inn sunga amleija kom arui ngei na hina sarukka Jisu ta sai ae.
Chuna Jisu na sange, “Atu jong pana anamei ta hran weta namei adangta nei lea chu amoha shimshi bhoron mee ae.
Hana atu jongpa namei nu nakom mapishal ta hranweta pishal adang kolla palthing lea cha amo ha shimshi bhoron lal mee ae.”
Malmashi ngei na unga ngei chunga Jisu na makut shipi ranga rui phao pachu marui ngei na lungsha ah rilleh manita.
Jisuna, nahi rijuija alung shukka hoino wa manita rilleh, “Unga ngei ha ka-am na ah wa shu oh hampi no oh, Chungthieng rengram ha mani jongpa taranga ae.
Keina adiek rou nangei ta rillinge, atu jongpa na, na unga hekta la thei Chungthieng rengram hi unga akha na lak hekta lah no lea chu amunt hana lut pha ang no weh.”
Hana aban chunga unga poi weta mani limta jaihra pe ae.
Jisu na malam tienga thinga thou juija apa akha na tanna wa weta makae kunga ahuk hrun weta sai ae, “Ahra ocha, alo ta keina samla ringchang pha ranga etullu lu ang mo ae?”
Jisuna sange, “Alo sarukka nangna keita ahra ocha kokka cha meh?” “Chungthieng ano wa chu atu akha ahra am no weh.
Rakit rou dangno che: ‘Malmashi ta thatno, meenamei shimshi bhoron no, aru theino, dieklou saro ngir no rousa ah trongno, nanu napata ajak atri oh!’ ”
Chuna Apa na hrabakta ril shukkae, “Ocha,” “Ka unga lei thou wa na limpa ha keina jui ah hang inge.”

Jisu na amota takratta anweta lungshi ah hita rilleh, “Na jui lou akha am songe,” “Thingo akha chu na am nadon eheilimpa jur weta sara ringrei ngei ta sam thingo. Chule chu wanram ma anei adon ange. Hana wa oh, kanutieng juijo.”
Apa hana mathei juija amai hai weta alung olla lea so weh, rouram chu amo ha anei adon mee ae.
Jisu na arui ngeita hulla an weta hita ril, “Achongpu ngeina Chungthieng rengram lut rang hi ehekta alu akha ae!”
Arui ngei na Jisu rouhi theijuija angak shukka amlei ah, Jisu na woihapa hita ril, “Unga ngei oh anei adon ta ngoiring taranga eja ah lu meh Chungthieng rengram lutrang!
Achongpu pana Chungthieng rengram luttang chu jangkusha na ahriem na sunga lutpa na hella doktek kange.”
Arui ngei na hella tieng ama acha ah mani akha lea akha ril hlakkae, “Chuleh chu atu jongpa chu aring koetlo pha ang mo nu?”
Jisu na manita takratta an na ril, “Na hi malmashi ninga chu neno ae, chuti weta eheilimpa hi Chungthieng kolla chu neno am no ae.”
Pitar na Jisu ta rillea, “Kani na eheilimpa nanutieng jui rang houphur songe!”
Oh weh Jisuna sange, “Adiek rou keina nangei kolla rillinge,” “Atu jongpa na kataranga akha chu ahra rou taranga ma inn lou ano lea, ata asar anoleh manu mapa anoleh ma-u-manao houphur lea chu,
amona atun mak chu saruk riha ha no wa ah inn alou ata asar, manu mapa, asanao ngei akha chu awut arel eja ngei hi phao angpa apha ah chu samla ringchang tukkange.
Chuti weta mani atun masha ah am atam pana na ruinung ange, hana atun rui nunga atampa na masha ange.”

Jisu akha chu aruingeina Jerushalem thing rang lampiya am meh. Jisuna aruingei matinga thinge. Arui ngeiha ati alou na si so weh, anui jui mee ngei nako ati so weh. Woiha lea ah Jisuna arui asom ani ta adanga rui weta anutinga makolla shuk kang lim ha rilpi ae.

Amo na ril, “Ani na Jerushalem ma kalla thinga mee sanaopa jur ange lok tek ti thiempu kolla akha chu roukung chupi ngei kolla manina thatta ngai mee ae ta vutta rella amota meejat adang ngei kolla peange.
Manina chelshak ka nuisho simso ange akha chu amota thattange. Hana rungnie nathum nutinga amo ringthou ange.”
Zebedi sanaorel Jacob akha chu Johon na Jisu kolla wa weta shai ae, “Ocha,” “Kani taranga eyongpa akha nangta ae pi num unge.”
“Naha chu e meh?” Jisu na manita shai ae.
Mani na sange, “Kanui ni sunga akha na nachang tienga hana akha na navoi tienga na reng phom lu na ong ni ah ong pi oh.”
Jisu na ril, “Nang na dangno che nang na roudoh am ha “aol tuidong ka een ang hi nang na een nea ang che? Ka baptias ae hekta baptias ae nea ang che?”
“Kani nea ange manui na sange,” Jisu na manita ril, “Nangei na katui don na ka inn na inn halkom akha chu tui ka lut na lut hal kom.
Ka ong na changtieng hal voitieng hal na ong ang chu keina kahal ang no ae. Chuti weta na amunt ha chu atujong mani tarang ae ta tamasha ae Chungthieng ta sa ae.”
Rouhi arui asom na thei pa chu Jacob lea Johon ta mani na lungsha ae.

Jisu na manilim ta ma am na ah kok weta mani ta rilleh, “Nangei na dangpha ange ejonga meejat ngei taranga ane angam akha ta rengpu mani taranga changpi hal hana mani chunga ane akha na ehei limpa ron na am meh.
Nahi nangei karra hita ae ang no wa ae chutihalkom atu jong pana nangei karra alok sanum mee na nangei rui chang anga ae.
Nangei kar rah akhana masha di lea chu amo ha meelim kou change.
Chuna meesanao pana phao wa amota shilpi bolpi rang jung ah no ae chuti weta amo na tieng meeta shilpi bolpi ranga akha chu mee ejata sam ranga maring chan pe junge.”
Hana mani na Jerikho tunga Jisuna marui ngei akha chu wairul rija ngei ta houphur leija Timas sanaopa mitcho booni Bartimas amo ha chu lamhou ah onga am ae.
Nazaret hai thou Jisu ae ti mathei pha juija amona aroul shukka au thou, “David sanaopa Jisu, keita ringrei ngei pi oh!”
Mee atampa amota lungsha-ah dai tikta am mota, rilleh amo na chu tingtek kating au weh, “David sanaopa keita ringrei ngei pi oh!”
Jisu na mauita ham ma ril lea, “Amota kok-ko” chuna mani na mitcho hata rilleh, “Ariem jou oh hana thoujou oh amo na nangta kokka am meh.”
Mapunmani denga hau weta amona Jisu am na ah chom ma wa so ae.
“Nataranga ejongpa tullu keita ae pi num ma chae?” Jisu na ril hana mitcho pana arengpu ta nie ae “Ocha, keina kamit woiha lea ripha num minge.”
Chuna Jisu na amota ril, “Thingjou oh,” “Nangoiring hana nang dam pha so che ae.” Apha hana makka amit ripha nea ah amo lamhana Jisu nutieng jui so ae.
Hana mani na Jerushalem nei ah wak jui mulbung am na Betphage akha chu Bethany ah Jisu na arui anie ta masha ah rourilla hla so ae.
Manita ril, “Nangei matienga am hu hana thing weta nangei lut thou len kormo sanao mee ngei na woiha phao chunglou ha renna am mange, naha nangei na rui hla weta choi wa oh.
Hana nangei ta atu jongpa na ejeranga mo ae ta sai lea chu, karengpu na anei ang am meh hana apha sot no lutta tha lea ange ta manita rillo.”
Mani thingjuija Kormo sanao ha lamhao shielhun innkal am na ren na am tukhlakka manina rui hla weta shukso ae.
Amunt hana ngirra am mee ngei na sai, “Kormo sanao hi hla weta ejongpa ae anga chao?”
Jisu na manita rilla hla hekta mani ta rilpa chu mee ngei na mani ta thingjou shu oh ta hla so ae.
Mani na kormo sanao ha Jisu kolla ruija wa weta achunga pun nie shi in len Jisu na kormo sanao chunga chung so ae.
Mee ngei na mani pun dier hachu lampi ah dokka hana atujong adang na thingbak hriem weta lampi ah shi so ae.
Chuna matienga thingei na kom hana nutienga thing ngei nakom hita au shukso ae. “Hosana!” Arengpu minga phao mee amo ha jaihra ae!”
“Chungthieng na phao anga am anipa David rengram ha jaihra pe shu oh Chungthieng ta dam ei oh.”
Jisu na niek na inn Jerushalem ma lutweta, amona eheilimpa ahul tunga an na rol hallea. Chuti weta atun chu tai hai sul shou chu, amona arui asom ani hitta Bethany ah shukka thingso ae.
Hana hu warra mani na Bethany hai thou phao ah Jisu won tam so ae.
Aram lah hai thou wa theichang kung abu tam ma am ri so, amo na ejongpa ara am mang mo ae ta anthinga amunt tungjuija chu abu ano wa amona ephao tuk no ae rouram chu ara apha ano sou chu.
Hana Jisu na thingkung hata rillea, “Woiha lea ah nakung hai thou wa atu akha na kom nara thei bak no shu oh.” Rou hi marui ngei na theiphaso ae.

Jerushalem ma manina tungjuija Jisu na mokna inn sunga lutweta amunt changtenna an weta hana sunga jurra am akha chu lei hlakka am ngei ta julla thouso ae, amona sum vulthuk vulsin ae na doukang akha chu paipi jur ngei ong na kom letta hou so ae.
Jisu na mani jurra am pot lim ha mokna inn sung hai thou wa akha phao choi ngei pi no ae.
Jisu na hita chupi takpi ah mani ta rillea, “Nahi jiekka shi sha no meh: ‘ka inn sung hi jat lim na mok rang inn kok kange?’ Chuti weta nangei na aru thei ngei bu wul pi so ae.”

Chungtekti thiempu ngei akha chu rouphun ocha ngei na amota that ranga an hlakka rol halkom mani ha amo ta leima tri so ae, ti-chu machupi matakpi am roulam lim ha wairul rija na angak shukka am jarra.
Nitak apha phao juija amona hulok hai thou wa shukka thingso ae.
Nituk apha hana mani lam hana thing juija theichang bu atro hai, thou wa charra thing ripha so ae.
Pitar na angei thei ah Jisu ta ril, “Rabbi, an no! Thei changbu ha nasarkou hai thou wa char so weh!”
“Jisuna sange Chungthieng kolla ngoiringa am mo.

Keina adiek rou nakolla rillinge, atu jongpa na amulbung ta, tui sunga nathei chak na thingweta deng hal, hana nalunga ephao ngaidol nolutta ngoiring ta lea chu ejongpa naril rou ha hamak makolla shuk kange.
Chuna sarukka keina nangei ta rilla aminge, nangei na ehailimpa niek juija nahamakha pha ang so weh ta ngoichak ngoiringo, hana naha nangei na pha ange.
Hana nangei na niek ranga ngirra amjuija apha ah wan ramma napa nakom nangei diekno aral ahui shilpi ange, atu jongpa chunga nahoi no makolla amleh chu nangei na aral ahui ha shilpi oh.
Chuna nangei na shilpi no taleh chu wanram ma am napa nakom naral nahui ejalim silpi nea ang no ae.”
Mani na Jerushalem woihapa tunga Jisu na mok na inn sunga rolla amlei, chungtek ti thiempu ngei hana rouphun ocha ngei akha chu ulien changei na Jisu am na wa ah sai ae.
“Ejongpa nane jaitha am ma nangna hijongpa tullu aeja am che?” ta mani na sai. “Hana atuna nangta hijong ae rang pe ah meh?”
Chuna Jisuna manita rou akha sai, “Nahi nangei na sang lea chu kei nakom rillange ejongpa sarukka keina nahi ae nea ah hilim ae mota.
Johon Baptias pana baptias ae pihi wanram tieng mo ano lea mee ngei kol hai thou meh? nahi diekka kakolla rilpi oh.”
Mani theichakka mani masel halhlak ka ril, “Ejonga anina wanram tienga ril lea chu, amona anita hita rill ange chuleh alo wa nangei na kei ta ngoiring no chao?
chuti weta ani na ejonga mee ngei kol hai thou wa ae rilleh chu” (Manina mee ngei ta atri ae, ha chu malmashi limpana Johon chu routakka rouphupa ae ta ngoiring ae.)
Chuna manina sange Jisu, “Kani dang nonge. Keinakom ejongpa kane jaitha amma nahi ae moti rillang nonge ta Jisu na ril.”

Hana Jisu na manita roumushuk changa ril thouso; “Apa akhana darkha innkul akha ah ahul tunga numtuk weta, Darkha tui som rang alei hur chao ae akha chu taiten kang shaphur ae, drakha mahun ha shella haophur ra inn hla weta rama adanga thingso ae.
Chuna mapha pha ah wakjui chu drakha eenkul sunga ara hom manga amo na masuukta innkulla tullu lu ang meengei hla so ae.
Chuti weta mani na amota mant na phitta kut rukka lehpi so.
Hana amona adang asuuk mani am na hla pa kom; mani na asuukpata aluwa phitta kuipi weta atri pi ah ajak tukka lea so ae.
Chutiphao sunga amona adang hla songe hana akha hatakom mani na that so ae. amona adang atram ta kom phitta adang ta chu manina hla so ae.
Mahla lou akha chu am songe, ‘ha chu ehakta makolla malungshit sanao ae, amona chetta ngoiring asanaopa chu mani na ajak atri ange ta atreem na ah hla so ae.’
Chuti weta mahunna am ngei mani akha lea akha na hitta ril hlakka. ‘Hi so weh mahun mitpu sanao pa, chuna wa oh anina amota that ei oh, hana mapha phung shuk eja ani na chang ei oh!’
Chuna mani na amota mant na that weta, darkha mahun au-wau ah denga hou so ae.”
“Drakha mahun amitpu na ejongpa tullu lu ang sha?” “Amona mahun na phao weta mahunna tullu lu mee ngeita that ta mahun ha mee adang ta pe hou ang no meh.
Nangei na jiek shi ha dang sho chau ae?
‘Inn sha ngei na ngei no weh alung ta
housa naha mak hana lella hratek ti change.
Nalim pa hi arengpu lu tullu chak sa ae akha chu
nahi ani mitta chu angakpi akha ae!’ ”
Chuna Jihudy lamkai ngei na Jisu ta mant ranga anna rollea, ti chu Jisu na manita roumu shukka rilsha rukka ae chuti weta wairul rija ta atri jarra; Jisu ta hou phur weta mani na thingso ae.
Anutieng chu Jisu rou ril nu juija amota mant ranga Phraisi ngei lea Herod ralmee ngeita Jisu kolla hla so ae.

Mani na makolla wa weta ril, “Ocha, nang chu adiek rou ril che ae kanina dang unge nangchu eichang eivoi nei no ae rou ram chu nangna atu ta kom an no ah Chungthieng adiek rou hi diekka takpi ae, chuna kanita rillo, Kaisar rengpa kolla sum pekhi rouphun na ngei no wa meh? kani na manita pe ang mo pe ang no meh?”
Chuti weta Jisu na ahra sa rou dangpha ah, “Eje ranga keita chang mant ranga do ah chao? Dinaris choi ah wa oh an tikkae ta” Jisu na ril.
Chuna mani na sumnoi choija phao pa chu Jisu na mani ta sai. “Nahina chunga jiekka shi mel rung hi atu meh?” “Kaisar’s” ae ta mani na sange.
Manita Jisu na ril, “Kaisar pha phung shuk na Kaisar ta pe oh. Hana Chungthieng ta hakom Chungthieng na chang su oh.” Hana mani na Jisu ta angak shukkae.
Athi ringthou am no ae ta rou ril Sedukise ahre ngeina Jisu kolla phao weta rou sai ae.

“Mani na sai Ocha, Mousi na kani taranga hita jiekka shi phur ae: ‘Ejonga uleh nao ngei karak sunga mata na asanao pokno lutta thija anamei ta houphur lea chu anao pa na arong nu ta anamei shakka nei weta mata pa taranga asanao don ngei ae.’
Uleh nao apa chak sari am phur ae; ulien tek ti pa na namei nei weta asanao don nolutta thi so ae.
Hana ani sunapa na arongnu ta nei ser juija amo hakom asanao am no lutta thi so weh, hahekta inthum suna pakom thiso ae.
Routakka mani uleh nao sari mak na asanao akha phao am no lutta atreem na chu namei nu ha kom thi so ae.
Ringthouni rungni ah chu namei nu ha mani kar sunga atu namei chang ang meh? rouram chu uleh nao sari makna amota nei hao phur sou chu?”
Jisu na manita sange, “Nangei na jieksha rou akha chu Chungthieng hina ane jaitha ha dang no chao, hina taranga nangei na lal no wa chao?
Chuna athi sa ngei na ringthouni chu mani na nuhla pamhla am mang no ae; hana mani chu wanram ma wanrui ngei hek ti ange.

Hana athi sa ngeina ringthouna rouram ma Mosi abai sunga jiekka shi hi pa no the ah che, aponbil maitung sunga, Chungthieng na amota alota rilsha, ‘Kei inge, Abraham hina Chungthieng, Isak hina Chungthieng, akha chu Jacob hina Chungthieng.’
Chungthieng chu athi ngei Chungthieng no ae, aringei Chungthieng sa ae nangei na ripta lalla am so chau ae.”
Rouphun ocha ngei kar sunga ngeitu hlak ha Jisu na thei pha ah mani ta hrabakta sang pi so ae, “Rakit lim karrakka hoipa na chungtekti mo ae?”
Jisu na sangso, “Chungtekti akha ha hiso weh: Isarel ngei oh theijo, ani Chungthieng rengpu hi arengpu akha chakkae.
Hana narengpu Chungthieng ta nalunglimpa hana namuihla limpa akha chu nahal limpa hana narat nathei limpa na lungshi ang nga ae.
Ani sunapana na inn-ning tul tieng ta natak mak hekta lungshi oh, chuna hita hella loktekti rakit am no ae.”
Mee hana sange, ehekta hraso weh, “Ocha! Chungthieng akha chakkae naril rou ha adiek takka atu adang am no ae.

Thin lung limpa akha chu dangthei limpa hana muihla limpa akha chu jaitha limpa akha chu inning tultieng ta matakmak hek ta lungshi hina hella mei ah holla pek akha chu rithoi liem pa karra chungtek kae.”
Chuna amona lungsin shukka sang Jisu na ri weta amota hita rillea, “Nanghi Chungthieng rengram hai thu aram lah ah am no che ae.” Hana nutieng hai thou wa atu akha na Jisu ta sai nijo weh.
Mokna inn sunga Jisu na chupi takpi ah am leija amo na sai, “Alota rouphun ocha ngei na Khrista hi David sanao ae ta rilla meh?
David matak makna muihla athieng na rou thienga tronge:
‘Arengpu na karengpu ta rillea:
nangta anda mee ha nakae tro ma
liem ma kachangtienga ongo.’
David matakmakna amota ‘Arengpu’; kokkae alo ta chu amo na masanao pa chang ang meh?”
Hana mee eja na marou ril ha ariem ma ngei num meh.
Areng Jisu na manita chupi ae, amona ril, “Sonjello rouphun ocha ngei ha linglul achulpa hanum ma ha weta mee ngei na rachon na ah ajak atri pi num meh.
Hana synagogue sunga bu don na ah kom ajak atri mee chang nummeh.
Mani na Arongei inn sunga ahra sha ah manita ru ranga shotta nie ae. Mani na mamaral atripi makhai pha ange.”
Jisu na mokna inn sunga ong weta malmashi ngei na alo ta dorra pe mota anna amlei ah achong areng ngei na atam dorra hou phur ripha so ae.
Chuti weta arong nu na chu sum noi ani te ha chu thall houphurre.
Jisu na marui ngeita makolla kokweta ril, “Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rillinge ha chu na arong nu na houphur hina malmashi adang ta lella houphur so ae.
Mani na pekka am chu mani chong reng chunga pe sa ae, chuti weta na arong nu na mapek chu masara chunga maring ranga shi eheilim pa pe so ae.”
Jisu na mokna inn haithou wa shukka, marui ngei kar hai thou wa akhana makolla rillea. “Anno ocha! alung takka sak inn hi eja ah ajon ahra ah meh!”
Jisu na sange, “Alok inn hi nangna rijou che? Alung akha na akha phao ma ma-am na munt na amang nijo weh; allung lim denga hou ange.”
Jisu na mokna inn aral tienga olive mul la onga ma amlei ah, Pitar, Jacob, Johon akha chu Andrew mani theichak na wa weta chikka amota sai ae,
“Kani ta rilpi oh, nalimpa hi ejongpa apha ah shuk kang mo? akha chu roulim hi shuk kang tienga ejongpa na muh shukkang meh?”
Chuna mani ta Jisu na rillea: “Songjella am oh, atu akha na nangei ta lam danga kai no su oh.
Kaminga mee atam pa na phao weta rillange, kei inge amoha; hana mani na mee ejata alou lamdanga rui ange.
Hana nangei na ral akha chu ral rasha thei pha juija hlawai no oh. Hajongpa lim ha shuk kange, chuti weta atreem na ha chu ano ae.

Jaty akha na Jaty akha ta anda ange, akha chu reng ram akha na reng ram chunga ral shul ange. Hana ram munt eja ah lingnu nok ka akha chu butang jutang eja kom shuk kange nalim hi aol ana athou na sa ae.

“Chuna sarukka theija singa ammo, mee ngei na nangei ta ulien changei mai ah rui shukkange akha chu Synagoge eja ah ruija thingweta kasarukka areng eja maija akha chu ram ron ane eja mai kunga ngir range maram chu ahra rou manita ril sharukka.
Chuna ahra rou ha masha ah jaty chang honna rou ril thingo.
Ejonga nangeita mant na chang an jui ja nangei lung tiersickka erillangmo weta ephao olno oh. Apha hana narillang ha, hata rillo, naha natrong shuk ano ae, muihla athieng sa ae.
Uleh nao sunga kom ulehnao athit phao ranga jur hlakkange, akha chu mapana asanao ngeita unga ngei nakom nungei pa ngei ta ngei num no ah akha chu manita that phao thatange.
Meelim na kasarukka nangei ta rinum mangno ae, chuti weta atu jongpana na atreem ni phao ngirra am amota chu sanpi ange.
“Nangei na ri ang chou ae ‘Ehekta atri alao amunt’ ma-an mang no na amunt na ngirra ma am ha” (apa ngei na lunghal theisu oh) “Apha hana chu Jehudiah am mani chu mulbunga thing su oh.
Chuna atu akha na ko inn chunga thou wa tumma jung weta inn sunga ejongpa anei adon latum no su oh.
Hana akha nakom loutai hai thou wa linglut la lea no su oh.
Hajongpa rungnie hana chu naoron na am nnupinu akha chu naosan don na am nu taranga eja ah jaishi pe ja meh.
Chungthieng ta nie oh hijongpa ngei hi phalbitiem ma shuk no range.
Rouram chu Chungthieng na shak aleiram hina sunga athou haithou akha chu atun phao sunga sumpsuk shuk nothe akha chu shukkang lou hajongpa aol rungnie ae.
Chuti weta Jisu na jung rungnie tanna bong pi phur noleh, muihla akha phao sanpi pha angno ae. Chuti weta mahal sha ngei sarukka, mani ta mahal jarra amona rungnie kom bongpi so ae.
“Hana jui apha ah atujong akha na nangei ta rillange, ‘Anno, Khrista hina am meh!’ ano lea, ‘anno, ko na am meh!’ ta rilhalkom ngoiring no oh.
Rouram chu Khrista alou Messiya akha chu chung dieklou rouphu ngei shukkange. Mani na anealah akha chu angakpi ae weta Chungthieng ahalsha nangei ta alau tienga lamkai ange.
Chuna hrabakta songjella am mo! keina nangei kolla rou limpa hi rou shukma apha ah rilsu sange.
“Hana jui rungnie ah chu aol ana hana nutienga nienu na kom thiema akha chu hlawar na kom mawar pe ang no ae.
Arshi ngei nakom wan haithou wa tulla amange, akha chu wan ramma am lim pa kom lingpi ange.
Hana apha ah chu malmashi ngeina ri ange meesanao pana sumphai sunga arat jaitha akha chu ahung ajai phu ah jungange.
Chuna arengpu na ma wanrui ngeita hla weta aky inly ah mahalsa ngei akha chu aleiram atreem na haithou wa wanram atreem na phao ah am ngeita hom manga.
“Nangeina theichang kung hai thou wa rou dangpha oh: abak adon shukka hang juija abu anao mel rijuija ashao apha nei so weh ta nangei dang hekta.
Chu phao sungakom, nalimpana shukka wak juija atun chu leima nei ah wa weta dang che hana apha hi atun chu sung karpha am so ae.
Angei thei oh, hilimpa hi atun na ringa am meelim na thit matienga shuk kange.
Awan alei kom treem ange, chuti weta ka trongshan che etikka ko treem ang no ae.
“Rungnie ha anolea apha ha atu akha na dang no ae, wan na wanrui nakom asanaopa na kom dang no ae mapa na chakna dange.
Hakka am akha chu songjello, maram chu nang na apha ha phao ang ha dang no ae.
Na hi, hihekti ae apa akha na ma inn houphurra thing weta mashuk ngeita ma ae, ma ae rang tullu lim rilphurra shongkar hakpa ta hakka am rang rilla tairam ma thingso ae.
Adongthei ah am mo, maram chu inn mitpu pa na etikka lea ang mo nangei na dang no weh, na hi nietlak ano lea janjai ano lea hu warrang tieng ano lea nie shuk juija kom ngei ae.
Ejonga amo na amacha ah maphao jui ja, amo na nang ha jalla am tukhlak no su oh
keina nangta ril hi, keina meelim ta kom rillinge; adong thei oh!”
Atun hi lanpina reen akha chu achol tolno budol reen rungnie nani matienga. Hana chungtekti thiempu akha chu rouphun ocha ngei na Jisu ta mant na that ranga huisar anna rol.
“Chuti weta reen sunga manita thang so ti no rang ae no ei oh ta mani na rillea.”
Raichi Simon ta danghlak apa inn Bethany ram ma Jisu na bakka ma-amlei ah nameinu akha na ehakta amant tam alabaster ariem hoi tui na shihakti um ha kuipi weta Jisu lu chunga shopi so ae.
Chuti weta mani amna kar sunga am tol ahre na lungsha ah mani thei chakka hita rilhlakke, “Ejeranga riemhoi sirik areempa ah hou meh?
Na ariemhoi sirik hina riha som nga hella jurveta apha sum hana sara ngeita pe anga ae ta!” mani na nameinu ta lungsa ah ril.
Jisuna rillea, “Ma lu tullu ha ae shu oh eko trongno oh, ejeranga namei hata nangei na lung olpi ah chau? namei nu na kataranga ehakta ahra tullu lu pi so ae.
Sara ngei ha apha chang honna nangei hitta am ha ange hana nangei dit apha hana nujuija nangei na san na ngei ae. Chuti weta kei chu apha chang honna nangei hitta am ha ang nonge.
Namei nu hana mane ha ae so ae. Namei nu ha katak chung ariem hoi sirik sopi hi keita ui ranga mahalla dang pi ah ae.
Atun keina adiek rou rilinge simlei chung hoi ram ma ahra rou ril juija namei nu hana ma ae hikom rillo, namei hata angei thei ranga ae kom ril ranga ae.”
Asom ani sunga Judas Eskirot na thiempu ngei chungtekti kolla Jisu manikolla sonloh thingso ae.
Mani na rou hi thei juija ariem ma amota sum pe ange ta saro ei so ae. Chuna amo na ejongpa tancha ah manita pe ang mo ae ta anna rollea.
Achol tolno budol reen ahalpa rungnie ah, lanpina kelmo hi that ae chuna Jisu kolla arui ngei na sai ae, “Hoija mun na nangna kanita thing weta lanthukna bakrang innrang amunt sem ang meh?”
Chuna Amo na manui ani ta hla weta manuita ril, “Hulok hana lutto, hana apa akha na tapot choi weta tui choi am akha tuhlak kange, manu tieng juijo.
Hana malutna inn hana mitpu kolla sai oh: ‘Ka ocha na rilleh, keina karui ngei hitta lan thukna budon ha hoi peak ka mo ae?’
Amo na pot cheilim shu hap ti semsa chung tekti ka alok nangei ta ri pi ange, hana nangei na tamasha ae oh ani taranga.”
Arui na houphur weta hulok hana thingso akha chu Jisu na manui ta ril makha tuk hlaka manui na amunt hana lanthukna bakrang tama ae so.
Nani nietakka chu Jisu na arui asom ani hitta tungso ae.
Manina solhakna doukanga bakha inn ha am lei ah amo na ril, “Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rillinge, nangei kar sunga akha na keita jur ange amo ha chu keihitta bakha aminge.”
Arui ngei na lung olla apha hana makka mani akha na akha nutienga akha na arengpu ta sai, kei mo ae?”
Amo na sange, “Nahi asom ani sunga ae, amo hachu kei hitta buhu akha chakka bakha am meh.
Meesanaopa chu mataranga jiekka shi hana nujuija thing ange. Chuti weta apa atu mo nu meesanao pa ta jurra hou mee chu aol ae nu! Amo ha chu don phur no lea mataranga hella hra ange.”
Mani na bakka amlei ah, Jisu na budol dom weta jaihra ni ah akha chu ther weta arui ngeita peweta ril, “Lah oh na hi katak kae.”
Hana tuidon lah weta jaihra nie ah manita samso, akha chu manina inn so.
Jisu na manita ril, “Nahi nangei lim taranga saro eisa kathee san tolpi ae.
Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rillinge, Chungthieng athar rengram ma tungmalim chu keina nangei hitta drakkha ra tui een ha pha ang nijo weh.”
Mani na laasa weta chulphoi mulbunga thingso ae.
Jisu na manita ril, “Nangei lim pa ahlem ma tul ange nahi jieksa so ae; ‘Chungthieng na kelmo rungei ta thattange, hana kelmo ngeina adang adang hran nange,’
chuti weta karingthou juija keina nangei matienga Galily ah thing ange.”
Pitar na rilsuk chu, “Manilim na ahlem kutchunga tulhalkom, kei chu tullang nonge!”
Hana Jisu na sange, “Keina nakolla adiek rou rillinge, oh ae awoni jantienga arhongpa na woini hung matienga keita nangna woithum ngai num mang no che ae.”
Chuti weta Pitar na lea ah lea ah ril, “Ejonga keina nang hitta thit ha phao sunga kom keina nangta ngainum no ae ang nonge!”
Hahekta adangei nakom hahekta mani na rillea.
Gethsemany amuntna manina thinge, akha chu Jisu na marui ngei ta ril. “Hina hakko kanieklei pha sunga.”
Arengpu na Pitar, Jacob, akha chu Johon ta rui weta amo na lung olla solhla nea nijo weh.
Jisu na mani ta ril, “Ka muihla hi aol na lella wa ah kathit rang pha olsinge. Hina am hakkou oh, akha chu dong ratto.”
Aram ahuite lella thing weta, alei chunga tu ah amona ngeileh chu apha hi kakol hai thou lal pi oh ta nie ae.
“Abba, Pathieng,” amo na ril, “Eheilim hi nakolla chu ngainoti am no ae. Chuna kakol hai thou wa tuidon hi lapi oh. Chuti weta kahal ano lutta nahal changpi oh.”
Hana amo na arui ngei am na maleh pa chu jalhappa am tuk hlakso ae. “Simon, Pitar ta koka ril, nang jalla am ma chou? apha atan te phao dongthei ah am nea no chou?”
Amona manita ril, “Dongthei ah nie ah ta lea chu ahlem na nangta nea ang no ae. Muihla na chu di halkom pum na chu nea no ae.”
Woiha pakom amo na niek ranga thing shil so, amona chap mana ah ril shil.
Woihapa maleh sirjuija mani jalla am tuhlak kae ti chu mani mit hi ehekta rit so. Chuna manina amo ta ejongpa rillang mo dangthei nijo weh.
Woithum sunapa maleh chu manita amona rillea. “Atun phao sunga inn num ma solhla ah am chao? ngaiso ae, apha ha wa so ae an no. Meesanaopa ha pakchel ngei kut chunga jur so ae.
Thoujou oh, ani na thingsai oh. Ann oh keita jur ang pa ha hi so ae!”
Amo na tronga amlei apha hana makka asom ani sunga Judah hi rouphun ocha ngei lea chungtek ti thiempu ngei akha chu ulien chang na hla wairul rija karra champsai akha molsum choija waso ae.
Arengpu ta jurpa na mani ta amel dang ranga rou takka rillea. “Keina abe kachup apa ha ae huppo akha chu amota nangei na hrabakta hakka ruija thingo.”
Jisu kolla mathinga Judas na rillea, “Rabbi!” hana amo na chup ae.
Hana mani na maituk hakka Jisu ta mant weta hupso ae.
Mani karra aneite ngirra am akha ma champsai sat weta achunga donga am thiempu ngei rui akha hana akur tan so ae.
Jisu na rillea, “Kei hi aruthei ngei lamkai hekta, nangei na champsai akha chu molsum tolla keita mant ranga phao chau?
Rungnie chang honna keina nangei hitta mokna inn sunga chupi takpi ka-am lei chu nangei na mant no chao. Chuti weta nahi jieksa rou ha shukpi ranga ae.”
Marui lim na amota houphurveta tan hap so ae.
Rungthar akha na mapun mani salla matakka mukka punpai pai weta Jisu nutieng jui ja wakpa chu amota mani na mant rang ae so ae.
Chuti weta amona anutienga apun houphurra punsalla tan na thingso ae.
Manina Jisu ta rui ah thiempu ngei, alok ashai hana chungtekti thiempu ngei lim akha chu rouphun ocha ngei hitta bom tulhaso.
Aram alah takka Pitar kom manujuija wa ah chungtekti thiempu ngei rui shanga ulien chang ngei karra sermei am na onga am tollea.
Chungtekti thiempu ngei akha chu ulien chang ngei na Jisu hi thi ah ngei ae ta adiek rou jonge chuti weta mani na ephao tukno ae.
Mani leima tam na Jisu chunga dieklou rou rillea chuti weta mani rou lim kom adang adang so ae.
Hana mani ahre na ngir thou weta Jisu chunga dieklou rou ril shukkae.
“Keina malmashi na shak mokna inn hi hri weta rungnie nathum sunga malmashi na kutta shaklou inn akha sa nea ange ta kani maril theipha unge.”
Chutiphao sunga mani rou hi adang adang songe.
Hana chungtekti thiempu na mani maikunga ngir thou weta Jisu ta rou sai, “Nangna kani rou hi sangpi ang nijo che? na malmashi ngei na nachunga rou rilla am hi?”
Chuti weta Jisu chu hata ephau sang no lutta dai diekta am meh woihapa chungtekti thiempu na rou sai ae. “Nanghi jaihra Chungthieng sanao Messiya ah che?”
Jisu na rillea “Kei inge,” “Akha chu meesanaopa na ene-ne akha hana changtieng nakka ong weta thangwan hai thou wa sumphai karra jung ha ri ange.”
Chungtekti thiempu na maling lut therra ril so, “Hina chunga anina ejeranga makolla rou sai ang am meh?”
“Nangei na Chungthieng ta hija sathi ril hi, ejong nalung hal the chou?”
Mani lim na amo chu thi ah matik cha ae ta rillea.
Hana mani na achel amota shakka thouso, akha chu amai hump ma kut chumma phetta rillea, “Atu na nangta phet mo ae!” hana amota songkar hak ngeina bang nga amota rui thing so ae.
Pitar na innthui hana am lei ah thiempu hina rui nangak akha ma am na wa so ae.
Nangak hana Pitar na sarmei onga amna nei ah wa weta amota, nangak na ril. “Nangkom Nazarate ta Jisu hitta am mee no meh.”
Chuti weta amona ngainum no wa rillea, “Naril rou hana ephao dang nonge akha chu lunghal kom thei nonge.” Amo na ril weta inn lutna tienga shukka thingso ae. Hana arhongpa na hung so weh.
Rui nangak hana woihapa amota ripa chu ngirra ahul tunga am ngei ta ril. “Na mee hi kom manu jui mee ngei karra akha ae.”
Woihapa kom amona ngainum no ae. Apha atan te waitakka chu aneite ah ngirra am ngeina Pitar ta rillea, “Nanghi routakka mani karra akha ange, rouram chu nang hi Galily mee ae.”
Amo na matak mathei chakka sarkou thou wa akha chu saro ei weta “Kei na dang nonge na apa hina rou ah tronghlak hi.”

Apha hana makka arhongpana woini hungso ae. Hana Pitar na Jisu na matarang ril phur ha angei thei so ae, “Arhongpa na woini hungma tienga nangna keita woithum ngai ang no che ae.” Chuna madang pha juija alung tonga trap thouso ae.
Nietuk chama ah chungtekti thiempu hana ulien changei, rouphun ocha ngei manilim na lung akha chakka ngirra, manina Jisu ta huppa Pilate kut chunga pek ranga ruija thingso ae.
“Jews ngei rengpa hi nang mo ae?” Pilate na sai.
Jisu na sange, “Oh weh nang na ril shuk ha ae,”
Chungtekti thiempu na machunga dieklou rou eja rillea.
Chuna Pilate na woihapa makolla sai. “Nangna katrong sang ang no che? anno mani na nachunga dieklou rou eja rilla am meh.”
Chuti weta Jisu na chu sang no lutta am hi Pilate na ngak shukkae.
Lanpina Reen changhonna mee ngei na nie lea chu raen inn sunga am mee akha hla ti hi mani talit tamange.
Barabas ti apa hi raen inn sunga mani ram ma hulong tuilong pi karra ae, akha chu amo ha meeta that mee ae.
Chuna hana am wairul rija na hang weta Pilate kolla amatieng hlou ma ae hekta ae ranga sai ae,
“nangei na keita dit hi Jihudi ngei rengpa ta hla pinum ma chao ta sai,” Pilate na.
Chungtekti thiempu ngei na anar sarukka Jisu hi makolla pe ae ti hi dange.
Chuti weta chungtekti thiempu ngei na wairul rija ta thanum pi ah mahutta Barabas ta hla su oh.
Pilate na sai, “Chuleh chu, nangei na Jihudi ngei rengpa ta kok hita, keina ei ae oh ta ril chau?”
“Khrose chunga that to, amo ta” manilim na rol shukka au ae.
Pilate na sai, “Alowa mo ae? ejongpa hrano tullu amona ae so meh?”
Chuti phao sunga mani na ringa au, “Khrose chunga thatto amo ta!”
Pilate na akut shilveta mani lim lungdam ranga Barabas ha mani tarang hla so ae, hana amo na Jisu ta phit weta khrose chunga that ranga manita pe so ae.
Ralmee ngeina Jisu ta arengpa ruisanga ruija lutta akha chu ralmee marul, marul rachon so ae.
Manina machunga punsan pai piweta aling kumlu jelweta malubur burpi ae.
Hana manina mokka hita kokka thou so: “Sotta ringo Jews ngei Rengpa!”
Manina lea, lea ah alukang raiweta amai ah chil amota shakka ahuk hrun weta mok thou so ae.
Hana mani na amota nuiso ah punsan la-ah hou weta mapun amota seng piweta khrose chunga that rang rui ja shuk so ae.
Lampi ah aming na Simon tipa maram thouwa hulok ka waklei ah ralmee ngeina nam ma mant weta Jisu kross ronpi so. (Alexander lea Ruphos hina mapa Simon Seriny thouwa.)
Manina Jisu ta Golgotha (hina rilna chu alu saru) ti amunt na rui ah phao.
Hana manina darkha tui lea akhatui tulweta amota pe pi, chuti weta amo na inn no ae.
Mani na khrose chunga ban jam nutienga malinglut ha ther weta atu, atu na chang ang mo ta rawan an ae.
Khrose chung mani that apha hi nitak apha na eenthum ta so ae.
Amota pek maral chu mani na malu chunga hita jiekka shi ae: “JEWS NGEI RENGPA.”
Manina amo hitta aru thei ani ta kom khross chunga aban jam shi ae ma changtienga akha na ma-oi tienga.
(Jiekka shisha rou nujuija arengpu chu aral am mee ngei karra akha so ae ta rilleh.)
Hana anei ah aleh ahong thingei na amo ta nuiso semso ah alu hai ah ril. “Oh nange nu athieng mokna inn hri weta rungnie nathum sunga sa angpa ha.”
Atun “Khrose chunga tumweta nathei ah nangna kal oh!”
Hahekta chungtekti thiempu ngei akha chu rouphun ocha ngei na kom Jisu ta ann weta nuiso ah, ril, “Amo na mee adang ta sanne ae, chuti weta mathei chakka matarang chu sanne no ae!”
Israel, ngei rengpa hi khross chung hai thou tumma jung su oh atun chuleh ani mit makka ri lea chu anina Khrista ae ta ngoiring ange!”
Amo hitta khrose chunga ani nakom amota trongchop ril phur ae.
Chuna chanutieng apha aruk hai thou wa janting apha aku takmalim ma ram lim thiemma am.
Hana apha aku takjuija Jisu na sanrol shukka trappa ril, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” hina rilna chu, “Ka Chungthieng, ka Chungthieng, alo wa keita hla ah hou che?”
Aneite ah ngirra am ahre na hita rilleh, “Ngei oh amo hi Elija ta kokka am meh!”
Apa akhana tanna thing weta patrung athur tui lupweta ulunga thil ah arengpu inn ranga peweta ril, “Hak ri oh! Alijah na junga amota khrose heithou choi ah tum mota anina ann ri eiyo!”
Jisu na sanrol ringa au weta mamuihla hla so ae.
Athieng innsunga banga shi pun ha ani shukka achung tieng hai thou wa athui atreem na phao ther so ae.
Ralmee rija hana mitpu anei takka ngirra am ah Jisu thit ha ri jui ah amo na ril, “Rou takka amohi Chungthieng asanaopa ange.”
Aram ala takka namei ahre nakom an na am. Mani kara Magadalin Mary unga Jacob lea Josi hina manu Mary akha chu salome.
Na numei nu ngei na Galily hai thou wa manu juija akha chu amota san na wurra hange. Mani leima tam adang ngei kom Jerushalem hai thou phao ah hang ngei kom hana am tol ae.
Nani ha sem sanie rungnie ae. (ha chu sabath rungnie matienga ae.) nitlak apha nai ah wa so ae.
Arimathiaja ram ma Josep ulien changei karra kom ajak ati shak hana amo chu Chungthieng reng ram taranga hakka am na Pilate kolla ephao ati ajak am no lutta Jisu hina pum sai wa ae.
Jisu hi thi so weh thei ah Pilate na ngakka ralmee riha mitpu ta kokka sai, routakka Jisu thi sho jo meh.
Ralmee riha hina mitpu kolla routakka thi so ae madangpha juija athi sa pum Josep ta pe pi so ae.
Chuna Josep na pun mukka choi ja wa weta apum ha choija tum so, hana mukka hana hlum weta sumlung vit weta shak hlanhur sunga uiso ae. Hana amona hlanhur mai ah alung akha na humma dolla shiso.
Madalini Mary akha chu Josi manu Mary na hoi amunt na jalpi si mo manui na ri phur ae.
Sabath rungnie huwarra Magadalin Mary Jacob manu Mary akha chu Salome manina ariem ahoi Sirik Jisu takka not ranga choija phao ae.
Hapta ah ahalpa rungnie innthou hana nie shuk in len mani na hlan kung lampi tienga thing so ae.
Mani akha lea akha na hita sai hlak kae, “Sumlung hlan mai ah am chu atu na lettang meh?”
Chuti weta sumlung ha mani rijuija chu hoija lok sumlung ha letta thing hak so ae.
Mani na hlan hur sunga lut juija punngou pai rungthar akha changtienga onga am ri so. Chuna manina ngak shukso ae.
Amo na ril, “Ephao ngak no oh,” “Nangei na khrose chunga that Nazarate Jisu ta an phao ah no chao? amo chu ringthou so amo ta jalpi shi na amunt hi an no, amo chu hina am nijo weh.
Chuna thingo, marui ngei akha chu Pitar ta rillo amo ha nangei matieng hai ta Galily ah thingso ae. Hana nangei na amota ri pha ange nangei ta maril la houphur chu hekta.”
Hlan kung hai thou wa namei ngei na hirra akha chu angak shukka tanna thingso ae. Manina atu akha kolla ril no ae. Rouram chu mani tit na jarra.
Jisu na hapta sunga ahalpa rungnie angal apha ah ringthou ah hlawang sari majul hla Magadalin Mari kolla masha ah ri pi.
Amo na thing weta amo hitta am ha phur ngai akha chu mataranga lung olla trappa am ngei ta takpi ae.
Jisu ringso weh ta akha chu namei nu na ri pha inge ta nahi thei juija mani na ephao ngoiring no ae.
[Hana takka Jisu na mel adanga mani ram tienga thing ha ani kolla ripi ae.
Hana mani lea weta amphur ngei kolla rou takjuija mani na ngoiring no ae.
Anutieng chu Jisu na asomakha na bakkha leija ripi; hana mani ngoiring no akha chu lung hir riweta manita trongsi ah rillea. Rouram chu Jisu ringthou ri ngei kolla mani na ngoiring no ae.
Manita amo na ril, “Simlei ram lim ma thing weta ahra rou hi chupi oh.
Atu jongpa na ngoi ring weta baptias ae mee ta chu sanpi ange, chuti weta atu jongpana ngoiring no lea chu amota lalpi ange.
Keita ngoiring mee ngei kolla roumuh shu pi ange, kaminga manina hlawang ta julla hou nea ange hana mani na trong athar rillange.
Manina mani kut takka arul sar ange; akha chu manina thit ranga tur inn halkom mani kolla ephao tong nea ang no ae; manina ana am ngei pum chunga mani kut shi juija kom ana ngei ha dam mange.”
Arengpu Jisu na mani kolla rou hi ril su nutienga amo chu thanwan na ruija kalla Chungthieng ban changtinga onga am.
Hana arui ngeina shukka thing weta amunt aram adang, adanga, rou ril thinge akha chu arengpu na mani hitta tullu lu ha na mani rou ha ta lingno wa danga am meh.]
Lungshit Theophilus:
Ani kolla shuk eheilimpa ha jiekka thangkou ranga malmashi ngei na mani nea makhai ae so ae.
Athouna hai thou mani mitta ri ngei akha chu rou rilla rol ngei ha mani na jiekso.
Chuna nakolla kom ahra ange, athou na hai thou wa eheilim ha adiek takka lung rang shukka nakolla akha chu nutienga akha ta hrabak ta jiek num minge, chungtekti Theophilus.
Na tullu hina nang na adiek rou lim nadangpha juija chupi nea ange.
Judia ram sunga Herod na reng changlei apha sunga thiempu hana ming chu Zekariah amo chu thiempu Abijah ngei kot ae anamei ming chu Elizabeth, amo kom thiempu ngei kot sung ae.
Manui ani mak na Chungtheing ningtienga ahra ah ringa Arengpu aril trong juija am meh.
Manui ha nao sal ae rou ram chu Elizabeth ha nao am no ae akha chu namei ha lea Zakariah kom leima ulien so ae.
Nahani akha ah Zakariah na, thiempu akha changa inn thienga matun mahlou ron na am lei sunga.
Thiempu akha hina yik anu juija Arengpu inn thieng sunga maicham ma ariem hoi sarmei hol rang amota hal so, chuna amona Arangpu inntheing-nga lutso weh marungnie shukso.
Ariemhoi sarmei holla amlei sunga wairul riha malmashi ngei na awau wa nie ae ah am.
Arengpu wanrui na ariemhoi sarmei holna maicham changtienga ngirra amota ri pi so.
Zakariah na amota rijui ja leima atri ah hir so.
Chuti weta wanrui na makolla ril, “Zakariah atri no oh! Chungtheing na naniena theipi so ae anno na-namei Elizabeth na spa akha don nange nangna aming Johon ta bo oh.
Chuna nangna eja ah ariem ahoi tul shukkang akha chu madon juija malmashi ngei nakom eja ah ariem mange!
Amo hi arengpu ningtienga arat athei mee chang ange drakha tui kom ju kom inn nangno ae. Hana adon hai thou wa amota muihla athiengna shi pi ange.
Akha chu amo na Israel malmashi ngei ta mani arengpa Chungthieng ningtienga ruija lea ange.

Amona Arengpu matienga thing weta rouphupa Elija hekta arat athei ange. Amona mapa ngeileh unga ngei woiha rachun pi ange; amona ariljuino malmashi ngeita adiek lamma lea rang lung rang pe ange; amo na Arengpu mee ngei ta mataranga thourang ae pi ange.”
Zakariah na wanrui ta ril, “Alo ta keina na hi dangpha ang meh? Kei chu ulien chang singe akha chu kanamei kom ulien so ae.”
Wanrui na sange, “Kei hi Gebariel linge” “Chungthieng mai ah ngir aminge, keita nakolla rou rillanga akha chu nataranga ahra rou ril ranga.

Chuti weta karou hi nangna ngoiring no che ae, nahina apha cha ah routakka shukkang sa ae. Nangoiring no jarra natrong shuk kang no che ae; nakolla kasaro eisa hina adiek takka shuk malim chu nang hata am mang che ae.”
Nalei apha sunga malmashi ngei na Zakariah ta ngakka hakka am meh, alo wa athieng inn sunga hichan sot am mota.
Amo na mashuk juija manikolla ephou trongne no, chuna mani na dangpha so amo ta ripi akha inn thienga am so ae trong shukka rou ril nea no sarukka makut takka am na dangpi so.
Innthienga matun mahlou apha treem ma Zakariah ma inn lam ma lea so,
Hana nutienga chu Elizabeth nao ron na hla nga inn na lingno wa am.
“Amo na ril atun chu keita arengpu na keita sanpi so ae” Amo na mee ngei maikunga keita ajak pe nijo ae.
Elizabeth na hlaruk nao ron sunga Chungthieng na wanrui Gebariel ta Galily Nazareth hulokka hla.
Arengpa David kot hai thou aming na Josep ti spa na reikung silsha saro ei ah shi nangak Mary kolla rouril lea.
Wanrui na makolla phao weta ril, “Nakolla adai am su oh! Arengpu na nakolla am so ae akha chu amona nakolla lokka jaihra pe so ae!”
Wanrui rouril hina Mary alung thukka aol pokso,
akha chu amo na ejongpa
ril na mo nu ta angak shuk so.
Wanrui na ril, “Tri no oh, Mary;
Chungtheing na nangta ehekta lungshi ae.
Nangna nao ron weta spa akha don nange
aming chu Jisu ta kokkange.
Amo hi arat athei ange hana amota
chungtekti Chungtheing sanao pa ae ta
kok kange, Rengpu Chungtheing na amota
mapa David phomlu pe ange.
Akha chu amo na Jacob tu te ngei karra Rengpa chang ange treem am no ah, mareng ram na atreem amang no ae.!”
Mary na wanrui ta ril, “Kei chu athieng snu inge, chuna nahi alo ta shuk kang meh?”
Wanrui na sang, “Muihla athieng na nakolla jung ange, akha chu Chungthieng jaitha na nakolla solha ange hina rou sarukka athieng naosan ha, Chungthieng sanao ta kok kange.
Nasakai Elizabeth phao kom ulien chang sanutienga unga am so ae, anno amo ha atun hla aruk su so ae.
Hina tak chu Chungthieng na nea no ephao am no ae.”
“Kei hi arengpu kor inge” ta Mary na ril, “Naril chu hekta kakolla shuk shu oh,” hana wanrui na houphur so amo ta.
Hana waitakka Mary na ranga potsem weta Mullon Judea ram hullokka thing.
Amo na Zakariah inn na thing weta Elizabeth ta riem ma tuk hlakso.
Mary na riem ma ril rou thei ah Elizabeth na thei phajui mawon sunga unga na lingso. Hana Elizabeth hi muihla athieng na shiso.
Akha chu sanrol shukka ril, “Namei lim chunga jaihra ha nange akha chu nadon nang unga ha kom jaihra ae!
Alo wa hija alok hi kakolla shukpi mo nu, ha chu karengpu hina manu kei ta vengpi meh?
Nahi kathei pha inlen kawon sunga am unga na ariem ma chom meh.
Arengpu rouril nangoiring hi eja ah ariem pi meh, nakolla rou takka shuk kange!”
Mary na ril,
“Ka muihla na arengpu ta dom minge;
kamuihla hi ariem minge,
roulam chu Chungthieng hi keita sanpipa ae;
Roulam chu arengpu amo na asul makor ta anpi,
anno atun hai thou wa meelim na
keita ariem nu ta kok kange.
Roulam chu enene Chungthieng na kachunga alok tullu lu so ae.
Maming chu athieng ae;
Meerul akha thou meerul akha ta amona lungsi pe ae,
akha chu atu yong amota atri azak pe lim ngei ta.
Arengpu na maban pom dokka mane jai tha ripi so.
Akha chu amo na mani lunghal
sarukka lok chok ngei ta pumchok chokpi so.
Amo na ane angam rengpa ngei ta mani phomlu
hai thou kai tum weta thui
tek ti ngei ta chungtinga dom.
Amona wontam ngei ta ahra pot peweta wanhoppi.
Akha chu achongpu ngei ta kut rukka hla.
Amona pipu ngei ta saro mashi hana amona
akor Israel ngeita sang ranga junge.
Abraham kolla ringrei ngeipi ange ti kom
makno ae akha chu matu mate
ngei ta kom atreem nei no wa!”
Mary na Elizabeth kolla hla inn thum am ha weta ma inn na lea so.
Elizabeth na ma naosan don rang apha pha ah amona spa akha don so.
Ma inn ning kolla am ngei akha chu a-u-anao ngei na theipha juija arengpu na eja ah hra ah angakpi ah meh, makolla hana mani na amo hitta riem ha so.
Naosan na hapta pha ulien jui ja mani na amota asar tan pi, akha chu mani na Zakariah aming hekta bo anga ae.
Chuti weta manu na ril, “Ano ae! maning ha Johon ta kok kange.”
Mani na manu ta ril, “Nasakai na-natei sunga hijongpa ming akha phao am no ae!”
Chunapa chu amota hi unga hi aming alo ta bo ang meh ta mani na mapa kolla dangpi ae.
Zekariah na jiekka ngei salep akha sai, ah, “Maming chu Johon,” mani makhai na alo ta ngaksha!
Hana apha makka Zekariah atrong woiha lea ah shukka akha chu Chungthieng ta amo na dom thou so.
Mani inn ning tultieng atri hap so akha chu na routhar hina sarukka Judiah mullon ram sunga thangso.
Chuna naosan hi alo ti tul shuk kang mo nu ta rou thei meelim lungsunga song hlakkae, rou lam chu arengpu kut na amo hitta am ha jarra.
Johon mapa Zekariah hi muihla athieng na shihakta Chungthieng rou ril:
“Israel ngei Arengpu Chungthieng ta anina dom ha shai oh!
amona maphao hi mamee ngei ta san ranga akha chu manita aol hai thou hlapi rang nga ae.
Amona anita arat a thei Sanpipa pepi so ae,
makor David hina atu ate ngei thou wa.
amona athieng thiempu hei thou wa saro ei so ae, apha eja matienga.
Chuna amo na anita anda ngei
hai thou wa ani ta sanpi ange,
akha chu hrano ngei kut chunga hai thou kom.
Amona ril ae ani pi pu ngei kolla malungshit ri pi ae
akha chu masaro ei ha angei thei ange.
Anipa Abraham kolla riem ma saro ma ei ha.
Anita anda ngei kut chung hai thou hlapi ange hana ani atri am no lutta amota hlou ae ranga.
Ani ringa hanga rungnie chang honna
mamai kunga athieng akha chu diekka am rang.
“Akha chu na ngei kasanao ngei, na ngei ta chungtakti Chungthieng rouphu ngeita kok kange:
Roulam chu arengpu matienga thing weta
ma lam san ranga.
Mamee ngei ta san rang na chu
ani pak ha kok pi so weta ril ranga.
Nahi ani Chungthieng chu ma ringreithei akha lungnem thei ae.
Athiem thuija akha chu athi hla sunga ani ta warpi so ae.
Akha chu thangwan hai thou wa
atheim athi sa hla ah ringa am ngei ta warpi
hana adai lam pi ah kalchoi lamkai rang.”
Unga hana pum lea mamuihla chu lokka hang juija, amo na Israel malmashi ngei maikunga marungni pha malim chu ramrukka hata ring ange meelim na dang malim chu.
Agustus Kaisar rengpa na reng chang lei apha ah, Rome na pal ramlim hi masing thit ranga trangsan shukpi ae.
Syria ah Quirinius na Governor change hana ahalpa masing thi ae.
Malmashi lim na maming chal ranga mani hu lokka thing so.
Chuna Josep kom Galily Nazareth Judea hina Bethlehem ram David hulokka tungso, rouram chu amo hi David sakai akha chu inn sung sarukka.
Amona mataichang ranga reikung siella shi saroei ah shi naoron Mary hitta ming chal ranga thinge.
Akha chu mani na Bethlehem ma amlei chu Mary na nao don rang apha nei so ae.
Chuna ahalpa masanao pa donso, hana pun na hlum weta shachik bakna hengkunga jalla shi ae, rouram chu mee tung rang inn mani tarang am no jarra.
Ram hana kelmo rungei na loupok ka riekka mani kelmo jantienga runga am meh.
Arengpu wanrui na mani mai kunga mel muh ah, akha chu arengpu ma hung ma jai na mani chunga war pi so. Mani ha leima tri so.
Chuti weta wanrui na mani ta ril, “Atri no oh kei na nangei taranga ahra rou ron na phao inge, nahina malmashi lim taranga ehekta ariem pi range.
Awoni rungnie mak hina David ram hulokka nangei ta Sanpipa Khrista arengpu don so ae!
Nangei dang rang chu: Unga ha pun na hlum weta asha bakna hengkunga jalla am tuk kange.”
Hana apha makka thangwan tienga wanrui abom ngei na rachon weta Chungthieng ta riemma laa sha weta dom meh.
“Chungthieng ajai hina thangwan na chungtek su oh,
akha chu malungshit ngei kom alei
chunga kom adai chang su oh.”
Wanrui ngei na wantienga mani lea su takka kelmo rungei na mani mashel ril hlakkae, “Ani na Bethlehem ma thing weta arengpu na anita rilpa shukka am rou ril an thing sai oh.
Chuna manina ranga phao weta Mary akha chu Josep hana shachikpek na hengkung sunga jalla am rihlakso.
Kelmo rungei na amota rijuija wanrui na naosan hana rouram ma ril na ha takso.
Kelmo rungei na rouril thei meelim na ama-acha shuk so.
Mary na nalimpahi angai thei ah, hana taranga lung thukka hal.
Kelmo rungei kolla ril chu hekta, theipha akha chu mitta rimakhai lim taranga manina Chungthieng ajai phu ah arengpu amota riemma domma lea so.
Rungnie narit su nie ah unga ha asar tan rang apha ah amo ha Jisu ta bo so. Na aming hi amo ta ron ma hai thou wa wanrui ngaina pek minge.
Moses hina roukung anu juiya mapha pha ah Josep lea Mary na Jerushalem ma thiengpi ranga akha chu pekranga ruiya kalso.
Arengpu hina roukung anujuiya jiekka shi ae, “Masha ah don spa chu arengpu taranga pe su oh.”
Mani na rithoi ranga, “Urhu ani ano lea paipi sanao kom choi ae rou lam chu arengpu hana rou kunga tolsa sou chu.”

Hanalei apha ah Simeon ti spa akha Jerushalem ma ringa am phur ae. Amo hi leima ahra akha chu Chungthiengta ajak atri, hana Israel ngeita sampi ange ta hakka am spa akha ae. Muihla athieng hana makolla am meh.
Amo hi arengpu Khrista ta mel ri malim ma thi ang no che ae ta muihla athiengna amota rilsukpi so.
Chuna muihla na lamkai ah Simeon na inn thieng lutso. Roukung anu juiya arengpu taranga mapa lea manu na unga Jisu ta rui lutso.
Simeon na unga ha poi weta Chungthieng ta dom so ae.
“Atunchu Arengpu nangna nata rouril limha rouraen ah shi che ae, hana nangna nasuuk ta dai ah thingpi so che ae.
Kamit makka keina nata aring kaetlo risinge.
Malmashi ngei lim maikunga nashem nashi ha:
Jat adang ngei tarang nawarpi ha akha chu na mee
Israel ngei taranga nahung najai nachoi phao ha.”
Unga hina mapa akha chu manu na Simeon na mataranga roulam ma ril lim hina yama-acha shukso.

Simeon na manita jaihra pe weta manu Mary ta ril, “Na unga hi Chungthieng na ahalsa ae rou lam chu atul sa Israel atampa ngei aring kaetlo pha rang amo hi Chungthieng kolla hai thou anealah ae malmashi eja na anda ah rou rillange,
akha chu thuppa shi lunghal lim kom dangpi ange. Hana apop chamsai hana nalung ha kui pi ange.”
Asher jati ah Phanuel sanaonu thiempu Anna ti akha am phur ae. Amo hi leima ulien so ae maluhong su takka apisal hitta kum sari ring ha ae.
Kum somrit innly phao arong nu changa amo na nisoun jantieng bu hai ah akha chu mokka nie ya Chungthieng inn thieng hla hao no ae.
Hana lei apha makka amokom tunga Chungthieng ta riem ma dom ma unga hana roulam ma ril, atu jongpa Chungthieng ta hakka am Jerushalem ngei ta sanpi ange.
Josep lea Mary na arengpu roukung hana anu juiya ae phung shuk eya lim su weta manui hulok Nazareth Galily tienga lea so.
Unga na lokka hanga arat shukso; amo ha lungsing na shihakti ae akha chu Chungthieng jaihra na machunga am meh.
Kum changhon na Jisu nu-pa na Jerushalem ma lanpina reen tol thinge.
Jisu na kum asom ani pha juiya mani na thinga hang hekta reen tol thinge.
Reen ha sutakka inn na lea rang thing thou so chuti weta Jisu chu Jerushalem ma amphur so. Manu mapa na chu nahi dangpha no.
Mani hal chu mani tonpi ngei karra tol ae ta chuna rungnie akha lampi mani thing juiya mani u-nao akha chu atronpi ngei karra tol rang so ae ta jong thou so.
Mani na amota tukno pa chu manuina Jerushalem tienga amo ta jong thing so.
Rungnie nathum su nie ah inn thienga amota tukso. Amo chu Jewish ocha ngei hitta ong ha weta rou ngei ya akha chu rou sai ah am meh.
Lungsing lungwar hra ah sanga ma am ri weta thei ya am meelim na ama-acha shukso.
Manu mapa na amota rijuiya angak shukso, manu na amota ril, “Kasanao oh alo wa hijong hi kani kolla ae ah che? napa lea keina atripi makhai lung olla nangta jong unge.”
Mani ta amona sang, “Ejeranga keita jonga cha meh? nangei na dangpha no chao kei hi kapa in na am mange ti hi?”
Chuti weta manui na masang hina rou hi lunghal thei no ae.
Chunapa chu Jisu na manui hita Nazareth ta lea tol so. Ti chu mani kolla aril jui mee ah jarra hana manu na chu roulam lim hi malung sunga hrabakta shi ae.
Jisu hi pum ma akha chu lungwar ani mak lokka hanga Chungthieng na akha chu meelim na lungshit na hella hangpi ae.

Tiberius kaisar na palla hang kum asom ranga ah, Judea ram sunga Pontius Pilate na Governor changa akha chu Herod na Galilee ah pallei, hana anaopa Phelip na Iturea akha chu Trakonitis ah palle, Lysanias na Abilene na pal ae.
Hana Annas lea Kaijapha chungtekti thiempu changa amleiya ramrukka Zekariah sanaopa Johon kolla Chungthieng rou tungso.
Chuna Jordan turiella am ram lim pa ah Johon na thinga rouril, “Pak hai thou wa Chungthieng am na lea jo oh hana baptias ae oh, napaklim silpi ange.”
Rouphupa Thiempu Isaiah na abai sunga jiekka shi so ae:
“Ramrukka atu mo akha na rol shukka au ae:
‘rengpa lam satto;
malam ha hrabakta dokpi oh mathing rang!
Lam kutta am makhai alei thullo,
hana mullon makhai tana tan weta mana pi oh.
Chuna lampi akai am no lutta hra pi oh.
Malmashi ringchang limpa na Chungthieng aring kaetlo ri ange!’ ”
Wairul riha na Johon am na baptias lak ranga phao ae. Johon na manita ril, “Arul sanao ngei.” Chungthieng na lungshat hi nangei kolla atu na hlik nea ange ta ril sha?

Lung hlonga ara ra oh, hana nangei thei chakka nangei rilhlak Abraham hi kani pa ae ti ha chan jou oh, roulam chu kei na nangei kolla ril num inge Chungthieng na, alung ngei ta Abraham sanao ngei changpi nea ae.
Thingkung atro ah tan ranga arei thourang ae so ae. Thei ara ra no thingkung makhai ta tan weta sarmai ah deng ange.”
Malmashi ngei na amo ta sai, “Chuleh chu kani na ejongpa tullu lu ang sha?”
Amo na sang, “Atuyongpa na linglut ani am lea chu atuyong am no akha ta pe shu oh akha chu bu am mee kom bakha su oh.”
Khasana hrai ahre kom baptias ae rang phao weta manina amota sai, “Ocha kani na e aeta meh?”
Manita amo na ril, “Nangei na hrai phung shuk ta lella hrai no oh.”
Ralmee ngei nakom amo ta sai, “Kani chu? eyongpa tullu lu ang sha?”
Amo na mani ta ril, “Atuyongei kolla yairaat ah sum lah no oh hana atu yong akha ta kom dieklao aral pe no oh nadon hana ahop chango.”
Malmashi ngei na lungranga thouso hana manina ngakthouso. Johon hi Messaiah ah ange ta.

Chuna Johon na mani ta ril, “Kei na nangeita tui sunga baptias ae pi singe chuti weta keita lella loktek ti akha phao ange, kei chu makae bur rui phao hla rang kane am no ae. Amo na nangei ta muihla athieng akha chu sarmei ah baptias ae pi ange.
Arengpu loupokka sang reina amunt lokka semma shi ae sangha arengpu na masrra bom mange Arengpu balei makutta am mehi chuna sangshi makhaita atreem nei lao sermei kumma deng ange.”
Akha chu Johon na adang, adang riemma dom na rou rilla mani ta ahra routhar rilpi ae.
Chuti weta Johon na Herod kolla manaopa namei Herodias sarukka akha chu adang hrano matullu taranga tronghsi ril.
Herod na eheilim chunga hikom hap then so, ti chu Johon ta kom hajok sunga shi so.
Malmashi lim na baptias ae su nutienga Jisu kom baptias ae so. Chuna amona prathana ma ae leiya thangwan hongso.
Hana muihla athieng na machunga wurhruh pum hekta chungso, wanram tieng hai thou sanrol akha ma yunga, “Nang hi kalungshit kasanao ae, nakolla keina leima pelsinge.”
Jisu na tun hlou ae thou makum hi somthum ulien so. Amo hi Josep sanao ae Josep na Heli sanao ae.
Matthat sanaopa, Levi sanaopa, Melki sanaopa Jannai sanaopa, Josep sanaopa.
Mattathias sanaopa Amos sanaopa, Nahum sanaopa Esli sanaopa Naggai sanaopa.
Maath sanaopa, Mattathias sanaopa Semein sanaopa, Josech sanaopa, Joda sanaopa.
Joanan sanaopa, Rhesa sanaopa, Zerubbabel sanaopa, Shealtiel sanaopa. Neri sanaopa,
Melki sanaopa, Addi sanaopa Kosam sanaopa Elmadam sanaopa, Er sanaopa.
Joshua sanaopa, Eliezer sanaopa. Jorim sanaopa Matthat sanaopa Levi sanaopa.
Simion sanaopa, Judah sanaopa, Josep sanaopa Jonam sanaopa. Eliakim sanaopa.
Melea sanaopa, Menna sanaopa, Mattatha sanaopa, Nathan sanaopa, David sanaopa.
Jesse sanaopa, Obed sanaopa, Boaz sanaopa, Salmon sanaopa, Nahshon sanaopa.
Amminadab sanaopa, Ram sanaopa, Hezron sanaopa, Perez sanaopa, Judah sanaopa.
Jacob sanaopa Isaac sanaopa Abraham sanaopa Terah sanaopa Nahor sanaopa,
Serug sanaopa, Reu sanaopa, Peleg sanaopa, Eber sanaopa. Shelah sanaopa,
Kainan sanaopa Arphaxad sanaopa, Shem sanaopa. Noah sanaopa, Lamech sanaopa.
Methuselah sanaopa Enoch sanaopa, Jared sanaopa, Mahalalel sanaopa, Kenan sanaopa,
Enosh sanaopa, seth sanaopa, Adam sanaopa Chungthieng sanaopa.
Jordon hai thou wa Jisu hi muihla athieng na shihakta maleh juiya Muihla na amota ram rukka rui so.
Hana amota rungnie somly hrano muihla na hlemma, na rungnie lei sunga ephao bakno inn no. Hana atreem ang tieng chu amo hi vontam thouso.
Hrano Muihla na amota ril, “Ejonga nang Chungthieng sanaopa lea chu, na alung ngei hi budol changrang rillo.”
Jisu na sange, nahi jieksha ae, “Nalmashi ngei na budol chak bak weta ringno ae.”
Hrano muihla na amota chungtekti amunt akha ah lamkai ah thing weta simlei chunga ram lim ripi so ae.
Hana amo na makolla ril, “Keina mangta nalimpa hi nakut chunga pe ange nahi ka kut chunga pek sa so ae, chuna atu mo tieng kapek num mee akha ta keina pe nea inge.
Chuna nangna kei ta mok ta lea chu na lim pa hi natarang ae.”
Jisu na sange, “Nahi jieksha so ae, nangna narengpa Chungthieng ta chak mok weta matun mahlou dom su oh.”
Hrano muihla na Jerushalem ma chungtekti athieng inn chunga ngir pi ah, “Ejonga nangna Chungthieng sanaopa ta lea chu nathei chakka chomma hina hai thou tummo, amo naril.
Roulam chu jiekka shi so ae, ‘Nataranga Chungthieng wanrui ngei nangta san ranga trongsan pe ange.’
Hita ko rilla shi ae, ‘Manikutta nangta domma shi ange chuna nakae ah alung theng pi ang no ae.’ ”
Jisu na sang, “Jiekka shi sha na ril, ‘Nangna narangpu Chungthiengta chang anno oh.’ ”
Chuna mahlem manglim sunutienga tan cha akha phamalim taranga hrano Muihla na arengpu am na haithou shukka thingso.
Muihla athieng jaitha ha makolla am ma, Jisu na Galily ah lea so. Chuna marou hi ram sanglim ah.
Synagogue sunga machu pi hi meelim na amo ta dom so weh.
Malok mashei hangna Nazareth ta amona thinga Sabbath rungnie ah mani talit nujuja synagogue ka lut so. Hana amona ngir thou weta athieng rou ril pha so.
Akha chu rouphupa Isaiah abai ha makut chunga pe so ae chuna abai ha hong weta jiekka shi sa roumunt akha tukso.
“Arengpu muihla athieng na kakolla am meh,
roulam chu amo na kei ta sara ngei taranga routhar sam rang hal pi so ae.
Hana amo na hajook sunga am ngei ta kom hla ranga keita hla so ae
hana mitcho ngei ri pi ranga;
