athuiya dolla shi ngei ta phong ranga.
Arengpu na mamee ngei ta san ranga apha neiso ae ta dang pi ranga.”
Chuna abai ha hlep sier weta hana am meeta lehpi weta amona ong so. Chuna synagogue sunga am malmashi lim mit na amota ann so.
Hana amona manita hita ril thou so. “Awoni nangei thei rou chu jiek sha abai hi adiek ka shuk so ae.”
Chuna mani na ahra marou matrong rilhlakka arengpu mur hai thou lungshi trongsan hana manina ngakka rilleh, “Amo hi Josep sanao pa no mo ae?”
Hana amona manita ril, “Suinowa nangei na keita na pramant hi ril ange, ‘maipa nang dam mo.’ Hana Kapharnahum ma na ae kani thei chu hekta nahu mak hina kom aeyo.”
Chuna arengpa na ril, “Keina nangei ta adiek takka rillinge, Chungthieng rou sam ngei ta atu akha na phao maram sunga mee na riemtuk num no ae.”
“Hana keina routakka nangei kolla rillinge Elija apha ah kum inthum hla ruk thangwan thinga simlei chung ehekta bu tang utang shukka Israel ngei hi atam pa arong chang hom meh;
Chuphao sunga atu akha na Israel karra Elija ta hla no ae. Chuti weta Sidon ram ma Zarephath arongnu na chak hla ae.
Akha chu Elisha rouphupa mapha ah kom Israel sunga raichi ehekta am hom meh, chuti chun atu akha phao dam no ae Syrian Naaman chakke.”
Synagogue sunga am malmashi lim na rou hi thei jui ya lungsha so.
Mani lim na ngir thou weta amota hulok hai thou ruiya shukka mani hulok sak rang mullon na ruiya kalso, mani ae chu amo hi ahai rakotta luiya hla ranga.
Chuti weta amo chu mani kar sunga lenga hata malampi ah thingso.
Kapharnahum Galily hulokka amona tumma jung weta Sabbath rungnie ah malmashi ngei ta chupi takpi thouso.
Machupi matakpi rou hi mane-matik tolla mani lim na angak shukso.
Synagogue sunga hrano muihla dijabol na lut spa akha am meh, amona sanrol shukka au weh.
“Kani ta ejongpa di ah cha meh? Nazareth ta Jisu. Naphao hi kanita thugai anga che? keina nangta dang unge atu mo ti ha, Chungthieng hina rouril mee ae!”
Jisu na ril, “Lang no oh!” makolla hai thou shukko!” chuna mani lim maikunga spa hata denga hou phurra alim akai am no lutta shukka thingso.
Malmashi lim pana ngakka akha lea akha ril hlakkae, “Hahi eyongpa rou ah sa? Ane jaitha akha tolla hi spana hra no muihla ta kom shukranga trongsan ril nea hi, hana manna shukka thing!”
Chuna routhar hi mani ram sunga ahul tunga thangso.
Jisu na Synagogue hou phurra Simon inn na thingso. Hana leiya Simon mapi chu atrun nokka am meh, chuna mani na Jisu kolla ril.
Chunapa chu Jisu na thinga mapanga ngir weta hitta ril atrun nok mak nang makol hei thou dam oh rilpa chu atrun nok ha damsho, hana amoha thou ah mani karra hak tol sho.
Semnie na lut su takka malmashi ngei na Jisu kolla adang adang rai eja rui phao wa Jisu na mani chunga makut shi weta dam pi so.

Chu-chunga hrano dijabol na kom mee ngei hai thou shukka Khrista chu Chungthieng sanaopa ae ta rol shukka au wa shuk so. Chuti weta Jisu na hrano muihla ngeita trongno ranga rou ril ae, roulam chu manina amoha Messaiah ae ti hi dange.
Hu war juiya Jisu na adai ram munt akha ah shukka thingso. Chuna meelim na chu amota jonga jonga ma am na phao weta mani am na hai thou shukka thingno rang hamma shi num meh.
Chuti weta amona ril, “Kei hi Chungthieng rengram ahra rou trong hi hullok adanga kom ril thing ange, rouram chu keita hana taranga hla ae.”
Chuna ram sunga am Synagogue amunt chang honna rourille.
Jisu na Gennesaret tuikum hou wa ngirra Chungthieng rou rilla malmashi ngei na marou ngei num ma makolla julla wahom leija.
Amona tuikum sunga kung ani am ri so, chuti weta kung sunga tuiriek mant mee chu mani len sella kung sunga am no ae.
Jisu na Saimon kungsunga lut weta, tui hou wa kung ella wakranga rilla Jisu na kung chunga onga wairul riha ta chupi takpi thou so.
Jisu na rou ril su takka, Saimon kolla ril, “Kung hi tui athuk tienga ella lut oh, hana nanui ani na len ha tuiriek mant ranga dengo.”
Saimon na sang, “Mitpu, janjei shotta kanuina ephao mant nea no ae, chuti weta narou anu juija kei na len hi deng ang singe.”
Manui na len denga tuiriek haja matik tolla len ha ther ang ae so.
Chuna adang manui tonpi ta sanpi rang kokka atronpi ngei na wa weta sanpi so, hana kung animakha tuiriek na shihak ti ah kung animak tui sunga luttang ae so.
Saimon Pitar na shukka am hi riveta Jisu maikunga huk hrun weta mokka ril, “Ka am na hai thou wa thingo Arengpu! Kei chu ehekta jaishi spa inge!”
Amo akha chu adang makolla amtol ngei na haja matik tam tui riek mant ri weta angak shukso.
Chuhekta Zebedee sanao rel Jacob lea Johon manui ha Saimon tonpi ae, hana Jisu na Saimon ta ril, “Hina sarukka ephao atri no oh, nang mee mant mee chang ang so che.”
Hana mani kung ha tui hou wa choija wakjui ja manina eheilimpa houphur weta Jisu nutieng juiso.
Jisu na hulok akha ah amlei apha ah raichi spa akha na phao ah Jisu mel mari juija amai alei tienga hai weta hita ril, “Arengpu oh ejonga nangna ngei pi lea chu keita nang na thiengpi nea che ae.”
Chuna Jisu na makut dok shuk weta makolla tonga ril, “Ngeipi sange; thieng jou oh.” Hana apha makka raichi na makolla houphurra dam so.

Jisuna makolla hita rou ril, “Atu akha kolla rilno oh; Chuti weta jang nga thiempu kolla, hana amona nakolla an su oh, chuna meelim kolla nangha hra so ae ti dang su, Moses na trongsan pek hekta rithoi Dorh peh shukko.”
Chuti weta Jisu rou hi ram lim ma thanga wairul riha na makolla phao weta rou ngei ah mani rai eja kom dampi ae.
Chuna Jisu na athei chakka nie ranga ram rukka thingso.
Rungnie akha ah Jisu na machupi ah amlei ah. Galily ram husung chang honna Pharisis lea roukung ocha ngei akha chu Judiah hana Jerushalem hai thou phao ngei kom aning kolla onga am meh.
Malmashi ahre na pum ahui athisa kut chunga ruija phao ah mani na Jisu am na inn hana rui lutta Jisu maikunga shi num ae.
Chuti weta wairul riha ban ma-am sharukka mani na amota ruilut rang lam tuk no ae. Chuna mani na inn chunga kalweta chek ahre la ah ahur ongpi ah Jisu maikunga makut chunga jalpi ah hla so.
Jisu na mani ngoiring ri weta spa, “Kolla amona ril, tonpi oh, napak ha keina silpi sange.”
Chuna Pharisis lea roukung ocha ngei na hita Jisu kolla saithou so, “Na spa hi atu meh hijong plouril hi! Chungthieng ano wa chu atu akha na pak silpi nea am no ae?”
Jisu na mani lunghal ha dangpha juija anona manita ril, “Ejeranga hajong lunghal nangei lung songa sanga chao?
Hoipa rilna leitek kang sha, ‘napak silpi sange’ ah no lea, ‘thou weta thingo?’

Chuna keina nangei kolla meesanao pana aleiram ma pak silne jaitha am meh ti hi dang pi ang inge.” Amona pum ahui athisa spa ta hita ril, “Keina nakolla rilla aminge, thou wo hana nakotchung choi weta na inn na thing jou oh!”
Hana apha makka amona mani maikunga thou weta majalna kotchung ha ma inn lam tienga choi weta Chungthieng ta dom so.
Mani limpa angak shukka Chungthieng ta domma mani lungsunga kom ati ah ril, “Awoni ah kani mitta eja ah angakpi akha ripha unge!”
Hina nutienga Jisu na shukka thinga khasana hrai ngei office ah Levi onga am riphaso. Chuna Jisu na makolla ril, “Kanutieng juijo.”
Hana Levi na eheilim houp hurra thou weta Jisu nutieng jui so.
Chuna Levi na ma inn sunga ehekta alok lochao ah ehekta tam khasana hrai eja na kom ma am na karra baktol ha ae.
Hana Pharisis ngei lea roukung ocha ngei na marui ngei kolla manilung sunga pelno ah ril, “Alo sarukka nangei na khasana hrai ngei lea jaishi ngei hitta bakha inha ah chao?”
Jisu na manita sang, “Atujong pum ahra ngei tarang doctor darkar am no ae, chuti weta pum hrano ngei tarang sa ae,
hina kaphao hi dramo chel ngei taranga no ae pakchel ngei ta shilung hlong ranga ae.”
Hana manina Jisu ta ril, “Johon hina rui ngei chu marak marakka bu hai weta nie, hana Pharisis ngei rui nakom ha hekta ae chuti weta narui ngei chu bakka inn na am meh.”
Jisu na sang, “Taichang nie ah aphao atronpi ngeina taichang angpa na mani hitta am ha lei lim ma bu hai ah am ange ta halla chao? nahi uithukno ae.
Chuti weta nahani akha chu phao ange taichang angpa ta mani kar hai thou ruija thing ange, hana juija mani kom bu hai ange.”

Jisu na manita na panteem hi kom rile, “Atu akha na pun athar atan ther weta pun alui chunga bal no ae, ejonga amo na ae lea chu pun athar ha ther weta pun athar ra bal ae, hana pun lui ha chu ajon kom ano ae.
Atu nakom darkha tui athar ha savunt hou alui sunga thalno ae, atu jong na darkha tui athar ha thal lea chu savunt hou ha tittange, chu na darkha tui ha leija hou ange.
Hana saruk chu athar darkha tui ha athar savunt hou sunga sunge!
Chuna asotta shi darkha tui inn su nutienga athar darkha tui inn num no ae, rouram chu ‘asotta shi darkha tuina tuitek kae,’ amona ril.”
Sabbath rungnie ah Jisu na sangloupok ajaija samma mathing juija, marui ngei na sang sui mal la mani kutta hlik weta chip thou so.
Pharisis ngei na sai, alo sarukka ani rou kungna sabbath rungnie ah ngei no tullu lu ah chao?
Jisu na manita ril, “Nangeina pa no ah chao David na ae marui ngei hitta wantam juija amo e-ae sha?

Amona Chungthieng inn sunga thing weta Chungthieng taranga pekkashi budol la weta bakka, amo hitta am ha malmashi ngei ta kom bakpi. Nahi routakka chu thiempu na chak bak phung shuk sa ae atu akhana bak ngei no ae.”
Hana Jisu na ril, “Meesanaopa na Sabbath rungnie hina arengpu ae.”
Nahani Sabbath rungnie adang akha ah kom Jisu na Synagogue ka thing weta chupi takpi ae hana spa akha aban changtieng athi sa akha amphur ae.
Pharisis ngei lea roukung ocha ahre ngeina Jisu ta maral pekranga ejongpa aral tullu lu ang mo ta Jisu kolla nei ah wa ah amona sabbath rungnie ah ana ta dampi ah am.
Jisu na mani lunghal dangpha ah spa hata ril. “Ngir thou weta maitienga wa oh.” Spa hana ngir thou weta hana ngir wa so.

Jisu na manita sai, “Keina nangei kolla dangnum minge: Roukung na anita alo ta sabbath rungnie rou ril meh? San thingo ti mo ano lea amang ata shukpi oh ti meh? almashi ringchang ta sanpi oh ti mo ano lea tuipi oh ti sa?”
Amo na mani makhai ta ahul tunga an weta spa hata ril, “Naban dokko,” chuna amo na maban dokka makut ha hra so ae.
Chuna mani lung shukka mani thei chakka Jisu kolla ejongpa tullu lu ang mo ta ngeituhlak thou so.
Hana lei apha ah Jisu na mullon na kalla hang weta jantieng chuppa Chungthieng kolla nie.
Hu wara sanutienga Jisu na marui ngeita makolla kolweta asom ani halla amona manita ming bo.
Saimon (Pitar ta amona boso.) Hana manao Andrew; Jacob akha chu Johon, Phelip akha chu Bartholomew.
Mathew Thomas, Alphaeus sanao Jacob akha chu Saimon (Patriot ta makok).
Jacob sanao Judas akha chu Judas Iscariot Jisu ta jurpa.

Jisu na mullon hai thou hal-rouron ngei hitta tumma majung juija manutieng jui wairul riha eja ngei hitta ngir na amunt ahra akha ah ngir so. Judiah Jerushalem Tyre Sidon akha chu hulok ramtieng haithou wa wairul riha bomtulle.
Mani na phao rou ram chu rou ngei ranga akha chu mani rai eja lim ha hratpi dampi ranga. Hana hrano muihla na jetta am malmashi eja kom phao ah dam pi ae.
Chuna malmashi limpana Jisu ta tham ranga julla, hina rouram chu Jisu jaitha na shukka mani rai ha dampi so.
Jisu na marui ngeita an weta ril,
“Sara ngei ha jaihra ae;
rouram chu Chungthieng rengram ha nata ae!
Atun na wontam pha ngei ha jaihra ae;
rouram chu nangeita won hopi ange!
“Atun na atap ngei ha jaihra ae rouram chu;
nangei ta ariem pi ange!
“Ariem mang chu nang ae malmashi ngeina nangta atir, nangta ngaino, nangta hrano thuchu, hana nangta hrano mee ae ta ril ange, hi makhei hi meesanaopa sharukka ae.
Malmashi ngei oh! hajong rungnie pha juija ariem ma lammo, rouram chu thangwan na napha rang ae-na mant ehekta lokka am meh, Papu ngei na hijongpa hi thiempu ngeita kom ae ah hou phur ae.
“Chuti weta eja ah atri pi mo nu nang atun na achongpu ngei;
nangei na atunna napha num pha so che!
“Eja ah atri pi nang atun na won hop;
nang wontam ah theng ange che ae!
“Eja ah atri pi mo nu nang atun nui ah am ngei;
trappa aol pha ang che ae!
“Malmashi lim na nangta ahra rou rilla am hi eya ah ringrei pi ae nang ha; rouram chu hihekta mani mapi mapu ngei na kom diek no thiempu ngei ta ae phur ae.
“Chuna atujong karil ngei am ngei kolla rilla aminge: nangta anda meeta lungshi oh, nangta anda mee taranga ahra tullu lu oh,
nangta sarkou ngei kolla jaihra pe oh, nangta utshitno ngei taranga nie pi oh.
Ejonga nabe akha tienga beng lea chu akha tienga hata amona beng su oh; Ejonga atujong akha na nata coat choi lea chu nalinglut kom choi ngal su oh.
Nakolla atujong akhana ejongpa akha nie phao lea chu pe ah hla oh. Akha chu atujong akha na nakol hai thou ejongpa pot akha choija thing lea, aleh pi rang rou ril no oh.
Malmashi ngei ta nakolla na ae pi num hekta, manita nangna kom hahekta ae jo.
“Ejonga nangta lungshi mee tachak nangna lungshi ta lea alo ta nangna jaihra pha ang che?
Akha chu ejonga nakolla ahra tullu lu mee tarang chak ahra ae ta lea chu alo sha rukka nangna jaihra pha ang che? hachu pak chel ngeina kom ae!
Akha chu ejonga nangna sum ding nea ang meeta chak nangna sum pu pi ta lea chu alo ta nangna jaihra pha ang che? hajong chu pakchel ngei na kom mani masum hata pu pi hlakkae.

Chuna nangta anda mee ngei ta ranga ahra tullu lu jo akha chu lungshi oh; napukpi sum ha ding ranga ephao hal no oh chu lea chu nangna alok mana pha ange akha chu chungtekti Chungthieng sanao pa chang ange, rouram chu ae na lamant dang no ngei ta hrano ngeita kom arengpu na lungshi ae.
Lungshi thei oh Pathieng na lungshi thei hekta.

“Meeta routreem no oh, chu lea chu Chungthieng na nangta routreem ang no ae. Meeta kom aral rilno oh Chungthieng na kom naral Rou rilang no ae, mee maral ngakpi ta lea Chungthieng na kom naral ngakpi ange.
Ape dol no oh nang ta kom pe ange, shilung lokka napek thingna anu jui ja nangna kom nakut chang makhai pha ange chuna nang na wul na changa Chungthieng na kom nangta wul ange.”
Chuna Jisu na manita na panteem hi ril, “Mitcho spa akha adang akha ta lamkai nea ang no ae; ejonga amo na lamkai lea chu manui nimak kum sunga tullange.
Atu rui akha na ma ocha ta hella thei tekno ae, chuti weta rui limpana mani chu mulshu multom juija chu mani kom mani ocha hek ti ange.
“Alo sarukka nata mitta am tingthou ta an na am che? namitta am tingthou ta masha hal no wa?

Alo ta nata kolla lungshi ngei ah namitta tingthou lah ah hou tikkae ta rillang che? namitta tingthou la no wa. Chuna ahra sa nangei! masha ah namitta tingthou la su ta lea chu nangna nata mitta am tingthou ha kom hra bakta lah hou nea ang che.
“Thingkung hra na hrano theira ra no ae, hana hrano thingkung na ahra theira ra no ae.
Thingkung lim pa hi ara ra jui ja dange. Chuna nangei na aling abom sunga theichang lei no ae hana aling abom karra anggur kom leino ae.
Ahra mee na malungsunga ahra ha choija shukkae hana hrano mee na malung sunga hai thou hrano ha choija shukkae chuna murra shuk rou hi lung sunga shi hakta am ha chak shuk kae.
“Alo wa keita kokka che, ‘Arengpu, Arengpu ta,’ karil chu nang na ae no che?
Kakolla wa meelim akha chu karou ngeinum ma karil jui ngeita keina manita amo hek ti mee mo dang pi ange.
Amo ha chu alei hur thukka chao wa alung chunga inn sha spa ae. Tuina lokka hang juija inn hana thum ma lut hal inn ha chu ephao ling ang no ae, rouram chu inn ha hrabakta sha thou sa so ae.
Chuti weta atu jongpa akhana karou ril thei weta juino ngei chu inn saweta akung alung tolno ngei jongpa ae, ha chu tui lokka hangjuija innha tu ange, chuna hajongpa taranga eja ah atri pi meh?”
Jisu na nalimpa hi malmashi ngei kolla rilsu nutienga amona kapharnahum tienga thingso.
Rom offisar na ehekta lungshit suuk akha thi ang makhai ana ah amunt hana am.
Rom offisar na Jisu hina rou theijuiya Jihudi ulien chang ngei ta suuk akha dampi phao ranga jongpi hla so.
Mani na Jisu kolla tungjuiya lung thienga ril, “Na spa hita sanna matik cha ae.
Amo na kani lim ta ehekta lungshi ae, akha chu amo mak na kani taranga synagogue kom sapi ae.”

Jisu na mani hitta thing ha juiya mani inn leima nei ah wakjuiya offisar hana atonpi ngei ta Jisu kolla hla weta rou rilpi, “Arengpu oh, nangna katrongsan sarrukka kakolla olla na wak kang ha kei ephao matik cha mee nonge.
Chuna hijong sarukka kei phao sunga kom nakolla wa matik cha mee nonge chuna dam jou oh ti narou ril te chak na kom kasuuk ha dam mange.

Keikom ane angam spa akha inge chuna ralmee kathuiya shi ah akha ta na thingo ril lea thing, hana akha tana wa oh ta rilleh wa! ta am ming, hana kor ngei ta kom hi ae oh ta rilleh hata mani na ae sa ae.”
Jisuna rou hi theijuiya amona angak shukka amai wul weta manutieng jui wairul riha ta ril, “Keina nangei maikunga rilla aminge hiyongpa amona mangoiring hi Israel sunga phao rino songe!”
Rouron na rol suuk na mani offisar inn lam maleh juiya asuukha dam ma am tukhlakso.
Jisu ranga Nain ti hulok akha ah arui ngei hit akha chu ehekta tam wairol riha ngei hitta thing.
Amona mani hulok innlamhar matung juiya athi rui se meelim ta riso. Athi spa ha chu arongnu na spa akha chak don sa ae. Chuna ehekta tam wairul riha na mamutieng juija am.
Arengpu manu mel rijuiya alung sunga ringrei ngei thei ah amo na ril, “Trap no oh,”
Jisu na wa weta khu ha tham pa chu khu ronna am ngei kom ngirso. Chuna Jisu na ril, “Oh rungthar thou oh.”
Athi spa ha ongthou weta rou ril thou so. Chuna Jisu na manu ta pe so.
Mani hana am makhai na atri ah akha chu Chungthieng ta riemma domso, “Ehekta arat athei rouphupa akha ani karra shukso ae!” Mani na ril. Chungthieng ha mamee ngei ta sanpi rang jungso ae.
Na Jisu hina rou hi mani inn ningkolla akha chu ram lim ma thangso.
Johon arui ngei na hina rouram ma makolla ril juija, amona mani karra mantei ta kokka,
Arengpa kolla amo na rousai ranga hla, “Johon na ril jung ang so ae ti ril mee ha nanga mah, ano lea kani na atujong akha ta hak kang meh?”
Mani na Jisu kolla pha juija mani na ril, “Johon na nakolla kanita rou sai thingo ta hla ae maril mee ha nang ah cha meh, anoleh kani na atujong akha ta hakka am mang meh.”
Hana lei apha hana makka Jisu na malmashi ngei rai eja ta dampiah akha chu hrano muihla eja ta julla mitcho eja ta ri pi ae.

Jisu na Johon hla rouron ngei ta sanga hla so. “Nangei na lea weta Johon kolla nangei mitta ri akha chu theipha mitcho na rine akae tik mee na thing hana atripi rai eja ta dampi akur set ngei na theipha athi sa na ringthou akhu chu sara ringei kolla routhar sam hina rou lim hi rillo.
Keita ephao lung chingna nongei chu eja ah jaihra meh!”
Johon rouron ngeina thingsu waitakka Jisu na Johon rouram ma wairul riha ngei kolla rouril, “Ramrukka nangei na shukka thingjuija echu ripha ang chao? Thirang rang juija linga am ha mo ae?
Hana nangei na ejongpa ri enge ta thinga chau? Anal pun sunga? Hajong punchoi dirchoi ngei chu reng hun am mange!
Nangei na ri ha kakolla rillo? rouphupa? adiek takkae, nangei ri ha rouphupa ta helleh richou ae,
Johon hi ae jiekka shi rou hana ril: ‘Chungthieng na ril, kei na nangei taranga lampi sattang ha matienga karou ron akha hla ange.’ ”
Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge, “Mee ngei na don sanao lim karra Johon ta hella alok am no ae chutichun Chungthieng reng ramma chu sintekti amona nakolhai thou wa loktekti ange.”
Chuna makolla rou thei lim na hana chunga khasana hrai ngei na Chungthieng na adit tullu lu ah Johon kolla baptias ae.
Chuti weta Pharisis akha chu roukung hina ocha ngeina Chungthieng ahal ha ngei num no ah Johon kolla baptias ae no ae.
Jisu na ril, “Atreem no ae atunrija mee ngei hi kei na atu ngei kolla an hlakkang mo? mani hi ejongpa ehekti mo nu?

Mani hi unga ngei Kaithil hou wa onga am ngei hek ti ae, abom akha na au hlakka abom akha ta kanina nangei taranga lunghungna ariem na hungrasam tum unge chuti weta nangei na lam no chau! Kani na mee thit na laa sa unge chuti weta nangei na trap num no chau!
Johon Baptias na phao weta bak no ae akha chu darkha tui kom in no ae chuti weta nangei na, ‘Amo hi dijabol lut so ae ta ril chau!’
Meesanaopa na phao ah bakka inna amjuija kom nangei na rilleh, ‘Anno spa hi! karam peicha ae, hana khasana hrai ngei tonpi ae akha chu adanga phaija ta mee ae ta hal chao!’
Chungthieng lungsin lungwar lasil meelim ta chu adiek ha ri pi ae.”
Jisu ta Pharisis na amo hitta bu bakha ranga kokka, Jisu na inn hana thing weta bakha so.
Hana hulokka ehekta pakchella ringa am snu akha am, snu hana Jisu Khrista Pharisis inn sunga bakka am meh ta mathei juija alabastar ariem ahoi siktui choija phao.
Jisu kae kung nungtienga ngir weta mitui shukka tappa akae chunga mittui lim ha tulla hana amo na asam takka ru-wa hou wa mani ta chuppa ariem ahoi tui hana mani chunga sungpi so.
Pharisis na nahi rijuija mathei chakka amona ril.
“Ejonga na malmashi hi adiek takka rouphupa ah lea chu amota tonga am snu hi atu meh ti danga ngei ae; amona pakchella ringa snu na ae hikom dangpha ngai ae!”
Jisu na rou ril shuk so, “Simon, keina nakolla ejongpa ril numinge.”
“Ocha oh,” amona ril, “Keita rilpi oh,”
“Apha akha ah spa ani na sumpuk ranga achongpu kolla niek,” Jisu na ril thou so. “Akha na rijanga don na akha na som nga pu so.
Ani makna manui puk sum ding nea no wa chutihal kom mitpu na chu animak ta map ae pi so ae chuleh chu manui ani sunga atu na hella lungshi tekkang mo?”
Simon na sange, “Keina ejonga sanga taleh chu,” “Sum tam tekti don pa ta kok pipa ha ae.”
Jisu na, “Na ril hamak ha rou takkae.”

Chuna Jisu na snu am na tienga hai lea weta Simon ta ril, “Hi snu ri so che? Nangei inn na kaphao hi nang na chu kakae sillang tui pe no che, chuti weta snu hina chu hitta silranga amit tui tulla hana asam takka kakae chunga amittui ru wa hou ae.
Nangna chu keita ariem lam tuk phao ae num no lei ja amona keita atreem am no makhai kakae ting chung chop chan no ae.
Nangna chu kalu tai rang churphone siktui pe no che, chuti weta snu hina chu kakae limpa kom ariem hoi siktui ah tuipi.
Chuna sarukka keina nangei kolla rillinge hija tam snu lungsit na mapak eja tam kom silpi so ae chuna atujon na atom te lungshi lea chu mapak kom atom te chak silpi ange.”
Chuna snu ta Jisu na ril, “Napak lim ko silpi ange.”
Hana ong tolla am ahre na mani thei chakka ril, “Nahi atu mo nu, amona pak phao silpi nea ae?”
Chuti weta Jisu na snu ha ta ril, “Nangoiring jarra nang chu sanpi pha so ae chuna adai ah thingjou oh.”
Apha atante nutienga Jisu na hulokka akha chu husunga thing weta Chungthieng rengram tarang routhar sui ah rolla, arui asom ani nakom amo hitta thing ha ae.
Hana hrano muihla na jetta rol dampha akha chu rai eja dampha snu ahre akha chu dijabol sari makol hai thou wa julla hla snu Mary (Madalini ta kok) kom tol lea.
Reng Herod’s hlou ronna am offisar Chuza namei Joanna, akha chu Susana, hana namei adang ahre mani thei chakka am adon hana Jisu akha chu arui ngei ta sanna am meh.
Jisu am na atreem am no wa phao ae hulokka matheng mathenga chuna wairul riha na bomtul juija Jisu na napanteem hi ril:
“Apha akha ah spa akha na muchi hita mawor juija, hita loupukka mathe juija ahre na lampi ah kae to na ah tulla awa na sar so.
Ahre na alung abom chunga tulla ajiek adon shukka tau ah hange chuti weta alei atam am no jarra charra thingso.
Ahre na chu aling abom sunga tulso. Mani ha tau wa hang halkom hata suon na thi so.
Chuna muchi ahre chu ahra lei ah tulla muchi akha na amal riha ra ae.”
Nahi ril weta Jisu na atreem na change, “Akur am lim pa na thei su oh!”
Arui ngei na Jisu ta sai panteem hina adien, chu e meh.
Jisu na sange, “Chungthieng rengram hina athup rou hi nangei kolla pe so ae panteem hina, nangeina an halkom rine no, ngai halkom lungkim thei no.
“Panteem hina ril na adien chu, muchi chu Chungthieng trongsan ae.
Lampi jai ja tul muchi hina dangna chu, rou thei chu thei weta hra no na phao wa mani lung sunga sanpi phana akha chu mani ngoiringa am rou ru wa thing ha ae.
Alung chunga tul muchi hina dangna chu rouril ha theiveta ariemma la weta apha atante tarang chakka ngoiring, hana chang an juija chu manina dangne no ae rou ram chu atro thukka tou no sou chu.

Aling abom sunga tau muchi dangna chu, rou ril thei chu theiveta mani achong areng rang taranga akha chu mani ringchang ahoi adi taranga olla hal chuna manina ephao ara lei pha no ngei ae muchi na tau weta alingna jetta ra nea no ae.
Ahra alei chunga tau dangna chu rouril theiveta mani lung sunga ril juija mani na ara ra malim phao wa dongne ha ae.
“Atu akha na awar ta hlum ma tai thuija akha chu kotkang thuija si no ae, hana si ang hutta adoi na chunga si ae, chuleh chu meelim pana mawar ha ri weta inn sunga lut nea ae.
“Chuna thuppa si ang ephao am no ae, hana dang ang no ephao am no ae.
“Chuna sarukka nangei na cheksilla am mo. Rouram chu atu jongpa kolla ma am chunga lella happange, hana atu jongpa ephao am no mee makolla am ahre te phao choija thing ange.”
Jisu ma nu lea manao ngei na makolla phao weta wairul riha kar sunga mani na lut nea no am ma,
Mani kar sunga akha na Jisu ta ril, “Nanu lea nanao ngeina mangta ri num ma awao wa ngirra am meh.”
Jisu na mani limpa ta ril, “Kanu akha chu ka-u-kanao ngei chu Chungthieng rouril theiveta jui ngei ha ae.”
Nahani akha ah Jisu na arui ngei hitta kung sunga lutveta manita ril, “Ani na tuikunghi lalveta kotiengpa aralla thing ei oh,” chuna mani na thing thou so.
Hita mani kung thou wa thing juija Jisu jalnum ma en so, edang dangno wa akal thirang akha tui kunga ranga thou wa kung ha chu tui sunga luppang thou so. Chuna mani lim pahi ati pi asih akha am so.
Arui ngei na Jisu am na wa weta hranga ril, “Arengpu oh, Arengpu, oh! Ani hi thi ang ae am so!”
Jisu na thou weta akal thirang tuijal ta trongsan ril, chuna thirang ha daija solhla so.
Hana Jisu marui ngeita ril, “Hoi meh nangei ngoiring?”
Manina atri angak shukka mani masel rilhlak so, “Nahi ehekti spa monu? Matrongsan hi thirang tuijul na kom maril jui ae!”
Chuna Jisu lea marui ngeina thou wa Gerasy Galily ral ha tienga tungso.
Jisu na kangpal hana tungleh dijabol na jetta am spa akha hana hu wa am akha tukhlakso. Na spa hi apha sotta apun ani salla inn na am no wa hlanbung chunga akha chu mulla rolla am meh.

Amona Jisu mel rijuija sanrol shukka aou, weta mathei chakka Jisu kae kunga tu weta hita aou, “Lok tekti Chungthieng sanaou Jisu! Keita nangna ejongpa dija che meh? Keita aol ana pe no oh ta nija aminge!”

Chuna Jisu na spa kol hai thou wa hrano muihla julla hou ranga trongsan pepi. Hrano muihla hana apha atampa mant na shi ae chuna mee ngei na amota thirui ja amo ta thingno ranga ren na shi halkom makolla am hrano muihla na chat pi weta ram rukka rui ja thing ae.
Jisu na amo ta sai, “Naming alo ti meh?” “Ka ming chu Mob ae,” amona sang, rouram chu dijabol atam pa na kakol la am ae.
Hana dijabol majam na Jisu kolla kani hi atreem nei no kum ma jalla hla pi no oh ta nie ae.
Hana ningkol mullon akha ah voksella pa na sella am na ah dijabol na kani hi vok ngei sunga lut tuk kae ta Jisu kolla niek pa chu Jisu na hana lutto ta mani ta lutpiso.
Mani na spa kol hai thou shukka thing weta vok sunga lutso. Chuna vok limpana ahai rakotta tanna jungveta tuikung sunga lutso.
Voksella am pana shukka am riveta hulokka enkul ae ja am mee ngei kolla rou hi thangpi so.
Malmashi ngei na kom shukka am hi an phao wa Jisu kolla mani wakjuija, dijabol na ruija rol spa ha Jisu kae kunga apun ani tolla akha chu hrabak ta ma am rijuija mani limna leima ti so.
Spa hana damma am ri meelimna alota dijabol na ruija rol mee na damma meh ti ha takso.
Chuna ramtienga am meelim pana atri hei sulla Jisu ta mani karra am no ranga julla Jisu na kung sunga lutta manita phella thingso.
Dijabolna hla phur spa hana Jisu ta hita nie. “Kei nang hitta thing ha tik kae”
chuti weta Jisu na amo ta hita rilla hla.
“Na inn lam tienga lea weta Chungthieng na nangta alota ae mo ti ha ril thingo.”
Spa hana hulokka thing, thing weta Jisu na makolla alo ta ae mo sui thingso.
Jisu na adang tuirel kangpal tungjuija malmashi ngei na amota ariem lam tuk ke, rou ram chu mani na amo ta hakka am sarukka ae.
Hana Jairus ti spa tunga amo na Jisu ma inn na tung ranga Jisu kae kunga athei chakka tuveta nie ae. Amo chu mani ram sunga synagegue ka offisar akha ae.
Rouram chu akum asom ani chak su lim ti asanao nu akha ha thija am jarra, Jisu na amo hita thing ha ah malmashi ahulla am lim pana makolla bomtul so.
Mani kar sunga kum asom ani leima olla athi shukka anna am snu akha kom tol lea. Madon manei lim pa kom doctor kolla pethinga adam am no ae.
Snu hana wairul riha nungtienga wa weta Jisu linglut ahou wa tonga hana apha makka athi shuk chan so.
“Atu na kei ta tonga mo ae ta Jisu na sai?” Meelimpana ngei nun no ae, Pitar na ril, “Arengpu mee ngeina ahul tunga nokolla am meh.”
Chuti weta Jisu na ril, “Atu na mo akha na keita tonga kakolhai thou wa jaitha shukka thingso ae.”

Namei nu ha thuppa ngei ang ni jo weta halla leima hirra mathei chak Jisu kae kunga tu wa hana am meelim maikunga amona rilsukkae, alo sarukka amona tonga mo, hana alota amona woiha chaka damma mo ril ae.
Jisuna namei ta ril, “Kasanao nu oh, nangoiring jarra nangna dam so che, chuna daija thing jou oh.”
Jisu na rou hi rilla ma am leija offisar in hai thou wa rou choija phao ae, “Nasanaonu ha thi so ae, Jairus kolla ril.” Chuna arengpu ta olpi no sa oh.
Chuti weta Jisu na Jairus kolla rilla am theipha ah ril, “Ephao atri no oh, ngoichak ngoiringo amo ha hra ange.”
Jisu na inn ha matung juija amona atu akha phao manutieng juija lutpi no ae, Pitar, Johon, Jacob akha chu unga hana manu mapa ano wa.
Hana am lim pana unga hana taranga olla tappa Jisu na ril, “Tap no oh; unga ha athi ano ae eenna am ma ae!”
Manina Jisu ta nuiso ae, rou ram chu manina unga ha thi sa so ae ta dange!”
Chuti weta Jisu na makutta namei sanao te ta kai ah kal weta kok, “Thou oh kasanao!”
Namei sanao te ringchang woiha lea ah ringthou wa Jisuna manita ejongpa bakpiranga trongsan ril.
Manu mapa na angak shukka chutihalkom Jisu na manieta shukka am hi atu akha kolla ril no ranga trongsan pe.
Jisu na asom ani aruita kokveta hrano dijabol ta julla hla nea rang akha chu rai eja ta dampi rang jaitha manita bomtulpi weta pe ae.
Hana Chungthieng rengram taranga rouril thingo akha chu ana asa ngei ta dam pi oh ta hla ae.
Rouhi ril su nutienga nangei lampi thing juiya ephao choi ngei ang no ae, chuna ramhai taranga molbuk halkom nahoukom, budol kom, sum kom hana linglut phao ani su wa choi no oh.
Ehalkom nangta ariemma kokna inn sung hana hulok ha houphur ra nathingma lim hata am mo.
Mee ngei na nangei ta ariemma kok num no lea chu nangei honghuppa vokphul kopphao tha ah hulokha ranga thingo.”
Arui ngei na houphurra, thing weta husung chang honna ahra trongsan rourilla akha chu ana asa amunt eja ah mee ngeita dampi.
Galily ah reng Herod na shukka am eja lim pa matheipha juija malungrang shuk thei ni jo. Rouram chu Johon Baptias ha lea ringthou so ae ta meelim pa na rilhlak sha rukka.
Adang ahre na chu hita ril hlak kae, Elija wolha pa ringso ae, hana adang ahre na chu amatienga rouphupa akha ring thou so ae.
Chuna Herod na ril, “Keina Johon chu ahong tan su sange. Chuti weta hijong kathei ah ka-am rou spa hi atu mo nu?”
Chuna amo na Jisu ta ri num ma ammeh.
Arui ngei na lea weta mani lu tullu lim pa ha Jisu kolla ril. Chuna amona manita rui weta Bethsaida hulokka manithei chak thingso.
Wairul riha na mani hina rou thei ah manutieng juiso. Chuna mani lim ta Jisu na ariemma kokveta Chungthieng rengram hana rou rilla atujong darkar am mee ta ana asa kom dampi.

Chuna ninu na luttang wakjuija arui ngei na ma am na ah wa weta ril. “Na malmashi ngei hi mani hu-wa julla hla jou oh rouram chu hina mani na am weta bakrang jalrang hija ram ala hina pha nea ang no ve.”

Chuti weta Jisu na manita ril, “Nangeina manita ejongpa ahre te chak halkom bakrang pepi oh.” Mani na sangso. “Kani don thei te chu budol ranga lea tuiriek ani chak kae, mani lim pa taranga kani na thing weta leipi num ma che nangna?”
(Hana mani ha spa chakka lising ranga ae.)
Jisu na arui ngeita ril, “Mee ngei ha som nga, som nga bomtulla ongpi ha oh.”
Arui ngei na naha ae su juija,
Jisu na budol ranga akha chu tuiriek ani la ah wantinga hai ah Chungthieng kolla nie ah mani ta samma arui ngei ta mee ngei kolla sam ranga pe.
Mani limpa na awon hoppa baksu nutienga mani houphur alim ha arui ngei na taidon asom ani shuk so.
Nahani akha ah Jisu na athei chakka nie ah ma leija arui ngei na makolla wa ah, “Amo na arui ngeita sai wairul riha na chu keita alo ta ril mo ae?”
Ahre na chu Johon Baptias ae ta ril ae hana ahre na chu Elija ae hana lei sunga ahre na chu apha eja matienga rouphupa ngei ha lea ah ringthou ae ta ril.”
Jisu na manita sai, “Nangeina chu keita alo ta rilla chau?” “Nang chu Chungthieng hina Messiya ae ta Pitar na sang.”
Chuna Jisu na rou hi atu akha kolla ril shuk no ranga arat rou ril so manita.

Hi kom Jisu na manita ril “Mee sanao pa ta ulenchang ngei na julla hla ange hana aol ana pe pi ange hana chungtekti thiempu ngei na akha chu roukung ocha ngei na Jisu ta that tange chuti weta rungnie nathum takka lea ah ring thou ange.”
Manilimta Jisu na ril, “Atu jongpa na ka-am na a wa num lea amo na matarang lim makphur weta ma khross ha rungnie chunghonna ron weta kanutieng jui shu oh.
Chuna atu jongpa na maringchang sanpi pha num lea chu mang shu oh. Chuti weta atujongpa kasarukka maringchang mangpi lea chu sanpi pha ange.
Mee na simlei ram lim pa changveta maringchang mangpi akha chu nea no wa am lea chu makolla chu kana ei pha meh!
ejonga mee hana keita ajakka akhu chu kachupi katakpi ta jui no lea meesanao pana Pathieng hana jaitha athieng wanrui hitta mahung tolla jung juija amota kom ajakka am mange.
Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rillinge nangei kar hina Chungthieng rengram ri ma lim phao sunga athi mel ri ang no ae.”
Hapta akha nutienga Jisu na rilsu wa amo na Pitar Johon akha chu Jacob amo hitta mullon na nie ranga thinge.
Nie ah ma am lei sung mamai soun ha hlonga akha chu apunchoi kom ade awar tolla ngou wa so.
Edang dang no ah spa anie na amota trongthou wa am, manui ha chu Moses lea Elija.
Thangwan tienga mahung majai mel muh ah Jisu litta trong thou ah am roulam ha chu allota amona Chungthieng hina adien ha naha chu Jerushalem ma thit rang allota ranga tung ang sha.
Pitar akha chu atonpi ngei chu hoija enna na am lei ja mani na thou weta Jisu kolla spa anie na mahung majai tolla ngirra am manina riso.

Spa ani na Jisu ta houphur nutienga Pitar na Jisuta sai, “Arengpa hina kani am hi eja ah hra ah meh! Chuna kani na inn inthum sa tuk kae akha na natarang, akha na Moses tarang, akha na Elija tarang.” (Amo na marilla am emo ti kom rou takka chu dang no ae.)
Hita matronga amleija sumphai na manita worpi so. Hana arui ngei na manita sumphai na hlum ma am ri weta ati so.
Sumphai sunga heithou sanrol akha na ril, “Machunga kei na hal sange, na hi kalung shit sanao ae maril juijo!”
Sarol hana sol hlakjuija chu Jisu thei chak am so. Arui ngei chu na lim pa taranga daitikta am meh. Akha chu atu akha nakom mani riphur eja rilsukno ae.
Hana rungnie mathanga Jisu na arui inthum hitta mullon na hai thou wa tum ma junga wairul riha ngei ta Jisu na tuhlak.
Hiatam kar sunga spa akha na auwa ril shuk, “Arengpu! Oh, keina nakolla nija aminge akha chak kadon sanao ta anpi ri oh!
Hrano muihla na amota mant na edang dangno wa arol shukka auw ae achil phul shukka amota aol ana pe ae chuchak no wa amota leima ol pija hlanum no wa hla chak ti ae.
Keina narui ngei kolla julla hla pi rijota kaniek juija mani na julla hla nea no ae.”
Jisu na sang, “Eja ah ngoiringno ngei akhuchu diekno meepok ngei! Echan sotta keina nangei kolla am ha ang?” Hana spa hata ril, “Nasanao ha hina ruija wa oh.”
Rungthar sanao ha hita ma wakka dijabol na amota alei chunga illa tupi so. Chuna Jisu na hrano muihla ta trongsan pe ah rilla rungthar ha dam pi so, akha chu mapa kolla peso.
Hana am lim pa na Chungthieng marat manea jaitha hana angak shukkae.
“Nangei na makno oh nangei kolla rillang ka ae rou hi! Meesanaopa ta malmashi ane angam ngei kut chunga pe ange.”
Chuti weta arui ngeina nahina rilna rouhi dang nea no weh. Nahi mani kolla chu athup sou chu mani na lungkim thei no ae, chuna mani hina rou sarukka sai ang kom ati ae.
Chuna arui ngei mani masel sunga hita trong ashang awai am hlakso atuna mani kar sunga lok tek ti ang meh,
Jisu na mani halhlakka am dangpha ah unga akha maningkolla ngir piveta.

Akha chu amo na rilso mani ta “Atujongpa na na unga hita kaminga ariemma lah mee ha keita lah ah ae; chuna atujongpa keita ariemma lah mee ha keita hla amotakom lah mee ae. Chuna nangei karra sin tek ti amona lokti ange.”
Johon na hita ril shukso. “Arengpu, kani na naminga dijabol julla houne ri unge. Chuna kani na amota hata ae no ranga ril unge rouram chu amo ha ani bom tul na karra am mee no ae.”
“Nangei na amota chan rang rou ril no oh,” ta Jisu na sang nge arui ngei kolla akha chu Johon kolla “Rouram chu atu jong akha na nang ta anda no lea amo ha namee ae.”
Wanram ma Jisu ta rui ang apha neija wakka Jerushalem ma thingranga Jisu na alung ngirso.
Mama tienga amo na rouron akha Samaria husunga ehai limpa thouranga hakkanga hla so.
Chutiweta malmashi ngeina amota ariem ma hakpi no ae rouram chu amo ha Jerushalem tienga mathing sharukka.
Johon lea Jacob arui ani na nahi rijuija manui na ril, “Arengpu, thangwan hai thou wa sarmei kani na kok weta mani lim pa ripta kang shu oh ti meh?”
Jisu na mai hai weta manita lungsha so.
Chuna Jisu akha chu arui ngeina hu adanga thingso.
Mani na mani lampi ah hata thing juija spa akha na Jisu ta ril, “Amunt changhon na nathingna ah kei jui ange.”
Jisu na amota ril, “Ram mui ngei ahur am meh, hana awa ngei kom abu am meh, chuti weta meesanaopa sol hak rang chu amunt am no ae.”
Jisu na adang spa akha ta ril, “Kanutieng juijo,” chuti weta spa hana ril, “Arengpu, ma sha ah ka inn na lea weta kapa athi sa ui lea ri tikkae.”
Jisu na sang, “Hata athi chu athi ngei na ui song ange. Nang chu Chungthieng reng ram rou sam thingo.”
Adang spa akha na ril, “Arengpa kei nanutieng jui tikkae chuti weta masha ah ka inn sung ngeita am joude ta ril thing tikkae.”
Jisu na makolla ril, “Atujong akha na lou hui thou nutienga anutienga hai lea chu amo na Chungthieng reng ram tullu lu nea ang no ae.”
Hina nutienga Jisu na spa somsari anieta halla mathing ang na amunt hulok lim ma manita anie, anie hlaso.
Manita amo na ril, “Sang pottang leima tam am meh, chuti weta sangpottang mee chu am no ae, chuna sangpottang mitpu kolla ratta nie oh, chu lea chu amona sangpotpang mee ha hla ange.
Thingo! Keina nangei ta kelmo nao ram mui ngei karra hla hekta hla singe.
Nangei thingjuija selhou kom choi no oh, hana hou kom choi no oh, kekok kom choi no; hana lampi ah kom atu akha kolla mokthingno oh.
Nangei na atu halkom atuhalkam inn sunga lut juija makolla hita rillo, ‘nangei inn sunga adai ti chang shu oh.’
Ejonga adai di mee lea hata nangkom mani inn sunga am mo; chuna makolla kom adai hana hata am shu oh ejonga anoleh adai napekha lah nole lah siro.
Mani inn sunga hata am weta nataranga bakko enno ta pe lim ha bakko enno. Rouramchu tullu lu mee na matullu nujuija phaphung shuk pha shu oh. Chuna natrung na inn ha helnga rol no oh.
Apha chang honna nangei lutna hulokka nangei ta ariemma hakka am na ah nangei matieng bakrang enn ran donna pekha hata bakko.
Rai eya takom dampi hrapi oh, hana malmashi ngei kolla hita rillo, ‘Chungthieng reng ram nangei tarang leima nei ah jungso ae.’
Chuna nangei thingna Apha changhonna hulokka lut juiya nangei ta ariem ma lamtuk lea no shukka thing jou weta Lampi hita rillo.
‘Nangei huloka kani kae pha ah kuppa am vokphu! Na chinga tenga hou unge. Chuti weta nangei makkang no chu Chungthieng reng ram ha nangei kolla neiya am so ae!’
Keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge ha chu Chungthieng rungnie ah routreem ae jui ya nangei hulok ta chu Sodom ta hella Chungtheingna ringrei ngei tekkange!

“Oh, Gorasin nataranga eya ah ati pi meh he Bethsaida eya ah aol ana napha ang mo nu rouram chu nangei kolla anealah tullu ha Tyre lea Sidon kolla ae phur lea manina bora rui thalveta paiya akha chu vokphul bolla shilung hlong ange.
Chungthieng routreem rungnie ah Tyre lea Sidon hu ngei ta hella ringrei ngei tek kange.
Kapharnahum! Nangna chu thangwan phao wa nathei chakka kal num ma che? Nangta chu sharmei-kum sunga denga hou ange!”

Jisu na arui ngei ta ril, “Atu jongna nangei rou jui mee ha karou jui ah ae; atujongna nangeita ngeinum noleh keita ngeinum no ah ae; atujong na keita ngeinum no lea keita hla mee amota ngei num no ah ae.”
Spa somsari anie na ehekta ariemma lea ah mani naril, “Arengpu,” “Naminga kanina rouril juiya diyabol na phao aril jui ah thinge!”
Jisu na ril, “Saitan thangwan hai thou wa hucham plak hekta tulla jung ri inge.
Ngai oh! Keina nangei kolla kane jaitha pe singe nangei na arul ngei akha chu eimehnu chunga thingne rang, chuna nangei ta anda ngei ta nea ranga akha chu mani na nangei ta ephao ae nea ang no ae.
Chuti weta hrano muihla na nangei ta atiya nangei ril jui sa rukka leima ariem no oh, hata hella nangei ariem rang chu nangei ming wanram ma jiekka shi na riem tekko.”

Hana lei apha ah Jisu hi muihla athiengna shihakta riemma am ma ril, “Pathieng, simlei akha chu wanchunga Arengpu! Keina nangta dom minge rouram chu nangna adang athei asing ngei kolla thuppa siveta unga ngei ta natakpi hina taranga. Pathieng hi sa nahal nadit.

“Ka Pathiengna pot chei limpa hi keita peksa ae atu akha na dang no ae atu mo meesanaopa kapa ah no wa chu. Akha na atu na mapa athieng moti ha meesanaopa ano wa hana masanao pana atu jong akha kolla mahal nujuija rilshuk ah no wa dang no ae.”
Jisu na arui ngeita haileh ah aruwa ril, “Eja ah nangei hi jaihra meh nangei na ri ja am ri pha hi!
Nangei kolla rillinge ha chu awoni ja nani ri num ma ripha nea hi akha chu theinum ma nangei theipha nea hi thiempu eja na akha chu areng eja na ri numg theipha num ae chuti weta mani na nea no ae.”
Roukung chupi takpi akha Jisu hi alota changa mantpi ang meh ta phao ae, “Arengpu,” “Alota ae weta keina samla ringchang pha ang meh ta sai?”
Jisu na sang, “Trongsan na chu alo jiekka si meh? Hana alo ta nangna mani kolla tanglat che meh?”

Spa hana ril, “ ‘Arengpu Chungthieng ta napum akha nalunglim khotta lungshi oh, namaihla limkom, hana narat nathei limpa kom hana nalungrang limpakom,’ ‘natakta nalungshit hek ta inning kolla am ngei ta lungshi oh.’ ”
“Nang hi adiekso,” ta Jisu na sanga, “nahi mak hi ae oh chu lea nangna aring pha ange.”
Chuna roukung chupi takpi pa na mathei chakka adiek ahra changnumna Jisu ta sai, “Atu mo ae ka inn ning tung tieng?”
Jisu na sang, “Apha akha ah Jerushalem hai thou Jerikho wa tum ma jung spa akha am meh. Chuna aruthei ngei na amo ta tukhlakka phita apun anie lah ah thi no hai ta hou phur so.
Chunapa chu hita shukso ae thiempu akha na hana lampi tienga tuma majung juija spa hata ripha ah amo na lampi adang tienga theija thingso.
Hahekta chap mana Levite spa akha kom hana lampi ah junga amota an phur weta akha chu lampi adang tienga amona thingso.
Chuti weta samariah spa akha kom hana lampi ah mathing juija amo ta tukhlakso. Chuna amo na mari juija malung shukka ringrei ngei ja.

Amo na ma am na ah waveta atuk apumma alem akui am na ah siktui not ah akha chu darkha tui sungpi ah hra bakta hlum piso. Hana machungna asa chunga shiveta inn akha ah amo na hra bakta matun mahlou ae pi so.
Atuk hu war juija amona dinari ani lah weta inn hakpa ta pe so. “Amota hrabakta an pi oh ta kom rilla hana chunga alut nasel nathum ha keina ka lea juija nakolla lea pi ange.”
Chuna Jisu na nahi rilveta chan so, “Nalungranga chu mani ennthum sunga atu na inn ning tung tieng hekta aruthei ngei na phita shi spa hata mal tek mo ae?”
Roukung chupi takpi pa na sange, “leima lungshi ah makolla ae pa na ae.”
Jisu na ril, “Thing weta nangkom hata ae oh.”
Jisu akha chu arui ngei na mani lampi ah hata mani thing juija husung akha ah namei Martha tinuna mani ta ariem ma ma inn sunga tungpi.
Amo ha ma ute Mary ti akha am meh, amo na Jisu kae kunga ong weta machu ah am rou hrabak ta ngei ah am.

Martha ma ae ang tullu leima tam ma dol hai sulla amo na Arengpu am na wa weta ril, “Ka ute ha tullu limpa kathei chakka ae ranga keita hou phurra hana am meh? Chuna makolla nangna rilpi oh ka tullu san ranga!”
Arengpu na sangso, “Martha, Martha! Haja tam taranga nangna olla am che.
Chuti weta akha te chak hi darkar am songe. Mary na ahra routakka halso ae chuna makolla hai thou wa lah ah thing ang no ae.”
Nahani akha ah Jisu na amunt akha ah aniek ma su juija, Marui akha na makolla ril, “Arengpu, kanita aniek rang chupi oh, Johan na arui ngei ta chupi hekta.”
Jisu na manita ril, “Nangei na niek juija, hita rillo:
Pathieng: naming athieng changshu oh
na rengram jung shu oh.
Nahani ah kani bakrang pe pi oh,
kani pak kom silpi oh.
Rouram chu kani na kom kanita alal ae ngeita
ngakpi hekta. Akha chu kani ta ahlem na nea no ranga.”
Hana Jisu na arui ngei ta ril. Ejonga nangei karra akha na natronpi inn na janjaija thing weta makolla rillo. Tronpi oh budol ennthum te pu hak tikkae ta.
Katronpi akha ka inn na ramhai thou wa tunga mabak rang ephao am no wa am singe!
Chuna ejonga natronpi na hita sanga inn sunga thou, keita jet no oh, inn har kom kal sange hana kasanao ngei lea kei kot chunga am singe kei na thou weta ephao pe nea ang ni jange nangta.
Keina nangei kolla rillinge amo ha matronpi mak halkom thou weta pe num no ae. Chuti halkom amona lea ah, lea ah, ajak am no ah maniek rouram sarukka amo na thou weta atron pi hana ahop na pe pi ae.
“Chuna, nangei kolla keina rillinge sai ta lea chu nangna pha ang che; jong ta lea chu nangna tukkang che; rai oh, chu lea chu natarang hongpi ange innkal.
Rouram chu aniek meelim na pha ae hana atujong jong meelim na tukpha ae, hana innkal rai meelim taranga hongpi ae.
Nangei karra atu mapa na asanao na tuiriek niek juija arul pe mee am ma meh?
Ano lea artui niek jui ja eimehnu pe mee am meh?
Hrano nangei ha nasanao ta ahra pekrang dang ta lou chu thangwan na pathieng na chu nangei ta eja ah lella muihla athieng aniek meelim ta pe ang meh!”
Jisu na atrong shukpi no wa dijabol na shi spa akha kolla dijabol ta julla mahou sanu takka spa ha atrong shuk thou ah, meelim na angak shuk so.
Chuti weta malmashi ahre na chu ril, “Na hi Beelzebul, dijabol ngei rengpa ae, amo na majaitha pe ah julla hla nea ah ae.”
Adang ngei na Jisu ta chang an num ma mani na Jisu ta anealah tullu kani ta nangna ri pi oh Chungthiengna angei ae ta dang rang.

Chuti weta Jisu na mani halla am dangpha ah amona manita ril. Ram akha hi mani mashel sunga sulla adang adanga ta hlak lea chu sat tang no ae. Hana chakno wa inn sunga mani mashel ngai hlakno lea adang adanga ta ange.
Chuna ejonga saitan ngei rengram abom, abom manimashel sulhlak lea chu eja shotta am mang? Dijabol kajulla kahla hi Beelzebul na keita pek jaitha ae ta nanei rilha.
Ejonga na hi ah mah aleh chu keina alo ta manita julla hla hou nea ang? Alota nangei nuju ngei na manita julla hla nea ang? Nanutieng jui mee ngei na nang hi ralla am meh ti dangpi ange!
Nahi ano ae, Chungthieng hina jaitha ah keina dijabol ta julla hla inge chuna hina chu Chungthieng rengram hi nangei kolla tung so ae.
“Arat athei spa akha na cham shai akha chu chai alem su wa ma inn hakka am lea chu mapot machai lim pa am ang no ae.
Chuti weta amota hella rattek ti spa akha na machunga mane juija chu amona mapot machet akha chu machamp masei limpa amona choija thing weta samso.
“Atujong amoha kamee no lea amo chu keita ngarchang mee ae; atujong akha na kei hita hom ha no mee amo chu routakka adang, adang ta ange.

“Hrano muihla na mee kol hai thou wa shukka thing juija amo na masol hak ranga ram kang ram munt junga nathingjui, ramunt matuk no juija amona mathei chakka hita ril, ‘Keina shukka kathingna inn lea ang singe.’
Chuna hita ma lea juija amona shukka mathing na inn ha leima hra ah thieng am so ae.
Hana amona shukka thing weta amo na hella hrano muihla sari ruija phao weta mani na hana am so. Chunapa chu mani na ripta nejuija chu athou leija mahratno ta lella hrano tek so.
Jisu na rou hi rilla am lei ah wairul riha kar sunga namei nu akha na Jisu kolla ril, “Nangta don nu akha chu nutang thun na hang namei nu ha eja ah jarhra mo mu!”
Chuti weta Jisu na sange, “Chungthieng rou ngei weta aril jui ngei hana eja ah jaihra tek kae!”

Jisu ta wairul riha na ahul tunga am ma amo na hita channowa ril, “Eja ah hrano meerol ngei sa atun rija mee ngei hi! manina angakpi tullu hachak sai ah am meh, Jonah kolla pek chak ano wa atu akha kolla pe ang niejo weh.
Rouphupa Jonah kolla anelah hi kom Nineve malmashi ngei taranga ae chu hekta atun rija malmashi ngei taranga meesanaopa hina anealah changpi so ae.

Chuna routreem rungnie ah chu natak tienga rengnu Sheba na ngir thou weta atun rija malmashi ngei ta neinunt pe ange. Rouram chu amo na simlei su-wa rolla araeng Solomon lungsing lungwan ngei tikkaeta phao wa chuna nangei kolla keina karil num chu Solomon ta loktek akha am ae tiha.

Routreem rungnie ah chu Ninewa mee ngeina ngir thou weta nangei ta neinunt non nange, rouram chu mani na Jonah rousui juija mani pak heithou alung hlonge; chuna kei na adiek rou rillinge Jonah ta ahre chak halkom loktek akha hina am meh!
“Atu akha na awar dewankari ka thuppa shi no ae, hana tai ah burra kom shino ae hata mashi ang sarukka dewankari shi na chunga shi ae. Chuta lea chu inn sunga lut mee lim na awar ri pha nea ange.
Namit ha chu napum ma dewankari ae. Chuna namit na leima hrat lei lim chu napum limpa kom war ra am mange chuti weta namit na hrano wa ri no jui ja chu napum limpa thimma chak am mange.
Chuna sarukka nakolla am awar ha thimjou meh ta hrabakka an no.
Ejonga napum limpana war huppa am juija akha chu athim ahui te phao am tol no juija chu awar na shi hak ti ange chuna diwankari na nakolla mawar war pi jui ja war hek ta nang kom war ange.”
Jisu na rou rilsu natienga Pharisis na amo hita bakha ranga kokka Jisu na lut ve ta bak ranga ong so.
Jisu na kut sil no wa bu bak juija Pharisis na angak shukso.
Chuna pa chu Jisu na makolla ril. “Anno, Pharisis nangeina chu tuidon akha chu buhu hi awou wa chak sil chau ae chuti weta asunga chu hra no na shi hak ti chao ae.
Lungmo oh! Chungthieng na awou sakleija asunga kom sa no meh?
Chuna nakolla am mahai ha sarra ring ngei ta ripta pejo chuleh chu nakolla eheilimpa ha athieng chang ange.
“Oh, Pharisis nangei tarang eja ah ati pi meh! nangei na Chungthieng kolla som ma akha chu adiek nathingparsa pe weta Chungthieng hina lungshit akha chu adiek hata na thadol chau ae.
“Eja ah ati pi meh Pharisis ngei oh! Synagogue sunga chu lokka angna halla shi ah akha chu malmashi bomtul na karra chu nangei ta ajak ati pe pinum ma.
Eja ah ati pi meh! nangei chu amel dang lou hlan bong ngei hek ti ae akha chu hana chunga ephao dangno wa rolla am ngei hekti ange.”
Roukung ocha ngei karrak sunga akha na Jisu kolla ril, “Ocha, narilla am rou hi kani ta kom nuiso che ae!”

Hana Jisu na sang. “Eja ah ati pi meh roukung ocha nangei kom! nangei na malmashi ngei ta ron na arit pot ronpi ah nangei na chu nangei kutchal te phou dokka shukka mani rot arit pot san num no chao mani ta.
Eja ah ati pi meh nangei hi! Roulam chu nangeina Chungthieng rouphu ngei taranga hlan hur chao ae napanapu ngei na manita that phur ae.
Ngei na rilsuk so ae, hana nangei pipu ngei na ae phur tullu ha. Manina rouphu ngeita that weta nangai na hlan saem chao ae.
Hina rou sarukka Chungthieng lungwar na rilleh, ‘Kei na rouphu ngei akha chu rou ron eje hla inge, chuti weta manina mani ahre ta that ta ahre tana aol ana pe ae.’
Chuna sarukka atun rija mee ngei ta aol ana pe ange roulam chu mani na rouphu ngei ta that te simlei shak hai thou wa.
Abel ta that hai thou wa Zekariah ta athieng amunt lea maicham karrakka that ta. Chuna keina nangei kolla ril inge, atun rija mee ngei limpa ta aol ana pe ange!
“Roukung ocha na ngei tarang eja ah ati pe meh! Roulam chu nangeina thimwar inn na lut rang innkal aikilh shi ah, nangei na kom lut no, lut tikkae ti mee taranga ko ngei na lut pi no!”
Jisu na amunt ha houphurra mathing sanutienga Roukung ocha ngei lea Pharisis ngei na trong jet hlakka leima kha ah leima tam rou sai hlakka thou so.
Manina ejongpa akha lalla maril juija changa mant ranga mani na amota hakka am so.
Wairul lasing malmashi eja na bom tulla akha na akha chunga kae tro hlakka am ha juija Jisu na masha ah arui ngei ta ril, “Hra bakta am mo ha chu Pharisis ngei na ahra sa ae.
Rouram chu eheilimpa hi thuppa shi ngei ephao ngai ang no ae hana wurra shi ang kom wurra ngei ang no ae.
Chuna sarukka athim thuija ehal kom naril ha nisoun awar ra theija am meh. Akha chu eheilim pa nangei thei chakka aruhan ta nangei inn sunga ril hlak rou ha inn chunga ringa thei ja am meh.
“Tonpi ngei jo kei na nangei kolla ril tikkae nangei nangei pum ta that nea mee kolla ephao ati no oh, rouram chu amona anutienga ephao hrano tullu lu nea ang no ae.
Kei na atu ta ti anga meh ti ha ri pi tikkae: Chungthieng ta ati oh amo na chu nangei ta that sanutienga kom sarmei kum ma denga hou nea ae. Karil rou hi ngoiringo, amo ae nangei tit rang chu!
“Naija peisha ani taranga ushak ranga jurra no meh? Chuti phao sunga Chungthieng na chu mani ta makka hou nea no ae.
Nalu ah nasam lim takom amo na masing danga am meh. Chuna sarukka ephao ati no oh: nangei chu atam ushak ngei ta hella nangei chu amant tam meh!
“Kei na nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge atujongna meelim maikunga hrabakta ril shuk nea mee amo ha ka mee ae chuna meesanao pa na kom wanrui ngei akha chu Chungthieng mai kunga hekta ae ange.
Chuti weta atujongna keita meelim maikunga ngeinum no lea meesanaopa na kom wanrui ngei akha chu Chungthieng maikunga ngeinum mang no ae.
“Atujong akha na meesanaopa ta trongshi ril chu ngakpi ange; chuti weta muihla athieng ta trongshi rilla anda lea chu ngak pi nea ang no ae.
“Chuna nangei ta synagogue sunga lamkai ngei ane angam akha chu Governore ngei maikunga rui ja phao juija alo ta nakkang sa hana alo ta sang ang sa ta nalung ephao olno oh.
Roulam chu muihla athieng hana apha hana alo ta nangna rillang mo ti chu pi ange.”
Wairul riha sunga spa akha na Jisu ta ril, “Ocha kata kolla kapa houphur anei adon limpa ha keita sampi rang ril pi oh.”
Jisu na makolla sang, “Tonpi oh, atu na keita nanui ani anei adon sam ranga karou am nonge?”

Chuna meelim ta kom amona channo lutta ril, “Natakna natakta chekshilla am mo karam paicha ngei kar sunga, roulam chu malmashi adiek ringchan ma am madon hana ah no ae, machong mareng hana kom ah no ae.”
Hana Jisu na manita panteem akha ril ae: “Atu jong achongpu akha eenkulla muchi balna leima ra ae.
Chuna amo na hita hal thou so, mathei chakka, ‘Keina amunt limpa ah muchi balna shi hap sange kei alo ta ae ang jou sha?
Hiso ae ka ae rang tullu chu,’ mathei chakka ril; ‘Keina kasier hi hri weta hita hel alok akha sha weta muchi balna limpa hi hrabakta shi ang singe.
Hana keina kathei chakka rillange, jaihra spa! Akum eja taranga nadarkar makhai shi sange naringchang ha bakka inn na riem ma nathei chakka ringo!’
Chuti weta Chungthieng na makolla ril, ‘Lungmo nang! Awoni jantieng mak hina naring chang pe ta so che; chuna sarukka atu na ahra pot nashi limpa hi pha ang sa nataranga na shi ha?’ ”
Hana Jisu na hita chan, “Chungthieng ningtienga achong areng changno mathei chak tarang anei adon shi ngei chu hi hek ti ange.”
Hana Jisu na arui ngei ta ril, “Keina nangei kolla rilla aminge, ha chu ephao olno oh, bakranga ring ranga darkar ngei kom, hana nangei pum taranga punchoi.
Ringchang na bu an ta hella amant tam tekkae hana pum na kom pun choi derchoi ta hella kom amant tam tekkae.

Anno waak ngei ta; manina muchi kom wor no ae hana hom ma kom shi no ae; Mani shang shi na sier kom am no ae chuti weta Chungthieng na manita bakpi inn pi ah am meh! nangei chu awa ngei ta hella amant tam tekkae.
Atuna nangei na olla so ae ta nangei ringchang ha huningchan thap sai pine sha?
Chuna nangei na hajong atan te tarang phao nangei nea am no weta eje ranga adang adangei taranga olla am ma chao.
Anno ahlam rei na tau wa hang, mani taranga mani na ephao wa laharra pun choi no ae chuna keina nangei kolla rilla amminge Solomon na phao wa rei ngei ta hella ahra punchoi am nea no ae.
Awoni ah par weta atukka tuijang thingna rampa ngeita eja ah hra pi lea chu, nangei ta chu eja ah hella punchoi dirchoi jon pi ang sha? Oh ngoiring thei lou nang!
“Chuna nangei lung sunga ephao wa olla hal no oh ebakkang e-ennang sa ta.
(Shimlei jati meelim na chu nahi na taranga jonga rolleh.) Na pathieng na nangei na nahi darkar am meh ta danga am meh.
Chuna saruk chu nangei na Chungtheing rengram ha jong ma sha oh, amo na nalim pa ha nangei ta pe ange.
“Atri no oh, kelmo naongei, roulam chu patieng na nangei kolla Chungtheing rengram pe num meh.

Na am nadon lim jur weta sara ringrei ngei kolla napha sum ha pe oh, amang am lou sum hou sem ma shi oh, ha chu aru thei ngei na kom ruk no na akha chu soum na kom bak no na thangwan ram ma chuna athang ti kom am no ae.
Chu lea chu nangei sona rupa am na amunt na nangei lungkom hana amange.
“Nakung rui chetta huppa amo akha chu Nata dewankari warpi ah.
Mitpu akha na taichang na thinga ma lea arui na hakka am hekta ha chu maleh jui ja inn kal ha woiha chakka rei jui ja inn kal ha woiha chakka hong rang.
Mitpuna lea juija aol donga hakka am ngei ha jaihra ae nu. Keina nangei kolla diekka rillinge malut juija amo na malinglut lep weta ma doukang chunga onga bakha pha ange.
Eja ah jaihra ang sa thou rang ae ah hakka am ngei ha, amo na janjei ah phao hal anutienga phao hal!
Chuna inn mitpu na aru theipa phao rang apha dang lea chu aru theipa na etikka kom ma inn thu gai weta lut nea ang no ae.
Chuna nangei kom thourang ae ah hakko. Roulam chu mee sanao pa na jung ang apha ha nangei ngoiring no jui ja kom ngei ae.”
Pitar na ril, “Arengpu na panteem hi kani taranga mo ano lea malmashi lim ngei na lak ranga etina mo ae?”
Arengpuna sang. “Atuna chu ngoiring chet akha chu lungwar shuk rui mo ae? Atujong kolla mitpu na ma inn sunga pot lim pa kut shilna ah apha cha ah bakrang pe ah ngoiring sa?
Hijongpa hra tullu lu ja am rui ha mitpu na tuk hlak juija eja ah jaihra ang sa!
Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge mitpu hana hajong rui hata inn sunga pot lim pa ha makut chunga silna ange.
Chuti weta atujong rui akha na athei chakka hita rilla, kamitpu hi lea nei nijo ve ta adang arui namei apa makhai ta bakka inn weta phitta.
Hana naha nie chu mangoiring no na apha ah ma mitpu lea juija amitpu na amota atan, atan tan weta aril jui no ngei kolla saruk pha pi ange.
“Amitpu lunghal dangpha rui chuti weta tullu chu lu no akha chu thourang ae no rui amo ta chu ringphur-mea sha chokta makhai pittange.

Chuti weta amitpu lunghal dangpha no rui chuti phao sunga ma lu na tullu anu juija phitta ngei mee ta chu haja panu phittang no ae. Hana atam pe meelim ngei hai thou wa atom la tikta rillange hana mee ngei na tamma hou phur na mee kol hai thou wa tam ma nie ange.
Simlei chunga kajung hi sermei huljung inge chuna alota kadit hi atun chu thou so ve!
Keina baptias pharang am ae, chuna nahi kasu ma lim ma keita eja ah lung aol pi meh!
Simlei chunga adai pe junge ta nangei na halla chau, ah nonge hella tieng ahran tul sukranga ae.
Atun hai thou chu inn sung am mee ranga sunga inthum na ani ta hran hlakka ani na inthum ngarchang ange.

Mapa ngei na kom asanaopa ngei ta ngarchang ange hana asanaopangei na kom mapa ta ngarchang ange. Hana manu ngeina kom asanaonu ngei ta anda ange hana asanao nu ngei na kom manu ngita ngarchang ange; Hana mani ngei na kom amao ngei ta ngarchang ange hana amao ngei na kam mani ngei ta ngarchang ange.”
Jisu na malmashi ngei ta kom ril, “Nangei na nattak tienga hai thou wa sumphai na hang juija nangei na ril hlakkae ru sur ange hana ru kom hata rukom sur ae.
Akha chu hlangtienga hai thou thirang ranga hang juija nangei na dangpha nea ae semnie hi leima sa ange ta naha, hata sa takkae.
Oh, taat-tool! nangei na wan na akha alei ah anna re weta danga chau ae chuti weta atun apha hi ejongpa apha meh ti chu dangne no chau ae?
“Chuna alo wa nathei chakna adiek dangveta ahra tullu lu no wa chau?

Hana nang hitta rou shukka am hana mitpu am na lam ma thing ha leija lampi ah makolla na maral sanpirang ril hou jou oh, ano lea amo na nangta routreem mitpu am na mun phao ruija thing weta routreem mitpu na alok ashai sanao ngei kut chunga pe ah mani na nangta aol raen-inn sunga si ange.
Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge amunt hana nasum ding hap ma lim ma hata raen - inn sunga am mang che.”
Halei matam ah malmashi arhe amunt hana amma manina Jisu kolla ril ae, “Pilate na Galily ngei ta manina Chungthiengta rithoi leiya manita that ae.”
Jisu na sange manita, “Nangei na alo ta halla chao mathat Galily mee na adang Galily ta hella hrano akha chu pak chel mee ngei meh?
Ano ae, kei na nangei ta rilla aminge nangei pak hai thou wa lunghlong am no lea nangei kom hata thi ange.
Ano lea Siloam inn na triem ma dolla that mee asom arit ha alo ta halla chao? Anoleh mani ha Jerushalem sunga ringa am makhai ta hella hrano vokno ngei ae ta halla chao?
Ano ae! Keina nangei kolla rilla am minge ejonga nangei na pak hai thou wa lunghlong no lea chu nangei kom mani thit hekta thi ange.”
Hana Jisu na manita na panteem hi ril: “Apha akha ah spa akha na ma inn kul sunge theichang kung linga shi ah, Amo na nahani chu ma an thingjuija ara ephou tuk nijove.

Chunapa chu amona ma inn kulla mashi mee kolla ril. ‘Anno, kum thum su so ae na theichang kung hi ara ra mo ta hakka a ka am keina awoni phao tuk nonge ara. Chuna akung hi tan na hou wo! Eje ranga lei hou makhai amona chuppa am mang sa?’
Chuna pa chu innkul hakpa na sange, ‘Ocha kum akha te chak tou wa am ri shu oh; keina akung hi ahul tunga chau weta alei hrat rang athu anang shi ange.
Hana chu nakum tienga chu ara leima ra ange hana ra no lea nang na tan na hou pi oh,’ ”
Sabbath rungnie akha ah Jisu na synagogue sunga chupi takpi am lei ah.
Hrano muihla na lutta kum asom arit khak olla am snu akha hana am meh; Amo ha chu ounchokka chak am so ae akae ha athei chakka dokne no jarra.
Jisu na amo ta ri jui ja amo na snu hata kokka ril, “Namei na ah na am hai thou wa dam jo oh!”
Jisu na makut machunga shi weta hana chu namai nu na athei chakka dok shukka Chungthieng ta amona dom.

Synagogue sunga am offisar na Jisu na Sabbath nie ah dampi sarukka lungsa so. Chuna pa chu amona meengei kolla rilsukso. “Ani tullu lu rang rungnie naruk am meh; chuna na lei apha sunga nangna rungnie sunga nang dampi ngei ae sabbath rungnie ano lutta!”
Areng Jisu na sange makolla, “Oh hypokrite! nangei lim na nangei silchalpa akha chu Kormoh ren na shi hai thou hla weta sabbath rungnie ah tui enn pi no wa chao.
Hina Abraham atu ate hai thou wa shuk namei nu hi Saitan na kum asom arit huppa shi hi sabbath ni ja hla ngei no meh?”
Jisu na sang rou hana amo ta anda ngei ta ajak tukpi so mani theichakka meelim na ariemma am meh ma ae angakpi lei sunga.
Jisu na sai, Chungthieng rengram hi ehek ti ang sha ta? Akha chu alo ta kei na hihek ti ange ta ae ang sha ril?
Hihek ti ange. Spa akha na antam machi ha ma innkulla mawor juija tau wa hanga thingkung hek ti so. Chuna awa ngeina abak chunga abu ran nea ae.”
Woihapa Jisu na sai, “Chungthieng rengram hi ejongpa hitta mel mal hlakkae ta rillang sa?
Ha chu hi hek ti ae. Namei akha na majam ha achol hita mapul juija majam lim purra shuk malim achol mahap jongpa ae.”
Jisu na hulok husin nei no lutta amo na thing, thing weta Jerushalem ma malampi thing lam ma chupi takpi ae.
Atujong ahre akha na makolla sai, “Arengpu, malmashi ahre te chak nangna sanpi anga che?” Jisu na manita sang.
“Narat nathei hana achip lam ma lutrang jullo; roulam chu mee atam pa na lut ranga jul hal kom mani na pak ka lut nea ang no ae.

Inn mitpu na inn kal ha kal su nutienga chu nangna inn kal awau wa ngirra am weta inn kal rei wa ah rillang che, ‘Arengpu kani ta rang inn kal hongpi oh!’ hana amo na hi sange nangta, ‘Keina nangta dang nonge hoija thou phao mo ti ha!’
Hana nangna hita sange, ‘Kani hulokka nachupi natakpi lei ah ani na bakha inn ha ha!’
Chuti weta amona woiha hita rillange, ‘keina nang hi hoija thou phao mo dang nonge ka am na hai thou wa thingjou oh hrano malmashi!’
Alo ta makhai natrap ang sa naha riella, Abraham, Isaac akha chu Jacob, hana Chungthieng rengram ma rouphu ngei ta nari jui ja, hana nang ta chu denga hou ang so ae.
Nasu natlak akha chu shaktieng hlang tienga malmashi ngei na phao weta Chungthieng rengram ma ba bakha rang ong ha ange.
Chuna juija chu rui nunga am ngei na masha ange akha chu masha ah am ngeina rui nung ange.”
Hana lei apha ah Pharisis ahre na Jisu kolla phao weta makolla ril, “Nang hi amunt hina thou wa ram adanga shukka thing jou oh, roulam chu reng Herod na nangta that tange.”

Jisu na mani ta sang, “Nangei na thing weta ram ui ngei ta rillo: ‘Kei na dijabol ngei ta julla akha chu rai eja ta dampi ah awoni akha chu atuk phao am weta rungnie mathum nie ah ka tullu hi su ange.’
Chuti halkom keina awoni kom atukkom hana nathang ni ah ka lampi ah thinga ta sange, roulam chu rouphupa akha phao Jerushalem sunga thi ngei no ae!

“Oh, Jerushalem, Jerushalem! nangei na rouphu ngeita thatta, akha chu nangei tarang Chungthieng rouron ngeita alung denga! Arpinu na ate ngeita ahla rum sunga kulla shihekta shinum halkom nangei na chu ngeinum no ae!

Chuna anno nangei inn ha nangei kut chunga akaruksha ah hou phur sange keina nangei kolla diekka rillinge ha chu, ‘Chungtheing jaihra pi jo arengpu ming jung amoha ta’ nangei ril ma lim chu nangei na keita ripha nea ang ni jo weh.”
Sabbath rungnie akha ah Jisu na Pharisis lamkaipu inn na bu bakha ranga mathing juija hana mee ngei na amota neija anna am meh.
Akae akut apum lei na na spa akha na Jisu kolla phao ae.
Hanapa chu Jisu na roukung ocha lea Pharisis ngei ta sai, “Sabbath rungnie ah ana ta dampi hi ani roukung na angei ah no ae, ta sai?”
Chuna pa chu mani na ephao wa sang no pa chu Jisu na spa hata manant dampi weta hla so ae.
Hana amona manita ril, “Ejonga ni kar sunga nangei sanaopa anoleh silchelpa na sabbath rungnie ah kum sunga tul lea sabbath rungni makhal kom nangei na thing weta kaija shuk kang no wa che?”
Chunapa chu mani atu nakom makolla sang nea no ae.
Awin ahre na amunt ahra ha haljui ah Jisu na dangso chuna Jisu na mani limta na panteem hi ril.
“Nangta apha akha ah mau rui na ah kok juija ongna hra tek ti mun na ong no oh. Roulam chu nangta hella chungtek ti atujong akha ta kokka ko ngei ae.
Chuna nanuita kokka am pa na nakolla waveta hita ril ko ja ae, ‘Hi amunt hi amo na ong shu oh.’ Hana nang na thuitekti ongna amunt na ong ang ajakhang che ae.

Hana saruk chu nangta kok juija thui tekti ong na amunt na ong thingo. Chu lea chu nangta kokka am pa na nakolla wa weta hita rillange, ‘Tronpi oh, hina hratek ti am na amunt na kal hango.’ Nahina nanghekta Awin matonpi eja ngei maikunga hella ajak atri shakkange.
Chuna atujong akha na mathei chakka lokka hal mee chu nem mange hana atujong akha na mathei chakka nem ma hal mee chu alok changpi ange.”

Chuna Jisu ha bubak kokka am pa ta ril, “Ejonga nangna mee kolla bubak nakok juija natronpi anoleh na u-nanao anoleh nata anoleh inn ning tultienga achong areng ta kok no oh, roulam chu mani na nangta lea ah kok kange hana mani ta nangna lea ah pe ah ta ae.
Hana bu bak nakok juija nang sara ngei chak kokko, akha chu akea hor katlik mitcho ngei ta.
Chu lea chu nangna jaihra pha ang che, roulam chu mani na etikkom nangta lea ah pe nea ang no ae. Ahra malmashi ngei na athi sa hai thou wa ringthou nie ah Chungthieng na nangta lea ah pe sier ange.”
Jisu hitta ong ha ah bakha am akha na theija ril amota, “Chungthieng rengram ma ong ha weta bakha ang ngei, eja ah jaihra sa!”
Jisu na makolla ril, “Apha akha ah spa akha na mee ngei ta alok reen bubak rang kokkae.
Bubakrang apha ta juija chu amona marui ngeita makokphao awin lim ta rillo. ‘Wajou oh eheilem shu so ae!’
Chuti weta manina chu akha lea akha ngaidam hlak thouso. Chuna masha pa na arui hata ril, ‘keina loupok akha lei inge hana thing weta an thing ta so ae lungshi ngei ah keita ngakpi oh.’
Adang akha na ril keina sil chalpa papot ranga lei inge keina mani ta chang an nom inge keita ngakpi oh.
Adang akha na ril, ‘kei chu taichang su lim ti inge chuna sarukka kei chu phao nea ang nijange.’

“Hana arui na amitpu kolla lea weta na lim pa hi rilso. Amitpu ha lung leima sha ah arui hata ril, ‘Nangna husung sorok lamjai ah thingo, thing weta sara reiringei akae hor ngei katlik mitcho eja ruija phao oh.’
Leima ranga asuk hana sange, ‘Mitpu narou nu juija keina thing ange atun phao sunga ka leima tam am songe.’
Chuna amitpu hana asukta ril, ‘Nang na ram sunga am sorok lam ma thing weta meengei ta rillo, meengei phao weta ka inn hi shihak ti shu oh.’
Nangei ta kei na rillige ha chu, ‘Kakok sha awin ngei akha phao na kabu ka-an hina atui dangpha ang no ae!’ ”
Apha akha ah wairul rehana Jisu nutinga jui ah thing lei ah, Jisu na heileya manita ril,
“Atungjongpa akha na kanu juija rol weta mapata manuta, anamei asanao ta hana anaonu anaopa ta akha chu makta hella lungshi lea chu etikkom karui chang nea ang no ae.
Atu jong na mata khros ron ah kanutieng jui no lea chu karui chang nea ang no ae.
“Atu jong akha na inn ahra sa tik ta halla am lea chu masha ah ong weta ma am masum hana thee weta sune ang su-ne-angno ti hal masha ae.
Ejonga amo na hajong ae no lea chu amo na inn sune ang no ae inn mun chak thul weta chan lea chu amo ta ri meelim na nuisho ang no meh.
‘Na spa hina inn sa thou weta ma tullu su ni oh!’ weta manina rillange.

“Ejonga Rengpa akha spa lasing asom ruiveta ral ma ae thingjaija ma anda Rengpa akhana lalsing somnie spa ruija wa lea chu amo na masha ongveta adang rengpa ta ral mai ngakna ang mo ta akha chu marat mathei hana nea ang mo ta hal.
Ejonga amo na nea ang no lea, amo na Rengpa hata tukhlakrang rou choi mee hla weta aram lah ah am lei ah adai ah am ha rang sai ang no meh,”
hihekta nangei na kom ka rui chung tik kae ti lea chu nangei na eheilimpa hi pe hap malim chu jui nea ang no ae.
“Chi ti hi ahra ae, chuti weta atui ha mang shule woiha lea ah amota atui hap rang lampi akha phao am no ae.
Naha alei tarang kom lei-hao tarang eko kana no ae, naha deng nga hou weh. Kur am lim na thei so oh!”
Nahani akha ah khasana hrai ngei lea, phaija ta ngei na Jisu rou ngei ranga phao.
Pharisis ngei lea roukung ocha ngeina lung ollang thou so. “Na spa hina manijong phaija ta ngei ta riem ma ok chak no wa bakkom bakha ae!”
Chuna pa chu Jisu na manita panteem hi pe.
“Ejonga kelmo riha sunga akha na mang juija amo na alota ae sa? Amo na shachik ahra am na amunt na somku-ku ta shi phur weta amang kelmo ha matuk malim ma jonga rolleh.
Amona matukjuija ariemma maling chumma shi weta.
Ma inn na lea ah ruija hange chuna amona atonpi ngei akha inn ning tungtieng eja ta kokka bomtalpi ah manita ril, ‘Keina leima ariem minge roulamchu amangsha kelmo ha tuk singe chuna reen amange!’
Na chu hekta keina ril inge som-ku-aku malmashi ngei lung lhong darkar am no hal pakchel akhana lung lhong jui wanram ah eya ah riem mang meh.
“Anoleh ejonga nameinu akha na rupa makhai asom sunga akha mangjuija namei nu na alo ta ae sha? Nameinu na sermei warpi weta ma inn sunga eheilim pa hrabakta amona atuk ma lim ma jonge.
Nameinu na matukjuija amona atonpi inn-ning kolla am eja ta bom tul pi weta manita ril, ‘Keina leima ariem singe roulam chu kasum amang paisa ha tuksinge chuna ani lim na riem ha ei oh!’
Hihekta munt ha ah, keina nangeita rilla aminge Chungthieng wanrui ngei na pakchel akha na shilung hlongjuija leima ariem mange.”
Jisu na hata rilla am mah, “Apha akha ah spa akha hina sanao ani am meh.
Naopongpa na makolla ril, ‘Apa oh kachangphung shuk makhai ha atun keita pejo,’ chunapa chu spa hana asanao rel anita ajai hui weta sam so.
Apha atan te waitakka chu asanao naopongpa na masaruk makhai hi jurveta apha sum ha choiveta inn houphurra thingso. Amo na aram alah amunt akha ah masum makhai ha ariem salla lokchokta ringthing so.
Amona ma am makhai limpa thangsu takka hana ram ma ati pi makhai butang jutang akha shukso. Hana chu makolla ephao am ni jo ve.
Chunapa chu amo na naram sunga am mee akha kolla thing weta napa Innkul sunga wok selranga hata hlaso.
Amona awon taranga mahal juija vok bakna rak phao baknum pokkae chuti phao sunga atu akha na amota bakrang inn rang pe mee am no ae.
Achana ah chu amona hita halpha ah ril, ‘Kapa kor ngei lim na phao hita hella bakka am meh hina keina wanram ma waipha tukka am minga!
Keina thou wa thing ing weta kapa ta hita rillange, keina apa nakolla akha chu Chungthieng kolla pak tullu lu sange.
Kei hi nasanao ae ta kokka matik cha ni ange keita kom nasuuk ngei akha hekta hallo.’
Chuna pa chu amona ngir thou weta mapa am na ah lea rang thou so.
“Inn hai thou wa mapa na amo aram alah hai thou wa ri so; malungsunga leima ringrei ngei ah mapa na tanna waveta aban tieng shukka asanaopa ta abeng chuppa kol so.
Asanao pana ril, ‘Apa’, ‘keina Chungthieng akha chu apa nakolla pak tullu lu sange kei hi nasanao akha ae ta kok matik cha ni ange.’
Chuti weta mapa na chu akor ngei ta harra kokka ril! ‘Hra tekti pun akha machunga sengpi oh, makutta kom kutjabik akha chu akae ah hanghup happi oh.
Hana anal shilsanao jonga thatto hana ani na ariem ma reen ae weta bakha inn ha ange!
Roulamchu athi sa kasanaopa ha awoni chu amoha ring thou so; Amo ha amangsa so ae chuti weta awomni chu keina tuksinge.’ Hanapa chu manina bakka riem thou so.
“Hana lei apha sunga masanaopa ulientekpa chu loupokka am songe Inn tienga lampi ah maleh juija inn neija mawok juija hung rasam tolla lamma nuija am tara theiso.
Chunapa chu amo na kor akha kokveta makolla sai, ‘Eje hlakka am ma meh?’
Kor hana sangso, ‘Nanaopa ha lea so ae inn na ephao aol ana am no wa chuna sarukka napa na ariem hie sulla anol silsanao akha that ta ae.’
Mata pa na hana sarukka alung leima sha ah inn na luttang nonge; hanapa chu mapana shukka inn na lut rang hlem so.

Mapa ta amo na ril, ‘Anno, kum chuppa keina kor hekta tullu lu ah aminge keina naril natrong juino ti kom am nonge, nangna keita echu pe jou che? Katonpi ngei hitta kabakha rang kel akha te phao pe no che!
Chuti weta nasanao pa na nanei nadon limpa ariem salla vokno namei ngei hitta hou thinga inn na maleh juija nang na anol kel mataranga that pi ae!’
Mapa na sange, ‘Kasanao, nang chu apha chang honna kei hitta am ha ae hana eheilimpa hi nataranga chakkae.
Chuna ani na riemma reen ae anga sa ae roulam chu nanao ha athi sa ha awoni chu amohi ringso ae; Amo hi mangphur halkom atun chu tuksinge.’ ”
Jisu na marui ngei ta ril, “Apha akha ah achongpu spa akha na atujong kor akha ta manei madon lampa kutsilna ah, achongpu spa na halimpa pana ah am pa ta nangna sum limpa hi ariem salla houso ae.
Chuna amo na amota kokveta ril, ‘Hina narou kathei ah am hi alo wa meh? Chuna sarukka nakolla am sum limpa ha hrabakta an weta pejou oh, nangna pana ngei ang nijo weh?’
Akor hana matheichakka ril, ‘Ka mitpu na katullu hai thou wa chan pi ang ae so kei alota ae ang sha? Alei chau wa rol lang kom kajaitha am nonge, hana meekolla nieja rollang kam ajak sange.
Atun chu ka ae rang dang sange! Katullu ha theng halkom, keita ariem lamtuk ang mee tonpi inn am mange.’
Chuna mitpu na masum don limpata amona kokso. Amo na masha pa ta sai, ‘nangna mitpu sum eja don na che?’
Amona sang, ‘kei chu siktui mant riha chak don inge?’ Amona sang, ‘hina am so ae nadon’ Shilrang pana ril, ‘ong weta som nga ae ta jiekka shi oh.’
Hana adang akha ta amona sai, ‘Nang na chu eja donna am che?’ Amona sang, ‘Gehu hou lising akha borra don inge’ ‘hina am so ae nadon asum’ arengpa na ril, ‘ri ha rit ta jiekka shi oh.’
“Chuna dramo am lou kor ha theija singa ma ae na sarukka marengpuna amota domso. Rouram chu awar sanao ngei ta hella simlei sanao ngei na mani taranga hella athei singe.”
Hana Jisu na hata rilla am songe, “Keina nangei kolla rilla aminge: nangna hrano diek lao tullu jarra natonpi nasem ma amona mane nojuija chu manina nangeita atreem nei no amunt hana rui ah shi ange.
Atujong akha na asiente ah tullu ma ngoiringa ngei lea chu alok tullu ma kom ngoiringa ngei ae atujong akha na asiente tullu ma lung thiengno lea atam tullu ma kon alung thiengne ang no ae.
Chuna sarukka nongei na dramo ah lou anei adon taranga ngoiring ngei lou mee lea atu na chu nangeita ahra anei adon ta pe ang meh?
Hana nangei hi adang akha taranga ngoiring ngei no lea atu na nangei taranga nangeita pe anga meh?

“Atu kor akha na mitpu anie ta rui chang nea no ae; roulam chu akha tana atier weta akha ta chu lungshi ange; anoleh akha taranga chu ngir pi weta akha taranga chu ngir num mang no ae. Nangei na Chungthieng akha chu anei adonta ranga rui chang ngai ang no ae.”
Pharisis ngei na roulim hi theijuija mani na Jisu ta nuiso ae roulamchu mani ha sum leima dit jarra.

Jisu na manita ril, “Malmashi ngei mit an na nangei thei chakka ahra sa ngei ae, chuti weta Chungtheing na chu nangei lung danga am meh. Roulam chu nalim pa hi mee ngei taranga chu lei ma tam amant tam meh. Chungtheing ningtienga chu ephao am no ae.

“Moses na roukung akha chu rouphu ngei na jiekka shi chu, Johan Baptias hana apha phao te chakkae; hana hai thou wa Chungthieng rengram hina Ahra Rou hita rilla am meh, akha chu malmashi limpa ta nahana lampi ah lut no ngei no ae.
Chuna sarukka jiek sha roukung sunga bindu akha mang ang saruk chu wan lea alei ram mangpa na lai tekkae.
“Atujong spa akha na manamei hran weta adang nameita luhongleh chu simsi-bohrong ti ae. Akha chu mee hran namei hata anei spa hakom simsi-bohrong lal thing ti ae.
“Apha akha ah achongpu akha am phur ae mapun choi dier choi hi leima amant tam ma senge hana nahani ah maring hi chu ta makhai ah hoija ringe.
Hana hitta mun ha ah ehekta sara spa Lazaras ti pa apan anum na shihakti pa achongpu inn mai ja ruija wak chak ti pa akha kom am phur ae.
Hana ruija wakna lungrang chu achongpu pa doukang chunga tulla jung bu lem anlem te na awon hop ranga akha chu ui na kom matakka apat anum liek chak ti ae.
“Sara spa ha thija amo ta wanrui ngei na wanramma Abraham ningkolla ong ha rang ruija thingso. Hana achongpu pa kom thija alei ram ma phum so.
Sarmei kum sunga aol ana donga ma am na amunt hana thou wa aram lah ah Abraham ning kolla Lazaras onga am ripha so.
Chuna pa chu amo na kokso, ‘Apa Abraham! Keita ringrei ngei pi oh, chuna Lazaras ha sarmei kum ma olla ka am na mun na kut chal ta hana tui luppi weta kaleipar te ah daipi shu oh!’

“Chuveta Abraham na ril, ‘Angai len thei oh kasanaopa naring lei apha ah nataranga ahra eja pe so ae hana lei apha ah Lazaras chu hra no ngei chak pha phur ae chuna amo matak makna amunt hina ariem ma am ma ae nangna aol ana napha lei sunga.
Hi chak no wa anie karakko leima thuk kum akha kom am meh. Chuna sarukka hina kani am na ah atu jong akha na wa num hal wa nea no ae. Hana atu akha na kani am na mun na hai thou wa nea no ae.’
Achongpu pa na ril, ‘Apa Abraham nakolla nieja aminge Lazaras ta kapa inn na hla pi oh.
Hana kau-kanao ringa am meh, hana amo na manita tak shu oh mani na aol an amunt hina chak chu tungno shu oh.’
“Abraham na ril, ‘Na-u-nanao ngei ha rouphu ngei akha chu Moses hitta am ha ae manita rou ril ranga; na-u-nanao ngei ha mani ril ha jui ja ta ae.’
Achongpu hana sange, ‘Apa Abraham hana pel nonge! Athi sa ngei sunga akha na ringthou weta mani am na thing weta lea le-chu mani na pak hai thou wa lung hlong ange.’
Abraham na ril, ‘Ejonga Moses akha chu rouphu ngei ril jui no lea chu mani na etikka kom athi sa ngei sunga akha na ril hal kom jui num mang no ae.’ ”
Jisu na arui ngei ta ril, Malmashi ngei hi pakka tul rang suino wa ahlem am mange, chuti weta eja ah ati pi mo nu pakka tulpi amo ha!
Hijong asiante pak tullu ma pak ta pi ang saruk chu mataranga chu ahonga chakkari lung ren weta tuipi sunga denga houpa na hella hra tekkange.
Chuna natullu lu ha min na an no! “Ejonga na u-nanao akha na pak tullu lu lea chu trongshi rillo, han ejonga amo na lung hlong lea chu ngakpi oh.
Ejonga amo na nahani akha ah woi sari pak tullu nakolla ae lea chu amona alung hlonga woisari nakolla lea weta ko ngakpi oh ril lea chu amo ta ngakpi oh.”
Arui ngei na Jisu kolla ril, “kani ngoiring hi rat pi oh.”
Arengpu na ril, “Ejonga nangna antam muchi thapte nangoiring am lea chu nang na kabarang kung ta nangna nathei chakka atro tolla phoi weta tuipi sunga phun mo naril jui ange.”
“Ejong nangei kar sunga akha na kor don na lou hui thing anoleh kelmo rungpi se weta ramma thou mahong juija nangna mabu bakka am lei ja ranga barro ta ril che?
