Nata ril no ae! Hana hutta makolla naril chu, kabu bak ranga su so ae chuna napun nani sem sa ah keita tun hlou ae pi oh. Kabak lei sunga kabak su nutienga nataranga bu hran na am mange?
Kor hana matullu ae sarukka naril jui sarukka nangna amo ta ariem minge ta rilla che?
Chuna sarukka nangei kolla pek trongsan lim pa ha ae su wa, ‘Ani chu matik chano kor, ani hi ae phung shuk tullu chak ae so ae ta nangei na rillo.’ ”
Jisu Jerushalem malampi tienga mathing juija amo na Samaria lea Galily apanga thinge.
Mathing na husunga ae atipi ah untsha rai na asom spa ta aram lah hai thou wa ngirra am ripha.
Hana mani na hita aou shukkae, “Arengpu Jisu! Kani ta ringrei ngei pi oh!”
Jisu na mani ta rija ril, “Nangei takka thing weta thiempu ngei ta an pi oh.”
Mani thingna lam ma mani ha dam so ae.
Mani kar sunga akha na matak ma an juija damso ae. Amo na lea weta Chungthieng ta ariem sanrolla domso.
Matak mathei chakka Jisu kae kunga bokka mokveta amota ariemma domso. Amo ha Samaritan malmashi ae.
Jisu na ril, “Spa asom no meh dam pha ha chu, hoija am meh aku ahre chu?
Alo sarukka ramdang sanao akha hina chak lea weta Chungthieng ta ariem minge ta ril meh?
Chuna Jisu na makolla ril, “Thou jou oh; nangoiring jarra nang na dam pha so che.”
Pharisis ahre na Jisu kolla Chungthieng rengram hi etikka jung ang meh ta sai. Masang phur chu, “Chungthieng rengram chu ri chek-chekta jung ang no ae.
Atu akha na rillang no ae, ‘Anno, hina amso weh!’ ah nolea, ‘hiso ae!’ roulam chu Chungthieng rengram chu nakolla am so ae.”
Hana Jisu na arui ngeita ril, “Meesanao pana jung ang rungnie ha nangei na rinum chau halkom rine no rungnie ha phao ange.
Nangei ta mee ngeina hita rillange, ‘Anno hako am so ae!’ ano lea, ‘hina am so ae!’ Chuti weta hana anthing rang shukka thingno oh.
Wochamplakna wan na mawar juija adang amunt tienga mawar pha nea hekta meesanaopa rungnie kom chu hekti ange.
Chuti weta masha ah aol ana eja pha ah awoni ah nangei mee ngei na kom nangta ngei num mang no ae.
Meesanaopa rungnie ah chu Noah apha hek ti ange.
Malmashi limpa na bakka inn na akha chu namei apa taichang lhakka Noah na kung sunga lut nie rungni phao wa tui lokka mani thit ha.
Hana jui ja chu Lot apha hekta. Malmashi limpa na bakka inn na pot lei ah jurra inn sha ah am mange.
Lot na Sodom hou wa mathing waitakka wan tieng hai thou wa sarmei na ru sur hekta junga mani limta that so.
Meesanaopa na rungnie hakom hi hek ta ripha ange.
Nani rungnie hana chu atu mo akha na inn chunga am halkom tumma jungveta mapot la jung no shu oh; hahekta loupokka am mee na kom ma inn na lea ah an no shu oh.
Lot namei nu ta angei thei oh!
Atujong na maringchang tarang hal mee chu amang pha ange. Hana tujongna maringchang tarang hal no lea chu jaihra pha ange.
Keina nangei kolla rilla am minge nani rungnie ah chu kot chunga malmashi anie na jalla am sunga akha ta ruija thing ange akha ta na hou phur ange.
Namei anie na sangsu wa am mange akha tana ruija thing ange akha tana hou phur ange.”
(Loupokka malmashi anie na tullu lu ah amange akha tana ruija thing ange hana akha tana houphur ange.)
Arui ngei na makolla sai, “Hoija meh Arengpu?”
Jisu na sang, “Hoiya amunt na hal athi sa ngei am na amunt na longkija kom pulla am mange.”
Jisu na arui ngei ta nuleh no lutta akha chu apha chang honna nei rang panteem hi mani ta chupi ae.
“Hulokka routreem akha Chungthieng ta kom ti lou akha chu mee ngei ta kom ajak ati am lou akha am meh.
Hana huloka makka arongnu akha na makolla apha changhon na phao weta, ‘keita anda ngeita lamant dingpi oh ta makolla san ranga phao!’
Apha aja amatienga napana ngeinum no wa ephao ae no hal atreem na ah chu mathei chakka ril, ‘Keina Chungthieng ta ti nohal akha chu mee ngeita ajak ati no hal.
Chutihal kom na arongnu na kakolla aol pek amhi, keina mapha phom shuk eheilim aun na tasinge. Keina na hi aepi noleh chu amona notichang hou wa ange, atreem na chu keita aol pe ange?’ ”
Arengpu na manita rilla am song, “Ngei oh hrano routreem ae pa na alota ril sha.
Atun chu Chungthieng na chu alo ta mamee ngei na makolla niesun janting nei no wa sanpi oh rilla am ngei ta routreem ae pi ang no wa meh? Hana amona mani tarang tai ah am mang meh?
Keina nangei kolla rilla aminge amo na mamee ngei taranga eshot shot no ah masanao pa na simleichunga majung jui ja chu amonta ngoiringei ta tuk ange?”
Jisu na hikom mathei, mathei, chakka kei chu diekka ahra mee inge hana meelim pa chu ephao ushit no ngei kolla ril.
“Apha akha ah spa anie na mokna inn na hangveta hita nie ae, akha chu Pharisis ae hana adang akha na khasana hrai mee ae.

Pharisis na amunt akha ah mathei ah ngir weta nie so, ‘leima ariem minge Chungthieng ha chu kei chu sum di mee kom anonge lung thiengno kom anonge hana meenamei ta kom lal nonge mee ngei hekta hana ka riem akha na khasana hrai pa hek ti nonge.
Rungnie nasari sunga rungnie nani bu hai ah nie inge hana kapha sum lim chang honna somma akha pe inge.’
Chuti weta khasana hrai pa chu aram la takka ngirveta amai te phou wan tienga hai nea no wa atlanga bengveta ril, ‘Chungthieng keita jaishi akha ae ta ringrei ngei pi oh!’

Keina nangei kolla rillinge” Jisu na ril, “Chungthieng ningtienga chu khasana hrai pa na adiek mee ae hana Pharisis pa ta no ae. Chuna sarukka atujong na mathei chakka adiekke ta hal lea chu methui dong ang ae hana atujong mee na meethui dong amo chu alok changpi ange.”
Malmashi ahre na mani unga ngei chunga Jisu kutta kut hangpi rang ruija wa ae. Arui ngei na ri ah mani lu tullu ha lungsha so.
Chuti weta Jisu na unga ngeita ma am na ah kokveta ril. “Unga ngei ha hamma shino oh mani ha ka am na ah wa shu oh. Rouram chu Chungthieng rengram hi mangei ta ae.
Ngaithei oh! Atujong akha na na unga hek ti no lea Chungthieng rengram ma lut nea ang no ae.”
Jiwish lamkai akha na Jisu ta sai, “Ahra arengpu oh, Alota keina ae weta samla ringchang pha nea ang meh?”
“Alo sarukka keita ahra ta kokka che?” Jisu na sai makolla, “Chungthieng ano wa atu akha phao ahra mee am no ae.
Nangna trongsan pek dang che, ‘mee namei lal no oh; meeta that no oh; meepot ru no oh; mee ta dieklou neinon pe no oh; nanu napa ta ejak ati oh.’ ”
Spa hana sang, “Ka ungak lei thou wa natrongsan limpa juija hang inge.”

Jisu na nahi mathei juija amo na makolla ril, “Chu phao sunga na ae ang tullu akha am songe, na am nadon limpa jurveta ring riengei ta napha sum ha pe oh chuna nangna wanramma tungne ang che; lea che weh weta kanutieng jui jo.”
Chuti weta spa hana rou hi thei juija leima alung olla am so ae roulam chu amo ha leima achongpu ae.
Jisu na malung ol ripha ah ril, “Eja ah aol pi sa achongpu na Chungthieng rengram lutrang hi?
Achongpu pa na Chungthieng rengram luttang hi chu yangkoosa na ahrim na sunga lut pa na lei tekkae.”
Hana thei mee ngei na makolla sai, “Atu ngei na sanpi pha ang meh?”
Jisu na sange, “Malmashi kolla uithukno ha Chungthieng kolla uithukno ti am no ae.”
Hana Pitar na ril, “Anno! Kani inn hou phur weta nanuting kani na jui unge.”

“Oh weh,” Jisu na manita ril, “Keina nangei kolla diekka rillinge Chungthieng rengram taranga atu jong akhana ma inn hou phurra anoleh anamei ah-u-ah nao manu mapa asanao limpa kasarukka houphur mee ha.
Amo na atun apha hina pha hella akha chu phao angpa samla ringchanga atreem nei no wa ring ange.”
Jisu arui asom anie ta ruija shukveta manikolla “Anno aniek na Jerushalem ma thing ange rouphu ngeina meesanaopa taranga jeik sha rou makhai ha diek takka shuk kange.
Amo ta meejat adangei kolla pe ange, hana manina nuiso ah ajak tukpi ah chilshak naph then ange amota.
Mani na leima phit raiveta amota that tange chuti weta rungnie nathum sunija amo ha ringthou ange.”
Chuti weta arui ngeina eheilimpa hi lunghal thei nea no ae hina rilna rou hi mani kolla chu athim hekti so ae akha chu Jisu na tronga am hi mani na dangpha nea no ae.
Jisu na Jerikho neija wakjuija. Lampi ahou wa mitcho spa akha amunt hana onga am ma eyongpa nieja am.
Wairul riha na amota hella thing matheijuija amo na sai, “Nahi alo wa meh?”
Manina makolla ril, “Nazareth ta Jisu ha hella thinga ae.”
Amo na tappa aou, David sanao pa, “Jisu! Keita ringrei ngei pi oh!”
Maitienga am malmashi ngeina amata trongsi rilla dai dikta am mo, chuti weta amo na hata hella tieng aou tekso, “David sanaopa! Keita ringrei ngei pi oh!”
Chuna pa chu Jisu na ngirveta mitcho pa ha makolla ruija wak ranga trongsan pe. Amo na nei ja wak juija Jisu na makolla sai.
“Nangna keita nataranga ejongpa tullu lu pi num ma che?”
“Arengpa,” Amo na sang, “Keina woihapa kamit ri num minge.”
Jisu na makolla ril, “Chuleh chu namit ha ri jou oh! Nangoiring jarra nangta ahra wulpi so ae.”
Hana chakka amo na hra bakta ripha so, akha chu amo na Jisu nutieng juija Chungthieng ta riemma dom ma wahrul riha na kom amota ri juija mani na Chungthieng ta chungtekka dom.
Jisu na Jerikho wa lutta hu lalla thingso.
Hana aming na Zakajas ti chungtekti khasana hrai achongpu akha am meh.
Amo na Jisu ta ri ranga julla rol ae chuti weta ripha nea no ae wairul riha karra roulam chu amo ha adung nem sarukka.
Chuna sarukka amona wairul riha ngei maitienga tanna thing weta Jisu wak rang lampitienga theipong kunga Jisu ta ri rang kalso.
Jisu na amunt hana pha ah wak juija achungtienga ann weta Zakajas ta ril. “Harra tumma jungo, roulam chu awoni kei na inn na tung ange.”
Zakajas na harra tumma jungveta amota chekta ariem lam tukka amota rui lutso.
Hana am malmashi ri makhai na hita rouril hlak thou so, “Na Jisu hi pakchel inn sunga mee awin changa tunge!”

Zakajas na ngir thou weta ril, “Arengpa! Ka am kadon lim hi ajaija hui weta sara ringrei ngei ta pe ange akha chu atujong akha kolla muthui phur ha lah phur lea kei na saruk innly shukka lea pi ange.”
Jisu na makolla ril, “Awoni hai thou na inn sunga samla ringchang tungso ae chuna sarukka na spa hi kom Abraham hina thou jung atu ate ae.
Meesanou pa na junghi amang sha ngei ta sanpi ranga jong junge.”
Manina rou hi ngeija amleija Jisu na manita panteem akha kom ril, roulam chu arengpu na Jerushalem nei ja wa so ae, hana mani na Chungthieng rengram harra ri ang so ae ta hal.
Chuna amona na ril, “Apha akha ah meena ajak atri spa akha ammeh, amona ram adanga reng chang rang sarukka matheng jui ah hana maleh ang jui ah.
Mathing ma hai ta, amo na masuuk asom ta kokveta mani limpa ta sona chandi asom, asom peveta ka lea malim ma hina nangei na achong rang hotna oh.
Chuna mani ram sunga mee ngei na areng mahal phur pa ta kanina di nonge amona kanita runga am hi di nonge chuna mani na rouron mee hal weta amnutienga ma am na ah hla so.
“Areng hana maram ma maleh juija masuuk limpa ha makolla woiha chakka phou ha rang rou pe ah akha chu mani na eja phao wa sum tam pi jou mo weta kom dangnum ma.
Masha akor hana wa weta ril, ‘Arengpa napek sunga keina asom pha singe.’
Amona ril, ‘leima hra so ae,’ ‘nanghi ahra kor kae, nangna asien te tullu ma ngoiring ang am mee ae chuna keina nangta ram asom ma mitpu changpi ange.’
Anie suna pa korna waveta ril, ‘Arengpu,’ napek sunga keina ranga hella pha singe.’
Napa ta chu amo na ril. ‘Nangna rengram ranga ah mitpu chango.’
“Adang kor hana waveta ril, ‘Arengpa, hina am so ae keita napek sum; keina lumant sunga soun na thuppa si inge.
Roulam chu keina nangta atri inge nanungchan ha nang chu nawor lou muchi kom tuk che ae hana natalau kom nang chu sar che ae.’
Makolla chu amona ril, ‘hrano kor nang! Naril rou mak hana nangta kei na neinunt pe ange! Nangna danga am che ae kata lau kon sar ae hana muchi worno kom luk akae ta.
Hra so ae, chu lea chu nang na bank sunga shi ngei no che hana shi lea chu kaleh juija sum hana amant ahel keina pha ong no meh.’
“Chuna hana ngirra am malmashi ngei ta amo na ril, ‘makolla thou nangei na am sum ha la weta saruk asom hella ronna phou pa kolla pe oh.’
Chuti weta mani na makolla ril, ‘Arengpu, amo chu saruk asom pha sa so ae!’

‘Keina nangei ta rilla aminge’ ta amona sang, ‘ha chu atujong akha na ahre te am lea chu tam ma keina happange. Hana atu jong akha sup am am no kolla chu atom te ma am te ha kom keina lah ange makol hai thou wa.
Atun chu, keita anda mee ngei hana keita mani arengpa changpi num no ngei ha hina makka mani ha ruija wa weta kamai kunga makka thatto!’ ”
Jisu na nahi rilla rilla hata mani matienga am Jerushalem pha ranga thing.
Olives mulla Bethany akha chu Bethphage neija malut juija Arengpu na marui anie ta mani matienga hla hakso.
Hita rilla hla so: “Nangei maitienga am hu sunga thingo; hana nangei na hata lut juija nangei na kormoh sanao mee na chunglou akha ren na am tukkang chau ae. Rui ha hla weta hina ruija wa oh.
Ejonga atujong akha na nangei ta alo sarukka ruija thinga chou meh sai lea chu kamit pu na darkar am meh ta rillo.”
Manina hata mani thingjuija Jisu na mani kolla ril makhai ha tukhlakso.
Kormoh sanao hana rui hla ah am leija amitpu na manita, “Ejeranga rui hla ah am ma chau?”
“Arengpu na nahi darkar am meh,” ta manina sang.
Kormoh sanao ha Jisu kolla ruija wa ah mani punchoi derchoi ha kormoh sanao chung pha pi weta Jisu ta ong pi so.
Hata arengpu na ma wakjuija malmashi ngei na mani punchoi derchoi ngei lampi ha phaso.

Jisu na Jerushalem neija wakjuija olive mul hai thou wa atung tuma junga manu tieng jui wairul riha na Chungthieng ta ariemma sansol shukka aou wa dom thou so roulam chu mani na ripha angakpi tullu eja hana sarukka.
“Arengpu minga wa rengpa ta Chungthiengna jaihra pe shu oh! Wanram ma adai changsu oh, hana Chungthieng mahung majai chang su oh!”
Wairul riha sunga Pharisis ahre na Jisu kolla ril, “Arengpu,” manina ril, “Narui ngei hi dai ranga rou pe pi oh!”
Jisu na sang, “Nangei kolla rilla aminge keina ejonga manina daija am lea chu alungei na manithei chakka aou thou ange.”
Jisu na Jerushalem hupi pha ah wakjui hana amona mari jui amona tap so.
Amo na ril, “Ejonga nangna awonie hina adai darkar hi dangpha ta lea chu nu! Chuti weta nangna chu ripha nenijo che!
Apha ha wa ange nangei ta anda mee ngei na ralpal harra, nangeita abak enn tungpi no ah, hana nak eheilim shuk, lut rang thing hap si oh weh.
Chuna inn bang sunga am na mee ngei kom nang kom manina nea ange hana alung akha na alung akha chunga mani na hou phur ang no ae roulam chu nangta sanrang apha hana nangna dangpha nijo che!”
Jisu na athieng inn sunga lutta asunga am pot jur ngei ta julla thou so.
Manita hita rilleh, “Chungthieng rou na hita jiekka shi so ae, ‘ka inn hi niek ranga inn ae.’ Chuti weta nangei na aru thei ngei abu wul pi so chau!”
Hana thou wa Jisu na rungnie chang honna alona chupi takpi so, chungtekti thiempu ngei, hana rou kung ocha hana malmashi lamkai ngeina amota that num ma waishi thou so.
Chuti weta manina ejongpa lamma amota tullu lu ang sa dang nea no ae roulam chu malmashi lemna hrabakta ngei ah trongsan akha phao manina theibet num no ae.
Nahani akha ah Jisu na athieng inn na malmashi ngei ta chupi takpi akha chu Chungthieng ahra rou samma am leija chungtekti thiempu Lea roukung ocha na Lamkai ahre hitta rachun na phao.
Hana mani makolla ril, “Nangna ejong nane am ma hejong tullu hi lu ah am ma che? Atu na nangta hijong tullu lu rang roupe ah meh? Kani maikunga rillo.”
Jisu na sange manita, “Keina kom nangei kolla rou akha kom saitikkae” naha keita rille.
Johon na baptias ae pi tullu ha Chungthieng ningtienga mo anoleh malmashi ngei ningtienga mo?”
Mani na mathei chakka hal hlak thou so. “Anina alota rillei sa? Ejonga anina Chungthieng ningtienga ae rilleh amona hita rillange, ‘chuleh chu nangei na Johon ta ngoiring no chou ae?’
Chuti weta anina, ‘malmashi hai thou ae’ ta rilleh chu hina am wairol riha na anita alung deng ang roulam chu mani na Johon hi rouphupa akha ae ta ngoiring so ae.”
Chuna pa chu mani na sange, “Kani na dang nonge hoi thou wa phao mo ti ha.”
Hana Jisu na sang manita, “Keina kom nangei kolla rillang nonge ka lu tullu hi alo sarukka ae mo ti ha.”
Hana Jisu na panteem hi mani ta ril, “Apha akha ah spa akha na darkha inkul akha ae weta malmashi adang akha kolla rungpi hakveta amona apha sot ta inn houphurra shukka thingso.
Darkha ha lukkung apha wakjuija amo na masuuk makor ngei hla weta mapha phung shuk lukranga hla so. Chuti weta innkul runga am pa na manita phitta julla lea pi so.
Chuna pa chu amona adang kor hla ser so. Chuti weta woiha pa amona manita phitta leima ajak peh ah julla lea piser so. Ephao pe no wa.
Hana amona woithum suna pa ah kor hla ser so. Runga am pa na alem akui shukpi ah denga hou so ae.
Chunapa innkul mitpu na ril, ‘Alo ta kei na ae ang sa? Keina kasonaopa mak hla ang sange; chuleh chu manina atri ajakkange amota chu!’
Chuti weta innkul hak pa na amota rijuija mani mashel rilhlakso. Hi chu innkul mitpu sanaopa ae ani na amo ta that ei oh, ‘chu lea chu ani na maram hi changpha ange!’
Chunapa chu mani na that weta innkul wau wa denga hou so.
Chu lea chu innkul mitpu na inkul hakka am pa ta alo ta ae ang sa ta Jisu na sai?”
“Amo na phao weta mani lim ta thatveta akha chu innkul kom malmashi adang kolla pe ange.” Malmashi hana am ngei na rou hi thei juija mani na ril, “Naha shuk no shu oh!”
Jisu na manita anveta sai, “Jieksha rou ha na rilna artha hi chu alo timeh?
‘Inn sapana ngeino ae ta ril alungha wulla
eheilim karra amo na tieng hella marui oi tekkae.’
Atujong akha na alung chunga tu lea chu amo ta atan, atan, tan ange; hana ejonga alung na atujong akha chunga dol lea chu wokphul changa mang ange.
Roukung ocha ngei lea chungtekti thiempu ngei na Jisu ta mant ranga tullu thou so, roulam chu mani na dangpha so mapanteem hi ani ta rilna ae. Chuti weta mani na malmashi ngei ta atri ae.

Chuna manina tancha ahra hakka am meh. Mathei chakka ahra sa mee alung thieng sa lak rouron hre Jisu kolla hlaveta marou matronga chunga lutveta manina Raman sarkar ra ane angam ngeita pekrang hot na so.
Na aru rouron ngei na Jisu ta ril, “Arengpu, kanina nachupi natakpi ha adiek makkae ta dangpha unge, nang chu eichang eioi nei no hana Chungthieng ningtienga adiek ha an weta chupi takpi che ae.
Kaisar rengpa kolla khasana kani pekhi pekphung shukmo anoleh kani pekhi adiek takjou meh?”
Chuna Jisu na mani lu tullu dangpha ah mani kolla Jisu na ril.
“Keita sum chui akha ri pi oh hana atu hina mel aming jiekka shi meh?”
Mani na sange, “Kaisar rengpa.”
Chuna Jisu na sang, “Hra so ae, nangei na Kaisar rengpa ta ha Kaisar rengpa ta pe oh, akha chu Chungthieng ta ha Chungthieng ta pe oh.”
Manina mee ngei maikung hana Jisu ta mant ranga ephao ae nea no ae, hana mani na Jisu sang ha angak shukka dai tikta am so.
Saddusis ahre na Jisu kolla wa weta ril, athi sa ngei na ringthou ang no ae.

“Arengpu, Moses na kani taranga jiekka hou phur ae, ‘Atujongpa uleh nao akha na namei neiveta asanao don no ah amo ha thi lea chu manao ngei na namei hata nei weta mata pa taranga sanao donpi anga ae ta rilleh.’
Apha akha ah uleh nao sari amphur ae; ulien tekpa na namei nei phur weta asanao am mo ah thi so ae.
Ani sunapa anao pa na namei nu hata nei sier so.
Hana innthum shupa anao pa na nei ah hahekta mani sari mak na nei weta asanao houphur no wa thi hapso.
Achana ah chu namei nu hakom thi so ae.
Atun chu, athi hai thou wa ringthou ang nie ah chu namei nu ha atu namei chang anga meh? Roulam chu mani sari mak hana namei chang phur ae?”
Mani ta Jisu na sang. “Atunpa ringchang hina chu nameinu ngei apa ngei na innpalla tuichang hlakkae.
Chuti weta athi hai thou ring thou ang matik cha mee snu spa ngei na phao angpa ringchanga mani ring rang chu taichang ti am mang no ae.
Mani ha chu wanrui ngei hek ti ange hana athi am mang no ae hana mani hata Chungthieng sanao ngei ae, roulam chu mani ha athi hai thou wa ringthou sarukka.

Chuna Moses na thiengvikta dangpi so ae athi hai thou maring hana apun sunga sarmei kang tamin sunga Moses na arengpa ta trongpi, ‘Abraham hina Chungthieng, Isaac hina Chungthieng, akha chu Jacob hina Chungthieng ae.’
Amo chu aring Chungthieng ae athi ha ah no ae makolla chu meelim pa na aring pha ange.
Roukung ocha ngei na trong ril shuk so, “leima hra ah sang so che Arengpu!”
Chuna sarukka manina lea ah makolla rou sai ang thanum thawak am nijo weh.
Jisu na mani ta sai, “Alota mani na Messiya hi David sakai sunga ae ta rilla meh?
David amo mak na Psalm abai sunga thienga jiekka shi ae,
‘Karengpu na ril karengpa ta:
Kaban chang tiengpa am na ah ongo
kai na nangta anda mee makhai ha nakae
tro wa nachung malim ma ongo.’
David na amota ‘Arengpu’ ta kokkae hativeta alota Messiya hi David sanao chang anga meh?”
Malmashi limpa na marou ngei ja am ma Jisu na arui ngei ta ril.

“Roukung lamkai ngei ha cheksilla ammo, mani chu punchul hapveta lampi sorokka mee ngei na mani ta ajak atri leima dije mani chu malmashi atam maikunga hana synagogues sunga kom mani ong na lingno wa am pi num hana lochau malhrun na kom hra tek ti munna onga bak num meh;
mani na arongnu ngei inn lah weta akha chu malmashi ngei mai ja asot nei ae! Mani na hana aol saruk chu atri pi tek ti ae!”
Achongpu ngei na athieng inn sunga sumpang nga pekhlakka am ahul tunga Jisu na ann jui ah ri pha so.
Hana mani kar sunga sara arongnu na neija peisa ani te hlakom riso.
Amo na ril, “Keina nangei kolla rilla aminge na arong nu-na pek ka am mani ta hel so ae.
Roulam chu adang ngei na pekka am hi chu mani adon anei chunga alem saruk pe ah ae, chuti weta na arongnu na pekka am chu maring ranga madon makhai so ae.”
Arui ahre na athieng inn hina rou ha trong hlakka am, eja ah hra mo nu alungna phao anno Chungthieng ta malmashi ngei na pekka shi hi, chuti weta Jisu na ril.
“Nangei ri eheilim hi apha ha wak jui ja chu alung akha na alung akha chunga dolla am mangno ae eheilimpa ha temma mang ange.”
“Arengpu” Manina sai, “Nahi etikka shuk kanga meh? Apha ha nei so ae ti dang ranga ejongpa riveta dang nea ang meh?”
Jisu na manita ril, “Tlakka am mo nangei ta atu na vet pi no shu oh, leima tam phao hom mange hana kei ha amo inge hajong apha wakjuija nangei na manita jui no oh.
Nangei na ral tara thei pha juija atri no oh, hajong ha masha ah shuk kange, chuti weta hajong hana atreem na so ae ta chu hal no oh.”
Amona hata ril the song, “Ram akha na ram akha ta sul hlak kange, rengram akha na kom rangram akha ta ral ae ange.
Hana apha ah atri pi lingnu nokka butang ange akha chu rai eja shukka wa ange, hana wan chunga kom atri alao eja kom shuk kange.

Na limpa hina shukma tienga nangei ta mant na aol ana pe ange nangei ta synagogues sunga ruija lutveta mee ngei kut chunga pe ange hana rengpa maikunga kasarukka rui ja lut weta raen-inn sunga si ange.
Nahina nangei taranga ahra rou sam rang ahra apha so ae.
Chuna nangei na nangei ringrang alota ngak thukkang olla nangei lung hal no oh masha ah.
Rouram chu hajong lungsin lungwar ha keina nangei ta pe ange hanajuija nangei ta anda ngei na sangne no rang rou ha.
Nangei hi na nanu napa ngei na akha chu na-u-nanao ngeina natrongpi ngei na mee kolla pe ange hana ahre na chu athi phao pha ange.
Kasarukka malmashi limpa na nangta an num mange no ae.
Chuti weta nalu ah nasam akha phao mang ang no ae.
Ratta ngirra am mo hana nangna nathei chakka nadongne jarra aring pha ang che ae.
“Nangei na Jerushalem ma ahul tunga shiphai ngeita rijui apha ah, nangei dang ang chu Jerushalem hi mang ang nei so ae.
Chuna Judija ah am manina mullon na tan shu oh, hana hupi sunga am ngei na shukka thingshu oh, hana husanao te ah am ngei nakom hupi ah lutno shu oh.
Roulam chu jieksha lim ha diekka shuk ranga, ‘nanie rungnie ha chu aol ana ha pha ange.’
Nani rungnie ha chu eja ah atripi rungnie ang monu mamei naoron na am akha chu nao donna am ngei ta rang!
Ahre ta chu champsai ah thattange akha chu adang ta na raen-inn sunga shi ange hana jat adangei na mapha ha pha malim chu Jerushalem ta kaetro nei ange.
“Apha hana chu ninu hlapa sunga akha chu arshi ngei karra adang rang akha shuk kange. Hana simlei ram lim ma leihap chatta akha chu tuipi tuijul tara na atri pi makhai shuk kange.
Simleichunga shuk kang eja na atri pi jarra malmashi ngei na sor holnea ang no ae, roulam chu thangwan kom lingpi ange.
Apha hana meesanaopa na mane jaitha hita sumphai karra jung manina ri ange.
Chuna rou ngei hi shuk thou juija ngirthou weta nalu antau oh, roulam chu nataranga aringkato ha neiso ae.”
Jisu na mani ta na panteem hi ril. “Theichang kung akha chu thingkung adang ngei an no.
Thingbu nanao chunga wakjui apha ah nangna dange asaupha hla neiso ae.
Hita munha ah nalim hi shukka wakjuija nangna dango, ha chu Chungthieng rengram neija jung ang so ae.
“Keina nangei kolla diekka rilla aminge atunpa pokhina am ngei hi thi happang no ae, narou lim hi shuk matienga.
Aleiram lea thangwan chu tuikom ngei ae chuti weta karou chu etikkom atui ah amang ang no ae.
“Chuna bakka inn na naringchang taranga aephung salai dangno wa nalung hirra am no oh nanie rungnie hana changa mant no rang semsa ah am mo.
Rouram chu hajong rungnie ha, aleiram amunt chang honna shuk kange.
Chuna sarukka nalung semsa ae ah nei ah apha chang honna ae ah am lea chu nalim hi shukka wa halkom sanpi pha ah meesanaopa maikunga ngir pha ang che ae.”
Nalei apha ah Jisu na athieng inn sunga chupi takpi ah amona jantieng apha pha lea chu Olieve mullon na thinge.
Hana innthou chang honna malmashi ngei na athieng inn sunga marou matrong ngei thienge.
Achol tolno badol reen lanpina ta dang apha nei ja wa ah,
chungtekti thiempu akha chu roukung ocha ngeina malmashi ngei ta ati ae chuna sarukka mani na Jisu ta aruhan ta that ranga hot na ae.
Chuna Judas Iskarot kolla saitan na lutso, amo ha arui asom ani sunga akha ae.
Hana Judas na chungtek ti thiempu akha chu athieng inn sunga offisar ngei kolla ril ae mani kolla Jisu hi alota jur ang meh!
Mant na amo ta ariem ma sum pe tukkae ta ngei so.
Judas na ngei hlak nutienga ejongpa tancha ahra akha ah Jisu hi mani kut chunga malmashi ngei na nahana rou dang no lutta pek rang apha an thou so.
Achol tolno budol reen rungnie sunga lanpina bu bakha ang kelmo that tang tienga.
Jisu na Pitar lea Johon ta manui ni na ae rang rou hitta munt ha ah hla so. “Nanui na thing weta anina lanpina bak rang lim ha thourang ae thing hakko.
‘Amunt hoija nangna di ah kanui ni ta sempi num cha mo ae ta manui na Jisu kolla sai?’ ”
Jisu na sang, “Nanui na hata hupi sunga lut juija spa akha na tuibel ronna thing tuk hlak kange. Manu tienga juija thing weta malut na inn sunga hata latto.
Hana inn mitpu hata rillo, ‘Arengpu na nakolla rilleh. Karui ngei lea kanina lanpina bu bakha rang kah ha hoija am meh?’
Amo na nangei ta ri pi ange achung tieng kah alok akha am mange, amunt hana nanui na eheilimpa tuk hlakange.”
Manui na thing juija Jisuna manui ta ril makhai ha tukhlakso. Hana manui na lanpina bakha rang thourang ae thingso.
Apha ha phajuija Jisu na ma am rang amunt doikunga ahal-rouron ngei hitta lutso.
Amo na mani ta ril, “Keina ka ol matienga nangei hitta leima tam ma na lanpina bu hi bakha inn ha di inge!
Rouram chu keina nangei kolla ril numinge, keina nangei hitta bakha inn ha pha angnijo ae, Chungthieng rengram pha ma lim chu.”
Hana Jisu na tuidon choi weta Chungthieng kolla niek so. “Na hi nangei na lah weta nangei taranga sam hlakko.”
Keina nangei kolla rilling atun hai thou wa keina nangei hitta mun ha ah Chungthieng rengram phao malim chu darkha tui inn ang ni ang ae.

Hana woihapa amo na budol atan sar weta Chungthieng kolla niek ah budol atan, atan tan so. Akha chu manita peveta ril, “Nahi kapum ae nangei taranga pek sha so ae nangie na nahi na tullu lu oh keita ngai lea rang sa ae.”
Hahekta akha rukka tuidon kom budol baksu takka mani ta pe ah ril, “Na tuidon hi Chungthieng na athar ra chungnam weta pek sa kathee ae nahi chu nangei taranga peksa so ae.
“Chuti weta an no! Keita jurra hou ang amo ha kei hitta doukang hina am ha ae!
Meesanaopa ha chu thi ah ta ae Chungthieng lungir sa ha nu juija, chuti weta eja ah atri pi mo nu amo ta jurra hou spa ha chu!”
Hana mani mashel sunga atujong akha na anikar sunga thing weta na tullu hi ae thing ang mo weta sai hlakthou so.
Arui ngei sunga trong jet hlak thou so mani kar sunga atu na loktek ta hal mo ae ta.
Jisu na manita ril, “Adang jati ah rengpa ngeina mani chunga mitpu ngei hekta tullu lu hana mani chunga tullu lu pi ngeita, ‘Mee ngei ta tonpi’ ngei ae ta kokkae.
Chuti weta nani chu hajong ah nao no ae; chuti weta, nani chunga lok tekti pana naopong hekta, akha chu lamkai mee hana rui sanao ngei hek tullu lu su oh.
Atu na loktek ti mo ae, ongveta bakka am pa lea ano lea amo ta bakpi innpi am pa ha? Ow ve, ongveta bakka am pa ae chuti weta nangei kar sunga chu bakpi innpi ah ae ah am chu kei inge.
“Chuna nangei chu ka-ol lei sunga kei hitta am ha so chau;
Pathieng na keita rengram pek chuhekta keina kom nangei kolla pe singe.
Nangei kom ka rengram ma kei hitta bakha inn ha pha ange hana nangei na Israel sakai asom ani chunga rourillanga phomlu chunga ong ange.”
“Simon, Simon! Anno, saitan na nangei lim pa ta chang anranga rou lah so ve, hrano karra ahra am no rang, lou mee pana sangshi hran hekta.
Chuti weta keina nataranga neik ja aminge nangoiring ha nuleh no ranga Simon. Chuna nangna ka am na ah na lea jui ja nangna na-u-nanao ngei ta jaitha pe oh.”
Pitar na sang, “Arengpu, keina nathingna amunt chang honna raen-inn sunga hal akha chu nathit na amunt na thit ang inge!”
“Keina rilling, Pitar,” Jisu na ril, “Awoni jintienghi arhongpa na hung ang no ae nangna keita woithum dang nonge ta naril ma lim ma.”
Jisu na arui ngeita sai, “Nangeita sumhou tolno wa akha keabur tolno wa kahla jui apha ah nangei na ejongpa watta chau?”
Mani na sang, “Ephou wat no weh.”
“Atun chu,” Jisu na ril, “Ejonga atu jongna sumhou am lea chu choijo oh; hana atu jong na chamsei am no lea malinglut jurveta leithingo.

Rouram chu nangei kolla keina rilla aminge abai sunga jiekka shi na ril, ‘Amo ha maral am ngei karra masing ten then so weh.’ Chuna keina nangei kolla rillinge nahi keina thungpi ange. Kasarukka jieksha ha atun chu pha ah wa so oh.”
Arui ngeina ril, “Anno! hina chamsai ani am meh arengpu!”
“Hana ngei so ae! amona sang.”
Jisu na hupi houphurra mathing na chak ti mullon olive ah; hana arui ngei na kom amo hita thing ha.
Amunt ha mapha juija amona manita ril, “Niek ah am mo, chu na nangei ha ahlem na nea no rang.
Hana amona alung denga hla alal na changa mamita houphurra ahuk hrun weta niek so.
“Amo na ril, “Pathieng,” Ejonga nahi nahal nalung aleh chu olla ka-am kakap hi lah pi oh. Kahal ano shu oh, chuti weta nahal hana tullu lu oh.”
Thangwan tieng hai thou wa wanrui ngei na makolla mel muh ah jaitha hap so machunga.
Alung tonga amona alung thienga niek ae; chuna ahlan tui tulla jung kom alei chunga chu athi hekti ae.
Niek ma am na mun hai thou wa marui ngei am na maleh juija ol happa inn hlakka am so ae.
Amo na mani ta ril, “Alowa inn hlakka am ma chau? Thou weta nie oh ahlem pa na nea no ranga.”
Judas na lamkai weta wairul riha na mani kolla tungphao Jisu tronga am song. Arui asom anie sunga akha na Jisu am na wa veta abe ah chup so.
Chuti weta Jisu na Judas ta ril, “Abe chuppa nangna meesanaopa ta jur so che nu?”
Jisu hitta am arui ngei na ejong pa shuk shijove ta ripha so, mani na Jisu ta sai, “Arengpu kani champ sai hi tol pi ang meh?”
Hana mani kar sunga akha na chungtekti Thiempu shuk kor akha hina akur changtiengpa tanso.
Chuti weta Jisu na ril, “Na hina ngei so ae!” Chuna amona spa hana kur tonga dampi so.
Hana Jisu chungtekti thiempu akha chu athieng inn sunga offisars hana ulien changei amota mant wa eja kolla ril, “Hrano mee ta mant nang hekta nangei na mollo champ mo ta phao ah chau?

Rungnie chang honna keina nangei hitta athieng inn sunga am ha lei ah chu nangei na mant rang hotna no chao, chuti weta nahi apha so ae nangei taranga athim na rou choija jaitha pha ah nangei tullu lu ranga.”
Manina Jisuta mant na amo ta chungtek ti thimpu inn na rui ah thingso. Pitar na kom aram lah hai thou anu juija wa ae.
Inn tumai ah sarmei hlan weta manina ahul tunga ongna ah Pitar kom ong tolla am meh.
Meesuuk namei sanao akha na sarmei am na onga ma-am ri weta amona ma am na ah mun na an weta makolla ril, “Na spa hikom Jisu hitta am ha mee ae!”
Chuti weta Pitar na ngei no oh ril, “Namei, keina amota dang nange!”
Apha atante takka spa akha na dangpi sier so Pitar ta “Mani karrak sunga nangkom akha ae!”
Hana atente akha nutienga adang spa akha na makolla ril, “Ephao ngoiring no rang am no ae na spa hi Jisu hitta am ha houphur mee ae rouram chu amo hikom Galily mee ae!”
Chuti weta Pitar na ril, “Spa, keina dang nonge nangna rilla am rou ha!”
Hata mani tronghlakka am lei ah arhongpa na hungso.

Arengpu na ahul tunga an na rolla Pitar kolla munna anna Pitar na Arengpu na makolla rilphur ngeileh thei so. “Arhongpa na hung malim ma awoni jintieng hi nangna keita woithum ngei ang no che ti rou.”
Pitar na shukka thing weta alung kha ah tapso.
Jisu ta hakka am ngei na makolla phitta akha chu nuiso ae.
Manina Jisu ta mamit hlum ma rou sai makolla, “Atu na nangta phit mo ae rillan oh!”
Hana mani na leima tam ajak tukpi rang rou makolla ril ae.
Nie nu na shukjuija lamkai ahre chungtekti thiempu ngei akha chu roukung ocha ngei na bomtulla mani maikunga Jisu ta ruija wa pi so.
“Kani ta rillo,” mani na ril, “Nanghi Messiya ah che?”
Amona sange, “Ejonga keina nangei kolla ril lea chu nangei na keita ngoiring ang no chau ae.
Hana ejonga keina nangei kolla rou sai lea chu nangei na sang ang no chau ae.
Chuti weta atun hai thou wa meesanao pa chu ineh-nepa Chungthieng ban changtieng pa ah onga am shijo ae.”
Mani lim pana ril, “Chuleh chu nang hi Chungthieng sanao pa che meh?”
amona sange manita, “Kei ae ta nangei na ril so chau.”
Hana mani na ril, “Kani na rou ngir tollang mee darkar am no ae! Kani na kanithei ah naril rou ha thei songe!”
Hana abom lim pana thou weta mani na Pilate maikunga Jisu ha ruiso.

Mani na hita Jisu kolla neinunt pe thou so: “Kani na amo ta mant chu ani mee ngeita amona adanga lamkai ah mani kolla hita rilleh, Kaisar rengpa kolla tushal pe no oh akha chu mathei chakka keihi Reng Messiya inge ti ae.”
Pilate na makolla sai, “Nanghi Jews ngei rengpa cha mo ae?”
“Ha chu nangna rilso che,” ta Jisu na sang.
Hana Pilate na chungtekti thiempu kolla akha chu wairul riha kolla ril, “Keina amo ta neinunt kapekkang jonga tuk nange.”
Chuti weta mani na hella ane rang rou rilleh, “Machupi matakpi hana Judaea thouwa meelimpa ta ollangpi thou ae. Amona Galily hai thou, thou weta atun chu hina pha so ae.”
Pilate na rou hi thei juija amo na sai, “Na spa hi Galily mee mo ae?”
Amona Jisu hi Herod ram ma mee ae ta madang pha juija amo na Herod am na ah Jisu hi hlaso. Amo ha chu hana lei apha ah Jerushalem ma am meh.

Herod na Jisu mel rijui ja leima ariem so. Rouram chu amona marou matrong mathei pha leima sot so ae hana apha eja matieng hai thou wa ri numma am meh. Hana mari num na chu Jisu na anealah ahre ae ha ri num ma ae.
Chunapa chu Jisu kolla Herod na leimatam rou sai, chuti weta Jisu na ephao sang no ae.
Hana chungtekti thiempu akha chu roukung ocha ngei manina maitienga sounna wa weta leima tam neinant Jisu kolla nont so.
Herod akha aral mee ngeina Jisu ta nuisho ah akha chu atri pi hita mun ha ah rou ajak ril, hana mani ahra punchul akha kom machunga wurpi weta Pilate kolla lea ah hla sier so.
Nani rungnie hai thou wa Herod lea Pilate tonpi changso ve, hi matieng chu manui hi anshi anda hlakphur ae.
Pilate rengpana chungtekti thiempu ngei lamkai ngei akha chu malmashi ngei ta bomtul ha ranga kok.

Hana amo na manita ril, “Nangei na spa hi ka-am na ah rui ja phao wa amo hi malmashi ngeita lam adanga lamkai so ta nangei ril hi atun keina nangei maikunga amota chang ka anjuija keina makolla nangei neinunt pek hrano meethat meemant rang akha phao tuk nonge.
Chuna Herod rengpa na kom mahratno na tukno jarra ani am na ah lea ah hla sier ah ae. Hana sarukka na spa hita athat rang ephao ma ae aral tullu am no ae.
Chuna keina amota dandi ahre pe weta hla ang sange.”
(Lanpina rungnie ah amona mani taranga dandi pha mee akha hla chakti ae.)
Hana am wairul riha na aou shuk so, “Amota that to! Kani taranga Barabas hla pi oh!”
(Barabbas hi meethat meemant akha chu hupi hana ollang sallang shukpi mee ae.)
Pilate na chu Jisu hi hla num meh, chuna amona malmashi ngei kolla angei lah ae.
Chuti weta manina anungtienga aou wa hla ae, “Amota aban jamma thatto! Aban jamma thatto!”
Pilate na manita woithum suna pa ah ril, “Amona ejongpa hrano tullu lu shu jou meh? Keina makolla thija ngei mamaral ephao tuk nonge! Keina amota dandi peveta hla ang sange.”
Chuti weta manina ranga aou tek ka Jisu hi aban jamma that anga ae ta ril shukka atreem na ah chu mani aou hana maipakso.
Chuna Pilate na mani niek na juija hata ae ranga angei pe so.
Amona hajok sunga shi meethat meemant akha chu ollang sallang pi pa ta hla pi so. Hana Jisu ta mani dit na juija ae ranga mani kut chunga pe so.

Ralmee ngei na Jisu ta ruija thinga hata mani thingna ah Syreni ah Simon ti spa akha maram haithou wa hupi ah phao tukhlakso. Hana manina mant weta Jisu khross machunga shiveta Jisu nungtienga ron pi ah thingso.
Leima tam warui rul riha na manutieng juija, mani kar sunga namei nu ngei na chu Jisu tarang tappa alung olla am.
Jisu na manita nu lea ah an weta ril, “Jerushalem ma am namei ngei oh. Katarang tapno oh, chuti weta nangei sanao ngei taranga akha nangei taranga.
Rouram chu malmashi ngei na trong shuk kang rungnie akha phao ange, ‘Nao am no ngei hi eja ah jahra meh hana naosan don no ngei ha. Hana naosan jokno ngei ha!’
Hana malmashi ngeina mullon oh kani chunga dolla jungo kanita bi pi oh ta ril shuk kang apha phao ange.
Chuna thing ring ta hajongpa tullu lu lea chu, thingkang chu ejongpa shuk kang meh?”
Mee hrano meethat spa ani ta kom mani kar sunga ruija shukveta Jisu hitta manina that.
Manina, “Alu Suru” ti amunt pha wakjuija manina Jisu ta aban jamma that hana hrano meethat rel kom. Akha na maban changtienga akha pana aban uitienga.
Jisu na ril, “Pathieng manita ngakpi oh! manina ejongpa tullu lu mo dang pha no ae.” Hana arengpu linglut ha mani na ther weta rawon na sam meh.

Malmashi ngei na ngirveta anna am meh. Jewish lamkai ngeina nuiso na nei ah ril, “Mee ta chu amona sanne ae; amo kam matak na matak ta kal shu oh, ejonga amo hi Chungthieng na halsa Messiya makleh chu!”
Ralmee ngei nakom nuiso tolla ma am na kolla wa weta athur ju tui pe ae.
Hana ril, “Nongna Jews ngei rengpa makleh chu nathei chakka kallo.”
Machunga trongsan na jiekka shi ae “Nahi Jews ngei Rengpa ae.”
Hai ah shi hrano meethat hana amo ta ushit no wa nuisho wa ril, “Nang ha Messiya no wa cha meh? Natak ta kal weta kanui ta kom kallo!”
Hana adang akha na chu trongraan ah makolla ril. “Nangna Chungthieng ta ti no che? Nangna mathit pha hekta nathit hi.
Anui na pha chu routakka pha phung shuk pha ah ae rouram chu anui lu na tullu anu juija; chuti weta amo chu ephao aral am no ae.”
Hana amona Jisu ta ril, “Rengpa changa najung juija keita angailen pi oh de Jisu!”
Jisu na makolla ril, “Awoni keina nakolla soro ei inge hachu nang hi Paradise ah kei hitta am ha ange.”
Apha asom ani tulso ae hana nienu na mawar war no wa simlei lim ta athim na hunna apha inn thum tulphao ah.
Hana athieng innsunga banga shi pun kom ajai ja therra ani shukso.
Jisu na arol kalla aou shukkae, “Pathieng! Kamuihla hi nakut chung pe singe!” Amo na natrongsan hi ril weta thi so.
Ralmee offisar na shukka am eheilimpa ripha ah, Chungthieng ta dom ma, hita ril, “Adiek mak kea amo hi ahra spa ae!”
Hana ranchon na an na am malmashi ngeina shukka am eheilimpa ripha ah mani inn lam ma atang benga alung olla lea so.
Jisu ta matak makna hrabak ta dangei hana Galily hai thou wa manutieng jui ja hong namei ngeina aram lah hai thou wa an na am meh.

Judiah hulok Arimathiah ah Josep ti spa amo ha chu ahra mee hana ajak atri sak mee ae amo ha chu Chungthieng rengram jung ang apha hakka am spa akha ae. Amo kom mani ulien changei karra tolla rou ril mee halkom mani lungir na ah ngir tolno ae hana mani lu tullu kom ngei no ae.
Amona Pilate rengpa am na thing weta Jisu Khrista pum ta niek ranga thing.
Hana amo na Jisu pum ha choija tum weta pun anal ahra takka hlumma ahir alunga hakka sak hlanhur atu akha phao phum no na ah phum so.
Nani rungnie ha chu erainie ae sabbath rungie kom leima neiso ae.
Galily haithou wa Jisu nungtieng juija phao ngei na Josep hitta thing ha ah alo ta Jisu ta hlan hur sunga phum mo ti ha ripha so.
Hana manina inn lam tienga lea weta ariem ahoi siktai eja Jisu pum not ranga semsa thingso.
Roukung anu juija mani na Sabbath nie chu solhlaso.
Leima angal apha lameiching nie nitukka namei ngeina hlan kunga mani semsasa ariem hoi siktui ron weta thingso.
Hlun hur lut na sumlung ha chu letta am hakka tukhlakso.
Chuna mani na lut juija arengpa Jisu hina pum ha ri pha nijo.
Manina hina taranga ae rang dang thei no wa ngirra am ma, edang dangno wa ehekta ade awar pun setveta spa ani mani am na ngir so.
Namei nu ngei na ati na shihakta alei chunga mok so. “Ejaranga nangei na athi ngei kar sunga aring mee ta junga am ma chau?
Amo ha hina am nijo ve, Amo ha ringthou so ae. Galily ah ma am lei ah nangei ta maril phur ha angei theino chau.
‘Meesanaopa ha pakchel ngei kut chunga pe ange, hana aban jamma thattange, hana rungnie nathum nie ah ringthou ange.’ ”
Namei ngei na marou ha angei lea so.
Hlan kung hai thou wa lea weta arui asom akhata nalim pa hi takso, hana adangei ta kom.
Namei ngei ha chu Mary Madalini, Joanna, akhu chu Jacob manu Mary; Mani hitta thing ha namei adangei na na rou hi ahal-rouron ngei kolla takso.
Chuti weta ahal-rouron ngei na hita halleh, na namei nu ngei na ril hi apang ngei ae, hana mani na manita ngoiring no ae.
Chuti weta Pitar na thouveta hlan kunga tanna thignso. amona akong unt weta ma an juija anal pun ahlum na ah no wa ephao ri no ae, hana amona inn na lea weta shukka am hata leima angak shukso.
Nani rungnie makka Jisu nutieng jui mee anina Jerushalem hai thou kilometres asom akha aram lah Emmaus hu wa thinge.
Hana manui na shukka am rou ha manui na trong lam ma thing.
Hata manui na tronghlakka halhlakka manui thing jui Jisu kom manui ta leima nei ah wa ah manui hita thing ha so.
Manui na amo ta ripha halkom alo ta mo manui na amota mel dongpha nea nijo ve.
Jisu na manui ta ril, “Nanui mashel ejongpa rou ah nanui thinglam ma tronga chau?” hana manui na aol mai muh ah ngirso.
Manui ani sunga Cleopas ti pa akha na Jisu kolla sai, “Nang hi Jerushalem ma meethar ah cha meh. Atunlei rungnie sunga shukka am rou ha nangna dangno wa cha meh?

“Ejongpa shukka meh?” Jisu na sai, manui na sang, “Nazareth ta Jisu kolla shukka am rou ae.” “Na spa hi matullu ae marouril eheilimpa hi malmashi ngei na akha chung Chungthieng na kom Chungthieng rouphupa ae ta ril hlakkae.
Ani chungtekti thiempu ngei na akha chu ane tullu ngeina amo ta athit ranga pe ah amota khrose chung aban jamma that ae.
Hana kani na amota hal chu amo hi Israel ngei ta sanpi pa ange ta! Hana chunga na rou lim shukhi awoni hitta rungnie nathum shu so ae.
Kani kar sunga namei abom ahre na mahlan kunga thingei na angak shukkae.
Manina mapum ha tukno wa mani na lea juija mani na hita rilleh mani na ri ah wanrui na hita rille amo ha ringthou so ae.
Kani bom kar sunga kom ahre na hlan kunga thinga namei ngei na ril makha routakka shukso chuti veta manikom amota ri no ae.”
Hana Jisu na manuita ril, “Eja ah lungmo meh nanui, alota haja nalung thilla Chungthieng rouphupa na ril phur eheilimpa ngoiring no the chau!
Messiya na aol ana hi pha weta hana amona ahung ajai pha ang no meh?”
Akha chu Jisu na manui ta hrabakta takpi so, abai sunga jieksha na mataranga alo ta ril meh, Moses na athou na hai thou jiekka shi hana Chungthieng rouphu ngei na jiekka shi.
Manina luttang husung neija wakjuija Jisu na chu aram lah tekka thing ang ae ah.
Manui na amota lea rang rou ril, “Kanui hitta am ha jou oh; semnie tah ang nei so chuna thiem manga ae wa so ae chunapa chu amona manui hitta am ha so.
Amona manui hita bakha rang mani kara ong tolso. Hana budol choiveta therra jaihra pe ah mani ta amo na pe so.
Hana mani mit manga manina amota mel dangphaso chuti weta amo na mani am na thou mang so ae.
Mani mashel rilhlakso, “Amona ani ta trongthou lei ah sarmei kung hekti no meh lampi ah thingha lei ah ajieksha abai sunga anita takpi ha?”
Manui na thouveta Jerushalem tienga lea so ae, hana manuina arui asom akha rachon na mee adang ngei hitta mun ha ah.
Hana ril, “Arengpu ha ringthou so ae! Amo na Simon kolla kom ri pi ae!”
Hana manui ani na lampi ah alo ta shuk mo ti ha kom takso. Hana amona budol ther juija alota manui na mel dang mo.
Spa ani hana mani maikunga na rou hi rilla amlei ah edang dang no wa Jisu matak mak mani karra ngir weta mani kolla ril, “Nangei kolla adai chang shu oh.”
Mani na atri hai sulla hi thimplop ri range ta hal so.
Chuti weta amona mani ta ril, “Alowa nangei na lung olla chau? Alo wa nalung sungu hajong chingna ah chau?
Anno kakae kakut nangei rijuija keimak no meh, kei makkae ta hallo, hana nangei danga am ha ae thimplop na asaru atak am no ae keita nangei ri hekti no ae.”
Rou hi amona rilla makae makut manita ri pi so.
Chu phao sunga manina ngoiring no ah am hal kom ariem na shi hakti akha chu angak shukka amlei ah Jisu na manita sai, “Hina ngei kolla abakkang inn nang ejongpa am chau?”
Manina tuiriek aro sa atan akha peso.
Amo na mani maikunga lah weta bakso.

Hana amo na manita ril, “Na hi ae kei na eheilimpa nangei hitta ka am ha lei ah karou karilha Moses na kom roukung abai sunga jiekka shi sa so ae, hana Chungthieng rou phupa ngei na jieksha ha akha chu Psalm sunga jiek limpa adiekka tung rang ae.”
Hana mani lung thong honga jiek sha rou ha lungkim thei so.
Hana mani kolla ril, “Na hi jieksha ha ae. Messiya na aol donga thi ange chuti weta rungnie innthum nu tienga ringthou ange.
Akha chu maninga lunghlong ranga pak silpi ranga rouril ngei na lam chang honna rou choi ah, Jerushalem thou ange.
Nangei na hi limpa hina saro ei tah ae.
Akha chu kei katak makna pathiengna keita saro ei nu juija nangei tah keina hla ange. Chuti weta nangei na hupi hana hakka am mo chungtienga jaitha akha na nangei chung jung malim ma.”
Chuna amo na mani ta hupi hai thou rui ja shukka Bethany phau ah, hana amona makut don weta manita jaihra bo pi so.
Amona manita jaihra pe ah am lei ah amota thangwanna rui ja kalla hranphur so manita.
Manina amota mokka Jerushalem tienga lea so, ariem na shi hakta.
Akha chu mani apha limpa athieng inn sunga am ma Chungthieng ta riem ma domso.
Ehei limpa sak matienga, trongsan ha chu am phur so weh; amo chu Chungthieng hitta am ha ae, hana amo ha Chungthieng ae.
Athou hai thou wa trongsan ha chu Chungthieng hitta am ha ae.
Ma jarra Chungthieng na eheilim pa sa ae; kutsem limpa hi amo tolno wa ephao sem no ae.
Trongsa hana ringchang hina shukna ae, akha chu na ring changna malmashi lim ta awar choi phao ae.
Awar hana athim sunga war ae, hana athim hana na awar hata nea no ae.
Chungthieng na marouron Johon ta hla ae.
Amo na mee ngeita awar hana maramma rilranga phao ae, chuna meelim pana rouril ha thei weta ngoiring ranga ae.
Amo matak mak chu awar ha ah no ae; amo na awar hana rou ril ranga phao ae.
Na awar hi adiek awar sha ae, na awar hina simlei ah phao hi malmashi limpa chunga awarranga ae.
Trongsan ha simlei chunga amphur so ae, hana Chungthieng majarra shimlei lim hi sem ae, chu phao sunga simlei ngei na chu amo ta dangno ae.
Amona mahu maram sunga phao ae, chuti weta mamee ngeina amota lah no ae.
Chuti halkom, ahre na chu, amota lah ae akha chu amo ta ngoiring ae; chuna amo na manita Chungthieng sanao ngei hina phaphung shuk pha pi so ae.
Mani hi don hei thou wa chu Chungthieng sanao ngei no ae, maram chu mani hi malmashi pa ngei thouwa don sha ae; chuti weta Chungthieng hi mani pa maksa ae.
Trongsa hana mee changa lungshi lea adiek hana shi ah ani karra am phur ae. Hana mapa haithou wa akha chakka don sanao na pha mahung majai ha kani na riphur songe.

Johonna maramma trongphur ae, amona rilsukke, “Hi akha hina maramma ae keina karilphurha, ‘Amona kanutinga phao ae, chuti weta amona keita lella loktekke, maram chu keita donma hei thouwa amochu amphur so weh.’ ”
Malungshit hana shihakti hei thouwa amona anilimta yaihra bopi so weh, anita yaihra akha nuteinga akha pepi ae.
Chungthieng na Moses hei thouwa roukung pe ae, Chuti weta lungshi thei lea adiek chu Khrista Jisu kol hei thou phao phur ae.
Atu akha na kom Chungthieng ta etikka kom ri nosonge. Akha chak don Asanaopa, Chungthieng, hitta akharukti akha chu Mapa ningtinga am, amona amota dangpi so weh.
Jerushalem ma am rouril nea Jewish ngei na Thiempu ahre lea Levites ngeita Johon kolla “Nang atu acha meh?” ta sairang hla ae.
Johon na sangnum no ae no lutta thienga ta amo na ril shuk kae, “Kei hi Messiya ha ah nonge.”
“Chuleh chu, nang atu che meh?” ta mani na sai.
“Nang Elija che?”
“A-no ae, kei a-nonge,” Johonna sangphure.
“Nanghi Thiempu che? ta manina sai.
“Ah nonge” ta amona sange.
“Chuleh chu kanita atu cha mo rillo.” mani na ril. “Kani ta hla ngei am na ah nasang rou ha ron na lea ange nang natak mak hi atu inge ti cha meh?”
Johon na roumaphu Isaiya rilphur rouha rilsir ae;
“Arengpu mathingrang lamha
tingpi-oh-ta ramrukka ao sanrolha kei inge!”
Pharisis ngei na hla rouron ngei na.
Johon kolla sai, “Ejonga nang hi Messiya anole Elija ano lea roumaphu anonge ti lea alo wa nangna meeta baptias ae pi ah che?
Johon na sang, “Keina tui ah baptias ae pi inge, chuti weta nangei kar sunga ngir tolla am akha ha chu nangei na dang nijo chou ae.
Amo ha kanutinga phao halkom kei na mahuirang rui sui pi phao kei chu matik cha nonge.”
Nalimpa hi Bethany ah Jordon tuiwa nasutienga shuk sha ae amunt hana ae Johon na baptias ae pi na ha.
Mathangpa rungnie ah Jisu na Johon makolla wak ha ripha ah ril, “Anno Chungthieng kelmo nao ha, amona simlei chunga pak lim pa ron na thing ange!
Hi akha hina maram ma ae keina karil phurha, “Apa akha kanutienga phao ange, amona keita hella loktekke rou ram chu keita don matienga amo chu am hlakso.
Keina amohi eyongpa mee angmo dang nonge, chuti weta Isarel meengei na amota dangranga keina tuisunga baptias ae pi ranga wa inge.”
Hana Johonna saro ei ah rille, “Keina muhla hana thangwan hei thou wa peipi hekta jungtumma machunga am so weh.

Keina amota atunpha dang nonge chuti weta tuisunga baptias ae pi rang keita hla Chungthieng amo na kakolla rille, ‘Muihla athieng na tum ma jung weta atu jong apa akha chunga am ha ripha ange, amo mak ha sa-ae muihla ah baptias ae pi ang ha.’
Keina ri pha singe” Johon na ril, “Hana sarukka keina nangei kolla rilla aminge amo hi Chungthieng sanaopa ae.”
Mathang pa rungnie ah Johon na marui ani hitta hana woiha leya ngirra am meh,
amo na Jisu wakha ri weta, amo na ril, “Amo hi ae Chungthieng kelmo ha!”
Arui ani na hita maril thei weta Jisu hitta thingha so ae.
Jisu na heileh a an weta manutieng jui ani hata sai, “Nanui nie na e-yong pa ann rol chou meh?” Manui na sang, “Rabbi hoija munt na nang am manga che?” (Rubbi rilna chu “ocha”.)
“Wa weta anwa oh,” amona sange. Manuina wa weta ma am rang na mun ha risho ae, hana manui na hanie rungnie ha chu amo hita am ha so ae. (Nalei ha nietating apha inli tulso weh.)
Manui anie sunga akha chu Simon Pitar manaopa Andrew ae.
Amona masha ah ma-ata Simon ta tukhlakka makolla ril, “Kani na Messiya” tuk songe (“Khrista” ta rilna.)

Hana amona Simon ha Jisu kolla ruija wa ae. Jisu na anweta makolla ril, “Naming hi Johon sanaopa Simon ae, chuti weta nangta Kephas ta kokkange” (hina rilna chu Pitar tichu “alung” ta ril na hita mana ae.)
Mathangpa rungnie ah Jisu na Galily ah thing ranga ngirso. Amona Philip ta tukka makolla rille. “Kanu jui wa-oh!”
(Philip hi Bethsaida ah mee ae Andrew lea Pitar am na hulok ka ae.)

Philip na Nathanel tukhlakka makolla ril, “Kani na Moses na roukung abai sunga jiekka shi akha chu roumaphu ngeina kom jiekka shi Arengpu ha kani na tukhlak so ae Amo ha Nazareth ta Josep sanao Jisu ae.”
Nathanael na saiye, “Nazaretta hei thou wa e-ahra shuknea ang meh?”
“wa weta ann wa oh,” Philip na sange.
Nathanaelna makolla wak Jisuna rijuija amona ma maramma rille, “Hina adiektak Israel am so ae; makolla diek lau akha phao am no ae!”
Nathanael na makolla sai, “Alo ta kei ta nangna dangpha che?”
Jisu na sang, “Philip na nangta kok matienga nangna theichang kung thuija na am ha keina ri inge.”
Nathanael na sange, “Arengpu,” “Nanghi Chungthieng sanaopa ae! Nanghi Israel ngei Rengpa ae!”
Jisu na ril, “Keina nanghi theichung kung thuija ri inge ta karil sa rukka ngoiringa che? Hita hella alok alok tullu nangna ri pha ang che!”
Hana amona manita rille, “Kei na adiek rou rilla aminge nangei kolla nangei na thangwan ram honga am ri ange hana Chungthieng wanrui ngei na meesanaopa chunga kalla hang tum ma jung ri ange.”
Rungnie nani waitakka Galily sunga Kana hulokka athieng nuhla ammeh Jisu manu kom hana am tol ae,
hana Jisu akha chu marui ngei ta kom luhongna ah manita kom kokke.
Darkha tui ha thanghap ti pa chu, Jisu manu na amota rille, “Mani darkha tui am nijo weh.”
Jisu na sange, “Nangna ka ae angha rillanga a-no ae,” “Ka ae-ang aphaha atun pha no songe.”
Chuna Jisu manu na asuuk ngeita rille, “Maril eheilimpa nangeina ae-oh.”
Jehudi ngei talit tamang anu juija alung bel akhana tui litres riha chal alok aruk mani na shil tengrang doija shi ae.
Jisu na shuk ngeita ril, “Na tuibel ngei hi tui shi hak ti pi oh.” Mani na bel amai phao shihak ti pi so ae.
Hana amo na manita rille, “Atun chu tui ahre shukka lah weta abak a inn ron na am pa kolla choija thingo.” Mani na tui ha shukjuija.
Atun chu darkha tui wulso ae hana amo na chihou an so ae. Amona na darkha tui hi hoitienga thou phao mo dangno ae (chuti weta tui shukka am arui hana chu dange.) Chuna amo na taichang angpa ta kokka.
Makolla rille, “Masha a meelimta hra tekti darkha tui nangna samso che hana nutienga kom athui hrit ti hra akha sampi che ae chuti weta atun phao sunga ehekta hra darkha tui lim ma am songe!”
Jisu na ahalpa anealah tullu hi Galily ah Kana luhonga ripi ae. Hana amo na mahung majai ha mari pi juija marui ngei na amota ngoiring thou so ae.
Hina nutienga Jisu hina manu manao akha chu marui ngeina kapharnahum ma thing weta rungnie atite am thinge.
Lanpina na Reen apha naija wa sou chu Jisu na Jerushalem tinga thinge.
Athieng inn sunga sum jurra am ngei kelmo jur ngei paipi jurngei hana sum chui kui ngei ejana na am amo na tuk hlakke.
Chuna amona ruija rul mol sem weta athieng inn awao ah sum kelmo ngei ta julla wa ae hana sum chui kui ngei doukang kom achung athui letta sum chui ngei bun na chok chai so ae.
Hana amo na paipi jurra am apa ta rille, “Hina hei thou wa choija shuk jou oh! Kapa inn hi kaithiel kal na neinou-oh.”
Marui ngei na jieksa rou ha angei thei ae, “Oh, Chungthieng na inn sunga kamokhi sarmei hekta keita kange.”
Jehudi ane angam ngeina sangveta rou saiye. “Nangna na tullu na lu hi aephung shukketa kani kolla eyongpa anealah ae weta mune ang chame?”
Jisu na sange, “Na athieng inn hi nangei na hri hou-oh hana keina rungnie nathum nie a woiha lea a sha sir nea ange.”
“Nangna rungnie nathum nie ah woiha lea ah sha sir nea ange!” Mani na amota rille, “Nahi akum somli aruk lutta shak athieng inn ae!”
Chutiveta athieng inn ta Jisu tronga am hi chu mapum hata ril na sa ae.
Chuna amo na athi hai thou wa ring thou juija marui ngei na na rou hi ae maril phur ta angei thei ae. Hana manina jieksha rou akha chu Jisu na rilphur ha ngoiringso.
Jisu na lanpina reen sunga Jerushalem ma, ma am leija angakpi maripi hata ri manina amota ngoiringso.
Chuti weta Jisu matakmakna chu mani ta ngoiring no ae, rouram chu amo na mani lim pa ta dange.
Hana atu akha na kom mani ha taranga makol rourillang am no ae, rouram chu amo matakmakna mani lungrang lim dange.
Hana leiya Jehudi ngei lamkai amingna Nicodimas tipa amo ha chu Pharisi ngei abom sunga tol lea.

Nahani jintienga amo na Jisu kolla thing weta rille, “Ocha, kani na nanghi Chungthieng na hla ocha akha ae ta dang unge atu akha na kom angakpi na lu tullu jongpa ae no ae Chungthieng na amo hitta am hano wa chu.”
Jisu na sange, “Keina nakolla adiek rou rillinge atu akha na Chungthieng rengram ha ri ang no ae amona lea ah don nowa chu.”
“Alota lokka hangsa mee na lea ah don sirrang meh?” Nicodimas na saiye, “Amo na manu von sunga lut weta woini suna pa don chu nea ang no ae!”
“Keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge” Jisu na sange, “Atu akha na ko Chungthieng Rengram lut nea ang no weh amo na tui akha chu muihla athiengna don a no wa chu.
Malmashi hi manumapa hei lhou wa don ae chuti weta amo ha chu muihla tienga muihla a don ae.
Nangna ephao angak shukno oh keina nakolla tharra don oh karil sarukka.

Thirangna madit na ram munt tieng range thinge nangna atarra chu theipha che ae chuti weta nangna hoitienga thou phao mo akha chu hoitienga thingmo chu dangno ae chu hekta. Muihla a don meelim ko hati sa ae.”
“Nahi alo ta shuk kang meh?” Nicodemas na saiye.
Jisu na sang. “Nanghi Isrel ngei alok ocha akha weta nangna na hi dangno wa che.”
Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rilla aminge kanina rilla am hi chu kani na dang akha chu kanina ripha ha thangkou wa unge chu phao sunga nangei akha phao na kani rouril ha lah num no chau ae.
Nangei na keita ngoiring no che ae keina simlei chunga roulim karil juija ngoiring no weta alo ta keina thangwan rouramma karil juija ngoiring ang sha?
Chuna atu akha na thungwan na kal thing no songe thang wanna thou jung meesanaopa amo ano wa.”
Moses na ramrukka arul ta thing kathanga tar hekta meesanaopa ta kom tar ange.
Chuna atujong akha na makolla ngoiring lim na samla ringchang pha ange.
Chuna Chungthieng na simlei hita ehekta lungshi pi-ae hana jarra akha chak don amo na masanaopa ta pepi so ae. Chuna atujong meena amota ngoiring lea chu athi am no wa samla ringchang ha pha so ae.
Chungthieng na asanaopa ta simlei ah hla hi routreem ae rang no ae chuti weta sanpi ranga ae.
Atujongna meesanaopa ta ngoiring lea chu routreem ae ang no ae chuti weta ngoiring no mee amota chu routreem so ae rouram chu amona Chungthieng akha chak don asanao ta ngoiring no ae.
Routreem ha chu hiti a-ae tichu. Simlei chunga awar hi tungso ae chuti weta malmashi ngei na chu awar ta hella athiem ta di tekke maram chu mani ae-ngam ahra tullu no ae.
Atujong akha na hrano tullu lu lea chu awar ta atir ae hana awar am na ah wanum no ae. Maram chu hrano tullu ma lu ha ri pi num no ae.
Chuti weta atujong na adiek tullu lu lea chu amo na awar am na wa num ae maram chu ma lu tullu ha Chungthieng aril atrong jui ja ae ta awarna muh ranga sa ae.
Hina waitakka Jisu akha chu arui ngei na Judiya ram tienga thinga hana apha atante mani hitta am ha weta baptias ae pi so ae.
Johon na kom Aenon na baptias ae pi ah am meh Salim hai thou wa aram lah no ae, rouram chu amunt hana tui leima tam am jarra mee ngei makolla phao weta amona mani ta baptias ae pi ae.
(Nahi Johon ta ahungin sunga si matienga ae.)
Johon arui ahre na Jehudi akha kolla trong wuk hlakka thou so ae mani talit tamang anu jui ja kut silna maramma.
Chuna manina Johon am na thing weta ril, “Ocha, Jordon nasu tienga apa akha nanghitta am ha ma maramma naril phur ha angei thei che? amona atun baptias ae pi ah am meelim makolla thingso ae.”
Johon na sang, “Atu akha na Chungthieng na makolla pe a no wa chu ephao pha nea no ae.
Keichu Messiya ha anonge, chuti weta keita mamatienga hla a sa aeta karilphurha nangei natakna kataranga meelungir ano ah chou meh.
Taichang angnu taranga chu taichang angpa ae; chuna makolla ngirra marou ngai ah am luhonh angpa atronpi na masanrol theijuija eja ah ariem meh hina chu hekta keina kariem hi shi hakti so ae.
Amona lella loktekka hangange keina sintekta tumma jung ang ae.”
Achungtieng hei thou phao amo hana eheilim chunga amona loktekke. Amo hana aleiram tienga lea chu amona alei ram taranga rou rillange. Chuti weta thungwan hei thou phao amo na ehei lim chunga ameh.
Amona mari akha chu mathei pha ha rilpi-ae, chu phao sunga atu akha na marou ril lah num no ae.
Chuti weta atujong na marouril lah lea chu Chungthieng hi adiek takke ta lingno wa am meh.
Chungthieng na hla atujong amona Chungthieng rou chak tronge rouram chu Chungthieng na machunga muihla shi hakta pe ae.
Mapana asanao pa ta lungshi ae chuna jarra eheilimpa makut chunga shi so ae.
Atujong na asanaopa ta ngoiring lea chu amo ha samla ringchang pha so ae. Chuti weta atu jongna aril jui nole chu amo na ringchang tukne ang no ae chuna Chungthieng a lei choiya am mange.
Pharisis ngei na theipha so, Jisu na Johon ta hella baptias ae pi ah akha chu marui na tam tekkae ta.
(Routakka chu Jisu matakmak na atu akha takom baptias ae pi no ae, marui ngei na ae pi sa ae.
Chuna Jisu rouhi theijuija amo na Judiah houphur weta Galily ah lea so.
Hana maleh na lampi hana amo hi Samariah samma thinga tah ae.
Samariah sunga Sychar ti hulokka amo na pha so. Hana na ram ha chu Jacob na asanao Josep ta pek loupukha aram lah ni jo weh.
Hana Jacob tuikung ammeh, mani thingna lamma Jisu ha olla tuikung hana onga solhla so. Naha chu niesoun tieng ti lei so ae.
Samariah nameinu na tui shuk kanga wa ah, Jisu na makolla ril, “keita inn rang tui pepi oh.”
(Marui ngei chu hulok hanna abak ranga lei thing hlakka am meh.)
Nameinu na sange, “Nangchu Jew ae, hana kei chu Samariah inge, chuna sarukka alo ta nangna kakolla inn rang tui sai ah che?” (Jews ngei na Samariah ngei tuidon inn na inn no ae.)

Jisu na sang, “Nangna Chungthieng na pek hi emo dang phurta lea akha chu nakolla inn rang tui nie mee ha atu meh ta dangphur ta lea chu, nang na nie phur anga ae, hana amo na nangta ringna tui pepi anga ae.”
Nameinu na ril, “Arengpu” “Nangna tuishuk na bartin kom am no wa hija thuk tuikung hi alota nangna ringna tui shuk weta pe ang che?
Kani puthou Jacob na kani ta peksha tuikunge; Amo na kom hana asanao ngei akha chu majoksha ngei na kom hina inphur ae. Nangna Jacob ta hella loktekkae ta halla am ma che?”
Jisu na sang, “Atujong akha na, na tuikung hina tui inn ngei na woiha lea ah tuiral sier ange.

Chuti weta atujong meena kapek kang tui inn mee amo ha woiha lea ah tuiral am mang no ae. Hana makolla kapek kang tui ha chu tuiphut changa ringchanga tuiral am no wa akha chu samla ringchung pha ange.”
Nameinu na ril, “Arengpu” “Keita na tui ha pepi oh! Chuleh chu woiha lea ah tuiral ka am no ranga hana keina na amunt hina lea ah tui shuk wak no ranga.”
“Thing weta napishal kok thingo, hana hina lea sierro ta Jisu na makolla ril.”
“Kei chu kapishal am nonge” ta nameinu na sang, “Kapishal am nonge ta naril rou ha leima adiekka ril so che. Jisu na sang.
Nang chu napishal ranga shu so ae, hana atun nang hitta am ha spa ha napishal athieng ah no ae. Nangna naril ha adiek takkae.”
Nameinu hana ril, “Keina arengpu ha ripha singe, nanghi thiempu ae.”
“Kani Samariah pa pu ngei na, na mullon hina Chungthieng ta mokkae, chuti weta Jews nangei na chu nangei Chungthieng hi Jerushalem ma mokkanga ae ti ae.”
Jisu na namei ta ril, “Keita ngoiringo, namei nu, malmashi ngeina, na mullon ah hal Jerushalem ma hal mapata mok no rang apha phao ange.
Samariah nangei na nangei mokhi routakka atu kolla mok mo dangno chao ae; chuti weta Jews kanina atu kolla moksha ti hi dang unge, chuna sarukka aring kaetlo hi Jews hai thou wa phao ae.
Chuti weta apha hakom phao ange hana hina amsu hakso ae, hana Chungthieng muihla hina jaitha jarra malmashi ngeina mokkange mapa amo ha mak.
Chungthieng chu muihla ae, chuna ma muihla hana jaitha jarra chak malmashi ngei na amota mok kange adiek tolla.”
Nameinu na rille makolla, “Messiya jung ange ti ha keina dang inge hana majung juija amona eheilimpa kanita ril pi ange.”
Jisu na sang, “Amo ha kei inge, nang hitta tronga am ha kei inge.”

Hana apha makka Jisu rui ngei lea ah mani na leima tam angak shuk kae amona namei akha hitta tronga am tukhlak juija. Chuti hal kom mani kar sunga kom namei nuta ril no ae “ejongpa nadit am sa?” ano lea “elo sarukka nameinu ta trong hlakka am ma che takom makolla sai no ae?”
Hana nameina na matapot houphurra mani hulokka lea weta mani mee ngei kolla rou ril.
“Wa weta anno katullu lu eheilimpa ril nea spa akha amo hi Messiya kom ah ngei ae?”
Chunapa chu mani na mani hulok houphur weta Jisu am na thingso.
Hana lei apha sunga marui ngei na Jisu kolla nie, ocha abak pot eyongpa akha bak ko.”
Chuti weta Jisu na sang, “Keina abak rang nangei danglao am minge.”
Chunapa chu marui ngei na mani thei chakka sai hlak thou so, “Atujong akha na tieng mabak rang choiya phao mee tol la mo?”
Jisu na manita ril, “kabu chu” keita hla amo hana mahal keita mapek tullu su pi weta aril jui ha ae.
Nangna chu hita rilleh, ‘Shangpottang hla li chak so weh,’ chuna keina nangei kolla rilla aminge nahong tou wa namit anno loupokka shang ha potta ngei hang so ae!
Muchi vorh pa lea shang pot pa na eya ah ariem ha angsa, shangpot pa na malom mant pha hana atreem neino wa ring ranga muchi ha homma shi ae.
Rilla am hi adiek tak ae, ‘spa akha na muchi vorh ae, adang akha na muchi lukke.’
Keina shang pottanga nangta hla singe natullu lu no na loupukka adangei kom tullu lu ah am meh hana nangna kom tullu na lu na lommant tok pha ange.”
Samariah hulokka am meelim pa na Jisu ta ngoiring ae, roulam chu hana nameina ril rou ha, “Amona ka tullu lu eheilimpa ha keita rilleh.”
Chuna Samariah ngeina Jisu kolla wa ae, mani na Jisu kolla mani hitta am ha ranga rilla Jisu na rungnie nanie am ha so ae.
Marou ril hana nujuiya leima tam tekka ngoiringso.
Chuna mani na namei nu ta ril, “Narou ril sharukka kanina ngoiring ah no weh. Kani tak makna marou hi theipha sarukka ae hana kani na dang songe amo hi routakka simlei limpa ta sanpipa ae.
Jisu na rungnie nanie am ha su waitakka manita houphurra Galily ah thingso.
Amo matak makna ril, “Chungthieng rouril ngei hi aram mak ngei na ajak ati no ae.”
Amona Galily matungjuiya malmashi ngeina ariem lamtuk hakka am meh, roulam chu manina Jerushalem ma lanpina reen na mani thinglei ah reen sunga eheilimpa ma lu tullu ha mani na riphur so ae.
Hana amona Galily Kana ah lea so amunt hana ae tui ta dharkha wul pi na ha hana Government offisar sananao pa kom Kapharnahum ma ana ah am meh.
Amona Jisu hi Judiah ram hai thou wa Galily ah phao so ae ta mathei juiya, amona Jisu kolla thinge, Kapharnahum ma thing weta asanao pa thi ang ae am pa ta dampi ranga sai so.
Jisu na makolla ril, “Atu akha nakom angakpi anealah nangei na ri malim ma ngoiring no ae.”
Offisar pa na sang, “Arengpu, kasanao thit matienga kei hitta thingsui oh.”
Jisu na makolla ril, “Thing jou oh nasanaopa ha ring ang ae!”
Spa hana Jisu rouha ngoiringa thingso.
Ma inn lampi ah kor ngeina amota tukhlak wa ah routhar ha ril so, “Nasanaopa ha dam sho ae.”
Amona manita sai, “Eyongpa apha ah kasanaopa hratekka hang meh, mani na sange, ajan ni soun na atrun manockha dom ae apha na akha tah jui ja.”
Hana mapana angei thei so ha chu Jisu na makolla rilna apha makkha, “Nasanao pa ha ring ang ae.” Chunapa chu amo akha chu inn sung limpa na ngoiringso.
Judiah heithou ah Galily maphao ah Jisu na woinie sunapa anealah hi ae so.
Hi waitakka Jisu na Jerushalem ma dramo reen sarukka thing so.
Jerushalem ma kelmo sungkar am na ah tuikum akha am meh alutna ranga limpa hlumma shi ae Ebriya na chu nahi Bethsaida ta kokkae.
Ahlutna ah kaettik mitcho, hana pum ahui athi sa wairul riha rai am malmashi ngei hana jalhlakka am meh.
Ejong apha ah wanrui na tumma jung weta tuikum ma tui lingpi juija hana atujong akha na masha ah tui lingsu tukka katlo lea chu ejongpa rai hal kom ma-am rai ha dompi ae.
Akum somthum arit ana ah am spa akha hana am meh.
Jisuna jalla ma am ri ah akha chu amo na dangpha ae apha eja sotta amo hi ana pha ah am meh tah; chuna Jisu na amo ta sai. “Nangna adam pha num ma che?”
Ana ah am spa na sang, “Arengpu, tuina ling juija keita lut pi ang mee kataranga atu akha am no ae; chuna keina lut ranga thou rang ka ae leija atu jong akha na masha chak ti ae.”
Jisu na makolla ril, “Naphar choi weta thou wo, hana thingo.”
Apha hana makka spa hana thou weta maphar ha choi weta thing thou so. Shukka am rungnie hi Sabbath nie ae.
Chuna Jews ane angam ngeina spa hata atu na nangta dampi meh, “Rungnie hi sabbath ae chuna ani roukung ta ngeino tullu lu nangna phar choija rol hi.”
Amo na sange, “Keita dampi spa hana keita ril lea kaphar hi choiweta thingo.”
Manina amota sai, “Atu meh spa ha nangta hi tullu lu oh ta ril mee ha?”
Chutiweta adam pha spa hana chu Jisu atu meh ti dangno ae amunt hana wairul riha na amna Jisu chu shukka thingso ae.
Hana nutienga Jisu na athieng inn sunga tuk hlakka ril, “Ano atun chu nang dam so ae; chuna pap tullu chan jou oh hella sathi rai nachunga shuk no ranga.”
Hana spa hana thing weta Jewish ane angam ngei kolla ril so, “Keita dampi mee ha Jisu ae.”
Chuna manina Jisu ta aol ana pe thou so. Rouram chu amona sabbath rungnie ah ana ta dampi ae.
Jisu na sange manita, “Kapa na apha chang honna tullu lu ah am meh hana keina kom hahekta tullu lu tah ae.”

Hina sarukka Jewish ane angam ngei na Jisu ta that ranga hella jong thou so, amona sabbath rungnie ah roukung anu juija kuipi chak ano wa Chungthieng ta kapa ae ta rilla, akha chu matak makhi Chungthieng hitta mana pe ae.

Chuna Jisu na manita sang, “Keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge asanaopa na mathei chakka ephao ae nea no ae, ma lu tullu chu mapathieng na lu tullu mari ha chakkae, ejongpa mapathieng na lu tullu ha asanao pa na kom ae ah ae.
Hina rou ram chu mapa na asanaopa ta lungshit jarra matakmakna lu tullu ri pi ae. Amona hita hella alok tullu ta hella kom ae rang ri pi ange hana nangei na angak shukkange.
Mapathieng na athi sa ngeita ringthou pi weta manita ringchang pekpi hekta asanao pana kom aring di ngei ta kom ringchang pe pi ae.
Mapathiengna chu atu akha ta routreem ae no ae. Amona asanaopata rou shu rang routreem ae nea rang pe so ae.
Chuna sarukka mapata meelim pa na ajak ati ae hekta asanaopa ta kom ajak ati anga ae, atu jongpa na asanaopa ta ajak ati no lea amota hla mapathieng ta kom ajak ati no ah ae.
“Keina nakolla adiek rou rilla aminge: atujong na karou theija akha chu keita hla amo ta ngoiring mee chu samla ringchang pha ange.
Keina nangei kolla adiek rou rillinge apha hi leima nei so ae. Apha ha chu tungso, athi sa ngei na Chungtheing sanaopa sarol thei rang, hana amona thei lea chu ringchang ha pha ange.
Mapa thiengna matak makka ring chan am chu hekta asanaopa kom makolla ringchang pe nea ae.
Hana amona asanaopa ta routreem ae nea rang jaitha kom pe so ae rouram chu amo ha meesanao pa ae.
Nahina sarukka angak shukno oh. Athi sa ngei na sanrol ha thei rang apha akha phao ange.
Hana mani hlanhur sunga thou wa shuk kange atujong ahra tullu lu ngeina hana ringthou wa aringpha ange. Hana atujong hrano tullu lu ngeikom ringthou weta amo ta chu aol pe ange.

“Keina kathei chakka ka nea ephou am nonge; routreem ka ae chu Chungthieng na keita ril ha chakkae, chuna karoutreem hi chu adiek chakkae rouram chu keina kadit hana ae rang kom am nange, chuna kei chu keita hla mee hana adit ha chak sa ae.
Kei kathei chakna kataranga saro ei lea chu keina ril num minge amoha alakrang rou am no ae.
Chuti weta kasarukka saro ei mee am sharukka. Hana keina kom dang inge kata maram ma ma-ril ha adiek takkae.
Nangai makna Johan kolhai thou theipha so chou, akha chu amona adiek rou hana rou ril so.
Keina chu malmashi kolla kataranga saro ei mee lah ah nonge, chutichun nangei ta sanpi ranga keina rou hi ril singe.
Johon ha chu dewarkari si na chunga warra chak am ha ae chuna nangei na apha atan te taranga mamai kunga ariem ha di chao ae.
Chuti weta kei chu kasarukka soro ei Johon na pek saro ei ha ta hella alok am minge ka ae ah am tullu hi kapathiengna keita ae oh ta pek tullu lu hana makka keita hla ae ta karou hana saro am meh.
Keita hla pathiengna kom ka rou hana saro pe pi ae. Nangei na ephao ma sanrol hi theikom thei no songe hana mamai kom ri no songe.
Hana marouril kom nangei lungsunga shi no chao ae, hana nangei na mahla amo ta kom ngoiring no ae.
Nangei na jieksha rou ha Jong chao ae, chuna sharukka hana sunga nangei na samla ringchang pha ange ta hal chao ae! Akha chu kamaramma jieksha rou rilla shi hi, hi ae.
Chu phao sunga nangei na ringchang ha pha rang sarukka ka am na ah wa num no chao ae.
Keina malmashi ngei na dom ma shi di nonge.
Chuti weta keina chu nangei hi ejongpa malmashi moti ha dang inge hana Chungthieng ta nangei lung sunga lungshit am no ae ti kom dang inge.
Kaphao hi kapathieng hina ane angam hita phao ha inge chuti weta nangei na kei ta lah num no ae; atujong akha na mathei chakka ane angam hitta phao hajui amo ta chu lah num meh.
Nangei na akha lea akha nangei mashel dom hlak di chau ae chuti weta nangei na Chungthieng athei chakna dom ranga ephao hot na no ae chuna sarukka alota nangei na keita ngoiring ang sha?
Keina nangei ta kapathieng am na ah aral nei nunt pe ange ta hal no oh, nangei na lungranga am Moses na tieng naral mei nunt pe ange.
Ejonga nangna routakka Moses ta ngoiring ta lea chu keitakom ngoiringo, rouram chu majiek rou ha karou ae.
Chuti weta nangei na majiekka shi ngoiring no am sou chu alo ta chu nangei na karilla am hi ngoiring ang sha?”
Hina waitakka Jisu na Galily tuipi lalla thingso. (Tiberias tuipi ta kom kokkae.)
Wairul riha na manutieng jui je, rouram chu mani na Jisu na angakpi ah rai eja ta madampi hana.
Jisu na mullon na kalla arui ngei hitta thing weta ongso.
Lanpina reen kom apha leima neija wa so ae.
Jisu na ahul tunga an juija wairul riha na makolla wak ripha so. Chuna pa chu amo na phelip ta sai, “Hoija amunt na ani na hija tam mani bakpi rung lei thing ang meh?”
(Marilla am hi Phelip ta chang an na routakka chu amo na ejongpa tullu lu ang sa dang su so ae.)
Phelip na sang, “Na mani limpa hi na atan te hal kom chungsap ti ranga chu rupa rihanie ah budol na kom lei ja hop hlak kang no ae.”
Adang marui Simon Pitar mata Andrew na ril,
“Hina rungthar sanao te akha kolla budol ranga lea tuiriek ani chu am meh, chuti weta mani hija tam hina taranga chu hophlakkang no ae.”
Jisu na manita ril, “Malmashi ngei ha ong ranga ae pi oh.” (Amunt hana tingthou leima am meh.) Hana ong malmashi ngei ha spa ngei chakka lasing ranga jongpa ae.
Jisu na budol lah weta Chungthieng kolla nie so, hana onga am malmashi ngei ta sam piso. Hana amo na tuiriek kom hahekta ae weta ma ngei na mani hop ma lim ma pe so.
Mani na shihakti so nu ti juija Jisu na arui ngei ta ril, “Atan atun tulla am ngei ha rachon pi oh anina ariem salla houno ei oh.”
Chunapa chu mani na ha lim pa ha rachon pi juija chu tai asom anie sunga shi so, malmashi ngei na budol baksu waitakka.
Jisu na ri pi ah am angakpi ri veta malmashi ngeina ril, “Routakka simlei chunga jung ange ti Chungthieng rou phupa mee ha amo ange!”
Jisu na dangpa so mani na makolla wa weta mani rengpa chang ranga amota mant nange ta; chuna amo na adang mullon thinga thing so.
Nietak apha pha juija Jisu rui ngeina tuipi ah tumma jungso.
Kung sunga lut weta kapharnahum tienga tuipi lalla thing so, jantieng pha wa so, Jisu chu mani am na phao no songe.
Hana lei apha sunga ajap ahai hanga tuijul hella hangso.
Arui ngeina kung holla thinga kilometres ranga aruk hai thou wa Jisu na tui sunga kal choi ja mani kung neija wak ripha so. Hana mani na tri thouso.
“Atri no oh,” kei inge ta Jisu na manita ril.
Hana manina ariemma Jisu ta kung sunga rui lutpi weta apha hana makka mani kung ha mani tung rang amunt mani matienga tungso.
Hana huwar rungnie ah wairul riha tuipi aralla am na dangso, ha chu kung sanao akha chak am meh. Hana Jisu na marui ngei hitta thing ha no weta manina dangso. Arui ngei na amota houphurra thingso.
Adang kung akha kom Tiberias hai thou wa-ah tuipi ahou tungso Jisu na budol dom weta mani bakna amunt ha nei hlak so.
Wairul riha na Jisu akha chu arui ngei hana am no juija, manina hana am kung hana lut weta kapharnahum tienga Jisu ta jonga thingso.
Malmashi ngei na Jisu ta tuipi aralla mani tukhlak juija manina makolla ril, “Arengpu, etikka na amunt tunga che?”
Jisu na sange, “Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rillinge. Nangei na keita jonga rol hi, budol nangei bak sarukka akha chu nangei dit pha jarra ae aeneleh nangei na ri sarukka no ae.

Abak taranga tullu lu no oh hrano tah ange, hana hutta samla rinchung taranga tullu lu pa na sottek kange na abak hi ae, meesanaopa na pekkang ha, rouram chu pa Chungthieng na machunga shi angei ha ae.
Chuna mani na makolla sai, “Kani na e tullu lu anga meh Chungthieng na kanita dit tullu lu ang hi?
Jisu na sang, “Chungthieng na nangei ta adit tullu chu mahla mee hata ngoiring ha ae.
Mani na sang, “Ejongpa anealah kanita ri pi anga che, kani na naha ri weta nangta ngoiring ranga? Ejongpa ae ang che?
Kani pi pu ngei na ramrukka Manna bakpha ae, jieksha rou na ril nujuija “Amo na thangwan hai thou badol bakranga pe ae.”
“Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rillinge.” Jisu naril, “Moses na nangei ta pek budol ha thangwan hai thou ah no ae; Ka pathieng na nangei ta pek budol ha chu athieng thangwan hai thou ae.
Chungthieng na pek budol ha chu thungwan hai thou wa tumma jung weta maringchang simlei taranga pekha ae?”
Manina makolla sai, “Arengpu,” “Kanita hajon budol ha apha chang honna pepi oh.”
Jisu na manita ril, “Ringchanghina budol ha kei inge.” “Atu motieng kakolla wa mee chu awon tam am mangno ae; keita ngoiring mee amo na tuiral ti kom am mang no ae.
Atun chu keina nangei kolla rilla aminge nangei, na keita ri so chau ae chuti weta ngoiring no chau ae.
Kapathiengna keita peksha nangei lim hi, ka kolla wa ange, ka-am na wa mee akha phao nutienga lea pi ang nonge.
Rouram chu thangwan hi thou wa kajung hi kahal ha ae ranga jung nonge, keita hla mee amo hana ahal ae ranga jung inge.
Akha chu keita hla amo hana ahal ha ah ae amona kakolla pek limhi akha phao mangpi ang nong ae, chuna sarukka keina atreem na rungnie ah mani lim pa ta ringa thou pi ah ringchang pe anga ae.
Hina rouram ma pathiengna dit meesanaopa ta ri meelim na amo ta ngoiring lea chu samla ringchang pha ange, hana keina mani ta atreem nie rungnie ah thoupi weta ringchang pa ange.”
Malmashi ngeina amota ril hlak thou so, ha chu amo na rilleh, “Kei thangwan hai thou jung budol inge.”
Chuna manina ril, “Na spa hi Jisu no meh Josep sanao pa ha? Ani na mapa manu danga am weta alo ta amo atun thungwan haithou jung inge ta rilla meh?”
Jisu na manita ta ril, “Nangei thei chakka rilhlakka am ha chanjou oh.
Keita hla kapathiengna lamkaija wa ano wa chu atu akha na kom kakolla wa nea no ae hana keina amota atreem nie rungnie ah ringthou pi ange.
Rouphupa na jiekka shi so ae, ‘Chungthieng na meelimpa ta chupi ange.’ Hana kapa kol hai thou mee atujong lim akhana theija dang nakakolla wa ange.
Nahina rilna chu meelimpa na kapathieng ta ri so ae ti na ah no ae. Chuti weta Chungthieng kolla am amo na chak kapa ta ri pha ae.
Keina adiek rou nangei kolla rilla aminge, atu motieng ngoiring mee na samla ringchang pha ange.
Ringchang hina budol ha kei inge.
Napa napu ngei na ramrukka Manna bak phur ae, chuti weta mani ha thi ae.
Chuti weta thangwan hai thou jong budol bak mee chu lungshi thei ah athi am ang no ae.

Thangwan hai thou jung aring budol ha kei inge ejong atujong akha na, na budol bak mee amo na atreem nei no wa ring ang ae, hana makolla kapekkang budol ha chu katak mak ae hana kapek hachu simleija aring pha range.”
Nahina mani karak sunga hella lungsha hlakka trong jethlak thou so. “Alota na spa hina matak ta abakranga ani ta pe ang sha?” Mani na sai.
Jisu na manita ril, “Keina adiek rou rillinge; ejonga nangei na katak akha chu meesanaopa hana athee inn no lea chu nang natakmakha ringchang pha ang no che.
Atujong akha na katak akha chu kathee inn meelim pa na samla ringchang pha ange hana atreem nie rungnie ah kei na ringchang pe ange.
Chuna katak ha chu routak budol ae hana routak inn ranga hachu kathee ae.
Atujong katak bakmee akha chu kathee inn mee amona kakolla ringe, hana keina kom makolla ring inge.
Aring pathiengna keita hla jarra keikom ring inge hana hekta atujong keita bak mee amo hakom kajarra aring pha ange.
Hina sarukka thangwan hai thou jung budol ha napa napu ngei na bak phur budol ano ae mani thit ha chu hana tujong na hi budol bak mee na atreem nei no wa aring pha ange.”
Jisu na, na hi Kapharnahum Synagogue sunga chupi takpi ae.
Manutieng jui meelim na rou hi thei weta ril, “Machupi hi leima akai ae atuna ngeine ang meh?”
Manina ril shuk no hal, Jisu na mani lungsunga rillhlakka am dangpha ah manita ril, “Na hina ngeita akai shukpi ah mo ae?
Chu lea chu mee sanao pa na masha ah ma am na ah lea weta kal ri ta lou chu alo ta rillanga chau?
