Nahi routakkae malmashi lei na thi ae maram chu mee akha na pak ka, Chuti weta Chungthieng na lungshi thei hana hella loktekkae meelim ta amant shalla mapekha mee akha hana lungshit jarra ae ha chu Jisu Khrista ae.
Arimsalla pek hi mee akha na pakka ae hita mana no ae, maram chu pak hana nutienga chu routreem am mange. “Pak sarukka” Chuna amant salla pek kuthul hana jarra pak chel eja na thieng pha nea ae.

Nahi routakkae mee akha hana pak sha rukka athi hina mee ngei ta nea chunga palso ae. Chuti weta Jisu Khrista mathei chakna lu tullu hi eja hella loktek mo ae atujong akha Chungthieng hina lungshithei amant sum mapek dramochel hana awat am no wa ringchanga am mange Jisu Khrista hana jarra.
Chuna mee akha na pakka malmashi limpa na aol pha chu hekta mee akha hana ahra dramo na malmashi limpa ta ringchang pe pi ah hla pi so ae amant salla.
Malmashi akha na aril juino sarukka meelim pa na pakka am chu hekta mee akha na aril jui hana jarra manita Chungthieng am na tungpi ange.
Rouphun hana tungsarukka pak lella ae na nei ae, Chuti weta pak na tam ma hang juija Chungthieng lungshithei kom hata hella tam tekka hange.
Chuna pak na palla athi ha pha ae hahekta Chungthieng lungshi theina palla dramo chellea akha chu arengpu Jisu Khrista hana jarra anita samla ringchang pha rang pi ae.
Ani na alota rillei ti meh? Chungthieng lungshit tamtek ranga anina pakka am ri ei ti meh?
Ano sa ae! ani hi pakka thi so ae chu ti lea ani na alota pakka ring ranga amanga meh?
Nangeina suino wa danga am mange anina tuisounga baptias Jisu hita ae ha lei ah anina mathit hana ani kom thi tol so ae.

Anina baptias ae hana amo hitta phum ha so ae akha chu mathit tum ha pha tol so ae. Khrista ta athi haithou wa mapa Chungthieng arat mahung majai tolla ringpi so ae, chuhekta anina athar ringchang ring ranga ae.
Ani na mathit hekta thi ha sou chu maring hekta ringthou ange.
Hana ani dang ha sha ae chu ani alui ringchang hi ma khross chunga thi tol so ae ti lea ani pakka am pum hi mangpi so ae. Chuna sarukka ani na pak hina kor changa am ni jo weh.
Chuna meena mathit juija amo ha pakarat hai thou wa shukka thingso ae.
Hana ani na Khrista hitta thi ha sou chu ani ngoiring chu amo hitta ring ha ange.
Hina rou ram chu Khrista na athi hei thou wa ringthou sa ae anina dange. Hana woiha lea ah athi am mang ni jo weh. Athi hana machunga ephao nea ang ni jo weh.
Chuna sarukka amona thi ah pak na machunga ephao ae nea no weh chuna atun chu maring chang ha Chungthieng hitta munha ah ring ha so.
Chuna chu hekta nangna kom hallanga ae natak hi thi so ae pak lam ma halhlak juija chutihal kom Khrista Jisu majarra ringchang hi Chungthieng hitta ringha so.
Tuija mang ang pum hina chunga pak ta nea pi ja hana mani dit eja juipi ah am no sa oh.

Napum ma sarukka akha phao wa hrano pak tullu lu ranga pe thing no oh, hana hutta napum lim ha Chungthieng taranga pe oh athi sa hai thou wa ringchang ronna phao ranga hana ahra adiekka ae rang napum lim pa pe oh.
Pak ha namitpu no ae; rou ram chu nangna rouphun hana thuija ringa am no ae chuti weta Chungthieng lungshit thuija ae.
Chu lea chu, Ejameh? ani na pak tullu lu ri ei ti meh, rouram chu rouphun hana thuija am no ae ta, hana Chungthieng lungshit thuija am meh ta? Ano ae!

Nangeina dang ange ta hallinge nangna natak ha atu jongpa akha hana kor tarang napek su juija routakka namitpu hana ril ha jui ranga kor sa ae. Pak aleh chu nangta athija lamkai ange, ano lea aril jui mee lea chu nangta dramochel pi ange.
Chuti weta Chungthiengta riemma dom shu oh! rou ram chu apha akha ah nangna pak hina kor changphur hal kom nangta chupi takpi napha hana nangna nalung songa adiek ka tukso che.
Chuna nang hi pak kum ma hei thou washukka thingso che, hana atun chu dramochel ngei hina kor chang so che ae.

(Keina ani am ha sa hekta trongsinge nangeita rouram chu nangei ringchanga pak hina kor changa am sarukka) apha akha ah napum limpata thieng no hrano tullu lu ranga napek phur ha chuhekta atun hi nangna napum limpa ha dramochel ngeitaranga akha chu athieng tullu lu ranga pe oh.
Nangei na pak hina kor changa am leija nangei na lu num tullu hana adiek hei thou wa thing phur ae.
Atuna ajak tukka na am na lu tullu hana ejongpa kana pha cha meh?
Chuti weta atun chu nangei hi pak kum hei thou wa shukka thingso ae. Chuna nangei hi Chungthieng hina kor so ae. hina natung chu naring chang limpa makolla pek hana samla ringchang pha ang ae.
Rouram chu pak ae na amant chu athi ha ae chuti weta Chungthieng hina pek chu arengpu Jisu Khrista jarra samla ringchange.
Ka-u-kanao ngei oh nangei mai ah ril tik kae ta ka ae hi nangei na dang ange ta hallinge rouram chu nangei na rouphun ha danga am meh, rouphung hana malmashi ngeina ring lei lim chu amona hup sa ae.
Taichang sha nameinu akha na maring leilim chu apishal hana thuija am chu hekta ejonga apishal na thija tah lea chu amota huppa shi apishal rouphun hai thou wa hla so ae.

Chuna ejonga nameinu na adang apa akha hitta apishal ringlei amha lea chu amo hata simsi boron nu ta kok kange; Chuti weta ejong apishal thi lea chu nameinu ha adang apa akha kolla taichang ha hal kom simsi boron nu kom ano ae hana ngeihlak anu juija angei akha ae.

Chuna chu hekta ka-u-kanao ngei oh rouphun hina rilna hallea chu nangei ko thi so ae. Khrista maram chu nangei hi Khrista hina pum akha ae. Chuna athi hai ringa thou amo hina mata so ae Chungthieng hina ara pi ranga.
Ani malmashi ringchang anujuija ringa am phur lei ah pakna anum adit eja hi rouphun na ani pum ah tullu lu ah hana ani tullu lu limpa atreem na ah chu athi pha ae.

Atun chu ehalkom ehalkom ani hi rouphun hei thou wa shukka thing so ae rouram chu ani hi apha akha ah athi pha ja tah phur ae hatihalkom atun chu anina lea ah hajong jieksha rouphun thuija tullu lu ang no wa ae chuna ani na athar muihla lam ma taranga ae tah ae.

Chuleh chu rouphun hana mak pak ae ta rillang meh? Ano ae! Chuti weta rouphun hana keita pak amel dang pi ah ae, ejonga rouphun hana rilphur no lea chu “meeta di no oh” keina hajong adi ha dang angnonge
Keita pek trongsan hana pak na tancha lah weta eheilim ma hrano anar katakka ampi so ae. Rouphun ha tol no wa chu pak ti chu athi sa ae.
Apha akha ah keina rouphun tol no wa ringphur inge chuti weta rouphun hana trongsan phao juija chu pakkha ringthou so weh.
Hana kei chu thi sing nge rouphun hana trongsan na karing chang taranga choija ronna phao chu athi ha ae.
Pak na trongsan hana tancha lah weta keita hungthei ae ah keita that ae.
Chuna sarukka rouphun ha mak athienge hana trongsan hakom athienge ahra akha chu adiek takkae.
Chuti lea na ahra hina kathiit na jou meh? Nahina ano ae! na chu pak na lu tullu sa ae; ahra hata pak na,pak ta ri pi ranga sa ae. Chuna trongsan hana pak ta hella pak am tek ranga sa ae.
Rouphunhi rha ae chuti weta kei chu mang nga ngai mee inge, hana pakka kor changa jursha ae
Keina ka ae ah am ka tullu ha keina dangnonge keina ka ae num no tullu ha keina ae ah aminge, chuna katier ra am hakom keina ae inge.
Atun ka ae ah am tullu ha ka ae num no ae hina tak chu keina rouphun hana chum pi ah aminge.
Chuna routakka chu na tullu lu ah am hi keina no ae, kasunga ring am pak hana sa ae.
Keina dang inge ahra ha ka sunga ringa am no ae, naha chu mahousha malmashi ka ringchang sa ae, rou ramchu kei na eja ah ahra tullu lu num halkom keina nahamak thang sukka ae nea nonge.
Keina ahra tullu ka ae num ha ae nonge hana hutta keina ka ae num no hrano tullu mak ae inge.
Ejonga keina ka ae num no tullu ha keina ae ah am lea chu hina rilna chu nahana tullu lu ah am kei nonge naha chu kasunga ringa am pak hana lu tullu sa ae.
Chuna katuk pha ah chu rouphun hi tullu ha ae, ahra tullu ka ae num juija hrano ha chak halling.
Kalung sunga ringa am na chu Chungthieng hina rouphun ha di ae.

Chuti weta kapumma tullu lu am rouphun chu adang, adange. Kalungna ngei so ae ta kahal sha tah sulhlak pi ah am rouphun kom tol lea, keita pak hana rouphun hana ahup mee changa katakka tullu eya am ae.
Eja ah ahoi pha lou apa ha kei ah meh? atu na katak athi sa hai thou wa sanpi anga meh?
Chungthieng ta ariem minge Jisu Khrista majar hana ae pi hi chuna hiso ae atun na ka ngirra ka am.
Chuna keina kalung makna Chungthieng matun mahlou chak ae ang singe kapum na pak tullu lu ah am lei ah.
Khrista Jisu hitta am ha sa ngei taranga atun chu neinunt non rang am ni jo weh.
Muihla tieng nga rou phungna ring changta Khrista Jisu hitta am ha rang ruiphao pi so hana pak athi kum sunga hai thou wa keita hla pi so.
Rouphun na ae pi nea no ae rouram chu malmashi ring changna sul jarra asanao pa ta malmashi ringchang tul shukpi weta hajong pak ha hourang sarukka malmashi mel hekta hlapi.
Chuna pum nutienga thingno lutta muihla nutieng jui anita rouphun hana rilha tung ranga ae.
Malmashi pum ringchanga ringa am ngeina hata pum taranga hallea chuti weta muihla nutieng jui ngei na muihla na adit ha ae.
Pum anu juija ringa am mani hina atreem na chu athi ha ae, hana muihla nu jui ja am na atreem na chu aring akha chu adai pha ae.
Chuna malmashi ringchang tulpa na nea ah ringa am lea chu amoha Chungthieng ta jiekna mee ae rouram chu amona Chungthieng rou ril jui no wa ae hana jui kom jui ang no ae.
Malmashi ringchang tul juija am mee ngei na Chungthieng ta lungshi nea ang no ae.

Chuna nangei ringchang tulla ringno oh, hana hutta muihla na ril lam ma ringo. Ejongpa routakka Chungthieng muihla na nakolla am lea chu, hana atujong ngei na Khrista hina muihla amno wa ringa am lea chu amo ha chu makolla Khrista mee no ae.
Chuti weta Khrista nakolla ringa am lea chu, muihla na nangta ringchang pe ange. Rouram chu nanghi Chungthieng am na ah thiengpi sa ae. Napum na pak sarukka thi su hal kom.
Jisu Khrista ta thi hai ringa thou pi Chungthieng muihla na nakolla ringa am lea chu athi hai ringa thou Khrista amona nang ngei pum hita ringchang pe ange nangei sunga am ma muihla ha na jarra.
Chuna uleh nao ngei oh, anina ae ang akha chu am meh ha chu ani ringchang tulla adit hana anina ring no tah so ae.
Rouram chu ejonga nangna naring chang tanna ringa am lea chu athi pha ange. Chuti weta muihla na nakolla ring lea chu pak luna tullu ah thi pi hal kom nangna aring pha ange ae.
Chungthieng muihla na lamkai ah rol ngei ha Chungthieng sanao ngei ae.

Chungthieng pek muihla na nakolla ephao wa meeshuk meekor changpi ang no ae hana ati pi ang no ae hana hutta muihla na nangta Chungthieng sanao ngei changpi ange hana muihla jaitha na Chungthieng am na anina “Apa! Kapa!” kokkange.
Chungthieng muihla mak na ani muihla ah tolveta ani hi Chungthieng sanao ngei aeta phu shukkae.

Ani na masnaongei chang sou chu mamee ngei taranga mashi jaihra ha ani kom pha tol ta so ae akha chu Khrista taranga Chungthieng na mashi ha kom pha ange; rouram chu ejongpa anina Khrista hina aol saruk ja tol lea chu anina mahung majai ha pha ha ange.
Keina hallinge atun apha hina aol ana lim hi anutienga ani ta mapek kang mahung majai hitta anhlak ngai an no ae.
Makutta mashem limna Chungthieng masanao pa ta mari pi ang ha hakjou no wa hakka am meh.
Rouram chu makutsem makhai na ephao kaneno wa am hi mani ae no ae nahi Chungthieng ahalhana ae shukpi sa ae, chu phao sunga asa chu am songe.
Chuna nahi chu makutsem lim na amang hana shuk changa am halkom hla pi ange. hana juija chu Chungthieng sanao ngei na pha mahung majai ha pha tollange.
Atun apha hina anina na dangpha chu makutsem lim na ana kou ah am meh, unga don ang tieng hekta.

Chuti weta nahi makutsem ngei chak na ana kou no ae Chungthieng na masha ah pek muihla ani sunga ana kou ah am ae, anina Chungthieng masanao pa chang ranga hakkae akha chu ani pum lim hi hitta sanpi ranga.
Chuna ani na lungrang hina sarukka anita sanpi so ae; chuti weta ani ri hata lungrang alea chu naha adiek lungrang no weh maram chu atujong na ejong mari hatta lungrang ae ah am meh?
Chuna ejongpa anina ri no hata lungrang ae chu anina dong thei ah hakka am meh.

Chuna chu hekta anina sulla am lei ah athieng muihla na jungveta sanpi ae, rouram chu anina alota ni ang meh ti phao dang no ae. Hana muihla mak na Chungthieng kolla ani ril nea no rou ha rilla pi ae.
Hana ani lung ta ri pi ah am Chungthieng na muihla hana ejongpa mahalla am ha dange. Rouram chu muihla na mamee ngei hutta Chungthieng kolla mahal nu juija nipi ae.
Anina dangpha ae Chungthieng na amo ta lungshi ngeita ti chu, mahal anu juija kokpi ngei hata ahrat ranga tullu lim ae ha pi ae.
Chungthieng na masha ah ahalsha ngei hatta masanao pa hek ti pi so ae. Chuna asanao pa hana ulenao ngei lim karra masha pa ae.
Hana Chungthieng na adanga halla shi ngei ta kom amona makok ngeita amo hekta athieng changpi ae akha chu amona mani hitta mahung majai ha pha ha pi ae.
Hilim nahina sarukka anina alota ril leisha? Ejongpa Chungthieng hi ani ta lea atu na anita e ae nea ang meh?
Amona masanaopa ta kolla shi no ae. Chuti weta amona anitaranga pe ae. Amo na eheilimpa anita pe ang no meh?
Chungthieng ahal sha ngeita atuna e ae nea ang meh? Hana Chungthieng na thieng pi sha ngeita kom!
Atuna manita neinunt pe anga meh? Thi weta ringa thou Khrista Jisu na Chungthieng ban changtienga am weta anitarang rou ril pi ah am ha.
Atuna Khrista hina lungshit hai thouwa hran pi nea ang meh anita? Aol ana,butang jutang anoleh pun nie sal hana mo, anoleh champ seina mo ae.
Jieksha rouna hita rillea:
“Nangei sarukka kanina apha chang honna
thi ang eja pha unge,
kanita athat tanga ruija
wak kelmo hekta lah so ae.”
Anita malungshit jarra nalimpa hi kanina ral nea ah shu songe.

Chuna sarukka keina kahal chu ejong akha phao na hija malungshit hai thou wa hran hlak pi nea ang no ae. Athi na kom ringchang nakom, wanruina kom ah noleh thangwan na ane angam na kom atun na akha chu anutienga kom.
Anoleh simlei achungtieng na kom anoleh simlei athui tieng na kom makutsem ejong akha na ani arengpu Khrista Jisu majar hana Chungthieng na lungshit hi ahran nea rang jaitha am no ae.
Keina adiek rou rilla aminge. Khrista mee inge keina hungthei trong nonge. Kahal kalungkom muihla athieng na huppa shi ae chuna keina hungthei trong ang no ae.
Kei hi leima aolla aminge hana kalung sunga ana kom atreem am no ae.
Kamee ngei sharukka katak akha chu kathee na mani taranga katak mak tri Chungthieng sarkou thuija akha chu Khrista kolhai thou wa ahran hlak phao hallinge.

Maniha Chungthieng mee ngei ae hana amona manita masanao ngei changpi ah mahung majai ha ri pi ae amona mani taranga roungir pi ah rouphun ha pe pi. mani ha ae adiek ka mok ngei ha hana manina Chungthieng na saro eipi ah jaihra pha ae
Mani pi pu ngei hi alok ashai Hebru ngei ae hana malmashi changa jung Jisu Khrista kom mani mee ae. Ehailimpa ta ene nepa Chungthieng ta atreem nei no wa dom shu oh! Amen.
Chungthieng na saro eisha ha ngai ni jo weta keina rilla nonge. Israel mee makhai ha Chungthieng mee chak no ae.
Hana Abraham atu ate makhai kom Chungthieng sanao chak ngei no ae. “Chungthieng na Abrtaham ta rille, “Isaac hana jarra natu nate am mange ta nakolla keina saro eiha”
Nahina rilna chu mahousha ah don unga ngei ha Chungthieng sanao no ae ti na ae. Chuti weta Chungthieng na saro ei ah hla don atu ate ngei chakkae.
Chungthieng saro ei rou ha na hi ae, “Apha acha hana keina lah ange, hana Sarah na nao apa akha don nange.”
Hina ripta ko ano weh, maramchu Rebikka hina sanao ani hakom mapa akha chakkae, ani pi pu Isaac.

Chutiweta, spa akha hana Chungthieng mahal makha tungpi ange, Chungthieng na Sarah ta rillea, “Ulien pa na nao pong pa thui dong ange.” Mani don matienga amo na nahi rillea akha chu manina ahra hrano akha phao ae matienga, chuna Chungthieng na kokhi mani na ae na eko ano weh Chungthieng mathei ah makok sha ae.
Mani tullu hana no ae makoksha ae hana makolla ril, “Ulien changna naopong tekta san nanga sa ae.’’
Hina jieksha nujuija, “Keina Jacob ta lungshi inge, chuti weta keina Esau ta chu atir inge.”
Chutilea chu ani na Chungthieng hi adiek nagm ae no ae ta rilei ti mo? ano ae.
Rouram chu amona Moses ta ril lea, “Keina atujong kolla ringrei ka ngei mee kolla ringrei ngei ange akha chu kalungshit mee amota keina lung shi ange.
Chuna na limpa hi malmashi ngeina mani hal madit no ae Chungthieng na ringrei ngei sha ae.
Egypt Rengpa Pharaoh ta jieksha rou na rillea, “Keina nangta arengpu kachangpi chu kajaitha lim ha nakolla phu ranga kahalsha ae. Chuna kaming hi simlei lim na thangshu oh ti na sa ae.”
Chuna Chungthieng na mahalsha ngeita ringrei ngei ae, hana alung hir ngei kom ma hir pi ae.
Nangei karra atumo tieng akha na keita rillange “Ejongpa nahi mak aleh chu alota Chungthieng na atu jong akha kolla maral tuk nea ang meh? Atu na Chungthieng ahal ta hou nea ang meh?”
Chuti weta anina Chungthieng ta nang nang atu cha meh? Katonpi oh Chungthieng trongta sang lea ha? Leisiella shak bell na asha pa tah ephao saine no ae, keita alowa hihekta sa ah cha meh tah?
Chuna bell sa ah am pa na madit hana nujuija amona hata sa ae chuna tapot sakna leisiel akha chakka bell ani sha ae akhana alok taranga akhana anei ngai taranga.
Hahekti ae Chungthieng na lu tullu hi, amona marat ha dang ranga ri pi di ae. Chuti weta amona malungshaveta amang atah sukkanglim dongthei ah dong ah ae.
Akha chu makolla ehekta atam mahung majai ha kom ripi num meh. Maringrei pha pi ang ngei meengei no wa ani chunga amona hajong mahung majai ha pha ang thourang som shu so weh.
Anikom amona makok mee ae, Jihudi ngei kar sunga chak ano ae chuti weta Gental ngei kar sung hai thou ko sha ae?
Hina sarukka ae Hoseah abai sunga maril ha:
“Na kamee no ngei hi
keina ‘Kamee ae ta kokkange.’
Kalung shit jati lao ngeita
keina ‘Kalungshit ae ta kokkange.’
Hana mani ril na amunt mak hana,
‘Nangei ha kamee no ae’
hana manita aring Chungthieng sanao ngeita kokkange.”
Chuna Isaiah na Israel ngeita rouril, “Israel sanao nangeina tuipi hou wa waipin ja hal kom mani ahre na chak sanpi pha ange.”
Chuna arengpu amona simlei hina marou hi, ranga treem pi ange.
Isaiah na amatienga ril chu hekta, “ejonga mitpu arengpu na matu mate houphur no lea ani hi Sodom Gomarah hek ti ange”
Chuna Gental ngeita ani ril chu manithei chakka Chungthieng am na athieng pha num no ngei hi ngoiring jarra amo hitta adiek kha so weh.
Chungthieng mee ngei, rouphun akha na Chungthieng hitta adiek pi ange ta jongha tukpha no ae.
Ah ang no ae, rouram chu mani na ngoiring chu ephao am no ae ejonga mani tullu hana hal hlakka am lea chu mani ha kae mathui na allunga, kae mathui ange.
Hita jiek sha so ae:
“Anno, keina Zion na allung doi phur inge
nahana mee ngei na kae mathui ange,
sumlung akha itta manita tu pi ange.
Hativeta amota ngoiring ngei na chu
ephao ajak tukkang no ae.”
Ka-u-kanao ngei oh, alota keina kathin kalung lutta kamee ngei lim pa na sanpi pha ranga. Chungthieng kolla keina nie ah aminge!
Keina hra bakta dang inge ha chu maniha Chungthieng ta lung lutta mokkae. Chuti weta mani mokha adiek tieng no ae.
Chungthieng na mee ngei hi amo hitta adiek changpi meh ti hi mani na dang no ae hana hutta manina mani lamma tieng thinga Chungthieng adiek ha jui num no ae.
Rouram chu Khrista na rouphun ha chu atreem na so ae, ngoiring lim na adiek chang ange.
Moses na jiekka houphur rouphun jui mee ta Chungthieng hitta adiek pi ange: “Atujong akha na rouphun hana trongsan pek jui mee na ring ange.”
Jieksha rou na, ngoiring jarra Chungthieng hitta diek ae ti hi, hisha ae: “Nathei chakka sai no oh atuna wanram ma kallang meh?” (Hachu Khrista ta rui tum ma ae).
Ano lea atuna simlei athui ah tum mang meh? (Naha chu athi sa Khrista ta rui kalla ae.)
Nahina rila shi chu hi ae: “Chungthieng rouha nakolla nai ah am meh murra akha chu nalung sunga” kani na rouril ngoiring rou ha na hi ae.
Ejonga nangna namur shukka Jisu hi Arengpu ae akha chu Chungthieng na amota athi haithou ringpi ae ngoiring lea chu nangta sanpi ange.
Chuna ani Chungthieng hitta diekka anina am mang chu ngoiring hana ae hana mur shukka lalsange ril hana ae anita sanpi pha rang.
Jieksha rou hana rilleh, “Atujong akha na amota ngoiring lea chu ephao wa ningshi pha no ae.
Nahi na mee lim pa tol sa ae rouram chu Jihudi akha chu gental ta tai na ephao am no ae; Ani arengpu Chungthieng akha chakkae. Atujong amota kok mee na machunga atreem nei no jaihra pe ange.”
Jieksha rou na hita rilleh “Atujongpa limna arengpu ta san ranga kok lea chu amo ha sanpi pha ange.”

Chuti weta alota manina amota sanpi rang kokkang sha ejonga manina ngoiring no lea? akha chu alotah mani na thei pha ang sha rouril mee am no wa? Trongshan ha sui no lea alota mani na theipha ang meh.
Akha chu alotah rou ron hi ril shukkang meh ejonga rou ron mee hla pi no chu? Jieksha rou na rilhekta, “Eja ah tripi ah hra sha ahra trongsan rou ron phao ngeiha!”
Chuti weta lim pa na ahra trongsan ha langno ae Isaiah matak mak na ril phurre, “Arengpu atuna kani rouril hi ngoiring meh?
Chuna ngoiring hi rouril theiphaveta pha ae, hana rouha Khrista maram ma sui weta shukkae.
Chuna keina sai inge: Adiek takka manina rouril hi thei no wa meh? Jieksha rouna rilleh routakka chu:
“Mani sanrol hana atarah ha simlei lim ma thange;
hana mani rou ha alei ram lim ma tung pha ae”
Woiha pa keina sai inge: Israel mee ngeina nahi dang no wa meh? Moses masha makna masha tekka sange:
“Keina nangeita mee jati
adangna anda rang sem mange;
akha chu jaty adangei ta lungmo piveta
kamee ngeita lungsha thana shukpi ange.”
Isaiah na atri am no lutta ril,
“Keita jongno mee kom keina tuk kae;
hana keita sai no ngei ta keina katak mak manita ri pi inge.”
Chuti weta Israel ngei taranga amo na rillea, “Rungnie chang honna keina mani aril juino akha chu anda am manita kakut dokka manita hakka aminge.”
Chuna keina sai inge: Chungthieng na mamee mak ngeita ngeino wa meh? Ano ae! kei katak makkhi Abraham atu ate inge, hana Israel sanao, Benjamin sakai sunga thou inge.
Chungthieng na athou hai thou wa mahal sha ngeita ngeinum no am no ae, Elija na Israel chunga Chungthieng kolla sem meh, nahi ajiek abai sunga am hi nangei na dang no wa chou?
“Arengpu mani narouril thiempu ngei kom that sho ae, hana maicham ngei kom hri ah hou so ae; kei chak sho ae atun hi. Chuna keita kom mani na that tanga jonga ammeh.”
Chungthieng na makolla ejongpa sang meh? “Keina kut ta sem hlawang mokno mee lasing sari kataranga shi inge”
Hahekta Chungthieng jarra lungshi ah mahalsha ahre chak am so ae.
Malungshit chu makut chunga am meh, mani ae na tullu ma no ae rouram chu ejonga Chungthieng na mani lu tullu nu jui ha lea chu malungshit ha athieng lungshi ano ae.
Chuna alowa jou meh? Israel ngei na jonga am tukpha no chu, Chungthieng na hol mee atomte na chak na ha tukphurre adang alem ngei ha chu Chungthieng na kok thei no ae.
Jieksha na ril chu hekta, “Chungthieng na mani lungrang akha chu lung dol piso ae. Chuna awoni hai thou wa mani na ri kom ri ang nie jo weh. Hana thei kom thei ang no ae”
Hana David na rillea,
“Mani reen tang hana changa munt hekta aol ana pha shu oh;
hana mani na tu weta mani ha dandi pha shu oh!
Mani mitkom cho shu oh hati lea chu mani na ri nea angno ae;
akha chu apha chang honna aol ana pha ah am shu oh.”

Chuleh chu keina sai inge; Jihudi ngeina nahana kae mathui ah tu juija maniha amang atah pha jo meh? Ano ae mani kae mathui hana Gental ngei na aringkaetlo pha na change. Chuna Jihudi ngeina kom anar shu oh tina sa ae.

Jihudi ngei pak hana simlei chunga alok jaihra pha na change akha chu mani muihla sul jarra Gental ngei na jaihra pha ae. Chuna ejonga Jihudi limna najaihra makhei pha lea chu eja makhei tam jaihra ang sha!
Gental nangei kolla atun chu keina rilla aminge. Gental nangei karra rouril akha changa ka am lei lim chu katullu ah apel chang inge.
Routakka chu kamee ngei makna anarveta mani kom ahre chu sanpi pha shu oh.

Chuna manina ngeinum no jarra Gental ngeina Chungthieng ta mel dangna changso ae, akha chu anda mee hai thou wa atonpi wul so ae ejonga mani na la siel lea chu alo ti ang meh? Hana chu athi hai thou aring pha ange.
Ejonga masha ah budol ha Chungthieng ta pe lea chu hana am budol lim pha ha kom mata ae. Aka chu ejonga thingkung atro ha Chungthieng ta pe shu lea chu abak ngei lim kom mata ae.

Chuna aling churuphal bak ahre na tikka ramna churuphol bak hanu jumma kolom sem ma churuphol bak changa ra so ae, hana nangei Gental ngei hi ramma churuphol kung jong pa ae chuna atun chu nangeina Jehudi ngei hekta namuihla rat ranga saruk pha tol so ae.
Chuna sarukka nangei na abak atikhata lungherno oh, nangei chu abakkae abak na atro ta ron no ae, atro na nangeita ronpi ah am sa ae.
Chuti weta nangna ril kom ngei ae, “Oh weh, chuti weta abak hana tik sarukka keina makolla tou wa hanga inge ta.”
Naha routak kae, manina ngoiring no sarukka mani ha tikka sa ae, mani hut silla amunt hana am ha chu nangna ngoiring sarukka ae. Chuti weta lokchok ti no oh; hana hutta atri oh.
Chungthieng na Jihudi ngeita tan hou ah no ae, abak amsa hajong hekta; nang ta kom tan hou ange ta ejonga halla che?

Hina ani na ripha nea ae Chungthieng hi eja ah lungshi thei meh akha chu eja ah ranga meh, thingbak tiksha ngei taranga eja ah rang chuti weta nangei ta chu eja ah lungshi sa. Chuna ejonga malungshitna nangei na ngei num no lea nangta kom hahekta tan na hou ange.
Ejonga Jehudi ngei na mani ngoiring nohi hata hla no wa am lea chu, mani hata Chungthieng na mani amphur na amunt hana rui ah lea weta shi ange maram chu naha Chungthieng ae na ae.

Gental ngei hi ramma tou churuphol jongpa ae chuna aphun na abak ha tanna houveta aphun churuphol kunga jam meh Jihudi ngei ha ating churuphol kung jongpa ae, aphun churuphol kunga atik abakha ta lea ah jom sier pa na tetta Chungthieng kolla lella leitekkae.

Athuppa shi rou am meh ka-u-kanao ngei oh. Keina nangeita kom dangpinum minge, nahana nangei na thei unge singunge ta halno rang sa ae. Tichu Isreal ngei na lung hirra am hi hatachak am mang no ae gental nangei na Chungthieng kolla susimta lut phao jui ah phao chakkange.
Chuna hita ae ah Isreal ngeita san ranga jieksha rouna rile,
“Sanpipana Zion hai thou ah phao ange
hana Jacob atu ate kar hai thou hrano lim julla hou ange.”
Keina mani pak shil pi shu jui ah
manita keina angei chak rou si ange.”

Maram chu manina ahra trongsan ngai num no ae. Gental nangei sarukka jehudi ngei hi Chungthieng jekna mee ae Chuti weta Chungthieng na ahalsha sou chu manita Matonpi changpi ae Maram chu mani pi pu hana jarra.
Tichu Chungthieng hina malungden hi ahlong am no ae mahal sha ngei akha chu jaihra mapek sa ngei ta.
Gental ngei hi amatienga chu Chungthieng aril atrong jui no ae Chuti weta atun chu Chungthieng na ringrei ngei pha tuk so ae, maram chu Jehudi ngeina aril atrong juino sa rukka.
Chuna nangeina maring-rei ngei pha hekta atun chu Jehudi ngei kom Chungthieng ringrei ngei pha ranga aril jui nijo weh.
Chuna Chungthieng na malmashi ta aril atrong yuino rang hunga si-ae, chuti lea manilim ta maringrei ngei ha ri pi ange.
Eya ah lokka meh Chungthieng neidon hi! Eja ah thukka meh malungsing lungwar! Atuna ma lung hata ril nea angsa? Atuna malam hi dangne angsa?
Jieksa na rilchu hekta,
“Atuna arengpu Malung halta dangne angsa?
Atuna amota ahra rou pe nea angsa?
Anoleh, arengpu kolla masha pe weta arengpu kolla haithou pha ang mee atu ammeh?”
Rouram chu eheilimpa hi makutsem chakkae akha chu eheilimpa hi makolla hai thou chakkae, chuna makolla Chungthieng hina mahung majai ha atreem nei no wa am shu oh! Amen.

Chungthieng na lokka maringrei ngai hana jarra ka-u-kanao nangei kolla keina roudoh ah aminge; Chungthieng na lungshit ranga nangei pum ha aringa kat pot changa, akha chu matullu tarang peya amota ariemna changpi oh nahi diekka mokrang nangei ae phung shuk kae.

Chuna natakmak simlei simsak waisak nu yuino oh, chuna hutta nangei sunga akha chu lunghal ha Chungthieng ta hlongpi oh, chutile nangeina Chungthieng na ahalha dang na ange eyong pana acha mo mariem na mo akha chu adiek moti ha.

Maram chu Chungthieng na keita lungshi ah pek khuthul yarra keina nangei limpa ta na rou hi rilling nangei natakna hal phungsuk hata heldonna hal thing no oh. Chuna hutta natak makna natakta routreem weta Chungthieng na pekka am nakolla ngoiring hana chak hallo
Ani pumma kajat atam amhom meh chuna na kajat lim hi mata mata tullu adang, adange.
Chuna chu hekta ani limpa hi kom Khrista Jisu pum ma akha chakkae, akha chu ani kajat lim pa hi adang adang halkom pumma am limpa hi jom hlak hek ti ae.
Chuna Chungthieng na anita malungshit ta pek adang, adang khuthul anu juija anina thinga taso ae. Ejonga Chungthieng na anita rourillanga pek khuthul am lea chu anina ngoiring nujuija ae tah ae.
Ejonga hlou ae ranga lea hlou ron tah so ae, ejonga chupi takpi ang nga lea anina chupitakpi tah so ae

Ejonga adangeita thanum thawaopi ang am lea chu na tullu ha ae su oh. Ape mee amona apam am no lutta pesu-oh alu ching ngei nako lung lutta lam kai su oh. Atujong akha na ringrei ngei thei lehamona kom ariem ariemma ae pi shu oh.
Lungshi tichu leima lung thieng anga ae, hrano tah atierro, hana ahra ta chetta kollo.
Khristen uleh nao ngei hekta akha lea akha lungshi hlakko. Akha chu akha lea akha ajak atri hlakko.
Ngam ratta ae oh, adol no oh, nalunglimna arengpu matun mahlou hrabakta ae oh.
Na lungrang hina nalung ariemma am mo, naol na nat pha jui adongthei oh. Hana apha chang honna niyo.
Na am nadon ha natonpi sara Khristen ngei hitta pha ha pi oh, akha chu hulhang ngei ta na inna tungpi oh.
Nangta aol ana pe ngei ta jaihra pha rang Chungthieng kolla nie oh sarkou no oh.
Ariem ma am ngei hitta ariem ha oh, trappa am ngei hitta trap tollo.
Akha lea akha chakka ngai lhakko, keina theitek mee sangeta lokchok tino oh, chuna natullu lu juija lu bu-a nolukka ae oh.
Atu jong akhana nakolla diek no tullu lu juija makolla nangna diek no tullu lepi no oh, chuti weta meelimna an juija lung lok tullu lu tirang ae oh.
Na ae nea tullu eheilim ma meelim na adai ah ring rang ae oh.
Mee kolla malungsui eko ae no oh katonpi ngei oh. Chungthieng malungshat tukrang amsu oh maramchu. “Arengpu na ajieksi rouna rille, “Keina malungsui ange, keina kut lea ange, Areng pana rille.”
Hana hutta jieksa rouna hitta rille, “Ejonga nangta anda mee na awon tam lea amota bakpi oh, atui ralle chu in pi oh, maram chu hita ae hina amona ayakka kang ange.”
Hrano na nangta nea no shu oh, Hana hutta ahra na hrano ta nepi oh.
Malmashi limna ane angam Goverment ngei aril atrong jui shu oh, rouram chu Chungthieng kol hai thou ano wa chu ephao ane angam am no ae. Mani lim ha Chungthieng na ronpi chak sa ae.
Atujong na ane tullu ngei ril trong ngainum no lea Chungthieng ril trong juinum no ah ae. Chuna atuyong akhana akhana yuinole machunga routreem ae ange.

Chuna ahra tullu lu ranga ane angam ngeita atri ang no ae, chuti weta hrano tullu lu ngeita sa ae? Nangna ane angam ngeita atri no wa che? Chutilea chu nangna ahra tullu lu oh, amona nangta dom mange.

Maram chu Chungthieng na nasharukka nataranga ahra tullu lu am ae. Chuti weta ejonga nangna hrano tullu lu ta lea chu amota atri oh, maramchu manina leichoi nea ae adiek tak madandi ha pha pi nea ae. Chuna amona Chungthieng hana suuk akha changa hrano tullu lu ngei chunga malungshat ha pha ange.
Hana sharukka nangeina ane tullu ngei ril trong jui anga ae Chungthieng hina dandi ha chak no wa nangei lung sunga ahra hrano kom dang ranga ae.
Chuna sharukka Chungthieng tullu lu ane angam ngeina mani tullu ahra ae sarukka ngeina tushal pe ah ae.
Chuna napek phung shukha pe oh, nahana manita nangna ajak atri ri pi ya sa ae.
Akhana akha thuija dong hlakka am mo chuna nangei san hlak hata akha lea akha lungshi na sha ae. Chuna atujong akha na thei ah am malmashi amona roukung nu juija sha ae.

Trongsan hana ril chu, “Mee na mei ta shimsi boron lal ae thing no oh; hana mee kom di thing no oh; mee that no oh, mee pot ru no oh”, hichak no wa adang tronglam pek am songe, “Natakta nalungshit hekta na inn ning hu laita kom lungshi oh.”
Ejong nangna atu jong akha ta lungshi ta lea chu makolla nangna ephao diekno tullu lu num mang no che; Lungshi ti chu roukunga aril makhei ha jui ja ae.
Nangna na-natullu hi hata ae oh. Maram chu atun apha hi jalla am hei thouwa inhrang lakpha apha so ae. Maram chu amatienga ngoiring ta hella atun hi ani samla ringchang ha nai tekka am so ae.
Jantieng apha ha shu thingso weh, waso ae, semnie warra wa so ae. Chuna jantienga ani tullu lu lim ha chan sei oh, akha chu awarra ral ae rang cham sei choi sei oh.
Ani na awar thuija thing hek ta thing sei oh, jurui burui, akha chu siemsak hrano ngei, hana lungsha rat ngei asul ahal di ngei hekta akha chu anar hlak am no sei oh.
Chuna Arengpu Jisu Khrista hina ral champ choi sei oh hana ringchanga pak na adi apam limpa ha hou sei oh.
Ngoiring shulla am ngei ta ariem ma lam tukko, hana mani ahalhako hatta trong wuk hlak no oh.
Mee akhana mangoiring jar hana amona eheilimpa abak ngai aeta bakke. Chuti weta ngoiring shul amona chu andiek nadiek chak bak ae.
Atujong eheilimpa bakpa hana atu jong bak no amota atir no su oh, chuna bak een no amona kom abak amota routreem no su oh, maramchu Chungthieng na amo talah pi sa ae.

Mee adang suukta routreem nangha atu cha meh? Mamitpu am meh amona ngir pi ange ti ha hana tu pi ange ti hal kom makut chunga am meh. Akha chu amona ngir pi ange maram chu arengpu na amota ngir pi nea ae.

Mee akha na chu rungnie akha na rungnie adang ta hella cha lekketa maru ui nie ae, hana adang mee akha na chu rungnie lim pa hi akha rukkae ta. Chuna meelim pa na mahal, mahalha lungranga thienga danga hata lingno wa ngir su oh.

Chuna atun jong amona rungnie akha na hella hra tekkae ta hal mee amo kom Chungthieng ta ajak atri ah sha ae. Rou ram chu eheilim bak ranga Chungthieng ta ariemma domma am meh. Hana atu jong bak num no amo kom arengpu ta ajak atri sa ae. Hana amona Chungthieng ta ariemma doma am meh.
Ani sunga atu akhana ko matheichak taranga ring no ae, ani sunga atu akkana ko mathei chak tarang thino ae.
Ejonga ani na ringle Arengpu taranga ae ani ringhi, hana ejonga ani na thi lea arengpu taranga ae ani thithi. Chuna sa rukka thi hal kom ring hal kom ani hi arengpu ta sa ae.
Maramchu Khrista na thi weta woiha ringa thou hi. Aring akha chu athi hina Reng changranga ae.

Andiek nadiek chak bakka am nangna alo sarukka na-u-nanao kolla routreem ae am che? Akha chu eheilimpa bakka am nang na alowa na-u-nao ta namit thuija ansi na che? Ani limpa hi Chungthieng maikunga routreem ranga ngir ang ruk kae.
Tichu jiek sha rouna ril lea,
“Keihi adiek aring Arengpu Chung nga Chungthieng inge, Arengpuna rille,
mee lim na ka mai kunga huk hrun ange
hana meelim pana kei hi Chungthieng ae ta rilshuk kange.”
Chuna meelim pana ma-ae ma aena lim Chungthieng kolla pe ange.
Chuna akha lea akha routreem ae hlak ha chan sei oh, hana hutta, na-u-nao akha kolla kae ma thui weta pakka lut no ranga nalung ngir ro.
Arengpu Jisu hitta ka am hana jarra dangpha inge, tichu thieng no abak ah een ekom am no ae; Chuti weta ejonga mee akhana thieng no abak ah een ae ta halle chu na ha mataranga thiengno chang nge.
Ejonga nabak na een pot hana na-u-nao kolla tong lea chu, nang na lungshi ing tina am no ae, Khrista na mahut shilla thit na ha nabak pot hana amang shuk pi no oh.
Chuna ahra aeta nangei lim ha hrano aeta ril shuk pino oh.
Rouram chu Chungthieng reng ram chu abak ah een na no ae. Chuti weta adiek, adai akha-chu ariem tarang muihla athieng na pek sa-ae.
Atu jong akha na Khrista hita tun hlou ron na am ta lea chu Chungthieng amota ariempi ae hana mee adang ngei na kom amota domange.
Chuna sarukka anina pha chang honna ani hi akha lea kha ta thanum pi ah kha chu adai hata choija kha lea kha arat shukpi anga ae.
Abak ah inn sarukka Chungthieng lu tullu ha mangpi no oh. Eheilimpa bakka ngai chakkae, Chuti weta atujong akha ta pakka tul ang ha chu bak een ha adiek ah no ae.
Unao ngeita kae mathui pha ang saruk chu ameh bak, ju een no pa na hra tekkae hina maram ma.
Chungthieng lea nanui karra nangoiring ha chetta sih oh. Adiek keta marou treemsa chunga lalle ta halno meeha yairha ae.
Chuti weta nabak na een hana chingna lea chu, Chungthieng na amota mabak ma een hana neinunt pe ae, maram chu ma ae shuha ngoiring jara no ae. Hana eheilimpa ah ngoiring jarno lea pakkae.
Ngoiringa arat anina, arit ron na am ashul ngei ta san nanga sa ae. Ani theichakka ariem anga no ae.
Ani lim pa na ani unao limta arha shukrang akha chu ngoining hana lokka hangrang ariempi anga ae.
Rouram chu khrista na matheichak phoirang ae no ae. Hanahutta jieksha rouna ril, “Najak tukkang makhei ha keina tuk singe.”
Athieng abai sunga eheilim pa jiekka shi sa hi anita chupi rang sa ae. Jieksha rouna anita takpi chu ah dongthei ah, thanum thawao ani lungdenna am ranga sa ae.
Khrista Jisu hina thing nu juija nangei karsunga lunghal akha chak amrang, adongthei akha chu thanum thawao shukna mitpu Chungthiengna ae nea rang jaitha pesu oh.
Chuti lea chu nangei lim pa na sanrol akha chakka rachun na ani arengpu Jisu Khrista hina mapa Chungthieng ta dom mange.
Chungthieng mahung majai taranga nangei akha lea akha ngaichak hlakko. Khrista na nangeita ngaipi hekta.

Rouram chu nangei kolla keina rillinge Khrista Jisu hina ringchanga matullu ae hi chu Jehudi ngei hutta ae, hina dangpi chu Chungthieng hi ngoiringa ngai ae, hana mapa mapu ngei kolla saro ma eiha adiek takka shuk pianga sa ae.
Akha chu Gentel ngei na kom Chungthieng ringrei ngei jarra amota dom nea rang ae,
Jieksha nou na ril chu hekta;
“Chuna keina Gental ngei karra nang ta dom mange;
nangta domna lah kom sha ange.”
Woiha kom hita rille,
“Chungthieng mee ngei hitta Gental ngei ariem oh!”
Woiha pa kom ril.
“Gental limna arengpu ta dom mo; mee limna ko dom oh!”
Woiha pa kom Isaiah na ril,
“Jesse hina atu ate ngei kol hai thou wa Gental ngei chunga rourillang mee shukkang nge;
Akha chu mani lunghal kom makolla am mange.”
Ani lungden shukpi Chungthieng na, makolla ngoiring jarra ahoi adai lim nangei sunga shihak ta am shu oh. Chu na lungden ha athieng Muilha arat hana achat am no wa loktek shu oh.
Ka-u-kanao ngei oh kalung sunga nangei hi ahra na shihakti ae ta adiek takka hallinge. Nangei kha lea kha chupi takpi hlak nea rang lungwar am meh ta halling.
Chuna adang jatngei kolla kei hi Khrista Jisu tarang tullu lu mee akha ae tiha Chungthieng na keita peksa malungsit jarra, nangeita lea ah angeithei rang lung lokka rouhi jiek ka lha inge.

Gentel ngei karra tullu lu ranga Khrista Jisu shuk akha changa, Chungthieng ahra tronglam rou ril juija keina thiempu hekta ae inge. Rouram chu Gentel ngei hi muihla athieng hana jarra Chungthieng kolla mani na hra bakta kat thukka pek nea ranga.
Khrista Jisu itta am ha ah Chungthieng matullu ae hi keina lokrang am ae.
Gental ngei hi aril juija Chungthieng am na keita lamkai ranga rou akha chu nagm ma takpi ae. Chuna Khristajarra keina atri am nonge.
Angakpi akha chu anealah hana jarra Chungthieng muihla jarra keina Jerushalem hai thou Illyrieam phao sunga Khrista hina ahra rou tronglam ha tung pi sange.
Apha changhon na kahal kalung akha chu kadit chu Khrista ming thei no na mun ah ahra tronglam hi ril thing num minge, chulea chu keina atujong akha na thulno inn mun chunga keina sak no rang.
Jieksha rou na ril lea,
“Marou ril no na amunt na mee ngeina ripha ange,
akha chu marou theipha no ngei na dangpha ange.”
Chuna sharukka nangei am na ka phao ang hi ehekta ahan am hom meh.
Chuti weta, atun chu na ramtienga ka lu tullu chu shu hap sange, akum eja hei thou nagei ta tuklhak rang dija amming.
Spain na kathing lam ma nangei itta tuk lhakka apha tante nangei itta amha phurveta nangei na Spain thingna phao thasukpi ange hallinge.
Chutihalkom atun mak chu keina Jerushalem ma thing weta hana am mee ngei karra Chungthieng matullu ahra ae ting ange.
Rouram chu Mesidoniya lea Akaija abom ah ngoiring ngei na Jerushalem ma Chungthieng mee sara ah am ngeita san num ma am meh,

Nahi mani thei chakka meelung ngir sha ae.Routakka chu Jehudi ngei na mani jaihra ha Gentel ngei ta kom saruk pha tol pi hina sarukka Gentel ngeinakom mani nei don pot ngei hana Jehudi ngei ta san num lungrang shukka sa ae.
Keina hi tullu hi sujuija akha chu mani tarang peklha shum ngei ha mani ta kapek shu juija keina Spain tienga thing ange hana nanagei am na ah luttange.
Keina dang inge nangei am na kaphao juija Khrista jaihra hit shihakta phao ha ange.
Ka-u-kanao ngei oh, ani arengpu Khrista Jisu akha chu muihla na lungshi ah ani ta pek jar hana, Chungthieng kolla apha chang honna ratta keihita katarang nie ha ei oh.
Nangei niek kang chu, Judiah ram ma ngoiring no ngei karra keina aol ana phano rang akha chu Jerushalem ma ka tullu lu juija Chungthieng mee ngei na ariemma la nea ranga.
Hana chu keina nangei am na ariem na shihakta phao ange,ejonga nahi Chungthieng na ahal alea chu anina ariema solha phaha ang sa ae.
Adai sukna anipa Chungthieng na nangei lim kolla am ha shu oh. Amen.
Kenkhriah abom ah tullu lu ah am ani sarnu Phaebi ta keina nangei amna hla inge.

Arengpu Chungthieng minga amota ariemma lah pi oh mee ngeina na ae phung shuk ha ae pi oh, hana amota nangei san nea ha sanpi oh amona nangeita darkar am ja-ae. Amohi mee eja kolla akha chu kakolla kom arha mee sa ae.
Khrista Jisu tullu ae ha katonpi Aquila akha chu priscilla ta kom ka riemtuk hla inge;
Mani na kataranga athi atri amno ae. Kathei chak na manuita ariem ma dom ah no ae, hana Gental Abom ah meelim na kom domme.
Hana Abom mee ngei kom mani inn na bomtul ha lim ta kom riemtuk pe inge.
Kalungshit katonpi Epaentus Asia ram sunga masha ah Khrista ta ngoiring Spa takom riemtuk pe inge.
Mary takom riemtuk pe inge, amona nangei taranga ratta tullu lu sa-ae.

Andronicus akha chu Junias rel ta kom riemtuk pe inge, manuiha kei hitta areu inn sunga am ha katonpi ae, Rouron ngei; kar sungako mee ngeina rha bakta amel dang mee sa ae. Manui ha kama tinga khristen changsowe.
Ka riemtuk hi arengpu minga kalungshit tonpi Amphliatus ta kom pe inge.
Hana Khrista minga tullu lu ha am Urbanes akha chu Stachys takom riemtuk pe inge,
Riemtuk hi Khrista taranga alung lok Apelles takom,hana Aristobulos ngei ulea nao ngei takom.
Riemtuk hi Jehudi Herodian akha chu Narcissus Khristen uleanao mani inn sung ngeitakom pe inge.
Ka riemtuk hi Tryphaena akha chu Tryphosa Arengpu tullu ron na am akha chu kalungshit katonpi Persis amona arengpu taranga tullu leima tan pi ae.
Arengpu tullu ma hella ahra tullu lu Rufus kolla keina ariem na hla inge, hana manu ta kom. Manuna keita apha chang honna keita masanao hekta an pi ae.
Hana ka riemtuk hi Asyncreitus, Phlegon, Hermes Patrobas, Herma akha chu mani hitta am Khristen ulea nao lim ta kom pe ing.
Ariem hi Philologus Julia ta hana Nereua akha chu masarnu, Olympas akha chu mani hita am ha Chungthieng mee limpa ta.
Uleanao ngei hekta akha lea akha lungshi hlakka be chup hlakko. Khristen ahalsha lim na ariem ma nagei ta riemtuk pe ah hla ae.
Ulea nao ngei kolla keina mokka aminge.Adong ratto nangeita ahran akha chu hoino shuk kang lim chunga. Nangei ta chupi takpi nujuija nangei ngoiring hana hata thingo, mani hai thou wa adanga am mo!

Hajong tullu lu manita chu ani arengpu Khrista tullu lu no ngei ae.Mani ha chu mani taranga hal ngei sha ae. Mani tronglam ahoi akha chu alei lomma rou ril hana maral amno malmashi eja ta hung thei ae.

Ahra tronglam taranga nangei alok tullu ha mee lim na thei pha ae. Hina sarukka nangei jarra kei leima ariem minge chuna keina nangei hi lungsinga ejongpa na ahra moti dangpi num minge, chuti weta hrano chu tong pi num nonge.
Hana ani adai shuk na Chungthieng na apha sot no lutta saitan amota nangei kea hana to pi shi pi ange.
Ani arengpu Jisu hina lungshit na nangei hitta am ha shu oh.
Kei hitta tullu lu ha Timothi na kom hana tonpi Jehudi sanao ngei Lucius,Jasan akha chu Sosipater manina kom riemtuk pe ah hla ae.
Na trongleng jiekka hla Tertius keina Khristen ngei ariem riemtuk nangeita pe ah hla inge.
Ahalsha mee ngei na bomtul na amunt inn mitpu Gaius na kom Eraster hupi hina sum rungpa akha chu ani ton pi Quartus mani makhai na kom ariem riemtuk pe ah hla ae.
[Arengpu Jisu Khrista lungshit na hi nangei lim chunga am shu oh. Amen.]
Chungthieng tarang chang shu oh ariem hi! amona nangei ngoiring hata lingno lutta am pi nea ae.Nangei kolla ahra tronglam ka rou ril anu juja akum sot matienga thuppa shi ripisha adiek hana nujuija.
Chuna atun chu adiekka thiempu ngeina jiekka shi jarra choija shuk so ae. Atreem neino Chungthieng hana tronglam pek na chu jati lim na dang lea chu manina ariljuija ngoiring pha shu oh tina sha ae.
Chungthieng amo chakkea eheilim dangne, Jisu Khrista heithou wa mahung majai chang shu oh atreem nei no wa! Amen.
Chungthieng ahal nu juija Khrista Jisu taranga ahalsha rui ranga kok Pol akha chu ani uleanao Sosthens na —

Korenthiya shunga am Chungthieng koksha hana athieng mamee lim ta hana Khrista Jisu mamee chang sha limta hana atu jong amunt chang honna meelim ngei arengpu Khrista Jisu hitta am ha arengpu ae ta mok lim chunga.
Ani Pa Chungthieng akha chu rengpu Khrista Jisu na pek lungshi thei lea adai pha shu oh.
Nangei sharukka apha chang honna Chungthieng ta dom minge rouram chu Khrista Jisu jarra nangei ta lungshi jaihra pek sharukka.
Khrista hitta nangei am ha na jarra nangei hi eheilim ma achong tul shuk sho weh, trong lam ma akha chu lungsing kom tolla.
Khrista hina rouril hi nangei kolla lingno wa am so ae.
Chuna nangei na jaihra hi atante phao pha no rang am no ae. Nangei na ani arengpu Khrista Jisu phao ang hakka am hina.
Amo na kom nangei ta atreem ni phao lingpino wa shi ange. Chulea chu nangi na ari arengpu Khrista Jisu marungnie phao aral no ae.
Nangei ta asanaopa Khrista Jisu ani arengpu hitta am ha rang nangei ta kok Chungthieng amo hi ngoiringa ngei ae.

Ani arengpu Khrista Jisu minga keina kalungshit uleanao nangei lim pa ta dangpi aminge. Nangei ril hlak lim ha ngai hlak akha am mo chulea chu nangei kar shunga ahran am mang no ae. Shilung lungrang akha chakka am ha oh.
Uleanao khlo inn shung mee ngei na keita thieng roulea tak nangei shunga trong wuk hlak am meh.

Kei na hitta ril num minge. Nangei shunga ahre na adang, adanga ril lea, “Akha na ril” kei chu Pol nujui ange. Adang na, “Kei chu Apollos nu jui ange,” adang na, “Kei chu Pitar nu jui ange.” Adang na, “Kei chu Khrista nu jui ange.”
Khrista hi nangei na abom, abom ma hran pi sho ae! Khross chunga Pol na nangei taranga thi pi ah meh? Pol nu jui mee taranga nangei chu baptias ae chau meh?
Chungthieng ta kei na leima ariem ma dom minge rouram chu Krispus lea Gaius ah no wa atu adangta baptias ae pi nonge.
Atu akha na phao rilne ang no ae tichu karui chang ranga baptias ae pi inge ta.
(Adiektak kae, Stephant ngei inn shung kom baptias ae pi inge, chuti weta keina atu adang takom ae pi mo ti ha angei thei ni ange).

Khrista na kei ta baptias ae pi rang hla no weh, amo na keita ahra tronglam rouril rang hla pi ae akha chu malmashi lungsing lungwar tol no lutta rou ril ranga hana Khrista na Khross chunga mathit hi ariem sum no rang sha ae.
Amang ngei taranga chu Khrista na khross chunga thit na rou ril hi eko no ae chuti weta sanpi pha sha ani taranga chu Chungthieng jaitha sha ae.
Jieksha rou na ril ae,
“Keina lungsing lungwar ngei ta mang pi ange
hana mani lungrang lim artha am pi ang nonge.”
Chuna, lungsing lungwar ngei na hoi ah am manga meh? Hana simlei chunga rouril thei ngei kom Chungthieng na mani lim ta lungmo mee ae ta ri pi ange!
Chungthieng lungsing lungwar hi simlei lungsing na amo ta dang nea ang no ae chuti weta lungmo ngei ae ta rilhlak ngei hana pek rouril ha ta ngoiring amo ta chu Chungthieng na sanpi pha ange.
Jihudi ngei na anelah an num meh. Chutiweta Grik ngei na chu lungsing di ae.
Kani na chu Khrista na khross chunga aban jamma thit na rou ril unge naha Jihudi ngei na ngei num no ae hana jat adang ngei kolla chu eko no ae.
Chutiweta Chungthieng na kok sha Jihudi akha chu jat adang ngei taranga chu rouril hi Khrista amo ae. Amona Chungthieng hina jaitha akha chu lungsing lungwarre.
Chuna Chungthieng kolla lungmo pa hi malmashi lungsing pa ta chu lellea, Chungthieng kolla am ashul te na malmashi rat ta chu lellea.

Chuna atun chu anno ulea-nou nangei lim pana Chungthieng na nangei ta kok lei apha ah malmashi ngei mit an na chu nangei hi lungsingpa ano lea ane angam akha chu meelim chunga chung tekti kom ngai ae.
Chungthieng ahal chu lungsingpa na ajak tuk ranga lungmo pa ta kokkae akha chu arat pa kom ajak tuk ranga ashul te ta hallea.
Amo na simlei mee ngei na thuija an na shi akha chu mee na ephao halno mee ta halla hla ae simlei mee ngei na leima maru-oi ae ta hal ha mang pi rang.
Hina rilna chu atu akha na Chungthieng maikunga alok sha no rang sha ae.

Chuna Chungthieng na Khrista Jisu kolla ani lim ta rui ah rachun pi so ae, akha chu amo na Khrista hi ani lungsing shukna changpi ae, majar ra ani hi Chungthieng hitta adiek mee changpi so ae, chuna ani hi Chungthieng athieng mee changpi so ae.
Chuna sharukka hitta jiekka shi rou na rillea, atu jong na alok sha num lea arengpu ma ae phur hana alokna nei shu oh.
Kalungshit uleanao nangei kolla Chungthieng athuk adiek rou rillang kaphao juija keina aphao sa num nonge hana leima athei asing hek ti nonge.
Rouram chu nangei am na ah ka am tol juija ehei lim mak weta Khrista Jisu na Khross chunga mathit ha chak hallinge.
Chuna nangei am na katung juija kei hi leima shulla ati ahir inge.
Hana pa chu nangei kolla kachupi katakpi malmashi ngei athei asing hekti nonge chuti weta Chungthieng muihla jaitha hana jarra dangpi inge.
Chuna nangei ngoiring hi malmashi hina athei asing jarra no ae Chungthieng jaitha sha ae.
Chuti chun muihla lamma mapung pha sha ngei shunga chu keina lungsing na rouril inge, chuti weta na hi chu alei ramma ane angam ngei lungsing ano ae mani jaitha ha chu amang ha sa ae.

Nangei kolla karouril lungsing chu Chungthieng athuk lungsing sha ae na hi chu malmashi kol hai thou wa chu athup sha ae. Chutiweta ani ahung ajai taranga amo na simlei hi shak matieng hai thou wa hal sha so ae.
Simlei chunga reng atu na kom na lungsing hi am no sha ae. Ejonga mani na na hi dangphur leng mani na ahung ajai na shihakti arengpu ta Khross chunga that ang no ae.
Chutichun jieksha rou na rillea
Atu akha na hijongpa rikom ri no ae
hana thei kom thei no ae,
atu akha na hal kom ephao shuk no songe
ejongpa mo ae Chungthieng na amota
lungshi mee taranga mathourang.”
Chutiweta, ani taranga hi so ae muihla na chu Chungthieng athup ha kom dang pi nea ae muihla na chu Chungthieng athukka shi mahal eheilim phao jonga am meh.
Maram chu mee shunga am muihla ano wa chu atuna mee ngei maram hi danga meh chuna chu hekta atu kha nakom Chungthieng lunghal hi dangpha nea no ae Chungthieng ma muihla mak ano wa chu.
Ani na simlei ramma muihla ha pha no ae hana hutta ani pha chu Chungthieng hla muihla ha sha ae Hana jarra Chungthieng na ani ta pek lim pa hi dangpha nea ae.
Chuna sharukka ani na malmashi ngei na pek lungsing roulam ma trongshuk no ae, muihla na pek chak ril shukkae atujong muihla am ngei karra muihla adiek rou ha hrabakta ril unge.
Atujong muihla am no mee na chu Chungthieng pek jaihra hi pha ang no ae hajong mee na chu mani ta halla shukkang no ae. Mani chu mani muihla hana nujuija routreem ange.
Atujong muihla am amo na chu eheilim ma amant tam ma routreem meh chu na atu akhana amota routreem ae nea ang no ae.
Jieksha rou na ril lea,
“Atu na arengpa lungrang dang nga meh?
Atu na amo ta rou pe nea ah mo ae?”
Chutichun ani hi Khrista hina lung rang ha am meh.

Kalungshit uleanao ngei oh, adiek takka kei na nangei kolla muihla am ngei kolla trong hekta trong shuk nonge; kei na karil shuk num chu alei ram ma nangei lungrang Khristen unga ngei ngoiring hekta rilla am minge.
Keina salom pe ah tah ae, ahir bu pe nea ang nonge rouram chu nangei na hana taranga thourang am no jarra. Atun phao shunga kom nangei na thourang am no ae.

Maram chu atun phao shunga nangei hi alei ramma mee ngei ring hekta ringa am songe Nangei mashel anar hlak juija akha lea akha trong jet hlakka am chou ae hina nangei hi aleiram mee ngei hekti ae ta dang pi na no meh?
Nangei shunga akha na ril, “Kei chu Pol nu jui mee inge” hana adang na ril “Kei chu Apollo” nujui inge nangei hi aleiram mee ae hekta ano wa chou meh?
Chuna atuna Apollo? akha chu atu na Pol? Ani lim pa hi Chungthieng suuk ngei chak sha ae hana nangei ta lamkai weta ngoiring pi ah ani akha lea akha tullu lim hi amo ta ae rang arengpa pek sha ae.
Keina muchi wor inge Apollo na tui sho ae chuti weta machina tou wa hang chu Chungthieng tou pi sa ae.
Atu akha na maru wur phur hal kom atu akha na tui sho halkom nalim ha eko no ae Chungthieng matullu chak sha ae hana matou pi sha ae.
Chuna machi wor pa lea tui sho pa hina khetnat na am no ae Chungthieng na matullu ae nu juija lommant pe ange.
Chuna kani hi Chungthieng taranga tullu lu ha mee ngei ae hana nangei na Chungthieng loulai sha ae.
Hana chak no wa nangei hi Chungthieng shak inn ae.

Chungthieng na keita pek khuthul anu juija kei na inn sha thei pa na alota akung thou weta hrabakta sha hekta kei na tullu hi ae sange. Hana akha nakom woiha achunga sha sirso, chuna mee akha na matullu lim ha hrabakta ae anga sha ae.
Chuna Chungthieng na Khrista Jisu hita chak inn akung ha doi shi so ae chuna adang inn akung am ngei no ae.
Ahre na sona rupa ano lea amant tam alunga inn akung thou ae; adang ahre na thing takka anolea shapo thou ae.
Mee akhana lu tullu hana amant ha chu nahanie ah ri pha ange, Khrista na rungni hana chu nanie rungnie ah chu sarmei na ri pi ange hana ejongpa mo dang pi ange.
Sarmei hana hol jui ja kang no wa am inn akung ta chu asha mee hana ae na mant pha ange.

Chutiweta atujong akha shak inn chu sarmei na kang lea chu amo ha chu amang sha ae chuti weta mo ha chu ejonga kanga thing lea chu amo mang ange chuti weta matak mak chu sarmai shenga kai ah lak hekta sanpi ange.
Chuna nangei na na adiek takka dang chou ae tichu, nangei hi Chungthieng athieng inn ae akha chu Chungthieng mamuihla na nangei shunga am meh?
Chuna sharukka atu jong akha na Chungthieng inn hata mangpi lea chu chu amo ta takom mangpi ange Rouram chu Chungthieng inn chu athieng inn sha ae hana nangei natak mak hi athieng ma inn ae.

Atu akha na kom lungmo no shu oh mathei chakka, ejonga atu jong akha na nangei kar shunga kei hi lungsing mee ae hallea chu na aleiramhina nujuija amo ha lungmo mee changa phao shu oh adiktakka lungsing mee chang ranga.
Rouram chu aleiram ma lungsing hi Chungthieng ningtienga chu lunghal thei no mee sha Jieksha rou na ril chu hekta, “Chungthieng changa athei asingha mani thei sing shak hana mant ae.”
Hana adang jieksha na hita kom rillea; “Arengpu na lungsing ngei lunghal lim danga amant am pi no ae.”
Atu akha na ma ae nea hana tarang alok sha no shu oh routakka ehei lim nangei ta sha ae.
Pol Apollo akha chu Pitar hi aleiram, ringchang akha chu athi, atun akha chu anutieng lim pa hi nangei ta ae.
Hana nangei Khrista ta ae hana Khrista na Chungthieng ta sha ae.
Chungthieng hina athuk athup adiek rou pekka shi Khrista shuk kani taranga nangei na hallanga ae.
Suuk akha changa ehekta darkar ui chu mitpu kolla ngoiring rang tullu lu hi ae.
Atun hi kei na eheilimpa routreem ae nea nonge malmashi mit an na; kei katak phao nalim an nea nonge.
Kahal kalungrang hi leima thienga hallinge na hi rilweta kei chu maral ephao am nonge ti nonge, kei ta kom routreem ae ang chu arengpu amo sha ae.

Chuna nangei na atu akha ta kom apha acha phamalim ma routreem ae no oh. Arengpu phao malim chu atreem na routreem hakka am mangawe. Amo na malmashi ngei thup pa shi lung rang lim hana athiem lim kom awar na ri pi ang sha ae. Hana jui apha ah meelim na Chungthieng kol hai thou wa adom pha ange.

Chuna nangei sharukka uleanao ngei oh kei katakmak akha chu Apollos na, na lim hi ae unge, chulea chu nangei na rilla am hina rou hi kani kolla dang na nei oh. “Jieksha rou ta lella thingno oh,” atu akha na alok sha weta akha ta athuija shi no oh.
Nathei nasing ha atu pekka no ae? Nalim ha Chungthieng pek chak no meh? Chuna nang na alowa kuthul apha no weta eje ranga nangna alok sha ah che?

Nangei na darkar lim ha am shu jou mo ae? Nangei hi achong nga jo che? Ani am no wa nang nathei chakka rengpa chang nga che? Oh ae kei na kom nareng hi di oh ani lim rachun ha weta rengpa chang ngei meh?
Kei na hitta hallinge ha chu Chungthieng na kani hitta atreem ang tienga ahalsha rui akha chu ram lim ma tusan rai ngei akha chu simlei meelim mai kunga athit ranga pek sha hekty ae.

Khrista Jisu minga kani hi lungmo unge chuti weta nangei na chu Khrista hitta am ha na jarra lungsing mee so ae kani chu shul unge, nangei chu rat ae, kani chu mee anda mee unge nangei chu meena ajak ati ae.
Atun apha hina thou wa kani na wantam tuiralla; aol ana bom shunga; phitta rei ah; amunt akha hai thou akha ah rol unge;
kani na kani thei chakka aol hi donga, kani ta sarkou juija kani na jaihra pe unge; aol ana pek jui ja, kani na dong thei unge;
kani ta ajak pek jui ja kani na hrabakta sang pi unge kani hi alei ramna anda mee ae; hana kani hi alei ram ma tui aphul jongpa songe atun apha hai thou wa.
Nangei kolla kajiekka kahla hi nangei ajak shu oh ta rilla nonge kalungshit kasanao ngei hekta chupi ranga.

Khristen ring changa nanu napashek lising asom nangei na am halkom; napa chu akhachakke khrista hitta nangei ringchanga am ha ah ahra tronglam hi nangei kolla choija phao ah keina nangei pa chang inge.
Chuna keina nangei ta rilla am minge, kanu jui jo.

Hina tarang sharukka kei na Timothi hi nangei kolla hla inge. Amo chu Khrista minga kalungshit ngoiringa kashi kasanao pa ae. Amo na Khrista Jisu kolla karing na lam hi hrabakta jui ange. Hana abom amunt chonghanna kachupi katakpi lim na kom jui ange.
Nangei kar shunga ahre na chu leima alok sha num ma am so ae rouram chu kei hi phao ang ni jo weh ta halla.
Areng ahal am lea chu kei leima ranga nangei am na phao sier ange. Hana juija kei na alo ta aphao sha weta tronga am ngei aratha kei na jong ange.
Rouram chu Chungthieng rengram ma chu murra trong chak no ae jaitha chakkang sha ae.
Lungshi ahra muihla lam ma mo ano lea malsum moltek choi ja kei na phao ang mo hoi pa na nangei dit meh?
Nangei kar shunga vokno namei apa am meh ti hi keina thei inge, asanao pa na manu pok lou nu hitta jalha am meh ta keita rillea chuna hajongpa ati pi rou hi Jisu mel dang no ngei kar kom am no ae.
Chuna alota nangei na alok sha num ma chao? Hana hutta nangei hi ajak na shihakta am manga ae chuna hojong tullu lu mee apa ta chu nangei abom shung hai thou julla hla anga ae.

Kapum na nangei am na hai thou aram lah ah am hal kom kamuihla chu nangei am na am tol ae kalungrang lim kom. Arengpu Jisu minga hajong ati pi tullu lu mee ha keina routreem ae rang hla shu sange. Nangei na ranchun na am na ah kamuihla kom am tolla. Hana arengpu Jisu jaitha hana jarra ani hitta am ha ae.
Na mee hi saitan kut chunga nangei na pe oh matak hi mangpi ranga, chulea chu areng rungnie ah ma muihla chu sanpi pha ranga.
Nangei na alok sha rang am no ae! nangei na dangno oh chau mee rilhlak ha? Achol ahuite na jam lim pata sem ma shukpi ha.”

Nangei atuisha pakka chol ha denga hou ta lou chu nangei limpa ha athieng chang ange. Chuna athar chol tolno butol jam hek ti ange oh weh nangei hi ha chou ae. Ani taranga chu Khrista na hut shilpi ah thi shu so ae.
Chuna ani na talpi na reen ha chol batol akha chu hrano tol no lutta bak sai oh, athieng adiek butol hitta.
Kei na nangei ta Jiekka rilla hla inge nangei na hajong vokno ngei hitta am ha no oh.
Rolwak neino anolea karam paicha ano lea aruthei akha chu kutta shem hlawang mok ngei ta rilla nonge. Chuna nangei na mani kol hai thou wa shukka a thingo ta rilla singe.

Karil num chu nang hitta na-u nanao ae ta mathei chak na ril chuti weta lamchat am lou karam paicha kutta shem hlawang ta mok anolea ju inn bubak aruthei akha chu mee mang ang rouril ngei mani ta chu ong kom ang ha no oh, bakkom bakha no oh.

Nalim pa hi kei na routreem rang ka tullu nonge, Chungthieng na mani ta routreem anga sha ae chuti weta nangei abom shunga am mee ngei ta chu nangei na ae routreem phung shuk no meh? Jieksha rou na ril chu hekta, “Hrano mee ha chu nangei abom hai thou wa la ah hou oh.”
Ejonga nangei kar shunga atu jong akha na rou shukhlakka am lea chu nang na athieng mee ngei am na hutta thing ang sha rukka thiengno mee ngei am na thing chou weh.
Nang na dang no wa che shimlei ram hi Chungthieng ma mee ngei na routreem ange ti hi? Chuna nangei na shimlei hi routreem mang ta lea chu, nanghi asin te tullu taranga routreem nea ang no mee ah meh?
Nangei na dangno wa chau wan rui ngeita ani na routreem ange ti hi? Chuna na ringchang hina eja ah hel mo ae!
Chuna ejong rou akha phao juija nangna manita abom ah tollou mee ngei am na ah routreem pi ang che?
Na ha nangei taranga ajakpi ae! nangei Khristen ulea-nao shunga atu mo lungsing akha chu am mange amo hana roushuk ka am ha daipi nea ange.
Hana hutta Khristen akha na akhata roushuk weta ngoiringlou routreempu kolla rou shu rang ril thinge.
Hina adiek takka takpi chu nangei mashel shunga akha lea akha anshi anda hlakka eheilim hi ngei ni jo weh. Chuna nangei hi aral pana hra tek no meh? Hana nangei hi aru thei pa na hra tekno meh?
Nangei na na-u-nanao makta aral tullu lu ah akha chu aru tullu lu so ae!
Nangei na dang ngou oh, hajong hrano mee na Chungthieng rengram pha nea ang no ae, lungmo no oh, vokno anolea kutta shem hlawang ta mok ano lea meenamei meepashal ta vokno tullu lu mee ngei oh.
Ano lea atujong aru ano lea hopla ano lea ju enn rat ano lea mee hrat no rang rourilla aruthei ngei na Chungthieng rengram tung nea ang no ae.

Nangei kar shunga ahre na chu hajong hek ti phur ae chuti weta nangei ha pak lim ha thiengpi so ae. Nangei ha Chungthieng kolla pe shu sha so ae; Ani arengpu Jisu Khrista akha chu Chungthieng muihla jarra nangei hi Chungthieng kolla adiek mee wulpi so ae.

Atujong akhana rille, “Keina limpa ae ngai ae.” O-ve, chuti weta eheilimpa hi nakolla arha chak ah no-ae. Eheilim pa hi kataranga angai chakkae. Chutiweta ejongpa akha phaona keita chu kor changpi nea ang no ae.

Atujong kaha na hitta rillea, “Rak hi won taranga ae akha chu won hi rak taranga ae.” Oh weh chuti weta Chungthiengna na ani makhi mangpi ang ae. Pum hi vokno hrano taranga no ae chuti weta arengpu tullu lu rang sha ae. Akhachu arengpu na taranga awat amno ah pe-ange.
Chungthieng na arengpa ta athi hai thou ringpi so ae chuna amo na ani ta kom majaitha hana jarra ringthou pi ange.
Nangei na dang chou ae nangei pum hi Khrista hina pum saruk akha ae. Keina Khrista pum ahui ta lah weh ta vokno namei changpi ngai ah meh? Uithuk lou sa ae!
Ano lea Nang na dang no wa che atu jong akha na matak mak na vokno namei akha hitta rachun lea chu amo hitta pum akha chak so ae? Jiksa rou na hitta rille, “Pum ani ha akha chak chang ange.”
Chutiweta atu jong akha na matak makhi arengpu kolla rachun lea chu amo ha muihla ningtinga arengpu hitta akha chak so ae.
Wokno tullu lha hou-oh atujong mee akha na pak tullu lu lea chu mapum ma ekom amang am no ae. Chutiweta atujong mee akha vokno tullu lu lea chu matak na matak chunga pak ae sa ae.
Nang na dang no wa che natak hi muihla athieng am na inn ae ti hi. Amo ha nakolla Chungthieng pek sha ae? Nang hi Chungthieng ta ae, nataranga no ae.
Amo na nangta lei sho ae chuna natak hi Chungthieng mahung majai tarang chanpi oh.
Nangei na kakolla jiek ka hla rouram anu jui-ah mee akhana taichangno pana hra tekkae.
Chutiweta vokno tam sha rukka apa akhana mata, mata namei am pa na hra tekkae. Hana namei nu na kom mata, mata apishal am shu oh.

Apa ha na kom ma ae phung shuk tullu ha pasalpa akha changa ae su-oh. Hana namei nu na kom ma ae phung shuk tullu ha mapung pha pi shu oh. Hana ani mak na akha na akha hina darkar anu juija san hlak shu oh.
Apishal am sha namei nu akha na mapum hi amona amitpu ano ae, chuti weta mapishal na sa ae chuna chu hekta anamei am sha palsha pa nakom mapum hi amona amitpu ano ae, anamei nu na sa ae.
Nangei natakna anikrang apha amrang, apha tante taranga ngailhak ano achu, nangei akhana khata ngaida lhakno oh, akha chu nangeina natakka manne no sarukka saitan na lhem neno ranga woi ha tul sirro.
Nangei kolla karil rou hi lungshi ah ril singe arang tronga no singe.
Routakka chu nangei limpa hi kei hekta am di inge; chuti weta mee chang honna mata mata kut thul Chungthieng kolla pha ae, akhana khatinga hana akhana adang tinga pha ah am ae.
Chuna taichang no the ngei lea arong nu ngei kolla rilla am minge mani na ka am hekta am nea ang lea chu am pa na hra tekkange.
Chutiweta ejonga mani na mani pum ta sum na nea ang no lea chu mani ha taichangpa na hra tekkange rouram chu aol donga am mang sha ruk chu taichangpa na hella hratekkae.
Chuna taichung sha mee ngei taranga keina tronglam pe ah am ming nahi katheichakka rou no ae arengpu rou sha ae nameinu na apishal hla ah hou no shu oh.
Chutiweta ejonga namei nu na hata ae lea chu, amo ha; hata am shu oh, ano lea apishal hitta lungle hlak shu oh. Akha chu pashal pa ngei na kom anamei ta hran no shu oh.

Adangei ta kom keina rilla aminge ejong, Khristain akha na Khrista mel dang no namei nei shu lea chu hana namei nu hana kom apishal hitta am ha nea ang sange ta ngai lea chu namei nu hata hran no shu oh.
Akha chu Khristen namei na kom Khristen lou apa kolla innpal lea amona pal ha nea ange ta ngeihlak shu lea chu namei hana kom apishal ta hran no shu oh.

Rouram chu ngoiringlou pashal ha anamei na thiengpi so ae hana ngoiringlou anamei nu ta kom apishal na thiengpi so weh anole chu asanao ngei ha thiengno ngei chang ange, chuna asanao ngei ha atun chu thieng so ae.
Chutiweta ejonga ngoiringlou amo na hran nange ta hran lea chu hata hran shu oh, rouram chu apa namei hi hojong shunga olla am rang no weh rouram chu Chungthieng na ani ta adai pha ranga kok sha ae.
Chuna Khristen namei nu oh nangna napi shalta sanpi ang, sanpi angno tihi alota dang nea ang che? Khristain pashalpa nangna kom na namei ta sanpi ang, sanpi angno tihi alota dangne ang che?
Amatienga Chungthieng na nangei ta kok lei apha hekta nangei lim pa na arengpu na pek nu juija ringa am oh. Na roulam hi ae keina abom chang honna kachupi katakpi ha.
Ejonga Chungthieng kok lei ah amo ha asartan lea chu na ha mang ranga amo na ae no shu oh. Asartan ma amo ta kok lea chu asar tan rang ae no shu oh.
Asartan lea asartan no hi ekom no weh chuti weta Chungthieng roukung ha ta jui ja thing ha sha ae.
Amo hata Chungthieng na kok lei apha ah atu mo ti ha, hata am shu oh,
kor changa na am lei ah kok lea chu ajou shu oh, hana taranga ephao nule no oh. Chutiweta ejonga nangta hla pi lea chu hana kom hella hra so ae.
Rouram chu kor changa na am lei ah arengpa na kok lea arengpu makolla chu nang ha ahla mee so weh. Hana kor no ngei takom arengpu na kok hi makor chang ranga sha ae.
Chungthieng na nangta amant pe ah lei so weh chuna sha rukka nangei na mee kor chang no oh.
Katonpi ngei oh, Chungthieng hitta nangei akha lea akha na bomtul ha ah akha chakka am mang nga sha ae nangei ta kok lei apha hekta.
Taichangno na rou wa nangei ril nujui ja kahal kalunga chu Arengpu lungshit pha mee amo ha chu ngoiringa shi num minge, nahi Arengpu pek rou no ae.
Atun na shukka am rouram lim hina tarang halleng chu, hata am hana hella hra tek kae.
Nang hi namei neijo che? Nangna taichang shu ta lea chu hran hlak no oh. Hana taichangno the ta lea chu namei nei rang hal no oh.

Chuna ejonga nang na taichang lea chu nangna pak ae ni yo weh. Chutiweta ejonga athieng namei na taichang lea chu amo ha pak tullu lu ah no weh chuti weta hella karil num chu awoni taichang sha ngei na rungnie changhon na aol ana halleng chu taichang no pa na hra tekkae.
Kalungshit uleanao ngei oh, hina karil na chu apha kom tam ma am ni jo weh chuna atun hai thou wa chu apa akha na taichang shu lea chu taichangno ngei hekta amo na ringa am no shu oh.
Tappa am ngei na, tappa am no ngei hekta; Ariem ma nui ah am ngei na riem no hekta; pot lei ngei na mani ta no hekta.
Potchei ahra, ahra chakka halla am ngeina mani tarang no hekta mani na shi, atun chu shimlei hi wulla thinga shot ta am ni jo weh.
Keina chu nangei hi aol ana hai thou wa shukka thingpi num minge taichang no the apa na arengpu na amo ta lungshit ranga ma reng tullu chak halla am meh Maram chu arengpu pelrang chak ae am meh.
Chutiweta taichangsha apa na chu aleiram ma taranga halla am meh rouram chu anamei na ap el ranga.

Chuna amo chu alam ani nah kai ae. Hana taichangno the athieng namei nu na chu mapum muihla ani mak hi reng tullu lu ranga kathukka pe nea ae. Chutiweta taichang sha namei nu na chu aleiram ma tarang chakka halla am meh, rouram chu apishal na amota pel ranga.
Karilla am rou hi nangei ta san num minge nangei ta kei na hamma shi ah no shange. Nangei na hoitiengpa na adiek mo ano lea nangei tak hi Reng matullu ae juija ahan am no ranga keina di inge.

Ejonga atu jong akha na athieng namei ta vokno tullu lu ang sharak chu reikung shil shu oh. Hana namei nu na kom ejong malunga rang lea chu hata taichang shu oh. Rouram chu manui ha pak tullu lu noranga ae.
Chutiweta atujong apa akha na mee adang na amota akal rou ril no lutta mathei chakka taichang ang nonge ta malung ngir shu lea chu, naha leima hra so weh.
Chuna apa hana taichang hal kom hra so weh. Chutiweta taichang no hal kom ehekta ahra ae.
Apalsha namei akha na apishal ringlei lim chu hran ngai ang no ae. Chutiweta apishal thi lea chu madit apa akha kolla palla ngei ae, chuti weta Khristen apa chang anga ae.
Amo na hatta palla am lea chu amo ha ahoi tekkange. Naha Chungthieng muihla tolla kahal rou sha ae.
Hlawang ta pek abakpot rou wa nangei sai na nujuija. Ani lim pa na, nalim ha danghap sha sho weh chutichun hajong chu apha atante chakkae, hana Lungshiti na chu sem nea ae.
Atujong na amo hi ejong akha dang inge ta halle chu routakka chu amo ha madangphung shuk ha dangno shonge.
Chutiweta Chungthieng ta lungshi mee amo ta chu Chungthieng na kom amo ta dange.
Chuna hlawang ta pek abak een hina rou hi: Ani dang chu kutta hlawang hi ephao am no ae. Ani dang chu Chungthieng akha chak am meh ti ha ae.
Thangwan ano lea aleiram ma hajong hlawang hi leima am hal kom hachak no wa hlawang ngei akha chu rengei am hal kom.
Chutichun ani taranga chu sempi pa Pa Chungthieng akha chak am meh. Hana Arengpu Khrista Jisu chakkae majarra eheilim pa sem sha ae hana ani kom majarra ringa am meh.

Chutiweta na adiek rou hi malmashi lim pa na dang no weh. Malmashi ahre na chu atun kom hlawang ta pek abakpot hi mani na bak juija hlawang ta bak rang pot anina bak sho weh ta mani lung shunga pak hekta halla leima shul pi ae mani thei chakka.
Chutiweta abakpot na ani hi Chungthieng kolla nai tekka am na no weh. Ani na bak no weta hella hrano mee kom ano weh akha chu bak weta hella hratekna kom am no ae.
Chutichun nangei na singthei ah nangei ae num ae hana ngoiringa ashul ngei kolla kae mathui na changpi no oh.
Chuna ejonga hajong lungrang shukthei no wa am mee maikunga nang na chu dang inge ta eko no hekta bak ta lea chu nangna hajong mee ta thanum thathou pi ah che ae hlawang ta pek abak pot ha.
Chuna hajong lungrang shukthai no na-u-nanao taranga Khrista na mataranga thit jarra ha, ariem shalla nang na mangpi so che dang inge ta na ti hana.
Hijong lampi ah nangei na na-u-nanao ngei ta pakka tulpi ae akha chu ashul Khristen ngeita hella ahra lungrang shukpi no weh.
Chuna ejonga abak pot na ka-u-kanao kolla pakka tul pi lea chu keina ameh phao etikkom bakkang nonge ka-u-kanao pakka tul no ranga.
Kei hi ahuppa lha apa ha ano meh? Kei hi ahalsha rui ah no wa meh? Keina ani Arengpu Jisu ta ri sa no meh? Areng tarang nga ka tullu lu na amant jarra no wa meh nangei hi?
Ejonga mee adang na kei hi ahalsha rui ae ta lano halkom. Nangei ringchang na arengpu hitta am hana jarra kei hi ahalsha rui ae ta ripha nea pi ae.
Mee ngeina keita aral nonna jui ja kaneranga keina hitta sang inge.
Ka-ngam ae hina jarra kei hi bakphang inn phung shuk no meh?
Arengpu ulea nao akha chu Pitar ngei hekta keikom namei rui weta thing ha ngei no wa meh?
Ano lea Barnabas lea kanui aringa rang taranga chak tullu lu ang nga meh?
Atujong ralmee akha na mathing mahongna alut sum lim hi amona choija shuk jo meh? Atujong angur mahum ae pa na angur arah bakno mee tolla meh? Kelmo sum pa na makelmo shalom een no mee tolla meh?
Rouhi rilnum ma karil rou no weh maramchu roukung hana kom hitta rilla no meh?
Mosi rakitrou na ril sha sho ae, tullu lu ah am shillapa mur huppa shi no oh. Nahi Chungthieng na shillapa taranga rilla meh?
Ano lea na hi adiek takka ani taranga rilla meh? Nahi routakka ani taranga rilla shi sho ae maram chu lou hui pa lea lou hloupa na akha chakka ae na aman pha ha ange.
Kani na nangei karra muihla muchi wor weta ejonga kani na nangei kol hei thou-wa kana pha lea chu kanina leldonna pha a jo meh?

Adangei na nangei kolla thou phaphung shukkle, kanina loktekta phaphung shukno meh? Chutiweta ani na aephung lim hi ae no ae rouram chu reng Khrista hina ahra tronglam ril juija ahan apal shukno rang sa ae.
Nangei na diekka dangchou ae, hachu mokna inn shunga tullu lu pa ngeina insunga katta shi pot bak pha ae. Akhachu saiphenga ijonga katta thoipana athoina tum pha ae.
Chuna chu hekta Arengpu na rille, ahra tronglam rouril ngei na kom mani ring ranga pha shu oh.
Najongpa lim ha keina ephao ae nonge, hana kataranga keina nalim ngei jiekka shi nonge. Chu chakno wa atu jong na kalok phungsuk hata iko ano rou aeta lale chu thi pa na hella hra tekke.
Ahra tronglam hi sui ingeta keina kalok rang ekom am no ae, ahra tronglam hi ejonga keina ril no lea chu eja ah ati pi meh kataranga, maram chu ae no ngaino hana kachunga dolla am ae.
Ejonga ka lu tullu hi kahal a lea chu keina ka ae na amant am ae, chuti weta keina tullu hi ka tlunluh ae ta halla ae inge.
Chutilechu keina ka ae na amant e pha ang meh? Keina aman tolnolutta arha rouhi sui inge, hita lechu keina, ahra tronglam suirang ka pha diekka jui singe.
Kei hi atu thuija kom kor changa am nonge chuti weta ka thei chakka meelim thuija kor changa am minge maramchu mee atam manne ranga.

Jihudi ngei karra ka am lei a kei na Jihudi ngei hekta am minge mani ta hom rang sha rukka, keina Moses tronglam anu thuija anno halkom manita honranga keina Moses tronglam thuija hekta mani kara amminge.

Chu hekta jat adang ngei karra tullu ka ae jui ja kom kei na mani ta homranga Jehudi ngei tronglam awao a am hekta aminge. Hati halkom kei hi Chungthieng ril trong hlik mee anonge, routakka chu kei hi Khrista tronglam thuija am minge.
Ngoiring ashul ngei karra keikom shul tol inge, mani ta hom ranga, keina meelim ngei kolla eheilimpa ha changsinge ahre chak halkom hom ma ngai ranga.
Ka lu tullu lim hi ahra tronglam tarang chakke chule chu jaihra hi keina pha rang sha ae.
Nangei na dang ha sa ae lam tan lim na tan ha halkom akha chakna mana pha ae. Chuhekta pharang ratta tanno.
Mahel shit hlak lim na ane pharang achum lam lim jui-ae, manina pha lubur chu apha tante rang sa-ae. Chutiweta kani lubur chu atreem nai no wa am rang sha ae.
Chuna sharukka keina lungrang am no ngei na tan hekta tan nonge ka lu tullu hi mee ngei na thirang ta phit jong pa no ae.
Mee adang kolla rouril nea ranga akha chu lubur ha pha rang sharukka kei na katak mak ta suuk changpi ah reanna shi inge.
Ulea nao ngei oh kei na nangei ta angei thei pi num minge, Moses nujuija hang, nu ngei pa ngei ta tuipi lin lal pi-ae akha-chu shumphai thui alippa thingpi ae.
Manilim na Moses anu jui mee ngei changa shumphai akha chu tuipilin sunga baptias ae so ae.
Meelim na muihla rakha akha chakka bakha ae.
Akha chu muihla tui kom akha chakka inn ha ae, maramchu mani itta thingha Muilha tinga sumlung hei thou inha so ae, hana sum lung ha chu Khrista sa ae.
Chuti phao shunga Chungthieng na mani atampata lungshi no wa athisha mani pum ha ramrukka denga hou ae.
Atun chu hilim hi ani taranga ripi so ae, tichu anina mani hektinorang akha chu rhanota dit no ranga hienna sa ae.
Mee arhena kutta sem hlawangta mokhekta nangeichu mokno oh, Jieksha rou na rilhekta, “Meengeina bakharang ongsowe anutingchu arui abah a namei apa okno tullu lu so ae.”
Akha chu mani arhena apa namei okno tullu lu sarukka naha nie akha chakta mee ring lasing somni inthum thi ae, anina vokno tullu manei hekta ae ang no ah ae.
Mani arhena Arengputa chang ansarukka arulna thathekta, anina Arengputa chang an ang no sa ae.
Anina mani hekta Roukat hlakka chak am mang no sa ae, mani ha Athi Wanrui na mangpi ae.
Manita shukka am ngamlim hi adang ngeina chu ranga sha ae mani ha na ani dang ranga jiekka shi phur sha ae. Maramchu ani ringa am hi atreem na apha ha wa so ae.
Atujong mee na hrabakta ngirsinge ta hallechu, tu norang chetta ngirsu oh.

Nakolla phao alhem ha mee lim kolla phao alhem ha sa ae. Chutiweta Chungthieng masharo ei sa chu lingno sa ae. Hana amona nadong nea angno alhem nakolla phaopi ang no ae, ejonga phaohal kom na nangta dongne rang jaitha pe pi ange, hana amona lam adang akha tienga honga hla ange.
Chuna sharukka kalungshit tonpi ngei oh, kutta shem hlawang ta mok hei thou wa shukka thing jou oh.
Kei na nangei ta lunghal thei mee ae ta rilla am minge karil rou hi nangeina diek diekno minna hallo.
Arengpu bu donna ah ani na Chungthieng ta dom hitta mun ha ah anina tuidon choija inha Khrista mathee sharuk ron ha ah am sha ae. Akha chu badol thera ani bakha Khrista pum sharuk pha ha ah am meh.
Rouram chu ani lim na badol akha pum akha change maramchu ani lim na badol akha chakka bakha ae.
Halla anno, Israel shanao ngei na hlawang ta kat pot kom Chungthieng maicham mai ah bakha ae.
Chungthieng ta kat pot lea hlawang hi ejongpa akha ae ta keina rilla meh.
Ano weh, rouram chu hlawang ta kat pot hi chu Chungthieng ta ano ae, saitan ta ae, chuna keina saitan kolla nangei hi am pi num nonge.
Nangna Arengpu inn na tuidon na akha chu saitan inna tuidon nako intiha dinonge nang na Arengpu bu donna maichama ko Saitan maichama ko bakha denonge.
Ano lea anina ta anar pinum ma meh? ani na amo ta hella rattekke ta halla meh?
Manina rille, “Ani hi eheilimpa ae ah ngai ae,” naha adiek sa ae, chuti weta eheilim pa hi ahra chak no ae, “Ani hi ehailimpa ae ngai ae” chuti weta eheilim pa hi kana rang ah no ae,
Atu akha na mataranga chak an no shu oh, chuna adang taranga kom an shu oh.
Kaithilla jurra am ameh ha nangei na ekom rou shai no lutta lei weta bakka ngai ae nangei lung aral tanorang.
Rouram chu jieksha rou na rille, “Shimlei akha chu eheilim pa hi Arengpu mata chakke.”
Ejonga atu jong Khrista mel dangno mee na nangei ta bubak kokka nangei na kom thingnum ta lea chu nangei lung hoino amno ranga ephao rou shai no lutta bakko.
Chutiweta atujong na nangei ta hlawang ta kat pot ae ta ril lea arilpa hana mamarama akha chu diek diekno aeta halrang yarra bakno-oh.

Naha nangei lunga halrang no ae, mee adang na adiek dieklou mani lenga dangrang sa ae, “Chutilechu, rhasowe” atujong akhana saiye, “Eje ah mee akhana diek diekno dangna malung hana ka ae num hata routreem ma meh.”
Ejonga keina kabakkang pot taranga Chungthieng ta kadom hi atujong akha na kachunga rou rillang am ma meh? Bakrang kadom hina maramma.
Hrasowe, natullu lu eheilim, nangna bak che hal een che hal Chungthieng ajai taranga ae oh.
Jihudi ano lea jat adang ano lea Chungthieng koksha mee ngei kolla ephao aol ana shuk norang lamtinga ringo.
Ka ae hekta nangei kom ae oh; keina ka ae limhi meelim ngei keina ka rhat rangchak halnonge, chuti weta mee lim hrat rang hallinge, chutile chu mani ha sanpi ha pha ange.
Khrista awong kajui hekta kawong hi jui-oh.
Nangei ta ariemma dom minge rouram chu apha changhona nangei kachupi lim ha maknolutta nangei na jui chau ae.
Chuna keina nangeita lunghal thei pi num minge ha chu meelim chunga Khrista ae, anamei chunga apishal am hekta, akha chu Chungthieng na Khrista chunga am meh.
Chuna apa akha na marouril jui ja ano lea meelim maija prathana ma ae juija alu hum lea chu Khrista ta ajak ati no wa ae.
Akha chu atu jong namei akha na meelim mai ah Chungthieng rouril jui akha chu pratha ma ae juija alu hum no lea apishal ta ajak ati no a ae. Amo ha alu asham kok namei hitta ephao hetlhak, no ae.
Ejonga namei nu akha na alu hum no lea chu asham ha tan shu oh, chuno namei nu na alu kang kok hi ajak pi shou chu amo na alu hum shu oh.
Apa ngei chu alu hum rang am no ae rouram chu amo chu Chungthieng ahung ajai mel sha ae chuti weta namei ngei chu apa ngei ahung ajai taranga sha ae.
Apa ngei hi namei nu hei thou wa shak ah no ae chuti weta namei nu chu apa hei thou shak ae.
