Namei taranga apa hi sem phur no ae, chuti weta apa taranga namei hi semphure.
Maram hina wanrui ngei sharukka namei na alu hum hi apishal thuija am meh ti dang na sha ae.
Khrista kolla am ani ringchang hi apa tolnowa namei shukno ae akha chu namei tolnowa apa shuk no ae.
Namei na apa kolhai thou wa shak hekta apa kom namei na don ae; chuti hal kom na Chungthieng na limpa hi shukpi sha ae.
Nangei na nangei thei chakka routreem ma ann oh, ha chu namei nu na meelim bomtulna ah alu hum no lutta pratha ae hi arha mo ae.
Anno, apa na asham shei ah am hi matalit no shou chu ajon ano ae.
Chutiweta namei na na asham shai ah am chu mahrat na change. Masham ashei hana chu alu hum pi ae.
Chuna atu jong akha na nahina taranga trong jet num lea chu Chungthieng ningtienga hal makoksha mee ngei ningtieng hal hajong talit tajou hi am no ae.
Hina chupi rouram anu juija kei na nangeita dom num nonge, Rouram chu nangei na mok ranga bom tuljuija ahra tullu lu ang hutta hrano tullu hella ae na neije.
Masha tekta kei na rilla am minge, ha chu nangei bom tul sunga ngai num no meh am meh ta kakolla rilphur so weh. Naha keina adiek takkange ta kom ngoiring inge.
(Ephao lungkim no rang am no ae nangei kar shunga arhan shukkange hana adiek mee ha chu hrabakta ripha ange).
Nangei na abom akha rachun na bakha ha arengpu bu don ah no weh.
Nangei na bakha ha juija ahre na ahre ta hakhlak no lutta bakhak ka ahre na wontam donge, ahre na rui ah am meh.

Nangei na bak rang inn rang nangei in am no wa meh? Ano lea Chungthieng mee ngeita lung hear ah chou? Akha chu eko donthei no ngeita ajak pea ah chou? Hina maramma keina ejong rou rilangeta halla chou? Keina nangei ta dom mang meh? Na ha ano weh!
Nangei kolla karil lim hi arengpa hei thou kapha sha ae, Areng Jisu Khrista ta jurni hana badol atan choi weta.
Chungthieng ta dom ma amo na ril, “Nangei taranga katak hi pe shange. Nahi nangei na ae oh keita angei thei rang.”

Chu hitta mun ha ah bak shu nutienga tuidon dom ma amo na ril, “Na tuidon hi Chungthieng na athar saro ei hitta mun ha ah kathee hi kapek sha ae, Nahi nangei na een bak juija keita angei thei rang sha ae.”
Hina rilna hi chu nangei na apha chang honna badolhi bak jui akha chu tuidon hina injui ja. Reng Khrista thit na rou hi majung malim ma ril pi oh.
Hina nu juija atujong akha na na badol akha chu tuidon hi in weta amota ajak atri amno lea, amoha Areng matak akha chu mathee hana chunga pak ae so weh.
Chuna meelim pana masha ah matakta thira ansu oh, hana nuteinga badol baksu oh akha chu tuidon hei thou in su-oh.
Ejonga amo na na Arengpu pum aeti hina maram hi dang no lutta badol akha chu tuidon hana een lechu mathei chakna machunga routreem rang bak een na ae.
Chuna sharukka nangei atampana akha chu ana asha pha ae akha chu ejana thi ae.
Ejonga ani na ani tak ta masha ah thier phur lea chu ani hi Chungthieng routreem thui ja am ang no ae.
Chutiweta ani hi Arengpuna leichoi ae akha chu routreem ae, chuti lea chu ani na simlei hitta aol ana pha ha ang nijo ve.
Chuna sharukka kalungshit ulea nao ngei oh nangei na rachun na reng bu don bak ang tienga akha na akha ta hakhlak ko.

Akha chu atu jong akha na wontam lea chu amona ma inna bak su oh, chu lea chu Chungthieng routreem ha makolla pha ang no ae. Hana adang rouram ngei marama chu keina kaphao juija keina hra ah sem mange.
Kalungshit ulenao ngei oh Muihla hina kutthul maramma jiekka lha rouha, keina nangeita hana maramma dieka dangpi num minge.
Nangei na jat adang changa amleija, nangeita ringchang sum kutta sem hlawangta mokranga lam eja ah ruija numa tukka am he, nangei na dangchou ae.

Keina nangei ta kadangpi num chu Chungthieng muihla na lamkai mee akha na, “Jisu ta sarkou ang no ae” hana atu akha na, “Arengpu Jisu” ta ril shuk nea ang no ae muihla athieng hana lamkai ah no wa chu.
Muihla lam ma pek kutthui hi adang adang am hom meh chuti weta mani lim ha muihla chu akha chakke.
Arengputa domang tullu kom adang adang am hom meh chuti weta arengpu akha ta domange chak.
Mane, mane ang tullu am hom meh chuti weta Chungthieng na limpata mane mane anga pek sha ae.
Meelim ahrat ranga Muihla na mee akha akha chunga ma amha lam ahre-a ripi-ae.
Muihla na mee akha ta chu rouril na rang lungsing la ha pe ae na muihla hana adang akha ta chu lungwar shuk rang pe ae.
Na muihla hana adang akha ta chu ngoiring arat rang pe ae, hana adang akha ta chu dampi hrapi nea rang pe ae.

Na muihla hana atu jong akha ta chu anealah tullu lu rang pe ae. Hana adang akha ta chu Chungthieng rouril hi hrabah ril nea rang pe ae. Hana adang akhata muihla ngei dang nerang thou phou. Hana adang akha ta trong dang adang dang nea rang, akha ta na let nea rang pe ae.
Chutiweta na lim pa hi muihla athieng ha chu akha chak sha ae amo na madit nu juija adang adanga pe ah sha ae.
Khrista hi pum akha hekti ae, kajat ija amhalkom akha chu kajat adang adangna semhalkom pumchu akha chak sa ae.
Chu hekta ani lim hi Jihudi hal jat adang hal ano lea kor hal kor no hal muihla hana pum akha sunga baptias ae pi so ae. Hana ani ta muihla akha chakka minga inn ha bakha rang pe so ae.
Rouram chu pum akha hi kajat akha chakna sem no ae chuti weta kajat ija na sem ae.
Ejonga kae na, kei chu, “Kut nonge chuna pum ma tol nonge,” chuna pum nonge ril chu ngai ang no ae.
Hana ejonga kur na kom kei chu, “Mit no sou chu pum ma tol nonge,” ril chu ngai ang no ae.
Ejonga pum akha hi mit chak lea chu alota amo na thei na ang sha? Hana kur chak lea chu alo ta amo na ariem thei pha nea angsha?
Chuna chu hekta, Chungthieng na maditna juija kajat lim pa hi pum akha chakka sha ae.
Kajat akha chak lea chu pum akha kom wul nea ang no ae.
Chuna sarukka kajat adang adang am hal kom pum chu akha chak sha ae.
Chuna, mit na kom kut kolla ril nea ang no-ae, “Nang kakolla anei rang am noae!” lu na kom ke ta, “Nanghi kakolla aneirang am nongae.”
Hana chakno wa pum ma shultek ti hana tol no lea pum na tullu hi ae nea no weh.
Akha chu ani na haljuija pum ma sintek ta hella hal tek kang am meh, hrano ae tahal pumma kajat akha tana ani na hella an pi-ae.
Chuna ani arha kajatngei hi aneirang am no ae chuti weta ajak atri pekkang wat kajat hana Chungthieng na lello rha-a ajak atri pepia pumma rachun pi ae.
Chuna pum shung hina adang adang hran hlakkang am no ae, kajat lim hi akha lea akha rachun weta anlhak rang sa-ae.
Chuna ejonga pum shunga kajat akhana ana pha lea chu adang kajat lim pa kom na tol ae; Ejonga kajat akha na ariem ma adom pha lea chu adang ngei na kom ariem pha ae.
Nangei lim hi Khrista pum sa ae, akha chu nangei pum hana kajat ae.

Chungthieng na abom shunga lim pa hi amunt acha ah shi so weh. Masha ah ahal sha rui ani shuna pa na rouril ngei, inthum su na pa na chupi takpi ngei, hana nutienga chu atripi tullu lu ngei, hana ana asha hrapi dampi ngei hana meeta sanpi thei ngei hana adang chat trong ta ril shuk nea ngei.
Mani lim ha ahal sha rui hana rouril chupi takpi ngei chak no ae. Hana meelim hi atripi tullu lu rang jaitha pha hap no ae.
Anolea rai eja dampi nea am lea jat adang trongta trongne mee ril na makhai ta let nea no ae,
chuna maru kitek kutthut hata meelung lutto, lim chung rhatek hachu athui a pek lam hi ae
Keina meengei trong eja trongnehal akha chu wanrui ngei trong phao dang halkom ejonga keina lungshi ti am no lea kei hi kanta rasa itta akha rukke.

Keina rouril nea rang kutthul pha hal kom, keina athup rou eja dang nea na am hal kom hana keina ngoiring na jarra mullon eja ta hlonga thingpi nea halkom. Keina lungshi ha am no lea chu kei hi ekom ano weh.
Keina ka am kadon eheilim pe nea hal hana keina katak hi maikang rang phao pe nea hal lungshi am no lea chu kei hi akrat ranga ekom am no weh.
Lungshi ti hi adongthei akha chu ringreithei ae, lungshi na anar am no weh lokchok ti kom am no weh.
Lungshi na nungchan sino ae, matarang chak hal no ae, lungsha ratno ae, hrano rou, sunga shi no weh.
Dramo am no ngei itta ariem ha no ae adiek itta ariem ha ae;
lungshi hi atreem amno ae, akha chu ngoiring, lungden akha chu adongthui hi etikkako atreem naino-ae.

Lungshi hi samla ae hana muihla na rouril pi am ae, chuti weta mani ha apha tante tarang sa ae; trongdang trong nerang kutthul am ae, chutihalko mani ha atreem nai ange, lungshing thei am ae, chu halko naha mang ange.
Chuna ani rouril thei hi kom ani lungshing hi kom ahui chak sha ae.
Chuna rakit ti ha changjui ja, ahui tiha mang ange.
Keina kanao pong leija chu katrong kahal kalung lim hi unga hek ti inge. Atunchu keina ulien kachang juija chu hajong unga lei tullu lim ha housinge.

Rouram chu atun ani na ri ah am hi melsen na thienga ri no hek ti sha ae. Chutiweta anu tienga chu mai lea mai tuk hlak kange. Atun kadang hi chu ahui te chak sha ae chuti weta anu tienga chu keita hrabak ta dang ange hana keina kom hrabak ta dang ange.
Chutiweta, atun chu adiek takka ngoiring lungshi akha chu lungdien inthum hi chu apha chang honna am ha ae chuhalkom nalim chunga lungshi ti na eheilim loktekke.
Lungshi ti hi jullo, chutiweta muihla na pek kutthul lim chunga chu Chungthieng rouril nea rang nalung lutta dijo.
Rouram chu trong adanga tronga am amo ha adang ta tronga am ano weh, Chungthieng kolla sha ae rouram chu atu akha na muihla athieng arat hana adiek athup rou ha ril sha ae.
Chutiweta atu jong akha na Chungthieng marou samlechu malmashi ngei ta thanum thathou pi ah hoi ahoi shukpi ae.
Hana atu jong akha trong danglou ta tronga am lea chu matarang chakkae chuti weta atu yong akha na Chungthieng marouha samma rouril lea chu akoksa lim ta sanna sha ae.

Nangei na trong danglou trong hi keina kom di inge; chuti weta lella kadit chu Chungthieng rou hi samthei akha akha changpi num minge. Rouram chu Chungthieng rouril mee na trong danglou trong mee amo ta lella aman tam tekkae, Rouram chu atu jong akha na rouril ha hrabak ta woiha let pi sier ano wa chu singlup lim na dang nea no weh.

Chuna ulenao nangei am na kaphao juija ejonga keina danglou trong, trong lea chu ekanatna amma meh? Hana keina Chungthieng kol hai thou wa athup rou ril shuk nea no, ano lea, lungsing shukpi nea no ah, chupi chu lea chu ejeranga meh.
Atara am muihla sum hung rasam hi atara shuk pi ano wa chu hung tara mo ano lea rasam tara mo, alo ta dang nea ang meh?
Akha chu ejonga mee akha na trumpet tum jui ja athieng atara theipi no lea chu atuna ral taranga sem sha ang meh?
Chuna chu hekta narouril juija nangna mee dang lou tronga ril lea chu narou ril lim ha thirang karra ariem ma mang ange!
Shimlei chung hina trong adang adang ehekta am hom meh, halim ha artha am lou akha phao am no ae.
Chuna ejong atu motieng akha na rourilweta kei na bahap ta no lea chu amo ha kataranga chu meram adang tina mee ae hana kei kom mataranga chu meeram adang mee ae.
Nangei na muihla athieng hina khuthul phanum shou chu, akoksa ngeita lokpi ranga nangei na eheilim chunga hot na ta sho weh.
Mee dang lou tronga rouril amo na maril rou ha mee na dangpha ta ranga nie shu oh.
Ejonga hihekta keina mee danglou tronga nie lea chu kamuihla na chak ae ah sa ae, chuti weta kadang na artha chu am no ae.
Chule chu keina alota ae ang meh? Muihla tolla lah kom sha ange kalung ah ko bahap ta ah san ange, kamuihla tolla nie ange, akha chu kalunga ko bahap ta ah nie ange.
Nangna nalung lutta Chungthieng kolla domma na nieklei lei a alo ta mee akha na tol weta “Amen” sang ang meh? Amo na naril rou ephao dang no lutta.
Chuna naprathana na leima hra hal kom, adang taranga chu ephao sanna am no ae.
Chungthieng ta kei na ehekta dom minge rouram chu nangei ta hella keina mee ram trong dang inge.
Chutiweta meelim bomtul na chu mee na bahap taranga tronglam ranga chak halkom ril num minge meeta chupi takpi ranga meeram trong lasing katrong ang sarukchu.
Ulenao ngei oh unga ngei hek ta halla am no sha oh, chuti weta hrano taranga chu unga hek ti oh, chuna nahal nalung rang ha alin ashai shuk mee hekti oh.
Hita jiekka shi so ae,
“Arengpu na ril meeram adangei tronga keina rouril
ange ka mee ngei kolla.
Hana meeram adang trong chakka rourillange
chuna phao kom kamee ngei na ngai numno-ae.”
Chuna meeram adang trong hi ngoiringlou ngei tarang sa ae chuna Chungthieng marou sham hi chu ngoiring ngei tarang ae ngoiring no ngei tarang no sa ae.
Chuna ejong singlup lim na rachun hajuija meeram trong dang no rourilla am juija ngoiring no mee ngei na lut jui manita thiempu ngei ae ta rillang no meh?

Chutiweta ejong meelim na Chungthieng marou hi rourilla am lei ah Khrista ngoiring no mee na lut jui mani theichakka rou ha thei pha ah pak am ingeta dangpha ange. Hana mathei rou hana amota routreem ange.
Malung shunga athup limpa ha choi ja shukkange hana amo na mapak lim ril shukka Chungthieng ta mokka, “Adiek Chungthieng hi nangei am na karra am tol ae rillange.”

Ulenao ngei oh hitta karil na chu, nangei na rachun na mokjui ja akha na laa sha mee, adang akha na chupi mee adang akha na Chungthieng athup rou ril shukkange, adang akha na meeram adang tronga rourillange hana adang akha na marou hina rilla artha pe pi ange chuna meelim na abom hina alok ashei shuk kange.
Ejonga atu jong akha meeram tronga rourilla am lea chu mee akha na maril ha hitta rilna ae ta tronglet mee tol anga ae.
Chutiweta atu jong akha na maril na rou ha tronglet pi mee am no lea amo ha Chungthieng lea manui tarang chak so ae chuna amo ha dai ah am su oh.
Mee ani no lea inthum na Chungthieng marourilla am lea chu adang ahre na mani ril rou ha ejongpa meh ta routreem ae anga ae.
Chutiweta ejonga atujong akha na Chungthieng haithou tronglam pha marouril ha ngir ah lea chu rourilla am amoha chan anga ae.
Nangei lim na Chungthieng marou hi rillou oh, makam masam naiya, akha nutieng akha na chule chu nangei lim na thei hlakka thanum thathou ange.
Chungthieng rourillang kuthul pha mee amo ha chu matak na matakta mant nea mee changa ta ae,
maramchu Chungthieng hi achok arel Chungthieng no ae, adai sa ae.
Athieng akoksa limna hitta thinghlak sa ae.
Namei ngei na tulbom shunga dai ah am shu oh, Jihudi ngei roupek nu juija mani ha rouril ngai no ae.
Ejonga mani na ejongpa akha ril num lea chu, mani pashal ta inn na sai shu oh! Maramchu Singlup lim karra nameinu na rouril hi ayakpi sa ae.
Anole, Chungthieng rou pekhi nakolla athouna a meh? Ano lea nakolla chak rou hi phao ah meh?
Anole ejonga Chungthieng marouril langa muihla lamlienga nangta kutthul am hal kom, amona madang pha ang chu ka jiekka kahla rou hi arengpu pek tronglam sha ae.
Chutiweta ejonga amo na karouril hi juinum no lea chu marou ril kom jui pi no oh.
Chuna sharukka kalungshit ule nao ngei oh Chungthieng rouril hi nalung lutta di oh. Hana adang adang trong nea ngei ta kom hamma shi no oh.
Eheilim na hrabakta akha chu masha rui nung nai pi oh.
Ulenao ngei oh, keina nangei ta atun hi angei thei pi num chu nangei kolla ahra tronglam karou ril phur nangei na la weta ngoiringa akha chu chetta nangei ngir oh.
Naha chu ahra tronglam, nangei kolla karil phur ha ejonga nangei na nahata chetta choi ta lea chu sanpi pha ae, ha no lea chu sanpi ha ae, ha no lea chu nangei ngoiring hi ariem shallange.
Eheilim loktekta kapha lim hi keina mathang, mathang nangei ta pe inge ha chu Khrista na ani pak taranga thi pi so ae; jieksha rouna rilchu hekta.
Amo ha chu hlan sunga phum weta rungnie nathum su nie a ringthou so weh jieksha rouna jiekka shi nu juija.
amona Pitar kolla ri pi weta ahalsha rui asom ani ha ta kom ripi-ae.
Hana manu tieng jui mee riyanga ta kom woiha chakka ri pi ae, mani ha ahre chu thi hal kom tamtek pa chu ringa am the songe.
Hana amona Jacob ta ripi ae akha chu ahalsha rui lim ta kom anutienga ripi ae.
Eheilim ma atreem na kei ta kom ri pi ae, keina mee ngei don hekta donphur no halkom.
Ahalsha rui ngei karra kom sin-tekti akha chu ahalsha rui ae ta kom kokphung sukno inge, rouram chu Chungthieng koksha mee ngei ta aol ana pe phur inge.

Chutiweta Chungthieng lungshit na jarra kei hi atunna hita ringa am karinghi pha inge, hana mapek malungshit hina keita ephao wa sui pi no ae hana hutta tieng, keina ahalsha rui ngei karra ratta tullu lu inge. Nalim pa hi kathei chakka ka lu tullu ano ae, Chungthieng na lungshit na jarra kei hitta tullu hi ae inge.
Chuna nahi kakolla thou phao hal kom anole mani kolla phao hal kom na hi so weh nangei kolla kani rouril akha chu na hi so ae nangei ngoiring ang.
Atun hi, ani na Khrista na athi hai thou ring thou na rourilla am sou chu nangei karra ahre na athi sha na alo ta ringa thou weta aring ringchang pha ang meh ta ril mee kom am ma meh?
Ejonga naha adiek tak lea chu hana ril na chu Khrista hi ringthou no ae ti ah sha ae.
Hana, ejonga Khrista hi athi hai thou ring no ae ti lea kani na nangei kolla rourillang ekom am no ae. Hana nangei na kom ephao ngoiring ang am no ae.

Hana chunga Khrista athi hai thou ring so ae kani ril na hi ejonga nangei na athi hai thou ring no ta lea chu hana amo na Khrista ta athi hai thou ringpi no ta lea chu kani hi Chungthieng chunga murthui trongei so ae.
Chuna athi sha ngei hi ring no ta lea chu, Khrista kom athi hai thou ring no ta so ae.
Hana ejonga Khrista na ringthou no lea chu nangoiring hi lechok so weh hana nanghi atun phao sunga pak kum sunga am the songe.
Chu chakno wa Khrista ta ngoiringa thi meelim hi kom manga am so ae.
Ejonga atun tun taranga chak Khrista kolla lungrang am lea chu ani hi meelim karra jaishi tekti ae shimlei chunga.
Chuna adiek tak chu Khrista na athi hai thou ring thou sou chu atu jongpa na athi ah jalla am lea chu amo ha takom ring thou pi ange.
Malmashi hai thou wa athi ti hi thou sou chu, chuna chu hekta akha rukka malmashi hai thou wa athi hai thou aring pha ange.
Rouram chu malmashi lim na Adam kolla tulha weta athi pha ae. Chuna chu hekta Khrista hitta mani na amha jarra ha meelim na kom athi hai thou wa ring thou ange.
Chuna meelim na kom ma tullu nu juija ring thou ange Khrista na meelim matienga ahalpa ae. Hana majung juija chu Khrista ta ngoiring lim kom ring ange.
Hana chu atreem nei ha tung ang so Pa Chungthieng rengram hi Khrista kutchunga pe ange ane jaitha akha chu muihla lamkai meelim ta kom.
Chungthieng amo ta anda lim ta nea ah akae pha thuija to wa shi malim ma Khrista na ronna am mange rengram ha.
Atreem na amo ta anda amo ha ta chu athi kom pha ang.
Jieksha rou na rillea, “Chungthieng na eheilim pa hi makae thuija shi ange” “Eheilim pa” ti hi Chungthieng amo chu tol no weh Khrista thuija am ngeichak kae.
Chuna meesanaopa na eheilimpa chunga dong hekta Chungthieng na eheilim pa chunga am chu hekta eheilim chunga amo na ripta mathui ja shi ange.
Atun chu ejonga ringa thou shir rang am no lea athi ae ta baptias ae ngei chu alo ti ang? Athi lim pa hi ephao ring no lea mani taranga eje ranga mani na baptias ae ah meh?
Hana taranga lea chu kani na eje ranga apha chang honna aol ana pha rang tan na chom ma rollang meh?
Kalungshit uleanao ngei oh, rungnie chang honna athi mai tuk hlakka aminge. Nangei na ani arengpu Jisu Khrista hitta ani ringchang rachon na am hana jara kei na chou thukka ril shukkinge.

Ephisus ram hina malmashi ngei mai ah ejong kei na amatieng hekta, “Ramsha” ngei hekta shulhlak lea chu echu kei na pha ang meh? Chutiweta ejonga athi ngei na ringthou wa aring ringchang pha no lea, hitta rilhlak no meh, “Ani na bakka inna am mei oh, ani hi atukka thi ang sha so weh.”
Lungmo wa am no oh, “Hrano tonpi na ahra nangam mang rang sha ae.”
Hrano pak lampi hai thou wa thingno sha oh, akha chu ahra lungwar tienga lea jou oh, keina nangei ta ajak pha rang rou hi rillinge ha chu nangei ahre na chu Chungthieng ta dang no wa am meh.
Atujong akha na kom sai, “Athi sha na alota ring thou ang meh? Mani ha ejongpa pum ang meh?”
Lungmo ngei oh! Nangei na aleichunga muchi wor juija thi masha ah no wa chu ajiek adon hang no ae.
Chuna nangei na maru worjuija akung apum wor no weh gehu maru ha chak wor ra sha ae anutienga akung tou wa sha ae.
Chungthieng na maru ha ta apum chang ranga madit hana nu juija tou pi hange.
Ringa am lim pa hina atak hi adang adang rukkae Malmashi ngei hina atak na akha, ramsha ngei akha, awa ngei akha, hana anga ngei akha sa ae.
Hana wanram ma pum lea aleiram ma pum kom am mange. Chutiweta wanram ma pum hrat na aleiram ma pum hrat hi adang adange.
Siemnie na kom hata ma hrat na am meh, hla kom ma hrat hata am meh. Hana arshingei kom hata ma hrat am meh, chuna chunga arshi chu adang adanga ma hrat hi am meh.
Nahi hek ti ange athi na woiha lea ah ringthou jui ja ring ringchang pum hi alei hrun sunga ui juija chu athi sha ha ae, chuti weta ringthou juija ring ringchang ha chu athi ti ha ammang no weh.
Ani na phum juija chu leima melshi ah ehekta shul lea, chuti weta ringthou jui ja chu mel hra ah akha chu ehekta rattange.
Anina phum lei ah chu pum ha ae, chuti weta ringa thou juija chu muihla pum chang ange oh weh, pum ha chun chu am mange chuti halkom naha muihla pum chang ange.
Jieksha rou na rillea, “Masha tekti apa, Adam, chu aringa mee ae ta shak sha ae”; chuti weta atreem na Adam hi chu ringchang pe pi muihla ae.
Masha ah muihla na phao no sha ae, pum sha ae hana muihla na rui nunga sha ae.
Masha Adam chu alei takka shak alei hai thou phao sha ae, hana ani su na pa Adam chu wanram tienga sha ae.
Alei ram taranga chak halla am amo ha chu, alei ah shak hekta amo ha mal pi ae. Hana wanram ma hekta mal amo ha chu wanram tieng hai thou jung ae.
Alei ram ma malmashi hekta punchoi dirchoi seng chu hekta ani na wanram ma mee hekta seng ha ei oh.
Uleanao ngei oh hina karilna chu tak lea athee na Chungthieng rengram tung nea no weh. Hana athi na thilou pha nea no weh.
Adiek athup rou hi nangei na thei oh,

ani lim pa hi thi ang no weh atreem na trumpet sharrol tum juija. Ani lim pa hi edang dang hou no wa mit hap hek ta ahlong pha ange trumpet hana tum juija athi sha mee lim pa hi ringa thou ange woiha lea ah athi am mang no ae hana ani lim pa hi hlong ange.
Athi ha na thilou hlong ange. Hana amang hana manglou hlong ange.
Chuna na lim pa hi shuk juija chu amang hana manglou hlong juija chu jieksha rou hi adiek shuk shi jo weh, “Athi ha amang ni jo weh, Ralne ha na rakit pha ang so weh!”
“Athi na nea ha hoija meh?
Athi nane jaitha ha jo meh?”
Athi ta nea chu pak chak sha ae pak ta nea chu Chungthieng tronglam sha ae.
Chutiweta Chungthieng ta dom minge amo na ani arengpu Jisu Khrista jarra ralne ani ta changpi ae.
Chuna kalungshit uleanao ngei oh atri no oh ratta ngir oh, reng tarang nga tullu ha atal adol am no wa ae oh. Nangei na dangpha sho chou ae arengpu ma tullu lu ha ephao arimshal am no ae.
Judiah Chungthieng mee ngei taranga shan nang sum alo ta shuk pi ang meh ta nangei jiek anu juija, Galatiya ngei kolla karil chu hekta nangei na ae anga ae.
Lang maiching nie chang honna nangei na mapha mapha sum anu juija makut makutta hammo adanga shi shu oh, chu lea chu kaphao juija nangei na sum hrai ang darkar am mang no ae.
Keina kaphao nutienga nangei sum pekkang mee ha mel dang pi ange chulea chu amo ta nangei na sum ha Jerushalem ma pe ah hla nea ang chou ae.
Chuna ejonga keikom tancha hlaklea mani ha hitta thing ha ange keikom.
Mesedoniya kathing nutienga nangei am na kei phao ange rouram chu kei Mesedoniya ah thingno ngei no am sho ae.
Kei hi phalbi hla shung hina nangei hitta am ha num minge. Hana nangei na mathangpa kalampi thing ranga shan pi oh chulea chu hoija hal kom, hoija halkom keina thing nea ange.
Arengpu na ngei pi lea chu nangei am na apha atan te am num nonge apha shotta am ha num minge.
Penticos rungnie pha malim chu kei hi Ephesiya ah am mange.
Rouram chu hina ka am lei shunga ehekta alok tullu lu rang lampi akha pe sho weh anda mee eja am hal kom.
Ejonga Timothi nangei am na lampi tienga ah phao lea chu amota ariem ariem ma tungpi oh, rouram chu amo hi kei hekta arengpu tullu lu mee sha ae.
Atu akha na amota hantha ah an no shu oh, malampi ahoi adai thing rang sanpi oh. Chulea chu amoha ka am na ah lea ange Rouram chu kei na amohi tonpi ngei hitta phao ha ange ta halla am minge.
Ulea nao Apollo hi kom apha chang honna atonpi rui weh ta nangei am na thingo ta thanum thathou inge chuti weta ano hi dangpha no the songe mapha ha pha juija amo ha sui no wa thing ange.
Ahra takka am mo, ngoiring taranga atri am no wa ngirro ratta thei oh.
Natullu lu limpa lungshi ah ae oh.
Nangei na Stephanas ngei inn shung dang ange mani ha Akai ah ahalpa Khristen ngei ae chuna mani na Chungthieng mee ngei taranga alo ta tullu lu sha nangei ta keina ni ah aminge.
Hajongei lamkai mee hek ti oh hana mani hitta tullu lu ah hlou ron ha oh.
Ehekta ariem minge kei rouram chu nangei am no lei ah Stephanus, Phorchunat akha chu Akaikus na phao pi ah.
Kei ta ariem pi ae nangei ta ariem pi hekta mani hata mel dangpi oh.
Asia ram shunga am ngoiring ngei na kom nangei ta ariem riemtuk pe ah hla ae, Aquila lea Priscilla nangei na mani inn na tukhlak rel na kom Khristen riemtuk pe ae.
Hina uleanao lim na riemtuk pe ah hla ae, akha lea akha uleanao lungshit hekta riemtuk ae hlakko.
Pol kakut makka na ariem riemtuk jiekka hla inge.
Atujong akha na arengpu ta lungshi am no lea chu amo ta sarkou pha shu oh Maranatha, karengpa jung jou oh!
Arengpu Jisu hina lungshi thei na nangei hitta am ha shu oh.
Khrista Jisu minga kalungshit hi apha chang honna am shu oh.
Chungthieng ahal akha chu ulea nao Timothi kolhai thou wa Khrista Jisu ahal rui. Pol na Korenthiya ah am Chungthieng akok sha mee ngei hana Akaiya ah am Chungthieng mee limta
pathieng ani Chungthieng akha chu Arengpu Jisu Khrista na lungshi adai pek chang shu ah.
Anina Chungthieng akha chu arengpu Jisu Khrista ta ariem ma dom mei oh. Ringrei thei Pathieng sha ae makol hai thou wa eheilim hi ani ta san na sha ae.
Amo na ani aol ana lim hi sanpi ae chuna jarra ani na kom aol ana eja lim ta san nea ah ae. Chungthieng kolla ani pha santhei naha na jarra.
Khrista kolla aol ana sharuk ani ron ha na chu hekta. Chungthieng santhei na hi Khrista kolla hai thou wa ani na ron ha nea ae.

Ejonga ani na aol ana pha lea chu nahana nangta sanpi ange akha chu aring kaeto phao. Ejonga ani na san pi lea nangta kom sanpi ange hana jaitha kom hap pi-ange hana aol ana pha jui ja dong nea rang jaitha kom pha ange.
Chuna sharukka ani lungrang hi ephou linga nea ang no weh anina danga am chu aol ana hina sharuk ron ha lea chu, nang na kom ani hi mee na santhei hi pha tol ae.
Uleanao ngei oh, kani na nangei ta angei thei pi num munge. Asia ram shunga ani aol ana dong lim hi. Hina taranga aol ana kanidang lim hi hal jui ja ringa am mange ti phao lungrang am ni jo weh.
Kani hal chu athi tina kani ta hella thing so weh na lim hi kani hina jar no weh, athi hai thou ringa thou Chungthieng amo chak na ae sha ae.
Chuna hahekti atri pi athi ang phao amo na anita sanpi ae akha chu amo na anita sanpi ange hana woi ha kom amo na sanpi ang songe.
Prathana ae weta kani ta sanpi na chu hek ta kani taranga nie ah am na hi Chungthieng na sangpi ange hana kanita jaihra pe pi ange kani hina sharukka mee eja na ariem ma sanrol shukka dom mange.

Shimlei hina ani lunghal ahra kari juija kani hi leima chouthukkunge. Ani am lungshit hlak hi Chungthieng amo na shilung thienga akha chu routhup roukoi am no pekpi taranga nahi alei ram ma malmashi ngei athei asing ano sha ae.

Kani jiekka hla rou hi nangei na pat nea rang akha chu halla shuk nea ranga sha ae. Chu phao shunga nangei dang chu atan ehak sha ae chuna kahal chu nangei na ripta hal thei ti hi di inge chu lea chu ani arengpu Jisu rungnie tungni ah kani sharukka nangei na kom chou thukkange kani na nangei sharukka chuthuk hekta.
Nangei kolla masha ah phao ange ta keina halla hou phur inge woini tran jaihra nangei pha ranga.
Rouram chu Mesedoniya kalampi thing lam ma, hana ka lea juija kom Judiah ka thing rang sha rukka nangei kolla sanpi rang kom la num minge.

Chuna hijeng kaden sha lim hi angir am no hekta kari pi jui am ma meh? Anolea najongpa lim ha kataranga chak mal jou meh? Keihina oh weh karil sha chu hato ngirra ka-am ngai nonge kati chu ngai no wa ka-am na jarra.
Chungthieng amo chu adiek rou ha chak ril shou chu kei na saro ai ah am minge oh weh kati sha chu ngai nong ti nonge.
Kei katak mak Silase hana Timothi na Chungthieng a sanao pa Khrista Jisu hina rou ril lim pa hi ngainum lea ngainum no ani mak taranga no ae. Amo chu ngai num ma chak am sha ae.
Chuna sharukka Chungthieng amo chu ma saro ei sha chu hata ling no am mang sha ae. Hina sharukka Jisu Khrista hina jarra “Amen” Chungthieng ahung ajai chang shu oh.
Ani ringchang hi Khrista hitta rachun ha so weh ti diekka sempi takpi hi Chungthieng matak mak sha ae.
Anita mitpu changpi shu chak no wa muihla athieng kom ani lung shunga pe pi weta ani taranga amo na wat no wa ham ma shi pi ae.
Korenthiya ah thing ang nong ka ngir ka lung rang hi, kalung dang nea Chungthieng amo ta kei na kok kinge adiek dang ranga.
Kani na nangei ngoiring na mitpa chang tikkae ta ae nonge. Kani na dang unge nangei na ngoiring chetta am hi kani chu nangei ariem na karra riem tol num ma unge.
Chuna woihapa lea ah nangei ajak tuk no ranga nangei am na phao ang ni ange ta kalung ngir shange.
Chuna ejong keina nangei ta ajak tukpi sier lea chu atuna chu keita ariem pi ang meh? Ajak katuk pi amo chakkang no meh?

Chuna sharukka keina nangei am na ka jiekka kahla karou chu, keina nangei kolla phao weta ajak tukpi lea chu amo ha chak sho weh kei ta ariem pi ang mee nangei ha rouram chu kei na dang inge kei na ka riem juija nangei kam ariem tol ae ti hi.
Kajiekka ka hla karou hi kalung tonga mitui tulla leima nangei ariem no ranga kahla na chu, kaden kalung akha am meh, ha chu keina eja nangei lim ta lungshi meh ti dang ranga ae.
Ejong atu jong akha na atujong akha ta ajak tuk pi lea amo na keita ajak tuk pi no weh meelim ta sha ae, atan te chak, (keina rilla aminge keina amota alung tonga am pi num nonge).
Hijong lampi tieng chak meelim na amo ta aol ana pe ah am meh ajou shu oh.
Chuna ehal kom ehal kom nangei na mamaral lim shilpi weh ah hijong ajak tuk no rang thanum thathou pi oh.
Ha lea chu keina dang ange nangei na amo ta diekka lungshi ae ti hi, Amota lungshit rang keina nangei kolla nie ah aminge.
Nangei kolla karil na rou chu, ka chupi katakpi hi nangei na jui ranga thou rang ae mo ano lea eja phao nangei na hina rou wa dang mo ti ha dangnum ma inge.
Chuna nangei ma atujong akha hina maral shilpi thei lea chu keina kom mamaral ha shil pi inge Hana keina shilpi ka chu Khrista maikunga eheilim pa ha nangei taranga shilpi sange.
Rouram chu Saitan ngan lim pa hi ani na dang no ano weh.
Troas ram ma katung juija Khrista hina ahra tronglam karouril jui ja arengpu na tullu lu rang lampi akha pe so weh ta hallinge.
Chutiweta ani ulea nao Titas mel kari no sharukka kalung leima olla mee kolla ahran na rou ril phur ing weta Mesedoniya tienga thing sange.
Chuna apha chang honna Khrista jarra thangshuk maipak pi ah akha chu lam kai pi ah amunt chang honna arengpu amota mel dang pi ah mariem hoi ha kani ta thangpi na jarra Chungthieng amota dom inge.
Ani hi Chungthieng Khrista na pek thou riem hoi hek ti ae sanpi pha sha ngei am na akha chu amanga am ngei mai kunga thei pi.
Amangsha ngei taranga chu athi chunga athi shukpi na thouriem hoi ae hana aring pha sha ngei taranga chu aring chunga aring shiktui riem sha ae. Chuna hijongpa tullu taranga atu na matik cha meh?
Rouram chu ani hi Chungthieng rou hata amant atom te ah choija rol mee ngei ah no weh, chuti weta Chungthieng hla mee shilung thienga mamai kunga Khrista reng masuuk sha ae.
Ani na ani tak makta dom ma am ma meh? Ano lea nangei ta hal anolea nangei taranga atujong akha na ae pi ti hi kani taranga atung am ma meh?
Kani lungshunga atu jongpa na jieksha meelim pa na danga patta am kani abai hi nangei na ae.
Na hi Khrista matak mak na thienga kanita jiekka hla sha so weh, mukka anolea alung chunga no ae aring Chungthieng muihla na malmashi lungshunga jieksha sho ae.
Na kani ril rou hi Khrista jarra Chungthieng kolla ngoiring am sha rukka ae.
Kani na tullu hi ae nea unge ta ephao wa ril shuk rang lung shunga am nonge Chungthieng kol hai thou jung kani nea te hi.

Athar roungir hina tun hlou kani ron nea hi amo mapek chak sha ae naha chu jieksha roukung ha no sha ae muihla sha ae jiek sha roukung na athi ronna pha oh ae chuti weta muihla na chu aring ringchang pe ae.

Roukung ha chu alung chunga jiekka shi ah, apek juija chu Chungthieng ahung ajai na mel mu pi ae chuna sharukka Israel mee ngei na Moses mai hatta mun na an kom nea no ae mani mitna. Ejonga roukunga athi ronna phao hal kom jaitha shukka wak jui ja chu ahung ajai chang na nei ae.
Muihla hina tullu na eja matikka lok tek meh!
Aring kaetto ron na phao ahung ajai tullu hana ae namtha ah shi nea ahung ajai hana hella thing.
Rouram chu mang ang am ha lea ahung ajai hitta apha chang honna am ha lea chu eja ah mahung majai warrang meh.
Chuna mahung ajai hana apha atan te am the shong lea chu eja ah ahung ajai na warra atreem nei no ae.
Rouram chu ani na na lungrang hi na taranga, ani na atri am no ae.
Manga ngai ade awar Moses maisuon ha Israel sanao ngei na ri no rang hlum ma shi Moses jong pa no ae kani chu.
Chuna mani shilung hirra shi ah awoni phao mani na ari sha meelung ngir ha chak pa ah am songe rouram chu Khrista jarra wurra shi pun ha hong so weh ti takpi no songe.
Awoni kom ejonga mani na Moses pek trongshan ha pa lea chu mani shilung ha pun hana hlum ma shi ae.
Chutiweta jieksha rouna rillea, Moses ril phur ha la ah hou ngai ae, “Amo na Arengpu kolla mai hai lea jui ja ahlum pun ha.”
Atun chu, “Arengpu hi chu muihla ae; chuna Arengpu muihla na am na changhon, amunt ha atit rang am no ae.”
Ani lim hi Arengpu hina ahung ajai na awar am pi so hlum ma shi no amai sum hana. Arengpu kolmai thou phao muihla na anita hlong pi so weh mamel hekta mang tek ti mahung majai hana apha chang honna.
Chungthieng lungshit na ani ta tullu hi ae rang pe sha weh chuna ani na hina taranga thadol rang am no ae.

Ani na athup akha ajakpi tullu eja hi nakolla shi anga ae. Ani na Chungthieng marou ha ta diek no wa akha chu mee nam ma ae no weh Chungthieng kolla awar lea adiek hitta ringa am ma ani tak lim na ahra wakhal hal rang hot na ah am meh.
Chuna, ejonga kani ahra tronglam rouril hi theipi no lea amang sha ngei taranga chu thei ang no weh.

Mani na ngoiring nea no weh, rouram chu mani shilung ha hra no hlawang na athim thui ah shi ah. Amo na manita hata pak tullu lu pi ah awar ri pi no wa shi ae. Chungthieng mel mak Khrista hina mahung majai ahra tronglam awar jung hata ri no weh.
Chuna nahi kani na no weh rourilla am hi. Kani rouril chu Khrista Jisu hi arengpu ae ti ah sha ae Jisu majarra kani hi nangei shuk kunge.

Chungthieng amo na ril, “Athem thui hai thou wa awar hana war ange!” awar hata same amo mak hana kani shilung ta war pi ha Chungthieng ano ta mel dangpi rang lungsin pe ah Khrista mai ah mahung majai ha ri pi ae.
Chuna arat jaitha lim hi ani tarang no lutta Chungthieng matarang sharukka alei ah shak bella ani anei adon shi ah sha ae.
Kanita amunt changhonna nam ma shi pi ae chuti hal kom noi chu noi no weh.
Anda mee na shihakti ae ehuti hal kom tonpi kam wat pi no ae. Akha chu ehekta aol ana pe ae chuti hakom tui pi chu am no ae.
Apha changhonna Jisu hina athi sha pum ha ta kani na ronna rollenge chulea chu mani na maringchang hata kani pum hai thou ri ung shu oh.
Kani ringchang limma Jisu taranga khudong chu thi ah ngei kani ringchang hina Jisu ringchang hi ri ranga.
Hina ril na chu, na athi tullu hi kani tarang sha ae, hana ringchang hina tullu chu nangei tarang sha ae.
Jieksha rouna rillea, “Ka ngoiring jarra kei na ril shuk kinge.” ngoiring nga ngei muihla akha chakka. Kani na ngoiring sharukka rou hi kani na ril shuk kunge.
Jisu ta ringthou pi Chungthieng amo ta kani na dang unge hana Jisu hitta kani ta kom ringthou pi weh ta ma am na ah nangei hitta am ha ange.
Na lim pa hi nangei pha rang chakkae hana malungshit hi mee ngei chunga hella, hella tung juija chu mee ngei na Chungthieng ahung ajai hata ariem ma hella dam na chang shu oh.
Hina tarang sharukka kani na nulea ti am nonge kani pum na olla wa hal kom, kani muihla na chu naha, naha rat na change.
Chuna na apha aten te kani ol hina kani ta angakpi ah atreem nei no jaihra pha ange aol hata hella ol tek shai tek.
Kani den na shi chu mitta ri ah no ae chuti weta mitta ri no ha ta ae, na ha chu atreem na apha pha jui ja chak ri pha ange, hana atreem na apha pha juija chu etikom na ha ri pha ang ni jo weh.
Chuna pun na shak inn hekti akha chu alei ah shak inn hina tui juija chu kutta shaklou Chungthieng ta atreem neina thangwan ram ma inn akha am meh ta dange.
Hana wanram ma ani am rang amunt ha hakjou no wa sholla am munge nalei shunga.
Ha chu pun shenga am hal kom pun sheng no hekta am mange.
Rouram chu ani na pun hek ti inn na am lei ah ani na lung olla am meh.
Na ani ta ahlongpi hi Chungthieng amo na thourang ae pi sha ae. Hana amo na ani taranga hamma shi hana taranga ma muihla ha ani ta pe pi ae.
Chuna anina apha changhonna danga am meh. Ha chu echan shotta anina inn na pum am na am lei lim chu Arengpu am na hai thou wa loa ah am meh.
Ani na na hi mitta ri ano sha ae ngoiring jarra sha ae.
Ani na hella di ae ani inn hai thou wa pum na hla ah hou phur weta Arengpu inn na apha chang honna am ha num unge.
Eheilim ta hella kani na inna am hal hana am hal malungshit hata hella di unge.
Ani lim pa hi routreem taranga Khrista maikunga ngir ange chuna meelim pa na ma tullu nu juija pha ange, ejonga ahra tullu lu mo ano lea hrano tullu lu mo ti ha.

Arengpu ta aty ti hina rou wa ani dang sha so weh chuna ani na mee ngei ta kom hlemma am meh. Chungthieng na anita eheilimpa dang sha so weh. Hana keina kom hallinge nangei lungshunga keita hrabakta dange ta.
Kani na kani takta nangei maikung woiha lea ah dom ma nonge chuti weta shilung shunga no lutta awao wa alok sha ngei taranga nangei na dangpi ranga. Nangei lok ranga kani hina rou wa dangpi ah unge.
Chuna shilung adanga kani na halla am hal Chungthieng kolla chu, hana shilung thienga kani hal hi nangei tarang sha ae.
Rouram chu Khrista malungshit na anita huppa shi sho ae rouram chu kani na hitta hal lunge ha chu, mee akha na meelim taranga akha na thi pi so weh chuna meelim hi thi tol sho weh.
Amo na meelim taranga thi pi sho weh chuna sharukka ringa am manita ranga ring no shu oh. Hana thi weta ringthou masharuk taranga hang shu oh.
Ani na atu akha ta an weta routreem ae no shu oh atun hai thou wa. Apha akha chu ani na Khrista ta malmashi mit an na ae phur ae, naha ani na ae no jou shu oh.
Atu jong akha an Khrista hitta am ha lea chu amo ha meethar so weh; ari ha thing so weh, athar ha phao so weh.
Nalim pa hi Chungthieng na ae chak sha ae. Khrista majarra ani na anda mee hai thou wa tonpi chang pi akha chu ani ta pek chu mee adang ngei kom matonpi changpi anga ae.

Ani rourillang chu Chungthieng na Khrista majarra malmashi lim pa hi matonpi changpi sho weh Chungthieng na ani ae pak hi atan te phao shi no weh. Hana amo na ani hi alo ta matonpi changpi meh ti ha rilla am meh.
Hina Khrista hutta kani na rou rilla am munge Chungthieng matak mak na kom ani kol hai thou wa ni ah am meh. Chungthieng na nakol hai thou wa anda mee hai thou wa tonpi wulpi shu oh.
Khrista hi pak am no ae chutihal kom ani sharukka Chungthieng na ani pak sharuk ja tol pi ah amo hitta rachun ha ah Chungthieng adiek ani kom pha tol pi ae.
Chungthieng hitta ani tullu lu hi, hana Chungthieng lungshit pha nangei lim ta ariem sum pi num nonge.
Chungthieng na hina rourilla am meh:
“Nangei ta kahal rang apha
wak jui ja keina thei ah am minge
Nangei ta kasan pi rang apha pha
juija keina nangei ta san pi inge.”
Thei oh! Apha hi Chungthieng lungshit tung rang apha sho weh; Awoni hi nangei ta sanpi rang rungnie sho weh.
Kani na atu akha phao aral am mee di nonge kani tullu hina chuna atu akha takom kae mathui rang lampi sam no rang hot na ah am munga.
Hana hutta eheilim ma tullu lu hi Chungthieng suuk kunge ta ri pi ah am munge, adong thei ah, aol ana pha juija adong ja lou akha chu khudong thit jui ja kom.
Kani ta phitta reija aral inn shunga shi ah dieklou tullu dol pi ah kani na bakno enno no wa tullu ka hella ae.
Kani na, thienga, lungshi thei ah, wakhal halla dong thei ah muihla athieng jarra kani adiek lea lungshit hi Chungthieng suukkae ta ri pi shonge.
Adiek kani rouril akha chu Chungthieng jaitha jarra dramochel hina kani ral ae na chang unge ral ae na akha kani tak ta ngakthuk rang ani mak taranga ae.
Kani ta ajak ati jui kom am meh, hana lungshit no jui kom am meh, kani hita ajak pi jui kom am meh, hana adom jui kom am meh.
Kani ta dang no ae ti ha kom meelim pa na chu danga am meh mee na thi so weta hal, hal kom nangei na ri ah am meh, nangei ri juija kani hi dandi pha ah am hal kani hi athi chu pha no ae.

Na limpa hi edang dang hou no hal kom kani chu apha changhonna ariem ma am munge kani sara mal hal kom kani na chu mee ngeita chongpi unge kani hi ekom am no hekti ae, chuti weta adiek takka chu eheilim pa hi am munge.
Koren na am lungshit tonpi ngei oh, nangei kolla tonpi changa rouril unge; kani lung lokka am munge.
Kani lung hi thinga shi nonge nangei taranga; nangei na ae kani ta nangei lung thinga shi ah ae.
Kasanao ngei hekta halla nangei kolla rourilla am minge chuna chu hekta nangei lunghal kom kani ta ri pi oh, kani na nangei taranga theng lokka honga shi hekta, nalung thong ha lokka hongo.
Ngoiring no ngei hitta mana ah tullu lu ha no oh. Alota adiek lea dieklou na thing ha ang meh, chuna na ha khak ngei no ae? Alota awar lea athiem am ha ang meh?
Alota Khrista lea saitan ngei hlak kang meh? Alo so ae ta ngoiring mee na ngoiring no ngei hitta am ha ang meh?
Alota Chungthieng mok na inn takom hlawang mok na changpi ang meh? Chuna ani aring Chungthieng mokna inna ae, Chungthieng matak mak na rillea,
“Keina ka inn hi kamee ngei
hitta na aring tol ange;
kei hi mani Chungthieng chang ange hana
mani ha kamee chang ange.”
Arengpu na kom rillea,
“Nangei na mani kol hai thou shukko
akha chu adanga nang na mani kol hai thou am mo.
Hana thieng no ephao tong no oh chulea chu
kei na nangei ta la shil pi ange.
Kei hi nangei pathieng chang ange,
hana nangei na kasanaopa kasanao nu chang ange na hi,
Arengpu marou ril ae.”

Kalungshit chim lea rol ngei oh nalim pa hi ani taranga saro ei sha sho weh, chuna sharukka eheilimpa ah ani na anitak makhi thienga shi ei oh. Muihla akha chu pum hi. Hana ani ring hi Chungthieng kolla thienga shi ei oh.
Nangei lung ha kani taranga shi pi oh, kani na atu akha ta lal nonge; kani na atu akh ta kom amang ata shuk pi nonge atu akha kolla kom tan cha lak ranga hot na nonge.
Na karil rou hi nangei ta neinunt pe ah nonge. Amatienga karil chu hekta nangei na kani ta lungshi ah ap ha chang honna ringhal thi hal am ha sharukka ril singe.
Kei na nangei hi sui ang no ae ta halla am minge nangei sharukka kei hi leima lokka am minge kani ae anat eheilim ma kei chu thanum thathou wa am minge. Kei hi ariem na shi hak ti inge.
Mesedoniya ah kani tung shu wai tak phao kani na sol ha no songe. Amunt chang honna aol ana shi hakti ae akha lea akha trong jet hlakka kani lung shunga ehekta ati unge.
Chutiweta Chungthieng amo na kani lung kui sha ta thanum thathou pi ae, Taitas phao na kom kani ta hella thathou pi ae.

Maphao na chakka kani ariem na ah no weh nangei na alo ta amta thanum thathou pi meh ti rou kom kani kolla rilna kom ariem munge maril na chu nangei na alo ta makhai kei ta ri num ma am meh ti kom ril pi ae hana nangei lung ol na, hana kataranga nangei lung olpi chuna tarang sharukka atun kam lei ma ariem minge.
Ka jiekka kahla karou hina nangei lung olpi hal kom hana taranga keina ephao nulea nonge, kei na pel no hal kom nangei ta apha atan ta taranga lung ol pi range ta kei na ri pha inge.

Atun kom kei chu ariem minge nangei ta lung ol pi sharukka no ae. Chutiweta nangei lung ol na jarra nangei na ahlong pha na chang ha, na ajak nangei tukha Chungthieng sem sha ae, chuna kanina nangei kolla ephao amang atah shukpino ae.

Chuna sharukka Chungthieng na pak nangei ajak tuk hana nangei lung hlong na nei ah samla ringchang tuk na change. Chuna taranga ephao pel no rang am no ae. Chutiweta, ajak tuk ringchang na chu malmashi ta athi ha pha pi ae.

Anno Chungthieng na nangei taranga na ajak tullu lu ah meh, eja shilung thienga nangei taranga sem pi ah meh, nangei maral am no ae ti ha dangpi na so weh, hana hajong lungsha, hajang tung hal, hajong naniek hajong dieklou ta dandi pek ranga nadit, nalim pa hana nang natak mak na eheilima aral am no weh ta ri pi ae.

Chuna kei na nangei ta jiekka hla phur hal kom aral ae mee amo taranga no weh hana aral lung halla am mee taranga kom ah no weh chuti weta kani akha chu nangei taranga Chungthieng mit ta dang ranga kei na jiek shu sange.
Chuna tarang sharukka kani na nangei ta thanum thathou pi ah unge.
Hana taranga chak kani na thanum nonge Taitas na kom kani ta ano na leima ariem pi ae nangei na amota eheilim lampi ah shanpi ah ariem tul shukpi ha!
Chuna ejonga kei na nangei jarra makolla kalokna nei inge keina ephao ajak tuk kang nonge hana eheilim ma adiek rou ril chu hekta Taitas maikunga kalok na ha kom adiek chang so weh.
Hana malungshit na hi hella nangai rat na change. Amo na mak thei no wa am na chu alo ta nangei na maril matrong jui ranga thou rang ae mo ti ha, hana nangei na amota atri ajakka hakka am mo ti ha.
Eja ah kei na ariem ma meh. Chuna sharukka keina nangei kolla eheilimpa beija am minge.
Uleanao ngei oh Chungthieng lungshit jarra Mosedoniya ram ma alo tullu lu mo ti ha kani na nangei ta dangpi num munge.
Mani na ehekta aol ana dong nga thinge chuti halkom mani na ehekta ariem meh ha chu mani shilung lokka pek thei na hi, mani na eja sara ringrei hal kom.
Kei na nangei ta chap cha ah rilla am minge mani pek thei hi mani na eja phao pe nea moti ha pe ae, hana ta hella kom mani na mani halla hata pe nea ae.
Mani na kani kolla rillea ha chu Jehudi ah Chungthieng mee ngei taranga kani na sang rang apha te pe pi oh ta.
Na lim pa hi kani hal ta lella sho weh, masha oh chu mani na mani takka arengpu kolla pe mee sha ae. Hana nutienga Chungthieng dit nu juija mani pa mani tak ha kani ta kom pe sho weh.
Chuna na tullu thou pi Taitas kolla nie ah am minge matullu hi chan no ranga akha chu hija lungshi ahra tullu hi ae shu ranga.

Nangei hi leima chonge nangei don lim ma, ngoiringa, rourilla akha chu hakjou no wa san num ma nangei lunghalla kani ta lungshi hi. Chuna sharukka kani na di unge na lungshi tullu hi kom shilung lokka, ae rang.
Keina thingrang hangrang lam shemma shi ah nonge, chutichu mee adangei na eja ah san num ma am ma meh ta ril pi num ma singe. Hana, keina natakta diekka lungshi meh ti ha dang num minge.
Nangei na areng Jisu Khrista ocha ah lungshi mee dang ange. Amatienga machong mareng, nangeita achong areng changpi rang sharukka amo matak mak na sara nouring change.
Kahal ka lung rang chu nakum ma nangei thou phur tullu ha shu pi pa na hella hratekkange. Nangei na tullu chak no lu tullu ha kam nangei na masha ae hana ae num ha kom nangei ae.
Chuna tarang sharukka tullu ha kom shu pi jou oh! Nangei hal nu juija tullu shu rang kom hak jou no wa ae oh. Hana atun na hal nujui ja na am hana ae jou oh.
Nangei na hakjou no wa Chungthieng kolla napek pot ha amena la pi ange na am no pot ha no ae.

Nangei ta pot rit ronpi weta adang ahre ta na kei na shol ha rang ae na ingei nangei na atun apha chu laima tam ma am sou chu, dorkar am ngei ta nangei na san nang hi lei ma ahra tullu sha ae. Hana mani na kom atam am hom jui ja nangei darkar san nange chulea chu nangei akha lea akha cham mana ah san hlakkange.
Jieksha rou na ril chu hekta, “Atam ma homma shi pa na atam am no hek ta, akha chu atom te shi pa na kom atom te am no ha jong pa ae.”
Keina Chungthieng ta dom minge nangei ta kahal hekta Taitas lung shenga kom mahal pi sharukka!
Kani hlem hi amo na ariem ma ngei pi chak no wa, amo matak mak na kom nangei am na thing num ma malung ngir taranga kom.
Amo hitta mun ha ah abom lim pana hra marouril thei na sha rukka ehekta ajak ati, shak aton pi hla inge.
Hana chakno wa, Areng mahung majai lungshi tullu hi ron na kani hitta thing ha rang abom ngei na halla angei pek mee ae. Kani na nangei ta san num meh ti kom dang ranga.
Apam am no lutta nangei pek ha kani tullu lu juija mee na jet no ranga ae.
Kani hal chu Chungthieng ningtienga chak ahra ano lutta mal mashi ningtienga kom ahra taranga sha ae.

Chuna tarang sharukka kani ulea nou ha nangei am na hla unge. Amo ta kani na leima chang an sho weh lei ma tamma hana amo hi nangei ta leima san num ma am meh. Hana amo hi atun chu nangei ta leima tam ngoiringe. Hana amohi nangei ta san rang hakjou no wa am meh.
Taitas chu kei hitta tullu ron ha katon pi ae nangei tullu san ranga. Hana adang ton pi ngei chu abom ngei ahut shilla khrista ahung ajai ron na phao rang kani hitta thing ha unge.
Manita nalungshit ha ri pi oh, chulea chu abom limpa na na sharukka kani lokka am hi sui no wa dang ange.
Judiah ah Chungthieng mee ngeita nangei san na rouram ma nangei ta keina adiek takka chu jiekka hla rang darkar am no ae.

Keina dang inge nangei na san numma am ha. Chuna tarang sharukka Mesedoniya meengei maikunga nangei sharukka keina leima lokkinge. Keina rillinge, Akaiah uleanao ngeita, “Nakum hai thou wa mani na san num ma meh,” atam pa na hakjou no wa.
Atun chu uleanou ta nangei am na ah hla inge karil chu hekta nangei na san pi ange, hana taranga kei na leima lokka aminge nangei sharukka chuna nangei na ariem shalla hla pi no oh.
Chutihalkom ejonga Mesedoniya mee ngei hitta keina nangei am na phao ha weta nangei na ephao san rung am no weh ta dang pha lea chu kani taranga eja ah ajakpi meh. Nangei ajak tuk ranga rilla nonge.

Chuna taranga kani matienga ulea naou tonpi hitta masha ah hla inge nangei na pe ange ta saro eisha ha thourang ae hak rang. Chulea chu katung juija eheilim thourang ae ah am rang. Chuna nangei am sharukka pe ah no lutta pe penum ti pa chu pe ah ae ta dang ange.
Makno oh, muchi atom te wor pana atom te lukkange Hana muchi atam wor pana atam ma lukkange.
Meelim pa na malunga mahal nujuija pe shu oh, pe num no wa peh akha chu pekno ngei no ae ta pe no shu oh, Chungthieng dit chu ariem ma pe meeha ae.
Chungthieng chu nadarkar ta lella pe nea ae. Hana chu nangna nadarkar chak no wa ahra tullu taranga kom lella nangna pha ae.
Jieksha rou na rillea,
“Darkar am mee ta amo na apam am no lutta pe ae,
malungshit chu atreem nei no ae.”
Nangei bakrang butol akha chu muchi worrang pe ah am Chungthieng na nangei darkar lim pa akha chu atam tou pi weh ta atam muchi hom pi ange apam am no lutta.
Amo na achong areng shukpi ange apha chang honna apam am no na am ranga chulea chu kani kol hai thou wa mani pha sharukka meelimpa na Chungthieng ta dom mange.
Na nangei tullu lu hi darkar am mee na pha chakno wa, Chungthieng kolla nangei na hella nangei pek kom change.

Na nangei tullu hina nangei takta mee ngei na Chungthieng ta dom mange rouram chu Khrista ahra tronglam hina rou nangei jui akha chu ngoiring, hana apum am no lutta mani hitta akha chu atu akha hitta kom sharuk jak hlak hi.
Mani na nangei taranga lung lutta nie ah am meh, rouram chu Chungthieng na malungshit adanga nangei chunga ri pi sharukka.
Ani na Chungthieng dom ha ei oh amant shalla mapekpi hina taranga.
Pol kei katakna nangei kolla Khrista hina lungnem lungdai lim jarra nangei hitta am ha ngei ranga leima tolla kei na nangei ta thanum thathou rang mokka am ming.
Nangei kolla kaphao juija keita namphu ah aol ana pe num nonge. Rouram chu keina dang inge atujong manina keita aleiram ma tah hekta hal mee amo ta chu kei na kom aol pe num mange ta.
Nahi adiek takkae, roulam chu ani hi aleiram ma ringa am meh. Chutiweta ani na aleiram ma hekta shullang no sha ae.
Ani shul hakna ralpun ralni hi alei ram ta no weh chuti weta Chungthieng jaitha ralpun ralni sha ae. Nahana arat ralmunt na kon akha chu dieklou trongjet na kom ani nea na change.
Chungthieng mai kunga ehekta lok chok thukka ngirlim ta kai ah tum mange. Hana mani hal lim pa ha lah ah hou weta khrista rouril jui pi ange.
Chuna nangna eheilim najui shu nutienga chu kani na aril juino mee taranga dandi pek rang som sha shi so weh.

Nangei na chu au wao wa am ha chak an na am meh, atu jong akha na kei chu Khrista mee inge ta rilla am ha chuk. Ehekta hra so weh woiha te chu amo kom lea ah halla an shu oh ma lu tullu ha, rouram chu ani hi khrista mee sha ae.
Rouram chu keina ephao ajak nonge chu, chunga ejonga keina aphao sha hal ling kom, areng na anita pek ae nea ha ane ha chu kuipi rang no weh semkat shakat rang sha ae.
Ka jiekka kahla rou hi nangei atri rang chu kei na changpi num nonge.
Atujong akha na chu rillea, “Pol jiekka hla rou hi kal hai shullea, chuti weta amo mak na ani hitta am hajuija chu ehekta shul mee akha chu marou lim kom alak rang ekom am no weh!”
Hajongpa mee na halne anga ae ha chu ephao thei hlak na am no weh, kanina nangei karra am tolnowa jiekka hla rou lea kani na nangei hitta am ha juija lu tullu ha.

Routakka chu kamee na mani hitta rishit rabutta no weh akha chu hran pi no weh mani thei chakka leima wanga am munge ta halla am manita. Mani ha eja ah apang mee mo weh! Mani na mani theichak ka mani changa routreem ae weta mant! Theising sem ngei ha
kani taranga chu ehal kom, ehal kan kani na alok shu halkom kani na rol ha lallang no weh Chungthieng na pekka shi amunt hai thou wa akha chu ha shunga nangei kom tolla am meh.
Chuna nangei hi ha shunga am tol shou chu, Khrista ahra routhar kanina nangei am na ronna phao jui ja mani am na aral pha ang no weh.

Chuna Chungthieng na pekka shi hai thou wa hella adangei na tullu lu nea hal kom kani lok rang ekom am no weh, hana hutta kani na am lungrang chu nangei ngoiring hella hang juija nangei shunga kani na hella loktekti tullu lu nea ange apha chang honna Chungthieng na pekka shi shunga.
Hana chu kani na ahra routhar hi rou ril thing ange nangei am na hella ram adanga kom chuna hana tullu taranga akha chu mee adang ngan ae shu na taranga nangei lok rang ephao am no weh.
Chutiweta jieksha rou na rillea, “Atujong na lok num lea chu reng tullu lu na rou hana chakka lokkanga ae.”
Chuna shurukka arengpu na mee hatta hra so weh hal mee amo ha routakka amo ha angai mee so weh mee hana mathei chakka kei chu ngei mee shinge hal no lea chu
Lungshi ngei pi oh, kashul na am juija keina nangei ta malim ha dong nea ranga nie ah am minge.
Chungthieng hekta keikom anar rattinge nangei hi athieng namei nu ta taichang ranga spa akha na rilla shi hekti ae amo ha chu khrista matak makkae.
Khrista kolla athieng na shihakta nangei am ringchanga wakhal ha mut pi ange ta kei na leima atri inge, ashing arul na murthei weta Eve ta meenam hekta.

Rouram chu Jisu minga adanga phao atujong akha rouril kom nangei na dongthei ah ariem ma dong chou ae kani kolla hai thou wa nangei lak ahra trongshan muihla ano lutta adang rou ta kom nangei na sar so chou!
Anno kei chu ahal sha rui lim ngei kar shunga kom leima shul mee inge ta kom kei na halnonge.
Chuna keina katronglo ah trongthei angthei no mee hal kom eheilim ma kani na nangei ta athup am no lutta dangpi shange.
Nangei kolla Chungthieng ahra trongshan karouril hina amant kom eko pha nonge. Kei katakna nangei kolla nolukka katak hi leima maru oi mee ae ta kahal hina aral jo meh?
Nangei karra tullu lu ah ka am lei kom abom adang ngei na sum pe ah am meh, routakka chu nangei ta san ranga kei na ru ah am minge.

Akha chu nangei hitta ka am ha lei apha ah kom kadrakar sum ha nangei kolla san pi ranga hal nonge Mesedoniya am ulea nao ngei na drakar am sum lim pa kom ronna phao pi ae, amatieng hai thou wa akha chu anutieng eja ah kom, chuna nangei kolla ephao rillang nonge.
Kakolla am Khrista adiek hana jarra nangei kolla saro ei ah am minge ha chu nataranga kalokna hi amunt chang honna.
Nahi karil sharukka keina nangeita lungshi no wa meh? Chungthieng na danga am meh keina nangei ta lungshi ti ha.
Atun na ka lu tullu hi hitta ae ah am mange, rouram chu adang rui ngei na rillea kani kom mani ae hekta kani kom chap mana unge ta eko no shalla chouthuk na change.
Mani ha chu adiek ahalsha rui no weh, mani ha chu dieklou rui ngei ae, mani tullu sharukka murthui ah rou ril akha chu mani thei chakka mel hlong pi ah khrista ahalsha rui sha ngei.
Nalim hi angak shukrang am ae, rou ram chu saitan na kom matheichak wanrui ngei mawar hekta war pi nea ae.
Chuna sharukka nahi alok tullu chu ano weh, ejonga masuuk ngeina mel mani thei chakka dramochel suuk sha hal kom, Atreem na apha ah chu mani tullu lu na juija mani na hamak pha ange.
Kei na lea ah rillinge, atu akha na keita apang mee ae ta hal no shu oh, chuti weta ejonga nangna apang ae halla am la lea chu hana taranga kei na atit te hal kom kachou thuk rang am meh.
Karilla ka-am karou hi rou takka chu arengpu na kei ta dit lou rou sha ae. Nahina taranga kachou thuk hi kei hi apang mee akha singe.
Chutiweta mee eja na mee akha changa ril hlak na akha hekta keikom rilla singe.
Nangei chu nangei theichakka dong leima athei asinge chuna sharukka nangei na apang ngei hitta ariem ha nea ae!
Nangei adang na chu atu jong akha na tierra hla halkom, napha phung shuk mee na pha hal kom, changa mant pi hal kom, han tha ah an halkom anolea namai ah nabe benghal kom,
Hojong tullu lu ranga ani na leima atri ae, kei chu ajak shange hana kaluttang hi.
Chutiweta atu jong akha na thouna hra ah ejongpa akha taranga chou thuk lea chu keikom atri nonge apang ngei hekta rilla am singe.
Mani ha Ebriya ngei meh? Kei kom ah inge. Mani na Israel neh? Keikom ah inge mani ha Abraham atu ate ngei meh? Kei kom ah inge.

Mani ha khrista asuuk ngei meh? Kei na awet hekta chuti weta mani ta hella shukha ah inge ehekta akal tullu kom lu inge raen inn shunga kom leima tam am singe keita mol eja bakpi meh. Keita apha chang honna athit rang phao ae sho weh.
Jehudi ngei ta phit pi ranga woinga keita pe pi ae hana mani mol takka shom thum aku phit ranga ae.
Roman ngei na phit ranga woithum hana woiha kom alunga keita denge woithum kung kui ah, tui shunga jan akha nishun akha am minge.

Kashe kahong juija tui lokka khudong thi ah kapha eja akha chu aru thei ngei kut chunga aol ana, ani tonpi Jehudi ngei lea jat adang ngei kut chunga kom, hana hupi shunga kom tuipi tuilen na kom hana dieklou tonpi thanrul ngei kolla kom.
Hana tullu ajai aol eja apha akha chu inno jalno eja wontam tuiral eja kadong, ka won hopa kabak pha no na eja am rang amunt am no punshal nishal eja.
Rilshuk ngei no eja, rungni chang honna ka abom ngei taranga hullang nong ti nea no kahal eja.
Atumo akha tieng na shulla am juija kei kom shul tollinge hana atumo akha na pak kum shunga lamkai jui ja kalung hi leima ollinge.
Ejonga kei no chouthuk ka ta lea chu kakhouthuk ranga chu kei hi eja ah shulla am ma meh ta ri pi ange.
Pathieng Chungthieng akha chu arengpu Jisu na jaihra pek chang shu oh, hana kei hi murthei ah ril nonge ti kom dang ange.
Damaska ah ka am lei ah Rengpa Aretas Governor na hupi lamthong phao keita mant ranga hakka am meh.
Chutiweta lan am na bi inge weta inn banga onga makol hai thou wa tan na thing singe.
Kei hi leima chouthukrang am meh, ahra tullu lu no phao shunga, chuti weta atun hi Arengpu na keita ripi akha chu dangpi rou hi rillang shange.
Ka dangpha ah akum ashom inly shu khristian spa akha wangtekti thangwan na rui ah kollea. (Keikom nahi routakka shuk mo shuk no mo dang nonge, ano lea ma ripha mo, Chungthieng amo na chak dange).

Woihapa ko keina lea sierra keina dang inge na spa hi Paradise ah rui ah thinge (woihapa kom na hi routak mo routak no mo ano lea maripha mo, Chungthieng amo na chak dange). Hana mathei pa ha chu tronglo wa sem nea no weh hana malmashi murra kom ril shuk thei no weh.
Chuna masha rukka kei hi leima chou thukinge chuti weta kei katak taranga chu chouthuk nenge kei hi eja ah tolla am ma meh ti hi na chakkae.

Ejonga keina chouthuk num halling kom kei hi apanga chu ah nonge rouram chu adiek rou ha kei na rillang inge chuti weta keina chou thukkang nonge rouram chu atujong akha na keita wanga dom ma shi hi di nonge chuna amo na keita maripha akha chu matheipha hana rou chak rilha di inge.
Angakpi tullu nangei kolla kari pi na sha rukka kei hi nangei na domma ka chouthuk na chang ange ta katakka rai akha na saitan wanrui ngei na rouril hekta angai thei pi ah shi ae.
Hina tarang sharukka woithum Reng kolla niek inge ka dam rang.

Chutiweta Reng na kakolla rillea nachunga kalungna na shi hakta am meh rouram chu kajai tha na nashul na ah rat pi ange chuna sharukka Khrista majaitha na koshul na changhonna am tol ange ta kariem na chang inge.
Khrista taranga aol ana kapha jui ajak katukjui mee na keita aol pek jui ja kapel na chang inge rouram chu hella kashul jui hella karat na chang inge.

Kei hi nangei na apang mee nam ma wulpi sho chou, chuna kei hi apang mee chang singe routakka chu kei hi nangei na dom ma shi ang mee sha ae ha chu kei hi ekom ano hal kom ahalsha rousam rol ngei nu juija kei na ephao nulea nonge.
Routakka chu keina nangei maikunge ahalsha rui akha hekta angakpi tullu eja ri pi shange.
Alo ta nangei na adang churek ta leima sathi ah ae na am ma meh, keina nangei kolla sum chunga sanpi rang ano wa chu, chuna taranga keita nangei na ngakpi oh.

Nahina woithum shuna pa nangei am na phao tikta thourang ka ae hi ae. Chuna nangei kolla ephao ka niek rang am no ae nangei tak ha chak di inge, nangei sum ha no weh, routakka chu asanao ngei na manu mapa ngei taranga hom ma shi ang no wa ae manu mapa ngei na asanao ngei taranga homma shi anga ae.
Ka am kadon lim hi nangei kolla ripta pe ing weta kei hi leima ariem mange katak phao wa, nangei ta san ranga. Nangei na kei ta lungshi pi oh rouram chu keina nangei ta leima lungshi inge.
Nangei na ngai pi oh, keina nangei kolla pot rit akha phao pe nonge chutiphao shunga atujong akha na chu mur thui ah kei na nangei hi changa mant pi hekta halange.
Kei na kahla rouril mee atu akha na kani tancha lak rang tullu lu jo meh?

Taitas ta thing ranga keina amota hlem ma hla inge hana adang Khristen kom amo hitta hla inge nangei na ril nea ang chou meh Taitas na tan cha la sho weh ta? Kei akha chu ano na kanui akha chak hek ta tullu lu no wa meh?

Nangei na chu halla kom ngai ae kani tak ah ngak thuk ranga nangei mai kunga ae ah mo ta, naha ano weh! Kani rouril lim pa hi Chungthieng maikunga khrista na ril pi num rou ha chak ril unge tonpi ngei oh kani tullu lu lim pa hi nangei ta san rang chakkae.

Atun ati ah ka am chu amunt hana katung juija ka ae pi num no ha nangei na ae ah am hana nangei na kom kei ta an jui ja nangei hitta ma na no wa tung ti hi. Hana nangei karra trong han hlakka am anar hlakka am lungsha hlakka am hana matarang chak hal hlakka am ajak pehlakka chou thukka mee hrano rang chak rou rille an monge ta leima ati inge.

Mathangpa kaphao ang hi leima ati ah am minge, kaphao juija Chungthieng na nangei lim maikunga ajak tuk pi angeta akha chu pak tullu lu ah am the ngei taranga shilung hlong no ngei taranga vokno namei apa dang hlak no ngei akha chu hajong hrano tullu taranga kei hi trapange ta.
Nahina nangei am na woithum shu na kaphao ae, “Chuna maral chang honna meelung ngir mee ani ano lea hella pepi ta sho weh,” jieksha rou na ril chu hekta.

Kei na nangei kolla ril num minge ama tienga pak tullu lu mani ta lim ta akha chu adang malim ta, woini na pa kaphao lei ah karil sha sho weh nangei kolla, chutihalkom woiha kei na nangei kolla ril sier ange kathing shu waitakka akha mathangpa kaphao jui ja chu atu akha dandy hai thou hella thing nea ang no weh.
Nangei lim na dang ange khrista na keita trongpi ae ti ha. Amo na nangei hitta am juija kom amo chu shulla am no weh. Hana hutta amo na ma nea jaitha nangei ta ripi ae.

Amo na khross chunga leima shulla thi halkom Chungthieng jaitha na amo ta aring ha pe pi ae amo hitta munt ha ah ani kom shul sha halkom, nangei hitta ani mari hina ani kom Chungthieng jaitha pha ringchang pha ange.
Chuna natak na natakta routreem ae ah akha chu chang anno, nang hi ngoiringa ringa am che. Ano lea Khrista na am na ah ringa am mo ti ha? Anolea na ha ani jo meh.
Keina ngoiring inge ha chu ani hi nea no ngei chu ano weh.
Chungthieng kolla kani na nie ah am munge nangei na hrano tullu lu no rang anina thangshuk maipak sho weh ta ri pi rang no weh ani na no jui ja kom ani na adiek tullu lu ah am ranga sha ae.
Rouram chu ani na adiek tullu ta ngei no rang am no weh, adiek tullu ha chak am manga sha ae.
Kani na kom shul juija leima ariem munge rouram chu nangei chu ratta am meh, chuna kanina nie ah am munge nangei kom mapong pha mee chang ranga.

Chuna tarang sharukka kei na nangei kolla am no jui ja na rou hi jiekka hla inge. Hina sharukka nangei am na katung juija nangei kolla keina Reng na kei ta pek ane angam rou kalla ril no rung sha ae Na lim pa hi nangei ta semkat shakat rang sha ae nangei ta thugai rang no sha ae.

Chuna atun chu ulea nao ngei oh hran sai oh nu! Mapung pha rang ratta hotna oh, karou ril lim jui pi oh, akha lea akha ngei hlakko dai ah am mou oh, akha chu Chungthieng hina lungshit akha chu adai na nangei hitta am ha shu oh.
Akha lea akha riemtuk hlakko ulea nao akha lungshit hlak hek lungshi hlakko.
Chungthieng mamee lim na nangei ta riemtuk pe ah am meh.
Chungthieng lungshit akha chu.
Reng Jisu Khrista ringrei ngei akha chu muihla athieng pa na nangei lim hitta am ha shu oh.

Ahalsa rui Pol mee na hla ko ano, mee na shukpiko ano, chuti weta athi hei thou ah ringthou Arengpu Jisu Khrista akha chu mapa Chungthiengna kei itta amha athieng insung limna Galatiya ah am akoksha meelimta ariem tronglam lan unge.
Ani Pa Chungthieng akha chu Arengpu Jisu Khrista na nangei limta adai pek changsu oh.
Anita atun riya hrano meerul hei thou wa sanpirang Khristana ani Pa Chungthieng ahal anu jui ah matakmak ani pak tarang pepiso-ae.
Chungthiengha atreem naino wa loktek seitek su oh. Amen.
Keina nangeita ngak ing ae, tichu Khrista mayarra nangeita kokpipa amota hla houweta adang ahra rou nu yuihi.
Routakka chu ahra rou adangti am no ae. Chutiweta mee ahre na nangeita lunglong piweta Khrista ahra rou hita ngainum norang ae ah ameh.
Kani nohal awantinga ruina halko kani chupiphur ahra rou alou chupi lea chu amoha sarmei hurra aol pha su oh.
Kanina amatingko nangeita rilsong ae, atunko keina woiha lea rilla amsir-ing ae; atuyongna nangei ngeisa ano ah adang ahra rou suilechu amoha sarmei hura aol dongsu oh.
Meengeina hra ae ta rilranga keina nahi rila meh? Ah no lea mee ngeina ayatrangchak ae ah am ma meh? Ano sa ae! Keina hita ae ah amlea chu kei Khrista rui ah ni ange.
Keina riltikke Ulenao ngei oh, ahra rou nangei kolla kasuihi mee kolhei thou wa shuk ano ae.
Mee kolla hei thou wa kapha kom ano ae, atu akha na kom keita chupi ano ae. Hilim hi Jisu Khrista matakmakna keita ripi sa ae.
Keina Jihudi darmo ah ratta ka am lei ha nangei nako dangha sa ae. Keina karat mahei choishukka Chungthieng akoksha meengeita ringrei lungsi dangno wa aol ana phapi ing ae.
Keina Jihudi darmo akha chu kapa kapu ngei thingphur aephur limhi keina apha hana karul ngei karsunga keina aluching chang inge, tullu ae tek ing ae.

Chutiweta Chungthiengna malungsit yarra matullu aerang keita donmating hei thou wa halpi so ae. Mahal anu jui ah keina Jihudi lou adang yat ngei kolla mahra rou hi suiranga masanao paha keita ripi so ae.
Atu malmasi akha ninga ko trong choh thieng nong ae.
Keina Jerusalem ma thingweta kamatinga ahalsa rui ngei ninga ko trong lathing nong ae, keina anatta Arabia ah thingweta Damaska tieng lea ing ae.
Kum thum nutinga Jerusalem ma Pitar kolla rou dangranga amo itta hapta ani phur ing ae.
Arengpu Jisu anaopa Jacob ano ah ahalsa rui atu akha ko tukhlak nong ae.
Chungthieng maikunga karil hi ae, keina kamur thei ah rilla ah nong ae.
Hina nutinga chu keina Siriya akha chu Siliki ramsunga thingphur ing ae.
Apha hana leiya Judia a akoksha ngeina kamel dangno ae,
Meengei na rilchak, manina thei ae, “Mee hina amtinga anita aol ana peweta ani ngoiring yunna houpinum ha atunchu amona suiya am ae,”
chuna mani na kayara Chungthiengta lokpi seipi ae.
Kum asom inli nutinga keina leya Barnabas akha chu Taitas ko ruiya Jerusalem ma thing ing ae.

Keina Kathinghi Chungthieng na ril; anu jui ah thing ing ae. Alu ching mee ahre kolla keina adang jat ngei ninga ahra rou kasui ha manita dangpi ing ae. Amating hal atun hal ka ae tulluhi keina arimsalla ae tichu changnum nong ae.
Katonpi Taitas amohi Grik ahalko amota asartan oh ta rilnonge.

Mee ahrena chu ae pi num ae, maramchu manina ngoiring tonpingei hekta hungthei saweta trongru cholla kani kara tolweta Jisu Khrista kolla amweta pha ariemha chanpiweta manina kanita kor chang ranga ae.
Chutiweta ahra rou hi kani kolla lingno lutta amranga manita apha atante phao penong ae.
Chuna hana am aluching ha keina chu mani ta aluching chingno tihi iko lelhlak pinong ae, Chungthieng na mee mel anweta routreem no ae akha chu mani katarang iko aepi nea no ae.
Akhatienga Chungthieng-na keita adang chat ngei ta ahra rou suirang tullu pe ae tihi manina ripha ae, Pitar ta Jihudi ngei kolla ahra rou suirang tullu pe ae.
Maramchu Chungthieng marat hana Jihudi lou chat ngei taranga keita ahal rui changpi so ae akha chu Pitar ta Jihudi ngei tarang ahal rui changpi ae.

Hana alu ching ae ta am Pitar, Jacob akha chu Johon na keihi Chungthieng na hi ma tullu lu ranga peso weta dangpha jui ah manina atun chu ani akha rukta tullu lu ha tonpiso ae ta, dangna changa ariem ma Barnabas kanuita riemtuk pi ae, Barnabas lea kanui na adang chat ngei kolla akha chu manina Jihudi ngei kolla tullu lu sei oh ta ngaihlak song ae.
Sara amno neno ngeita sanpi ti ka aenum mak maninako ae ei oh ta rille.
Antiyok ka Pitarna wak ah keina amota mee ngei maikunga ran ing ae, maram chu amo hi thienga lalle.

Jacob na hla mee ngeina amunt hana tungmating, Pitar na adang jat ulenao ngei hitta bakha ennha ah am ae, meengei na hana tungyui ah Pitar na ma am na hei thou wa adang jat ngei itta bakha ah eenha ah am no hekta sonna lea ae, asartan no ngeita atit yarra.
Jihudi ulenao ahreko Pitar hungthei sa hekta ae ae, Barnabas ko naha riweta alung longtalle.

Manina ahra rou hi diekka thingnoha kariyui ah Pitarta manilim maikunga rilling ae, “Nangchu Jihudi akha che ae, chuti weta adang chat ngei hekta am che ae, Jihudi ngei hek tino che ae, hatilechu nangna adang chat ngeita Jihudi hekta ngai nea ang cha meh?”
Routak ka anihi adonhei thou wa Jihudi sa ae, “Pakchel gentel” ngei ha ani chu ano sa ae.

Anina dangpha ne-ae tichu Jisu Khrista ta ngoiring hana yarra Chungthieng hitta munha ampi ah adiek changpi ae, etika ko rouphun ril anu jui ah tullu lu hana ano sa ae, anita adiek so ae ta Chungthieng na lakpiranga Jisu Khrista ta ngoiring ung ae. Maramchu atu akhatako tullu lu weta adiek akha so-ae ta lano ae.
Chutilechu anina Khrista hitta diekka am harang ae jui ah anihi yaisi gentel ngei hekti ae halea chu Khrista hi pakchel ngei rui ayo meh” eko ano ae!
Keina therra kahousa rouphun ha keina woiha leya sathou sirle kei hi yaisi ing ae ti hi muhsang ae.
Rouphun hina maram ma thukka hal lea chu Kei, hi athi sa sang ae. Rouphun mak hana keita thatsa so ae. Chutile chu Chungthieng hitta ringha ranga Khrista hitta Khros chunga thiha sang ae.

Chuna keina karinghi kei ah no ae Khristana kasunga ringa am ae. Atun ringa am karing changhi, Chungthieng ma sanaopata ngoiring yarra ringa am ing ae, amona keita lungsi ae akha chu maring changha kataranga pepi so ae.
Keina Chungthieng lungsit yarhi yunna hounong ae, chuti weta eyongpa atuyong akhana rouphun hana yarra Chungthieng itta adiek ha lea chu Khristana thit hi arimsal so ae.
Lungmoh Galatiya ngei oh nangeita atuna lungmoh pi ah meh? Nangei maikung takka Khrista na Khros chunga thit ha!
Rillou oh nangeina rouphun tullu ae weta Chungthieng muihla pha chou mo ano lea ahra rou thei weta ngoiring pha chou meh?
Alo wa haya ah lungmoh ah chou! Chungthieng muihla thou weta nangei rat na shupi ang yo chou meh?
Nangeina aol ana haya mahei dongweta eko ano ah arimsalla changpi ang yo chou?
Nangeina rouphun tullu ae sarukka Chungthiengna muihla pea nangei sunga anealah tullu ae chou mo ano lea ahra rou theiweta ngoiring sarukka mo ae?
Abraham ae phurha halla ann oh, athieng abai na hita rille, “Amona Chungthiengta ngoiring ae chuna amota Chungthieng adiek mee ae ta lapiso ae.”
Nangeina dang jou oh, ngoiring lim Abraham sanao ngei sa ae.

Athieng abai sunga hita jiek phur ae, ngoiring jara gental limko amo itta adiek changpi ang ae hina sarukka athieng abai na Abrahamta ahra rou dangpi phur ae, “Nangei jara Chungthieng-na malmasi limtako yaihra pe ang ae.”
Abraham na ngoiringa yaihra pha ae, chuna ngoiring lim hako amo hekta yaihra pha ang ae.

Rouphun na ril tullu ae weta aring pha aeta halla am lim sarkou tukkae. Maramchu athieng abai na rille, “Atu yongmeena rouphun abai sunga jiekka silim jui no lea chu amoha Chungthieng sarkou tukka am ae.”
Chuna rouphun yarra atu akha nako Chungthieng kolla adiek chang nea no ae. Maramchu athieng abai na rille, “Ngoiring yarhana Chungthieng kolla adiek mee changa ring pha ang ae.”
Ngoiring ah no achu rouphun hana eko ae nea no ae. Chuna sarukka athieng abai sunga rille, “Rouphun hana rillim yuine mee hana aring pha ang ae.”
Ani chunga rouphuna phapi ang sarkou ha Khristana ani tarang phapi so ae, maramchu hita jiekka houphur so ae, “Khros chunga thi mee amoha sarkou tukkae.”
Anina ngoiring yarra Chungthieng muihla pharang akha chu Abraham phaphur yaihra ha gental ngeiko pharanga Khristana thipi ae.
Ulenao ngei oh, Keina meelim ngeina dangpa ranga rillinge ae, atuyong mee ani na ngaihlak ha atu akha nako kuipi akha chu ha chunga alolko ngai ang no ae.
Chungthiengna saro ei ah Abraham akha chu matu mate ngeita rilha meelimta ril ano ae, matu mate tichu Khrista ta rilla sa ae.
Hina karil maram chu Chungthiengna Abraham hitta saro ei ah ngaihlakha akum riyali somthum nutingphao akui atreem am no ae.
Maram chu Chungthieng kutthul hi rouphun yarra ah no ae, Abraham hitta saro ei hlak yarra ae. Chuna Chungthieng na saro ei hana yarra makut thulha Abraham ta pephur ae.

Chutile rouphun chu iye ranga sa? Saro ei ah semphur Abraham sanao (tute) hana phaomalim diekno tulluha muranga akha chu. Marui ngei hitta mee akhana tullu ae athing harang wanrui ngei kutta pekhla rouphun sa ae.
Chutiweta meering akha chakna thingha ae tiha ril ngai no ae; Chungthieng chu akha chak ae.

Chuti lea chu rouphun hina Chungthieng saro ei hita ngaihlak no ah meh? Hako ano ae. Mee ngeina rouphun yuiweta aring ringchang tuk lea chu, meelim pana naha yuiweta Chungthieng hitta adiek changta so ae.
Chuna sarukka abai hana rille, simlei limhi pak jaitha thui ah am so ae, hina sarukka ngoiring limta Chungthiengna saro ei ah Khrista ta ngoiring ranga pephur pi so ae.
Chuna ngoiring ang apha ha phamatinga rouphun na anita hunga siphur ae.
Anina Chungthieng hitta diekka ngoiring jarra am ha rang Khrista tungma ah rouphun na ani chunga am phur ae.
Atunchu ngoiring rang apha haso ae, routhun na anita sotta runga amrang ah niyo ae.
Khrista hitta amha weta ngoiring yarra nangeilim Chungthieng sanaopa changso chou ae.
Khrista hitta baptias ae sa nangei limna pun dir seng hekta Khrista ta sengso chou ae.
Chuna Jihudi ti, gental ti, mee suuk, mee suukno akha chu apa namei ti teihlakna amniyo ae.
Nangei na Khrista mee alea chu Abraham sanao ngeiha changso ae, Chungthieng saro eiha nangeiko pha ang ae.
Keina woiha leya rilsir tikke asanao akhana mapa kolla phaphung shuklim pha-ang halko amona unga changlei chu-amota iko no, shuk hekta halle.
Amona alin asai shukka mapana pekphung shuklim peyo tikketa rilmalim atuyong meena naorui naokaiya hang ae.
Chuhekta aniko muihla tinga arat shuk mating chu aleiram ma am muihla ngeina choi ah runga am ae.
Chutiweta acha apha ha phayui ah chu Chungthieng na asanao pata hlapi ah namei wonsung ah wonchoiya Jihudi ngei rouphuna ringphur ae.
Rouphun thui ah am ngeita hlok ranga akha chu anita ma sanaopa changranga ae.
Masanao ngei ae ti dang ranga Chungthieng na ani lungsung a muihla pepi ah apa “kapa” ta kok ae.
Chuna nang mee suuk ani yo ae asanaopa akha ah soche ae. Asanaopa akha ah sou chu Chungthieng na ma amlim ha asanao ngeita pepi ange.
Amatinga nangei na Chungthieng ta dangphur no ae, chuna hlawang ngei suuk chang phur chau ae.
Atunchu Chungthieng ta dangso chou ae-Chungthieng nako nangeita dangso ae. Hitiweta hoi alota nangeina hrano muihla tinga nule chou meh? Nangeina alowa leya mani suuk changsir num chou meh?
Nangeina ahra rungni, kum hla, mapha akha chu ahra kumta lahlak chou ae.
Keina nangei tarang olling ae, nangei kolla ka tullu lu hi eko ano chang ang yo meh?
Keina nangeita niya am ing ae kau kanao ngei oh, kei hekti you oh; kei ko nangei hekti sing ae.
Nangeina kakolla diekno iko ae no chou ae, keina katak hoino sarukka nangeita ahra tongsan masa ah suiphur singe.
Chuphao sung keita yunna hou no lutta nangeina wantinga ruihekta akha chu Khrista Jisu hekta keita ngaiphur chou ae.
Nangeina haya a ariem phur ha atun chu elo ah yo meh? Nangei mitphao lasuk weta keita pene ang ae ta kei katak makna rilphur ing ae.
Atun chu nangeita adiek rou karil sarukka kei hi nangei anda mee changa yo meh?
Atuyong anda mee ngeina nangei lea keita ahran rang lungsi hungthei sa ah am ae.
Arhapa maram ma lungsi hlak chu hra ae; keina nangei hitta amha leichak lungsi ah diekka am anga no sa ae.
Kalungsit sanao ngei oh Khrista maring changha nangei sunga am malim chu kei katakka namei na wonchoi angtinga nat hekta ana dong ing ae.
Keina atunhi nangei hitta amha nelechu nangei kolla adang adang rouko rilnum ing ae. Maram chu keina nangei tarang olling ae.
Nangei kolla atuyong na rouphun an am num lea chu keina riltik ae: rouphun hita ril ha thei no chou meh?
Hita ril ae, Abraham na asanao apa ani donphur ae, akhana suuk namei na don ae, akhana anamei takna donae.
Suuk namei don sapaha meedon mangai ah don ae, chuti weta anamei takna don sapa hachu Chungthieng na saro ei anu jui ah don sa ae.
Hi hina anina achurang lam ani shukka am ae, Namei ani tihi rou ngirhlak ani ha sa ae.
Suuk changrang unga don manu ha Hagar sa ae, amona Sinai mulla roungir hlak hut sa ae, atunna am Jerusalem akha chu suuk changa am mamee hi Arabia ah am mul Sinai hi Hagar ae ta dangna nei ae.
Chutiweta wan ramting ah Jirusalem chu ani nu ae amochu atu thui ah ko am no ae.
Maram chu Athieng abai na rille,
“Ariem ou oh ungasal namei oh!
Ariem ah ao oh, unga don
angting aol dongno nang!
Maram chu apisal na rhanhou namei
hana sanaona
apisal am namei na don
sanaota lellang ae.”
Atu chu uleanao ngei chu Chungthieng na saro ei ah don Isak hekta Chungthieng sanao chou ae.
Apha hanalei thou ah atunphao a mee ngei don hek don amona Chungthieng muihla yarra don akhata aol ana phapi ah am ae.

Chutiweta athieng abai sung ah alota rilla si meh? Hita rille, suuk namei hale asanaopa hata yulla hou oh, maramchu suuknamei sanao amona mapa kolla phaphung limha ahal namei don sanao hitta pha ha ngai no ae.
Chuna sarukka ulenao ngei oh anichu suuk namei hana sanao ah no sa ae ahal namei hana sanao ae.
Khristana anita pakna hup ah si hei thou ah hlapi soae, chuna chetta ngir oh; woiha leya pak suuk changsir ang ae no oh.
Pol karilim hi thei oh, nangna asartan rang ngaita lea chu Khrista hi nakolla ite phao kanat am ni oh ae.
Woihako leya nangeita rilsir ing ae, nangeina asartan hita ahra adiek aeta lata lea chu nangei na rouphun lim yuirang am song ae.

Nangei sunga atuyong na rouphun yuiweta Chungthieng na adiek changpi ae tilea chu amoha Khrista kolhei thou wa mathei chak shukka thing so ae. Nangha Chungthieng ringrei ngaipi hana awao ah amso che ae.
Muihla hana thou ah ngoiring yarra Chungthieng na anita adiek changpirang anina atam aral hekta halla am ae.
Khrista Kolla asartan tanno ti iko am no ae. Khrista na aditchu anina lungsi ah ngoiring weta tullu lu tihi chak ae.
Nangeina ahra ngan thinga amlea chu atunako nangeita harm nea ang no ae.
Chungthieng na atreem rang ah nangeita kok ah no sa ae.
Chol ahuitena heng sihakta shuk pihek ti sa ae.
Nangeina mee adang adangei rou lano lutta Khrista amo hitta hlongno lutta amha ang ae tihi ngoiring ing ae. Nangeita alou thuchu ngeiha Chungthieng na aol pe ange.

Ulenao ngei oh keina asartan tihi ae no hrano ae ta sui lea chu keita manina eje sarukka atun phao keita aol ana pepi ah meh? Mani ril hana adiek ah lea chu Khrista na thitpi Khros maram ah karil hina aol shukrang am niyo ae.
