Nangeita lung longpi maniha asartan ta lella mani pumlim tan lea chu ta kalunga halsing ae.
Ulenao ngei oh nangeita ahup hla ah kokpi hi nangei pumna dit ae rang ah no ae, lungsi hlakka akha lea kha thui ah am hlak rang ah sa ae.
Maram chu rouphun lim hi rouphun akha chak na suipi nea pi ae, “Hachu nangeina nangei inn ning tung ting ngeita natak hekta lungsi ngai hlak oh.”
Chutiweta nangeina ram sha ngeihekta phit hlak reihlak ah am lea chu anungting ah chu nangeilim ripta mang ang ae.
Karil numchu muihla hana nangei ringchangha lamkaipi su oh. Chuti lea pumna dit hana thing nea ang no ae.
Tichu ani pumna ditha muihla na ngaino ae akha chu muihla na ditha pumna ngaino ae. Manui aniha ngaihlak no ae, tichu na pumna ae numha ae nea no ae.
Muihla na lamkai lea chu rouphun thui ah am niyo che ae.
Pumna ae num chu; lal num hlak, thinglou aphing aphai,
kutna sem hlawang ta mok, doihla-aihla, anda ansi, phithlak reihlak, anarhlak, kamee mamee naihlak, ashuk-apal nailou, matarang chak ngai; hranhlak, kuihlak,
yurui burui, ayak ati sal, akha chu hiyongpa tullu ae ah am hana etika ako wanram pha nea ang no ae ta amatinga ko rilhou sing ae, atunko rilla am ing ae.
Chutiweta muihla na; Lungsi, ariem, adai, sotta adongthei, ringrei dang, ahra, ngoiringa ngai,
meethui dongnea akha chu matakta mannea tihi shukpi ae, hilim hi rouphun diekno ae ta ril no ae.
Khrista kolla amlim ngei chu pumna ae num adit limpa thipi so ae.
Muihla na anita aring pepiphur so ae, Muihla ta ani ringchang hi lamkai pi ei oh.
Anina khale kha hungthei ah rasit rabun lhakka akha chu ansi anda ae hlak no ei oh.
Ka-u-kanao ngei oh, atu jong akhana pak ah tulle chu amo hitta pak ae ha no rang muihla phasa nangeina hra bakta adiek lamting ah ruile oh.
Akhale kha arit pot ronha au oh hita ae lea chu Khrista tongsan ha nangeina jui chou ae.
Maram chu eko changlou mee na kei emo akha si ang ae ta hal lea chu amoha mathei chak ah hungthei ae mee ae.
Limpana ma ae ma ae tullu hana ah no ah chu mee ae tullu hana ma lokrang eko am no ae.
Maram chu meelim pana mata mata aritpot ha ron ang ae.
Ahra rou dangsa amona, amota chupi pa itta ahralim samha ang ae.
Natak nathei chaka hungthei no oh; atunako Chungthieng ta lungmoh pinea ang no ae. Maram chu ma ae ma ae ha amona pha sir ang ae.
Nangna napum tarang wor lea chu pumna amangha pha ang ae, chuti weta muihla tinga wor lea chu muihla tinga samla ringchang ha pha ang ae.
Chuna sarukka anina ahra tullu aelei ah olno ei oh. Anina channo lutta ae ah am lea chu acha apha ah ahom rang apha ha pha ang ae.
Chuna ae ang apha amlei ah anina meelimta ahra ha ae ei oh; ani itta ngoiringha inn sungeita lella ae ei oh.
Kakut makna jiek rolla nangeita kajiek ah hla ing ae.
Nangeita asartanno hrano ae ta hata ae ah am ngeita manita Khrista khross marama aol pha norang akha chu manina manitheichak lokrang ae ah sa ae.
Asartan mani phao ah rouphun rilha yuinea no ae. Mani rilha jui talea chu manina maniril jui so ae ta mani lokrang ae ah sa ae.
Khrista Khross ah no ah chu keichu kalokrang eko am no ae, khross yarra hina aleiram ah thiphursing ae.
Asartan hina eko ah no sa ae athar kutsem chang hana sa ae.
Na karil hi maring changa yuimi amoha machunga akha chu Chungthieng inn sunglim chung ah adai, yaihra pek chang su oh.
Atreem na chang ah karil numchu atunako keita aol ana pepi no su oh, maram chu Khrista rui ae tihi muh rang ah kataka mol meh aming ae.
Kau kanao ngei oh Jisu Khrista ringrei ngaipi ha nangeilim chunga am su oh. Amen.

Chungthieng ahal anu jui ah Khrista Jisu hei thou ah ahal sa rui Pol na Ngoiring ah mani ringchang Khrista hitta amha Ephesiya ah am Chungthieng meelimta ani pa Chungthieng akha chu Arengpu Jisu Khrista na yaihra akha chu adai pek chang su oh.
Khrista hitta amha yarra wanram tinga jaihralim pepi ani Arengpu Jisu Khrista, mapa Chungthiengta dom ei oh.
Anina mamai kunga thienga akha chu diek am rang akha chu Khrista hitta amha yarra simlei semthou matinga
Chungthieng na anita masa tekta halpi so ae.
Malungsit akha chu madit anu jui ah Khrista hei thou ah anita masanaopa ngei changranga Chungthieng na masateka anita halranga ngirphur so ae.
Malungsit asanaota aman salla pepi saruka anina mayaihra limta dom ei oh.
Khrista na aman salla thitpi yarra anita ahup ah si hla ah pak hei thou ah sanpiso ae. Chungthieng maringrei ngaipi hiya ah lok ah meh.
Tella teljou no mahei anita yaihra pepi so ae.
Chungthieng na marat mathei thupa silim Khrista yarra anita singsengta ripi ang ae ta amating thou ah ngirphur so ae.
Mahal ha ae ang apha ha pha jui ah simlei wanrama amlim Khristana aluching changweta rachun pi ang ae.
Eheilimpa hi Chungthieng ahal adit nujui ah shuk sa ae; Khrista itta amha weta anina mamee changranga Chungthieng na athou hei thou ah mahal anu jui ah alung ngir ae.
Chuna anina Khrista amota masha ah ngoiring ngeina Chungthieng mahung majai ha dom-su-oh.
Nangeina adiek rou tichu aringketo phapi ahra rou ha thei-ah, nangeina ngoiringa saro-ei athieng muihla hana nangei mitpu chang so-ae.

Chungthieng na mamee ngeita phapirang saro-ei phur ha ani taranga muihla hana ngirpi ae. Hina sarukka Chungthieng na mamee chang mee ngeita ahup hei thou ah hlapi ae. Anina mahung majai limhita dom ei oh.
Hina sarukka Arengpu Jisuta nangei ngoiring akha chu Chungthieng mee ngei limta nangei lungsit ha kathei thou ah,
Nangei tarang Chungthieng ta adom chan nong ae, keina kaniek changhon ah nangei tarang angai thei ing ae.
Nangei sunga muihla na lutpi weta athei asing shukpi weta amota lella dangrang ani arengpu. Khrista, mapa Chungthieng kolla nie ah am ing ae.
Hiya hra ah mamee ngei tarang saro ma ei phurha, akha chu nangeita kokpi maram ha nangeina thinwar lungwar honga dangpha rang keina nie ing ae.
Ngoiring mee ani sunga haya ah lok marat hana tullu ae pi ae, hiyongpa marat hana ani sunga ehekta ratta tullu ae ah am ae.
Nalim hi amona Khrista ta athi hei thou-ah ringthou pi phura wanrama machangting ah-ongpiso ae.
Khristana awan chunga am ae nea arat renglim akha chu simlei chunga akha chu phao ang simlei chunga ko loktek ae.
Chungthieng na eheilim Khrista kea kunga sipi ah, akoksha ngei tarang pepi ah eheilim chunga Reng chang so ae.
Akoksha ngei hi Khrista pumha changa Chungthieng ringchang na machunga ripta shihak ti ae.
Amating chu nangeina aril jui no ah pak ae saruka muihla tinga thi ah am chou ae.
Apha hana lei ah nangeina simlei rama hrano lam tienga akha chu atunri ah Chungthieng ril jui lou ngeita choi muihla na nangeita rui ah rolle.
Apha hana lei ah chu aniko mani hekta pumna dit ae num ae phura mani hekta Chungthieng lungsat rang mee changphur ae.
Chutiweta Chungthieng na anita ringrei ngaipi ah akha chu lungsit pi hi aril ang salla mahei lok ae.
Apha hana anina aril yuino ah, muihla tinga thi ah amlei ah anita Khrista hitta aring lamtinga ruipi so ae; Chungthieng ringrei ngeipi yarra nangta sanpi so ae:
Khrista hitta amha ah anita ringthou pi ah wanrama amo hitta pal ha ang ae.
Hita ma ae hina anuting phao ang apha changhonna Khrista kolla malungsit akha chu malok masei limhi ani meelim mai ah phurang sa ae.
Maram chu nangta sanpi phur hi nangna nalok ranga na tullu lu narat hana ahno ae, hichu ngoiring yarra pha ang Chungthieng kutthul sa ae.
Maram chu ani limna ahra ma tullu lu ranga amating hei thou ah Khrista mayarra semphur so ae.
Asartan ung ae ta Jihudi ngeina asar tanlou kok yentel ngei oh, amatinga nangei alota amphur chou mo halla an ou oh!

Apha hana leichu nangei hi Khrista kolla hei thou ah aram la ah, saro ei ah Chungthieng rou ngir hlak hana tol no chou ae, Isarel ngei hu hlangmee changa akha chu aring pharang lungrang amno lutta simlei chunga amphur chou ae.
Chutiweta atun chu Khristana amant salla thitpi yarra Khrista makolla nai ah ampi so ae.
Maram chu Khrista matak makna ani kolla adai choiphao pi ah Jihudi akha chu gental jat ani hi angkha ruk so ae, matak mak na andami changpi ah am ahar ha hri ah houpi so ae.
Yat ani shukka amhi athar mee akhachak changranga amona Jihudi ngei rouphun akha chu ae ang lu ang lam limha hri ah hou so ae.
Khrista na khross chunga thit yarra anda khlak am niyo ae, mathit yarra adai choiphao pi ah yat ani ha pum akha chak changpi ah Chungthieng kolla woiha lea ah rui phao pi so ae.
Khristana yung phura ahra rou adaihi, Chungthieng kolhei thou ah aram la ah am gental akha chu nai ah am Jihudi ngeilim chung ah chupi so ae.
Khrista ma yarra Jihudi ngeiko, gental ngeiko muihla akha chak ah mapa maikunga wanea so ae.
Chuna sarukka gental nangei hi huhlang mee akha chu ram adang mee ani yo ae; Chungthieng hu hah tuihah changso ae, akha chu Chungthieng inn sungmee ngei chang so ae.
Khrista matak makna inn pi cho changweta ahalsa rui ngei rourilpa ngei thul inn mun chunga nangei tako sapi so ae.
Arengpu athieng amokna in changranga amona limpata ra chunpi ah choi ah am ae.
Amo hitta am ha ah nangeiko Chungthieng muihla yarra ma am rang amunt akha changranga adang mee ngei hitta rachuna sapi so ae.
Hina sarukka gental nangei taranga Khrista Jisu hunga si changa Pol keina Chungthieng kolla nie ing ae.
Nangei tarang ahra tullu ae ranga keita Chungthieng ma ringrei ngai thui ah halle tihi nangei na thei so chou ae.
Chungthieng athup lamha ripi ah keita dang piso ae, (Hina maramko keina jiek phur sing ae).
Jiekka kahou phurha nangeina anlea chu Khrista kolla athup lam kadanghi nangeiko dangpha nea ang ae.
Amating chu hiyong athup lam rilphur no ae; Chutiweta atun chu Chungthieng mahalsa athieng rui ngei akha chu rouril ngei muihla yarra ripi so ae.

Athup lam hachu ahra rou hina yarra gental ngeiko Jihudi ngei hitta Chungthieng yaihra ha akha chakka pha ha so ae; Mani limpa pum akha chakka changa Chungthieng na Khrista hei thou ah saroei ah tumha phaha so ae.
Chungthieng na ma ae nea marat anu jui ah keita alok kutthul pepi ah keita rou ron suuk chang pi so ae.
Athieng mee ngai kar ah keina toltek changhalko Chungthieng mayarra keina tel jou no Khrista kolla thupa am lim ha gental ngei kolla rou hi rilpi ing ae.
Eheilimpa sempi Chungthieng na amatinga meerul eya hei thou ah thupa si atipi ma ae ang tullu ha meelimna ripha ranga,
Akok sha mee ngei yarra wanram amunt amunt eya lim ma thienglou muihla achoi ahai ngeita Chungthieng ma ae nea adang adang eya limpa ripiso ae.
Chungthieng hi limpa hi Khrista mayarra ae phur ae.
Anina Khrista hitta am ha ah akha chu ani ngoiring yarra Chungthieng maikunga atri am no ah wanea ae.
Keina aol ana kadonghi nangei lung leano ranga rilla am ing ae; hi lim hi nangei hratrang sa ae.
Hina sarukka keina mapa kolla huk hrun ah nie ing ae.
Wanram heithou ha inn sunglim akha chu simlei chunga am inn sunglimna adiek mingha pha su oh.
Nangei sunga arat amrang akha chu muihla yarra malok ma ae nea ha pekranga keina Chungthieng ta nie ing ae.
Nangei na ngoiring yarra nangei lungsunga Khrista amrang keina nie ing ae. Akha chu nangeina lungsi tihana inn mun changa ato sanrang keina nie ing ae.
Nangeina Chungthieng mee ngei hitta tulla Khrista malungsit hi eya sei, eya lok, eya shai akha chu eya thuk tihi dang rang aratha,
Phaweta atun ripta dangpha nohal Khrista yarra Chungthieng maring chang hana am ranga keina nie ing ae.
Ma ae nea marat hana ani sung tullu ae pi yarra kaina sai ah dangno akha chu halla shuk no eya lim ae nea ae.
Akok sha akha chu Khrista kolla Chungthieng malok masei apha chang honna atreem naino ha am su oh. Amen.
Arengpu matarang ahung si keina nangeita rilla am ing ae: Nangeita akok anu jui ah Chungthieng ma ngai ringchang hana ring ou oh.
Apha changhon nangei lu bu ah, anem akha chu adong ratto, khale kha adongthei ah nangei lungsit hlak ha mee ngei kolla ripi oh.
Muihla na nangeita akha chakka amha rang adai tihana hup ah si ha chatno rang narat shukka ae oh.
Pumko akha chak ae, akha chu muihla ko akha chak ae, Chungthiengna nangta lunghal akha chak ah amranga kokpur so ae.
Arengpu ko akha chak ae, ngoirengko akha chak ae, baptias kom akha chak sa ae.
Meelimpa Chungthieng akha chu mapa ko chang Arengpu amona eheilimpa chunga runga an ah am ae.
Ani mee akha, akha chunga Khrista na pekphung shuk kutthul ha pepi so ae.
Athieng abai sunga rilhekta,
“Amona achungting ah kalyui ah
mant ah si mee ngei tako amona ruithen ae,
amona meengeita kutthulko pephur-ae.”
Atun, “Amona achungting kalyui ah” tihi atu rilna meh? Amona masa ah nimtekti simlei ram ah yungphur ae tina sa ae.
Jungphur amona limpa chunga sihakta amranga wanram lim chunga kalphur amo ha sa ae.
Amo ha ae, “Mee ngeita kutthul pephur ha”; amona ahreta ahal rui changrang, ahretana rou maphu, ahretana rouril ngei changrang ahrengei tana kelmo sum akha chu chupi ang mee halphur ae.
Chungthieng meelimna Khristen tullu ae weta Khrista pum sakranga hilim hi pe phur ae.
Chuna anina lungrang akha chu ngoiring akha chak hana wa weta alin asai shuk mee changa Khrista melrung, maring chang ha pha ang ae.
Mee ngeina alou diek lou rilweta tuiyul hekta thirangna alea ahong choirol unga ngei hektiha anichu ha ani yo ae.
Chu ang saruk chu anina lungsi hlakweta adiek rou tonglhak ei oh, ani alu chang am Khrista lamtinga lok hangrang ae ei oh.
Khrista na ani ka jatlim ma am ang phung shuk anu yui ah yumpi ae, chuna ka jatlimna ae phung shuk ma ae ma ae ang tulluha lu jui ah pumna lungsi athui ah lokka hang ae.
Chuna sarukka Khrista minga nangeita keina hin inge; nangeina Khrista dangno mee ngei hekta arimsal lung songa ringno oh.
Maniha Chungthieng yaihra pek tolno ah ahlem lungha halla eko dangno ah alung hira am ae.
Manilimha ajak donno ah diek lou tullu lu rang mani pumha pe ae.
Khristana hita ae rang nangeita chupi phur no ae.
Nangeita ma maram ah chupiphur ha theisa so ae, manuting jui mee changa Jisu kolla am adiek ha dang so chou ae.
Chuna, amating nangeina ringa houphur aluisa pumhei thou ah hla ah thing jou oh.
Nalung akha chu nalung ranglim athar ah hlong yo oh.
Akhachu Chungthieng melrung kai ah adiek akha chu athieng athar ringchang ha seng yo oh.
Lea ah murthei murthim ae no sa oh meelimna matonpi mathanrul kolla adiek rou tonghlak ka anilim hi Khrista pum akha chang so ae.
Nalung sa che halko paklam tinga thinga pak ae no oh akha chu nitak pha phao lungsa no oh.
Hrano Saitan ta amunt peno oh.
Aru thei mee na aruha channa, tullu ratta aeweta anei don shuka ah, am no ngeita samnerang ae su oh.
Meelung natrang rou rilno oh, mee na theiweta thathnum thathou shukweta ahra tullu lu numrang rou rillo.
Chungthieng muihlata olpea no oh. Maram chu muihla hina yar ah ani hi wanchung ting sanao ae ta dang ang sa ae, akha chu rangni hana anita ahup hei thou ah hla mee changpi ang ae.
Ansi anda, lungsa thana, sulhlak reihlak akha chu aohlak rilhak, anar hlaklim nangei kolla am no su oh.
Chuna hutta nangei khale kha ringrei lungsi dang hlakka lung athar sunga, Chungthieng na Khrista yarra sanpi hekta nangeiko akhana akhata santing oh.
Nangei na Chungthieng sanao akha changa amo hekti rang hotna oh.
Nangei ringchangha lungsina lamkai su oh, Khristana lungsi ah maring chang anita pephur ah Chungthieng angei changa amona ariem ahoi akatpot changpi so ae.
Chungthieng mee changa namei apa oklou akha chu karam paicha hopla pellah rou hi nangei karsunga tong hlak no oh.
Thinglou semsak, khrim elsel tongkong sulou nangei na ae phung shukno ae, chu ang saruk chu nangeina Chungthieng dom ou oh.
Nangeina dang ou oh, dieklou mee, anole kutta sem hlawang mokngei ahop apel amno mee ngeina itikka kom Khrista akha chu Chungthieng Rengram ha phaphung eko amno ae.
Nangeita atunako alou rou rilweta dieklou lamting thing oh, hiyongpa ae sarukka aril juino ngei chunga Chungthiengna lungsa bun ae.
Chuna sarukka mani hekti ha changno ou oh.
Nangei natak mako amating chu athim thui ah amphur ae, atunchu nangei Arengpu mee ah so chou ae, awar hana ringso chou ae, chuna awar sanao ngei hekta thing ou oh.
Maram chu awar hana ara chu; ahra, darmochel akha chu adiek hi ae.
Arengpuna ariem rang ratta hutna oh.
Eko kanalou athim tullu ae ah am ngei hitta tonha no oh, chuna hutta awar choisuk ou oh.
(Manina aru ah lu tullu ha rillang phao ajakpi ae).
Eheilimpa awarra choishuk yui ah chu mani lu tullu ha thienga ripha sei yo ae.
Maram chu thienga ripha dangpha hi awar chunga sa ae, maniha awar sa ae, chuna saruk hita rilphur ae,
“Thou jou oh jalla enna am nangei ha,
akha chu athi hei thou ah ringthou jo oh,
hana Khrista na nachunga warpi ang ae.”
Chuna nangeina singa thei ah ring ou oh, lungmoh ngei hekta ano lutta asingei hekti oh.
Ae ang apha napha lei ah ahra ae jo oh. Maram chu apha hi hrano ae.
Lungmo no oh Arengna nangeita e ae pinumsa tiha dangrang ratta jongo.
Tuisik een na arui aba ae nou oh, nangei mang ang chou ae, chuna hutta Muihla na sihakti ou oh.
Nangei kha lea kha adomna laa, amokna laa, anikna laa sahah tongha ah nangei lungsung arengta dom ou oh.
Ani arengpu Khrista minga apha changhon eheilimpa taranga mapa Chungthiengta adom pe ou oh.
Khrista ta ati ajak changa nangei akhana akha thui donghlak ou oh.
Namei ngei oh Rengta ajak atri pek hekta napishal ta ajak atri oh.
Maramchu Khristana mapum sakka am akoksha ngeita sempipa changa mani chunga amhekta apisalna anamei chunga am ang ae.
Hana sarukka akoksha ngeina Khrista thui dong hekta eheilim ah namei ngeina apisal thui ah am su oh.
Pisal ngei oh Khristana akokshata lungsi ah maring chang pekhekta nangei namei ngeita lungsi oh.
Athieng changranga Khrista tronglam yarra tui ah thienga silpi so ae.
Chuna akoksha ngeita ajiek akoi, chuklip chuklop amno lutta makolla katranga sa ae.
Apa ngeina mani namei ngeita mani pum hekta lungsit phung shuk ae. Atuyong apa akhana anameita lungsi lea chu matak makta lungsi ah ae.
(Atunako matak makta ittik ako atir no ae, atir ang hutta atak hratrang abak een ah Khristana akoksha ngeita ann pi hekta ae ae,
Maram chu ani hi Khrista mapum matak chang mee ngei sa ae.)
Athieng abai na hita rille, “Hina sarukka apana mapa manu hla houweta anamei hitta amha su oh, akha chu manui anina pum akha chak chang so ae.”
Abai hina sunga ehekta athuk athup, athieng adiek adangrang am ae, hachu Khrista lea akoksha ngei lungsit hlak hisa ae ta keina laing ae.
Hihekta nangko ae oh; Apisal limna anameita matak hekta lungsi ngei oh; akha chu anamei limna apisalta ajak ati ou oh.
Unga ngei oh nanu napa ngei ril tronglam ha jui ou oh, Khristen akha changa hihi nangei tunluh sa ae, nahi maksa ae adiek ae phung shuk tlunluh ha.
“Napa nanuta ayak atri oh,” tihi saro ei ah pek ahalpa rouphun ae;
“Chuti lea chu nangeina aleiram ah hoi ah dai ah tunsotta ring pha ang ae.”
Mapa manu ngei oh; nangei sanao ngeita simdai ah lungsat rang ae no oh, chuta ae ang saruk chu manita Khristen ahra lamtinga thing rang chupi takpi oh.
Kor ngei oh, nangei mitputa ayak ati akha chu ahirr hitta aril jui ou oh: Khrista amota ae ing ae ta halla lung thienga ae ou oh.
Mani kolla adom tuk rangchak ae nolutta Khrista kor chang ing ae ta halla Chungthieng maikunga diekka hra ah ae ou oh.
Nangna meeta hlou dom nong ae, Khrista ta hlou dom ing ae ta halla ariem ariem ma ae oh.
Makno oh Arengpuna kor halko kornohalko ma ae, ma ae na tullu anu jui ah ae mant ha pea ang ae.

Mitpu ngei oh, nangeiko nangei kor ngei maikunga ahra lam ah thing ou oh akha chu manita anti alao ae ha chan oh. Maram chu nang akha chu nangei kor ko wanram mitpu hana ta chaksa ae, amona mee limpata akha rukta routreem ange ae.
Atreem na changa, nangei na Arengpu itta amha ah marat ma anea yarra hana nangeiko arat shuk oh.
Hrano saitan hana alet ahong ae maitinga nangna chetta ngir nea rang Chungthieng na pek ral pun ral dir limha seng oh.

Maram chu ani ae ang ralhi malmasi aring pum chunga ano ae, chuti weta hrano mitpu, aenea arat athei, athim simlei chunga am akha chu wanchung tinga hrano aenea muihla ngei chunga anina ral ae anga sa ae.
Chuna sarukka atunhi Chungthieng ral pun ral dir ha seng jou oh, hrano ralha atimphao nea ranga ae ou oh.
Chetta ngir jou oh, adiek hana konghit changa nakonga sui oh, darmochel hana natanga somjou oh,
nakae nahuirang nakom adai pharang ahra rou ha sui thingrang ae jou oh.
Apha chang honna ngoiring hana phoh changa choi oh nahina hrano ngeina yunna hla kanga am thalru ha mit ang ae.
Akha chu aringketo hana lubur hekta bur oh, hana muihla na pek Chungthieng rou tong hana chamsei hekta choi oh.
Chungthiengna sanpi ranga makolla nie weta hilim hi ae oh. Muihla na rui leilim eheilim nie oh, hina sharukka atreem am no lutta Chungthieng meelim tarangko nie pi oh.
Keina ahra rou athuplim ha ati amno lutta rilshuk trongshuk nea rang Chungthiengna keita tongpek ha ril nea rang katarangko nie pi oh.
Keina raen inn sunga amhalko ahra rou tarang keita hla ae, hana keina lung hirra ngir ah karil phung shuk ahra rou hi suine rang katarang nie pi oh.
Kalungsit kanao Taichikas, Arengpu tullu ah ngoiringa ngai makolla hei thou ah karou hi theipha ang chou ae. Amona kei alota am ah meh tihi amona rilpi ang ae.
Akha chu kani lim alota amsa tihi dangrang ah akha chu nangeina thathou thanum shukrang keina nangei kolla amota tirra hla ing ae.
Mapa Chungthieng akha chu Arengpu Jisu Khrista na Khristen ulenao limta pek adai, lungsi akha ngoiring litta munha ah amjou shu oh.
Khrista ta atreem am no lutta lungsit ngei chunga Chungthieng na yaihra pek changsu oh.
Khrista rui Pol akha chu Timothi na Philipi ah am Khrista ta amha ngei akha chu, akoksha sunga alu chingei akha chu akoksha ngeita tullu sanna am limta,
Ani Pa Chungthieng akha chu Reng Jisu Khrista na adai yairha pek changsu-oh.
Nangeita kangei thei sing jui ah keina apha changhona kapa Chungthiengta dominge.
Nangeilim taranga keina apha changhona ariem hitta nie ah am minge.
Rouram chu arha rou tarang katullu kalu hi nangeina athou hei thou wa atunpha sanpi am chou weh.
Na chunga hi arha tullu thoupi phur Chungthieng na Khrista Jisu rungni phamalim phao wa nangei ta ruipi ange ta keina Chungthieng ta ngoiring inge.

Nangei ta apha changhona kalungsunga si-inge! nangei tarang ka ae limhi adieke ti hi kalunga hallinge rouram chu ka ae pha arha tullu limhi nangei na atunpha sunga keina ahong akha chu alha lim akha chu arha rou chetta amranga nangeina sampi chou-ae.
Nangei ta thuka ngai-inge ta karilim hi Khrista malung sit hei thou wa shukke ti hi Chungthieng na meelung ngir sa ae.
Nangei na lungshi akha chu adiek lousing louma lella sukrang keina niya aminge.
Chuti lea chu nangeina lella ahra ha halnea Khrista rukni hana thinglou ti dieklou tiha chang ang niyowe.
Jisu Khrista hina adiek ara na nangei chung shihak ti shu oh, akha chu Chungthieng mahung majaita dom na changshu oh.
U-lenao ngeiyo, Nangeita kadang pinumchu, kakolla shukka hanglim hana arha tongsan suirang ngamtinga mashon na change.
Hina saruka kulnunga thonghaklim, akha chu hina amlim pana keihi Khrista rui akha chang yarra raen inn sunga am ae ti hi dangpha ae.
Keina raen inn sunga ka amyara ulenao ngeina Khrista ta ngoiring lella manina apha changhonna ati amno lutta arha tongsan sui nea ae.
Atuyong arhena anarra, arhena asul ahal shukrang chuti weta arhena arha lungsonga Khrista tongsan sui-ae.
Adang ahre ngeina ahra tongsan tarang keina ngirra am meh tisarukka ahra rou hi suiye.
Adang arhena lung thinga suino ae, keina raen inn sunga ka amleiya lella aol shukpi ranga mani tarang chakka halweta suiye.
Adiekka suihal, diekno wa suihalko eko ollang amno ae. Nealeilim chu Khrista ahra rou sui ange, hina sarukka arieming akha chu arimang inge.
Nangeina niekpi jara akha chu Khrista muilha na sanpi jara keita ahung hei thou wa hlapi angeta danginge.
Chuna keita athina hal, aringnahal atunako katullu ka ae hita ajak tukpi nea angno weh, keina karing changlim Khrista domange tihi kalunga kadit kahalsa ae.
Maram chu ringchanghi eya meh? Kakolla chu keina karinghi Khrista sa ae. Chutiweta athi na hratekke.
Chutiweta ringa amlea chu lella ahra tullu lu rang sa ae, hoitingpa hallangmo kahallang dangnonge.
Keita lam anihina kaiya ameh keina aleiram hlaweta Khrista itta amha pana lella hratekke.
Chutiweta nangei tarang ngaileng chu keina ringa ampana ehekta hrateke.
Kei ringa ampana rhatekke tihi keina la inge, Keina ring lea chu nangei ngoiring akha chu ariem lella nangei tullu shu ange ti hi keina danginge.
Nangei kolla woiha leya kaphao jui ah Khrista kolla nangei ariem ha lellange.

Ehekta maru uichu, nangei ring changhi Khrista ahra tongsan hana adit anu jui ah ringo, keina eyonga rilhak nehalko nea nohalko nangei na lungrang akha chakka Khrista arha rou tarang ratta ral aeya chetta ngirra ameh tihi keina theipha ange.
Nangei ta anda ngeita ati no-oh, apha changhonna thanum tha thou oh hiti lea chu manina maisi pha a nangei na nea ange ti hi hallange, rouram chu nangei anea peha Chungthieng pekke.
Rouram chu Khrista amota domrang nangieta pepi-ae amota ngoiring hachak anowa matarangko aol dongrangko pesa-ae.
Atun chu kei hitta ralmunna lutha eiyo, amating thouwa atunphao sunga ral ka-ae nangei ri, ah theiya am ral ha ae-ha seiyo.
Khrista kolla am nangei ringchangha arat changsu oh, malungshit hana nangeita ariem pisu oh. Nangei na muilha hitta amha ah akha lea akha lungsi ringrei ngai lhakke.
Nangei na lungrang kha chakka lungsi ngai lhakka akha chu mui lha akha chakka ngaiya am ou-oh ta nie ja am minge.
Nang nathei chak tarang halweta nathei chak lokchokta ringrang ae no oh, chuti weta nalung sunga ayak atisonga akhana akha tarang halweta adangei tana loktek ke ta hal hlak ou oh.
Nadit na-aenum chak anowa adangmi ngei aenum adit hako amo.
Khrista lung songhekta nangeiko nangei lunga songo:
Khrista ha Chungthieng ahalko,
Chungthieng singeta amona chetta
kolla amanga ae
tihi amona halno ae.
Chuna hutta malmasi melrung
laweta suuk changa
ani karra risukpi ae.
Amona ayak ati ah
aril atrong jui lamtinga athitphao tarang
thing Khross chunga amona thi ae.
Hina sarukka Chungthieng
amota chungtekti amunt
limchunga chungtek ta domma,
mee ngei lim chunga loktekti ming peso ae.
Hana sarukka, wanramako akha chu
simleiram akha chu simlei thuiya
amlimna huk hruna
Jisu ming mokkange.
Hana limpana phonga Jisu hi
Khrista Renge ta mapa
Chungthieng malok masei ha phu ange.

Hina sarukka, kalungsit tonpi ngeiyo, nangei hitta amha leiya karil nangei yuita lella atun nangei kolla aram la ah amlei ating karil nangeina yuitek kou oh, nangeina ati ahir hitta munha ah nangei aring keto ha chetta choirang hutna oh.
Maram chu, Chungthieng na apha chang honna mahal akha chu maning ha nangeina ariema jui ah ae nea rang nangei sunga tullu lu ah am ae.
Eheilima yetlhak worlhak amno lutta ae oh.
Hati lechu nangei hata amut akha chu pakna si simlei chunga ringa am kara athieng akha chu rakitpha Chungthieng sanao ngei ae ta dang pha ange. Nangeina mani karra awan arsi hekta war oh.
Manita aring tongsan napekleiya, nangeina hata ae lea chu, keina karat choi sukka ka ae tullu lim amang amno ae tihi Khrista rukni hana nangei jara kalok na nei ange.
Eyonga kathee hina akat ranga saiphung chunga bun lea chu nangei ngoiringha Chungthieng kolla akat chang so weh, chuta ae lea chu, kei arieminge akha chu nangei lim hitta ariemha inge.
Chuhekta nangei ko ariem mange akha chu nangei ariemha kakolla ko pha ange.
Eyongpa nahi reng angaipi ah lea chu keina Timothita nangei kolla anatta hla-tikketa hallinge, hatiyuiya nangeirou theiyuiya keina thanum shukange.
Amo hi chakke kalung kahal dang akha chu nangei tarang routakka ngai ah amko am ae.
Meelim ngeichu mani hratrang chak halle, Jisu Khrista tarang halno ae.
Amole keina mapa asanao kaiya munha ah arha rou taranga tullu ae ha ah nangei na ko dangpha angchou ae.
Kaning kolla shuka am hina sarukka keina amota ngai lea chu ranga nangei amna ah hla tikketa hal aminge.
Kei katakmakko nangei amna munna wane-ange ta Rengta ngoiring inge.
Kei hitta tullu ronha am, ralmee changha am, akha chu nangei kolla rou ronna am, keita tullu dom ha am Epaphroditas tako nangei kolla hla tikketa kalung ranga aminge.
Amonako nangei limta ehekta ri lhaknume, akha chu nangeina amohi atak hoino ae ta theiphurha amoko alung ol lea.
Routakka amohi thi angsamta naphure, chuti weta Chungthieng na amota lungsi ngaipi ae, amota chako ano ae keita aol chunga aol lolnorang ngaipi ae.
Reng kolla uleanao hekta ngaiya amota ariemma lapi oh, amo hekti meelim ngeitako ajak atiha muh au oh.
Arengpu minga ariem ma amo ta riemtukpi oh.
Maram chu amona nangei ae nea no Khrista tullu taranga maring chang athi ang phao ati amnoa keita san nea.
Atreem na changa, ka-u kanoo ngeiyo, Reng kolla ariem ou oh ka jiek sa lea lea ah ka-jiekhi kakolla akai eko amno ae, hita ka ae hina nangei kolla lel lating arhatrang sa ae.
Hralou tullu ae ngei ha cheksillo, hana ui ngeiha, ta kom cheksilla, asartan ngei ta kom chekshillo.
Adiekka asartan ngei chu ani sa ae, mani ano ae, maram chu muilha jara anina Chungthiengta mokke akha chu Khrista hitta amha ah ringchang ariem tukke awao ah chak asartan hana ngoiring rang amno ae.
Awao ah ae hachak ngoiringei tihalko, kei nea inge, atuyong na awao chak ngoiringei tihalko keina lel tekinge.
Keita donsu rukni naritta asartanne, Isarel jati ah doninge, Benjamin sakai inge, athing hibru athi inge, Jihudi rouphun yui mee halle chu kei Pharisi inge.
Darmo tinga lunglut hallechu kei keina akoksha ngeita phit rei inge rouphun ri yuiweta darmo chelle ta lale chu kei karal eko am nonge.
Hilim hita ae weta kana ae ta kahalha, atunchu Khrista jara aek hekta hal singe.
Keina Khrista amota kapharanga eheilim chunga Karengpu Khristana lel tek ae ta hiyongpa awao ah shuk tullu lim hi keina arimpasa ae ta ripta yunna housinge.
Khrista kolla ripta peya amno ah chu keina rouphun ril yuiweta darmochel ringchang phane nonge, ngoiring tihita beiweta Khrista amota ngoiringa Chungthieng kolhei thouwa darmochel ha keina phasinge.
Eheilim chunga kaditchu Khrista amota dangeveta akha chu athi hei thouwa ringne arat, ma aol manat ha dongingeta mathit hekta thi keina di inge.
Hiti lea chu kei katak makko athi hei thou aring pha ang inge.
Keina thangsuk maipak phasinge akha chu eheilima rakit phasinge ta rilla ah nonge. Khrista na keita mataranga halpi anu jui ah keina ae mant pharang hutna inge.
Ulenao ngeiyo keina ripta nesinge ti ano ae, keina ka ae amchu athing saha kanutinga yunna houingeta amaiting am hata karat shukka yulla aminge.
Chuna keina achung tinga ringchang ha Khrista jara, Chungthieng akok anu jui ah ae mant pharang akha chu lam tungrang amunt ha pharang kei na lam tieng tan inge.
Muilha na sisa anilimna lungrang akha chaka songha eiyo. Chutiweta atuyong pana adang lungrang songle chu Chungthieng na nangeita thinga ripisu oh.
Anina athou hei thouwa thing am lam anu jui ah maitinga sonna thingeiyo.
Ulenao ngeiyo ka ae anu yuiyo, nangei ko ae oh, kani na nangeita api hekta ae mee ngei ta kom hra bak ta an pi oh.
Keina nangeita amatinga lea lea karilsa sa ae, atunko lesira kamit tui tulla rillinge; atuyong mee ngeichu mani ringchangha na Khrista na Khross chunga thitpiha anda ae.

Maniha sarmei hura mani ringchang atreem na chang ange, maram chu mani hlawang chu mani pumna dit ha ae. Manina ajak tuk pharang hana chaothuk ka ameh, akha chu manina aleiram hina am potlim tarang chak halle.
Ani chu wanram mee ngei sa ae anina anita sanpipa Arengpu Jisu Khrista na wanram heithou wa yung angha tuiral wontam hekta hakka am ae.
Amona asul akha chu thi ang ani pumhi atreem amlou arat ae nea na si matak hekta wulpi ange, hiyongpa marat thuiya eheilima si ange.

Chuna sarukka kalungsit ka-u-kanao ngei oh nangeita lungsi inge, akha chu nangeita rinum inge, nangeina keita ariempi ae hina sarukka keina nangei maramma lok chok ti inge, hina sarukka Khrista kolla nangei na chetta ngiro, kalungsit kau kanao ngeiyo.
Eyodia lea Sintuki Khrista minga lungrang akha chakka amranga nanui limta rillinge,

Kei itta tullu ronha nangei nako hi namei ngei hita sanpi oh, maram chu manina Klemen akha chu kei itta ratta tullu ae ha Chungthieng abai sunga ming jiekka si manilim tolla arha tongsan suirang tullu lu ha am ae.
Nangeina Khrista kolla am ah ariem ou oh woihako lesira rillinge ariem ou oh.
Meelim kolla lungnem ma ngailhak ou oh, Rengha ranga yung ang so ae.
Eheilim taranga nalung ol no oh apha changhonna lungsunga ariem adomna si ah nangei awat lim Chungthieng kolla nie oh.
Hana malmasi na dang phane no Chungthieng adai hana nalung akha chu lung ranglim Khrista kolla suino ngamno lutta ampiange.
Ulenao ngei oh atreem na changa, nangei lunghi mee na adom rangna si ah ampi oh, tichu, adiek, alunglok, arha, athieng, lungsi akha chu ajak ati ya ngai hina si ah am oh.
Kaning kolla hei thou wa nangei chu akha chu katongsan, katullu ka ae limhi nangei ae ou oh. Hana anita adai pe Chungthieng na apha changhon nangei chunga amsu oh.
Karing chang hina Khrista kolla amha ae ehekta arieminge maram chu nangeina keita ansirang apha ha waso ae, nangeina keita chu makso chou ae ta rilla nonge, apha ha nangeina phano ah sa ae.
Keina awat amsinge ta rilla nonge, keina ka am kadonte hina ahopnai tihi amrang chuphur singe.

Atomte ah amrangko keina dang inge, atam ma am rangko dang inge, hiyong athuk alu hi keina chuphur singe, chuna eyong jui apha ah wontam hal won hophal, atomte amhal atampanu amhal keina apel ahop nai inge.
Khrista na keita arat pek jara hiyongpa shuk jui ah keina maitukne inge.
Chutiweta ka ol jui ah nangei sanhi nangei ninga arha ae.
Nangei Philipi ngei oh amating apha hana arha tongsan suiranga Mesedoniya lhaphura kathinglei ah nangei ano ah atuting akok ngeinako keita sanpi am no ae tihi nangei nako rhabakta dangha sa ae.
Thesolonikiya ah darkar ka am leiko nangei na awat limha thunna lha phur chou ae.
Keina nangei pekchak langnum ah no ae, nangei sum hou ah lella tam tek rang sha ae.

Nangeina kawatlim samrangta lella keina nangei kolla thouwa phasinge. Epaphroditas kolla ka darkarta lella nangei pek lha ha phasinge hilimhi Chungthieng na angei, ahop akha chu ariem hoi akat pot hekti sa ae.
Kapa Chungthieng kolla awat amlou manei madon hana nangei awat limha pepi ange.
Ani Apa Chungthieng ha atreem naino lutta loktek seitek changsu oh. Amen.
Kei itta amha ulenao ngeina Khrista Jisu kolla am Chungthieng mee ngeita ariem tongsan lanne.
Hina am Chungthieng mee limna akha chu kolnunga am ngeinako ariem tonsang lanna hla ae.
Arengpu Jisu Khrista lungshit ha nangeilim chunga amsu oh.
Chungthieng hina ahal Khrista Jisu na ahalsa rui Pol akha chu uleanao Timothi kolhai thou wa.
Khrista minga ngoiring uleanao Kolosiya ah am Chungthieng mee ngei: Pa Chungthieng na lungshi adai pe shu oh nangei chunga.
Nangei taranga kani niek changhonna arengpu Jisu Khrista mapa Chungthieng ta dom munge.
Khrista Jisu ta nangei ngoiring kani thei juija akha chu Chungthieng mee ngeita nangei lungshit ha.
Nangei kolla masha ah ahra tronglam adiek rou tunga lungrang hi nangei taranga ae ta theipha saruk jarhana nangei lungshit akha chu ngoiring hi wanram ma shi lungrang hana ringa am meh.

Chuna ahra tronglam na jaihra pe ah akha chu simlei su wa jaihra ronphao na ahul tunga thange, Chungthieng na adiek takka lungshit hi nangei kolla akha chu nangeina masha theipha rungnie ah dang hek ti ae.
Tullu ah ngoiring chet akha chu kani hutta Khrista tullu lu ah am lungshit shuh tonpi Epaphras kolla nahi nangei na chu oh.
Muihla hana jarra nangei lungshit ha amo na kani ta dangpi so ae.

Hina sarukka kani na nangei rou thei nie rungnie hai thou wa apha changhon kani niek na makno wa amunge kani na Chungthieng kolla niek chu, muihla na pek lungsing lungwar akha chu lunghal thei na nangei lungshi na shi shu oh.
Chuna jarra nangei na arengpu ditta ringa am nea ange akha chu apha chang honna na ringchang na ahra tullu lim shukkange hana Chungthieng lungwar hita munt ha ah lokka hang nea ang.
Mahung majaitha haithou wa phao arat hana nangei ta rat pi shu oh, chuna nangei na aol ana lim ha dong nea ang chau ae.
Akha chu Pathieng ta ariemma dom maou oh. amona nangei taranga awat am no lutta tum halla shi ae awan rengram hana Chungthieng mamee ngei taranga.
Amo na athieng jaitha hai thou wa anita san na, rui ah alungshit asanaopa reng ramma tungpi ae.
Makhol hai thou wa anita hlapi ae tichu ani pak lim pa kom silpi so ae.
Khrista mita ri nea lou Chungthieng amel ae. Ashem phur lim chunga chungtekti masha don asanao pa ae.

Chuna sarukka makol hai thou wa Chungthieng na thangwan akha chu aleiram eheilim semso ae mita rilou akha chu mitta ri hana ane angam rourilne ngei lea mitpu, ashuk limpa Chungthieng na simlei chunga am lim hi majarra akha chu mataranga semphur so ae.
Amo chu eheilim matienga am phur so ae chuna eheilimpa ha amo hita am ha ae.
Amo chu ahalsha ngei hina alu ae, amo hi ahalsa meengei ringchang athou na ae hana amo hi masha don sanaopa ae amona athi hai thou wa ringthouna chu eheilim amunt na masha ah mapha rang sa ae.
Nahi Chungthieng mathei chakka malungir sa ae ha chu asanao pa chunga Chungthieng amo mak hina awong na shihakti ae.

Chungthieng nalungir so ae asanao pa jarra simlei chung limpa hi makolla rui lea ange. Asanao pa na khross chunga thit jarra Chungthieng adai sem so ae chuna amona aleiram akha chu wanram eheilim ha makolla rui lea nea so ae.
Apha akha nangei aram lah ah am phur ae Chungthieng kol hai thou wa akha chu nangei lunghal lea nangei tullu na amota anda mee changphur ae.
Chuti weta atun chu asanao pa na pum ma thit na jarra Chungthieng namai kunga nangei ta thienga akha chu amut am lou, arillang sum, la nangei ta atonpi wulpi so ae.

Chuna sarukka nangei hi ngoiring atreem am no wa akha chu kae to na amunt shakka am rang hana nangei na ahra tronglam theipha lei ah nangei lung don hata ling no am rang natakna dango. Na ahra tronglam hina tarang sarukka ae. Pol kei na suuk changa ka am hi, chuna na ahra tronglam hi simlei chung malmashi lim ta rousam ma am meh.
Nangei taranga ka-ol ha atun chu kei leima ariem minge Khrista na mapum tichu ahalsa taranga aol dong awat ha katakka aol ana hana keina nangei ta ripta san na chang sange.
Hana Chungthieng na keita ahalsa ngei suuk taranga sem so ae keita arit tullu pek ka shi hi nangei na ahra tullu lu rang sa ae. Na arit tullu hi chu marou lim hi rilla rollang nga ae.
Malmashi lim kol hai thou wa akum ahla eja aru wa thuppa shi ha atun chu mamee ngei ta ripi so ae.

Chungthieng na mahal chu nahi ae; mamee ngei ta aru wa mathuppa mashi hi dangpinum chu, thuppa shi ahung ajai hi malmashi lim tarange akha chu thuppa shi ha nahi ae ha chu Khrista ha nangei sunga am meh hina ril na chu nangei na Chungthieng hina ahung ajai tum pha tollange.

Chuna kani na malmashi lim ta Khrista rou hi sui unge hana meelim chang honna chupi takpi ah mani ae no rang kom ril unge mee akha, akha na Khrista kolla rakit pha ah akha chu Chungthieng am na pha nea rang lungsin lungwar hitta chupi unge.
Nahi pha ranga keina aol ana donga ratta hot na inge Khrista na pek jaitha pek hana tullu lu inge.
Keina nangei lea Laodicea akha chu keita hrabakta dangno mee taranga eja ah olla tullu lu meh ti ha nangei kolla ril tikkae.
Mani lung sunga aratna na shihakti ha kei na di inge, akha chu rachun na lungshi hlakka Chungthieng hina thuppa shi Khrista masha makhi mani lung sunga sungjel thei ah am shu oh.
Amo hi ae Chungthieng hina thuppa shi lungsing lungwar hata pha rang ha ae.
Chuna keina rillinge atu akha na nangei ta mee dieklou ta ang wurra hung thei no shu oh mani na eja ah ahra kai hal kom.
Rouram chu nangei karra katak makhi am tol no hal kom ka muihla chu nangei hitta am ha ae hana ka riem na akha na nangei na shilung akha chakka Khrista ta nangei ngoiring ka ri juija ae.
Khrista Jisu ta nangei na Arengpu ae ta laa sou chu, amo hitta ring ha oh.
Makolla nangei tro thukka shan, machung nga nangha ring rang sem sa oh, hana chu nangoiring ha hella ratta hang ange, nangei ta chupi hekta hana chu ariem na shihak ti ange.
An no, Malmashi ngei thei sing na nangei akha tro phao ta rui ah thing no shu oh, akha chu aleiram ma hrano muihla na kom Khrista kol hai thou ano wa.
Khrista hina apum maring chang hi Chungthieng makkae.
Chuna nangei ringchanghi amo hita shihakta am ha rang pe so weh. Amo chu muihla akha chu anea angam ngei lim chunga ronna am ha ae.
Amo hita nangei am ha jarra nangei hi asartan so ae malmashi ngei na asartan ano lutta, Khrista mak na sem asartan ha ae nahana na pak pum hai thou shukka thingso ae.
Rouram chu baptias ae lei apha ah nang ha Khrista hita ui then so ae, hana nangoiring jar hana Khrista hita baptias ae hana ringthou so ae Chungthieng jaitha hana athi sa hai thou amota ringpi so ae.

Nangei pak hana jarra apha akha ah chu muihla ah thi sa so ae hana chakno wa rouphun am no gental sarukka chuti weta Chungthieng Khrista hitta ringha rang ruiphao pi so ae. Chungthieng na ani pakkom shilpi so ae.
Sanpi ngeilou ani landon makhai kom amona tan na hou so ae hana huppa shi chatnabi hakom khross chunga thirjum ham na jarra pak lim ha la ah hou so ae.
Khross chung Khrista na ane angam mitpu ngei ta nea ah amona wairol riha ngei maikunga ripi ae.
Chuna sarukka atu akha na kom nabak na een taranga akha chu athieng rungnie, anolea hlathar reen anolea sabbath taranga routreem no shu oh.
Na lim pa hi chu anutieng taranga ahla sa ae; adiek tak ha chu Khrista sa ae.

Atu jong akha na danga mari nea jar na akha chu meelou wanrui ta mok hana kei, kei sange ta hal atujong akha na nangta hungthei no shu oh. Hajong ngei ha chu mani hal pa na jarra areem salla mang ange.
Alu chang Khrista kolla hijongpa ngei na am num no ae pum lim hi chu Khrista hana thuija akha lea akha jom hlakka lokka hanga Chungthieng nakom lokka hang ha madit sha ae.

Nangei hi Khrista hitta thi ha so ae chuna simlei chung ane angam ngei muihla kut chung hai thou wa shuk so ae chulea chu alo sarukka na aleiram hina taranga ringa am ma che? Elo wa hajong ane angam ngei ril trong jui ah am ma che?
“Choi kom choi no ah,” “bakka kom an no ah,” “adang ha ta kom tong no oh?”
Na limpa hi areem sal rukkae, apha akha ah choi houphur hal kom mani ha mee na sem lam sha ae akha chu, chupi sha ae.
Hajong lam ha mani na hrano muihla ta mok sharukka hajongpa lungsing shukka sha ae. Alou lunghal akha chu pum ta aol ana pe ah ae, hana pum ta mant rang kanant ekom am no ae.
Khrista hitta ringa thou su ta lea chu wanram tienga taranga nalung shioh hana Khrista na Chungthieng phomlu chang tienga onga am meh.
Chuna nalunghal kom hana chetta den na am mo, na aleiram hina pot tarang ano lutta.
Rouram chu mathit na sha rukka naring chang hi Khrista hitta Chungthieng am na ah thuppa shi so ae.
Chuna Khrista hi adiek takka naringchang so ae hana mamal maripi jui ja nang kom hata ri pha nea ang nge hana amo hitta mahung majai tum ha pha ha ange.
Aleiram ma nadit natullu lim ha thi pi oh, na ngei ha chu, namei apa vokno, thienglou, hrano adi trongchop trong akha chu hopla pella lim.
Hina sarukka Chungthieng lungshat hi jong ang so ae aril juino ngei chunga.
Chuna apha akha ah chu nangei hi hajong adi hana ringphur ae rouram chu hajong ngei hana nangei chunga am phur ae.
Atun chu lungsha rat, anshi anda, anar don, akha chu trongshi trongbau haithou wa chan jou oh.
Akha lea akha murthui trong hlak no oh, rouram chu hajong nangei ringchanga hrano lim ha lah ah hou so ae.
Hana natak na natakta athar punchoi dirchoi jou oh nahana sempipa hina amel akha chu lungsing lungwar shukna chang ange.
Hina sharukka Jihudi akha chu gental am mang ni jo weh, hana asartan lea tan no kom am mang no ae, hana shuklea mitpu kom am mang no ae; Khrista eheilimpa mitpu ae!
Nangei hi Chungthieng mee ae, amo na nangeita lungshi ae akha chu mataranga nangei ta hal so ae chunna ringrei thei adong thei hina natakta punchui derchoi hekta choi oh, meethui donga.
Akha lea akha santhei hlakko ejonga akha na akha kolla aral amjuija, arengpu na nangei kolla san chu hekta chuna nangei kom hata ae anga sa ae.
Nalim chunga lungshi thei hi hla no oh, nahina eheilimpa ta akha chakka rakit pha pi nea ae.
Hana Khrista hina adaina nalung sunga am shu oh hina tarang sarukka nangei ta pum akha chak tulla Chungthieng na koksha ae chuna adom thei oh.
Khrista rou na nalunga shi hakta am shu oh lungsunga chupi takpi ah ahrat ranga akha lea akha ril hlakka. Chungthieng kolla muihla riem na laa sha ah dammo.
Hana nangei na tullu lu halkom rou ril halkom eheilimpa arengpu Jisu minga ae oh, majarra pa Chungthieng ta ariem ma dom mo.
Khristen akha changa namei na ngei oh napishal thuija am mo.
Pashal ngei oh nangei namei ngei ta lungshi pi oh, hana mani ta aol pe no oh.
Unga ngei oh apha chang honna nanu napa ril trong jui oh nahi Khristen ngei ae phung shuk tullu sa ae.
Mapa ngei oh, nangei unga ngei ta lungsha pi no oh mani ha nung lea ange.

Kor ngei oh eheilimpa ah nangei mitpu ngei ril trong jui oh, mani na an na am lei chak no wa mani na lungshi pha rang chak no wa nalung thiengo, rouram chu nangta ajak atri pha rang sha ae namitpu na.
Natullu lu lim changhonna nalung lutta ae oh. Mee ngeita ae no lutta Arengpu taranga ae ta hallo.
Arengpu na malmashi ngei taranga mashi olnamant. Maram chu Khrista hi adiek namitpu ae.
Chuna aral tullu lu ah am mee taranga ma ae na nujui ja amota pe ange rouram chu Chungthieng na akha chakka malmashi lim ta routreem ange.
Mitpu, ngei oh, nakor ngeita nathing nahong ha ei chang eiwoi nei no oh, rouram chu angei thei oh nangkom namitpu akha am meh wanram ma.
Nalung lutta nie ah naniek jui ja. Chungthieng ta ariem ma dommo.

Hi, hitta mun ha ah kani taranga kom nie pi oh, chuna jarra Chungthieng na kani ta apha ahra pepi ah Khrista ahra athup marou ril shuk rang apha, pha tukkae hana sarukka ae atun keina raen inn ka am hi ae.
Aniek hana jarra kei na ejongpa rilphung shuk mak hata thienga ril nea ranga.
Ngoiring no ngei maikunga nangei athing ahong ha lungsing ngo. Chuna nangei na tancha ahra pha ta lou chu nahana ahra shukpi oh.
Narou ril chang honna ahoi than num thathou rang rillo, hana meelim na rousai ha alo ta adiek rou sang anga meh ti ha kom dango.
Ani lungshit ulea nao Tykikas ngoiringa ngei tullu lu akha chu arengpu matullu ah ani tonpi shuk amo na nangei kolla karou thar hi takpi ange.
Chuna taranga ae kei na nangei kolla amota kahla hi, kani hi alo ta am sha hana nangei na dang lea chu nangei lung kom amona thanum thathou pi ange.
Amo hita mun ha ah Onesimus lungshit ngoiringa ngei uleanao nangei jaty, mani na hina shukka am eheilim pa ha rilpi ange.

Kei hitta raen inn sunga am ha Aristarkas na kom nangei ta riemtuk pe ah hla ae, hana Barnabas mapate sanao Mak, nangei kolla chupi takpi sa so ae ejonga (Mak na nangei kolla tung lea amota hrabakta akha chu ariem ma lah pi oh.)
Justus ta kom kok hlak Joshua nakom riemtuk pe ae Chungthieng rengram taranga kei hitta tullu lu ha am Jihudi sanao ngoiring inthum mani chakkae hana mani na kom kei ta lok ka san na am meh.

Khrista Jisu shuk nangei jaty Epaphras tonpi na kom riemtuk pe ah am ae. Amona apha chonghonna nangei na lungir ra am ranga Chungthieng kolla nie ah am meh, hana chakno wa Chungthieng ahalla hrabakka thing nea rang akha chu lungkim ah rakhit pha am rang kom.
Hierapolis akha chu Laodiceah ah am malmashi ngei hana nangei taranga alung lutta matullu ha lu hi kei katak na amota hrabak ta dang singe.
Ani Lungshit Doctor Luk hana Demas mani na kom riemtuk pe ah am meh.
Nympha inn na ani tukhlak akok sha ngei lea Laodicea ulea nao ngei ta kani ariem na riemtuk hi pe pi oh.
Na trongleng hi napat su len mak no oh de Laodicea ah akoksha ngei ta kom dangpi oh, hana uieanao Laodicea ngei tah kom nangna pat rang ae oh.
Hana Arkippas kolla kom ril pi oh, “Arengpu matullu ah amota pek ha asu ranga ae shu oh.”
Pol kakol hai thou wa riemtuk hi kei kakut makka na trongleng hi jiekka am minge kei hi mee na huppa shi ae makno oh! Chungthieng lungshit na nangei chunga am shu oh deh.
Pol, Sailas, akha chu Timothi hai thou wa Thesolonikiya ah am abom nangei ta Pa Chungthieng akha chu arengpu Jisu Khrista hina lungshit akha chu adai nangei kolla am shu oh.
Nangei sarukka apha chang honna Chungthieng ta riemma dom munge, hana kani niekjuija kom nangei ta angei thei unge.

Pa Chungthieng maikunga kanina nangei ta angei thei chu, nangei na ngoiring hi alo ta tullu changa lu sha, nangei lungshit na alota tullu ratta lu nea sha, akha chu Arengpu Jisu Khrista kolla ah ta nangei lungrang hi eja chetta am sha.
Uleanao ngei oh, Chungthieng na nangei ta lungshit akha chu mataranga nangei hi ahalsa so ae tihi kani na dang unge.

Chuna nangei taranga kani na ahra tronglam hi echam chamma rou ha chak ronna phao nonge muihla athieng hana jaitha akha chu adiek hata danga phao unge kani hi nangei hitta am ha sou chu alota ringa am sa nangei na dang ange nalim hi nangei ahrat rang chak sha ae.
Nangei na kani akha chu arengpu awong la oh; aol ana pha hal kom ariem nea chau ae, na ha chu muihla athieng kol hai thou phao sa ae.
Chuna nangei hi Mesedoniya akha chu Akaiah ngoiringei mai ah chu rang awong chango.
Chungthieng kolla nangei ngoiring hi Mesedoniya akha chu Akaiah ram chak no wa amunt chang honna thang so ae. Chuna hana taranga kani rillang am no ae.

Hana malmashi lim na nangei kolla kani tung ja nangei na ariem ma lapi maramma ril hlakkae, akha chu alo ta nangei na kutta sem hlawang hai thou Chungthieng kolla lea ah adiek akha chu aring Chungthieng ta domma meh.
Akha chu Chungthieng malungshat tang hai thou anita sanpi athi hai thou wa maringpi masanao Jisu wanram ma thou majung ang hakka nangei am ha.
Uleanao ngei oh, nangei kolla kani phao hi ariem sal no ae ti hi nangei tak mak na kom dang ange.

Nangei am na kani tungma tienga Philipi ah kani ta ajak tukpi ah aol ana eja kom pha ha, nangei na dang ang nge hana chunga anshi anda eja am hal kom Chungthieng kol hai thou ah ahra tronglam nangei kolla ril shuk nea rang kanita atri am pi no ae.
Nangei kolla rouram kani ril num chu dieklou thienglou tarang akha chu hungpher ae rang no ae.

Hajong hutta apha chang honna Chungthieng na kanita madit hachak trongshuk kunge, rouram chu Chungthieng na kani ahra tronglam sam ranga angei pe ah routreem pe so ae, chuna kani na malmashi lungshi pha rang tullu lu nonge chuti weta meelung dang Chungthieng malungshit rang tullu lu unge.
Rouram chu nangei na hrabakta dang nga am meh nangei kolla ahra sa ah ae nonge hana ka hella kani tarang hal na kom am no ae, Chungthieng na meelung ngir sha ae.
Kani na atujong akha kolla adom pha rang nga kom hot na no ae nangei nahal kom adang mee na halkom.
Khrista rouron rui akha chang halkom nangei hitta kani am ha lei sung hina chu kani kom nangei hek ti unge manu akha na asanao ta ngei hekta ngai unge.
Nangei ta kani lungshit sarukka Chungthieng ahra tronglam chak no lutta kani ringchang kom nangei taranga pe unge. Rouram chu nangei ha kani na ehekta lungshiae

Routakka nangei na dang chou ae. Uleanao ngei oh, nisuon janting aol ana donga tullu eja ah ae sha ti ha, rouram chu kani na Chungthieng ahra tronglam nangei kolla peklei sunga nangei kolla ahan apan am no rang sa ae.
Thieng ngoiring, adiek akha chu dieklou am lou nangei kolla kani na alo ta thienga meh ti ha nungei akha chu Chungthieng na meelung ngir ae.
Mapa na asanao ta an hekta kanina nangei lim pa ta an ma am meh ti ha nangei na dang pha chou ae.
Kani na nangei ta thanum thawak pi ah akha chu ariem pi ah hana nangei ta kokpi Chungthieng na lungshit pharang akha chu marengram ma mahung majai saruk phu ranga nangei ta ril ung nge.

Hana Chungthieng ta apha chang honna kani dom na akha na, Chungthieng marou ha kani na nangei kolla ronna phao juija malmashi ngei rou hekta lah no wa nangei thei pha len riemma ngei pi ha, ngoiringei nangei shunga Chungthieng na matullu lu ah am meh.

Chuna uleanao ngei oh, nangei hi Jihudiah ah Chungthieng ahalsha mee ngeina Khrista Jisu awong lak hekta nangei na kom nangei ram sunga am mee ngei kut chunga aol pha hi hana lei ah ahalsha ngei na Jihudi ngei kut chunga aol ana pha hek ti ae.
Mani na arengpu Jisu akha chu thiempu ta that ta akha chu kani ta aol ana pe ae. Mani ha Chungthieng lungshit pha mee changno ae, akhana mani ha malmangshi lim ta jiekna mee ae!
Mani na jat adang ngai lung hlong ranga kani rouril thing phao hanna shi ae chuna mani ae na pak tullu hi na atreem na tungjui ja chu, atun hi mani chunga Chungthieng malungshat tung so ae!
Uleanao ngei oh, kani taranga chu lunghal no lutta pum na ani hi adang, adanga hran hlakka am hi, kanina nangei ta woiha ri hlak num ma hot na sha.
Chuna kani na nangei am na phao num munge Pol katak makhi woihata lella nangei kolla lea sier rang hot na inge, chuti weta saitan na kanita hanna shi ae.
Rouram chu arengpu Jisu jung juija maimai kunga ral nea na lubur pha rang lungrang akha chu ariem ha nangei chak ta no meh?
Routakka nangei hi kani lokrang akha chu ariem rang ha ae!
Apha shotta hakneno sharukka kani na Athen na kani chak am ranga rou ngir so ae.
Kani hitta Chungthieng matullu ron ha am uleanao Timothi ta Khrista marou ahra tronglam sam ranga akha chu nangei ngoiring ling no wa am rang hana thanum thathou ranga hla unge.
Chu lea chu nangei akha phao na kom aol ana pha juija nulea ang no ae nangei natak mak na dang ha ae hajong aol ana pe ha chu ani kolla Chungthieng ahal akha ae.
Nangei hitta kani am ha lei ah nangei kolla apha chang honna ril phur ha adiek takkae, ani hi aol ana pha ange nangei na hella danga am ha mak jou chou?
Hana sarukka amthei no wa keina Timothi ta nangei am na ah hla singe rouram chu ejongpa ahlem na hlem weh ta, kani tullu lu phur lim ariem salla tullang mo weta nangei ngoiring ha an ranga hla inge.

Atun chu Timothi hi lea ah, amo na nangei ngoiring nga akha chu lungshi hlakka am na ariem rou ron na phao ae hana kani ta amo na ri hlak num ma kani na nangei ta rihlak mum hek ta hal ahra ha ril pi ae.
Uleanao nangei ngoiring na jarra kani na eheilim ma aol ana tukhlak hi hella thanum thathou na changpi ae kanita.
Maramchu atan routakka kani na ring unge nangei na nangei ringchang hi Khrista hitta chetta am lea chu.
Nangei tarang sarukka atun kani na Chungthieng ta riem ma dom num munge. Ma am na ah riem nea unge nangei sharukka.
Lutta nanangei akha, akha ta rihlak rang akha chu nangei ngoiring darkar am lim san ranga suon jan nei no wa ni ah amunge.
Ani Pa Chungthieng matak mak akha chu ani arengpu Jisu na nangei am na tung rang lam sat pi shu oh!
Arengpu na nangei akha lea akha lungshi hlak pi shu oh, kani na lungshit hekta nangei lungshit kom naha naha hel pi shu oh.
Na lampi hina amo na nangeita rat pi ah ani arengpu Jisu na mamee ngei hitta jung ha juija Pa Chungthieng maikunga nangei hi athieng rakit pha mee chang ange.

Atreem na ah, uleanao ngei oh, nangei na alota ring ang akha chu thing ang Chungthieng na pel changrang, kani kolla nangei na dangpha sho weh chu hekta naha, naha hella hang rang arengpu Jisu minga kanina mokka akha chu rilla am munge.
Nangei na danga am areng Jisu hina ane jaitha hana kani na nangeita chupi takpi ha.
Chungthieng na nangei hi thienga am di no ae, hana namei apa vokno hi am pi num no ae.
Apa lim pana nangei namei ngei hita alota thienga ajak atri ah ring ha ang meh dang phung shukkae.
Chungthieng mel dangno jat adang ngei hekta hrano mitta adi hrano lunghal hal thingno oh.
Hina sarukka atu akha na matonpi akha ta dieklao tullu lu no shu oh akha chu tancha lah no shu oh. Nangei maikunga kani na rilphur ha ae akha chu hajong ae no rang akal rou ril ha ae.
Rouram chu Chungthieng na ani ta kok hi thiengno ranga no ae, thienga ring ranga sha ae.
Chuna sarukka, atujong amo na na chupi takpi hi ta ngei num no lea amo na malmashi ta ngeinum no ano ae, nangei ta a thieng mamuihla pe pi Chungthieng ta ngei num no wa sa ae.
Chuna nangei ngoiringei kar sunga lungshi hina rou wa jiekka hla rang darkar am no ae. Rouram chu nangei mashel akha lea akha lungshi hlak ranga Chungthieng na chu pi takpi phur so ae.
Adiek tak chu nangei na hata Mesedoniya ulea nao ngei ta lungshi ah am meh chutichun hella, hella lungshi hlak rang kani na nangei kolla hlem unge.
Adai ringchanga ringa am rang denna shi oh, matullu matullu lu rang hallo akha chu naring rang ratta tullu lu oh. Amatienga kom hitta rillunge.
Chuna hita ae ah naring nga ngoiring no ngei kolla nangna thangshuk maipak pha ah akha chu nangna atu akha kolla bei no wa ring nea ange.
Uleanao ngei oh, athi sa ngei ta ranga nangei kolla adiek rou ha nangei ta dangpi num munge chu lea chu lungrang am no ngei na olla am hekta nangei na aol pha ang no ae.
Ani ngoiring chu Jisu na thi weta lea ah ringthou ae chuna amota ngoiringa thi lim ta Chungthieng amo na Jisu hita woiha lea rui tum mange.
Atun kani na nangei ta chupi hi arengpu machu pi aearengpu majung rungnie phao wa ringa am ani hi athi sha ngei matienga etikkom masha nea ang no ae.

Apha hana wanram tienga aring sanrol, akha chu wanrui ngei sanrol na auw wa hana Chungthieng tumpet, san rol thei juija Areng matak mak na wanram hai thou jung ange. Hana Christa ta ngoiringa thi ngei na masha ah ring thou ange.
Hana nutienga houphur ringa am ani na mani kom arengpu hitta tukhlak ranga sumphai karra areng hitta tukhlak ranga rui ah kallange. Chuna ani na atreem nei no wa arengpu hitta am ha ange.
Chuna sarukka na rou hina akha lea akha thanum thathou pi hlak ko.
Ulea nao ngei oh hajong rungnie akha chu apha hi kani na nangei ta jiekka hla rang darkar am no ae.
Rouram chu nangei na hrabak ta dange ha chu arengpu majung ang rungnie chu aru thei pa na jantienga phao hek ti ae.
Meengei ngei na hita rillea, “Eheilim pa hi dai so akha chu hra so weh” hana edang, dang no wa mani chunga pha so ae! Naoron namei na nao don nang aol hata hlik nea no hekti ae.
Chuti weta uleanao ngei oh, nangei chu athiem ma am no chou ae, niesoun na awar ra aru pa na nangei ta angak shuk pi no shu oh.
Nangei lim hi awar sanao ae hana niesoun sanao chak sha ae. Ani hi jantieng athiem sanao no ae.
Chuna ani na jalla am mani hekti no ei oh ani na maranga am ei oh.
Rouram chu jalla am amo na janna jalla sha ae, hana await ngei na jantienga rui ah sha ae.
Chuti weta ani chu niesoun sanao sou chu ani na lungsinga am mei oh lungshi lea ngoiring na pho shakka akha chu aring kaeto na lung denna lubur shakka shi ei oh.
Rouram chu Chungthieng na lungshat ranga anita halla no ae. Chutiweta Jisu Khrista hei thou wa aring kaeto pha rang nga sa ae.
Amo na ani taranga thi pi so ae chuna ani na thi hal ringhal ani hi amo hitta ring ha anga ae.
Chuna nangei akha lea akha thanum thathou hlakko akha chu, akha lea akha san hlakko, atun na nangei ae am hi hekta.
Uleanao ngei oh, nangei kolla kani na rilla am unge, nangei karra tullu lu am mee ta ajak ati oh, amo na lamkai ah Khrista ringchang tarang chupi takpi ah am sha ae.
Mani tullu hana jarra mani ta lungshi ah chungtekta dom mo akha lea akha dai ah ring ha oh.
Hana uleanao ngei oh kani na rilla am munge ha chu atal adol ngeita kom tri pi oh, ajak rat ngei ta kom thathou pi oh, ashul ana ngei takom sanpi oh, meelim hitta adong thei ha oh.

Nahi makno oh, atu akha na kom aral taranga aral tullu lu no shu oh, hana akha na akhata apha chang honna ringrei ngeihlak shu oh. Chutiweta apha chang honna akha lea akha akha chu mee limpa nou ahra tullu lu rang denno.
Apha chang honna ariem mo.
Atreem am no lutta nie oh.
Ehei lim chang honna domna shi oh. Nahi Khrista Jisu kolla nangei taranga Chungthieng mahal ae.
Muihla athieng ta thinga shi no oh.
Muihla athieng rou ta ngeinum no ae no oh.
Eheilimpa ta chang anno, hana ahra hata chetta kollo.
Hrano eheilim ta junna hou wo.
Anita adai pe Chungthieng amo na napum namuihla lim pa ta athieng changpi shu oh hrano lim hai thou wa arengpu Jisu Khrista majungnie rungni phao sunga.
Nangei ta kok amo na ae ange rouram chu amo hi ngoiringa ngei sha ae.
Kani taranga kom nie pi oh ulea nao ngei oh.
Ngoiring lim ta riemtuk pea ah uleanao hekta chup hlakko.
Keina Arengpu angei nujuija nangei limta mokka aminge ngoiring mee lim ngei maikunga na trongleng hi pa pi oh.
Ani Arengpu Khrista Jisu hina lungshit na nangei hitta am ha shu oh.
Pol, Shailas akha chu Timothi kol haithou wa Thesolonikiya ah akok sha Pa Chungthieng akha chu arengpu Jisu Khrista.
Pa Chungthieng akha chu arengpu Jisu Khrista hina lungshi adai nangei chunga am shu oh.

Uleanao nangei sarukka kani hi apha chang honna Chungthieng ta dom munge na hi adiek takkae, rouram chu nangei ngoiring hi naha, naha hella hang akha chu nangei lim pa lungshi hlakka akha lea akha lungshit hel hlak jarra ae.
Chuna sarukka Chungthieng na akok sha ngei karra kani na nangei ta ana-asa dongthei akha chu ngoiring lingno am hi na sarukka lung lok kunge.
Nalim hina meelung ngir ae Chungthieng routreem hi adiek rou ae. Hina jarra nangei hi Chungthieng rengram taranga masing tel then na rakit che ae ha chu aol ana nangei dongthei hana.
Chungthieng na adiek ha emo tiha ae ange. Hana amo na nangeita aol ana pe ngei ta aol ana pe pi ange.
Hana aol ana pha nangei tana amo na aol ha pe ange akha chu kani ta kom Nalim pa hi arengpu Jisu na wanram hai thou wa wanruei ngei hit majung jui ja ri ange.
Chuna Arengpu Jisu hina ahra tronglam hita akha chu Chungthieng marou matrong juino ngei ta chu dan di pek ranga sarmei hita jung ange.
Mani hata atreem nei no amang atah phana sunga dandi shi ange hana arengpu hina ahung ajai hai thou wa hran nange.

Rungnie hana majung juija chu atheing mamee ngei ta mahung majai phu pi ange Hana amota ngoiring lim na amota ajak atri ange Nahi sunga nangei kom tol so ae rouram chu kani rouril hi nangei na ngoiring ae.

Hina sarukka kani na apha chang honna nangei tarang nie ah am munge. Nahana Chungthieng na kom nangei ta kok khi rakit cha na kom chang shu oh akha chu majaitha hana nangei eheilim tullu lu na akha chu ngoiring ha shihakti pi shu oh.

Kani niek chu arengpu Jisu hina mahung majai hi nangei kolla pha shu oh, hana Arengpu Jisu na kom nangei kolla ahung ajai ha nangei na kom makolla ani Chungthieng akha chu arengpu khrista Jisu hina ma lungshit pha shu oh.
Arengpu Khrista jung ang hina rouram ma akha chu ani na makolla rachun nang hi kani na ulea nao nangei ta hlem ma am munge.
Arengpu Jisu rungnie hi tung so ae ta nangei lung sunga olla akha chu lungrang shukthei no wa am no oh, ejong kani jiekka hla rouram ma hal kom hana chupi takpi hina kom.
Atu jong akha na nangei ta ejongpa akha tieng hal kom hungpher no shu oh rouram chu anda mee na akha chu hrano mee sarmei kum ma luttangei na shuk malim ma arengpu rungnie ha tung ang no ae.
Amo ha chu mathei chakka dom ma meelim na mok hlawang lim chunga chungtek ti ange, hana amona Chungthieng athieng inn sunga phao lutta onga mathei chakka kei hi Chungthieng inge ta rillange.
Nangei na angei thei no wa chao meh, keina nangei hitta ka-am ha lei ah na lim pa hi karil sha so ae?
Atun phao sunga chu shukkang hi ejong akha na thinga am hi, dang pha ange nangei na kom, mapha ha pha yuija chu hrano na mamel ri pi ange.
Hrano athup matullu ha lu ah am meh; chuti weta shukkang am ha choija ampa hana hla malim ma shukkang no ae.
Hana hrano paha shukkange, chuti weta areng Jisu na jungjuija am na mahuk thal hana thattange akha chu made mawar hana amota amang atah shukpi ange.
Saitan hina yaitha jarra hrano pana diek lou angakpi anealah adang, adang ri pi ange.
Amang angei ta hrano hanna jat jat hrano eja hita hungpher ange. Chuna mani na amang tah ae rouram chu mani na adiek akha chu lungshi ta ngei num no ae.
Hina sharukka Chungthieng na ehekta jaitha am hrano hla pi ange, mani karra tullu lu ranga. Chutilea chu mani na dieklou hrano tullu lu ti hi ngoiring ranga.
Hina amant chu adiek hata ngoiring no wa pak ariem ahoi hata di lim pa chunga aol pha ange.

Arengpu lungshit uleanao ngei oh nangei sharukka kani hi apha chang honna Chungthieng ta dom manga ae. Rouram chu Chungthieng muihla athieng na nangei ta masha ah shilpi hana akha chu adiek hata ngoiring lim pa na aring kea to pha rang hal pi so weh.
Kani na nangei kolla ahra tronglam pek hana jarra amo na nangei ta kok so ae ha chu ani arengpu Jisu Khrista hina mahung majai ha pha ranga.
Chuna sarukka uleanao ngei oh kani na tronglam na hal murra hal anolea trongleng na hal kani chupi takpi hi nangei na chetta kolla shi oh. p
Ani Rengpu Jisu Khrista matak mak akha chu ani ta ahra lungrang pe ah thanum thathou pi ah am ani pa Chungthieng na lungshit ringrei na.
Thanum thathou pi shu oh nangei lung sunga akha chu nangei tullu lu na changhon na arat lol pi shu oh.
Atreem na ulea nao ngei oh kani taranga nie pi oh, hana jara arengpu marou hi kani na atreem am no lutta sam rol nea ange akha chu marou theipha malmashi lim na nangei hekta ajak atri shu oh.
Hana hrano malmashi ngei kut chung hai thou wa Chungthieng na san pi ranga; rou ram chu malmashi lim na rouril hi ngoiring nea no ae.
Chuti weta arengpu chu ngoiring ngei mee sha ae hana amo na nangei ta hrano kut chunga tul no rang san pi ange hana arat jaitha pe pi ange.
Nangei ta ngoiring rang jaitha arengpu na kanita pe pi ae, akha chu kani na nangei kolla ril lim ha atreem am no lutta ae ah am mange ta ngoiring unge.
Nangei chunga Chungthieng na lungshit akha chu Khrista na pek adong thei ha lella dang nea rang lam kai pi shu oh.
Arengpu Jisu Khrista minga nangei kolla tronglam hi rilla am munge ulea nao atal ringchanga ringa am ngei kol hai thou wa thingo, mani ha chu chupi takpi kom jui no ngei ae.
Rouram chu nangei natakmak na kani matienga alo ta jui ang meh ti ha dang sha so ae nangei hitta kani am ha lei ah kani hi adolla ring nonge.
Kani na atu jong akha kolla sum pe no lutta bak inn nonge hana hutta kani na jantieng niesoun nei no wa tullu ratta ae unge chu lea chu kani na nangei atu akha kolla pot rit pe ni yo weh.
Na tullu kani ae hi, kanita nangei san rang ekom am no ae ta rilla ah no ae kani nutienga jui akha changa nangei na, achu rang tullu hi kani na ae unge.
Kani na nangei hitta am ha leija nangei kolla kani ril chak ti hi, “Atu jung akha na tullu lu num no lea chu amota bakkom bak no shu oh.”
Kani na nahi ril na rouram chu kani theipha ah nangei kar sunga dol la ring mee am meh, hana mani na tullu shal hloushulla chak am meh.
Arengpu Jisu Khrista minga kani na hajong malmashi ngei ta tronglam hi rilla am munge mani ha hrabak ta ringthei ah ring shu oh, akha chu mani ring ranga tullu lu shu oh,
chuna uleanao ngei oh, ahra tullu nangei ae juija ol no oh.
Na trongleng kani na nangei kolla hla rouram hi atujung akha na chu juino kom ja ae hajong ha shuklea chu, amota mak no oh, hana makolla ephao ae no oh, chuna amo na hata ajakka am song ange.
Chuti weta amo ta anda mee akha ae ta chu halpi no oh, chuna amota uleanao akha hekta halpi oh.
Arengpu matak mak akha chu ani adai shuk na amo na nangei kolla adai apha chang honna akha chu alam chang honna adai pe shu oh, hana arengpu na nangei kolla am ha shu oh.
Pol katak mak na na riemtuk trongleng hi kakut mak ka jiekka hla inge.
Arengpu Jisu Khrista na lungshit ha nangei kolla am pi shu oh.
Anita sanpipa Chungthieng akha chu ani lungden khrista Jisu tronglam anu juija Khrista Jisu ahalsa rui Pol kolhai thou wa.
Ngoiring lam tienga adiek kasanao Timothi Pa Chungthieng akha chu ani arengpa Khrista Jisu lungshi ringrei akha chu adai nangta pe shu oh.

Mesedoniya ah kathing lei ah karil chu hekta keina nanghi Ephesiya ah am pi numg minge rouram chu malmashi ahre na dieklou lamma chupi takpi ah am so ae chuna nangna mani hata chupi no rang ham thiengo.

Atreem nei no nuhang pahang na arat athei akha chu hlawang ngei hana tamin tajou ha rilno shu oh, nahana akha lea akha jethlak shuhlak na sha ae nahana Chungthieng matullu ma akha chu ngoiring nalam ma ahra shukpi no ae.
Natrongsan hina ril na chu athieng lungsunga thou lungshi hana athieng ahra, hrano hal nea akha chu adiek ngoiring tarang sa ae.
Malmashi ahre chu nahina hai thou wa nulea ah mani thingna lam mangpi ah thinghal lungshalla am so ae.
Mani na Chungthieng roukung hina ocha changnum meh, chuti weta mani atrong hlak hakom ejongpa ril na mo ae ti kom no ae hana chaknowa mani na meelung ngirra am na phao dang no ae.
Ani na dange ha chu rouphun hi ehekta hra ae ani na hrabakta choi thei lea chu.

Hana ani na dang ang chu rouphun lim hi ahra mee ngei taranga no ae; Chutiweta rouphun juino ngei, meethat meemant ngei hana pak chel ngei akha chu thienglou dramochel no ngei; Hana mapa ano lea manu ta that akhu chu mee that ngei taranga sem sa ae.
Mee namei mee pashal dangno vokno karra tullu lu ah am akha chu ahra tullu hai thou wa mana no lim pa sa ae.
Na chupi limpa hi ahra tronglam shunga tukkae, hana ahra tronglam mahung majai akha chu Chungthieng jaihra hi ril shuk ranga keita pe sho ae.
Ani rengpa Khrista Jisu ta keina riemma dom minge. Amo na keita jaitha happi ah matullu ae ranga mangoiring mee changpi ae.

Keina amatienga amota hrano trongril akha chu ah aol ana ejakom tukpi phur inge. Chutiweta Chungthieng chu kei ta malungshit jaihra pe pi ae maram chu nalim ha ekom kadangma akha chu kangoiring no lei sha rukka sha ae.
Ani arengpu atreem am no lungshit ha kachunga bunpi so ae akha chu Khrista Jisu hitta am ha ngoiring lea lungshi ha ani ta sha ae.
Khrista Jisu na simlei chunga jung hi pakchel ngei ta sanpiranga ae hajong ngei kar sunga keina hella pak chellinge. Na hi ngoiring nga ngei adiek rouril sha ae.

Chuna jarra pakchel ngei karra hella jaishi tekti kei ta malungshit pepi ae hina Jisu Khrista na adong jo no madong hi anutienga amota ngoiring ngei na samla ringchang pha ranga ngei ta muhpi nga sha ae.
Atun chu Chungthieng amo chak kae, atreem nei no Arengpa, athi am lou, mitta rillou chuna mahung majai ta ajak atri shu oh atreem nei no wa, Amen.
Kasanao Timothi natronglam hi nakolla shilna shinge amatienga rouril phur roungei ha, nang na hra ah ral ae rang tronglam hi ralcham shai hekta choi oh.
Hana nangoiring lingno lutta am mo hana nalung thienga hal thei oh. Malmashi ahre na chu thienga mani lung hal thei no hana mani ngoiring ha manga thing nge.
Mani kar sunga Hymeneas lea Alexander hi aol pha ranga saitan kut chunga kei na pe singe, nahina mani na hrano tullu chan rang dangpha ange.
Masha tekka, keina nangeita kadangpi num chu, meelim taranga Chungthieng kolla nie oh rillo akha chu adom ti ha donna pe oh.
Hana Rengpa akha chu rouril trongril nea meelim na kom adai ringchang ringweta ahra lamchat nei ah Chungthieng mamai kunga ani na ajak atri mee shak chang ranga.
Na hi anita sanpipa Chungthieng na adit ahra sa ae.
Amo hana chu malmashi lim pa hi sanpi pha pi num meh hana adiek ha dangpi num meh.
Rouram chu Chungthieng chu akha chakkae, hana Chungthieng lea malmashi karrakka trong thou hlak rang hi Khrista Jisu amo chakkae.
Amo ha chu matak mak ha pe malmashi lim san rang pi ae Chungthieng na madit apha cha ah amo na sanpi ae.
Hana sarukka ae keita ahal sha rui akha chu ocha changa gental ngei taranga hla ae adiek ngoiring rang rou ha chu pi takpi ranga na hi nangei kolla keina murthui ah rilla nonge adiek takka rillinge.
Hoi ah mun hal kom, hoi ah mum hal kom keina apa ngei na nie juija lungsha tha na am no lutta nangei kut dom ma kal weta nie pi num minge.
Hana namei nu ngei na kom apun ani asam ana lim ha ajon ahra sengweta amant tam sona rupa akha chu shalea thei chang no lutta niek ha di inge.
Chu na namei nu ngei na mani ahra tullu lu hana Chungthieng ningtienga ajak ati chang shu oh.
Namei ngei na lungnem akha chu adai ha chu shu oh.
Kei na namei nu ngei na apa ngei chunga chupi takpi tarang angei pe nonge mani ha dai am shu oh.
Rouram chu masha ah Adam ta sha mee sha ae hana nutienga Eve ta sem meh.
Hana Adam na hungpher ae ano weh; namei nuna hungpher ae phurra Chungthieng rouphun kui pi phur ae.
Chutiweta namei nuna hana sanpi pha ange unga mani don jui ja, ejong mani na thienga lungshi ngoiring ha am hang jui ja.
Nahi adiek rou ae hana ngoiringei ejonga atujongpa mee akhana lungsunga abom lamkai ron tik ti mee am lea chu amo ha ahra tullu di ah sha ae.

Lamkai mee akha chang lea chu aral am lou, namei akha hina pashal chang anga ae lungsha rat no matakta hrabakka bahap ta mee hulang meeta ma inn na bakpi eenpi thei akha chu, chupi takpi nea mee changa ae.
Ju een lou mee, akha chu trongjet hlakka rolno mee chuti weta lungnem akha chu adai mee hana sumdi no mee chang anga ae.
Amo ha chu ma inn sunga hrabakta silthei borthei mee hana asanao ngei na kom ajak atri mee changa anga ae.
(ejong atujong akha na ma inn sung phao sil borthei no lea alota Chungthieng ahal sha ngei ta rung nea ang meh?)
Amo ha chu ngoiring chet mee chang ang nga ae chu lea chu amo na etikom lokchokka saitan ta nainont hakta amoha pha no ranga ae.
Amo ha chu abom sunga chak no lutta meena ajak atri chang anga ae, chulea chu amona ajak tukang no ae akha chu saitan changa luttang no ae.
Abom shunga san ngei shilung thieng mee akha chu ahra simshak am manga ae, mani ha tuishik so mee akha chu sum ta hopla pella mee chang no shu oh.
Mani ha chu adiek ngoiring akha chu athieng lunghal thei ah am ma ta ae.
Mani ha masha tekka chang ang nang nga ae, hana ejonga mani na chang an jui ja nea lea makhai chu san mee chang pi ang nga ae.
Hahekta mani namei ngei kom ajak atri mee chang ang nga ae mee adang lung nat rang rou rillang no sha ae hana lungnem ma eheilimpa ah lungthieng anga ae.
Abom ah san mee ha namei akha chak kanga ae. Hana ah inn sunga asanao ngei ta hrabakta sil thei bor thei ang nga ae.
Hana mani na hrabakta tun hlou ae ah am asan ngei ha Khrist Jisu ta mani ngoiring ha atri am nolutta ril shuk nea ange.
Keina nakolla ranga rilhlak num ma lungrang ae ah trongleng hi jiekka hla inge.

Ejong kei na tai lea chu na kajiek rou hina ani na ani thei ah Chungthieng inn sung nga alota thing anga meh ti nang na dang ang che, nahi chu aring Chungthieng hina inn sung tichu aring Chungthieng abom inpi hi adiekna phun phur sha sho ae.
Chingnat rang ekom am no ae thuppa shi ani dramo hi leima lokkae.
Amo na malmashi akha changa muh phur ae
muihla athiengna amo hi adiek
takkae ta ri pi phur ae
akha chu wan rui ngei nakom ri pha ae
jati lim Pa ngei karra maram ma sui phurra rou ril phur ae
Simlei ram lim na kom ngoiring ae
hana wanram ma rui ah kal sho ae.
Muihla na thienga ril pi na ha chu apha sotno lutta malmashi ahre na mani ngoiring hi mang shi jo weh; Chuna mani na hungthei muihla dijabol na chupi takpi ha jui ange.
Hajong hi ahrasha lak hungthei ngei chupi takpi hana thou suksha ae, hajong ngei lunghal athi sha ae ha, thier asha takka kang ha hekti sha ae.

Hajong mee na taichang phao diekno ae ta chupi ae akha chu abak een pot ahra bak ngei no ae ta chupi ae Chungthieng na chu na abak pot lim pa hi bak ranga semphurre ngoiring akha chu adiek donga domma nie lea chu bakshu oh.
Chungthieng na shakka shi sha eheilim hi ahra chaksha ae; hana ephao ahou ang am no ae. Chutiweta eheilimpa hi riemma nie weta la ang nga ae.
Rouram chu Chungthieng tronglo akha chu aniek hi na thiengpi ae.

Ejong nangna uleanao ngeita hilim hi chupi takpi ta lea chu, nang hi Khrista Jisu hina ahra suuk chang ang che, nangna natak makta ngoiring na rou muihla lam tienga na pha chu hekta akha chu adiek anu jui che ae.
Chungthieng tolno ulien ngei tamin tajou hai thou shukka thingo, chuna Chungthieng mee ringchanga ring nea rang ratta hotna oh.
Pum hrat rang atan achom hi ahre te chu kana ae, chuti weta muihla rat rang tullu lu chu eheilim ma kana ae rouram chu atun alei ringchang lea anutienga phao ang ringchang tarang saro ei sha so ae.
Na hi adiek rouril ae; Chuna eheilimpa ha alakkang chak kae akha chu ngoiring range;
Kani na tullu ratta lu unge, rouram chu aring Chungthieng kolla kani lungrang hi shi unge. Amo ha chu meelim ta sanpipa ae akha chu amota ngoiring ngei na leltekkae.
Na ril lim hi, mani ta chupi takpi oh.
Nang hi unga ae ta atu akha na kom thousha no shu oh. Chutiweta narouril jui, nasemshakka, nalungshit ngoiring akha chu atheing hana ngoiring mee ae ta mel dangpi oh.
Kaphao malim ma nalung lutta rouril la chupi takpi oh.
Rouril ngei na rilphur akha chu ulien ngeina nachunga kut shi nie rungnie ah pek nakolla am muihla tun lam ha thashi thadol am no oh,
Nalung lutta natak na nalim hi hotna oh, natullu son limha ha meelim na ri shu oh.
Nachupi natakpi akha chu natak makhai min na hallo, apha chang honna hitta ae oh, rouram chu ejonga nang na nahi mak ae lea chu natak mak kom hana narouril thei ngei kom sanpi pha ange.
Apa ulien tek ngei ta trongshi ah rilno oh hana hutta chuna napa hekta hallo, hana rungthar ngei ta kom nau nanao hekta halpi oh.
Namei ulien tek ngei ta kom nanu hekta hallo, chuna namei sanao ngei ta kom nashar nu ae ta halla thienga shi pi oh.
Arong nu ta kom ajak atri pe oh amo chu eheilim ma athei chakkae.

Chutiweta ejonga arongnu asanao atu ate am lea chu manina mani inn sunga dramo lam tienga chu thou shu oh hajong hana manu mapa akha chu mapok ngei ae na mant dang nga ae, maram chu Chungthieng na apel ha, na ha sha ae.
Eheilim ma athei chaka am arongnu mataranga atu akha am no amo na Chungthieng kolla lung donna shi jouweta asoun ajan nei no lutta amota san rang nie ah am shu oh.
Chutiweta atujong arongnu amo na mathei chakka ariem ahoi dija rollea chu ringa am hal amo ha chu athi sha ae.
Nahi manita chupi takpi oh chu lea chu atu akha na manita aral tuk ang no ae.

Chutiweta ejonga atu akha na mani uleanao ngei taranga thousa pi no lea hella ma inn sung mee mak ngei ta an pi no ae lea amona ngoiring ha ngeino ae akha chu amo ha ngoiringno mee ta hella sha thi mee ae.
Arongnu namei akha na akum somruk hella thingma lim chu arong namei ngei karra arong ae ta tel then no oh. Rouram chu namei nu ha woiha chak lim meh mataichang.

Ahra matullu hana taranga ehekta mee na amel dang namei nu hana unga ngei ta jokko mahangna, mee ta bakpi een pi thei mati na, hulang phao mee amona akae shilpi na akha chu aol ana eja ta santhinga matak mak na ahra eheilim tullu taranga alung lut te.
Chuna naopong arong ngeita arong ngei karra mashing tel no oh; rouram chu ejonga mani na lea ah tai changnum juija mani ha Khrista kol hai thou wa alah ah thingange.
Chuna mani na masha ah saro ei hana sarukka mani ha amaral am mee change.
Hana chakno wa mani na adolla inn lam chang honna thing, thingweta ariemshal meetrong tronga rolla ngamshal hloushal hekta rol lea, chuna mani na hajong ae no shu oh.

Chuna keina kadit chu naopong arong ngei hi taichang pi num minge hana asanao pha ah akha chu inn sung hra bak ta semshu oh akha chu ani ta anda hrano ngei na hra no tullu taranga talcha lah nea ang no ae.
Routakka chu arong namei ahre chu lung lea ah saitan nu jui mee am so ae.

Chuna ha ajong atujong ngoiring arong namei akha inn sunga am lea chu amona mani ta san shu oh, hana abom mee ngei ta pot rit ron pi no shu oh, chulea chu abom na atujong arongnu madarkar am juija san nea ange thienga.
Atu mo lamkai ahra tullu lu amo ha ta chu nolla nolla ajak atri pe anga ae, hella chupi takpi ah rouril rol amo hata.
Jieksha rouna rillea, “loupokka tullu lu ah am shiellapa mur huppa shi no oh,” “Tullu lu ah am mee na mapha phung shukha pha shu oh.”
Lamkai ah am mee ta aral pe no oh meering anie hella rou takkae ta ril mee am no lea chu.
Pak tullu lu mee ta meelim maikunga ran no, chu lea chu adang ngei na rimma ati ange.
Chungthieng maikung hana Khrista Jisu akha chu athieng wanrui minga keina nakolla hrabakta chupi takpi hi jui ranga akha chu eichang eiwui am no lutta natullu changhonna hrat ranga kokkinge.
Arengpu tullu taranga ti hal kom atu jong akha chunga nakut hang weta nie rang har hai shul no oh. Mee pak hana nangkom tol no rang ae oh; natakta thienga shi oh.
Tuidai chak een no oh na sung tah rang tuishiek ahre te een no, malunna nanat sharukka.
Malmashi ahre ngei pak chu ri pha ah mani pak hana taranga routreem maikunga tung mee sha ae; chuti weta ahre ngei pak chu anutienga ri pha ae.
Chu hekta ahra tullu ha kom ripha nea ae, rino ahre kom thuppa shi nea no ae.
Atujong mitpu akha thuija kor changa am amona ma mamitpu ta eheilim ma ajak atri pe anga ae chulea chu atu akha na ani chupi takpi akha chu Chungthieng minga hrano rou ril nea ang no ae.

Akha chu Khristen mitpu ta ngoiring am amo na manita hantha ah an pi no shu oh rouram chu mani ha uleanao chak sha ae. Chuna sarukka mani ha hella tieng sanhlak kanga sha ae Rouram chu mani pha na mee ngei ha ngoiring thei akha chu lungshit ngei chak sha ae chuna dom hlakka chu pi hlakka eheilim ma nangna chupi ah rouril pi oh.
Chuna atu jongpa na adanga chupi ah akha chu ani dramo ah arengpu Jisu Khrista hina rou chupi takpi hina ngei num no wa chupi lea chu.
Amo ha chu ekom dangno chouthuk mee ae hana alung sunga hrano aol kolla hana hrano chak chingna ah am meh.
