Hana atreem am no wa malmashi ngei hitta chak trong wuk hlakka awakhal la kom adiek ephao hal no weh. Mani na hal chu dramo jong hi achong areng rang lam ae.
Routak kea, dramo na mee hata ehekta achong areng tul shukpi ae ejonga amo na madon hana ahop thei lea chu.
Ani na simlei chunga ejong pa chu ronna phao ah meh? Ekom ron no ae! Ani na simlei ah echoi ah thing ang meh? Ekom am no ae.
Chuna sharukka, ejonga ani na abak rang akha chu punchai dirchui am lea chu nahana ani taranga ahop ah so ae.
Chuna atu jong ehekta achong di mee amo chu ahlem kut chunga tul lea akha chu amang atah shukka lungmo change.
Chuna sharukka sum di hina eheilim ah hrano atro ae. Hana atujong ahre chu manidit hana sharukka mani ngoiring phur phao manga thinge, akha chu mani lung kui ah aol eja pha ae.
Chuna Chungthieng sanao, nang chu nalim ha tol no oh, Chungthieng mee kha changa adiek ahra, julla lungshi, ngoiring adongthei akha chu anem ha jullo.
Ngoiring lamtan na narat makhai tan oh akha chu shamla ringchang ha pha ah maram chu hina taranga, nangna meelung ngir eja maikunga chetta nangoiring sharukka Chungthieng na kok phur sho ae.
Ringchang eheilimpa ta pe pa Chungthieng amo na, Akha chu Pontius Pilate na Khrista Jisu ta atu meh ta dang shu takka mapak lim hra ah ril shuk ha kei na nangta rilla am minge.
Na trongshan hi hrabakta jui ja am mo Jisu Khrista amel ri pi ang ma rungnie ha pha malim ma.
Mamel ri pi rang rungnie ha chu Chungthieng makut chunga apha acha am meh. Amo ha chu jaihra ae hana Rengpa chunga Rengpa ae akha chu arengpu chunga arengpu ae.
Amo chakkae thi no; Amo chu awarra am mee atu akhana ko lutwa nea no ae. Atu akha na amo ta ri pha no songe. Amota ajak ati shu oh akha chu majaitha chu atreem nei no ae. Amen.

Na simlei chunga achong areng ngei kolla tronglam hi ril pi oh, mani ha chouthuk no shu oh, hana mani sum lea pai hina lungrang ae ah am no shu oh, chuna mani lungrang ha Chungthieng kolla shi shu oh. Amo chu ani taranga eheilim ariem ranga awat am no lutta pe nea sha ae.
Mani ha ahra tullu lu shu oh, ahra tullu hana achong areng tul shuk weta ape adol am no wa mee adang ta kom san pi shu.
Anutienga ringchang adiek ringchang nga chetta am rang sha rukka mani na mani taranga hajong homma shi shu oh.
Timothi, nakut chunga shil nat sha ha hrabakta am pi oh, Lungmo ngei hekta ajet rat no oh hajong ha dieklou trongwuk sha ae, “Lungshing ah no ae.”
Chuna hajong ha pha ranga ahre na chu julla pha ae, hana sharukka mani na mani ngoiring na lam mang sho ae.
Chungthieng lungshit nangei lim chunga am shu oh.
Khrista Jisu hina ahalsha rui Pol Chungthieng ahal anu juija Khrista Jisu kolla saro eisha ringchang, pek chang shu oh. Khrista Jisu minga rachun na marou ril hla ha.
Kalungshit sanao Timothi ani arengpu Khrista Jisu Pa Chungthieng kol hai thou lungshithei, ringreithei akha chu adai pe shu oh.
Ka pi ngei kapu ngei ahekta hlou ron na am keina Chungthieng ta dom minge, kalung thienga niesoun jantieng nei no wa kaniek chang honna angai thei inge nangei ta.
Namit tui tulha angaithei inge nangta ri num minge chuti leachu kalung hi ariem na shihak ti ange.
Nalung thienga nangoiring ha keita angai thei pi ae, naha chu napoknu luis lea na nu Eunie kolla masha ah am ngoiring ha, chuna nakolla kom na ha am mange ta ngoiring inge.
Hina sharukka keina nangta angai thei pi num minge na chunga kakut shi Chungthieng pek jaihra mang pi no oh.
Chungthieng na atri rat muihla pe no ae, mapek muihla na anita arat lungshi akha chu atukta thienga shi ha shi hakta am pi ae.
Chuna sha rukka ani arengpu taranga ajak no oh, ano lea Khrista sha rukka aral inn sunga am kamaram kom, Chungthieng jaitha jarra ahra tronglam hina taranga kei hitta aol dong ha ui oh.

Amo na ani ta sanpi so ae, akha chu ani ta kok hi athieng ringchang am rang sha ae ani na ejongpa tullu lu na ah no ae chuti weta mathei chakka mahal akha chu malungshit jar ah sha ae. Na ma lungshit hi apha athou matieng hai thou wa Khrista Jisu jarra ani ta pe so ae.
Atun chu anita sanpi pa Khrista Jisu jarra anita riso ae, amo na athi ta nea weta athi am lou ringchang ha ahra tronglam jarra pe so ae.
Ahra tronglam rouril ranga akha chu, chu pi ranga rui akha changa Chungthieng na kei ta hlou ron pi so ae.

Hina sarukka ae keina eja ah aol ana pha inge, chu phou hal kom keina ephao ajak nonge rouram chu kei na dang inge ngoiring nga ka-am amo ha, hana rungnie ha pha malim ma keita shil nat sha ha hakpi am mange ta ngoiring inge.
Nangta adiek rou kachupi lim ha chetta choi oh, Khrista Jisu kolla ngoiring lea lungshit ha apha chang honna am mo.
Ani sunga ringa am muihla athieng arat ma nakolla kani shil nat ahra ha chetta choi pi oh.
Asia ram sunga am mee ngei na akha chu Phygelus lea Hermogenes ngei na keita hla ah thing nge ti hi nangna dang pha che ae.
Onesipharus ngei inn sunga arengpu lungshit am shu oh, rouram chu apha chang honna keita ariem pi ae akha chu amo na kei hi aral inn na am meh ti hi ephao ajak no ae.
Chuna chakno wa Rom ram ma matung inn len keita matuk hlak malim ma keita jonge.
Arengpu na malungshit ha makolla rungni hana pha shu oh! rouram chu amo na eja ah kata ranga tullu lu moti ha nang na Ephesiya ah dang ang che ae.
Chuna, kasanao oh, Khrista Jisu kolla lungshit hana jarra ratto.
Kakol hai thou wa nathei pha ka chupi ha hrabakta choi oh, mee atam am na ah rou hi rillo, akha chu, atu jong adang kolla chupi takpi nea ang mani kolla nahi shil na pi oh.
Ahra Khrista Jisu ral mee hekta kani hitta aol ana dong thei oh.
Ralmee atu akha na kom ralmee no hekta rol lea chu lamkai amitpu na lungpel nea ang meh.
Chuna chu hekta atu jong akha na lam tan, tan tol amo hana anea na lubur pha no ae, maram chu amo hana jiekka shi rou anu jui no wa.
Ratta tullu lu pa amona masha ah shang nem pha ta ae.
Karou ril lim hi minna hallo, rouram chu arengpu na halim ha nangei ta halla shuk nea rang sanpi ange.
David sakai sunga thou Khrista Jisu hi athi hai thou wa ring thou hi angai thei oh, na hi ae ka chupi hra tronglam.
Ahra tronglam hina turang sha rukka keina thirrui sunga aol donga am minge mee hra no mee hekta, chuti weta Chungthieng rou chu thir rui na jem ma shi nea no ae.
Chuna sharukka Chungthieng ahalsha mee ngei taranga eheilimpa hi donga am minge, chulea chu Khrista Jisu majarra mani makhai na aringkaeto pha ah samla ringchang ahoi jaihra chui ja phao ange.
Na hi adiek rou rillea:
“Ejonga ani na amo hitta thi ha lea chu,
ani na amo hitta ring ha sier ange.
Ejonga ani na adong ratta dong thei lea
chu ani kom amo hitta tullu ron ha ange.
ejong ani na amo ta ngei num no lea
chu amo no kom ani ta ngei num mang no ae.
Ejonga ani na ngoiringa ngei mee no hal kom amo
chu ha ta ngoiringa ngei mee kha changa am mange
Rouram chu amo matak mak na aral am no ae.”
Mani na apha changhonna makno shu oh rouril hana taranga mani ha ashul ahal am no shu oh ta ril pi oh, na ha na ephao ahra shuk nea ang no ae, angei ah am mee na hella amang ata shuk na sha ae.
Chungthieng dit rang narat makhai ae oh, rouram chu Chungthieng hlouron na tullu lu mee amo na matullu hana taranga ajak rang am no ae, Chungthieng hina adiek tronglam ha diekka chupi oh.
Ah ang lou rou trong ta tronga am ha chan jo oh, hajong trong hana Chungthieng kol haithou wa mee ngeita aram lah ah thing pi ae.
Hojong trong hana hrano rai na pum ahui, ahui bakka wak hek ti ange hojong trong ngei karra Hymenaeus lea Philetus na chupi takpi ae.
Adiek rou trong lam hai thou tan na thing manina hita rillea athi hai thou wa ringthou shu so ae. Chuna hina maram sharukka mani na mee ahre ngoiring ta mang pi ae.

Chuna Chungthieng ling alung chu ephao lieng nea no ae hana chunga hitta jiekka shi ae. “Arengpu na mamee makhai ta dange.” Akha chu atujong ngei na amo hi arengpu ta ae ril shukne ha chu hrano lam hai thou wa shuk shu oh.

Hana alok inn sunga akha ah bell buhu shu ah am meh ahre na sona rupa takka sha ae ahre adang na, think takka akha chu alei takka shak kom tol ae, na lim ha ahre chu alok reen na nei ranga hana ahre na chu, mangaiya anei ranga ae.
Chuna atu jong pa akha na hijong hrano tullu hai thou matak na matak ta thieng pi lea amo ha chu ajak ati mee changa mamitpu na ahra tullu lim taranga anei rha mee chang ange.
Naopong akha changa hrano adit apam hai thou wa tlanna thingo, hana dramochel, ngoiring, lungshi akha chu adai pha rang Rengpa ta san rang kokka am alung thieng ngei hitta tulla pha ranga hot na oh,
Eko dangno Lungmo ngei hitta trong wuk hlak no oh nangna dang che ae mani na atreem juija chu shulla chan ae.
Arengpu rui ngei chu shul hlak kang no sha ae, hana hutta amo chu meelim pata lungshi thei changa ahra akha chu adongthei ocha chang ang nga sha ae.
Ngai num na meengei ta kom hrabakta chupi takpi oh, ejonga Chungthieng ahal am lea chu mani kom alung hlonga adiek lam ma pha nea ang nge.
Hana chu mani kom lung rang shukha hrano chang hai thou wa lut no ah, manita mant na shi hana haithou wa mahal ha jui ah am mee ngei ha.
Angei thei oh, atreem nie Rungnie ah alu apha am mange.
Malmashi ngei na mataranga chak ngei ange, hopla pella lokchokna shi akha chu murthei hungthei ange, manina manu mapa ril trong jui ang no ae amant dangno akha chu dramo am mang no ae.
Mani ha chu lungshi thei lou sanpi thei lou mee hrat no rang tullu lu ah matak na matakta harm nea no wa meethat mee mant na ahra tullu atier range.
Lokchokti, hrano mee chang lut aphing aphai Chungthieng ta lungshit ang hutta simlei ariem ahoi ta hella di ang nge.
Chungthieng mee hekta awau wa ahra sha ae hana majaitha ta chu ngeinum no ae hajong mee hai thou wa adanga am mo.
Mani ha pakna dolla am eheilimpa di ah am ashul namei ngei inn sunga lutte.
Atu motieng namei ahre na chu apha changhon na dangnum theinum meh, chuti weta mani hana adiek ha dangnum hal kom ephao wa dang pha nea no ae.
Jannes lea Jambres na Moses ta anda chu hekta mani na kom adiek hata ngeinum no wa mani ta thin mo lungmo pi ah mani ha ngoiring tul shukpi no ae.
Chuna mani ha chu etikkom alien ashai shukkang no ae, rouram chu mani lungmo na hi, meelim na hrabakta dangpha sha rukka hajong ha Jannes lea Jambres kolla kom shuk sha ae.
Chuna nang chu kachupi takpi lim ha hrabakta jui ae, kashim shakkom, ka ring changa kaden, nangna dangche ae, ka ngoiring na, kadongthei, kalungshit na hi,
keita phit arei akha chu aol ana kadong, nang na dangpha ange ka pha aol ana Antioch, ka, Ikonium, ma, akha chu Lystra ah, ati pi aol ana kadong! chuti weta arengpu an nalim hai thou wa sanpi ae.
Chuna atu jong meelimna Khrista Jisu hitta mun ha ah, Chungthieng minga aring ringchang ring num amo ha aol ana pha ange;
Hana hrano mee, akha chu hungthei mee na hrano tienga jultekkange, mani takna takta mee nam hekta mee adang ta kom mee nam ange.
Chutiweta nataranga chu, nangei ta chupi hekta diekka ngirra am mo ngoiring hitta mun ha ah, nang ta chupi ngeiha dang che ae.
Hana nangna dang che ae, na naopong lei thou wa athieng rou nadanga na hang, nahana nangta lungsing shukpi akha chu lamkai ah Khrista ta ngoiring jarra samla ringchang na pha ha.

Jieksha rou lim hi muihla thieng na hlum ma shi rou ae, chuna adiek chupi takpi rang nga kana ae, aral pata dang rang akha chu diekno hata adiekka chupi rang hana adiek ringchanga ringthei rang chupi na ae.
Chuna sharukka Chungthieng matullu lu amo ha chu ehekta athei asing mee changa ahra eheilimpa ta ae nea chang ang nga ae.
Khrista Jisu akha chu Chungthieng maikung anga atu na athi lea aring ta routreem ae nea ang meh, rouram chu amo na phao weta reng changa pal lange, nangta nie inge.
Chuna tronglam suithingo mapha hal mapha no hal lungthou pi oh, ratto, akha chu thanum thathou pi oh nang na adong hit mun ha ah.
Mee ngei na ahra chupi lam hina ngai num no rang apha ha phao ang nge. Hana mani matak na dit ocha atam rui thing weta bomtul pi ah mani chupi takpi hi meelim na kur neng trongshan ha rillange.
Mani hana chu adiek rou ha thei num no wa nutieng heileh ah thing so ae. Hana mani na nulea pa innky tamin tajou hata oh lella lung lut te.
Chutiweta nang chu shukka am eheilim chunga natak harm thei ang nga ae, ahra tronglam rouril akha ae ta aol ana dong thei ang nga ae, akha chu natullu lu lim ma Chungthieng rui akha ae ta ri pi oh.
Katarang halea chu kapum hi katrang apha ha tung sho ae; ringchang hi hou wa thing rang apha hi ka-am na ah am sho ae.
Kei chu hra tekti ahra tullu dom shu sange. Hana kalam tan ha kom tan tung shu singe, chuna chakno wa kangoiring kom lingno wa shi sange.

Chuna atun chu Chungthieng routreem na adiek tullu lu ngei taranga aol mant mashi hana keita hakka am meh, na ni rungnie ah, na ha chu katarang nga chak no weh chuti weta atu jong lungshi ah namel ri rang hata hakka am mee hana taranga kom tol ae.
Kakolla harra tungrang ratta tullu lu oh.
Demas na chu simlei hita dit jarra keita hou wa thing so ae. Thesolonikiya ah kom thing sho ae Kresen Galatiya ah Taitus na Dalmatia thing so weh.
Kei lea Luk chak sho ae, chuna mak ha rui weta nang hitta phao ha oh, rou ram chu amo ha ka tullu ma kei ta leima san nea ang nge.
Ephesiya ah keina Taichikas ta hla sing nge.
Naphao jui ja Troas ah Karpus kolla kahouphur ka coat kom ronna phao pi oh; ka leiriek ha kom, makno tek ti rang chu shawut chunga jiek abai ha ae.
Thier lung tullu lu pa Alexander na keita leima hrano tullu lu; chuna arengpu na ma ae na tullu nu juija machunga ae ange.
Chuna nang na natakta hrabakta chek shillo, rouram chu amo na ani rouril hi thinga hrano shukpi ae.
Masha ah chu atu akha na kataranga ngirra nea no wa keita hla ah thing hap so ae, Chungthieng na kom mani ta ephao masing mani chunga tel pi no ae!

Chutiweta arengpu na ka am na am tolla keita jaitha pe pi ae chuna jarra keina ahra tronglam hi jat adang ngei kolla mupung pha ah rouril nea inge; akha chu kei hi athi pha ang hai thou wa sanpi phur ae.
Akha chu arengpu na keita hrano eheilim hai thou wa sanpi ah mawan ram rengram ma keita rui pi ae makolla mahung majai na apha changhonna atreem alam nei no shu oh! Amen.
Onesiphorus inn sung mee ngei, Aquila akha chu Prissilla kolla riemtuk pe ah am minge.
Korenthiya ah Erastus chu am sho ae hana
Trophimus chu Miletus ah houphur singe maram chu, apum nea no sha rukka.
Phalbi tung ma tienga phao rang nga hot na oh.
Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, akha chu Klaudia na kom
nangta riemtuk pe hla ae, hana adang Khrista minga
lungshit uleanao lim ta kom pe ae.
Na muihla chunga arengpu na am ha shu oh. Hana apha changhonna Chungthieng ringrei theina nang hitta am ha shu oh.

Jisu Khrista ahalsha rui akha chu Chungthieng hina suuk Pol kol hai thou wa, ani dramo na chupi adiek na Chungthieng ahalsha mee ngeita lamkai rang akha chu mani ngoiring san ranga kei hi hal thukweta hla ae.
Chungthieng chu murthui trongno weh apha hi am matienga ani ringchang taranga saro ei shu so weh shamla ringchang pha pi ranga lungrang ha.
Chuna acha apha makka marou ngei ha amo na ripi so weh. Na hi kakolla shilna pi ah akha chu keina rou thangpi inge anita sanpi pa Chungthieng trongshan nu juija.
Ani lim na ngoiring na lam ma adiek kasanao Taitas kolla keina na hi jiekka hla inge Pa Chungthieng akha anita sanpi pa Jisu Khrista na ngeita lungshi lea adai pi shu oh.
Crete ah keina kahouphur chu hulok chang honna abom ulien changei ta tullu lu rang hap pi ah mani na hrabakta darkar am makhai ae ranga kachupi ha nangna mak no oh.

Abom ulienchang akha changa amo ha mee rouril no mee changa tah ae amo ha namei akha hina apishal chang anga ae. Hana asanao ngei na ngoiring chet mee changa ta ae akha chu mani ha mee lim na anjui ja ramsha ngei hekti na akha chu aril jui no ngei chang no tah ae.

Rouramchu abom lamkai ngei hi Chungthieng tullu ahut shil ngei ae. Amo ha mee rouril mee chang no tah ae amo na chouthuk mee chang no tah ae lungsha rat no jurui burui awet apa sumdi thumdi mee chang no tah ae.
Amo chu ahra ta lungshi akha chu mee tah bakpi innpi thei akha chu matak na matak ta hrabak ta nea mee thienga ringa tah ae.

Amo chu ngoiring lam ma chetta ngirra am hana ngoiring na lamma rouril hitta am ha mee changa tah ae. Nahina amo na mee adang ngei ta thanum thathou pi nea ange diekno akha chu jethlak shuhlak ngei kolla adiek chupi takpi ah ripi nea ange.
Hajongpa ha leima tam am hom meh, hella Juda hai thou wa lunghlong ngei mani lunghal thei no lei ah mee kolla anda ah hungsha thei ngei ha.

Nahi routakka ae no ngei no akha ae hajong rou ril chan ranga rouram chu mani na enn sheng lim ta pelpino weh, manina chupi ang lou chupi sharukka, hana ajakpi sumlo thum lo tullu ma mani lu tullu ha.
Mani shunga mani rouril mee akha na ril Crete mee ngei chu apha chang honna murthui ngei ae hrano ramsha ngei ae, akha chu katal ngei ae.
Nahi routakkae chuna sharukka nang na mani ta warakko chulea chu mani na ngoiring chetta am mange.
Hana chu mani na Jihudi ngei doi ei ta an num mang no ae anolea adiek rouril ngeinum no ngei rouril kom jui ang no ae.

Athieng mee ngei taranga chu eheilim pa athieng chakkae, chuti weta amut mee taranga chu athieng ekom am no ae. Hana ngoiring nea no ae routakka chu mani lunghal akha chu lukang shung hi amut chakka ae.
Mani na Chungthieng ta dang unge ta rillea chuti weta mani tullu chu ngai no ae. Mani ha chu aril jui no ngai akha chu atier pi mee ae chuna mani ha ahra taranga ekom rakit no weh.
Chuna na chupi ang hi ngoiring na lam ma angai ha ae.
Ulienchang apa ngeita chupi oh, adong thei rang lunghal thei rang matakna matakta nea rang mani ngoiring lungshi adongthei ah am ranga.

Na hitta munt ha ah namei ulien changei ta kom chupi oh, mani kom namei nu akha na ring nga am hekta ling lu shu oh akha mani ringchang ha thienga am shu oh, mee hratno rang ae no shu oh, akha chu ju inn mee no shu oh. Mani na ahra ha chak chupi anga ae.
Athourul namei ngei na achu ranga mani pashal akha chu asanao ngei hrabakta chupi takpi shu oh.

Matak na matukta nea weta athieng akha chu inn shunga ahra namei changa apishal ta atri ajak mee chang shu oh. Chu lea chu atu akha na kom Chungthieng kol hai thou phao ahra rouril hi hrano rouril no shu oh.
Chuna chu hekta unga ngei ta kom matakna matak ta nea ah am ranga ril pi oh.
Eheilimpa ah nang natak makna ahra tullu ah mee na achu rang am shu oh naling nalu wa nalung thienga hra bakta chupi takpi oh.
Ahra rou choi ah rourillo jethlak shukhlak am no ranga. Chulea chu nangta anda mee ngei ha ajakkange ani sharukka ejongpa hrano rou mee na ril no shu oh.
Kor ngei oh nangei mitpu thuija am mo akha chu eheilimpa ah mani na lungshit ranga ae oh mani nutieng rou ril no oh.
Akha chu mani kol hai thou aru aran ae no oh, mani na nangei ta ngoiring rang tullu ah ri pi oh. Chu lea chu lampi lim ma anita sanpi Chungthieng chupi takpi hi ehehta hra ange.
Rouram chu Chungthieng na malungshit aringkaetlo ha mee lim ta ri pi ae.
Malungshit na chupi anita pekpi chu ani ringa Chungthieng ditlou akha chu alei ramma adit apam lim hou wa matak na matak ta nea weta adiek athienga aleiram ma ring ang sha ae.
Ani na lungrang ae weta hakka am jaihra rungnie akha chu Chungthieng akha chu anita sanpi pa Jisu Khrista mahung majai tolla ani ta ripi ang ha.
Amo matak mak anita pepi ah hrano tullu hai thou sanpi weta athieng ringchang ringa mamee changa ahra tullu lu num chang rang sha ae.
Mani ta nahi nachupi juija atri am no lutta thanum thathou pi oh akha chu routreem oh narou thei ja am ngai na. Atu akha na kom nangta hantha ah an no shu oh.
Namee ngei ta angei thei pi oh, ane angam ngei thuija am rang akha chu mani ril trong jui shu oh. Hana eheilim ma ahra tullu lu rang hakka am shu oh.
Manita rillo atu akha chunga hrano rou ril no rang. Hana lungshi hlakka dai ah am shu oh meelim maikunga ahra maishun muh hlakko.

Rouram chu apha akha ah ani hi lungmo changa aril atrong jui no mee aral am phur ae ani hi ahra lea hrano ariem ahoi di hina suuk kor chang phurre ani ringchang hi anar hlakka mee lung mat rang tullu lu ah mee ta kom anda ah mee nakom ani ta anda ae.
Chutiweta Chungthieng malungshit akha chu maringrei ngei jarra ani ta sanpi na muh ah.

Amo na anita sanpi so weh. Nahi ani na ahra tullu lu na sharukka no weh, chuti weta maringrei ngei jarra amo na anita sanpi ah ae muihla athieng na anita ani ta silpi weta athar ringchang pokpi sierre.
Chungthieng na ani ta sanpi Jisu Khrista mujarra muihla athieng ha ani chunga atreem am no wa bun pi ah.
Chu lea chu ani hi malungshit jarra anita adiek changpi ah Chungthieng hitta am ha ah atreem nei no ringchang hina lungrang pha ah am mange.
Nahi adiek rouril sha ae.
Keina nahina maram ma hella rou pe num minge chulea chu Chungthieng ta ngoiring lim na akha na akha taranga ahra tullu lu ah meelim ta ranga ehekta ahra chang ange.
Chuna kanano trong wukhlak no oh, ashei nuhang pahang na rourilla rouphun hina maram ma trong jet hlak no oh, maram chu nahi kanano ekom am lou tullu sha ae.
Woiha woini rou dollo ahran akai shukpi amo ta hana hella rouril no oh ephao amo hitta ae rang am no ae.
Nang na dang ang che ae hajong mee chu amut mee ae akha chu mapak na amo hi aral am mee ae ta dang ang che ae.
Keina Artemas lea Tykikas kahla juija nang na ka am na ah wak rang na nea makhai hot na oh, rouram chu phalbi hla hi Nikopolis ram ma am tik ta lungir shange
Zenas ukil akha chu Apollos hina mani thing hong rang athourang darkar uite eheilim ha nangei anea makhai sanpi oh.
Ani mee ngei na chuno ngei no ae apha chang honna ahra tullu lu weta am ti hi hana adiek darkar am mee ta sanpi rang mani ha kanano wa ringa am mee chang no shu oh.
Kei hitta am ha lim pa na riemtuk pe ah hla ae, hana kani riemtuk te kom ani ngoiring ha tonpi thanrol ngeita pe pi oh.
Chungthieng lungshit nangei lim chunga am shu oh.
Jisu khrista taranga rean inn na shi Pol akha chu lungshit tonpi Timothi rel na Philimon akha chu hlou ron ha am tonpi ngei,
hana inn na ani tukhlak ani sarnu Apphia hana ani tonpi ralmee Akhippus;
Pa Chungthieng akha chu arengpu Jisu Khrista na adai hana lungshit pek chang shu oh.
Kalungshit Philimon, ka niek chang honna nangta mak nea nonge hana Chungthieng ta ariemma dom minge.
Chungthieng sanao ngei eja ta nalungshit akha chu reng Jisu kolla na ngoiringa na am ka thei pha jui.
Ka niek chu ngoiring ngei kha changa mun ha ah ani bomtul ha hina anita hella halthei tek tul shukpi ange jaihra lim ha chu khrista kolla ani ringchang na am ha jarra.
Ehekta kalungshit, nalungshi thei hana keita leima ariem pi ae hana ehekta keita thanum thathou pi ae! Chungthieng meelim ta ariem pi che ae.
Hina taranga keina ekom atri nonge roulam chu Khrista minga nalungshit unao kha changa nangna na tullu lu phung shuklim ae oh.
Nangta kalungshit jarra Khrista taranga thi ang ti lou akha chu atun kom mataranga raen-inna shi akha ah halling kom nakolla na hi rilla aminge.
Chuna karil num rou lam chu Khrista kolla kasanao hekta kahal Onesimus taranga ae, raen inn sunga am halling kom muihla lam ma chu kei hi mapa singe.
Apha akha ah nataranga mee reem akha halko, atun chu natarang kataranga ehekta santhei chang ang so ae.
Keina amota nakolla woiha lea a hla singe atun hi kalung tolla hla inge.
Ahra tronglam taranga rean inn na olla ka am lei sunga keina chu amo hi kakolla am ha num minge, chu lea chu amo na na hutta keita san nange.
Chutihal kom keina nakolla san no ngei na ae ta karillang hutta nahal nalungrang hana ae pi num minge. Chuna nangna ngainum nole keina ephao ae ang nonge.
Onesimus na apha atan te am phur no hal kom atun ma lea sier jui hana chu apha chang honna nang hitta am ha ange.

Chuna atun chu amo hi kor a-niyove, hana korta hella! Amo hi Khrista kolla lungshit ulea nao so ae. Kata ranga amona eja ah san nea ang sa! hana; nataranga ko hella amona san nea ange. Rengpa lungshit kor kha changa.
Chuna keita natonpi ae ta hal ta lea chu, amo ta ariem ma riemtuk pi oh, keita ariem ma nariemtuk hekta.
Ejonga amona nakolla diekno tullu eja lu phur hal kom ding phung eja am halkom kei nalim ha chunga tello.
Pol keina kakut makka na hi jiekka aminge keina nalim ha lea pi ang singe. (Chuna makolla mamaral lim ha kei na lea ah nangta angei thei pi ranga ae.)
Chuna unao oh, lungshi ngai ah rengpa minga nangna san pi oh. Khrista minga uleanao kha chang hella keita ariem tul shukpi oh!
Routakka na kajiek lim hi nangna ae ange ta hallinge ti chu hitta lella kom nang na ae pi che ae.
Hitta mun ha ah katungrang na inn sunga kot hur akha waisang pi hakko, rouram chu Chungthieng na nangei lim niek ha sang so ae ta hallinge, chuna kei na lea ah nakolla phao ange.
Khrista Jisu taranga kei hitta raen inna am ha Epaphras na kom nangta riemtuk pe ae.
Hana kei hitta hlou ron ha Mak, Aristarkhas, Demos akha chu Luk na kom nangei limta riemtuk pea ae.
Rengpa Jisu Khrista lungshit na apha chang honna am shu oh.
Amatinga hei thouwa Chungthieng na ani pipu ngeita rouphupa ngei yarra ma ong adang adanga ril pi hou ha,
chuna atreem ni rungni hana ah anita asanaopa yarra rilpi so weh. Asanaopata pot limpa hina mitpu chang pi ah, makol heithou simlei ram limpa sempi so weh.

Chungthieng hina mahung majai akha chu mawar ha, asanaopa makolla akha chu Chungthieng mamel mak malla rilpiah, simlei hina awat eyalim angakpi ma ae ma tronglam na pepi ae. Malmashi ngei pap kokpi ranga tullu lu su nutinga, ehekta matik mangal na shihakti Chungthieng ongna wanramma changting nakal ting amona onge.
Asanaopa hata wanrui ngeita lella chungtek pi ah, Chungthieng na amota pek mingha manita lella chung tekke.
Chuna Chungthieng na wanrui ngei kolla hayongpa tronglo supril rilno songe hachu,
“Nangha kasanaopa ae;
Awoni heithouwa napa ha kei asinge.”
Hiyongpa tronglo, atu wanrui akha takom Chungthieng naril no weh,
“Kei napaha chang ang inge,
akha chu amona kasanaopa ha chang ange.”
Chutiweta Chungthieng na ahalpa pok asanaopa simlei hina hla ang tinga amona hita rille,
“Chungthieng hina wanrui ngei limpana amota mokkanga ae.”
Chutiweta Chungthieng na wanrui ngei kolla hita rille,
“Chungthieng na wanrui ngeiha thirang phaibu changa semme,
akha chu asuuk ngeita meitrungna ae.”
Asanaopa kolla Chungthieng na hita rille,
“Oh Chungthieng na reng ramha atreem amnowa ahoi palla am su oh.
Nangna solwai chunga roukam ae itta munha ah adiek ka ngir oh.
Nangna adiek ae meeta lungshi oh akha chu aral ae meeta atir oh.
Hana sarukka Chungthieng na nangta halla shuk kae;
akha chu ajak ati itta munha ah, lella ariem kom pepiya,
atlongpi ngeita lella ajak ati hakom pi pisowe.”
Amona hita kom rille,
“Rengpa, nangna aleiram hi athouna heithouwa sempi ah,
akha chu nakut mak hina waram kom sem pi so weh.
Na pot lim mang happange, chuti weta nang mang nolutta amange;
Na pot limpa pun dir lakka hou hekta la ah hou ange.
Apai punni hekta hlappa shi ange,
akha chu pun dir hlong hekta mani chu hlong shi oh weh.
Chutiweta amochu maringchan hi ahlong am no lutta,
atreem ti kom am no weh.”
Hiyongpa trong atu wanrui ngei kolla Chungthieng na ril no weh hachu:
“Keina nata andat mee ngeita nakae hana to ahshi malim phaowa,
kata changting nakal hina ongo.”
Hale chu, wanrui ngei chu atu meh? Mani chu Chungthieng matullu ae rang, muihla ngei ae akha chu aring kaeto pha mee ngeita sanranga mahla muihla ngei ae.
Chuna sarukka adiek rou, ani theisusa limha chetta choiya anita ehoiya thingne no ranga ae.
Wanrui ngeina ani pipu ngei kolla pekka houphur roukit ha adiek takke akha chu atu yongna rilla houphur roukitta yuino akha chu thingno meeha, ma ae na nuyuiya ae mant ha phaange.

Hiya ah aleen aring kaeto hi, anina lung lutno saruk ka lit thuk pi sei meh? Rengpa matak makna aring kaeto hi na ehal halla hlou pao ae piya akha chu atu yongna maril tronglam thei mee ngeina, Rayon ani kolla peya, naha adiek takke.
Ha itta munha ah, Chungthieng na mani kolla malung ngir, angakpi eya ae pi ya akha chu maning athuiya, athieng muihla na pek ka am kuthul makheina mani itta munha ah mee lungir pe ae.
Chuna ani rilhlak, phao wanga am athar simlei hina wanrui ngeita roukam ae ranga amunt Chungthieng na pe no weh.
Hina ahutta athieng abai hina jiekka si ae:
“Oh Chungthieng, nangna ningsinga am mee ha atu meh?
ano lea chu rengpa, na an mee sanaopa ha atu meh?
Nangna amota wanrui ngei thuiya apha atomte si pi ah,
nangna amota ajak ati akha chu mahung lahao hap piya,
akha chu amota pot limpa roukam ranga makut chunga pulla sipisowe.”
Hita rilla amme Chungthieng na, apata semhi “pot limpata an sillanga ae”; nahi pot limpa tol so weh tihi dangpha so weh, chuti weta atun amina pot limpa mathuiya am meh tihi chu ripha nosonge.

Chuna sarukka Chungthieng na ringlei ngaipi yarra, Jisu meelim taranga athi hita dangpi ranga wanrui ngei thuiya sipiya, Jisu athi hina aol dongpiya, malung majaina akha chu meelimna ajak atiya chungtek ka sipiha anina ripha ae.

Chuna Chungthieng amona asanaopa eya ngeita mahung hina rul ah lutte, manita, aring kaeto hina mitpu hata aol alongpi yarra, mapung phapirang rangpa matarang mak chu chap cha ae, maramchu Jisu Khrista malung shit sarukka mayarra pot limpa ripha pi ae.
Amona malmashi pak lim thieng pi ah akha chu amole, mathieng pi sa ngei lim mapa akha chakke maram hana sarukka ule nao ngei oh ta kok ka Jisu na ekom ajak no weh.
Amona Chungthieng kolla rilla am meh,
“Keina kata ule nao ngei kolla na ae houphur tullu lim
shuk kang inge;
keina mani abumna amunna nangta wanga dommang inge.”
Amona hita kom ril sille, “Chungthieng ta kashilung sung chetta shiang inge, akha chu amona hita kom ril sille hachu, Chungthieng na keita pek unga ngei itta kei hina aminge.”

Chuna makok unga ngei, atak akha chu athi pal souchu. Jisu matak mak kom mani hekta malmashi hina ma ong aeya houphurre. Amona simlei kaeto thinga, Jisu mathit yarra athita arat peya am hachu hrano muihlata mang pi so weh.
Hi itta munha ah, athi ta ati ya suuk changa, ringa am ngeita, Jisu Khrista na thit yarra manita athi ta nea pi so weh.
Chuna adiek takka rengpana wanrui ngeita sanpi ranga yung anowe, chuti weta Rengpana Abraham hina dhara ngeita san pi ranga yunge.

Hina rilla am artha chu Rengpana solwaingei pak kokpi rang sarukka Chungthieng hina tullu na lungshi thei akha chu lungduh thimpu chang rang sarukka amota ma ule nao ngei itta limpa mana pi ta so weh.
Atungchu rengpa matak makna ahlem akha chu aol ana eya dong nea ah, hana sarukka ahlemna hlemma am ngei ta, Jisuna san nea ae.
Chungthieng na kokpi kalungshit Khristen uleanao ngei oh! Ani ngoiring rilsuk pirang hina chungtek thimpu Jisuta wakhal halpi yo.
Chungthieng ma inn sunga Moses na matullu lim Lungduh hekta Chungthieng halpi Jisu kom Chungthieng matulluta lungduh pi ae.
Chuna inn sha, inn mitpu hata inntalella ajak ati hlak ke, Jisu hakom Moses ta lella matik cha ae.
Adiek rouphom meh, sha ah am akha chu sha susa inn limpa, atu yongpa akha shak chakke, chuna pot limta sempiya am mitpu chu Chungthieng chakke.
Matikcha suuk akha changa Moseshi Chungthieng insunga lungduh ae, akha chu anuting shuk kang eya, Chungthieng na rillanga, Moses na ahut silla rilpisowe.

Chutiweta Khrista chu Chungthieng amo mak hina ma inn shung hina chungtek asanaopa ae akha chu lungduh ae. Anikom thouna hra ah akha chu, am halla am lungrang, chetta ngirra am lea chu anihakom Chungthieng hina inn shung akha ae.
Chuna, athieng muihla na rilla am chu,
“Nangna awoni Chungthieng sanrol hi thei talechu,
nangei pipu ngeina Chungthieng ta andat hekta akha chu ramruka thinglei apha,
nemo nenomo, pemo pe no mo chang eya an hekta, nangei shilungha kalno oh.
Chungthieng na hita rille, manina akum somlee ka lu tullu
danga akha chu manina Chungthieng ta chang eya an na si ae.
Hana sarukka keina kalung hanga manita hito rillinge,
‘Nangeina apha changhon na karakit rou ngei hi jui num
no chou weh akha chu keita apha changhon na ajak ati no chouwe.’
Keina kalung hanga sharo ei itta munha ah rouren pi inge,
‘nangei solhlak rang kapek amunt hana,
nangeina etik kom lut nea ang no chou weh!’ ”
Khrista ta ngoiringa am thanrul ngei oh, cheksillu oh, hachu Chungthieng ta hla ah thingweta, nangei karra atu adang akha nakom hrano akha chu ngoiringno lungrang shi no su oh.
Chungthieng hina athieng tronglam na rilla shi yuine ranga nangei atu yongna papta meenam ma shilung kal no ranga nangei akha lea akha awoni rungni amleiya sanhlak ku oh.
Maram chu anina amatinga ani ngoiringha atreem phao ah chetta ngirra am lea chu ani hi Khrista itta phaha ang ngeiha ah so weh.
Chungthieng hina athieng tronglam na rilla am chu,
“Awoni Chungthieng tronglam hi nangeina theita lea chu,
nangei pipu na Chungthiengta ngainum no
hekta nangei shilungha kal nou oh.”
Chungthieng tronglam hi theiya, thei weta, amota andah ah akha chu ngainum nowa am ngeiha atu ngei meh? Ha ngei chu Moses na Egypt ram hei thouwa rul yah shuk meengei ha ae.
Chungthieng na akum somlee atu ta lunghanga meh? Ramrukka pap ae yah thi mee ngei ta ae.
Chungthieng saro eiya rourean piyah, maniha etik kom kapek ram mun hana lut pha ang niyowe, keita andat yar sarukka.
Anina mit makka ripha ah, manina Chungthieng ta ngoiring no yarra, maniha ram mun hana tung nea no weh.

Atun chu ameena amota shilung shunga siranga Chungthieng na sothlak rang rourean ha, dorh peh pi so weh, chuna atu akha phaona awat am nowa sohlak rang rourean ha shilung shunga am pirang chek sil eiyo.

Maram chu, mani hekta anikom ahra tronglam eya thei pha ae. Manina ahra tronglam eya thei halkom ahra tullu ti ekom ae no weh, maram chu manina tronglam ha theiyuiya adiek ngoiringa shilunga lashil no weh.
Chuna ani atuyongna Chungthieng na solhlak rang rourean piha adiek takka ngoiring lea chu maniha Chungthieng hina solhla pha sa ngei ae. Chungthieng amona rilla houphur hekta hachu,
“Keina lung hanga rourean na saro ei
houphur hekta:
‘manina etik kom solhlak na amunna tung nea ang no weh.’ ”
Matullu lim athouna heithouwa shu hap halkom, nahi rilla houphur sa ae.
Chuna athieng tronglam shunga rungni nasari hina maramma hita rille: “Chungthieng hi matullu ae heithouwa rungni nasari suniya solha ae.”
Hi itta munha ah woiha lea ah rilla am chu, Chungthieng na solhlak rang pek kasi ahoi ram munha, manina etik kom phane ang no weh.
Ahra tronglam ehal halla thei misha ngeina shilung sunga lasil no weh maramchu manina ngoiring no yar sarukka akha chu adang ahre na shilunga lasille.
Mohi routakka ripi ah, Chungthieng na rungni adang akha pe pi silla hachu “Awoni” ta boh peya, akum eya amatinga David heithouwa athieng tronglam shunga rilla si ae:
“Chungthieng sanrol nangeina awoni thei
tale chu nangei shilung kal no oh.”
Chuna Joshua na manita solhlak rang pe phur lea chu, Chungthieng na anutinga adang rungni hina maram rilphurang no weh.
Chuna sarukka Chungthieng na mani taranga solhlak rang atun phao sunga amunha drakar amsonge.
Atu yongna Chungthieng rourean pisa solha phami ngeiha Chungthieng na matullu limpa ae shu jui ah solha pha hekta, manita mani tullu heithouwa solha pi ange.
Chuna, ani limna solha pharang hratek ti tullu ha ae sheiyo, maramchu amatinga ngeina mani ngoiring wat hekta, ani chu mani hekta ae no eiyo.

Chungthieng tronglam chu atun tun ringa am akha chu ratta tullu lu am, cham sei aha ani pal talella put tekke, muihla akha chu thawai joom hlakna akha chu sharu sunga am anem phaowa tan nea ae. Malmashi shilung akha chu ahal adit eya kom chumpi ae.
Chungthieng maikunga thuprang ekom am no weh; maramchu pot limpahi ma mit hana ripta riya am meh. Chuna anina Chungthieng maikunga ani lu tullu eheilim.
Chuna ani ngoiringhi rilla shukka, chetta choiya am eiyo, maram chu Chungthieng hina asanaopa Jisu Khrista anita chungtek thimpu am meh.
Hana sarukka ani asul, ana dongha ranga, san neno chungtek thimpu ani taranga am ah no weh, chuti weta ani hekta eheilimma ahlemna hlemma am, hatihal kom pap tollou, chungtek thimpu ani kolla am meh.

Chuna sarukka lungshi thei, thouchal amna Chungthieng phomlu ah akha chu thouna hra ah anina Chungthieng kolla naiya wa eiyo. Hana ani drakar am lim anita sanpirang thouchal akha chu lungshi thei ha pha ange.
Pap taranga pekkang pot akha chu ahut silla kattang ngeita, Chungthieng hina tullu ah mee ngeita ahut silrang, mee ngei sung heithouwa halweta chungtek thimpu hap pi ae.
Chuna amo matak mak hi asulna sihakti sarukka, thei no singno ngei itta akha chu aral ae mee ngei itta shilung nem ma amha dang pha ae.
Chuna asul akha a sou chu mee ngeina pap kokranga kat pek hekta, amona kom matak mak taranga, pak hina sarukka katta pe ta so weh.
Mee atu akha phaona ajak ati phom chungtek thimpu ha matak makna halla la no weh, chuti weta Aaronta kokpi hekta, Chungthieng nachak mita kokka chungtek thimpu chang pi nea ae.
Hi itta mun ha ah, Khrista nakom hiyongpa ajak ati phomhi. Mathei chakka halla la no weh. Hina ahutta Chungthieng na hita rille,
“Nangha kasanaopa ae;
awoni heithouwa kei napa ha changsinge.”
Chungthieng na amunt adang akha ah hita kom rille,
“Nangha Melchizedek hutta atreem naino
thimpuha chang ang che ae.”

Jisuna simlei chunga amlei apha ah, Chungthieng kolla kalla trappa, niya akha chu mokka, amota athisa heithouwa kalpiya, Chungthieng na amota theipi hina maram chu amochu shilung nem mee akha chu riltrong jui ae.
Chungthieng hina sanaopa akha ahalkom, aol pha jui ah aril trong yuirang amona chu ae.
Jisuna matik chamee akha chang jui ah, maril matrong jui ah thing meelim tarang, Jisuna atreem naino aring kaeto hina akungha changsowe.
Chuna Melchizedek hina anu jui ah, Chungthieng na chungtek thimpu changrang amota ril shuk so weh.
Hina maramma nangei kolla leima arillang am hom meh chuti weta nangei kolla akol ahae chu aerang lu ah shuk kae, maramchu nangei ha lungkim ma leima soom chouwe.

Chuna apha anu jui ah nangeichu, chupi, takpi meeha changa ngai akha ah sou chu, atu yongpana nangeita Chungthieng hina trongta athouna heithouwa maru oiha woiha lesilla tak piranga nangei kolla lella hratek kange, hatiweta nangei chu akal pot bakkang nekchu anem pot salom een na, atun phao sunga hratek songe.
Chuna salom chak een na am mee hachu, achum akha chu aral lungrang dang nosonge, maram chu amoha unga songe.
Akal pot bak ka am ngeichu mapung pha sa ngei ae, manina mani takta hrabakta siyin na ah, ahra hrano eya lim dang pha nea ae.

Chuna Khrista hina ahalpa roukit eya ngei nungtinga hla ah houwa, mapung pha chupi takpi tinga anina ma sonna thing eiyo. Anina halla hei thouwa kana anglou tullu lu akha chu Chungthieng ta ngoiringa;
tui luppanga chupi takpi, kut luchunga siranga, athisa heithouwa ringpi akha chu atreem naino routreem ae rang hana akung woiha lesilla thul no sa seiyo.
Chuna ani maitinga sonna thing seiyo, Chungthieng na ngaipilechu, nahi ani ae ranga ae.

Chuna hoi alota mani ngoiring hla ah thing sa ngeita woiha lea ah lunghlong ranga lea pisillanga meh? Apha akha ah Chungthieng mawar pha ah amsa, thangwan na pek khuttul hina atui dangsa, akha chu athieng muihla hina saruk phasa;
Manina Chungthieng tronglam hi ahra aeta mani tullu hana dangsa akha chu phao anga am kum hina manae yaitha ha manina dange.

Hatiweta mani ngoiring hi hla ah hou ah; woiha lesilla mameeta lunghlong pirang leima luwa shuk kae, maram chu manina woiha leya Chungthieng asanaopata Kross chunga pang tinga akha chu mee jam maikunga phonga ajak tuk pi ae.
Ruhna sulla, na ruh tuita chup ranga Chungthieng na alei hita yaihra pe ae akha chu atu yongna lou ae talechu ehekta kana ah, andik na diek kom tou pi ae.
Chutiweta aling kung akha chu talu ngei tou talechu ekom aman tolnowe, na ha khudong thi Chungthieng na serap peya akha chu mei ah khanga mang pi ange.
Kalungshit trongpi, nangeina hihekta trong talechu, kanina nangta thachat ounge, nakolla am aring kaeto meelimta lella yaihra pha ae tihi kanina dangpha onge.
Chungthieng chu huwngthei no weh, na lu tullu lim, nalungsit lim, akha chu natongpi nathawul ngeita nasan pek, napek lim Chungthieng na etikkom makkang no weh.
Anina aleen diya halla am, mee limna atreem haowa maseba ae numha shilung sunga sipi oh, chuna nahal lungrang eya lim adiek chang ange.
Kanina nangta katal akha changpi num nonge, chuna akhang kal ngoiring akha hekta akha chu Chungthieng na anita eheilimma pe pi angeta roungir sa ha lapiyo.
Chungthieng na Abraham kolla rourean jui apha ah. amona suino lutta yaihra pe pi angeta rouraen nea. Amo hekta aleen tek atu kom am no weh, matak makna maming ril shuk weta amona rouraen so weh.
Amona rille, keina rourean na am chu, “Keina nangta yaihra pe ange akha chu nasanao, natu nate eya kom pe ange.”
Abraham na akhangkal it munha ah Chungthieng na rouraen pi sa ha, amona pha ae.
Mee akhana rouraen jui apha ah, atu yongpa amota lella aleen tek mingha rilweta, akha chu rouraen eyalim sune ae.
Atu yongna Chungthieng rouraen pharanga, Chungthieng na thienga dang rang, mahal maning ha, ahlong am no ranga di ae.

Chuna ahlong am no ranga akha chu Chungthieng hina huwngthei no weh dang rang, pot ani am ha chu, anina makolla ahoiya solhlak rang akha chu ani hal asa eya chetta ngirrang, thouna hap piya ani maikunga shi pi so weh.

Chuna ani eyong aleen lung rang am sarukka simlei hina ringa am nea ae, nahi adiek akha chu aol pha ang eya takom ngak thuk nea, akha chu wanramma athieng Chungthieng ta mokna inna raap phaowa leng nga thing nea ae.
Anihut silla Jisuna ani maikunga athieng amunt na lutpi ah akha chu Melchizedek mathanga amona ani taranga atreem nai no ah chungtek thimpu ha chang pi ae.

Melchizedek hi Salem ram hina areng akha chu Chungthieng hina chungtek thimpu akha ae. Abraham na areng inlee ta ral nea ah lea jui ah, Melchizedek na Abraham itta tuk hlak ka, akha chu amona yaihra bor pe ae.
Hana Abraham na Melchizedek kolla asom sunga akha pe ae. (Ahalpa ah Melchizedek hina rilna chu, “Dramo chel hina areng maram chu amo Salem ram hina arenge, adang artha akhapana,” adai hina araeng).
Melchizedek hina manu, mapa akha chu pi pu akha chu mapokna amunt, mathitna amunt eya ekom jiekka shi no no weh. Amohi Chungthieng hina asanaopa hekti ae amohi atreem naino thimpu changa amshi yowe.
Chuna nangeina ann oh, amohi eya ah rat meh? Abraham, ehekta amingthing ani pu, ralnea ah machoile pot eya lim, asom sunga akha tihi makolla katta pe ae.

Abraham chak anowa, Levi hina dhara, thimpu ngei, rouphun hina anu jui ah Israel sanao ngei. Abraham hina dhara akha chu mani ram sunga am mee ngei takom asom sunga akha ti hi thimpu ngeina hraiweta pe ae.
Melchizedek hi Levi hethouwa yung dhara kom anowe, chuti weta amona Chungthieng na rouraen pha Abraham heithouwa asom sunga akha hrai ah la ah amota yaihra bor pe ae.
Hana ngaidolh rang am no weh maram chu yaihra bor peya am akhana yaihra bor phasa akhate lella aleen tekke.
Thimpu ngeina asom ma akha hraiya lakchu athisa mee ngei kolla la ae; chuti weta Melchizedek na chu aringa am malmashi ngeita asom ma akha hraiya ammeta, athieng tronglam na rilla am meh.
Chuna Abrahamna asomma akha tihi pe ae, Levi ngei nakom asomma akha pe ae.
Maramchu Levi ngeihi hana lei apha ah amnosong halkom, mani ha amsowe, ta rilla amme, ani pipu Abraham na Melchizedek itta tukhlak heithouwa.

Levitical thimpu ngei anu jui ah, rouphun hi Israel sanao ngei taranga pe so weh. Atun chu Levitical thimpu ngeina mapung pha ah, mani tullu hi ae talechu, Melchizedek hina mahut silrang, Aaron anolutta adang thimpu hi ri pi sillanga.
Maramchu thimpu changa am ngei, hlong jui apha ah, hana rouphun kom hlong phum shuk kae.
Nahi, adang adang jatti ngeita akha chu majatti mee ano, thimpu akha changa seba ae louna, Chungthieng ta mokna athieng amunna seba ae no weh.
Anina hrabakta dangsa, theisa ae hachu amohi Judah jatti mee akha changa pokke, akha chu Moses na thimpu ngeita tronglam pe jui ah, na jatti hi jiek ah houphur no weh.
Echam chamma na roupham hi shuk so weh, Melchizedek hekta adang thimpu akha ripha so weh.
Chuna amota thimpu akha changa hal pi ah, simlei chung malmashi ngei roukam anu jui, anolutta amona aring ringchan hina manea jaitha hina atreem amno lutta pal lange.
Chuna sarukka athieng tronglam na rilla am chu Melchizedek mathanga, “Nangna atreem naino thimpu ha chang pi ange.”
Amating ari roukam hi, akinga si hina maramchu ari roukam hi sulleh akha chu kana niyowe.
Chuna Moses hina rouphun eya na ani kolla mapung phane no weh, akha chu atun chu anina Chungthieng kolla naiya wa ah, lella hratek lungrang ani kolla pe pisowe.
Hina chunga Chungthieng na rouraen pi ae. Marou raen pi hachu, adang thimpu ngei rouraen hek tinowe.
Chuna Jisuna rouraen itta munha ah thimpu akha changa, Chungthieng na makolla hita rille,
“Rengpa ha saru eiya rouraen
so weh hana mawakhal
ahlong ammang niyowe.”
Chuna hi manat no hlak hi lella hra, chetta angai hlak am ranga Jisuna sem pi ae.
Adang thimpu ngei itta khatna hlak hina maramchu simleiya am thimpu ngei chu, thiweta akha chu thisuyuiya woiha lesilla mani tullu le-ah ae thou sil nea no weh.
Chutiweta Jisu chu atreem am no lutta ringa am mang akha chu thimpu akha changa, matullu ae hi mee atu adang ko lalla thing ang no weh.

Chuna amochu atun kom akha chu apha chang honna, amochu eheilim ma ae nea ae hachu atu yongna Chungthieng heithou wamee ta kalpi ange, maram chu amo chu atreem amno, ani taranga Mapa Chungthieng kolla ril pirang ringa am meh.

Ani drakar eheilim pek pi ranga am chungtek thimpu ha Jisu ae. Amo chu athieng ha ae; Masunga hrano pap akha chu aral ekom am no weh. Amo chu hrano pap hei thouwa hran na akha chu athi hei thouwa ringa wanram ma kal so weh.

Amochu adang chungtek thimpu ngei hek tinowe. Mahousha ah thimpu ngeina ahalpa ah mani pap taranga, hana amtinga mee ngei pap taranga niti chara pot katta am hekta Jisu chu halim makolla drakar am no weh maram chu Jisu matak mak kat thukka, meelim tarang woiha chakka kat thuk ka thi pi so weh.

Moses hina rouphun, chungtek thimpu taranga mee ngeita halla shuk hi mapung pha no weh chuti weta rouphun anutinga Chungthieng na rouraen itta munha ah asanao pata hal, amochu atreem am nowa mapung pha pi so weh.
Wanram ma matik magul na sihakti araeng ongna, changting nakalla onga am, anita chungtek thimpu akha am meta eheilinma anita takpi it munha ah rilla am meh.
Amona chungtek thimpu akha changa, ehekta athieng tekti amunt sunga tullu lu ah, naha chu rengpana sem routak pa am range, mee na sem ah no weh.

Chuna Chungtek thimpu chang honna, Chungthieng kolla iratpot, asata katrang akha chu adang pot eyata katpirang tullu lu pi ranga pham hi hal pisowe. Chuna ani Chungtek thimpu kom, eyongpa kattang pot makolla amme.
Amona simlei hina am mang tale chu, thimpu akha changa am phur ang no weh, Chuna Jewish rouphun anu jui ah akha chu mee ngeina hatta pek eya ta seba ae ranga thimpu eya amme.

Routakka manina thimpu ngei hekta tullu lu hi, awai akha chu waram hina ahla ae. Naha Moses ta ripi it ta chap mana ae. Amona ramrukka mani solhlak rang inn asinte sak rang apha ah, Chungthieng na amota hita rille, “Keina nangta ching chunga ripi hana am jui ah eheilim hi sem mo.”

Chuna atun chu manita lella chungtek, Jisu ta thimpu hina tullu pe pi ah, Chungthieng akha chu ma mee ngei karra lella angaihlak hratek akha choiya lutta sem thourang lim hi, lella hratek rouraen hina yarra ae.
Ahalpa angaihlak hina ekom asui akha chu aral amno talechu, ani supa angaihlak choiya luttang drakar am no weh.
Chuna Chungthieng na mani ngei sunga aral ha am sarukka amona hita rille,
“Rungni ngeiha naiya yung so weh Chungthieng na rilla am meh,
keina athar angaihlak Israel sanao ngei akha chu Judah hina mee ngeita choiya kahal jui apha ah.
Amatinga nangei pipu ngeita, angaihlak hekti ang no weh,
hana apha ah manita kakutta choiya rolla akha chu Egypt haithouwa manita ruiya shuk kinge.
Keina angaihlak kasen ping hata manina angaihlak kata lungduh no weh,
hana surukka manita keina lunglut nonge.
Atunchu, phaowanga am rungni eya ah,
Israel sanao ngeita angaihlak kasem anghi hi ae ta Rengpana rille hachu;
keina mani wakhalla kata rouphun eya hap pi ange akha chu mani shilung sunga jiekka si ang inge.
Keina mani Chungthieng ha chang ang inge hana manina kamee ngei ha chang pi ange.
Atu akha phaona matongpi anole leipak hana mee kolla
‘Rengpata dango’ ta chupi,
takpi no su oh maramchu asinte heithouwa aleen tekti
phao mani limna keita dang ange.
Keina mani pap lim kokpi ange akha chu mani
hrano ae lim woiha lea ya ningsing pi ang niange.”
Chuna athar angaihlak hina maram ma rilla am hi, Chungthieng na masa ah ari angaihlak sem pi ah, akha chu eyongpa ari changsa akha chu atit sa lim, sot no lutta mangpi siyowe.
Masa ah angaihlak hichu Chungthieng ta mokkang niyom ngei ae akha chu mokrang ha mee na sem sha ae.
Chuna dambor akha dunga, ha asunga thanmei doina sari akha chu Chungthieng ta kat rang doukang lea butol shi ae, na hita athieng amunt aeta boh weh.
Ani sunapa raap anungtinga dambor inn hata ehekta thieng tekte amunt aeta bohwe.
Hana sunga sonata ariem hoi mei hol saiphung, akha chu sona limpa hloom angaihlak na upu; upu sunga Manna tol bubel, anaa tol Aaronta molbuk, akha chu rakit rou eya jieksa alung pek ani am meh.

Upu achunga ahla nei giba shi pi hina maram chu Chungthieng na tatnowa loina am meh tina ae, ahla ngei hana phalla, pap eya ta kohpina amunt hata lipiya am meh. Chuna pot limpa hina maram ma anina atun apha na am no yarra hratakta jiekka shi nea no weh.
Hi rouphun lim hi thourang ae susa so weh. Thimpu ngeina nitiya awao ting dong damwul sunga lutweta mani ae phum shuk tullu ha lu ranga lutte.

Chutiweta chungtekti thimpu na akum akhashunga, woiha chak, asung ting dong damwul thiengtekti amunt sunga lutte. Malut jui apha ah, meelim pap korang akha chu matak mak pap kokrang, meelim ahutta amona athee choiya lutweta Chungthieng ta kat teh.
Athieng muihlana chupi takpiya amme, hachu, masapa damwul, thiengtekti amunt ha, thinga shi amlei apha ah, athieng meelim na athieng amunna lutranga lam ha atun hongpi no songe.
Na damwul hi atun apha taranga panteem akha changa ah songe. Hina artha chu pek ka am eya akha chu asata Chungthieng kolla katta am hina, Chungthieng ta mokka am ngei shilung sunga mapung pha no weh.
Maramchu hangeiha bakka, inna, adang adang thieng pirang nijom eya ha, nalimpa ha awao thonga thieng pirang nijom chakke. Na nijom hi, Chungthieng na athar nijom sem ma heita, jui hak kang chakke.

Chuna Khrista na chungtek thimpu akha changa, ahra eya taranga yung pi su so weh. Damwul sunga matullu ma ae, hita lella leentek akha chu lella mapung pha tekke; nahichu mee na sem ah no weh, simlei ram semma saruk tol kom ah no weh.

Khrista na damwul sunga, thiengtek ti amunt sunga malut hi, mee lim taranga woiha chak lut pi phur so weh. Thiengtek ti amunt hana malut jui ah, amona Chungthieng kolla katrang kel thee akha chu shil thee choiya lut no weh, hata lella mee limna atreem naino aring kaeto pharanga Jisu na mathee mak choiya lutta kat pi so weh.

Chuna kel thee akha chu shil lapa hina athee akha chu shil hatamte hina meikangsa awood ngeihi thieng no am mee ngeita thieng piranga mee ngei tak chung chai pi ae. Hana nahina manita thiengpi ae akha chu am housa mani hrano eyalim kokpi ae ta hallae.

Amatinga mani ae ya houphur eya kom chum meh, chuti weta Jisu Khrista athee hana eya tam lella ae nea ae tihi ripha; Athieng muihla hina yarra amona matak makta mapung pha Chungthieng ta kattang pot akha changa kat thukpi so weh. Chuna anina aring Chungthieng, maseba ae pharanga, mathee hana anita achum aral eheilim thiengpi ange.

Hina maram sarukka Khrista; matak makna athar angaihlak sempiyah, chuna, Chungthieng na rouraen pisa, atu yong Chungthieng na kok pi sa ngeina atreem naino yaihra ha pha pi angeti. Nahi jui ah hongpher hina maram chu amating masa angaihlak, mee ngeina aral tullu lu jui ah, aol ana pe no lutta hla ae, hana sarukka athiti pe ae.
Maram chu, thit pi rang am hata, ha sempi mee amona thipi shuk ta so weh.
Chuna, thit tanga shukka, thitranga thinge, maram chu athit rang semam mee hana aringleiya naha etikka kom arat makolla shuk no weh.
Chuna sarukka aharpa angaihlak hachu, athee tol nowa lingkok pino weh.

Chuna, masa ah Moses na rouphun sung jiekka shi rakit rou eyalim, mee ngei maikunga pa ah shuk kae. Hana amona shil lapa athee akha kelhina athee tui itta pulweta, rouphun abai chunga akha asha mul ashan, hissop sijin naam meelim chunga athee ha chai pi ae.
Nahi Chungthieng na nangei ningtinga rakit rou pek pi sa, adiek roungir hlak rang athee ha ae.
Hi itta chap mana ah, damwul chunga akha chu mokranga shijin nat am pot eya chunga, Moses nakom athee chai pi ae.
Chuna rouphun am jui ah, pot limpahi athee na thiengpi aeta rilla ngai ae, chuti weta athee mak tul pi nole, pak kokpirang adang am no weh.
Chuna sarukka waramma am pot hina panteem changa am ngeita hingeihina thiengpi tasowe, chuti weta wanram ma am pot hamakchu hingei ta lella ahra kattang pot drakar ui ae.
Chuna, mee na sem athieng amunt na Khrista na lutta no weh chuti weta waram makta ani taranga Chungthieng maikunga ripi ah, Rengpana ani hut silla lutpi ae.
Jewish chungtekti thimpu na akum chang honna asa hina athee choiweta thiengtekti amunt hana lutte. Chutiweta Khrista nachu matak makta katranga tatno lut no weh.
Hati lechu, Rengpana simlei ram sem mating, heithouwa tuiya aol donghak kanga ae. Chuna sarukka pek yarra pap lakka hourang woiha chak mee limta ripi so weh.
Meelimpa woiha chu thi ange, hana nutinga Chungthieng na routreem ae ange.
Hihekta Khrista nakom meejam pap kok pirang sarukka matak makta katthukka peya, aring kaeto tarang Rengpana hakka am ngeita pap ae no lutta, anisuna majung jui apha ya ripha ange.

Jihudi ngei rouphun hi atun takka adiek ngoiring ngai no ae. Nahi chu ahra taranga harra shi pal sha ae akum chang honna hana taranga chak katta pe ah am meh, alota rouphun hana nujuija katta am pot hana Chungthieng kolla phao mee na mapung pha ang meh?
Ejonga mee ngei na Chungthieng ta mok lea chu mani pak lim ha thiengpi ah mani na mani pak shilpi sho weta woiha lea ah pot kattang no weh.
Ano shou chu malmashi ngei na akum chang honna mani pak tullu lu lim angei thei ae.
Shillapa akha chu kel thee hana mee ngei pak chu shil pi nea no weh.
Chuna tarang sharukka Khrista na aleiram ma majung ang tieng amo na Chungthieng kolla rillea:
“Nangna akat pot hi di no weh chuti weta nang na
kataranga pum akha thourang ae pi so che.
Nang na ajoksha sarmai ah maicham chunga kat di no
che ae naha na pak shilpi rang ha.
Hana kei na rillinge,
‘hina kei am minge’ oh Chungthieng nahal ha ae ranga
rouphun abai shunga kataranga jiekka shi chu hekta.”
Masha ah amo na ril, “Nangna asha anga maicham chunga katta pek hi di no weh akha pel no weh hana pak shilpi nea no weh.”

Hana amo na ril, “Hina kei am minge oh Chungthieng nahal nadit tullu lu ranga.” Chuna sharukka Chungthieng na ari sha ka pot kat lim pa hou weta mani hutta Khrista na Chungthieng adit tullu lim ha lu sho weh ani lim hi shilpi so weh mapom ha mak woiha chakka mapek hana jarra.
Rouram chu Khrista na Chungthieng adit tullu lim ha ae sho weh ani lim ta pak hi shilpi sho weh mapom ha mak woiha chakka mapek hana jarra.
Jihudi thiempu ngeina rungni chang honna na hlou ha ahlong am no lutta leima tum ae sho weh, chuti weta hajong katta am hana pak ta chu shilla hou nea no weh.
Khrista pak shil ranga matak mak katta pek hina atreem nei no wa san pi na chang sho weh. Hana chu amo na Chungthieng ban changtienga onga am meh.
Hana amo na hakka am meh, Chungthieng na amota anda mee ngei ta akae ah tro ah shi malim ma.
Woiha chak mapum katta pek hana pak shil pi hina mapung pha na ah so weh.
Masha ah amo na ril, muihla athieng hana kom roungir tol sha ae.
“Nahi ae mani hitta kei na tharra kasaro ei ha, Rengna ril,
anutienga phao ang rungni eja ah chu keina mani lung shunga
rou hi shi ange hana mani kolla nahi jiekka shi ange.”
Hana woiha amo na ril, “Kei na woiha lea ah mani pak tullu angei thei ang ni ange akha chu mani hrano tullu lu lim pa kom shonga shi ang nonge.”
Chuna sharukka woiha lea ah pak shil ranga pot kattang am no weh ani pak hi shil shu takka.
Uleanao ngei oh, chuna sharukka ani hi Jisu thit na jarra athieng amunt na lut ngai ranga angai pe pi sho weh
Amo na athar lampi hongpi sho weh aring lam pi ha matak mak hana jarra.
Ani hi ehekta alok thiempu hut shil pi sho weh Chungthieng ma inn hana.
Chuna tarang sharukka shilung thienga akha chu ngoiring hitta munt ha ah ani na Chungthieng kolla nei ah wa sai oh, ephao chingna am no lutta akha chu athieng tui ah tak bulla.
Ani na lungrang am weta ril shuk sha rou ha chetta kolla shi ei oh, rouram chu Chungthieng chu masharo ei sha ha hata shi ae ti hi ngoiring ei oh.
Ani na akha lea akha taranga hal hlak weta ahra tullu tarang lungshi hlakka san hlak ei oh.
Ani na tukhlak weta rachun na ani am hi ae han am no ei oh, mee ahra na ae hekta akha lea akha thanum thathou hlakka, rouram chu reng rungni hi ehekta neitekka wa so weh.
Nang na danga danga, woiha lea ah pak tullu lu ta lea chu, na ha na taranga woiha lea ah kattang pot am no weh.
Chuna Chungthieng ta anda ngei taranga chu mani ta routreem sarmei akal akha am meh.
Atujong akha na Moses rouphun ta jui no mee amo ta chu athi pha ange lungshi thei no hekta, mee ani no lea hella mee na machanga routreem ae jui ja roungir tollea.

Chuna Chungthieng sanao ta ushit no mee ta chu? Hana pak ta shilpi pa Chungthieng athee ta amant atom te ah la mee ta chu? Atu mo muihla athieng lungshit ta ajak pe mee ae? Halla an no amo ha chu eja ah aol ana pha phong shuk mo ti ha.
Atu na rilla meh, ani na dange kei na lamant ding ange kei na lea pi ange, akha chu hi kom atuna rilla meh, “Reng na mamee ngeita routreem ae ange.”
Aring Chungthieng kut chunga tul hi eja ah atri pi ah meh?
Amatienga athingsha rungnie eja ha angei thei oh, alo ta nangei hitta am ha sha, Chungthieng mawar na war pi sho takka nangei aol ana eja dong nea ha.
Apha akha ah chu nangei na meelim maikunga ajak tukpi akha chu leima hrano tullu lu ah hajong ngei hitta nangei na rachun rang kom thourang ae phur ae.

Nangei na aral inn na am ngei hitta aol dong ha sho weh nangei pol lim mant ah shi hal kom nangei na riem ma am meh rouram chu hata lella hratekti atreem neino wa am mang akha am meh ti nangei na dange.
Ephao nulea no oh rouram chu nangei taranga alok lommant choi ah phao ange.
Adong ratto Chungthieng na saro eisha ha pha ranga.
Jieksha rou na rillea,
“Apha atante shot no wa
akha chu amo hi jung ang sho weh
amo hi tai ang ni jo weh.
Dramochel kamee ngei oh,
ngoiring mee na aring pha ange
chuti weta atu jong pa na nulea,
lea chu keina amo ta pellang nonge.”
Kani hi nulea mee akha chu amang mee no weh, hana hutta kani hi chu ngoiring mee hana sanpi pha mee sha ae.
Ani na ngoiring ti hi ani na ri no ta ani na den na shi hatta sui ang no weh ti ah ae.
Amatienga mee ngei na ngoiring na sharukka Chungthieng na angei mee change.
Ani na lungkim ah akha chu ngoiring jarra shimlei ram hi Chungthieng na marou chak na sem pi ae. Chuna atun na ani ri ah am hi ani na ri no hai thou wa shak sha ae.

Abel na mangoiring nu juija Kain ta hella Chungthieng kolla ahra pot kat ri ae. Mangngoiring hana Chungthieng na amota dramochel mee change rouram chu Chungthieng matak mak na mapek pot hi angai chang pi ae. Abel mangoiring hana jarra thi halkom atun phao rourilla am meh.

Enok chu mangoiring jarra athi hutta Chungthieng na amota rui ah kallea, chuna atu akha na amo ta tuk hlak no rouram chu Chungthieng na amota rui ah kal sha rukka. Jieksha rou na hitta rillea. Enok ta rai ah kal matienga Chungthieng na amo ta ehekta pellea.
Ngoiring am no atu akha ta Chungthieng na pel no weh chuna atujongpa akha na Chungthieng kolla wa lea chu ngoiring shu oh. Hana Chungthieng na ol mant pe ange amo ta jong mee lim ta.

Noah na mangoiring jarra sharukka Chungthieng na anutienga shukkang rouril hla ah thei pha ae mari lou hatta. Amo na Chungthieng rouril jui weta kung sha weta amo akha ma inn shung lim sanpi pha ae. Shimlei ram hi aol ana pha ah Noah chu Chungthieng lungshit mee change na hi ngoiring hai thou phao sha ae.
Abraham na mangoiring jarra Chungthieng na amo ta kok weta maram hou phurro hana Chungthieng na saro eisha ram ha pe ange ta madang no na ram ma emo na thinge.
Mangoiring jarra amo na ram hana meedang akha changa am meh. Chungthieng saro ei nu juija. Amo na dambur inn shunga ringa am meh, Isaac lea Jacob kom hahekta Chungthieng saro eiha pha nea ae.
Abraham na Chungthieng na sem hupi akha chu madit ta sem ram atreem neino akung hatta hakka am meh.
Ngoiring hana jarra ae Abraham na mapa akha changhi amo na eja ah ulien chang hal kom Sarah na unga am no hal kom. Amo na Chungthieng na saro ei hata ngoiringa am meh.
Abraham na asanao am pha hella thinghal kom makol hai thou wa matu mate eja wan na arshi ja akha chu tuipi hou wa waipin thi jou no ja tam meh.

Na manilim pa hi ngoiringa thi ngei rukkae hana mani limpa na Chungthieng saro ei pha hap no weh Chuti weta mani na aram alah hai thou wa nui shonga mani ta hakka am ha ripha nea ae. Hana chakno wa na aleiram hi ram hai ah phao unge ta dange.
Hijong rouril mani na thieng weta danga mani mak hina ram am meh ta anna am meh.
Mani houphur ram hata ephao mani na lea ah halla am no ae. Ejonga mani na halla ta lea chu mani lea rang apha am the kom ngai ae.

Hana hutta mani na hra tekti wanram ram hatta ngai tekka am meh chuna tarang sharukka mani. Chungthieng ae ta mani kok kang hi Chungthieng na kom mani taranga ajak am no weh rouram chu areng mani tarang hupi akha sem pi so weh.
Abraham mangoiring na jarra ae Chungthieng na amota chang anna akha chak asanao pe oh rilla pek nea ha,
Chungthieng makolla rillea, “Isaac kol hai thou ah natu nate pe ange ta kei na saro ei inge.”
Abraham na dangpha nea ae, Chungthieng chu athi sha Isaac ta kom ringpi nea ae, chuna hitta rillea ngei ae, Abraham na Isaac hi athi sha hai thou ah pha ae.
Ngoiring na jarra anutienga shukkang eja ta. Isaac na Jacob lea Esau ta saro ei ha jaihra pe pi ae.
Ngoiring na jarra Jacob na Josep sanao lim ta athit matieng jaihra pe pi ae. Amo na mamolbuk ta beija Chungthieng kolla mokkae.
Ngoiring na jarra Josep na mathit ang tieng phao sunga, Israil sanao ngei na Egypt houphur ang tieng mapum ha alo ta ae ang sha ti rou chupi phur ae.
Ngoiring na jarra ae Moses manu mapa na adon shu waitak hla thum thumpa shi nea hi. Mani na ehekta ahra unga mel rijuija Reng tronglam ta atri am no wa aril jui no hi ae.
Ngoiring na jarra Moses na alien ashai shukka hang jui ja Rengsanao na han asa naopa oh ta kok jui num no hi.
Amo na apha atante ariem ahoi ang sharuk chu Chungthieng mee ngei hitta aol ana dong num meh.
Amo na Messiya taranga trongshi bakpa na lella di tekkae Egypt ram ma lal thum ta pai ang sha ruk chu, rouram chu mamitta anu tienga mapha rang mana ha mari juija.
Moses na Reng lungshat am hal kam ephao atri am no lutta Egypt ram hou phur ra tan na thing nea ae, rouram chu mitta ri lou Chungthieng ta mitta ri hek ta hallea chuna sharukka amo na nulea no weh.
Chuna ngoiring na jarra lan na bu reen ae pi weh ta shongkar chang honna athee tai oh ta tronglam pe ae chulea chu masha don Israel sanao lim pa ta meethat wanrai na that ang no ae.
Ngoiring na jarra ae Israel sanao ngei na ashan tuipi lien ta kangphal hekta lan na thingha. Chuna chu hekta Egypt sanao ngei na lan na wakjui chu tuipi lien na mani lim ta rolhap so ae.
Ngoiring na jarra ae Jerikho bang ha Israel sanao ngei na rungni sary ahul tunga kella junghi.
Ngoiring na jarra ae vokno nu Rahab ta Chungthieng aril juino ngei hitta that tang hai thou wa aring pha ae, rouram chu amo na Israel aru rouron ngeita tonpi hekta sanpi sharukka.
Kei hi rillang song mo ae? Apha na am nijo weh Gideon, Barak, Samson, Jephtah, David, Samuel akha chu adang rouphu pa ngei maram ma ril shukkang.
Mani na ngoiring na jarra ram, ram ngeita ral ae weta nea ae. Mani na adiek akha chu Chungthieng saro ei ha chak la ae. Mani na nungsha mur thinga shi ae.
Sarmei kom kanpi no ae, chamshai takka thattang phao sanpi ae. Mani ha leima shullea, chuti weta aratpi ae, tuiram ral mee ta nea ranga ratpi ah ral nea ae.
Ngoiring na jarra namei ngei na mani uleanao athi sha ngei ha aring pha ae.
Adang adang ngei na lella hratek aring pha ranga.
Adang ahre ta chu nuisho shimsho ah chakno wa phit pi ah akha chu adang ahre ta na thirrui ah huppa aral inn na shi pi ae.
Mani ta alunga denge, hana mani ta chamsai takka that ae, mani ta kelmo akha chu kel vut takka apun ani shakpi ae chuti mahai mani ta hrano ah ae.
Shimlei ram hi mani taranga chu hrat na ephao am ni jo weh! Mani na inn lou am no ngei hekta ramrukka akha chu mulbunga rolla alung hur shunga ano lea alei hur shunga ringe.
Eja ah makla mo ae mani na ngoiring nga am nea hi, chu phao shunga mani na Chungthieng rourean na pha no songe.
Rouram chu Chungthieng na lella hratek tullu ani trang ae rang lungir sho weh mahal madit chu ani hitta am ha lea chu mani ha lella mapung pha mee chang ange.

Ani taranga chu ani hi wairul riha na mee lungir ngei ahul tunga am meh, chuna sharukka ani lamma hanna am pakna ani ta chetta kolla am hei thou wa shuksei oh, akha ani matienga am lam ha adong thei hitta munt ha ah tansei oh.

Ani ngoiring thouna akha chu atreem na chang Jisu ta ani mit denna shi ei oh, amo na khross hana ha hla ah hou no ae, maram chu ariem hana amota hakka am jarra, amona khross chunga thi ang ajak atri lim eko halnowe, amo hi atun Chungthieng phomlu changtieng nakka onga am meh.
Maram chu nangei muihla ha nulea no oh, sreng amo ta jaishi ngei na hija anshi anda, akha chu tronglok lim dong ha hallo.
Nangei na atun phao shung pak hitta maituk hlakka ane rang hot nat ha athit phao ah ae rang pha no shonge.
Chungthieng na nangei ta asanao ngei hekta thanum thathou trong pekha nangei na mak jou chou?
“Kasanao oh, Rengna rakjuija hrabakta hallo,
akha chu amona nangta raan juija nulea no oh.
Maram chu Rengna malungshit meelim ta raan nea,
akha chu asanao chang angei ta amo na leichoi ae.”
Mapa na raan hekta ngai ah aol dongo, na ol nanat hana Chungthieng na asanao ngeita ae hekta nangei ta ae ah sha ae maram chu mapa na raan lou asanao atu am ma meh?
Ejong nangta asanao ngei oh hekta raan no lea chu, nang chu adiek asanao no che ae, chuti weta nangchu shatun rai so che ae.
Anita raan rang ani pa am meh, hana anina mani ta atri ajakkae, ani na eja ah lella ani muihla mapa pathieng ta ajak atri ang no meh!
Ani malmashi apa ngei na apha te taranga raan nea, mani na diek kae ta hal nujuija, chuti weta Chungthieng hina athieng tum lim pha ranga ani na ahoi ranga arengpu amo na raan nea.
Araan pha hi atun, atun tarang ariem rang ano weh chuti weta aol sha ae, hana anutienga chu nahana jarra jui ja am ngei ta adai hina ara akha chu dramochel ringchang ha pepi ae.
Hamma am nakut ngei ha dokshukjou oh, akha chu hirra nahukha dokjou oh!
Kaetlikpa na lampi ah kae mathui no wa adam ahra chang ranga nangei na nangei lampi ha hra ah shemmo.
Meelim pa hitta deija am rang hot na oh akha chu athieng ringchang ring rang hot na oh maram chu nahi tol no wa atu akha na ko arengpu ta ripha ang no ae.
Chungthieng ringrei ngei hei thouwa nulea no rang ratta am mo, atu akha na ko akha thingkung hekta tou ah hanga tour changa aol ana shukpi no shu oh.
Atu akha na kom Eso hekta woklou, akha chu muihla am no wa bu chara akha ta taranga asanao ulienpa chunga mapha phungshuk ha jurra hou ae.
Maram chu nangei na dange, anutienga chu Eso na jaihra phanum halkom amota ngaipi no ae amona mitui tulla ratta jung halkom ma ae sha ha chu woiha lea ah ahlong rang am no weh.
Israel mee ngei na wak hekta nangei chu wa no chou ae maram chu sarmei kanga am Sinai mulla ahang athiem thirang phaibu ah.
Mee ngei na tumpet tum arasha akha chu shanrol hina tara theijuija mani na adang arasha rou thei no rang rillea.
Maram chu ashe na phao amul hatta tonglea chu thi ange ti rou ha mani na ngai nea no ae.
Hana mitta ri ah phao ehekta atri rang am meh, maram chu Moses na phao hitta rillea, kei na atri hai shulla hirra am minge.
Hana hutta aring Chungthieng wan ramma Jerushalem Zion amulla nangei na wa oh, wanrai lashingei hitta.
Wanram ma ming jieksha masha don sanao ngei lim ariem ma bomtul na akha chu akoksha lim ngei routreem, akha chu ahra meengei muihla ta rakitpi Chungthieng kolla waso che ae.
Athar roungir shempipa Jisu kolla akha chu Abel thee ta lella ahra rou trongshuk rang saro eihitta munt ha ah athi thee sha kolla nangei na wa so chou ae.

Rourilla am arengpu ta nangeina ngaino ae no rang chekshillo maram chu nangei ta mitsing kursingpi pa amota manina ngai no sharukka ringphur no lea chu. Wanram tienga mitsing kursingpipa arengpu makal hei thou ani na hamma thing lea chu eja lella ring ang nowa meh.
Apha hana Arengpu amona mashanrol na shimlei ta hirpi ae chuti weta atun chu keina shimlei chak ano wa wanram ta ko lingpi ange ta saro ai so weh.
Rou hana ko woiha lella thienga muh pi ae ti chu ashomsha lim hi lingpi ange akha chu lah ah hou ange, chutilea chu lingpi ngailou pot ha hata am mange.
Ani na dommei oh, maram chu ani na linga ngaina Rengram akha ha pha so weh, ani na ariem ma Chungthieng ta ajak atri akha chu mapel rang lam ma mokkai oh.
Maram chu ani Chungthieng chu kanga mangpi nea sarmei ae.
Khristen uleanao hekta akha lea akha lungshi hlakka ammo.
Nangei inn shungei ha hulangei ta riemtuk rang angei thei oh, hitta ae ah atujongpa na dang hou no wa wanrui ngei ta riemtuk kae.
Araen inn na am ngei ta ko angei thei oh mani hitta raen inn na am hekta ngai oh aol donga am ngei ta ko nangei aol dong hekta angei thei oh.
Athieng nuhla hi meelim ngei na atri ajak kanga ae. Hana mani kotchung ha mutpi no shu oh, Chungthieng na woklou tullu akha chu mee namei mee pishal lal ngeita routreem mange.
Naring chang ha sum lea pai di hei no oh akha chu na am hana ahap nei oh, maram chu Chungthieng na rillea keina etikka ko plella hou ang nonge, keina etikka ko hla ah hou ang nonge.
Ani na atri am no lutta rillei oh,
“Arengpu hi keita sanpipa ae,
kei na atri ang nonge,
keita atu na ae nea ang meh?”
Nangei matienga lamkai Chungthieng ahra rou nangei kolla rilphur ngei ha angei thei oh, mani na alo ta ringa houphur akha chu a thiphur meh ti ha lea ah hallo, akha chu mani ngoiring ha ae chu oh.
Jisu Khrista hi ajan ko awoni ko, akha chu atreem nei nowa hlong am no weh.

Adang adang akha chu alou, dieklou chupi hana nangei ta choija thingpi no oh maram chu muihla ta abakpot anowa, lungshi na chet pi pana hra ae, abak ah een hina nutieng juija thing hana mani tarang ahra eko am no weh.
Jihudi ngei mokna amunt hana tlon lu wa am thiempu na kani shaiphunga don nashi eheilim bakphung shuk no weh.
Jihudi ngei thiempulel na thiengtekti amunt hana paklim tarang don asha ngei thee choija lutte chuti weta ashangei apum ha chu auwa holla hou ae.
Hina sharukka Jisu mathee hana meelim pak shilpi ranga hupi au-wao wa thi ae.
Chuna sharukka inn oh wao wa makolla thingweta akhe chu majak tuklim ha pha ha eijo.
Maram chu aleiram hina athanshakka am mang ani tarang hupi am no ae ani na phao ang hupi hatta anna ameh.
Chuna sharukka ani na arengpu majarra Chungthieng am na ah apha changhonna adom na akat ti chu arengpu maninga ani na adom ha pe eijo.
Ahra tullu lu akha chu akha lea akhu shanhlakha makno oh, maram chu hijongpa kat hi Chungthiengna pellea.

Nangei lambai ngei ril juijo akha chu mani roupek juijo, maram chu mani na nangei muihla ta solha am no lutta runga am meh, maram chu mani tullu lu ha Chungthieng kolla pe ange. Nangeina mani ril juilea chu mani na mani tullu ha ariem ma ae ange chutinolea manina olla ae ange akha chu nahana nangei ta sanrang am no ae.
Kani taranga chan nolutta nie pi oh, adiek diekno dang rang lung thieng am munge maram chu adiek ha apha changhonna kani na ae num munge.
Keita Chungthieng na nangei kolla lea ah ranga hla rang lung lutta shilung thienga nie rang nangeita nie ah am minge.

Chungthieng na athi hei thou ringpi arengpu Jisu, kelmo ngei rung ha na kathukka mathit na jarra atreem neino roungir hi chumnam so weh. Mahal ha ae ranga Chungthieng adai hana nangei awat lim ha pe shu oh amo na Khrista jarra mapel rang ani chunga ae shu oh. Akha chu Khrista ta atreem am no wa domna nei shu oh. Amen.
Kalungshit uleanao ngei oh nangei ta ka jiekhla rou ha dang ngou oh maram chu keina nangei ta tronglam shei ah jiekka hla nonge.
Ani uleanao Timothi ta raen inn shonga heithou hla pi so weh ti nange na dango, amo na nangei kolla harra walea chu keina amohitta nangei ta ri hlak kange.
Nangei ta lamkai ah am akha chu Chungthieng mee ngeita kani riemtuk pepi oh, Italy heithou uleanao ngei hana kom nangeita riemtuk pe ae.
Chungthieng lungshit ha nangei lim chunga am shu oh.
Chungthieng akha chu Arengpu Jisu Khrista hina suuk Jacob kol hai thou wa simlei chung lim ma Chungthieng mee ngeita riemtuk pe ah am meh.
Ka-u-kanao ngei oh, nataranga minna hallo, edang dang no wa nalampi ah eheilim ma ahlem phao kom ngei ae.
Nang na nadang pharang chu hajong ahlem limma natukhlak jui ja thangshuk maipak shuk ta lea chu nang hi adongthei sho weta dang ngo.
Suino wa nahallang chu hajong adong rat hana mani na ephao sui pi no lea chu ephao awat am no mapung pha mee akha so ae.

Chutiweta nangei kar sunga atu jong pa na lungsing am no lea, amo ha Chungthieng kolla nie shu oh, amo na pe nea ae; rouram chu Chungthieng chu meelim ta atam ma shilung lokka akha chu lungshi ah pe nea ae.
Chutiweta nangna niek juija ngoiring nga nie ang nga ae eko ngaidol no oh. Atumotieng hajong ngaidol mee amo ha chu tuipi lin na tuijul hek ti ae chuna thirang rang juija junga thing ang nge.
Hajong mee ha chu ephao wa malung na angir am mang no ae, akha chu ma lu tullu lim ha lungir am no ae chuna amo na Chungthieng kol hai thou wa ejong akha pha ange ta hal no shu oh.
Sarah Khristen ngei hi Chungthieng na mani ta dom ma kal jui ja ariem mang nga ae.
Hana achongpu Khristen ngei kom Chungthieng na athui ja tol pi juija mani kom ariem mang nga ae. Rouram chu ram mulla tau reipar na charra thing chu hekta achongpu pa kom hahekti ange.
Siemnie na shukka hang jui ja ram pa lim nie sha dong nea no wa charre; reipar kom tui ae, akha chu ahra ha kom tuija thinge hi na chu hekta achongpu pa kom tui ang sha ae.
Aol pha wakjui ja lung lea no wa ngoiringa ariem ma am ngei mani hana thang shuk maipakka pha jui chu, mani ha Chungthieng na amota lungshi ngei ta pe ange saro ma ei sha lom mant ha pha ange.

Ejonga hajong ahlem na wak jui ja amo na na hi Chungthieng kol hai thou wa ahlem pa ae ta ril no shu oh. Rouram chu hrano na Chungthieng ta etikkom hlem nea no ae akha chu amo na kom atu akha ta hlem no ae.
Chutiweta mee chu amo na hrano tullu madit hana amota ahlem tukkae.
Chuna hrano tullu madit hana nao ron na pak don ae; hana pak hana lok jui ja chu athi pha ae.
Uleanao ngei oh, hungpher no shu oh!

Ahra kuthul akha chu rakit pha tullu lim hi thangwan hai thou junge; na hi Chungthieng kol hai thou wa jung sha ae amo ha chu thangwan na awar sempipa sha ae, hana atu akha na amota nulea pi weta athiem wul pi nea no ae.
Mahal malung hana ani ta adiek rou trong hita amo na rui ah phao pi sho, chu lea chu ani na makut sem ngei lim kar sunga ani na masha ah am phung shukkae.
Ngaithei oh kalungshit uleanao ngei oh! Meelim na rou chu hara thei pha ang nga ae. Chutiweta rou ril shuk lea lungshat chu har ang no sha ae.
Malmashi lungshat na Chungthieng dramochel pha nea no ae.
Chuna hrano nasiemshak akha chu amut tullu ha hou jou oh. Hana Chungthieng pek marou ma trongshan ha nalunga la jou oh, na hana nangta sanpi nea ae.
Marou ngaithei chak changno oh, hana hutta tullu changa ae oh.
Atujongpa na rouril ha thei chu theiweta tullu changa ae no mee chu spa akha na mamel melsen na an na hata am hek ti ae.
Amona mathei chakka mamel ha minna an weta shukka thinge hana amohi ejongpa melmo ae chu maklen so ae.
Apha changhonna roukung hata hrabakta ngei weta amak am no lutta tullu chang nga ma ae jui ja jaihra pha ange.
Atujong na amo hi dramochel mee ae ta halla meh? Ejonga amo na maleipar ha chekshil no lea chu madramo machel ha ariem sum ae hana matak na matak ta ngaidol mee ae.

Mapa Chungthieng na athieng adiektak akha chu dramochel mee ae ta hal chu, hi ae. Nuleapa sum akha chu arong tuimei na aol ana pha juija hrabakta shelpi rungpi hana akha chu akha ta matakna hrano amut simlei hai thou wa lutnorang anpi ta ae.
Ani arengpu Khrista Jisu minga kalungshit uleanao Arengpu ahung ajai hina. Nangei na mee ngei mel an weta adang adanga hran na tullu lu no oh.
Ejonga achongpu pa na sona kutjabik donna akha chu alinglut ahra senga nangei bomtul na ah phao ah, akha chu Sarah pana apun adier atit sha ha seta phao lea chu.
Ejonga nang na apun ani ahra jon pa tah hella ajak ati ah “Ahra ang na hina am sha ae ongo,” chuti weta Sarah pa ta chu, “Nangna ha na ngir ro, ano lea kae to na alei chunga ong nga,” ril ta lea chu.
Nang hi nangei kar sung phao wa kom hrano ahran tullu lu ah am che ae. Akha chu hrano saitan routreem ae ah am meh.
Ngai oh, kalungshit uleanao ngei oh! Chungthieng na nasimlei hina Sarah ngeita ngoiring tienga chongrang hal lea, chu amota lungshi mee ngei taranga masaro ei sha rengram ha pha ranga.
Chutiweta nang na chu sara ngeita ajak ati no ae! Achongpu ngei no meh nangei ta routreem ha? Manina aol ana peh mee ha!
Mani ha ae nangei ming ahra hata hrano wa rouril ha.

Jieksha rou na ril chu hekta, “Nang na na inn ning tuitieng ta natak mak hek ta lungshi oh” rou phun ha mak jui ta lea chu adiek takka nangei na ahra tullu lu ah ae. Na chu athieng abai shunga tukkae.
Chutiweta nang na ejonga awao wa meemel an weta tullu lu ta lea chu nang na pak tullu lu so ae, hana nanghi rouphun hata kui pi mee ha ae, chuna rouphun na nang ta routreem ange.
Chuna atujong mee na tronglam ta akha juino shu lea chu amo na peksha tronglam lim ta jui no mee ae.

Rouram chu nahita akha rukkae, “Mee namei ta lal thing no oh,” hana woiha pa kom, “Mee that no oh,” Chuna ejonga nang na mee namei tah lal thing no che hal kom nang na mee tah that ta lea chu na ha kom rouphun ta kui pi ha nange.
Adiek routreem ae thei ngei na ani ta hla chu hekta natrong nu jui ja tullu kom lu oh.
Rouram chu ringrei thei lou atu motieng na routreem ma ae juija machunga Chungthieng na ringrei ngei pi ang no ae; ringrei ngei na routreem ta ane ae.
Kalungshit uleanao ngei oh, Atujong akha na ngoiring inge tah ril weta tullu tol no lea makolla hoija hra ah meh? Chuna ngoiring hana amota san na meh?
Ejonga uleanao sar lea tah punchoi rang kom am no hana abak rang kom am no ngei kolla.
Nangei na manita, Chungthieng na jaihra pe shu oh akha chu lummo, won shiah bakko rilweta eko peno lea chu echu ahra ah meh?
Chuna tullu tol no wa ngoiring chak chu, athi sha ae.

Chuna nangei kar sunga atu mo akha na hita rillea chu, “Apa akha na ngoiring nge akha na tullu changa lu mee ae.” Hina karil num chu, “Alo ta atu mo akha na tullu tol no lutta ngoiring mee ha ri pi oh, kei chu nangta ka tullu hina kangoiring ri pi tikkae.”
Chungthieng akha chakkae ti hi nangna ngoiring che? Hra ae! Dijabol na kom ngoiring nge aty ahier ae.
Lungmo apa! Nang na naha dang num che tullu tol lou ngoiring chu ariem sa ae.
Alota ani puthou Abraham ta Chungthieng na adiektak ngoiring mee ae ta halla sha? Na ha chu asanao Isaac ta maicham ma mapek matullu hana ae.
Nangna ripha no che? Mangoiring lea matullu ha akha chakno meh, ma tullu hana mangoiring hata rakit pha pi ae.

Hana jieksha rouril ha adiek tak tung so ae, “Abraham na Chungthieng ta ngoiring jarra Chungthieng ta mangoiring hana sharukka dramochel mee ae ta lah pi ae,” Chuna Abraham ta Chungthieng na tongpi ta kokkae.
Anno matullu ae hana Chungthieng na mee hata adiek mee changpi ae chuna mangoiring nachak ah no ae.
Nahi vokno Rahab ta shuk pi hekti ae Chungthieng na matullu hana amo ta adiek mee changpi ae, tichu Israel ngei aru rouron mee ta hrabak ta tukhlakka manita sanpi ah adang lam tienga hlapi jarra.
Chuna pum hi muihla tol no wa chu athi sa ae, chu hekta tullu tol no ngoiring chu athi sha ae.
Uleanao ngei oh, nangei atam pa na ocha chang ngei no ae, nangei na dang ang chau ae, ocha chang ani ta hella loktekka routreem ae ange mee adang hek ti ang no ae.
Ani lim pa hi woiha, woiha lal chak ti ae, chuti weta ejonga mee akha na maril matrong juija aral am no lea chu amo hi rakit pha mee ae hana mapum lim pa ta hrabakta sum na mee ae.
Ani na sakor murra rui ren na chu ani ril jui rang nga ae, hana ani na thingpi num na amunt na thingpi nea ae.
Ano lea halla anno kung ha, haja lok halkom arat ajap ahai karra alota thou wa thingsha, athou pa na thingpi num na tieng nga thing hi asien te nou hana jarra ae.
Chuna leipar hi asiente halkom tien amo na ehekta alok rou ril shuk nea ae.
